
1a1(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba brgyad bklu sgrub kyi mdzad pa bzhugs/ /
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ yo ga sha ta ka /bod skad du/ sbyor ba brgya pa/ sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od
1b2(mdo 'grel): kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa klu sgrub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ring du grags pa'i gso spyad nas/ /mdza' 
1b3(mdo 'grel): yas rgyud kyi gces pa blangs/ /sman pa mkhas par ram mchod pa'i/ /sbyor ba brgya yis bcings par bya/ /bdud rtsi lta bu'i
1b4(mdo 'grel): sman sbyor gyis/ /lus ni nad med 'gyur ba yin/ /gso dpyad shes pa'i sman pa yis/ /nad rgyu mtshan nyid yongs su brtag/
2a1(mdo 'grel): sle tres sla sgang byi tsher bca' sga dang/ /byi tsher gla sgang tik+ta parba Ta/ /bA sA byi tsher bca' sga gla sgang rnams/ /
2a2(mdo 'grel): bskel thang rlung mkhris bad kan rims la btung/ /k+Shu tra sle tres bca' sga paSh+kaur/ /bskol ba'i thang byas bad kan rlung mchog
2a3(mdo 'grel): la/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde bcas dang ka med/ /gzhogs gzer nyes gsum las byung rim la'ang bsngags/ /dong ka drod
2a4(mdo 'grel): sman nar rtsa gla sgang dang/ /hong len a ru ra rnams bskol ba'i thang/ /gzer bcas tshad 'khru bad rlung ldan rims la/ /phan
2b1(mdo 'grel): no drong skyed bzhu ba byas bas kyang/ /rgun 'brum gla sgang hong len a ru ra/ /dong ka parba ta ka'i thang byas la/ /mkhris byung rims dang bslab bcol brgyal
2b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /mgo 'khor tsha skam skom dad ldan rnams la/ /kaN+Da kA ri bca' sga sle tres bskol/ /dro sman nar mo bsres pa'i thad 'thungs pas/ /gsus
2b3(mdo 'grel): gzer lud pa tshad rnying dang ka med/ /pho ba'i nad chab dpugs mi bde rnams 'joms/ /byi tshar parba Ta ka a ru ra/ /ba sha hong len titpa pri yaM ku/ /ka ra cher
2b4(mdo 'grel): btab bskol ba'i thang 'thungs pas/ /skom dang khrag mkhris rims dang tshad ldan 'joms/ /rims nad gso ba'i spyad do// //skyer rtsa 'bras
2b5(mdo 'grel): bu gsum dang bi shA lA/ /skyer rtsa phye mar byas la nges par bskol/ /thang la sbrang rtsi ldan pa 'thungs pa yis/ /gcin kha snyi pa'i nad skyes ma lus 'joms//
3a1(mdo 'grel): u dI tsya dang ka ba de bong nga dkar/ /gla sgang dug mo nyung bcas thang byas pa/ /tshad pa zer bcas khrag 'khru dang bcas la/ /yun ring zhugs
3a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'khru ba rnams la phan/ /gla sgang bca' sga bong da dkar por bcas/ /sle tres cha mnyam chu la bskol 'thungs pas/ /me drod zhan pa'i rgun gyi nad rnams
3a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /tshad zin 'khru ba'i nad kyang sel bar 'gyur/ /pags nad lto ba na dang skya rbab na/ /spos dang cham pa bad kan mgul 'gags la/ /bu na rna bA thang shing a
3a4(mdo 'grel): ru ra/ /sle tres ba gcin gu gu la ldan pa btung/ /bla sgang shi gru thang shing dan+ti 'bras/ /bi ta gro sman nar phye bcas thang gis/ /rgyun tu kha rkub nas 'byung srin phu
3a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /srin las skyes ba'i nad kyang 'joms bar 'gyur/ /suk+Sh+me dro sman shing mngar na le sham/ /a sma b+he dang a ri bA sha gze/ /brag zhun gtso cher bskol
3b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i thang 'thungs na/ rde'i gsag ma dang bcas gcin sri sel/ /bra gzhun asma b+he dang suk+Sh+me dang/ /dro sman phye ma 'bras bkrus chu btab btung/ /yang na bu ram dang bcas 'thungs tsam na/ /gcin
3b2(mdo 'grel): sri 'chil thug pa'ang 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dong ka dang ni gze ma a ru ra/ /byi tsher asma bE ta ba shi ka /bskol ba'i thang la sbrang rtsi ldan 'thungs na/ /tsha zhing gzer bcas gcin sri grol bar 'gyur//
3b3(mdo 'grel): dod ka dang ni sle tres bA sha rnams/ /e ra ta mar khu la bskol thang 'thungs na/ /rlung byung rnam 'gyur ma lus khrag gi nad/ /steng 'og lus kun nas 'dzag rim bas 'joms/ /taN+Du la ka'i rtsa
3b4(mdo 'grel): ba lig bu mig /'bras kyi chun la sbrang rtsi ldan 'thungs na/ /kun gyis bskyed pa'i khrag nang nges bar 'joms/ /dbugs mi bde la b+hArgI bca' sgas so/ /bi ha ti gnyis e raNa ka ped dang/ /
3b5(mdo 'grel): ma tu a sma k+Sha ra shing kun gze/ /saind+ha e ra Na mar khur bsres byas thang/ /rked pa snying nu pho mtshan gzer bas btud/ /shing kun shu dag kha ru bca' sga dang/ /go snyod a ru puSh+ka ru rta rnams/
3b6(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i cha 'phel phye mar byas rnams kyis/ /lto skran rims rnying gsud nad rnams la'o/ /bca' sga shing kun ru tsa cha snyam byed/ /sga chu la bskol bad kan rlung byung dang/ /rtsib loD
4a1(mdo 'grel): snying rgyab gsus gzer gsung rnams la/ /btung ngo de bzhin nas khrus rtug 'gags la'o/ /'jam 'bras lo ma'i pI shA lA tsa bya/ /tsi tra tsha gsum lan tshwa gtso cher btsegs//
4a2(mdo 'grel): bsregs pa'i thal ba zhol sbyar 'thungs bas/ /dmu? skran skya rbab rkub kyi nad rnams sel/ /shing kun shu dag bca' sga swa rtsi ka /kha ru phyi ma nyis 'gyur phye mar byas/ /chu dron btab 'thungs sna tshogs
4a3(mdo 'grel): gsung gzer dang/ /snying nad skran dang stod du rlung 'tshangs 'dzoms/ /shing rgI tsha gsum 'bras gsum kaN+Da ka /b+hA rgI puSh+ka rdza DA tshwa sna lnga/ /phye ma chu don btab 'thungs skyigs bu lud/ /dang ka med cha ba
4a4(mdo 'grel): stod rlung mi bde 'joms/ /dzi bu du gnyung arga shi gru snu ha bse shing byA g+hi bri ha tI/ /pA ri ka bed tshos shing dzA DA a bA ma rga ni m+bi tsa traka /pa Sha puSh+ka rba? Da la dang sainda ldan pa bsregs thal bskolpa la/ sngar
4a5(mdo 'grel): bshad shing kun la sogs pa'i/ /khu pa lto skran bad kan nad la btung/ /tsa byA star bu tsha gsum bse yab bcas/ /ba lu dzI ra bcu gang tsi tra ka /phye ma cha mnyam bur bsres dri gsum ldan/ /gre
4a6(mdo 'grel): mdzer cham bad dang ka med la bsdags/ /ba lu tsa bya na sha mi mtshungs gnyis pa/ /mu la bcu gang dro tsa'o sga gsum 'gyur/ /bu ram sum 'gyur dri bzang ril byar mur/ /grang bzhi glo rims gzer ba'i
4b1(mdo 'grel): gzhang? 'brum sel/ /sgra drod na lo sha nA 'dab shing cha/ /su k+She? mdza' rims gang 'phel phye mar byas/ /'di dag cha 'dra'i gang 'gam gzhang med zhan/ /dbugs dang mi bde skran mgul snying nad pa'o/ /saind+ha shing kun 'bras gsum la la phud/ /tsha gsum bu ram cha
4b2(mdo 'grel): rnams ril bu byas/ da rnams mur zhing myangs pas tshim thob cing/ /me drod zhan las rab tu byung ba'ang sel/ /lcags phye tsha gsum brgya shugs cha thams cad/ /mA k+Shi phye ma dang mnyam de rnams bza' / /rgun 'brum ldan pa'i rjes su dar 'thungs bas/ /skya rbab nad la
4b3(mdo 'grel): phan zhing ring du 'gro/ bu ram ldan pa'i bca' sga'i drod sman nar/ /gsum pa a dur 'am bal pa'i se'u/ /bad kan tshang snying gzhang 'brum nad rnams dang/ /rtug pa 'gags pa rnams la'ang rtag tu bya/ /bca' sga gla sgang a ru ra phye la/ /bu ram ldan pa la ni ril bu bya//
4b4(mdo 'grel): lud pa dbugs mi bde dang tsha ches rnams/ /kha ru ril bu mur bas bzlog par 'gyur/ /n+ya gro utpal ru rta mAk+Sha ka/ phye ma 'bras che bcas pa ril bu bya/ /sru pa kha ru mur bas skom dad dang/ /rab tu 'phel pa myur du 'joms par 'gyur/ /ldong ros drod smen nar
4b5(mdo 'grel): mo ? le sha ma/ /phye ma ka bi ? skyur khu bar ldan/ /'bras phye cha mnyam ma kI ka bsres pa'i/ /bus pas lan cig ma yin skyug pa 'joms/ /sna khrag 'dzag la du rba'i khu ba 'am/ /bal se'u me tog khu sbyar nges par bstan/ /bud med nu zho rgyu skyegs khu ba
4b6(mdo 'grel): 'am/ ? Da ma k+Shi kas kyang e ku 'joms/ /skyu ru sbos dkar khu ba kha ru tshe/ /de rnams bsres pa so ba re la btags/ das 'dir myur bar gzhi nas zhe? byed cng/ /ji lta'i skyig bu slar mi 'byung pa yin/ /durba indta thal ka a ru ra/ /ku ther kA kany+dzi ka
4b7(mdo 'grel): dar btags/ /gsum bas phyug pa'am nu ma'i 'og btags pas/ /shu ba dang ni g.yan pa rnam par 'joms/ /snu ha ci tra b+h+ri? ga arka dang/ /mya ngan med shun ru rta tsha ba gcin/ /bcas pa'i mar khus shu ba mdze glang shu/ /gdug pa'i rma dang za 'brum se kha?
5a1(mdo 'grel): 'phrog /gu gu la mig sman bra tshil simd+hur/ /bang ma cha mnyam tsha ba'i mar khus btso/ /khyi rdo za tsag gis ni lus skams la/ /lan cig byugs pa'i nus pa gzhi nas 'don/ /bu brtsi kA ru rta mu rba sga/ /rgya skyegs dang ni brtsod dang yud ba rnams
5a2(mdo 'grel): drug 'gyur dar ba la bskol grub pa na/ /byugs pas grang dang tsha ba'i rims 'joms so/ /kaN+Da kA ri sle tre sa bA sha ka/ phye mar zhun mar la bskol grub ba de/ /'thungs pas tshad rnying lung gzer dbugs mi bde/ /me drod zhan pa'i pho ba'i nad la phan/ /bA sha sed
5a3(mdo 'grel): ldeng ba Ta la pa tra/ /ni m+ba shing tshe sle tres ta ma la/ /ki phye mar sar la bskol myur grub na/ /me dpal mkhris bskran mdze las brgyal bar 'gyur/ /drug pas khrag dang bcas pa brgya yi skyon/ /rab 'khrugs las skyes yan lag lus kun gzer/ /
5a4(mdo 'grel): bye brag med bal chang gis ra ro ga /rmongs pa chang 'thungs las skyes rnam 'gyur la/ /kaN+Da ka ri ni m+ba pa to la/ /sle tes 'bras gsum 'jam 'bras ba sha ka /phye chud ra rnying la ni cho gas gtso/ /myur du grub 'dir mdze las myur du rgyal/ /kar
5a5(mdo 'grel): ku shmaN+Ta ka cho ga bzhin du btsos skams nas/ /mar bskol kar btang tsha gsum zi ra ldan par btso/ /'di bsten byis rgan khrag 'dzag rlung 'joms bud med la phod cing/ /zas skom lus khrag mkhris skyug dbugs mi bde dang gzhad 'brum
5a6(mdo 'grel): 'joms/ /bag cin skyu ru ma k+Shi ka dro sman/ /kha ru po son du pa dan+t+ri dang/ /ru rta rnams btso rang bu mthe bong 'dra/ /mar bskus rkub bcug de yin da 'phrog byed/ /lus gso ba'i dpyad rdzogs so// //kar bcas gur gum cha mnyam mar
5a7(mdo 'grel): la btsos/ /cho ga bzhin rlung khrag las byung ba'i/ /smin ma mu 'gram rna mig mgo bo yi/ /phyed gzer nyi 'khor las byung nad 'joms so/ /a ru ba ru skyu ru nang sa bon/ /gsum gnyis gcig gi cha rnams zho la btags/ /mig sman de yis mchi ma mar?
5b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing/ /mig tsha rab tu 'khrug pa 'ang 'joms par 'gyur/ /a ru saind+ha ba dang lig bu mig /btsag yug dang bcas chu la bsres btags te/ /mig gi phyi rol rab tu byugs byas bas/ /'di yis mig gis nad kun zhi bar 'gyur/ /sau b+hi la saind+ha seng phro ma btaD
5b2(mdo 'grel): de nas mar btsos ras dkar po la btsags/ /de yis mig la byug byas mkhris bskyed nad/ /dmar tshag dang ni sha mdzer nges par 'joms/ /khrag bskyed ka ra rgya mtsho'i sbu bas 'joms/ /ba byung gro sman nar mo srod lod la'o/ /lug mig tsha ba gsum gyis
5b3(mdo 'grel): mig 'gribs la/ /ling tog dkar la mA k+Sha s+thang rtsis so/ /nag tshur lig mig dkar bcas rgya mtsho'i sbu/ /nal sham sam kha saind+ha btsag yug dang/ /ldong ros cha mnyam mA kI ka bsres btags/ /rab rib khus bskyed rdzi nang tshag po 'joms/ /sle
5b4(mdo 'grel): tres bu shel lcags phye dug nyung nal sha saind+he kaDpha? la/ /lig mig rdo dreg spang spos yud ba spyad ma sang kha rgya mtsho'i lpu/ /mtshungs pa phye ma lcags snod du bzhag sbrang rtsi ldan pas sha mdzer dang/ /rab rib ling tog khrag 'bur mig sha'i nad la
5b5(mdo 'grel): nye bar byug pa'ang bsdags/ /shing mdar utpal rgya mtsho'i lbu ba shing tsha bu shel gi hang btsod/ /spang pos tsan dan saM kha bcig yug ba lu lig mig nag tshur gdag /de ltar thams cad cha mnyam mig sman 'di yis mig 'brum mig na ga tsha//
5b6(mdo 'grel): mchi khrag skya rib mig sha gzer nad 'phrog la bsdags pas rtag tu byug /mig gi sman dpyad rdzogs so// //tha shing bod? da dkar po sle tres bcas/ /dug nyung hong len ma nu pA tra'i thang/ /ba gcin la grub sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa/ /mgrin
5b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad dang kun la btung bar bya/ /k+Sha ra te dza ba ta ba nad kun la/ /skyed rtsa gla sgang dzA ti'i me tog gi lo gsar sbrang rtsi la byas kha nang du/ /mur bar bya'o mgrin pa'i nad kun la/ /skyer rtsa gla sgang dzA ti'i me tog gi/ lo gsar rgyun 'brum dug
6a1(mdo 'grel): nyung 'bras gsum bskol/ /sbrang rtsi ldan pas lus kyi kha sgo'i nor/ /lce yi nang rnams dus su zhi bar byed/ /ru rta dang ni skyer ba'i rtsa ba seng phrom btsong/ /yud hong gla sgang pA thA te ja ni/ /zhib btags so rnams ldeg par byed pa dang/ gzer
6a2(mdo 'grel): zhing 'khrug la nad khrag 'byin par byed/ /so so bri? ra tsu kra sge'u gsher ma tu/ /khu ba sha rnams bu gul sind+hu rnams/ /gang zhig tsha ba'i mar khu la bskol te/ /rna par blugs pas rna ba'i zug ? sel/ /ba sha ni m+ba? ba To la barba ta ka be ca bya skyer rtsa dang/ /gla sgang
6a3(mdo 'grel): tik+ta pu shel byi tsher tsha gsum tri yan+tak+ta tsandan rnams/ /zhun mar la grub steng 'og nas skyes rnam 'gyur sna dang mig gi gzer la sogs/ /pags nad rims dang khong 'bras rma yi zug rdu mig nad skya rib rnams la bsngags/ /skyar tsa dug nyung nim+ba
6a4(mdo 'grel): bcags? dang ro sman byi tsher shing mngar dang/ /tra yin+t+ra? hong 'bras gsum tik+ta pri sha ba tro la dad gla sgang mngar/ /de rnams phye mar bskol ba zhun mar la grub 'di ni mig la phan pa yin/ /mkhris pa khrag las byung dang skya rib rab rib rnams dang stong kyi nad
6a5(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ /e raN dkar po'i rtsa ba dang ni shud dang sha ta bu Shpa bri ha ta'i 'bras bu gzhan yang/ /ta kha ra yi mar khu 'o mar bcas las grub/ /rab rib stong dang gtso che'i nang dang gzhan pa'ang 'joms/ /zug rdu zang bar byed pa gnyis ba rdzogs so// //dud dang mu ?
6a6(mdo 'grel): ka dag me lces bsregs pa'i thal ba snod du blug par byas te/ de nyid slar chu la btso zhing bskol ba'i thal ba mar khu'i cho ga rnams/ /sbyor ba de yis gdug pa'i rma dang rma tsha skangs 'bur tsa yi nang rnams dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan bar brdol ba'i pags
6a7(mdo 'grel): nad yun ring mgul ba'i nad rnams la/ /shing mngar dang bcas skyer rtsa shug pa utpal dang/ pri yaM ku dang seng po? ma dkar po tsandan rnam pa/ /mar khu dang ni 'o mar gtso zhing sbyar bar bya/ /rma rnams dang ni gzer dang tsha ba 'joms par 'gyur/ /dzA ti nim+ba ? lad ? hod?
6b1(mdo 'grel): len skyer rtsa yung ba dang/ /btsong dang thal tres a ru pu shel pra chil pangs ma shing mngar 'jam 'bras rnams/ /mar la brub? pa 'di yis kha nad bra mo dad nig nang gzer tsa yi nang/ /na dad ma gzer bcas 'pho zhing 'byung ba'i ma yin da rnams dang ni 'byad pa 'byin/ /zug? du zad byed gsum pa rdzogs so//
6b2(mdo 'grel): na le shi dkar po shing li/ me tog khu bas brgya phrag bsgo bar bya/ /sbrul gyis sos btab brgyal bar gyur pa la/ /rab tu sbyar bya btung dang mig sman la/ /rma bya'i mkhris pa tandya la yi ka/ kA kaN+Ta bcas mi nyung 'thung byas pas/ /'gro ba'i dug dang brtan mchog dug gi ni/ /'tshe ba dang bcas
6b3(mdo 'grel): myur du 'byin par byed/ /til btags mar khu la ni bur ma dang/ /de bzhin arka'i lo ma cha mnyam btung/ /sprin gyi tshogs la 'phral du rlung byung ltar/ /khyi smyo'i dug mchog myur du 'byin par 'gyur/ /khang pa'i du ba gu gul dang ldan pa/ /pA dzi gand+he taNb+hy? li ya bcas/ /ba
6b4(mdo 'grel): yi gcan la btags byas snying nang dang/ /brtan mchog 'gro ba'i dug rnams 'phrog par 'gyur/ /spad spos bu shel ba bla kaun+ti dzi la sle tres ldong so ? hi pad+ma ke shi dang/ spik+ka tsaN yud ba ru rta ka rab rta rdo drag spu k+Sh+me gur kum shing shug pa/ /tsha mnyam yungs kar brgyad
6b5(mdo 'grel): cha nA gser mogta? cha bzhis ldegs gus? kun tu long spyod cing/ phun sum tshogs bya sha za rim dang dug gi nang rnams 'joms 'gyur zla ba shar blta bur grags/ /du gnad sel ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //yungs kar 'bras gsum shi ri Sha ka tra b+hI shwe 'jam 'bras sle tres dang/ /btsod dang
6b6(mdo 'grel): ser po gnyis dang tshab gsum dang spang spos shu dag shing kun rnams/ /ra yi gcin la btags byas 'thungs sogs sten ps sprul gyis sos btab gdon kun dang/ /gshed byed smyo byad sha za dang ni srin po 'joms shing brlag par byed par 'gyur/ /karba sa'i dus pa dang ni rma bya'i
6b7(mdo 'grel): 'dab ma bri ha hi rnams dang/ /ni rma lya po son cha shing tsha cu gang byi la'i brtug pa bA sha kA dang ke sha sbrul lpags dang/ /glang po'i so dang sh+riM ka shid kun nal sham dkar po cha mnyam bdug byas pas/ /gshed byed smyo byed sha sin po lha rnams zhugs pa'i rims ni ?
7a1(mdo 'grel): par dran/ /tsha ba gsum dang dal gur kum dro sman nar mo'i rtsa ba k+Sha ra siM hi yud ru ? nyung kar gnyis dang amdu dug nyung sgog skya 'bras bu gsum dang pu shel rtse dang ho lan shu ta ga spangs ma shing mngar bA la dmar po ldong ros shug pa zhes
7a2(mdo 'grel): grags pa/ /darti rgya spos ma d+hu ka sA pri yaM ku dang bor po dang dkar po lig bu mig dang tsa bya thang shing bcas pa phye mar byas pa mar dang srog chags brgyad kyi gcin gyi cha la bskol ba bshad 'thungs pas 'byung bo 'bros shing de yi gdon rnams mchog
7a3(mdo 'grel): tu 'dzems par 'gyur/ /rgya spos shing mngar 'jam 'bras rgya skyegs pa'o la'i lam rak+ta pa Da kA shu dag pa Twa la dang shin kun yungs kar si hi ser gnyis la twa hod len dang/ /po son cha gsum kA kAnda thad shing bi ti a dza g+hand+ha ma rA/ /a rkoD dang
7a4(mdo 'grel): koSh+To kI na shaM nam+ba sla tres dug mo nyung/ /ru rta shu ka ta ru buShpa bA la shing mngar a par dzi ta/ dan+ti tsa tre ka bed cha mnyam phye ba gcin gyi sde dang mar la bskol/ /yun ring du bzhag kun gyi rim par sbyor bas myur du 'joms par 'gyur ba yin//
7a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba chen po'i gdon kun dang ni smo byed des byas mdzo rims zhi bar bshad/ /'byung po zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud lnga pa rdzogs so// //skyer yungs dug mi nyung ga sa bon dang/ /si ha dang ni shing mdar cha mnyam bo/ /de rnams thad byas bu chud ma yi
7a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bu nang dang ni 'khru ba kun la phan/ /ka ber buShpa d+d+hA ka dza la/ /sed phrom dang bcas ga dza libba lI/ /thad la mA k+Shi ka bsres byug pa dang/ /'khru ba rnams la byis ba la sbyar bya/ /sh+ri gA dran ? bod da dkar po phye mar byas/ /go rim skyug pa'i nad rnams 'joms
7a7(mdo 'grel): pa la dad mA kshi ka bcas bod dkar de bzhin gcig /byis pa'i nang sel ba'i rgyud drug pa rdzogs so// //skyu ru ra phye drug cu rtsa bzhi'i srad la rang gi khu bsgos sbrang rtsi mar dang cha mnyam zhing/ /drod sman nar mo ? brgya dkar ? 'gyur cha ldan thal ba'i
7b1(mdo 'grel): phung po'i nang du bzhag par bya ? dbyar gyi mdza' ru de brten skra dkar dang bral gzugs dang kha dog dang ni sbobs pa dang ldan zhing/ /nang med blo dang yid gzhung dran pa chig bsal stobs dang ldan zhing sems stobs ldan par 'gyur ba yin/ /shing mang ba dang ni sbrang rtsi mang dang ni/ /lo ma
7b2(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar rjes su bsten pa yis/ /lus po rgyag pa rab tu thob gyur nas/ /dga' zhing 'khrig pa yang yang nus par 'gyur/ /shing mngar bcu gang send+ha dro sman nar/ /ka ra dang ni 'bras bu gsum rab ldan/ /tshe sbyin ro tsa shin tu yid bzhungs shing/ rgas dang nad rnams
7b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par 'joms bar 'gyur/ /gze ma sgyu ru sle tres phye mar byas/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan pa bsten pa yis/ /ro rtsa brtan zhing sdug bsngal rnam 'gyur zhing/ /skra gnag tshe lo brgyar ni 'cho bang? 'gyur/ /ni m+ba'i mar khu rang bzhin gnas byas
7b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /chog ji lta bzhin btung ba dang/ /'o ma mar dang rab sbyar do zla bas/ /skra dkar dang ni rgas pa rnam par 'byin/ /gze ma kshu? ri dang rtsa ba bcu bA na rA nA gA bA la ba wa/ /phye ma'o thugs byas 'di btung bar bya/ /de yis 'khrig pa lan
7b5(mdo 'grel): brgyar nus pa yin/ /rta ltar byed pa bdun pa rdzogs so// //shing mngar thang skol senda ba ldan zhing/ /dug nyung dro nar po mon phye mar bsra/ /sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'di dag slon la sbyar/ /mgrin nang kha dang gre 'gags nad
7b6(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ /sau bI ra la a ru ra thang bskol/ /dro nar a ru dan+ti phye phye ldan/ /e ra mar khu dang bcas 'khrul de/ /bshal gyi sbyor bas nang rnams 'joms par 'gyur/ da sna bo son cha dang 'bras gsum sle tras rtsa ba bcu dang nA lA dang//
7b7(mdo 'grel): mar khu sind+ha ba bcas pa la mi si bcos ldan sbrang rtsi bur ram bcas/ /sha ta puShpa sle tres ru rtag po ta pi yaM ku dang dre sman nar/ /shu dag phye ma kalji ba'o gcin bcas ma btang rlung nad rnams la phan/ /pha la phye ma mar khu la bskol dri bzang dang//
8a1(mdo 'grel): bcud grub pa dang 'o ma zho dang skyu chu rnams/ /de bzhin sa hA tsa rA sna sle tres dang/ ? ri re rer bskol bas rlung 'joms so/ /sbyar bar bya'o bca' sga 'am bu ram la/ /yang na sind+ha ba bcas dro nar la'o/ /sna
8a2(mdo 'grel): kha 'jim pa 'gram pa dbung ba dang/ /rgyab dang mgo mig mgul 'gags nad rnams la/ /las lnda'i le'u ? pa rdzogs so// //rims la gtso cher bar bab Ta ka sbyar bya skom dang che la skyu ru ra dang skyug pa la/
8a3(mdo 'grel): cha ba lnga skyes gzer la 'jam rtsi rengs la gi ri? dza dang gcin sti skyu ru ra yi khu bas so/ /rlung gi nang la rA sna dmu rdzid mcher ba'i nad la ba gcin cham pa la/ /dro nar 'phyol bi taM? dag la shu ka rta ru skrangs la gu gul lo//
8a4(mdo 'grel): ba sha ka yis khrag mkhris dug nyung gis/ /'khru la'o bsre shing he mi lci gzer la/ /sbos la thang shing srin nad byi ti kas/ /skya rbab a ru ra dang 'bru gzhan gyis/ /zang byed nad la 'bras bu gsum bshad gzer ba kun la de
8a5(mdo 'grel): ltar khu bas so/ /mdze la rtag tu sed ldeng khu ba glo la kaN+Da ka ri dang/ /tshigs nang gzem mur gshed byed nA ga bA lA ba las so/ /bcud len kun la skyu ru lha bcas gdon/ /nad la brag zhun bshad rgyud phyi ma'o// //
8a6(mdo 'grel): rab tu grub pa'i sbyor ba'i chog rdzogs par byas/ /grub pa'i don rnams rtogs pa'i sman pa mkhas rnams kyis/ /rtog pa'i sman pa med bar su yis sbyor ba mthong/ /'di don slar yang 'dir ni cung zad bshad bar bya/ /shugs
8a7(mdo 'grel): bkag ma zos gnyid chag skad ches rtsol ba drags/ /gzhon ba la zhon tsha ba kha bskab rtsub pa rnams/ /sems bzung 'khrig dang 'jigs dang bskur gnas mya ngan drangs/ /dbyar gyi dus su rlun gi rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur//
8b1(mdo 'grel): tsha skyur chad dang lan tshwa rno dro til mar khu/ /khro dang gdung ba lo ma skam po 'jigs ngal rnams/ /thal sman la sogs ma zhu ma 'phrod zas zos pa/ /ston gyi dus su mkhris pa rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /nyin gnyid mngar dang
8b2(mdo 'grel): grangs ches nya sha lci ba dang/ /shing tog 'o ma bu ram shing gi rnam 'gyur rnams/ /snum bag 'grangs ches zos dang lan tshwa bur chu rnams/ /dpyid kyi dus su bad kan rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /de ltar 'di rnams rim pas bye
8b3(mdo 'grel): brag skyon/ /bdug pa kun ni ldan pa brgyad du shes/ /sna tshogs nad ni lus kyi grangs bzhin du/ /ming rnams ma lus rjes su rtogs par bya/ /rtsub 'khums 'pho zhing gzer dang sngo ba sangs mdog /yan lag zug che yan lag
8b4(mdo 'grel): brkyang bo skum byed/ /shes rmong grang zhing gyod la skom ba rnams/ /rlung gi las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan/ /'dzag cing rdul 'byung tsha zhing 'dod chags skye/ /dri ba rnag dang 'ju dang khro ba dang/ /bslab bcol brgyal dang
8b5(mdo 'grel): mgo 'khor lus mdog ser/ /mkhris pa'i las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan/ /kha mig sna chu grang lci lus g.ya' rdul/ /shes pa rmongs shing sna tshogs 'gags pa dang/ /cho ches mchil snams yun ring 'byung byed
8b6(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /bad kan las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan no/ /de rnams kyis byas 'di dag rtogs rnams ni/ /nang kun ming gi du ma'i rnam pa 'ang/ /bye brag kha cig skye ba'i dbang gis 'gyur/ /gang gi 'di rnams ming gzhan kun
8b7(mdo 'grel): tu 'gro/ /rgyud ni le lo yid ni rnam ma dag /skyon ni rab 'jug bkres dang gcin yang 'byung/ /gsus lci shes pa rmongs shing dang ga med/ /de rnams nad ldan de la nad 'byung 'gyur/ /bcud dang drod dang brtan
9a1(mdo 'grel): dang ro tsa stobs bskyed lan tsha mngar skyur mar khu dang/ /khrus dang drod bsten mas btang she dang bsten yan lag kun la dril phyis dang/ /snum gyi dugs dang 'jam rtsis zhi byas bsku byug nye bar bsten pa
9a2(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa/ /bza' dang gtung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis rlung ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /kha mngar bska ba grang dang rlung yab mtshan mo zla ba'i gzer la gnas pa dang/ /sa yi khang ba chu yi 'khrul 'khor chu la
9a3(mdo 'grel): brtse zhing bud med lus la reg /mar sar k+Shi ra dang por lus la bkru sman dang ni khrag gi gtar spyad bya/ /bza' dang btung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis mkhris ba rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /rtsub dang k+Sha ra ba ska kha tsha ba dang
9a4(mdo 'grel): ni 'bad rtsol drag dang ngar snab sbyar/ /bud med bsten zhing la du ba gnyid bcag chu la rtse zhing rkang ba 'chag bar bya/ /red bu'i dud bsten mgo bsro khrus dang skyug sman dug dang mas btang la sogs pa/ /bza' dang btung ba gnas
9a5(mdo 'grel): dang sman 'di rnams kyis bad kan nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /'phrod zas bsnyung dang tsha ba'i chu btung zhing/ /zas dang bya na yang zhing kha ba'i bcud/ /rtsub bral dugs dang 'jub bsten pa dang/ /de bzhin lus kyi steng 'og sbyang
9a6(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /rgun stong dbyar dang rgun smad rlung gi dus/ /mkhris ba ston dang so kha cha ba'i dus/ /bad kan dpyid ka me tog 'ong dus 'khrug /de la de bzhin phan pa'i sman bstan bya/ /bad kan 'khrugs la skyug sman sbyar bar
9a7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /mkhris pa'i rnam 'gyur byung la bkrus sman btang/ /rlung gi bdag nyid 'jam rtsis 'joms par 'gyur/ /'du 'phrod skyes la'ang 'dres ma de dag go /rlung la skyur dang mar khu lan tshwa dang/ /mngar ba'i
9b1(mdo 'grel): bza' dang btung ba rnams kyis so/ /mkhris pa la ni de bzhin mngar ba dang/ /kha dang bska ba grang ba rnams kyis so/ /bad kan la yang kha dang tsha ba dang/ /rtsub dang bskab rno ba'i ro rnams kyis/ /de rnams bza' bas nye bar 'gro 'gyur ga/
9b2(mdo 'grel): nang ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /blo gzhan nyid kyis gang de ma bstan gang zhig bstan/ /nang rnams rang gis rtags nas ji lta'i tshul/ /sman rnams rjes su blo gros chung ba rnams la byas/ /bstan bcos su ni cung zad btan
9b3(mdo 'grel): phab 'bras bur byas/ /yon tan lhag can sbyor ba brgya pa brjod pa yis/ /bsod nams bla na med pa bdag gis gang thob pa/ /de yis rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis gzir gyur ba/ /mdza' yas 'gro ba rnams kyi nang ni med gyur cig /sbyor
9b4(mdo 'grel): ba brgya ba zhes bya ba'i sman gyi gzhung 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal bo'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze dze ta kar+NA'i zhal snga nas dang po rtsa 'grel lan cig gsungs shing/ dus phyis rgya gar shar
9b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bud d+ha sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas stong cung zad gsungs nas/ grub pa'i zhing skyi rong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang la cung zad las mi ring pa/ chen po'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa dpal sher
9b6(mdo 'grel): gyi gtsug lag khang du/ sdom brtson dam pa sde snod gsum dang/ rgyud dang rgyud kyi yan lag rnams las legs bar 'dris shing/ khyad par du tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i gzhung don legs bar
9b7(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa dge slong a mo g+ha'i gsung gis bskul nas/ mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos 'grel pa gsum dang bstan te bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab ba'o/ /gso
10a1(mdo 'grel): dpyad gzhung lugs brgya phrag du ma'i gnad/ /sna tshogs mngon brjod tha dad sdeb sbyor can/ /ya mtshan rgyan la legs sbyar tshig gis spel/ /gang 'di bsgyur dges nad rnams zhi bar shog /sa steng du nyi ma
10a2(mdo 'grel): dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ //lo tsA ba'i 'gyur bstan la dpe phyi byas nas bris te/ zhus dag legs par bgyis pa 'dis/ /sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed par gyur cig/ //sman 'tsho ba'i mdo ? sgrub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs// //
10a3(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dzI ba sA tra/ bod skad du/ sman 'tsho ba'i mdo/ bam po gcig pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs nad sel de la phyag bcal nas/ /'phags pa'i brtul zhugs drang srong ma
10a4(mdo 'grel): gtogs skyes bu blo ldan pas/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod sbyad bag bya sbyong lam gyis/ /mi lus 'di thob don yod 'tsho ba'i don tsam bstan par bya/ /'dod khro gti mug gsum las rlung mkhris bad kan gsum srid de/ /lus
10a5(mdo 'grel): yul dus la sogs pa kun dang bde bcas dbang sgyur zhes/ /drang srong chen pos gsungs phyir de yi khyad par mdor bsdus nas/ /tshul brtags zas dang gnas sbyad dgongs pa nyi tshe 'di brjod pa/ /lus rtsub skems sems rgod tshig
10a6(mdo 'grel): mang grang rlung gi mi/ /dmar ser blo rno khro la drod cha dri can mkhris pa'i mi/ /dkar snum tshig g.yung lci la drod chung gnyid chung bad kan mi/ /gnyis dang gsum du 'dres pa yang ni de las shes par bya/ /rgan dang dar dang byis pa rim
10a7(mdo 'grel): gyis blta zhing shes par bya/ /dad can grang ba rlung gi yul te tshag dud mkhris pa'i sa/ /rlan tsan snum bag bad kan yul te 'dres ba de las brtag /nad bar srod ni bad kan tho rangs phyi dro rlung gi dus/ /nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed
10b1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i dus yin shes par bya/ /dpyid na bad kan ldang steng dbyar stong rlung gsog ston mkhris ldang/ /dbyar smad rlung ldang mkhris gsog dgun stong dgun smad bad kan gsog /ston ni rlung zhi dgun stong mkhris zhi dbyar smad bad kan zhi/ /lus yul
10b2(mdo 'grel): dus dag brjod nas ro drug khyad par mdor bstan pa/ /mngar kun bsil te bod kan bskyed de rlung mkhris sel byed na/ /zhun mar bu ram snying gzer gze ma gro dang starka dro/ /mu ga sbrang rtsi skam sa'i sha dang nas dang bu ram snying/ /bad kan sel te nye shing
10b3(mdo 'grel): ram nye bad kan mi skyed snyoms/ /tsha ba dro ste mkhris bskyed rlung dang bad kan sel byed na/ /srog chags mkhris pa mkhris sel na le sham ni rlung yang bskyed/ /skyur kun dro ste mkhris pa bskyed cing bad kan rlung sel na/ /skyu ru ra dang bal po se'u
10b4(mdo 'grel): ni mkhris pa sel bar byed/ /ku shu mdar ni bsil la dar ba chus bslang mkhris mi skyed/ /kha ba bsil te rlung bskyed bad kan mkhris pa sel byed na/ /shu dag sle tres dro ste 'phrod dang sbyar na rlung yang sel/ /bska ba kun ni bsil te rlung bskyed
10b5(mdo 'grel): bad kan mkhris sel na/ /a ru ra ni nyes pa gsum la gnod mi byed de snyoms/ /chad ran bad kan rlung sel mangs na mkhris ba skyed par byed/ /lan tsha dro ste rlung sel bad kan mkhris pa skyed byed na/ /rgyam tsha lce myang tshwa ni mkhris pa la yang
10b6(mdo 'grel): gnod mi byed/ /mdar dang bska dang lan tshwa gsum rim pa bzhin mas lci ste/ /skyur dang tshwa dang kha ba gsum ni de bzhin rim bzhin yang/ /kha ba bska dang lan tshwa gsum yang rim bzhin mas rtsub ste/ /mdar dang skyur dang tshwa ba gsum yang
10b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin mngar zhing 'jam/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ga 'dra ste nyid kyis nyid bskyed pas/ /lus dang yul dus zas spyod tshul gcig 'dom na nad ldang ste/ /ji ltar mthun par 'phrod sbyar rlung mkhris bad kan mi ldang phan/ /de phyir 
11a1(mdo 'grel): 'phrod dang mi 'phrod la sogs tshul bzhin 'dir bstan pa/ /rlung ni mngar snam lci dro de rtsub yang bsil mi 'phrod/ /mkhris pa kha mngar bsil dang 'phros de tsha skyur dro mi 'phrod/ /bad kan snum lci gsil dang mi
11a2(mdo 'grel): 'phrod rtsub tsha bskyong dang 'phrod/ /de bas rang gi lus dang dus gnas zas dang 'phrod spyad phyir/ /dpyid zla gnyis ni bad kan bskyed dus yin te nang ldang bas/ /bad kan drang zhing bkru sman skyug sman btang zhing chu chan btung/ /gro nas bsreg
11a3(mdo 'grel): sha sgrang rtsi la sogs rtsub bska yang ba bza' / /sbrang chang rgun chang rga chu bu ram chang rnying btung/ /mar tshil la sogs snum lci kha ra skyur po tsha phrom dag /mngar 'jam skyur na bsil bag yang zhing nyin par log mi bya//
11a4(mdo 'grel): rlu chas lus bkru mnye shing las bskyod bcag bya ci ran bya/ /gnas kyang ha cang mi tsha mi grang ran dro grib mar 'dug /dbyar stong zla gnyis mar 'bri dus yin nyal po drag shul spang/ /ngal dub mi bya bag 'bras 'o ma mar
11a5(mdo 'grel): sar sha dag bza' / /bu ram tshil ni cung zad bza' ste chang nyung yang ba btung/ /'o ma bskol grangs kha ras btab dang dar ba 'thungs na phan/ /lan tshwa skyur zhing na le sham la sogs pa cha sgyur spad/ /chu 'jam tsam gyis
11a6(mdo 'grel): lus bkru sgra snyan mnyan zhing gdags/ /chad par reg bya nyin par tsog pur gnyid kyis log na phan/ /gnas kyang bser bu drag po'i dad med dro min bsil bar 'dug /dbyar smad zla ba gnyis na mkhris pa gsog cing rlung sdang ste/
11a7(mdo 'grel): phyi rol tshal lus kyi nang grang nad gsum g.yo bas na/ /rlung nad bsal phyir lus mnye snum bsku? chu bskol bas bkru/ /rlung nad sel nges til mar mas btang dags dang lums kyang bya/ /zas kyang ha cang tsha min mngar skyur
11b1(mdo 'grel): med par ran par sbyar/ /pho ba drod bskyed bag dang mar tshil? sbrang rtsi bar 'ga' bza' / /yos dang 'bras chen mar khu blug dang zan dron sha dag bza' / /chang yang cung zad btung ste chu dang chu 'grogs spang par bya/ /rlan la mi 'dug mi 'gro
11b2(mdo 'grel): lus la char pas gsher mi bya/ /stobs dang drag shul ngal zhing dub par gyur ba'i bag dang yang/ /nyin mtshan mi bde nyin par mi log nyal po brtun byed spang/ /gnas kyang rlan med rlung mi ldang la bsil bar stan gding 'dug/ ston zla
11b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis ni mkhris pa skye ba'i dus yin nad ldang bas/ /bsil mngar bkru sman btang zhing gtang kas khrag kyang ci ran dbyung/ /kha zhing mngar la bsil ba'i sman yang rtag tu bza' bar bya/ /dus 'di'i chu ni dug med gtsang dang bkrus
11b4(mdo 'grel): shing 'thungs na phan/ /zas kyang 'bras nas sran ma sbrang rtsi kha ra sha la sogs/ /mngar zhing kha la yang ba mar sar 'o ma bza' zhing btung/ /char lci drag po'i ro yod mi btung ra ror mi bya ste/ /tshil dang til mar mi bza' 
11b5(mdo 'grel): bril par mi 'gro 'dug mi bya/ /tsha ba'i zas dang yul yang zla grogs yid du 'ong ba bsten/ /chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru gos kyang dri ma med pa bgo /rgyan dang dri zhim lus la gdags shing nyi tshan mi lde ste/ /gnas kyang
11b6(mdo 'grel): dro min bser bus mi phog bsil bag can la 'dug/ dgun stong dgun smad zla bzhi phyi grang nang tsha bad kan gsog/ gos dror bgo zhing rlan dang lhags la bag bya nyi ma'ang sde/ /zas kyang sha tshon rus khu mar mig snum bag
11b7(mdo 'grel): 'grangs par gza'/ /mngar sgyur lan tshwa drod? bag cher bza' gsar tog 'bru dag bza' / /ran par sna tshogs chang btung ngal ba'i las dag byas kyang sla/ /rtsal bcag lus sbyang skabs skabs mgo lus til mar bsku zhing
12a1(mdo 'grel): mnye/ /de rjes skyu ru ral sogs pa sman bskol chus kyang bkru/ /gnas kyang bsro khang dron por me dang stan stug ldan par 'dug /dbyar stod tsha dus dbyar smad rlung dus bkru sman mi btang ste/ /dgun stong dgun smad grang dang
12a2(mdo 'grel): rgas la skyug sman gtang ka spad/ /dgun gnyis dbyar stod lums dugs mi bya nad kyis gzir kyang sla/ /de ltar yin yang lus dang nang du gar mthun brtsam par bya/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod pas 'tsho ba'i mdo brjod nas/
12a3(mdo 'grel): bag byed spyod lam can dag ring du 'tsho phyir yang bstan pa/ /med smra cir yang chos dang rigs pa gzhan dag gsum la 'jom/ /sngar byas nang nub bsam zhing skyon dor phyin chad bag cher bya/ /byed pa gang la rdul med rang nyam med
12a4(mdo 'grel): cing 'dod chen spang/ /nga rgyal longs spyod spyi brtol che min shed dman zhum mi bya/ /sdig grogs spang zhing dge gshes bsten te gtong smos dge bcu spyad/ /gsong des tshul chags gzhan la gnod min mi la byams par bya//
12a5(mdo 'grel): lha dang rgyal por nyer bsam lung mnyam yid dang mthun par bsgrub/ /rgyal po'i sras dang rma ni chud yang mi bsnyas bag cher bya/ /spyod lam sgyu mas mi bslu bka' khrims yul chos bsrung/ /gzhan gyis spyas skyon mi
12a6(mdo 'grel): brjod gtogs 'dod gtum chos 'gran mi bya/ /dge slong slob dpon pha ma'i gong du mi 'gro sri zhu skyed/ /dge sbyong drang srong srog chags ya mtshan gnyan gtong sbrul mi brtse/ /ma rtogs shing chen mchod rten drud dang lam
12a7(mdo 'grel): mdo phug stong dang/ /sems can mang du bsad pa slo sa dur khrod nyal mi bya/ /gnyan pa'i mtsho dang chu mig bzang por mi bkru mi bshal te/ /rdo shing dgon pa'i shing chen mi bcad pha bod gzhom mi bya/ /mchod rten rgyal mtshan
12b1(mdo 'grel): Arya'i grib ma maN+Dal mi 'gom zhing/ /mi ro gtor ma yas btags hom khung thal? khung bcag mi bya/ /nam mkha' ban bun nyi ma phyed dang dmar thag chad pa'i tshe/ /mi bza' mi btung yi ge klog min nyal po las dad spang/ /nyi ma la
12b2(mdo 'grel): sogs 'od zer phra sngags mi ring ring mi blta/ /lha khang sgor mi nyal te ri sna grog snar gnas mi bca' / /ya mtshan shes drag mi bsten bud med dog mi mnyan/ /bud med rgan la mi rgyo rtsal rgyo smra 'gros dub mi bya/ /gad ma che zhib
12b3(mdo 'grel): ring du rgod dang dud mo drag po spang/ /rtag tu mi 'dug ring du mi 'greng ci nus rin par bcag /sprid pa lud pa kha chu mchi ma snabs phyen bshad gcig yal/ /mi dgag ma bsgrus bkres skom nad gnyid gnag min myur du bsal/ /nyal
12b4(mdo 'grel): po skegs pa lud pa la sogs tshe lus 'dzing mi gcu/ /glal na kha dag ba sbrid pa smra tshe ha cang kha mi bgrad/ /sen mo ring du mi bzhag bregs te phan tshun brung mi bya/ /mgo lus lag pas mi brdab mgo la drag tu mi sprug ste/ /don
12b5(mdo 'grel): med sa mi bri zhing lag pa mi brngab chu mi bri/ /mi nu bzhin du lci mi 'degs te mya ngan mnan mi bye/ /dpyid dang dbyar stong ston ni phyugs mar dus gzhan til mar gyis/ /rtag tu mgo dang rkang mthil ba sku zhing bar bar lus kyang
12b6(mdo 'grel): bsku/ /ston dpyid ma yin res 'ga' sna dang rna bar til mar blug /skyer ba'i khaN+Da stang zil dag gis bar bar mig kyang bsku/ /rtag tu lus kyi byi dor bya zhing sman sngags rin chen gdags/ /bser bu drag po mi ro'i dri dang dung
12b7(mdo 'grel): pas phog mi bya/ /chu tshas mgo lus mi bkru bkru sman skyug sman btang ba la/ /cham pa mi zhus btab ste mgo lus mi bkru snum mi bsku/ /skya reng shar nas cog bor 'dug ste de ring ci bya bsam/ /langs nas so shing bca' zhing kha yi
13a1(mdo 'grel): skyon gsal lag gdong bkru/ de nas sman mchog a ru ra ni rtag zos bdud rtsi yin/ /lug gi mar min mar sar zhun mar rgas sra tshe ring ste/ /'di la sogs pa lus dang tshe la phan pa'i sman zos na/ /byug
13a2(mdo 'grel): pa rgyan dang gos kyis shin tu mdzes byas lha yang mchod/ /de nas sri zhu'i gnas dang 'khor la snyan brjod 'dzum bstan nas/ /rje dpon las dang bdag gzhan don la nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed/ /dus bzhir dro ba ran par zas
13a3(mdo 'grel): bza' ngoms par skom btung ste/ /thug pa? khu tshan la sogs snum lci drod kun sngar bza' zhing/ /'bras la sogs pa bsil yang phyis bza' phrad med phyi ma bkam/ /bab chol ha cang 'grangs par bza' min myong par
13a4(mdo 'grel): chad mi btung/ /'bras kyis 'grangs rjes phye zan mi bza' drod rjes skom mi btung/ /skyom ran par 'thungs na lus rta nang na rgan la gsod/ /ro drug gang yang gcig la cher zod nad ldang ran par sbyar/ /'grangs pa'i rjes
13a5(mdo 'grel): la nyal po bad stobs rta rgyug la sogs spang/ /shing tog ldam ldum mangs na nad ldang ba mos phog pa gnod/ /dbyar zla 'bring po tshes la sdam ldum bza' drags nad du 'gyur/ /nad can lums kyis drangs te mgyogs
13a6(mdo 'grel): na nad ldang skran du 'ong/ /mchin pa g.yer ma spangs te zos na cung zad snying la gnod/ /zas mchog sbrang rtsi mar rnying cha mnyam zos na dug bzhin gnod/ /mi mnyam che chung byas kyang zos rjes chang chu 'thungs na gnod//
13a7(mdo 'grel): ma langs zho dang langs ma thag gi zho dron nad kun klong/ /chu bya dbyar spang ldum mchog ki lun dbyar zla 'bring po'i sman/ /sman 'thungs sha ba'i sha gnod ga gon zhor 'dres rims su 'gyur/ /bcod bsreg
13b1(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsir mi 'phrod lhan cig zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ke'u 'am gnag sha lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur/ /dgun stong rgya g.yer zos na snying na drags na mig kyang ldod/ /mar chil zos dang mi 'phrod lta ba bza' drags na so 'byung/ /phra do
13b2(mdo 'grel): mang du zos na rlung dang lus g.ya' ste/ /nub mo chu 'thung 'chang gnon la phug snying dang sha skam spang/ /nya dang kha tsha mar tshal mi 'phrod snod kyang gcig mi bya/ /nya dang 'o ma lhan cig mang zos nang gzer ma gnod/ /shing tog chang la sogs te
13b3(mdo 'grel): skyur dang shang tshe la phug rlon/ /yungs rnyings 'di rnams gang yang 'o mar 'phrod min mang zos gnod/ /'o tshan 'thungs rjes chu bgrog 'thungs dang rgya sran nag po gnod/ /zla ba sbyang gis zin tshe zan zos so na shu ba 'byung/ /gnag sha sha rta lhan cig
13b4(mdo 'grel): zos na lus la g.yan ba 'ong/ /gnag sha phag sha lhan cig zos na lto yi srin bur 'gyur/ /nya dang khyim bya'i sha gnyis lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur/ /khyim bya'i sgo ra'i spri dang sgog skya zos na dbugs mi bde/ /khyim bya'i sha dang ri bong sha
13b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis lhan cig zos na cu zad 'khru/ /sha mo yungs mar nad du brdos pa zos na lus la gnod/ /ma nu'i sa bon ka tsam tsi dang sbrang rtsir 'phrod ma yin/ /la phug bu ram mi 'phrod zho dang bya gag shar mi 'phrod/ /de ltar 'phrod zas goms dang rtag tu
13b6(mdo 'grel): 'chag pa dang/ /lang tsho 'ju slas zos dang nyung na gnod ba med dang bsre/ /'phrod pa'i zas zos phyi dro'i las byas na ma sros bde bar nyal/ /de ltar nan tan bag byas mi tshe tshad bzhin 'tshe des pas/ /skyes nas la bsku'i? bar du sma mi dbab cing rang
13b7(mdo 'grel): gar bzhag/ de nas nyi shu lon te lo bcur bslab dang rtsol bar bya/ /de nas lnga bcu lnga lon sum cu rtsa lnga khyud khor du/ /longs spyod grags pa'i yul srid gtam byas nas/ /lnga bcu lnga lon phyin chad chos lam yum gyi tshad bsgrub phyir//
14a1(mdo 'grel): dge la brtson bskyed thos rig goms byed lus sems ci bder gnas/ /de ltar sus chus mi lus thob pa'i don yod skyed cing dge/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub snying pos sman pa rnams la brdzangs pa/ /sman 'tsho ba'i mdo tshigs su
14a2(mdo 'grel): bcad pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon klu sgrub kyis bshad pa sman a ba'i cho ga/ sman a ba 'di ni lus kyi rus pa chag pa dang/ rkang lag gi rus pa chag pa dang/ 'phres pa dang/ kha bye ba dang/ tshigs 'bur ba dang/ smad te rma chen po byung ba dang/
14a3(mdo 'grel): rlung dang/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ dreg nad dang/ da rgan dang/ ro smad man chad 'jas pa dang/ na ste mi bden yang nad kyi ngos ma zin te cin gtol med pa dang/ mi gnad sna tshogs pa dang/ rgas sra bar bya ba dang/ ro tsa par bya ba la sogs pa'i
14a4(mdo 'grel): dpyad/ lta chen po gu lam gis gu lam gi btsun mo zhes bshad de/ a ba yin no/ /a ba gtang ba'i chos grangs 'dam pa ni/ tshes bdun dang/ brgyad dang/ bcu gsum la bzang ngo/ /skar ma 'dam pa ni ba ru Na'i dus la bab pa'i chu lha ste/
14a5(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi dang 'byor ba'i skar ma la bzang ste sman btang ngo/ /sman btang ba'i thabs ni nad cin yang rung ste/ dang por sbrang rtsi las sbyar te btang/ de'i 'og tu zhun mar la sbyar te btang/ de'i 'og tu 'bru mar la sbyar te btang ngo/ /sbrang rtsi la sogs
14a6(mdo 'grel): pa sna re re 'dra ste/ zhag bdun bdun sbyar zhing 'phul te 'tshal lo/ /phan pa'i sna grangs ni/ lus kyi rus pa chag pa dang/ rkang lag chag grums byung ngo cog dang/ lus la rma byung ngo cog dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsi ba logs na ba dang/ ro stong gzer ba
14a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ glo na ba dang/ rus pa chag go cog la lhag par phan no/ /rlung las gyur ba'i nad brgyad cu snyed yod pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur ba'i nad kyi rnam grangs nyi shu dang/ bad kan gyi nad nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ spyir nad brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa ril
14b1(mdo 'grel): 'byad ngo/ /dreg nad dang/ grang nad dang/ tsha grang 'dres pa las gyur ba'i nad dang/ mdor na nad ci yang rung ste/ sman a ba btang na nad do cog 'byad do zhes lha chen po tshangs pa dang/ gu lam gis bshad ba las thos so/ /mig rab tib yod pa dang/ yid tog pa
14b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ spris g.yogs pa dang/ ldongs pa dang/ mig g.ya' ba dang/ na ba dang/ mi gnad yod do cog dang/ mgul ba man chad na ba dang/ sna nad dang/ rna ba mi gsang ba dang/ klad pa mi bde ba dang/ mchin nad dang/ snying nad dang/ ro stod mi bde ba dang/
14b3(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams la 'bras bu gsum las sna gcig kyang zho re re/ lcags phye zho gsum lcags dog gi nad du chab can rtse gsum las bsgral te gang lus pa dang/ btsags ba chu dron 'jam tsam gyi nad du smad a ba zhib du btags pa zho
14b4(mdo 'grel): gsum btab ste/ 'jam tsam la nub mo nyal gar 'tshal lo/ /dgongs 'tshal mi 'tshal na/ dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo/ /sman 'di nyin zhag nyi shu tsam btang na/ ldongs pa yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang sbyor ba rnam gcig
14b5(mdo 'grel): la/ 'bras bu gsum las sna gcig kyang zho re re/ lcags phye zho gsum/ bu mar sreng gnyis/ chab can rtse gsum gyi nad du bskol te/ do ni du/ gang ni lus pa dang/ btsags te dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du a ba btags pa zho gsum btab
14b6(mdo 'grel): la nyal gar 'tshal lo/ /dgongs 'tshal mi 'tshal ba lta zhig na/ dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo/ /'di bzhin du zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshal ma/ mig phyung ba ma gtogs pa/ dmus long dang mdongs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
14b7(mdo 'grel): lo bcu drug pa gzhon nu'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ /a ba phye ma mar ldan pa/ rus pa chags pas nub gsum du/ 'thungs na de yi rus pa ni/ /rdo rje lta bur sra bar 'gyur/ /a ba tsho gsum de bzhin/ /tsha dag nye shing rtsa ba yis/ /drug skam rus pa na?
15a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /lud ba de bzhin dbugs mi bde/ /snying na ba dang sha tshod la/ /de rnams cha ni mnyam byas te/ /phye mar byas nas nub gsum du/ /chu dron lhan cig myur du btung/ /'bras bu gsum ni 'o ma dang/ /mkhas bas de bzhin
15a2(mdo 'grel): bskol byas nas/ /mar ni sum cha gcig dang ldan/ /de bzhin a ba bzhin cha gcig/ zas zos 'og tu nub gsum du/ /'thungs nas 'u sha gsum dang bza' / /gyen du za ba'i nad las rgyal/ /rab rib rdzi bor mig ser dang/ /chad rnying
15a3(mdo 'grel): gsan pa mtshor bcas dang/ /mi gi nad ni thams cad dang/ /gzhan yang de bzhin klad nad dang/ /lto nad dang ni snying nad dang/ /de bzhin yan lag chag pa dang/ /zhag gsum du ni rab sbyar na/ /long pa dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /a
15a4(mdo 'grel): ba so ma ra dza dang/ /ra yi'o mar skol te btung/ /'thungs na rlung ltar mgyogs par 'gyur/ /a ba phye ma mar sar dang/ /kha ra de bzhin pi pi ling/ /gzhad gnad ni thams cad la/ /'di las drag pa gang yang med/ /glang po ba
15a5(mdo 'grel): lang khyu mchog dang/ /ra dang lug dang mi rnams la/ /a ba mar dang 'o ma dang/ /'thungs na de dag shis 'gyur te/ /sha chod rul pa chag pa dang/ /skem dang snying nad mgo 'khor dang/ /thams cad nad las rnam par grol//
15a6(mdo 'grel): gang gi lus ni skem pa dang/ /gang zhig sha bkrar gyur ba dang/ /gang gi lus ni 'jig pa dang/ /gal te su bnar gyur cing/ /gso dka' ba yi nad la phan/ /a ba dang ni nye shing dang/ /so ma ra dza de bzhin te/ /sbrang rtsi pi pi ling de bzhin te/ /mar
15a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'o mar lhan cig btung/ /zhag bdun bar du spyad par bya/ /'dod chags rnam par spangs byas te/ /zhag bdun par du sbyar ba yis/ /de ni rlung dang khrag las rgyal/ /de bzhin nad rnams kun las rgyal/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa
15b1(mdo 'grel): sman a ba'i chog rdzogs so// //*// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying bo bsdus ba slob dpon pha gol gyis mdzad bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ aShDAM ga h+ri da ya saM hit+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom
15b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags la sogs ma lus pa yi nang/ /rgyun tu 'brel bas lus kun ma lus khyab/ /'dod dang gti ? ? ba yi/ /sman pa sngon med de la phyag
15b3(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo// //da nas tshe ring bar 'dod pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad do/ /tshe ni ring gang 'dod pa yis/ /chos dang nor gdang bde ba sgrub/ /tshe yi rig byed lung bshad
15b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rab tu gus par bya bar gyis/ /tshangs pas tshe yi rig byed dran/ /skye dgu'i bdag la bshad pa yin/ /de yis tha skar des brgya byin/ /de yis rgyun shes drang srong la'o/ /de yis me bzhin 'jug la sogs/ /de rnams kyis rgyud so sor
15b5(mdo 'grel): byas/ /shin tu 'thor ba de rnams las/ /rab gces phal cher btus pa ni/ /shin tu bsdus min rgyas min par/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po byas/ /lus dang byis pa gdon lus stong/ /mtshon dang mche ba rgas ro tsa/ /gso dpyad
15b6(mdo 'grel): gang la gnas pa yi/ /yan lag brgyad du de bshad do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan yang/ /nyes pa rnam gsum mdor bsdus yin/ /de ni rnam 'gyur ma gyur pas/ /lus ni 'joms dang gnas pa yin/ /des khyab gyur kyang snying ga dang/
15b7(mdo 'grel): lte ba'i 'og bar steng na gnas/ /na tshod nyin zhag zas zos la/ /de ni mdza' dbus sogs rtogs rim/ /des ni 'ju ba mi snyoms rno/ /chu dang mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur/ /de ni lto ba sra snyi ran/ /mnyam pas kyang ni bar mar 'gyur// 
16a1(mdo 'grel): skye ba'i dbang po khu khrag gnas/ /dug can srin bu'i du ge dang mtshungs/ /de ni rang bzhin rnam gsum ste/ /chud 'bring chen po so sor blta/ /ma lus pa la khams mnyam pa/ /mchog yin mnyes pa gnyis 'byung smad/ /de
16a2(mdo 'grel): la rlung ni rtsub cing yang/ /grang zhing sra la 'phra zhig g.yo/ /mkhris pa snum bcas rno zhing dro/ /yang zhing dri ma nam 'khru zhing gsher/ /bad kan snum bsil lci ba dang/ /rtul zhing 'jam brtan 'byar ba gcan/ /de gnyis gsum zad la
16a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa las/ /ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa yin/ /lus zungs dangs ma khrig dang sha/ tshil dang rus rkang khu chu ste/ /gnod bya bdun yin dri ma gcin/ /bshad brdul la sogs pa yin/ /thams cad mnyam pas 'phel 'gyur zhing/
16a4(mdo 'grel): de las bzlog pas gnod par 'gyur/ /ro ni mngar skyur lan tshwa dang/ /tsha dang kha dang bskal ba ste/ /rdzas drug la gnas de rnams kyang/ /go rim bzhin du stobs chen yin/ /de la dang po'i gsum po ni/ /rlung 'joms tsha sogs
16a5(mdo 'grel): bad kan sel/ /bska dang kha dang mngar ba ni/ /mi khras sel gzhan dag byed pa yin/ /de ltar rdzas ni rnams pa gsum/ /zhi 'khrugs tha mal gnas la phan/ /de la tshab sil phul byung bas/ /nus pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad//
16a6(mdo 'grel): rdzas kyi zhu ba rnam gsum ste/ /mngar skyur tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/ /yon tan lci rtul bskul dang snum/ /'jam dang bskal ba mnyam dang brtan/ /phra dang bas shing skam bag can/ /de bzlog pa dang nyi shu yin/ /dus don las kyi sbyod
16a7(mdo 'grel): pa rnams ? dman dang log pa lhag pa dang/ /yang dag sbyor bas nad dang ni/ /nad med rgyu gcig yin zhes bya/ /nang ni nyes pa ma snyoms yin/ /nyes pa snyom pa nad med yin/ /de la nad ni rang bzhin gnas/ /glo bur cha yis gnyis
16b1(mdo 'grel): su bshad/ /de rnams lus sems dbye ba yis/ /gnas khyed rnam pa gnyis yin no/ /'dod chags gti mug kyang yid kyi/ /nyes pa gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /nad pa blta dang reg pa dang/ /dri ba yis ni yongs su rtag /nad kyi gzhi yi dang po'i tshul//
16b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid nye bar bsten 'thob pa yin/ /sa dang lus kyi bye brag gis/ /'di la yul sa rnam gnyis bshad/ /skams sa phal cher rlung bskyed cing/ /rlan can bag kan 'phel ba yin/ /cha mnyam nyes pa mnyam pa ste/ /sa yi phyogs ni
16b3(mdo 'grel): gsum du bshad/ /skad cig la sogs nad kyi skabs/ /dus su sman ni sbyor bar byed/ /mdor na sman ni rnam gnyis te/ /sbyang bya dang ni zhi ba'o/ /lus las byung ba'i nad rnams kyi/ /rim gyis sman gyi dam pa ni/ /mas btang bkru sman slon
16b4(mdo 'grel): sman dang/ /de bzhin ril mar mar sbrang rtsi/ /blo dang brtan bdag sogs shes pa/ /sems kyi nyes pa'i sman mchog yin/ /gso ba dag tu bstan pa ni/ /sman pa sman dang nad g.yog dang/ /nad pa yan lag rnam bzhi ste/ /re re'ang rnams pa bzhi
16b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi yin/ /sman pa mkhas rtogs gzhung don shes/ /las rnams mthong zhing gtsang ba yin/ /sman ni cho ga mang po dang/ /yon tan mang ldan phun tshogs 'phrod/ /nad g.yog rjes rtse gtsang sgra can/ /sgrin zhing blo dang ldan pa yin/ /nad
16b6(mdo 'grel): pa phyug cing bsgo ba nyan/ /shes par nus shing snying stobs ldan/ /sman kun bzod par nus pa'i lus/ /skyes bu gzhon zhing bdag nyid thul/ /gnad du ma seng rgyu sngar tshul/ /mtshan nyid chud dang gnod pa med/ /gnod bya yul dus
16b7(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin rnams/ /mtshungs min yan lag phun sum tshogs/ /gza' ni rjes su mthun pa la/ /nyes pa lam gcig gsar gso sla/ /gnad ni mtshon sogs kyis gdab cing/ /gso ba dka' zhing de las 'das/ /tshe yi lhag ma lus phyir
17a1(mdo 'grel): 'tsho/ /go bzlog pa las goms phan nyid/ /bcos pa'i thabs med nyid du 'byung/ /bcos pa'i thabs med nyid du 'byung/ /shin tu phyin ci log par gnas/ /'dod dang rmonogs dang khro bar byed/ /'chi ltas snang zhing dbang po nyams/ /sman pa rgyal po
17a2(mdo 'grel): la sngar dang/ /de dang mi mdza' sdad pa dang/ /yo byad mi 'byor brel pa dang/ /nyan du mi gtab tshe zad dang/ /gtum zhing mya ngan la mnan 'jig /byas pa mi bzo sman brnyas spang/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyu 'di yi/ /le'u bsdus pa bshad
17a3(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ /tshe ring nyin re dus spyod dang/ /nad med bya dang btud pa dang/ /zas shes bya dang zas snga ma dang/ /zas tshod sman dang rol gnas/ /nad shes bya dang de dbye ba/ /de gso ba dang gso thabs gnyis/ /spyad sogs snum chos
17a4(mdo 'grel): khrus btang bya/ /sman dud khar dor mig bkru dang/ /gso dang dbyung thabs zug rngu mtshon/ /gtang dpyad zug rngu dbyung ba'i dpyad/ /mtshon dang thal sman mi bca' las/ /mdo gnas le'u sum cu ni/ /'di yi lus kyi brjod bya
17a5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /mngal du 'jug dang de yi nad/ /yan lag gnad kyi bye brag dang/ /rnam 'gyur bang chen las byung drug /nad kun 'byung ba'i nad gzhi dang/ /rims khrag dbugs mi bde gcod sogs/ /tshad dang gzhang 'brum tshad pa'i nad//
17a6(mdo 'grel): tshu 'gags gcin ni snyi ba dang/ /khong 'bras dbu rdzing dag dang ni/ /skya rbab mdze nad rlung gis gzir/ /dreg nang dag dang bcu drug yin/ /rims nad gso dang khrag dang ni/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde dang gcod/ /son dang tshad nad
17a7(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum dang/ /tshad nad pho ba gcin nad gnyis/ /khong 'bras skran dang dmu rdzing dang/ /skya rbab 'od nad me dpal dang/ /mdzad dang sha bkra rlung na dang/ dreg nas g.yo ba'i dpyad rnams te/ /le'u nyi shu gnyis 'di yin// //
17b1(mdo 'grel): de las gzhan pa cho ga grug /skyug sman bkru sman cho ga dang/ /de grub mas btang cho ga dang/ /mas btang nyes grub drug pa ni/ /sman yin de nas phyi ma ni/ /byas pa nyes spyod de'i nad dang/ /de gdon 'byung por rtogs pa gnyis/ /sgyo dang brjod
17b2(mdo 'grel): byed sogs gnyis gnyis/ /mig mchu rdzi ma'i grwa mtshams dang/ /mig 'bras rab rib mthong nyams gsum/ /gnyis gnyis kun la 'gro ba yin/ /rna dang sna dang kha dang mgo'i/ /rma dang chag drugs mtshan par brdol/ /'bras
17b3(mdo 'grel): sogs phra mo'i nad rnams dang/ /gsang ba'i nad ni tha dang gnyis/ /dug dang sprul dang srin bu gdug/ byi ba dad ni bcud kyis len/ /bu med sa bon gso ba ste/ /le'u bzhi bcu nyid yin no/ /de ltar le'u rgya nyi shu/ /gnas ni drug tu
17b4(mdo 'grel): bshad pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po sdus pa las mdo'i gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// /de nas nyin re zhing spyad pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /bde gnas tshe ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /yud tsam tshangs phyir gnas te
17b5(mdo 'grel): langs/ /lus kyi bya ba rdzogs byas nas/ /de nas gtsang sbra'i cho ga bya/ /arga n+ya go d+ha seng ldeng/ /ka rany+dza ka ku la sogs/ /bska dang tsha dang kha ba dag /rtsa 'jam nad par zas spyad nas/ /se dang rnyil la ma gnod par//
17b6(mdo 'grel): so yi dag byed bca' bar bya/ /ma zhu slon bro dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa'i lu rims kha yon can/ /skyon zhing kha bskam snying mig rna/ /mgo bo na bas 'di mi bca' / /rtag tu mig spyan skyed khaN+Da/ /mig la phan pas de phyir bsten//
17b7(mdo 'grel): /de ni me yi rang bzhin? te/ /lhag par bad kan la 'jigs pas/ /mchi ma 'dzag phyir skyed khaN+Da/ /zhag bdun zhing ni blugs par bya/ /de nas sna sman 'khur bkang dar/ /bdud pa so rtsi bsten par bya/ /so rtsi blo
18a1(mdo 'grel): 'grams mkhris pa khrag /rtsub pas mig ni na ba dang/ /dug gis brgyal zhing chad nad gzir/ /lus skye ma gyur la gnod pa yin/ /rtag tu bsku byug spyod byed na/ /de ni rgyas dal rlung 'joms yin/ /mig gsal lus rgyas
18a2(mdo 'grel): tshe 'phel zhing/ /gnyid 'od pags 'jam rtas byed yin/ /de ni mgo dang rna ba dang/ /rkang pa khyad par rtag tu bsten/ /bad kan skyes dang ma zhu dang/ /bkru sman sogs btang bsku byug spang/ /yang zhing las ni nus pa dang/ /me yi drod bskyed tshol 'bri
18a3(mdo 'grel): la/ /lus kyi skabs phyed mkhregs pa nyid/ /rtsol ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung mkhris nad can byis pa dang/ /rgas shing 'khogs pas de spang bya/ /stobs ldan snum pa gzab dang/ /grang ba'i dus dang dpyid dus dang/ /nus ldan dag
18a4(mdo 'grel): gi de bsten bya/ /de las gzhan tsha dal ba nyid/ /de byas ci bder lus dag ni/ /kun nas yongs su mnye bar bya/ /rtsol ba de byas zin nas ni/ /bde bar lus kun gnas par bya/ /shin tu rtsal bas lung pa dang/ /skom dang gcod can mi dran
18a5(mdo 'grel): mun dad? khrog dang mkhris rgyas ngal dang dug /rims dang slon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtsol ba mi nyal lam bud med/ /rgad dang smra sogs shugs 'byin dang/ /seng gas blang po drangs pa bzhin/ /shin tu grags par ma rungs 'gyur
18a6(mdo 'grel): dril phyis bad kan sel ba dang/ /tshil ni rab tu zhu byed cing/ /yan lag brtan par byed ba dang/ /pags pa gsal bar byed pa'i mchog /khrus ni drod skyed ro tsa dang/ /tshe dang mdangs dang stobs rab bskyed/ /g.ya' dang dri mngal dang ldan
18a7(mdo 'grel): rdul/ /snyoms skom lus tsha mi shes sal/ /chu dron gyis ni lus kyi smad/ /blugs shing bkrus pa stobs bskyed yin/ /de nyid mgor blugs khrus byas na/ /skra rang mig gi stobs 'phrog yin/ /khrus ni 'gram 'chags mi gnad
18b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rna ba'i nad dang tshad pas 'khru/ /lto spos tsham pa ma zhu dang/ /zas ma thag tu rnams la smad/ /zhu nas phan zhing ran par za/ /gshad sogs nan gyis ba rnags mi bya/ /shugs ma phyung bar gzhan mi bya/ /gnod las mi bde bar ma yin/ /sems
18b2(mdo 'grel): can thams cad bde 'dod phyir/ /rtson pa kun la 'jug par 'dod/ /bde ba chos med par ma yin/ /de bas chos la brtson par bya'o/ /mos bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten/ /cig shes ring du spang bar bya/ /'tshe dang brku dang 'dod log spyod/ /phra
18b3(mdo 'grel): ma dag rtsub brdzun tshig dang/ /mi 'brel smra dang gnod sems dang/ /brnab sems lta ba phyin ci log /de ltar sdig pa'i las rnams bcu/ /lus dag yid kyis spang bar bya/ /phongs pa nad pa mya ngan gzir/ /ci nus par ni phan gang las
18b4(mdo 'grel): bya/ /'bu srin grog spur dag la yang/ /rang dang 'dra bar rtag tu blta/ /lta dang dge slong bram ze dang/ /sman pa rgan rgyal mgron pos mchod/ /slong la rgyab kyis phyogs kyi? gyi/ /brnyas par mi bya tshar mi bcad/ /gnod pa byed brtson dgra
18b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan la'ang/ /phan gdags pa ni gtso tsher bya/ /'byor dang rgud la'ang yid gcig bya/ /rgyu la phrag dog 'bras bu min/ /dus su phan dang ngan pa smra/ /slu ba med cing nges par bya/ /bzhin 'dzum gsod por smra ba dang/ /spyod pa
18b6(mdo 'grel): bzang zhib snying rjes jam/ /gcig bu bde min thams cad la/ /yin mi brtan cing dogs mi bya/ /su yang bdag gi dgra yin dang/ /bdag ni su yi dgar gyur dang/ /brnyas dang bdag la gtso bo ni/ /mi byams zhes ni smra mi bya/ /'gro
18b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i bsam pa shes nas ni/ /gang zhig ji ltar yongs mgu ba/ /de la de bzhin rjes 'jug cing/ /gzhan dag dga' byed mdzangs pa yin/ /dbang po gzir bar mi bya zhing/ /'di rab nyams bder bya ba'ang min/ /tshoms gsum med pa la
19a1(mdo 'grel): btsom pa la/ /mi bsten de dang 'gal mi bya/ /chos rnams kun gyi lam la ni/ /dbu ma'i 'a ma gyis rjes 'jug bya/ /skra sen kha spu ring mi bzhag /sgo dgu rkang pa dri med pa/ /khrus pa dga' zhing dri zhim pa sgos/ /chos
19a2(mdo 'grel): lugs bzang zhing mi 'phyar spang/ /rin chen grub pa'i gsang sngags dang/ /sman chen rtag tu bca' bar bya/ /gdugs dkar lham dang ldan pa ni/ /gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro/ /mtshan mngon chen dag la ni/ /dbyug thogs 'og dkri
19a3(mdo 'grel): grogs ldan bya/ /mchod rten mchod bya rgyal mtshan dang/ /mi shis grib ma thal phub dang/ /mi gtsang ga sreg bod gtor ma dang/ /khrus byas sa ni bsgom mi bya/ /chu bod rgyal te 'gro mi bya/ /ma chen phung por 'gro mi bya/ /the tshom bcas
19a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i gru shing las/ /gzhon pa mi bsrun bzhin mi gzig /sprid pa gad mo glal pa la/ /kha ni gdangs par mi bya'o/ /sna ni bru bar mi bya zhing/ /don med sa ris mi bya'o/ /lus kyi yan lag ni/ /bcu zhing/ rtsog rtsog por yang 'dug mi bya/ /lus ngag yid kyi spong
19a5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /snga nas la las bzlog par bya/ /pus 'gred yun ring gnas mi bya/ /mtshan ma shing drung bsten mi bya/ /sum mdo mchod rten drung bzhi mdo/ /lha yi khad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /gsod sa 'brog stod lang stong dang/ /dur khrod du ni
19a6(mdo 'grel): nyin mo 'ang min/ /rnam kun nyi ma la mi blta/ /mgo yis khur ni bskur mi bya/ /shin tu phra dad 'tshor ba dang/ /mi gtsang mi sdug rgyun mi blta/ /chad 'tshong ba dang sbyor ba dag /sbyin dang len la spyad mi bya/ /mdun gyi bser bu nyi
19a7(mdo 'grel): tshan rdul/ /ba mo dang ni drud tshub dang/ /sbrid ba sgregs pa lung ba zas/ /gnyid log nyal po gcus mi bya/ /gang kha'i grib ma rgyal po sngar/ /sprul gdug gcan zan rwa can dang/ /dus mtshams dag tu zas bzha' dang/ /bud med
19b1(mdo 'grel): nyal log sems las dang/ /dgra bo'i nang mar zan tshogs 'dus/ /smad 'tshong tshod pa'i zas dag dang/ /lus dang mchu dang sen sgra 'byin/ /lag pa sgra ni sbug pa dang/ /chu me mchong bya'i bar du 'gro/ /ro bsregs la bsten dud pa dang/ /chab sogs
19b2(mdo 'grel): chags dang bud med la/ /yid rton dang dbang gyur pas spang/ /blo ldan spyod pa thams cad la/ /'jig rten nyid ni slob dpon yin/ /de bas 'jig rten pa yi don/ /rtogs par byed pas de nyid bya/ /snying rjes bslan zhing stong dang ldan/ /lus dang ngag yid
19b3(mdo 'grel): dul ba dang/ /gzhan gyi don la rang don sems/ /de dag dam pa'i spyod mthar thug/ /de ltar bdag ni nyin mtshan du/ /ji lta bur ni gnas 'gro zhes/ /rtag tu dran pa nyer 'jog pa/ /sdug bsngal snod du mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar spyod pa mdor bsdus bas//
19b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig kun tu spyod byed pa/ /tshe dang nad med dbang phyug dang/ /grags pa 'jig rten rtag 'thob 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las mdo'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas dus su sbyar pa'i le'i bshad par bya'o//
19b5(mdo 'grel): dgun zla rab ba sogs gnyis gnyis/ /rim bzhin dus ni drug tu bshad/ /de las dgun zla tha chung sogs/ /gsum ni byed du 'gro zhes bya/ /de tshe mi rnams gnyid re zhing/ /mthu 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yin/ /de tshe shing tu ni zhing tsha/ /rtsub pa'i lam
19b6(mdo 'grel): gyi ngo bo nyid/ /nye ma rlung gi zla ba yi/ /sa yi yon tan zad par byed/ /'dir ni cha bsgra kha ba yi/ /ro rnams stobs ni tsha ba yin/ /de bas me ni mthu stobs 'phrog/ /lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba'i dus/ /dbyar la sogs par slar stobs bskyed//
19b7(mdo 'grel): 'di stobs sar ni bskyed bas na/ /'dir ni bsil bas zla ba ni/ /stobs dang ldan pas nyi ma 'bri/ /char 'bab pa dang rlung bsil bas/ /sa steng tsha ba zhi ba na/ /'dir ni snum dang skyur lan tsha/ /mngar ba'i ro rnams mthu bskyed do/ /dgun che
20a1(mdo 'grel): chad dang tsha dus su/ /stobs chud ltag ma dag la 'bring/ /stobs ldan grang bas bkag pa na/ /dgun gyi dus su me stobs ldan/ /de ni rlung gis spang bas na/ /zas nyung gyur na lus zungs skems/ /de bas dgun ni mngar skyur
20a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /lan tsha'i ro ni bsten par bya/ /de tsha mtshon mi ring bas na/ /nang par nyid ni bkres par 'gyur/ /nges par bya ba byas nas ni/ /ji skad bshad rdzogs de rjes la/ /rlung 'joms til mar gyis byug cing/ /spyi bo til mar gyis byug
20a3(mdo 'grel): mnye/ /bag yod pa dang stobS 'gyad cing/ /rkang pas ran par mnye bar bya/ /de nas bskabs snum bsal la/ /chog bzhin du khrus dag bya/ /gur gum gla rtsi dang bcas pa/ /lus bsku a ka ru yis gdug/ /sha tshon khu ba
20a4(mdo 'grel): snum pa dang/ /bu ram chad dang chang dangs chad/ /gro dang 'bras khur ma sha dang/ /'o ma bu ram shing byas bza' / /kha zas gsang dang zhag til mar/ /dro 'jam chu yis gtsang sbra bya/ /be'u bslag pa dang sog pa'o/ /dre'u
20a5(mdo 'grel): rdog re'u bal la gding/ /rang bzhin dro zhing yang pa yi/ /gos bgo mal la brten par bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od la ran par bde/ /dugs bya lham ni rtag tu bgo/ /chud ma gzhon zhing yid 'od rgyags/ /nu ma brla dang ro smad rgyas/ /gur
20a6(mdo 'grel): gum gyis byugs spos kyis gdugs/ /lus kyi drod kyis grang sel ba'o/ /sa khang khang pa nyis rin byas/ /mdag ma'i drod kyis bsros pa ni/ /grang dang rtsub pa las byung ba'i/ /nyes pa nam yang mi 'byung ngo/ /dgun smad
20a7(mdo 'grel): dus du lhag par yang/ /chog 'di nyid bya ba yin/ /de tshe lhag par grang ba dang/ /stobs 'phrog las byung rtsub ba yin/ /dgun ni bad kan kho na sogs/ /dbyid dus nyi ma'i 'od dros pa/ /me yi drod nyams nad bskyed de//
20b1(mdo 'grel): de bas de ni myur du bsal/ /rno dang skyag sman sna sman sogs/ /yang dang rtsub pa'i kha zas dang/ /bcag dang lus kyi mnye ba yis/ /bad kan 'od ba'i nad gsal bya/ /khrus byas ga bur tsandan dang/ /gur gum sogs pas bsku bar bya/ /nas dang gro ni
20b2(mdo 'grel): rnying pa dang/ /sbrang ci skam sa'i bsreg sha bza' / /a mra'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i/ /khu ba skom du sbyar ba btud/ /chung ma dri zhim utpal gyis/ /mig dang ldan dang lhan cig pa cing/ /yid ni dga' zhing bder byas pas/ /grogs dang lhan cig
20b3(mdo 'grel): gtud par bya/ /skyon med chang dro 'jam dang/ /bu ram rgun chad sbrang chad dang/ /sga chu bskol dang se'u'i chu/ /sgrang chu 'am bla sgang chu btung bya/ /lho phyogs bser bus bsil ba dang/ /mdza' ma kun tu chu 'bab la/ /nyi ma'i 'od
20b4(mdo 'grel): ni mi snang dang/ /nor bu bcag 'dra'i mdangs ldan pa/ /khu byug snyan pa sgra sgrog cing/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ldan pa'i sa/ /sna tshogs me tog ldan pa'i shing/ /dri zhim skyed mos tshal du ni/ /dga' 'dun gtan ni sna sogs pas/ /phyed
20b5(mdo 'grel): dus 'debs bde bar bya/ /lci bsil nyin mo nyal ba dang/ /snum bag mngar skyar spang bar bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tsha bas/ /so ga 'phrog pa 'dra b yin/ /de bas de tsha lan tshwa tshwa/ /skyur sol nyi ma'i 'od zer spang/ /zas ni mngar dang 
20b6(mdo 'grel): yang ba dang/ /snum bsil sla ba nyid bsten bya/ /rab bsil chu yis lus khrus zhing/ /phye zan khar bcas pa bza' / /char mi btud ste 'thud na yang/ /nyung ba 'am chu mad bsres la btung/ /gzhan du de ni kha bskams stong//
20b7(mdo 'grel): tsha dang rmongs par byed pa yin/ /'bras chen kun de ltar dkar dang/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha dag bza' / /khu ba mi bska zhod da ni/ /bu ram sbyar sogs g.yos byas btung/ /phal cher skyur ba btung bar bya'o/ /snying po lnga yi
21a1(mdo 'grel): btung pa ni/ /kham phor sar ba la gnas pa/ /chu shing rgyas lta dum bu bsres/ /skyud bcas kham phod snod kyis btud/ /chu ni bta? las bsgongs shing/ /ga pur bcas shing shin tu bsil/ /zla zer lta bu'i
21a2(mdo 'grel): bza' ba ni/ /mtshan mo dus su bza' ba dang/ /zla ba skar ma ltar dkar ba'i/ ma he'i 'o ma bsil mo btud/ /sA la tA la chen po ni/ /sprin reg tsha ba'i 'od zer sgrig /rgun 'bra'i snyam g.yung tha shing/ /'khri shing dang ldan nags tshal
21a3(mdo 'grel): bzang/ /dri bzang kha ba'i chu yis ni/ /gsal khang lus dang 'tsham byas pa/ /ldum bu 'bras bu 'phyang ba dang/ /chu shing 'dab dang ka ltar/ /bar rtsa pad+ma utpal/ /me tog rgyas pa dang ldan par/ /'jam pa'i gnas ma la bca' nas
21a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /phyed dus nyi mas gdud bas na/ /nyal ba'am chu yi khang ba ni/ /bud med bcos gzugs nu ma lag /kha las u shing chu 'bab bya/ /mtshan ma yang thog rdo thal byugs/ /zla ba la'ang kyis bsil bar nyal/ /mal stan bde
21a5(mdo 'grel): bar sems bde zhing/ /tsan dan lde gu 'phreng ba thogs/ /rab tu phra ba'i gos bgos shing/ /'dod pa'i rgyun las ldog par bya/ /tA la'i bsil yab spos chu btab?/ /pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rlungs yab dad/ /dal gyis legs par
21a6(mdo 'grel): g.yo pa dang/ /rdzi char bser bu dang ldan bya/ /ga phur mal+li ka 'phreng ba/ /mu tig do shal tsan dan dkar/ /ne tso sha rig? la sogs/ /sgra snyan yid 'ong sgrags pa dang/ /chung ma gung bu bang rtsa 'dra/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur
21a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes/ /pad+ma can ni 'gro 'dra ba/ /sgom par sel bar byed pa yin/ /mthu 'phrog pas don pa'i lus/ /dman par las kyang dman gyur te/ /dbyar gyi gnod pas gnod 'gyur te/ /mkha' la sprin 'dus chu yis
21b1(mdo 'grel): brlan/ /chu thigs bcas pa'i rlung dang ni/ /glang ba drag po ldang ba dang/ /sa yi rlangs pa skyur smin dang/ /chu ni rnyog pa can dag gis/ /me drod chung ba gnod pa phyed/ /phan tshun gnod pa de la ni/ /dro zhing me yi stobs bskyed pa/ /bud mongs gang
21b2(mdo 'grel): yin bsten par bya/ /spyad bas lus ni dag byas pa/ /zas ni yang bag khu ba bza' / /skam sa'i srog chags sha khu dang/ /sbrang rtsi chang ni rnyed pa btung/ /dar ba kha ru tshar sbyar ba/ tsha ba lnga'i phye ma can/ /khron pa'i chu ni bskol ba'ang rung/ /char che'i
21b3(mdo 'grel): dus su kha zas ni/ /rang gyur lan tshwa snum dang bcas/ /skam zhing sbrang rtsir ldan pa yang/ /rkang gis mi 'gro dri zhim phyug /rtag tu gos ni sogs kyis gdugs/ /khrod bzang steng du ba mo bsil/ /char gyi zer spangs gnas par bya/ /klu chu dang sbyar
21b4(mdo 'grel): skyo ma dang/ /nyin nyid rtsol dang nyin tshan spangs/ /dbyar dus bsil bar gyur ba la/ /'phral du nyi zer gyis gdungs bas/ /char 'bab chen bsags pa yi/ /mkhris pa ston ni ldang bar 'gyur/ /de bsal phyi ni sman mar ba?/ /bkru sman btang
21b5(mdo 'grel): dang gter ga bya/ /kha dang mngar dang skab dang/ /bkres tshe zas ni yin pa bza' / /'bras chan mung+ga ru ra/ /sbrang rtsi skam sa'i ba to la/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa dang/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis bsil byas la/ /de'i shar bas dug med pa
21b6(mdo 'grel): nyin mtshan gnyid gar sbyangs chu btung/ /dang ba'i dri med chu zhes pa/ /dri med dri ma sel 'gyur ba/ /mi 'brug rtsub ba ma yin pa/ /btung ba la sogs bdud rtsir mtshungs/ /tsan dan u shing ga bur? dang/ /mu tig chu ni 'phyar
21b7(mdo 'grel): 'breng gos mdzes/ /khang bzang rdo thal gyis dkar zhing/ /zla zer can du mtshan gnas kyang/ /zil pa thal sman te cang 'drangs/ /zho dang til mar zhag nyi tshan/ /mi bzang tshad dang nyin par nyal/ /mdun kyi bser bu yongs su spang ka bdun?
22a1(mdo 'grel): dang dbyar ni dang po gsum/ /dpyid ni tha ma'i ro gsum ste/ /so ga mngar ste ston ka ni/ /mngar dang kha dang bska ba bsten/ /mdor pa zas dang skom dag ni/ /ston dang dpyid ni rtsub? ba ste/ /sog sbyar mdza' bsil bar
22a2(mdo 'grel): byed da gzhan dag du ni de las bzlog rtag tu ro kun bsten pa las/ /rang rang dus su lhag par bsten/ /dus gnyis thog mdza' zhig bdun ni/ /dus mtshams yin par shes par bya/ /der ni snga mo'i cho ga spang/ /'og ma rim bzhin bsten
22a3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /ma spangs nan nad 'gyur te/ /'phral du nad ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /mdo'i gnas le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas nad mi 'byung bar bya ba'i dpyad kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// //phyi dbugs bshad ci sprid
22a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /bkres skom gnyid dang lung ngal dbugs/ /glal dang mchi ma skyug pa dang/ /khu ba'i shugs ni dgag mi bya/ /phyon ni bkag par gyur pa yis/ /skran dang rtug skam gzer snyom lci/ /phyen dang bshad gci khong du 'gags//
22a5(mdo 'grel): mig rdul drod chung snying nad 'gyur/ /bshad 'gags byin pa'i nya 'gyur zhing/ /cham pas 'debs shing klad pa na/ /khar ni mi gtsang 'byung ba dang/ /sngar bshad nad duAng 'gyur ba yin/ /gcin bsgags pa yis yan
22a6(mdo 'grel): lag na/ /rde'i chu so pho mtshan dang/ /dku yi nang na sngar gyi nad/ /phal cher 'byung po de yi sman/ /reng bu bsku byug lus spyir dang/ /dugs dang sman rim mas btang ba'o/ /zas sgom bshad ba 'gags pa dang/ /bshad 'gag
22a7(mdo 'grel): las byung glo gtsang mtshungs/ /chu 'gag pa la mar sar ni/ /che tshad tsam ni rab tu sbyar/ /sgregs pa bkag ni yi ge 'chus/ /lus 'dar snying dang brab 'gags na/ /spo zhing lung ba skyigs bus 'debs/ /de sman skyigs bu dag
22b1(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra/ /sbrid bkag mgon dbang mi rno/ /gnye'u rengs kha yo 'gram chig 'gyur/ /bud rnon gyis dbug mig sman dang/ sna sman nyi ma lta ba yis/ /sbring pa 'gags pa bsal bya zhing/ /snum dang dugs kyang bsten par bya/ /skom pa bsgags
22b2(mdo 'grel): pas kha skams shing/ /yan lag mi bde rnam mi gsang/ /mgo 'khor myos shing snying nad 'byung/ /der bsil cho ga thams cad phan/ /bkras pas lus zhig yig 'chus/ /lus snyoms nyam chung gzer mgo 'khor de la zas yab snum?
22b3(mdo 'grel): ? dag /chung ba dag ni sbyar bar bya/ /gnyid bkag khong myos spyi bo mig/ /lci zhing snyom la glal 'ong zhing/ /lus zhig snyam sems de la ni/ /gnyid log lus mnyes phan pa yin/ /lud pa bkag pas de 'phel zhing/ /dbugs mi bde
22b4(mdo 'grel): zhing yig 'chus/ /snying nad skem byed skyigs bus 'debs/ /der ni lung bsal cho ga bya/ /dal du ba dbugs ni bkag pa las/ /skyan dang snying nad myos par 'gyur/ /de la nges gso bya ba dang/ /rlung sel ba yi cho ga phan/ /glal bkag
22b5(mdo 'grel): pa ni sbrid bkag mtshungs/ //cho ga thams cad rlung 'joms bya/ /mchim bkag pas mgo snying na/ /gnya' rengs yi ge 'chus mgo 'khor/ /skyan bcas sna tshu 'dzag 'gyur der/ /gnyid doms chad btung gtam snyan phan/ /skyug
22b6(mdo 'grel): bro mngas? bas me dpal mdze/ /'bras dang mig nad g.yan pa rims / /skya rbab yud pa dbugs mi bde/ /dang gar ro stong mi bde skrangs/ /kha bkar dob dur smyung bar gnas/ /rtsub zas de nyid skyug pa dang/ /rtsol dang myur bar gtar ga gang ba//
22b7(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ /khu ba bkag pas de 'dzag dang/ /pho mtshan na dang 'ong nad rims/ /snying nang chus 'gags lus zhigs dang/ /rde'u 'phel dang ma ning 'gyur/ /de la khyim bya'i sha dang chad/ /'bras chan mas
23a1(mdo 'grel): btang lus spyid dang/ /chu so'i nad bsal til mar btsos/ /'o ma bud med gzhon bsten phan/ /shugs ni bkag dang btsir ba yis/ /rgad ni kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shin tu mang po de yi phyir/ /gso
23a2(mdo 'grel): dpyad mang po 'dir bshad do/ /de las phal cher rlung du ma/ /gang phyir 'khrugs par gyur pas na/ /de phyir de yi zas skom sman/ /mnyam par 'gyur ba sbyar ba bya/ /'di dang gzhan du phan 'dod pas/ /'dod chen phrag dge zhe sdang
23a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ser sna 'dod chags la sogs shugs/ /rtag dgag po thul bar bya/ /dri ma rnams ni sbyar ba'i phyir/ /ji bzhin dus su nan tan bya/ /de ni shin tu gsogs gyur na/ /shas cher 'khrug pas srog rgyun gcod/ /gnod pa
23a4(mdo 'grel): smyung dang bzhu byas bas/ /bsal kyang slar ni ldang srid kyi/ /gang zhig logs par sbyang ba dag /de ni slar yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /dus shes pa yis de phan chad/ /rim pa bzhin du ci rigs pa dang/ /bcud kyis len rnams
23a5(mdo 'grel): grub ba dang/ /ro tsa'i sbyor ba sbyar bar bya/ /sman rnams kyis ni lus sbyangs phan/ /sa lu drug cu pa dad 'gro/ /mung+ga sha dang mar la sogs/ /phan pa'i zad kyis rim lus rta/ /yid 'ong drod skyed sman sbyar ba/ /yi ga 'bye zhing ba ju
23a6(mdo 'grel): byed dang/ /bsku zhing dril phyis khrus bcas dang/ /drag po 'jam rtsi mas btang brtas/ /des ni mi kun stobs ldan zhing/ /blo mdog dbang po dri ma med/ /de bzhin tshe ring ro tsa dang/ /dpal dang gzi mdangs thob par 'gyur//
23a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung po dug dang rlung dang me/ /mtshan rmas chags brugs sogs 'byung dang/ /'dod chags zhe sdang 'jigs sogs gang/ /de ni blo bur nad ces bya/ /shes rab nyes pa spang pa dang/ /dbang po nyer zhing dran pa dang/ /yul
23b1(mdo 'grel): dus bdag nyid shes pa dang/ /dam pa'i spyod pa'i rnam 'jug pa/ /lhan cig skyes dang glo bur nang/ /mdor nam skyes pa yi phyir/ /skyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /grang ba las byung nyes tshigs dpyid kyi tshe/ /rnam bsal
23b2(mdo 'grel): sog las byung dbyar dus na/ /dbyar bsags sprin bral dus su lags sbyangs nas/ /dus byung nang ni nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu phan pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten/ /brtags te byed cing yul rnams la mi chags/ /gtong ldan
23b3(mdo 'grel): sems snyoms bden brtson bzod dang ldan/ /nyams ldan sten par byed na nad med 'gyur/ /mdo'i gnas le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas chu sna tshogs la sogs pa'i bye brag shes bar bya ba'i la'u bshad par bya'o// //
23b4(mdo 'grel): mkha' las 'bab pa'i gang+gA'i chu/ /'tsho byed ngoms byed yi gar 'od/ /tshim zhing sems ni gsal byed pa/ /slar zhing ri mo gsal la zhim/ /bsil zhing yang pa bdud rtsi mtshungs/ /nyi zla rung gis reg gyur pa/ /de ni yul dus la bltos
23b5(mdo 'grel): nas/ /phal cher phan dang gnod pa yin/ /gang zhig char 'bab dri ma med/ /'bras chan dngul phor nang gnas pa/ /ma rung mdog kyang ma gyur pa/ /gang+gA'i chu ste btung bar bya/ /gzhan du mtsho chu ston zla ni/ /'bring po min par btugs mi bya//
23b6(mdo 'grel): char pa'i chu ni snod bzang bzhag/ /'gyur ba med pa rtag tu btung/ /de ming na ni thang la gnas/ /bar snang ba dang rjes mthun yin/ /sa phyogs dkar nag gtsor zhing yangs/ /nyi 'od rlung gis phog pa bsngags/ /steng ka 'dam rdzab nyi lcibs?
23b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rtswa dang la ma rnyogs ma can/ /nyi zla rlung gis ma phog pa/ /mngon du 'bab dang chu gang lce/ /spu ba srog chags can dang dro/ /grang chas so yis mi bzod pa/ /char gang dus sum bab dang/ /dus kyi dang por 'bab pa gang/ /srog chags
24a1(mdo 'grel): gdug dad pa sogs 'dres/ /bshad gci dug 'dres gnod mi btung/ /nub phyogs nas ni rgya mtshor 'bab /gang yang myur 'bab rdul med chu/ /de dag mdor na dge ba yin/ /de las bzlog pa bzang ma yin/ /rdo
24a2(mdo 'grel): la shugs drag rdebs pa yis/ /rgyun chad g.yengs pa chu dag dang/ /gang can ma la ya las byung/ /dge'o de nyid brtan g.yung na/ /srin bu rkang 'bam rnying dang ni/ /lkog ma klad pa'i nang skyed 'gyur/ /shang dang nub kyi mdza' las byung//
24a3(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum skyed do dbang che na 'bab/ /dmu rdzing rkang 'bam nad skyed 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas binda'i ri las 'bab/ /mdze dang skya rbab klad nas 'gyur/ /pa ri ya ri'i nang kun sel/ /khron pa rdzing la sogs pa'i chu/ /skam sa rlan can srog?
24a4(mdo 'grel): la shes/ /drod chung skran yod skya rbab dang/ /dmu rdzings tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum mam/ /pha ba'i brod chung 'or nad can/ /mi btung brang dka' nyung zad btung/ /ston ka so ga ma gtogs par/ /nad med mis kyang cung zad btung//
24a5(mdo 'grel): zan zos bar mdza' thog mar ni/ /chu 'thungs ngan dang sbom skams 'gyur/ /chu bsil chang nad brgyal ba dag/ /skyur dang dal dang mgo 'khor dag/ /skom dang lus tsham khris pa dang/ /khrag brgyas dug ni sel byed yin
24a6(mdo 'grel): chu tshan drod skyed zas 'ju zhing/ /mgul ba de lus yang gcin nang sel/ /skyigs bu lto spos rlung bad kan/ /rims sar 'phral du zlog byed cing/ /lud pa cha ma sar dbugs mi bde?/ /rtsib logs ? la chu tshan bsngags//
24a7(mdo 'grel): chu ni bskol la bsgrangs bdag/ /bad kan mi skyed lus yang zhing/ /mkhris pa can la phan pa yin/ /de ni zhag lon nyes gsum bskyed/ /rgya lhar chu ni snum pa dang/ /ri mngar ro mi bsal zhing yang/ /skom dang mkhris pa
24b1(mdo 'grel): rlung nang sel/ /drod skyes lgang ba'i nad sbyong byed/ /dbyar gyi char chu chu bo'i chu/ /mchog tu bzang dang ngan par bshad/ /chu'i sde tshan no/ /'o ma phal cher ro zhu mngar/ /snum zhing mdangs bskyed lus zungs 'phel/ /rlung dang mkhris
24b2(mdo 'grel): sol ro tsa byed/ /bad kan skyer lci bsil ba yin/ /ba yi 'o ma 'cho byed cing/ /bcud kyis lan yin glo rdol dang/ /glo gcod la phan yid gzhungs byed/ /stobs skyed nu zho skyed dang 'khrul/ ngal dang mgo 'khor myos dpal nyams//
24b3(mdo 'grel): lud pa dbugs mi bde bkris skam / /rims snying gcin ni sri ba dang/ /khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba yin/ /ma he 'o ma 'ju drags dang/ /gnyid med la phan rag cli bsil/ /rin chu nyung 'thung bas rgod/ //kha zhing tsha bza za bas
24b4(mdo 'grel): yang/ /skem dang rims dang dbugs mi bde/ /khrag dang mkhris pa tshad nad sel/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma cung rtsub dro/ /lan tsha bro zhing drod che yang/ /rlung dang bad kan ltos spos srin/ /'o ra na de dmu rdzings gzhan nag sel/ /bud med nu zho rlung
24b5(mdo 'grel): mkhris khrag/ /snang pa'i mi nad sel byed de/ /chim byed mig dang snar blugs phan/ /lug gi 'o ma snying gnod tsha/ /rlung 'joms skyigs du dbugs mi bde/ /mkhris pa bad kan skyed pa yin/ /ban glang mo yis rab brten byed//
24b6(mdo 'grel): mig pa gcig pa'i 'o ma tsha/ /yan lag rlung sel skyur bcas shing/ /lan cha? bro zhing rmongs par byed/ /'o rlon bad kan skyed cing lci/ /rigs pas bsgol ba de las gzhan/ /shin tu bsko na 'ju dga' lci/ /bzhos ma thag dro
24b7(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi mtshungs/ /zho ni ro dang zhu rjes skyur/ /rtug skyemS lci la rlung nad sel/ /tshil dang khu tshu stobs bad kan/ /khrag mkhris drod skyed 'or nad skyed/ /yi ga 'byed cing kha zas len/ /grang ba'i rims dang mi snyoms rims/ /
25a1(mdo 'grel): cham pa gcin 'gags gyur pa dang/ /'khru ba'i nad la rtsub mo phan/ /zho dron dpyid dang so ga dang/ /ston dus mtshan mo gtud mi bya/ /de ni mung+ga sran tshod dang/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang kar sha/ /skyu ru ni med mi
25a2(mdo 'grel): 'thung/ /rtag tu ma yin ma langs min/ /gzhan du rims khrag ma dpal dang/ /mdze dang skya rbab mgo 'khor skyed/ /dar sar yang la bskal zhing skyu ro/ /drod rkyed bad kan rlung dag sel/ /skran nad dmu rdzings gzhang 'brum dang//
25a3(mdo 'grel): pho nad chu sri yi ge 'chus/ /mcher ba skran dang mar ma zhu/ /sbyar dug skya rbab nad rnams sel/ /de 'dra kho kha chu 'khru yang/ /rtsa spubs sbyong la rtug skam sel/ /'phral gyis mar sar ro ci zhing/ /bsal zhing mdog
25a4(mdo 'grel): stobs drod skyed byed/ /'khru gcod rlung mkhris khrag gzhang 'brum/ /glo gcod kha yon lung gsel/ /zhun mar blo rno dran gsal zhing/ /yid gzhungs drod skyed stobs tshe 'phel/ /mig der byis rgan bu 'dod dang/ /mdangs
25a5(mdo 'grel): bzang rab gzhon skad snyan phan/ /glo rdol skems dang gcod dang 'bras/ /mtshon smas mes tshig mya la'ang bsngags/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dug dang smyo/ /lus skems mdangs nyams rims rnams sel/ /sman gyi nang na
25a6(mdo 'grel): snuM? mchog ste/ /bsil zhing na tshod 'jog pa'i mchog/ zhun mar stobs ni stong dang ldan/ /sbyor ba las ni stong byed 'byung/ /mar rnying smyo dang brjod byed brgyal/ /klad nad rna mig mngal nad dang/ /rma rnams sbyor zhing
25a7(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba byed bas/ /nad las rgyal byed dam pa yin/ /phrum sar spra dang rgya phrum dang/ /chung ba la sogs stobs skyed cing/ /khu ba gnyid dang bad kan 'phel/ /rtug skam byed lce nyes dang ldan/ /ba mar 'o ma mchog yin no//
25b1(mdo 'grel): lug las byung ba smad pa yin/ /'o ma'i sde tshan no// //bu ram shing khu 'khru lci snum/ /shar skye ro tsa bad gcin 'phel/ /bsil zhing khrag mkhris sel ba dang/ /ro dang zhu rjes mngar ba yin/ /de tshe lan tshwa bo zhing sos//
25b2(mdo 'grel): bcas na khar dag dang 'dra/ /rtsa ba rtse mo dbus zos sogs/ /btsir dang dri ma pags pa dang/ /dus ni cung zad lon pa las/ /'khrul 'khor can ni rnam 'gyur te/ /tsha zhing lci la mkhregs par 'gyur/ /de la khar dkar po'i shing/ /
25b3(mdo 'grel): bsil dang mngar bas mchog yin la/ /de yi 'og ma spubs can yin/ /tshigs brgya pa dang ka ta ra/ /bal yul skyes sogs de las rim/ /cung zad tsha bro bska ba dang/ /drod bcas cung zad chi ba bskyed/ /lbu ba can lci bad kan
