25b4(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /sogs byed gcin ni sbyor byed yin/ /dkar po bad kan cher mi bskyed/ /bshad dang gci ba bde bar 'byin/ /dmar nag phal cher srin bu khrag/ rkang tshal sha dang 'dra kan pa skyed/ /rnying pa yid 'ong phan pa yin/ /sar pa drod
25b5(mdo 'grel): 'bri bad kan bskyed/ /hwags dang khaN+Da ka ra dkar/ /rim gyis yon tan che ba ste/ /ri tsa blo gcod blo rdol dang/ /khrag dang mkhris pa rlung sel yin/ /dam pa kha ra tsha zhing mngar/ /bskal ste yon tan de dang 'dra/ /kha ra kar ka
25b6(mdo 'grel): tsha dang skom/ /skyu dro brgyal dang khrag mkhris sel/ /bu ram shing bsdus kha ra dang/ /dbub can mchog tha ma yin/ /sbrang rtsa mig phran gcod sgom dang/ /bad kan skyigs bu khrag mkhris 'joms/ /tshal tsha mdze nad gcin nad skyug /lud pa dbugs
25b7(mdo 'grel): mi bde tshad sel/ rma sbyong rma 'tsho chag drug sbyor/ /rlung ni skyed par byed ba yin/ /rtsub cing bska la mngar ba ste/ /sbrang lrtsi khaN+Da de dang 'dra/ /tsha zhing tshas gdungs tsha dang ldan/ /tsha ba de ni gsod par 'gyur/ /skyugs sman sman mar mes btang la/ /sbrang
26a1(mdo 'grel): rtsi dro ba'am bkag pa med/ bu ram shing gi sde tshan no// //'bru mar rang gnas lta bu yin/ /de la til mar til mar til dang mtshungs/ /gtso bo rno zhing khyab pa yin/ /pags pa'i nyes sel mig la gnod/ /tsha zhing
26a2(mdo 'grel): ron la bad kan bskyed/ /skem po dag ni sha bskyed cing/ /sbom po'i sha 'bri mkhregs par 'ong/ /rtug 'gags srin bu 'dzoms pa dang/ /sbyar bas nad rnams thams cad sel/ /e raN+Da dkar tsha zhing kha/ /zhu rjes mngar lci 'khru ba yin/ /brlig
26a3(mdo 'grel): rlugs skran rlung bad kan dang/ /lto nad ldang dub rims nad sel/ /'or nad rkeng pa gsang ba'i nad/ /lto ba ro rgyab nad la phan/ /e raN+Da ni dmar po'i mar/ /rno tsha dring rab 'byil 'dred/ /yungs mar tsha dro rno ba dang/ /bad kan rlung sel khu pa
26a4(mdo 'grel): 'bri/ /yang zhing khrag mkhris skyed byed la/ /sha bkra mdze 'brum rma bu sel/ /ba ru ra'i mar mngar bsil lci/ /skra skyed rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /ni ma dmar rab tu tsha min kha/ /lta srin mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /zar ma le brgan rtsi yi mar//
26a5(mdo 'grel): dro zhing dpags nad bad mkhris bskyed/ /zhag dang rkang ni rlung 'joms shing/ /stobs dang khu chu bad kan bskyed/ /sha ni rang dngos rjes mthun la/ /tshil yang de dang 'drar shes bya/ /til mar la sogs pa'i sde tshan no// //chang
26a6(mdo 'grel): ni drod 'bar yi ge 'byed/ /rno zhing drod bskyed khong rta dga' / /mngar bcas kha zhing tsha ba dang/ /zhu rjes skyur zhing cung zad 'khru/ /bska bcas gdangs snyan nad med dang/ /sbobs bskyed mdog 'gyur khong yang zhing/ /gnyid med pa dang
26a7(mdo 'grel): gnyid che la/ /phan zhing khrag dang mkhris pa bskyed/ /rigs 'thungs skem dang sbom phan zhing/ /rtsub sna lus sgo khyab cing sbyong/ /rlung dang bad kan sel ba yin/ /gzhan du brten na dug dang mtshungs so/ /chang gsar lci zhing nyes bskyed
26b1(mdo 'grel): yin ? chang snying de las gzhan du byed/ /cha ba'i spyod pas ldan mi btung/ /sun cing bskres nyen nang pas min/ /shin tu rno min sar pa dang/ /legs par ma bslangs rnyog can min/ /'bru chang skran dang dmu rdzings dang/ /rtug skem blo gcod sel ba dang//
26b2(mdo 'grel): rlung 'joms tshil dang khrag bskyed cing/ /gcin bder 'byin cing bad kan bskyed/ /chang dangs yon tan de 'bral sa/ /yid 'ong yang zhing rno ba dang/ /gzer dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /skyug bra bshad 'gags spos cham 'joms/ /btur chad yang zhing phan//
26b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu ra ror mi 'gyur zhing/ /rma dang skya rbab mdzenang la/ /ha cang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing/ /rdzas bzhin yon tan rjes mthun chang/ /chang gi yon tan kun las ltag/ /pho nad skya rbab mdze gzhang 'brum/ /lus skem skrang 'or smu rdzing rims/ /
26b4(mdo 'grel): skran dang srin bu mcher nad sel/ /roni bska zhing tsha rlung bskyed/ /rgun chad nad sbyong snying la phan/ /shin tu dro min mdar zhing 'khru/ /mkhris rlung cung zad bskyes skya rbab/ /gcin nang gzhan 'brum srin nang sel/ /bu ram chang ni gcig rtug
26b5(mdo 'grel): 'gags/ /'byin zhing doms la drod bskyed yin/ /bu ram shing chad rlung mkhris bskyed/ /snum dang bar kan las byung 'joms/ /tshil 'or dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum sel/ /de bas khu ba bskol mchog yin/ /sbrang char 'grib byed rno ba yin/ /
26b6(mdo 'grel): gcin nad cham ba lung pa sel/ /tsha ni khrag mkhris bad kan dag/ 'ju zhing rlung ni snyoms byed la/ /rab tu tsha zhing rno rtsa bskyur/ /yi 'od yig 'bye zhing 'khru/ /kdrod bskyed reg na bsil ba dang/ /skya rbab srin sel mig la gnod/ /bu
26b7(mdo 'grel): ram bu shing rgun chang dang/ /tsha ni phyi ma phyi ma yang/ /sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras sogs las/ /mnan byas de dang 'drar shes bya/ /rdo gu la sogs bshur ba gzhan/ /dus kyi skyur po yang zas len/ /'bras bu'i rang skyur 'khru rno tsha/ /mkhris
27a1(mdo 'grel): pa bskyed byed bskus na bsil/ /ngal dang ? sel yi ga 'bye/ /drong ba skyed chu so'i nad sel yin/ /mas btang la phan yin du 'ong/ /yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms/ /ba gcin ra lug ma he dang/ /glang po rta bong rda
27a2(mdo 'grel): mo'i gcin/ /mkhris bskyed rtsub cing rnol tsha/ /'thungs rjes tsha dro ro tsha ste/ /srin nad 'or nang dmu rdzing spos/ /gzer dang skya rbab bad kan rlung/ /dug skran sha skra yi ga 'chus/ /mdze dang gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms/ /de ltar
27a3(mdo 'grel): chu bo bu ram shing/ /til mar chang gi sde tshoms rim/ /gsher ba'i rdzas phyogs gcig pa 'di/ /rags rim ji bzhin bstan pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// //
27a4(mdo 'grel): de nas kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rtsa snar 'bras chen ka ma la/ /drug cu pa dang bya yis blang/ /sgron bu'i mchu dang ce rnon dang/ /ro 'dra'i 'bras 'dra dri bzang dang/ /ba dang ka dang ser mdog can/ /
27a5(mdo 'grel): gang gzhan 'bras ni bzang po rnams/ /ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing snum/ /ro ca bshad bci bska zhing chung/ /ro rjes bar ska zhing phan pa dang/ /yang zhing gcin mang bsil ba yin/ /de la rtse rno'i nang rtsa snar/ /mchog yin skom
27a6(mdo 'grel): dang nyes gsum sel/ /de yi 'og tu 'bras chen sman/ /de'i 'og ka la ma de'i 'og /nas 'dra ha ya na cer ma/ /de sha da ka la sogs ni/ /ro mang na dri zhim lci la snum/ /zhu ba'i rjes skyur bad mkhris bskyed/ /bshang dang
27a7(mdo 'grel): gcib thur du 'byin/ /snga ma snga ma smad pa yin/ /'bras nad drug cu pa mchog ste/ /rtsa ser shun pa gnag pa dag /snum zhing 'ju sla bstan zhing mngar/ /nyes pa gsum sel bsil rtug 'dril/ /de la rim bzhin thub
27b1(mdo 'grel): chen dang/ /shun nag rgya skyegs tshigs ma 'dra/ /khyim bya'i sgong 'dra 'ur pa'i mig /phug ron 'bras dang su khar/ /bar kha dang utpal dmar/ /ci na ston skyes d+ha d+hu ra/ /gand+ha na dang ku ru bin/ /yon tan rim bzhin chung zhes bya/ /
27b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras gzhan mngar zhing zhu rjes skyur/ /mkhris pa bskyed cing lci ba dang/ /gcin rtug mang zhing tsha ba yin/ /pa ta la nyid nyes gsum bskyed/ /tsi tse khre dang ni pa ra/ /khra rgod sne 'bras sogs bsil yang/ /rtsa'i 'bru de dag rlung bskyed
27b3(mdo 'grel): cing/ /khong rtsub bad kan mkhris pa sel/ /de la khro ni rtas byed cing/ /lus kyi chag grugs 'byor bar byed/ /khre rgod mchog tu 'khru gcod cing/ /reg na bsil la dug sel yin/ /nang ni rtsub bsil lci la mngar/ /cung zad
27b4(mdo 'grel): khong 'khru bo shang rlung 'phel/ /ro tsa tan byed gcin dang ni/ /tshil dang mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /cham pa lung pa dbugs mi bde/ /da rgan lkog nang pags nang sel/ /nang rgod cung zad sman pa yin no/ /mig skyes 'bras nas rtsub cing tsha//
27b5(mdo 'grel): gro ni ro tsa snum bas li lci/ /'tsho byed rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /chag grugs 'byor byed mngar ba dang/ /sha mkhregs byed cing cung zad 'khru/ /nan ti mu ga ro bska zhing/ /bsil zhing mngar yang phan pa yin/ /gra ma can gyi 'bru sna tshoD
27b6(mdo 'grel): kyi sde tshan no// //mon sron sde dkar sran chung sogs/ /gang bu can 'bru rtsa sgo bkag /ro bska mngar zhing 'khru ba gcod/ /zhu rjes tsha la bsil zhing yang/ /tshil dang khrag dang mkhris pa la/ /bskus shing sdugs na phan pa
27b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /'di las mung+ga mchog rlung chung/ /sran ma shin tu rlung bskyed yin/ /mon sran dkar po rlung po skyed cing/ /rtsub cing lci la bshad ba 'phel/ /rgya sran nag tsha zhu rjes bskyur/ /khu chu'i rje'u cham lung pa/ /dbugs mi bde
28a1(mdo 'grel): rlung bad gzhang 'brum/ /'joms shing khrag mkhris mchog tu bskyed/ /ni Shab? ba ni rlung khrag mkhris/ /nu zho gcin 'phel lci zhing 'khru/ /tsha byed mig gnod khu ba 'bri/ /bad kan 'or nad dug rnams sel/ /ma sha
28a2(mdo 'grel): snum stobs bad kan bskyed/ /bshad gci mkhris ba 'phel byed 'khru/ /lci zhing tshal rlung 'joms dang/ /khu ba 'phel zhing 'byin par byed/ /ka kan du la phra sral phre'u/ /yon tan mon sran dre'u dad 'dra/ /til 'bru dro zhing
28a3(mdo 'grel): pags pa 'jam/ /bsil zhing skra dang stobs bskyed la/ /lci zhing gcin nyung zhu rjes tshe/ /yi gtungs? drod bskyed pad mkhris bskyed/ /zang ma snum mngar kha zhing dro/ /lci zhing bad kan mkhris pa bskyed/ /mi gnod khu skems
28a4(mdo 'grel): zhu res la tsha/ /le brgan rtsi 'bras de dang 'dra/ /gram can las nas rgod dang/ /ma shi gad bu can tha chad/ /'bru yi gsar thog bang kan bskyed/ /lor yon 'bru ni yang ba yin/ /myur bskyed de bzhin sran ma ni/ /snun med legs brdos
28a5(mdo 'grel): tshod ma yang/ /gang bu chags pa'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no// //'bras thug sla bska gar ba dang/ /'bras chan rnams ni snga ma bzhin/ /yang do de las sla ba ni/ /dge zhing rlung ni lugs mthun byed/ /skom bsnya
28a6(mdo 'grel): nyes pa lhag ma 'joms/ /'ju zhing lus gzungs mnyam par byed/ /rtsa sbubs mnyen byed rdul ba dang/ /me yi drod ni skyed par byed/ /thugs bska bskres skom nyams chung bsnya/ /lto nad rims nad sel pa yin/ /
28a7(mdo 'grel): dri ma 'gag la phan pa dang/ /drod bskyed nad ni 'ju bar byed/ /thugs gar 'khru gcod yi gar 'ong/ /skom sel drod bskyed rma dang mig /bkru sman rjes dang nyams chung dang/ /snum 'thungs rjes la yan pa yin/ /'bras
28b1(mdo 'grel): chan legs bkrus khu brtsags chos/ /rlangs pa dang ni bral ba dang/ /gang yang tsha ba'i sman rnams kyis/ /bskol ba'i 'bras tshos yang ba yin/ /de las bzlog pa gang zhig ni/ /sha khu 'o ma bskol sogs lci/ /de ltar rdzas deng bya sbyor dang/ /
28b2(mdo 'grel): tshad la sogs pa kun shes bya/ /khu pa nyams rtas tshim byed cing/ /ro tsa mig phan rma la gnod/ /mon sran rde'u sbyangs dang rna/ /lkog ma mig nad dag la phan/ /ku lat+tha khu rlung dang skran/ /ro smad smar gzer gnod pa sel/ /til tshigs
28b3(mdo 'grel): g.yos su sbyar byas nas/ /tshad ma skam dang myu gu dang/ /sgyur por char bu bcug pa ni/ /mig gnod nyes bskyed rma byed lci/ /dri 'dzin lus rta ro tsa zhing/ /snum zhing stobs bskyed yi ga 'byed/ /rgun chu'i btung ba dal dub dang/ /bkres
28b4(mdo 'grel): sel tshim par byed cing lci/ /rtug skam gcin mang yi gar 'ong/ /de yi yon tan sman bzhin blta/ /'bras yos skom dang skyug tshad 'khru/ /gcin mang tshil dad bad kan sel/ /lud pa mkhris pa nyer zhi byed/ /drod bskyed yang zhing
28b5(mdo 'grel): bsil pa yin/ /srun len lci zhing stobs bskyed la/ /bad kan bshad ba sra byed cing/ /nas yos rtug mkhregs rtsub pa dang/ /skom zhing khong 'khrug lci ba yin/ /nas phye khong yang bkres skom dang/ /dal dub mig nad rma la ban/ /skyo mar byas
28b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'thungs pa yis/ /'phral du stobs ni skyed byed yin/ /chu dang phye spel mi bza' zhing/ /dus gnyis mtshan mo 'dra 'phrad med min/ /'drangs rjes mi bza' sos bcad min/ /ha cang 'drangs ches bza' mi bya/ /'ba' cha nyam 'bri
28b7(mdo 'grel): rtsub pa dang/ /bshad mkhreg mig la gnang ba yin/ /sha g.os spos sbyar snum zhing lci/ /stobs bskyed sha 'phel rtas byed yin/ /mung+ga g.yos sbyar lci ba dang/ /sman gyi cha dang yon tan 'dra/ /khur ba mdag btsos dog le dang
29a1(mdo 'grel): sa blang? ? nur rgya sol bsregs/ /khyur? ba 'di rnams rigs gcig kyang/ /phyi ma phyi ma yang ba yin/ /g.yos su byas pa'i zas kyi sde tshon no// //sha ba dgo ba ku rung+ga/ /rkyang dang ri sha
29a2(mdo 'grel): ri dags ma/ /ri bong dang sgo tsa ru ka /ldang sgo la sogs ri dags yin/ /la tsa brti brti ka /go cha dmar dang god mo dang/ /sreg pa u ba tsa tra dang/ /ka bany+dzi ku ru pa/ /pa rta ka dang brti ka /gong mo sreg dang rma bya dang/ /khyim bya
29a3(mdo 'grel): dang ni ba dang/ /go nan dang ni ri la gnas/ /sha ra b+ha dang in+d+ra ba/ /ri bya 'di dag zas khron rko/ /shang shad te'u da du ha/ /bung 'dra ne tso sha ri ka /la ta khu byug he re ka /bye'u la sogs mchu rko yin/ /sbal ba sprul dang skyin
29a4(mdo 'grel): 'khor dang/ /be dur la sogs khung na gnas/ /ba lang rta bong dre'u dang/ /stag gzigs seng ge dom sbre'i/ /byi la byi ba sbyad ki dang/ /sre mo dang ni dred dag dang/ /wa dang 'phar ba khra dang ni/ /chun lag khra sbyad bya rog gi /
29a5(mdo 'grel): bya rigs khra sngon bya ku ra/ /bya rgol 'jug pa ka ling+ga/ /dud tsan ma du ha la sogs/ /gcan gzan bya dang rtsal mthus bra/ /phag rgod ru ru ma he skyin/ /ro hi ta dang glang po che/ /mdzo rgod g.yag rgod bse dang ni/ /smyur glang
29a6(mdo 'grel): zhes grags ri dags che/ /chung gnas dang pas ras/ /chu skyar ka ran dang bya gla /rgya dang khrung khrung ngur pa dang/ /so bya ka tampa sogs yin/ /nya ro hi ta ba ti na/ /nya phyis rul sbal kumpi ra/ /karta dur sram shaM bu ka /nye
29a7(mdo 'grel): ldang bar mi tsan+ti ka /bu lu chu srin nag khra dang/ /nya bo che ni byis pa gsod/ /dza ri tso ri tsi ma sogs /de ltar cha ni brgyad du bshad/ /ra lug gzas kyi spyod yul ni/ /'dres pas rigs gcig nges ma yin/ /thogs
29b1(mdo 'grel): tha ma skam gsher gnas/ /bar ma gnyis po thun mong bshad/ /de las skam sa'i sha rtug 'gags/ /bsal ba dang ni yang ba yin/ /'dus pa mkhris pa shas che zhing/ /rlung 'bring bad kan chung la phan/ /ri bong sha ni drod bskyed
29b2(mdo 'grel): rtsub/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru gcod gsil/ /brta ka la sogs pa'i sha /cung zad snum gro lci rtas byed/ /de rnams las kyang rgya bya'i sha /yid gzhungs drod stobs khu ba 'phel/ /bshad skems mdog bzang rlung shas che/ /'dus pa sel
29b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i dam pa yin/ /rma bya'i sha ni bzang min yang/ /rna mig skad 'gags rgas sar phan/ /khyim bya de 'dra'i ngo rtsa la/ /grong gnas lci zhing bad kan bskyed/ /gong mo u pa tsa krar bcas/ /yid gzhungs drod bskyed yi gar 'ong/ /thi ba zhar
29b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i sha lci zhing/ /tsha bro nyes pa thams cad bskyed/ /bye'u bad kan bskyed cing snum/ /rlung 'joms khu ba rab tu 'phel/ /sde tshan de las phyi ma rnams/ /rim bzhin lci dro snum zhing mngar/ /gcig mang ro tsa stobs bskyed cing/ /rlung 'joms
29b5(mdo 'grel): bad kan 'khrispa bskyed/ /de las ri dags chen po bsil/ /rtsa la mthus sha rlon za ba'i yang/ /ro rjes lan tshwa bro zhu rjes/ /tsha zhing sha ni 'phel bar byed/ /gzhang 'brum snying pa pho ba grang/ /rkem nad nyen la mchog tu phan/ /ra sha
29b6(mdo 'grel): shin tu bsil min zhing/ /lci snum ma yin nyes med yin/ /lus dang khams ni mnyam pas na/ /bad kan mi bskyed lus rtas byed/ /lug sha de las bzlog pa ste/ /lus rtas yin par shes par bya/ /ba lang sha ni yung skam
29b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dal dang tshas ches ma snyoms rims/ /cham pa dang ni skem pa dang/ /rlung nang gcig phun ba sel/ /ma he shin lci zhing tsha/ /gnyid che rtan byed shas cher bskyed/ /phag rgod sha ni de 'dra zhing/ /ngal sel zas len khu stobs
30a1(mdo 'grel): skyes/ /nya ni mchog tu bad kan bskyed/ /rtsi li tsi ma nyes gsum bskyed/ /la baM ro hi ta skyin 'khor/ /sha ba dang rang sde tshan mchog/ sha ni 'phral bsad dag pa dang/ /dar la bab ba bsten par bya/ /rang shi ring dang shin tu tsho//
30a2(mdo 'grel): nad chu dug gi shi ba spang/ /pho dang mo yi stod smad phyed/ /lci ste sbrum ma thams cad lci/ /rkang bzhi mo yi yad ba yin/ /bya rnams kyi ni pho yi yang/ /mgo bo ro stod brang dang rgyab/ /rked pa dpyi yi lci ba yin/ /de bzhin pho ba rgyu ma sogs/ /go
30a3(mdo 'grel): rim bzhin du lci ba yin/ /khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams/ /phyi ma phyi ma'i lci ba yin/ /sha las rlig pa pho mtshan dang/ /mkhal ma mcher ba gzhang dag lci/ /sha'i sde tshan no// //tshod ma pa ta sha ti dang/ /su she su ni sha
30a4(mdo 'grel): na dang/ /sa ta na tsa rgya sne'i sogs/ /nyes pa gsum 'joms rtug sri yang/ /de las su ni sha ni kro da'i tsa ra dza k+Sha pha ti/ /pho ba gzhad 'brum nad sel mchog /rgya sne'u rtug?  skam 'joms pa yin/ /mon sde'i dme ru nyes gsum
30a5(mdo 'grel): 'joms/ /mdze sel ro tsa bcud len dro/ /khru zhing mgul bsnyan bar byed/ /rtsad gi ri skyur mi drod bskyed/ /pho ba gzhad 'brum bad kan rlung/ /drod che 'khru gcod yang ba yin/ /pa to la dad sapta la/ /ni swa sharga? shtha sle tres/ /a pa ldza
30a6(mdo 'grel): gu spa'i myu gu/ /bri ha tA dang ba sha dang/ /til ba rni ku ta la/ /ma du ka 'dab karto ta/ /ka ra be la pa rta dang/ /Na ti dang ni ka ta ya/ /go dzi ta dad brta ka /ba na tik+ka ka ri raM?/ /ku yi ka dang man+ti dang/ /ku ce la shag ku nad ni/ /ka ti lam dang ke'u bu
30a7(mdo 'grel): kaM/ ko ti ko? sha ta ka dang/ /karsha 'jam bsil kha zhing tsha/ /bshad sri rlung bskyed pad mkhris sel/ /pa to la zhim sriin nad sel/ /zhu rjes mngar zhing yig 'byed/ /bri ta tI gnyis mkhris bskyed 'khru/ /drod bskyed rlung ni 'joms pa yin
30b1(mdo 'grel): bri sha rlon dang lung pa 'joms/ /khrag mkhris sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /ka ra be laM kha ba dang/ /drod bskyed bad kan sel mchog yin/ /brta ka ro kha zhing tsha/ /mngar gro bad kan rlung dag sel/ /lan tshwar bcas pa ma drod bskyed/ /yid 'od zas len
30b2(mdo 'grel): mkhris mi bskyed do/ /ka ri raM ni sbos byed cing/ /ro ska mngar zhing kha ba yin/ /ko sha ta tra bal gu dza/ /khru zhing drod ni skyed byed yin/ /tandu yi bsil rtsub pa dang/ /ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing yang/ /chang nad mkhris nad dug khrag sel/ /mu ny+tsa las
30b3(mdo 'grel): byung rlung mkhris sel/ /snum sel lci zhing mngar ba dang/ /lus rtas khu ba 'phel ba'i mchog /pa la k+Sha lci 'khru bar byed/ /utpo da ka chad nad 'joms/ /tsu tsu ba lak+Sha 'dra las/ /de ni 'khru gcod bdag nyid can/ /ba di ri ni rlung mkhris sel//
30b4(mdo 'grel): gcin mang mngar zhing bsil ba yin/ /'tsho bar byed cing lkog nad sel/ /lung rta ro tsa lci bcud len/ /dzi bin+ta mngar bsil ba dang/ /mig la phan zhing nyes gsum sel/ /ku sman ta buM sha ka ling/ /karka dad ni erba ru/ /da na dis zhes bya
30b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /da na dis dang ga gon dang/ /tsin+ta ka dang tsi ra bi ta/ khang rlung bskyed cing 'khru gcin mang/ /bshad sri lci zhing zhu rjes mngar/ /'khri shing 'bras bu nang na mchog /ku sman da ste rlung mkhris sel/ /gcin nad sel zhing ro tsar byed/ /ga gon shin
30b6(mdo 'grel): tu gcin mang yin/ /ku ba shin tu rtsub pa yin/ /ka ling+ga dang erba du/ /tsi rbi mkhreg zhon mkhris sel bsil/ /smin pa de las gzhan du byed/ /'bras bu'i lus rnyings lan tshar bcas/ /mkhris bskyed bad kan rlung nad sel/ /yi ga 'bye
30b7(mdo 'grel): zhing dro yid 'ong/ /hen langs zhing yang/ /bad rtsa rtsa ba ub la/ /ku mu utpal chu ba dang/ /chus pa ka lu ka ta dang/ /sing+ga dang ka sha ru ka /kron tsa da na ka lo rgya/ /rtsub cing bshad sri bsil zhing lci/ /ka lam pa dang
31a1(mdo 'grel): na li ka/ mar she zhes ni bya ba dang/ /ku tin+dza ra sku ba kha/ /seng phrom yungs ma kho ni ka /ka ru dkag pe du/ /'tsho byed dang ni dzu ? dang/ /e dag dza dag dang ni/ /ya ba sha ka lcam pa dang/ /a lu ka sogs
31a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang/ /sram lo shing mngar lo ma dag /ma dar zhing rtsub la lan tshwa bro/ /bad kan rlung bskyed lci ba dang/ /bsil zhing bshad lci 'byung sla byed/ /phal cher zhu nas gshang gci mkhregs/ /tshos shing khu ba legs
31a3(mdo 'grel): btsir la/ /mar cher btab pa nyes mi bskyed/ /seng phrom 'dab ma zhes bya gang/ /de ni rgya sne'u dang 'drar 'dod/ /ta rka ri pa ra na mngar/ /kha bcas rlung dang bad kan sel/ /bur rna rnam gnyis ka la sha /cung zad tsha bro kha zhing
31a4(mdo 'grel): tsha/ /drod bskyed khong 'khru sbyar dug dang/ /'or nad bad kan rlung nad 'joms/ /tsi ri bi ri'i myu gu ni/ /drod bskyed rlung dang bad sel khru/ /nye shing myu gyu khab ste/ /ro tsa nyes pa gsum sel yin/ /smyug ma'i myu gu rtsu ba pa
31a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /khong tsha rlung dang mkhris pa bskyed/ /pa tu da ni drod bskyed kha/ /mcher pa gzhang 'brum bad rlung sel/ /ka sa mardta sin lung pa /bad kan sel zhing zhu byed 'khru/ /le brgan rtsi tshod rtsub skyur tsha/ /? lci zhing mkhris ba
31a6(mdo 'grel): bskyed la 'khru/ /yungs kar tshod ma lci zhing tsha/ /bshad dang lci 'gags nyes kun bskyed/ /la phug gzhon nu ro mi gsal/ /cung zad tsha bro kha dang bcas/ /gang yin de ni nyes kun sel/ /yang zhing cung zad tsha ba dang//
31a7(mdo 'grel): skran dang lung gcod dbugs mi bde/ /rma dang mig nad lkog nad sel/ /skad 'gags drod tshud rtug skam dang/ /cham pa'i nang ni 'joms ba yin/ /nar son ro dang zhu rjes tsha/ /drod skyed byed cing nyes gsum bskyed/ /
31b1(mdo 'grel): bad kan bskyed lci btsos pa ni/ /snum zhing de yang rlung sel yin/ /skam po rlung dang bad kan sel/ /rjen pa thams cad nyes bskyed yin/ /nyung ma tsha zhing dro ba dang/ /bad kan rlung sel mkhris pa bskyed/ /shan+ta mU la mkhris sel zhing/ /bsil
31b2(mdo 'grel): zhing zhu rjes mngar ba dang/ /ro mngar kha zhing bska ba ste/ /bad kan dug kyang sel bar byed/ /sku the ra bye'u rug shi khru/ /su mu kha dang ske tshe dang/ /bu srin dang pha ni ji/ /dzin thig le dang dzi bi ra/ /de la sogs pa'i ldum rnams ni/ /gshang
31b3(mdo 'grel): gci sra zhing me drod bskyed/ /khong pa tsha byed kha rtsub tsha/ /yid 'ong lung dro yi ga 'byed/ /mig gnod khu ba srin 'joms rna/ /skrad par byed dad yang ba yin/ /bye rug skyigs lugs dbugs mi bde/ /rtsib logs zug dug kha
31b4(mdo 'grel): gnam sel/ /su mu kha ni rab tsha min/ /sbyar dug 'or nad sel ba yin/ /'u su'i lo ma kha zhing mngar/ /gcin mang mkhris pa bskyed ma yin/ /sgog skya rab tu tsha zhing rno/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru ba dang/ /zhim zhing skra bskyed
31b5(mdo 'grel): lci ro tsa/ /snum zhing drod bskyed yi ga 'byed/ /sha bkra mjo skran gzhang 'brum dang/ /gcin nang srin dang bad kan rlung/ /skyigs bu tsha ba dbugs mi bde/ /lung ba sel nye khrag mkhris bskyed/ /kun dong de las yon tan dman//
31b6(mdo 'grel): bad kan bskyed mkhris rab mi bskyed/ /ke'u btsos dug sbyar zas pa yis/ /bad kan rlung dang gzhang 'brum sel/ /rno zhing rtugs pa sri ba dang/ /de ni mkhris can la phan yin/ /su ra drod bskyed kha zas len/ /bad sel dri ma
31b7(mdo 'grel): sbyor zhing yang/ /mchog tu gzhang 'brum dag 'gan?/ /spang phrum shin tu nyes bskyed yin/ /me tog 'dab ma 'bras yal ga /sdong bu rim bzhin lci ba yin/ /tshod ma'i rab mchog 'tsho byed yin/ /yungs kar tshod ma tha chad?
32a1(mdo 'grel): chad yin/ /tshod rdan rnams kyi sde tshan no// //rgun 'brum 'bras bu'i mchog yin te/ /ro tsa mig sman bshad gci sla/ /mngar zhing zhu rjes snum pa dang/ /cung zad bska zhing bsil la lci/ /rlung dang khrag
32a2(mdo 'grel): mkhris sel byed cing/ /kha nang kha bro chang nad dang/ /skom yud tshad rims dbugs mi bde/ /skad mdzer glo brdol blo gcod sel/ /bal bo se'u sngar mkhris rgyas dang/ /nyes pa gsum po sel ba yin/ /skyung pa mkhris bskyed min cung
32a3(mdo 'grel): dro/ /rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/ /se'u kun kyang yid 'ong snum/ /yang zhing bshad sra drod zas len/ /mo tsha 'bra go ba na sa/ /rgya star ba ru sha ka dang/ /a mra ta la ka smra 'bras/ /ra dza da na ma du'i 'bras/ /rgya shugs so
32a4(mdo 'grel): bi ra angkol/ /pha lgu sle ma ta'i 'bras bu/ /ta ma wi shu star ga'i 'bras/ /myu gu la dang rgya kham dang/ /a ru ma na bi yal 'bras/ /rtas byed lci zhing bsil ba yin/ /lus tsha glo brdol glo gcod sel/ /khrag dang mkhris pa snyoms
32a5(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /zhu rjes mngar zhing snum pa dang/ /bshad lci bad kan khu ba 'phel/ /ta la'i 'bras bu mkhris bskyed 'khru/ /karma ri 'bras sril ba dang/ /bshad ci 'gags pa sel byed cing/ /skra bskyed yid gzhungs bcung len
32a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /pa ta ma sogs dro ba dang/ /bad kan mkhris pa bskyed cing 'khru/ /snum zhing mchog tu rlung skyed byed/ /bi lA ya'i 'bras tsha ba min/ /pi lA ya yi tshig gu mngar/ /ro? tsa mkhris ba rlung nad sel/ /rgya shugs tshi gu'i yon
32a7(mdo 'grel): tan ni/ /de 'dra skam rlon lud pa sel/ /bi la 'bras smin pa 'dzu dka' zhing/ /nyes bskyed phyen ni dri dan byed/ /ma smin drod bskyed bar rlung sel/ /de dag gnyi ga 'khru ba gcod/ /ma smin ka bde mgul nad dang/ /nyes ba kun
32b1(mdo 'grel): bskyed smin pa ni/ /nyes 'joms skigs bu slon bro sel/ /kun kyang 'khru gcod dug 'joms yin/ /'dzam bu'i shing tog bshad sri lci/ /bsil shing shin tu rlung bskyed yin/ /bshad dang lci ba gcod byed cing/ /lkog ma la gnod bad
32b2(mdo 'grel): mkhris sal/ /a mra'i 'bras bu ma smin rlung/ /khrag mkhrig skyed byed rus chag ba/ /bad kan mkhris bskyed smin rlung bskyed/ /lci mngar bad kan khu ba 'phel/ /brik+Sha aM la rtsub bshad sri/ /lci tsha bad kan rlung dag 'joms//
32b3(mdo 'grel): sha mya tsha lci skra gnod rtsub/ /bi lu'i 'bras bu mkhris pa bskyed/ /bad kan rlung nad sel zhing 'khru/ /mcher pa gzhang 'brum skran srin sel/ /pi lu mdar zhing kha ba gang/ /shin tu tsha min nyes gsum 'joms/ /ba lu shun kha tsha
32b4(mdo 'grel): zhing snum/ /rlung nad sel bar byed pa yin/ /ba lung 'bras sha rtas byed mngar/ /rlung dang mkhris ba sel zhing lci/ /de yi rkang yang skyigs lung pa/ /dbugs mi bde dang chang nad sel/ /kha skam rlung dang bad kan dang/ /rtug sra
32b5(mdo 'grel): skyug bro yi ga 'chus/ /skra dang gzhang 'brum gzer nad dang/ /me drod tshud ba nyid sel to/ /na ram ga 'bras mdar cung skyur/ /yi gang 'od zhing kha zas len/ /lci zhing rlung ni rab bskyed pa'i/ /
32b6(mdo 'grel): yon tan ldan par shes bar bya/ /bse shing 'bras bu'i shun pa sha /khong rtas byed cing mdar la bsil/ /de rus me mnyam yid gzhungs byed/ /bad kan rlung ni sel ba'i mchog /ku shu rnam gnyis lci ba ste/ /mngar skyur
32b7(mdo 'grel): bsal dang tshe ba yin/ /yi ga 'bye zhing me rab 'bri/ /khaM sha yig 'byed cing mngar/ /sman pa myur du 'ju bar 'gyur/ /shin tu tsha min lci nyes bskyed/ /rgun 'brum ba ru sha ka dang/ /ka ra mar dang bcas rlon sgyur/ /
33a1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa bad kan bskyed cing 'khru/ /lci zhing nus tsha rlung 'joms so/ /rgya shug skyur thung li gu tshe/ /a mra ka ta de bzhin no/ /er ba ti sur dang/ /mri ka linda dzaM bir bcas/ /smin dang ka ra mar da skam/ /mkhris
33a2(mdo 'grel): pa shin tu skyed byed min/ /amli ka dang rgya shug skyur/ /skam po drod bskyed 'khru ba dang/ /skom dang ngal dang rmya ba sel/ /yang zhing rlung dad bad kan 'joms/ /de las 'bras bu kun tha chad/ /li ku rtsi ste nang kun slong/ /kha ba me dang rlung
33a3(mdo 'grel): gnod nyen/ /sbrul gyi kha chu sogs pas phog/ srin pus zos dang chu nang ltung/ /sa ngan dus min skyed pa dang/ /'bru gzhan 'dres shing mthu nyams dang/ /shin tu rnyings gyur 'bru spang bya/ /tshod ma'ang de bzhin rtsub par ni/ /g.yos
33a4(mdo 'grel): ba dag dang mi snying dang/ /ro ni smin par ma gyur dang/ /la phug ma rtogs skam po dang/ /'bras buAng phal cher de bzhin te/ /bilba ma rtogs rlon pa spang/ /'bras bu'i sde tshan no// //lan tshwa kun kyang bad kan
33a5(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /'phra zhing bshad gci 'byin la 'jam/ /rlung 'joms 'ju byed tsha zhing rno/ /yi ga 'bye zhing bad mkhris bskyed/ /de la lce myang tsha mngar bcas/ /ro tsa yid 'ong nyes gsum sel/ /yang zhing tsha la mig la phan/ /
33a6(mdo 'grel): tsha ba mi skye me drod bskyed/ /rtsa bas ru tshwa yang yid 'ong zhing/ /sgreg pa sbyong zhing dri zhim la/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing bshad sra sel/ /drod skye yig 'byed byed yin/ /kha ru tsha ni stod bad kan/ /smad kyi drung 'byin drod bskyed la/ /bshad
33a7(mdo 'grel): 'gag lto spos rtug skam dang/ /gzer zug lus lci sil ba yin/ /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar/ /lci zhing bad kan rnam 'phel byed/ /bkod ma'i lan tsha cung zad kha/ /tshwa dang ba tsha rno byed gsher/ /kha ru tsha nag yon tan
33b1(mdo 'grel): dri/ /ma gtogs yon tan pa tir mtshungs/ /mtsho tsha yang ste sa skam tsha/ /bad kan bskyed cing 'ju dka' lci/ /lan tshwa rnams kyi sbyor ba la/ /rgyam tshwa la sogs rab tu sbyar/ /nas tshig 'khus pa'i lan tshwa ni/ /skran dang snying nang
33b2(mdo 'grel): skya rbab dang/ /pho ba mcher pa lkog nang dang/ /lung pa gzhang 'brum dbugs mi bde/ /lto spos bad kan sel ba yin/ /sa rdzi ka sogs thal tshwa kun/ /rab rno tsha zhing srin sel yang/ /krag mkhris skyed byed smin byed la/ /gcod cing mi
33b3(mdo 'grel): zhim rnam par byed/ /nas tshig 'khus tsha kha bas na/ /mdog mdangs khu ba skra mig gnod/ /shing kun rlung dang bad kan sel/ /gzer 'joms mkhris pa skyed byed de/ /zhu rjes ro tsa yi ga 'byed/ /drod bskyed zas 'ju yang ba yin//
33b4(mdo 'grel): a rur bska zhu rjes mngar/ /rtsub cing lan tshwa'i ro med yang/ /drod che zas 'ju yid gzhungs byad/ /na tshong la 'jog dam pa yin/ /dro zhing 'khrul tshe la phan/ /blo dang dbang gsal stobs rab bskyed/ /mdze dang bzhin lus
33b5(mdo 'grel): mdog mi sdug /skad 'gags rims rnying mi bzang rims/ /klad pa mig nad skya rbab dang/ /mig ser pho ba'i nad rnams dang/ /skem bcas 'or dang gcin nad sel/ /tshad 'khru rmongs bag myos rlon srin/ /mchil ma lung ba
33b6(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde/ /gzhang 'brum mcher pa lto spos dug /gsus 'phel rgyun 'gags skran dang ni/ /da rgan na dang yig 'chus/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad/ /de dang de ni sil byed yin/ /skya ru ra yang de 'dra bsil/ /ro
33b7(mdo 'grel): skyur bad mkhris sel te las/ /yon tan cung dman pa ru ra/ /zhu rjes tsha mngar skra mig phan/ /'bras bu gsum po 'di dag ni/ /bcud kyis len mchog mig nad sel/ /rma 'tsho pags nang rma red dang/ /tshil ches lci snyi bde
34a1(mdo 'grel): khrag sel/ /shing tsha sug smel pa tra gsum/ /ge sar bcas pa dri bzang bzhi/ /na le sham ni mkhris bskyed rno/ /rtsub cing drod bskyed yig 'byed/ /ro dang zhu rjes dag kyang tsha/ /bad kan 'joms shing yang ba yin//
34a2(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling rnon pad bskyed mngar/ /bsil zhing lci la snum pa yin/ /skam po de la sa? bzlog pa yin/ /snum zhing ngo tsa ro tsha la/ /zhu rjes mngar zhing bang rlung dang/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde sel 'khru/ /de gnyis bcud len ma gtogs
34a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /gzhan las shas cher sbyar mi bya/ /dong bra drod bskyed ro tsa dang/ /'khru gtsang yid 'ong 'bregs pa sel/ /yi ga 'bye yang zhu rjes mdang/ /khong snum drod che bad rlung sel/ /sbe'u gsher de 'dra de dag ni/ /tsha ba gsum ste
34a4(mdo 'grel): sha sdom dang/ /me drong nyams dang dbugs mi bde/ /lung pa rkang 'bam? cham pa 'joms/ /dbyi mod pi pi ling rtsa pa/ /nal sham yon tan cung zad chung/ /tsi tra ka stobs me dang mnyam/ /'or nad gzhang 'bru ma srin
34a5(mdo 'grel): mdzo sel/ /'di rnams las nina la sham/ /ma gtogs cha ba lnga zhes bshad/ /skra cher dmu rdzing lto sbos dang/ /gzer 'joms drong ? bskyed pa'i mchog /bi lba ka sha ta rka? ri/ /pa ta la dad tundu ka /rtsa tshan lnga po bska
34a6(mdo 'grel): kha dro/ /rlung dang bad kan sel byed yin/ /aM shu ma ti bri ta tI/ /gnyis gnyis gze rtsa chu lngar bshad/ /zhu rjes ro mnga' ha cang ni/ /bsim dang cha min nyes kun sel/ /ba la su rna e raN+Da/ /su bya pad ni sna gnyis rtsa//
34a7(mdo 'grel): 'bring yin bad kan rlung 'joms yin/ /shin tu mkhris pa mi bskyed 'khru/ /nye'u shing ka ko li 'tsho byed/ /dzI ba ka dang ri shar bshad/ /'tsho byed ces bya mig la phan/ /ro tsa rlung dad mkhris pa sel/ /'jag ma ku sha
34b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras gur shing/ /'dam rtsa rtsar bshad lnga mkhis sel/ /gra mgar bu g.yos sbyar zas/ /sha dang cho ra ma shing rtog sman/ /zas cha cung zad tshan bsdus 'di/ /rtag tu dgos pa yod par smra/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa laS/
34b2(mdo 'grel): mda' gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //de nas kha zas pa srung pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rgyal pos pho brang nye 'khor du/ /srog 'tsho slob dpon bzhag par bya/ /de ltar byas pas thams cad du/ /thams cad las ni bsrung
34b3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /khyad par du nis bdag gi /zas skom dug las bsrung bar bya/ /chosla sogs dang gang 'bril pa'i/ /'byor pa de la rag las so/ /'bras chan dug pa nas bsher bag kyang/ /skam bag can ni 'bra par 'gyur/ /
34b4(mdo 'grel): yun ring chos par gyur pa dang/ /chos pa'ang zhag lon lta bur 'gyur/ /rlangs ba rma bya'i mgrin 'dra zhing/ /khong myos brgya la dab lus rdul bskyed/ /dri dang mdog sogs nyams par 'gyur/ /rul zhing rma bya'i sgro ltar mtshed
34b5(mdo 'grel): tshong ma myur du bskams pa dang/ /bskol ba'i mdog ni rnag 'gyur zhing/ /der gzugs chung ba 'am cheb 'am/ /mi sdug pa'am mi snang 'gyur/ /dbu ba steng byung ri mo 'tshan// /kha chu 'dra dang chu bur 'byung/ /btud pa mngar skur/
34b6(mdo 'grel): k+tshong mdang/ /sha dag mtshams bye ro dad bral/ /sha khu ri mo sngor snang zhing/ /'o ma zangs mdog zhi dri ma/ /dang ba la ni ser dang gnag /mar khu chu dang 'dra bar sang/ /chang dang chu rnag sbrang rtsi la/ /ljang snang til mar dag la
34b7(mdo 'grel): dmar/ /shing tog ma smin par ni snang/ /smin pa dag ni yongs su 'drul/ /kha zas rlon dang skom pa dag /rnyings shing mdog ni nyams par 'gyur/ /sti ba dang ni sra ba dag /reg pas go ni bzlog bar 'gyur/ /me tog phreng rtse lo
35a1(mdo 'grel): ma 'gas/ /rnying cing dri ni mi zhim 'gyur/ /gos la nag po tal til dang/ /sbu rnams 'thul zing kha tshar 'chad/ /gser dngul mu tig shing dang rdo/ /rin chen sogs la dri ma chags /gzi mdangs reg pa 'od nams
35a2(mdo 'grel): 'gur/ /sa yi 'od ni mdog bcas byed/ /dug ster kha ni sngo bskams la/ /gnong bag gis ni phyogs su blta/ /rdul zing 'dar la skrag pa dang/ /'jigs shing 'gros 'khor glal bar 'gyur/ /dug ldan zas ni mes bsregs na/ /me
35a3(mdo 'grel): lce gcig 'khyil me rtag brga la/ /du ba rma bya'i mgrin 'drar 'gyur/ /me lce mi 'bar 'bar yang mnan/ /sbrang mis zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bya rog gis zos skad zhan 'gyur/ /'di ni ne tsod ru ha/ /ri skegs kyis mthong ca co
35a4(mdo 'grel): 'byin/ /dang bas zos na rdeg 'chos la/ /shang shang te'u na bar 'gyur/ /sreg pa mig ni mi chags byed/ /khrung khrung dag ni 'dzur bar 'gyur/ /pu ron khu byug bya gag dang/ /dur pas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /byi la skyo zhing
35a5(mdo 'grel): 'dor bar 'gyur/ /spre'u mi gtsang 'dor par byed /rma byas de mthong dga' bar byed/ /dug gi dpal na nyams par 'gyur/ /de ltar zas ni dug ldan par/ /shes shing ci nas de yin/ /srog chags phra mo yan chad la/ /gnod
35a6(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur bar 'bang de dor/ /reg na tsha zhing g.ya' la na/ /rims 'debs 'brum 'byung tshor ba chu/ /sen mo sbu 'byung lus skrang ste/ /de la dug ni rnam 'jig pa'i/ /tsan dan shug pa spu shes tso/ /so ma'i shun
35a7(mdo 'grel): bcas pa la bu'i 'dad/ /ru rta sle tres a ka ru'i/ /chus bkrus blugs shing bsku bar bya/ /khar chung na nimchil bsnams mang/ /lci mchu sbring cing ? por byed/ /lus tsha na zhing so gtso la/ /ri mo tshar zhing 'brams so
35b1(mdo 'grel): thams/ /de la dug kun 'jos sman dang/ /u shir sogs khus 'khur bkang dpo/ /ma zhu'i gnas babs rdul ba dang/ /brgyal zhing lto spos myos mgo 'khor/ /ba spu ldang zhing skyug lus cha/ /mig mi gsal zhing snying mi dran/ /yan lag
35b2(mdo 'grel): thig les khyab par 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i gnas su phyin na yang/ /kha dog sna tshogs skyug pa dang/ /gcin mang rab tu 'khru bar 'gyur/ /?  skom skom zhing mdog skya la/ /gsus pa zhe zhing nams stobs zad/ /de gnyis slon dang khrus byas
35b3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /ser gnyis bur ma gir kar ni/ /si du ba rin sbi pa/ /ba shi ka dang tshigs brgya pa/ /tandu li ya'i rtsa ba dang/ /bye brag sgo nga la a ba lgu/ /snang btang mog sman slung bya ba/ /dug zhi'i phyir ni sbyar bar bya/ /dug 'thung pa dag steng dang ni//
35b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'og ni sbyangs gyur nas/ /dus su zangs bzang bdar phye ma/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa snying sbyong sbyin/ /snying nad sbyangs nas gser bye ni/ /zhib mo zho phyed sbyin byas na/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar chu bzhin du/ /gser gyi yan lag la mi
35b5(mdo 'grel): chags/ /tsho yang ring du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sbyar dug la yang cho ga 'di'o/ /kha zas dag kyang mi mthun zos/ /sbyar dug 'dra bar shes par bya/ /rlun can sha dang mon sran dre'u/ /sbrang rtsi 'o ma myu gu can/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba la phug gam/ /
35b6(mdo 'grel): bur ma dang bcas mi 'phrod yin/ /khyad par du ni 'o ma nya/ /nya rnams las kyang ci li ci/ /'o ma lhan cig skyur kun na/ /mi 'phrod shing tag de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rgya sran khre dag dang/ /ba la ku lat+tha mi 'phrod/ /la phug la sogs rdo
35b7(mdo 'grel): rdad ni/ /zos nas 'o ma sbang bar bya/ /phag rgod byi dur sha mi bza' / /khyim bya bri sha ta zhor min/ /sha rlon mkhris pa dag y+dang ni/ /la phug mA Sha'i tshod mar min/ /le brgan rtsi chod lug sha min/ /myu gu'i tshod ma pad+mar min// 
36a1(mdo 'grel): mA Sha'i sran tshod bu ram zho/ /mar 'o la gu rtse'i 'bras min/ /chu zhing 'bras bu dar bar min/ /tA la'i 'bras bu zhor mi 'phrod/ /tsha ba gnyis po bu mar dang/ /sbrang rtsi ka ka ma rtsir min/ /de ni nya bcos pa'i snod
36a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dor gra btsos par g.yos pa min/ /ka ma ta ni snod gzhan du/ /bcos nas nyin mtshan lon mi bra/ /nya rdod pa yi snum las ni/ /pi pi ling brdos spang bar bya/ /mar sar 'khar snod zhag bcu lon/ /go bye'i 'bras bu gror mi za /
36a3(mdo 'grel): bas sregs shar mi 'phrod cing/ /dar bar kaM bi la btsos min/ /'o thug dad ni kri sar/ /chad dang lhan cig mi 'phrod spang/ /sbrang rtsi mar sar zhag til mar/ /chu rnams gnyis gnyis gsum gsum mam/ /cha mnyam lhan
36a4(mdo 'grel): cig zes pa dag /phan tshun dag ni mi mthun no/ /mar sbrang cha ni mi mnyam yang/ /char ba'i chu ni 'thungs na gnod/ /sbrang rtsi pad+ma'i sa bon dang/ /sbrang rtsi 'bru chad kha rar min/ /'o thug rjes la skyo mar min/ /sha mo yungs
36a5(mdo 'grel): kar brdos mi 'phrod/ /u po ta ka til tshigs la/ /btsos ba 'khru bar byed pa yin/ /bya gag shin chad dngos dang/ /kul ma sha yi thug mi 'phrod/ /de nyid phag rgod tshil la brdos/ /srog ni 'phral du 'joms par byed/ /de
36a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin sreg pa rma bya dang/ /lab ka pany+dzi la praM?/ /e ran yi me la mi/ e raN+Da'i mar brdos mi 'phrod/ /ha ri tra sha skyer pa i/ /thur ma dag la skyon nas ni/ /skyer pa'i me la bsregs gyur pa/ /'phral du srog ni 'joms par byed/ /de nyid thal
36a7(mdo 'grel): ba rdul gyis gos/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'phrod ma yin/ /gang la nyes pa ma sbyangs ba/ /mdor na de ni mi 'phrod yin/ /nyes 'dir sbyangs bar 'dod pa'am/ /yang na de dang mi mthun pa'i/ /rdzas de nyid kyis dang po ni/ /lus ni
36b1(mdo 'grel): mngon par sbyang bar bya/ /rtsol can snum bsten drong che dang/ /dar la bab cing nyams stobs ldan/ /goms par zos dang cung zad zos/ /mi 'khrod zos kyang gnod mi 'gyur/ /mi 'phrod cha yis goms byas pa 'am/ /cha yis cha yis yongs su
36b2(mdo 'grel): spang/ /phan? pa'ang de bzhin bsten byas te/ /gcig gnyis gsum gyis chod par bya/ /skyon ni rim gyis 'grib pa dang/ /yon tan rim gyis 'phel 'gyur na/ /slar skye bar ni mi 'gyur zhing/ /g.yo ba med pa dag tu 'gyur/ /mi 'phrod pa yang spangs gyur zhing/ /
36b3(mdo 'grel): 'phrod pa goms par gyur pa nyid/ /'phral du spangs dang ma bsten las/ /nyes pa rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa gnod bya'i bdag nyid can/ /shin tu nye bar gyur ba la/ /phan med gnod par byed pa ni/ /mkhas pas phyir zhing bya mi
36b4(mdo 'grel): rigs/ /zas dang mal stan 'dod la spyod/ /ran zhing rigs par spyad pa yis/ /khang khyim 'chos pa lta bur ni/ /rtag tu lus ni gzung bar bya/ /de la zas ni bshad zin zhing/ /de dang der ni bshad par bya/ /bde sdug sbom dang stobs che chung
36b5(mdo 'grel): bud med la phod mi 'phod dang/ /shes dang mi shes 'tsho dang 'chi/ /gnyid la rag ni lus pa yin/ /dus min ha cang thal chos dang/ /gnyid ni kun tu bgegs pa dag /bde dang tshe ni nyams byed de/ /dus mtshams gnyis pa lta bu yin/ /mtshan mo gnyid ni ma
36b6(mdo 'grel): log rtsub/ /nyin mo gnyid log snum lcir 'gyur/ /tsog bur 'dug ste yur ba dag/ mig rtsub bad kan med par 'gyur/ /so ka rlung 'phel stobs 'phrog dus/ /rtsub cing mtshan mo thung bas na/ /nyin par gnyid phan gzhan dag tu/ /de ni bad kan mkhris
36b7(mdo 'grel): pa bskyed/ /smra mang gzhon dang lam gyi dbu?/ /ra ro bud med bsten khur las/ /mkhris dang mya ngan 'jig pas dub/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/ /rgan dang byis pa nyams stobs zad/ /glo brdol skem dad gzer gyis gnod/ /zas ma zhu?
37a1(mdo 'grel): dang bcom dang smos/ nyin par gnyid log rigs ma gtogs/ /'di dag de bzhin lus zungs snyoms/ /bad kan skyes shing lus rtas 'gyur/ /chil tsha bad kan mang dang snum/ /rtag za nyin par gnyid ma log/ dug gi phog dang lkog nad can/ /
37a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo na ma yang gnyid ma log /dus min gnyid log rmongs bag dang/ /rims bskyed rmugs shing cham bas 'debs/ /mgon skrangs shing slon sgyid skyur/ /rtsa yi rgyun 'geg me dod nyams/ /de la bsnyungs dang slon sman dang/ /rdul dbyung sna sman
37a3(mdo 'grel): btang ba dag /gnyid ches gyur la skyug sman no/ /mig sman rno dang sna sman dang/ /bsnyung ba sel la bud med bsten/ /mya ngan 'jigs dang khro ba sbyar/ /'di dag nyid kyis gnyis grags par/ /'jig cing bad kan rab zad byed/ /gnyis yar ba yis
37a4(mdo 'grel): yan lag snyoms/ /klad pa lci zhing klad 'ong la/ /mi gsal na zhing mgo 'khor la/ /zas mi 'ju rmya rlung skyes nad/ /de bas mtshan mo dus bzhin du/ /ci bder gnyis ni log par bya/ /ma goms gnyid kyis ma log na/ /nang par ma zos
37a5(mdo 'grel): phyed gnyid log /gnyid yar gyur na 'o ma dang/ /chang dang sha khu zho rnams btung/ /lus bsku dril dang khrus bya zhing/ /mgo bsku rna ba mig ? gang bya/ /na chung lag ngar gyis 'khyud dang/ /sems bde bya ba zin ba dang/ /yid dang rjes mthun
37a6(mdo 'grel): yul ldan pa/ /ci 'dod gnyid 'ang bde bar bskyed/ /nyal po'i bde la sems ma chags/ /tshangs par spyod pa la dga' ga /chog shes pa yis mgu ba'i gnyid/ /rang gi dus las 'da' mi byed/ /nyal po'i chos ni spang bya ba/ /ba kan? min zla?
37a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan ldan pa dang/ /yid du mi 'ong mi sdug spyod/ /mngal ni skyon gyis khyab pa dang/ /rab sbom skem dang btsas pa dang/ /sbrum ma gzhan gyis bud med dang/ /rigs gzhan skye gnas ? mthun dang/ /bla ma lha dang rgyal po'i gnas//
37b1(mdo 'grel): mchod rten dur khrod gsod gnas dang/ /bstes lam gyi bzhi mdo chung/ /dus tshigs nyin mo yan lag min/ /snying ga mgo bor brdeg bya spang/ /'grangs ches ltegs dang brtan bral dang/ /yan lag mi bder gnas dang skom/ /byis ba rgan dang shugs
37b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan nyon/ /nad pa yis kyang 'khrigs pa spang/ /dgun dus ro tsa byas grags tshe/ /'dod pas 'dod pa bsten par bya/ /dpyid ston zhag ni gnyis gnyis nas/ /sog dbyar tshe zla phyed cing/ /gzhan du bud med la zhugs nas/ /mgo 'khor ngal dang bla mthu nyams//
37b3(mdo 'grel): stobs dang lus gzungs dbang po nyams/ /dus min 'chi bar byed ba yin/ /bud med dag la legs bsdams na/ /dran dang yid gzhungs nad med tshe/ /dbang po rtas shing grag stobs rnams/ /lhag par 'phel zhing rgas srar 'gyur/ /khrus dang byug pa rlung
37b4(mdo 'grel): bsil kha ra la sogs bza' / /chu bsil 'o ma sha khu sran tshod chad dangs 'thung/ /nyel po dga' byas 'dod dang bral gyur rjes la brten/ /de 'dras de yi lus mdangs stobs slar skye bar 'gyur/ /sman pa thos sbyong phun tshogs ldan zhing
37b5(mdo 'grel): las mkhas snying rje can/ /bges dang gnod med lus srung byed pa nye bar bzhag byas nas/ /rgyal po'i rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i longs spyod pa der spyod cing/ /nad med mthu dang gzi brjid grags pa yun ring 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad
37b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas kha zas kyi tshod zar na par bzang bI le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dus kun tu ni tshod zin bza' / /de ni me drod skyed byed yin/ /rdzas ni lci ba'am yang pa'ang ?
37b7(mdo 'grel): tshad la bltos par bya ba yin/ /lci ba las ni phyed 'grangs bya/ /yang pa las ni rab 'grangs min/ /bde blag 'jub de tsam la/ /tshod zin zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /zad tshad ma zin chungs 'gyur na/ /stobs dang gzi mdangs 'phel mi 'gyur
38a1(mdo 'grel): rlung gi nang ni thams cad kyis/ /rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /tshad las shin tu ches pa yang/ /nyes pa thams cad myur du bskyed/ /ma zhu'i zas ni mi bzad pa/ /de yis rlung sogs gzir gyur pas/ /cig car rnam
38a2(mdo 'grel): par 'khrug 'gyur zhing/ /de nyid du ni zhugs 'gyur nas/ /rtsa sgo 'gags shing ba snabs bskyed/ /steng dang 'og gi lam dag tu/ /bskyod bas gsung cing zug byed pa/ /brkam chags can la 'phral skyed byed/ /de la rlung las gzer mgo
38a3(mdo 'grel): 'khor/ /khong sbos 'dar zhing rengs sogs 'gyur/ /mkhris pa las ni 'khru rims 'debs/ /khong tsha skom zhing kha sogs 'gyur/ /bad kan rlon zhing yan lag lci/ /tshigs thogs mchil ma mang bar 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni nyams
38a4(mdo 'grel): chung zhing/ /me drod zhan dang shugs 'gags pa'i/ /zas ni rlung gis bkag pa dang/ /bad kan gyis ni rab bkag pa'i/ /nyes pa be snabs 'khrugs pas na/ /zug rdu zug pa lta bur gnas/ /'khru dang slon pa mi byad pas/ /gzer la sogs
38a5(mdo 'grel): pa mi bzad pa/ /be'u snabs de yin nyes rab rtug /be snams mi bzad kyis sbubs bkag /rtsib logs kun tu drang por 'gro/ shing bzhin rengs par gyur na ni/ /ma zhu shing 'dra zhes bya ste/ /myur du gsod byed de spang bya/ /mi 'phrod
38a6(mdo 'grel): lhag zam zhu bar/ /za byed ma zhu dug gi ni/ /mtshan nyid can de mi bzad pa/ /dug gi ming can gang yin te/ /dug gi tshul can myur gsod byed/ /gso dpyad bya bar dka' bas spang/ /de nas ma zhu'i pa snabs gyur/ /gsor
38a7(mdo 'grel): rung shu dag rgya mtsha dang/ /po son cha bcug chu dron ni/ /'thungs pa skyug bcug de nas ni/ /dugs dang mas btang reng bu dag /dri ma rlung dag legs rgyu sbyar/ /yan lag 'khums par gyur pa la/ /shin tu dugs bya bkri bar bya/ /gsung
38b1(mdo 'grel): nad shin tu 'phel ba la/ /ting par ma btsa' gdab pa bsdags/ /de ni de'i nyin bsnyung bar bzhag /khrus btang lta bur nye bar sbyar/ /ma zhu mi bzad nyan 'gyur yang/ /gzer 'joms sman ni btang bar bya/ /be'i snabs ma zhu me drod nyams/ /nad kyis sman
38b2(mdo 'grel): ni ? mi nus/ /de yis nad pa 'phral du ni/ /thung zhing 'chi bdag tu 'ang 'gyur/ /kha zas zhu nas lto ba ni/ /rtsub srar gyur la sman dag kyang/ /nyes pa'i lhag ma sbyang phyir dang/ /pho ba'i me ni bskyed phyir btang/ /ma zhu'i 'gyur ba zhi ba dag/
38b3(mdo 'grel): nyams smad bar ni byas las gyur/ /de gsum nyes pa rnam gsum ni/ /btags na rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /de la chud la snyung ba phan/ /'bring la snyung dan zhu bya ba/ /chen po la ni sbyan pa ste/ /de yis dri ma rtsa nas 'byin/ /de bzhin nang ni gzhan dag
38b4(mdo 'grel): la'ang/ /rang nang bzhi las go bzlog pas/ /gso bo de dang rjes 'brel yang/ /rgyu las go bzlog rnam spang pa/ /sman pas ji lta ji lta bar/ /nad pas go bzlog sbyar ba'am/ /de'i don byed pa sbyor bar bya/ /nyes smin me drod skyed gyur na/ /
38b5(mdo 'grel): nyams rta snum gyis byug pa dang/ /btung dang 'jam rtsi sogs rigs sbyar/ /bad kan ma zhu'i be snabs te/ /de ni mig dang khur ba skrangs/ /sgregs pa zos ma thag 'dra 'byung/ /mchil ma mang zhing nyes g.yo lci/ /rlung las rengs
38b6(mdo 'grel): bag gzer ba dang/ /gshang gcig 'gags shing sbos drod nyams/ /mkhris las khong tsha skom mgo 'khor/ /rmongs bag sgregs pa skyur zhing tsha/ /ma zhu ba snams snyung bar bya/ /rengs bag las ni dugs rab bya/ /tsha ba'i ma zhu
38b7(mdo 'grel): skyug sman dag /btang ba'am gnas skabs gang phan bya/ /ma zhu be snabs ci ba na/ /rtsa sbubs thim las yun ring can/ /bad kan rlung ni 'dres mtshan ma/ /de dang mnyam par bsgrub par bya/ /dangs ma lus las zas dang chung/ /snying
39a1(mdo 'grel): na sgregs pa mnam par 'gyur/ /'di la cung zad gnyid log bya/ /ma zhu kun gyis nyin par ni/ zas ma zos par gnyid log la/ /bkres gyur yang las ran par bza' / /ma zhu spyi yi mtshan ma ni/ /rnam par 'gags sam shes cher
39a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /na zhing rlung ni mi gsal rgyu/ /mkhreg cing lus lci mgo bo 'khor/ /zas tshod lhag par gyur pa nyid/ /gcig du ma zhu ma zad kyi/ /mi 'dod 'gag byed tshig ma tshes/ /lci dang rtsub dang mi gtsang dran/ /khong tsha skam dang chu mang dang/
39a3(mdo 'grel): bsras pa'i zas ni 'du? mi 'gyur/ /mya ngan khro dang bkres pa yis/ /nyes par rdungs shing zas mi 'jug/ /phan dang mi phan bsres pa dag/ thos pa mnyam za yin par 'dod/ /'grangs rjes slar yang za 'gyur ba/ /lhag bar za ba
39a4(mdo 'grel): yin zhes bya/ /dus min che ba 'am chung zod pa/ /mi mnyam par ni za ba yin/ /gsum po 'dis kyang gsod pa'am/ /mi zad nad kyis 'debs par byed/ /dus su goms shing gtsang la phan/ /snum gro yang dang ma yengs dang/ /
39a5(mdo 'grel): ro drug ldan zhing mngar bag che/ /shin tu myur min ngal bar min/ /khrus byas bkras shing dben par gnas/ /kha gdong lag pa rkang pa bkrus/ /lha dang yi dags brjod cing sbyon/ /bla ma byis pa mgrin mchod byas/ /dud 'gro rnams
39a6(mdo 'grel): kyang rab brtags shing/ /bdag nyid legs par brtags nas ni/ /ma smas smra'am yid 'ong smra skye bo ma cing zhing gus pas stabs/ /yid 'ong gnyen dang lhan cig bza' / /zas ni rtsa dang skra spu sogs/ /'dres shing khong du sleng
39a7(mdo 'grel): sros dang/ /tshod ma zas ngan mang ba dang/ /tsha ches lan tshwa mang ba spang/ /phrum dang zho dang phrum skam dang/ /ba tsha tsha dang la phug rjen?/ /phag rgod lug dang ba lang nya/ /ma he sha dang ring dang skam/ /mASha? chu ldum ni sA ba/ /bad rtsa
39b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras 'khrur myu gur gyur/ /tshod ma skam dang nas 'dra dang/ khu ram phra mo bza' mi bya/ /sA lu'i 'bras dang gro dang nas/ /drug cu ba dang skam sa'i sha/ /a ru skyu ru rgun 'brum dang/ /mung+ga khar ba to la/ /zhun mar char chu'o
39b2(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ /sbrang rtsi se'u bru rgya ? bza' /mig dang stobs phyir mtshan mo ni//'bras gsum sbrang rtsi mar sar bza' / /mi nar 'jog par byed gang dang/ /nad sol byed pa gang yin bsten/ /pad rtsa bur shing tso tsa dang/ /mo ca
39b3(mdo 'grel): a mra'i 'bras bu dang/ /la du khur ba bur ma can/ /zas ni lci zhim snum pa dang/ /mngar zhing 'ju dka' bstan pa rnams/ /dang po nyid du bza' bar bya/ /de las bzlog pa tha mar bza' / /bar du skyar tsha lan tshwa can /lto yi cha
39b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis zas kyis ste/ /cha gcig skom gyis dgang par bya/ /rlung la sogs pa'i gnas su ni/ /cha bzhi pa ni lhag mar bzhag /zos rjes skom ni bsil ba'i chu/ /nas dang bag che'i g.yos byas zos/ /zho chang dug 'gags
39b5(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi la/ /chu bsil rjes su 'thungs na phan/ /mi 'ju 'gags la chu dron btang/ /tshod ma mu sgir? gnod pa la/ /zhog chu dang dar ba dang/ /rang skyur rtsabs mi btung bar bya/ /skem po rgyas phyir chad btung te/ /sbom pos
39b6(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi'i chu btung ngo/ /gcod chen nad la sha khu btung/ /drod chung sha zos chang btung bya/ /nad dang sman sogs sbrum bud med/ /? bcad dga' thub las rnams kyis/ skem dang byis pa rgan po la/ /'o ma bdud rtsi lta bur
39b7(mdo 'grel): phan/ /mdor na skom rjes btung ba ni/ /gang zhig thas dang yon tan gyi/ /mi mthun mi 'phrod med gyur pa/ /de ni rnam pa kun tu bsngags/ /zos rjes skom 'thungs ngoms dang khyab/ /stobs 'phel lus ni brtan byed la/ /
40a1(mdo 'grel): zas sdud snyi bar 'gyur ba dang/ /'drul zhing rnam par 'ju bar 'gyur/ /de ni nam tshod yan chad nad/ /dbugs lud glo brdol cham pa dang/ /glu len smra mang la chags dang/ /skang 'gags pa la gnod pa yin//
40a2(mdo 'grel): lus la rnam 'dzag gcin nang mig/ lkog nad rma yi nad kyis nyen/ /skom spang kun gyis skom 'thungs nas/ /mang smra lam zhugs nyal ba spang/ zan? gnas ni nye tshan ma/ /rta zhon rkyal dang 'degs pa spang/ /gshad dang gci
40a3(mdo 'grel): gsal snyil dri med/ /nyas pa lam min par mi 'gro/ sgregs pa dag cing bru ba tsha/ /'gyur thur gyi rlung tha ma la rgyu/ /de bzhin mi yi drod bdo? dbang po gsal zhing lus kyang rab tu yang/ /zas kyi tshod ran tshe gar sbyor
40a4(mdo 'grel): bzhan za ba de ni dus su 'dod/ /yan lag rgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas sman la sogs pa rnams kyi bye brag shas par bya ba'i le'ung? shad par bya'o/ /
40a5(mdo 'grel): sman rnams nyid kyi rol sogs/ /de ni de la brten pas mchog /de yang 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /sa la brten te skye ba yin/ /chu ni skye 'gag me dang rlung/ /nam mkha' rnams ni tshogs pa las/ /de skyes gyur dang khyad par byung/ /
40a6(mdo 'grel): ming ni shas tshe las gyur yin/ /de bas 'byur ba 'dus pa las/ /'byung bas sman ni ro gcig min/ /de phyir nad kyang nyes rig min/ /de la gsal ba ro zhes bya/ /mi gsal ro rjes mdza' ? cung zad gsal ba dag tu 'di
40a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /sman gyi yon tan lci sogs dang/ /? ni sa la sogs bsten pas/ /mtshungs par spyod pa nyed gnabs pas?/ /ro las ming du btags pa yin/ /de las sman lci dang sbom/ /sra zhing dri ba shes rab che/ /lci zhing brtan dang
40b1(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa dang/ /ha bar 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /chu i gsher dang lci bsil bsnum/ /rtul zhing bskal to shas che/ /'jam zhing bad kan 'dra ba la/ /bdul zhing chim byed sdud par byed me yi rtsub rno tsha zhing skam/ /'phra zhing gzugs kyi yon tan che/ /tsha
40b2(mdo 'grel): zhing 'bar la mdog bskyed cing/ /gsal zhing smin ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rlung gi rtsub cing khyab la yang/ /reg pa'i yon tan shas che yin/ /rtsub cing yang la dri ma sel/ /rnam dpyod na bar byed pa yin/ /nam mkha' phra zhing dang la yang/ /sgra yi
40b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan shas che ste/ /khong stod yang bar byed pa yin/ /de ltar 'gro na don dang ni/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs dbang gis na/ /sman min ci yang yod ma yin/ /de la sman ni gyen du 'gro/ /phal cher ma dad rlung shas che/ /thur du 'gro ba 'phal cher mi
40b4(mdo 'grel): sa chu'i yon tan shas che yin/ /de ltar sman no ro'i bye brag/ 'di yi 'og nas ston pa yin/ /sman mthu la las bshad pa ni/ /lci snum bsil dang 'jam pa dang/ /yang rtsub tsha dang rno ba ste/ /de ltar rnam pa brgyad du 'dod/ /sman
40b5(mdo 'grel): mthu tsa ra kas bshad pa/ /gang gis bya ba gang byung ba/ /mthu min tsir yang mi byed kyi/ /de dag thams cad mthu yis byed/ /des na lci la sogs pa nyid/ nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa dang/ /yon tan ma lus snying or ni/ /gyur
40b6(mdo 'grel): bas mthu zhes bshad pa dag/ ngan dang mthun par btags pa yin/ /gces pa mang du yod na yang/ /tha snyad gtso bo nyid kyis yin/ /de bas go ni bzlog ba'i phyir/ /de ni ro la sogs pa la/ /srid du zin kyang ma bshad de/ /de bas lci
40b7(mdo 'grel): ba la sogs yin/ /gzhan dag tsha dad bsil nyid gnyis/ /stobs yin zhes kyang ston par byed/ /sman ni sna tshogs bdag nyid can/ /nyi ma zla ba'i stobs can yin/ /'gro 'di gsal dang mi gsal las/ /nam yang 'dab bar mi 'gyur ro/
41a1(mdo 'grel): de la tsha ba mgo 'khor skom/ /bs? rdul che zhing myur 'ju byed/ /rlung dang bad gan zhi bar byed/ /bsil bdag ni tshim byed cing/ /'tsho dang rengs par byed pa dang/ /khrag dang mkhris pa rab dang byed/ /pho ba'i me dang 'phrad
41a2(mdo 'grel): ba las/ /gang zhig ro gzhan byung gyur ba'i/ /ro rnams kyi ni mthar zhu ba/ /de ni zhu ba zhes bshad do/ /mngar dang lan tsha zhu rjes mngar/ /skyur ba'i zhu rjes skyur ba yin/ /kha dang bska dang tsha ba rnams/ /zhu rjes phal cher kha ba yin/ /ro dang
41a3(mdo 'grel): zhu rjes 'bras bu mnyam/ /de la sman ni bzang dang ngan/ /la la ro yis las byed la/ /gzhan dag 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /yon tan gzhan dang nus pa dang/ /mthu yis la la byed pa yin/ /sman gyi ro segs gang dang gang/ /stobs ldan nyid
41a4(mdo 'grel): kyis gnas byed de/ /shin tu zil mnan de dang de/ /sgrub byed rgyu ni nyid du gnas/ /yon tan mi 'phrod sbyar ba ni/ /mang pos nyung du zil gyis gnon/ /ro dang 'ju ba'i mthu dag ni/ /de yi stobs kyis zil gyis gnon/ /ro sogs de ltar
41a5(mdo 'grel): stobs ni mnyam/ /ma bcos pa yi stobs dang ldan/ /ro sogs mnyam pa'i las gang ni/ /khyad 'phags de ni mthu las skyes/ /dan+ti dang ni ci tra ka /ro sogs mchungs kyang dan+ti 'khru/ /shing mngar rgun 'brum 'dra yang 'khru/ /'o ma
41a6(mdo 'grel): mar 'dra mar drod bskyed/ /de ltar sman la sogs pa yi/ /phyi yi las te de yang ni/ /sna tshogs rkyen gyi dbye ba yis/ /sman dbye tha dad gyur ba yin no/ /gro dang nas ni mngar ba dang/ /lci las rlung 'joms bskyed pa yin/ /nya dro? 'o ma
41a7(mdo 'grel): bsil ba dang/ /seng+ge kha yi phag ma yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas ro tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mngar ba la sogs ro skye ba
41b1(mdo 'grel): sa chu me sa chu dang me/ /mkha' rlung me rlung sa dang rlung/ /gnyis gnyis shas cher las rim 'byung/ /de las ro ni mngar bdag /gang zhig myang ba'i tshe na ni/ /kha la chags shing lus dang ni/ /tshim byed dbang po rab dang byed/ /grog ma la
41b2(mdo 'grel): sogs dga' ba yin/ /skyur ba kha nas chu 'jig cing/ /so gtso spu ni ldang ba dang/ /mig dang smin ma 'dzum par byed/ /lan tsha khar ni mchil ma 'du/ /'khur bgre ba tsha bar byed/ /kha ba kha yi dri ma sbyor/ /lce ni 'joms par byed pa
41b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /tsha ba lce rtse skyo byed cing/ /cig cig byed par 'gyur ba dang/ /kha mig sna las 'dzag byed cing/ /'khur ba sreg par byed pa yin/ /bskabs lce ni bem por byed/ /gre ba rtsa sbubs 'gag par byed/ /ro yi tshul ni de dag ste/ /
41b4(mdo 'grel): las ni ro mngar ba dag gi /skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa dang/ /lus zungs mthu stobs rab bskyed cing/ /byis pa rgan po glo brdol? skem/ /mdog mdangs skra dang dbang po bzang/ /lus rtas skad 'gags phan zhing lci/ /nu zho bskyed cing rma
41b5(mdo 'grel): 'byor byed/ /tshe ring 'tsho byed sdum pa dang/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dug rnams sel/ /ha cang dwags na tshig bcas dang/ /bad kan las byung nas bskyed cing/ /lus sbom drod bri chang nang dang/ /gcin nad lci ba smen sogs bskyed/ /skyur
41b6(mdo 'grel): ba me drod skyed byed snum/ /zhi mi zhing 'ju byed yi ge 'bye/ /dro ba'i nus bskyed reg pa bsil/ /chim byed 'drul byed yang pa ste/ /bad kan khrag mkhris rgyas par byed/ /rlung 'gags rgyu bar byed ba yin/ /de ni shin tu bsten drags na//
41b7(mdo 'grel): lus lhod rab rib mgo 'khor dang/ /g.yan pa skya thab me dpal dang/ /'or nang thor bu skom rims bskyed/ /lan tshwa dang khyim la dang/ /'gags pa 'byin cing drod skyed byed/ /snum dang dugs kyis rdul zhing rdo?/ /yi ga 'byed cing
42a1(mdo 'grel): gcod 'byed byed/ /de ni drags pas rlung khrag dang/ /skra 'byi skra dkar gnyen ma dang/ /skom mdze dug dang med ba la rnams/ /bskyed cing stobs ni bri bar byed/ /kha ba rang nyid zhim min zhing/ /yi ga 'chus dang srin skom
42a2(mdo 'grel): dug /mdze dang brgyal dang rims rlon bro/ /tsha dang mkhris pa bad kan 'joms/ /'drul dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang/ /bshad dang gci ba? skems pa dang/ /yang zhing yid gzhungs bsil zhing rtsub/ /nu ma'i skad dang skad 'gags sel/ /de
42a3(mdo 'grel): ni shin tu drags gyur na/ /lus zungs zad cing rlung nad bskyed/ /tsha bas lkog nad 'gags pa dang/ /mdze dang ma zhu 'o ra nad sel/ /rma 'jig byed cing snum pa dang/ /tshil dang 'drul bag skems par byed/ /drod bskyed 'ju byed
42a4(mdo 'grel): yig 'byed/ /sbyor zhing zas ni 'jig par byed/ /'ching ba gcod cing rtsa sbubs dag/ rnam par 'byed cing bad kan sel/ /de ni shin tu drags gyur pas/ /bskom bskyed khu ba stobs zad cing/ /brgyal zhing lus 'khums 'dar
42a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rked pa rgyab sogs na bar byed/ /bska ba mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /lci zhing khrag nang rnam par sbyong/ /skom zhing rma 'tsho bsil ba dang /'drul dang tshil ni rnam par skems/ /be'u snabs 'khyil zhing sri bar byed/ /
42a6(mdo 'grel): rtsub cing pags mdog rab dang byed/ /de ni shin tu bsten drags na/ /bshad 'gags lto spos snying nad dang/ /skom dang skem zhing skem mthu nyams/ /rtsa sgo 'gags shing dri ma sri//zhun mar bu ram star ka gser/ /mo tsa tsho tsa
42a7(mdo 'grel): ba ru sha /nye'u shing ram nye pa nas/ /rA dza dan pa la gsum/ /me da gnyis dang par+Ni bzhi/ /'tsho byed 'dzin pa ri sha pa/ /shing mdar ma du ki bim+bi/ /sh+ra pa ni gnyis bi da ri/ /cu gang k+Shir shu ku la/ /sa ha do can kaSh+ma ri/ /'o ma bu ram
42b1(mdo 'grel): shing gzem/ /rgun 'brum sbrang sogs mdar ba'i sde/ /skyur ba skyur ru aM mli ka/ ba lung dang ni star bu dang/ /se'u 'bru rdul dang dar ba dang/ /tshwa dang ku shu a mra dang/ /amla ta ka b+ha bya dang/ /ka ra marda ka pid ta'o/ /tsha mchog rtsa ba ru kha ru tsha//
42b2(mdo 'grel): bid rgya mtsho bkod ma'i tsha /mtsho tsha skam tsha ro nye dang/ /k+Shar lan tshwa'i sde tshan yin/ /kha ba kyi lce pa to la/ /tsan dan u shir ba la ka/ ci sgregs nimpa pu tso shal/ /rgya spos a kar ba tsha kha/ /nak+ta ma la ser po gnyis/ /gla
42b3(mdo 'grel): spang murba ba sha ka/ a ba marga bo son cha/ /mkhar lcags sle tres byi tsher ba dang/ rtsa ba che lnga byA g+hi gnyis/ /bod nga shu dag bi sha la/ /tsha ba shing kun na le shaM /bi TaM ga dang tsha ba lnga/ /ku ber sogs lduM dang sngo/ /mkhris pa gcin dang
42b4(mdo 'grel): go bye yin/ /ska chan a ru ba ru ra/ /sbrang rtsi seng ldeng sh+rI sha /ka daM u dum+ba ra dang/ /mu tig byu ru any+dza tsag/ ki? rra gzhon khardzu ra/ /pad tsa pad+ma utpa la'o/ /'bras rnying nas dang gro rnying dang/ /mung+ga spang ci sha ka ra/ /skam sa'i sha
42b5(mdo 'grel): rnams ma gtogs pa'i/ /mngar ba phal cher bad kan bskyed/ /skyu ru se 'brum gtogs pa'i/ /skyur ba phal cher mkhris pa bskyed/ /rgyam tsha lce myang tsha ma gtogs/ /lan tshwa phal cher mig la gnod/ /sle tres pa to la bca' 
42b6(mdo 'grel): sga/ /sgog skya pi pi ling ma gtogs/ /kha dang tsha ba phal cher ni/ /ro tsa 'bri zhing rlung bskyed yin/ /dka' la a ru ra ma gtags pa/ /phal cher bsil zhing sri bar byed/ /ro tsa skyur dang lan tsha rnams/ /go rim bzhin du
42b7(mdo 'grel): dro nus ldan/ /kha dang bska dang mngar ba rnams/ /de bzhin du ni bsil ba nyid/ /kha dang tsha dang bska ba rnams/ /de bzhin rtsub cing dri ba sril/ /lan tshwa skyur mngar snum pa dang/ /gshad gci thur gyi dbugs 'byin byed/ /lan
43a1(mdo 'grel): tshwa las bska de bas kyang/ /mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin/ /sgyur las tshe dang de bas kyang/ /kha bdag ni yang pa yin/ /ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba las/ /sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang/ /brtag pa drug cu rtsa gsum du/ /rags
43a2(mdo 'grel): rims ji bzhin phye ba yin/ /de lnga re re phri ba las/ /ldar gyur pa ni ro gnyis pa/ /gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste/ /lan tshwa gsum ste kha cig/ bzhi ba la ni mngar po bcu/ /skyur ba bzhi po lan tshwa gcig/ lnga pa la ni skyur gcig bu/ /
43a3(mdo 'grel): mngar ba lnga la brtan pa yin/ /sman ni ro drug gcig bu yin/ /ma 'dres pa ni ro drug 'gyur/ /lnga po drug dang ro ni tha dad drug /bzhi pa gnyis pa lnga pa bco lnga yin/ /dbye ba gsum pa nyi shu gcig nyid de/ /sman ni do drug de
43a4(mdo 'grel): ltar drug cu gsum/ /de rnamS ro dang rdo rjes ro'i dbye ba/ /rab dang rab mchog dag tu brtags pa las/ /rtsis las 'das par byung bar gyur pa ni/ /nad dang sman gyi dbang las nye bar sbyar/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
43a5(mdo 'grel): pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas nad la sogs pa'i tshul shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nad dang lus gzungs dri ma rnams/ /rtag tu lus kyi rtsa ba yin/ /de rlung
43a6(mdo 'grel): dbugs 'byung dbugs rdub dang/ /bskyod dang las sbyong shugs 'byin dang/ /lus zungs legs par rgyu ba dang/ /dbang po rnams ni gsal bdag /mi gnod pa ni rjes 'dzin yin/ /mkhris pa ? drod mthong byed dang?
43a7(mdo 'grel): bkres skom zas yin mdangs yid gzhungs/ blo ldan bges snying dus 'jam pas/ /bad kan brtan zhing snum nyid dang/ /tshig 'bel bzod la sogs pas so/ /lus zungs las /tso go rim bzhin no/ /chi ma byad ka tshe
43b1(mdo 'grel): byed g.yog pa dang/ /snam dang ston dang 'gengs pa dang/ /mdal ni skyed byed yin par bshad/ /ston par byed pa bshad pa yin/ /'drul dang 'byin pa gcin gyi yin/ /ba spu brtan pa rdul gyi yan/ /rlung ni 'phel bar 'gyur pa yis/ /skem
43b2(mdo 'grel): dang mdog gnag dror bag dga' / /'dar dang lte spos bshad ba sri/ /stobs ngang gnyid dang dbang po nyams/ /smra mang mgo 'khor zhum par byed/ /mkhris pa bshad gci pags mig ser/ /bkres skom lus tsha gnyid chung byed/ /bad
43b3(mdo 'grel): kan drod nyams mchi la ma mang/ /khong snyom lci dang sha mdog dkar/ /lus drang yan lag lhod pa dang/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde gnyid cha/ /dangs ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la/ /khrag 'phel me dpal khang pa mcher/ /mdze dang rlung
43b4(mdo 'grel): khrag mkhris pa khrag/ skran dang rnyil nang mig ser dang/ /bskyod dka' drod nyams rmongs bag can/ /mig dang gcin ? dmar bar 'gyur/ /sha 'phel wa ba men? bu mdud/ /mkhur tshos grang lho bla sbom zhing/ /mgul sogs lhag par
43b5(mdo 'grel): sha yang che/ /tshal 'phel de 'dra de bzhin ngal/ /cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs rgod cing/ /rkub chos num gsum 'phyang 'gyur/ /rus 'phel rus lhag so lhag 'gyur/ /rkang 'phel lus lci mig rtsa g.yung/
43b6(mdo 'grel): /tshigs kyi mgo bo sbom pa dang/ /tshigs la thong bu gsos ka 'byung/ /khu 'phel bud med la rab gang du/ /khu ba'i rde'u dag tuAng 'gyur/ /bshad 'phel lto spos rgyu 'khrug cing/ /lus lci lto ba na bar byed/ /gcin 'phel
43b7(mdo 'grel): chu sor zug cing na/ /lcis kyang ma lcis snyams sems 'byung/ /rdul 'phel rdul tshe dri mi zhim/ /g.yan pa nyid kyang bskyed ces bya/ /mig rdul la sogs dri ma rnams/ /mod las lci la sogs par byed/ /rlung zad mtshan
44a1(mdo 'grel): ma lus mi bde/ /? nyung rtsol ba chung bar 'gyur/ /dran pa mi bsal bad kan 'phel/ /sngar bshad pa yi nad rnams 'byung/ /mkhris zad drod nyams grang pa dang/ mdog nyams byed de bad kan zad/ /mgo 'khor bad kan gnas
44a2(mdo 'grel): stongs shing/ /snying 'dar tshigs ni lhod par 'gyur/ /cung zad rtsub ngal skam pa dang/ /na zhing sgra cher mi bzod 'gyur/ /khrag zad skyur dang bsil la dga' / /rtsa lhod pags pa rtsub par 'gyur/ /sha zad dbang nyams mig khur ba'i/ /?
44a3(mdo 'grel): skams lhu tshigs na par 'gyur/ /tshil zad gnyid che dbyid rke mngon/ /mcher ba che dang lus skams 'gyur/ /rus zad rus zug so dang ni/ /sen mo skra la soD pa 'byung/ /rkang zad rkang sbrabs stong ba dang/ /mgo 'khor rab rib can du
44a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /khu ba zad pas ring nad 'byung/ /yang na khu ba khrag nyid 'byung/ /rlig pa shin tun ba dang/ /pho mtshan tshig pa snyam du sems/ /bshad zad rlung ni rgyu ma'i nang/ /sgra bcas 'khyl ba lta bur byed/ /lto bar rgyu zhing gyen du 'gro/
44a5(mdo 'grel): snying ga rtsib logs mi bzang na/ /gcin zad gcin nyung sri ba dang/ /mdog 'gyur ba'am khrag bcas nyid/ /rdul zad spu byi spu 'gred la/ /pags pa rnams ni 'gas bar 'gyur/ /dri ma shin tu phra ba rnams/ /zad pa rtag dka' dri
44a6(mdo 'grel): ma yi/ /rang gnas bstan dang na ba dang/ /stod dang yang ba las shes bya/ /nad sogs rang nyid ji lta ba'i/ /yon tan 'di ni bzlog pa dag /zad pa dang ni 'phel 'gyur las/ /'phel 'bri sman pas shes par bya/ /dri ma thogs
44a7(mdo 'grel): las 'phel ba ste/ /shin tu 'byung las zas shes bya/ /lus ni dri mas brtan pas na/ /'phel bas zad pa gnod pa yin/ /de la rlung ni rus par gnas/ /mkhris pa rdul dang khrag la gnas/ /bad kan lhag ma gnas des 'di
44b1(mdo 'grel): phan tshun rten dang brten pa yin/ /'phel dang zad par byed pa'i sman/ /gcig gi gang yin gzhan gyi'ang de/ /rus pa rlung gnyis la 'di min/ /phal cher rtas pas 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bad kan rjes mthun de yi phyir/ /de las bzlog pas
44b2(mdo 'grel): zad pa yin/ rlung dang rjes mthun de ltar na/ /'phel dang zad pa 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /bsnyung dang blta bar bya ba yis/ /nad ni rim gyis gso bar bya/ /rlung ma rtogs te de skyes la/ /de nyid bzlog thabs sbyar bar bya/ /khyad par du ni khra skyes
44b3(mdo 'grel): na/ /gtar ga dkru sman dag gi gso/ /sha cher skyes las byung ba'i gnas/ /gtar ga me bca' thal sman sbyar/ /tshil skyes sbom skem gso bar bya/ /rus pa zad pa las byung la/ /mar dang 'o ma kha bar sbyar/ /de bzhin 'jam rtsi
44b4(mdo 'grel): btang bas so/ /bshad pa 'phel la 'phru bas gso/ /gshad bzang las byung ba'i nad/ /ra lug nang grol zan dron dang/ /sbyar dug ma sha gnyis sogs sbyin/ /gcin 'phel gyur la gcin 'bri ba/ /gcin zad las byung gcin
44b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis gso/ /rdul mi 'byung la rtsol dang bsku/ /rdul 'byung chang gis gso bar bya/ /lus kyi mi drod rang gnas 'dug /cha shas lus zungs rnams la brten/ de rnams 'bri zhing rab 'bar ba/ /lus zungs 'phel dang zad
44b6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /lus zungs dang po'i phyi ma ni/ /rgyas byed zad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /nyes 'khrugs pas ni lus zungs nyen/ /gnyi gas dri ma la gnod byed/ /'og nas gnyis te mgo bor bdun/ /bu ga dang ni rdul 'byung ba'i/ /dri ma'i
44b7(mdo 'grel): gnas ni brim ste/ /rang rang gnas su nad bskyed 'gyur/ /lus zungs khu ba'i mthar thug pa'i/ /nang nas gzi can mdangs mchog yin/ /snying la gnas kyang khyab pa dang/ /lus ni brtan par gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig 'jig
45a1(mdo 'grel): na des 'jig la/ /gang zhig gnas na gnas gyur pa/ /gang las dngos rnams sna tshogs pa/ /lus la brten pa 'byung ba yin/ /mdangs ni sems 'khrugs bkres sems las/ /mya ngan ngal la la sogs
45a2(mdo 'grel): pas zad/ /de zad spang zhing lus ring la/ /yang yang sems shing dbang po nyams/ /gzi nyams rtsub dang yid mi dga' / /nyams chung bar ni 'byung ba yin/ /'tsho byed sman dang 'o ma dang/ /sha khu la sogs de'i sman yin/ /zas
45a3(mdo 'grel): rnams mi 'dod gang zhig slong/ /de la mi 'phrod 'phrod pa ni/ /spang dang sbyin par bya ba dag/ de dang das 'phel zad par 'gyur/ /nyes pa phyin ci log pa dang/ /mthun pas sred pa skyed byed de/ /phal cher 'phel dang zad pa dag /
45a4(mdo 'grel): mi mkhas pa yis mi shes so/ /ji bzhin stobs dang rang ji bzhin/ /'phel na nyes pa rgyas par 'gyur/ /zad pas rang bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur/ /mnyam na rang gi la rnams byed/ /gang zhig mnyam pas lus ni 'phel bar
45a5(mdo 'grel): byed/ /nyes pa de nyid mi mnyam gsod par byed/ /de byas zas pa'ang 'phel ba lta bu ni/ /phan pa'i spyod pa nyid kyis bsrung bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //
45a6(mdo 'grel): de nas nad kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /zhu ba'i gnas dang rked ba ste/ /rna ba rus pa reg dbang po/ /rlung gnas yin te las kyang/ /zhu ba'i gnas su khyad par gnas/ /mkhris gnas lte ba ? bsdul?/ /chu ser
45a7(mdo 'grel): ? ma khrag dang ni/ /mig dang pags pa dag yin te/ /de las lte ba khyad par gnas/ /bdag na brang dang mgul ba mgo /glo ba rus tshigs ma zhu'i gnas/ /dangs mchal dang sna rtser gnas/ /brang ni khyad par dag gi gnas/
45b1(mdo 'grel): rlung ni srog sogs dbye ba yis/ /lnga yi bdag nyid 'dir srog ni/ /phyir gnas brang dang gre bar rgyu/ /blo dang dbang po sems 'dzin byed/ /mchil mdor sbrid 'byung sgregs pa 'don/ /dbugs rdub zas ni med par byed/ /gyen rgyu'i gnas
45b2(mdo 'grel): ni brang yin te/ /sna dang lte ba lkog mar rgyu/ /tshig 'byin 'bad rtsol mdangs dang ni/ /stobs dang kha dog dran las byed/ /khyab byed snying gnas lus kun la/ /ma lus khyab cing rab tu mgyogs/ /'gro dang ldeg dang 'jogs pa
45b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mig 'byed 'jubs pa la sogs pa/ /lus can bya ba phal cher ni/ /de la rag ni lus pa yin/ /mnyam gnas me drod nye bar gnas/ /nang grol kun tu rgyu ba yin/ /bya ba zas len 'ju ba dang/ /dngas snyigs 'byed
45b4(mdo 'grel): cing 'dor bar byed/ /thur sel gzhang gnas 'dod mo dang/ /lgang ba pho mtshan brlan gnas/ /bya ba khu ba zla mtshan dang/ /bshad gci mngal gnas 'byin par byed/ /mkhris pa'i rang bzhin lnga de la/ /zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas
45b5(mdo 'grel): bar gnas/ /'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can gyis ni/ /gang me'i yon tan shas che bas/ /gsher nyid skom byed 'ju la sogs/ /las kyi me yi sgrar bshad do/ /zas ni 'ju dang de bzhin du/ /dang sa ma chigs ma 'byed par
45b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ /des gnas bzhin du mkhris pa ni/ /lhag ma rnams kyi grogs byed pas/ /stobs bya skyed pa yis byed 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'ju byed ces bshad do/ /mkhris pa ma zhu'i gnas la brten/ /dang sa mdog bsgyur
45b7(mdo 'grel): bas dmar bsgyur yin/ /mkhris pa sgrub byed snying la gnas/ /blo dang yid gzhungs nga rgyal sogs/ /mngon 'dod don ni sgrub byed pas/ /mig la gnas te gzugs mthong byed/ /mthong byed ces bshad mdog gsal ni//
46a1(mdo 'grel): pags mdog gsal byed pags par gnas/ /bad kan rnams lnga brang gnas pa/ /rang gi stogs kyi sum mdod ?/ /snying dang zas kyi mthu dang ni/ /de nyid la gnas chu las byed/ /bad kan lhag ma'i gnas gyur ba'i//
46a2(mdo 'grel): rten ni gang phyir byed gyur par/ /de phyir rten byed ces bshad do/ /gang zhig ma zhu'i gnas la gnas/ /de ni zas sogs 'drul byed pas/ /myags byed ces mi bya ba yin/ /myong byed lcer gnas ro tshor byed/ /rtas byed mgo gnas
46a3(mdo 'grel): dbang po ni/ /tsham par byed do 'byor byed ni/ /tshigs gsal gnas nas 'byor par byed/ /de ltar nang ni phal mo che/ /mi 'gyur bdag nyid can khyab kyang/ /gnas yin par ni shes bya ste/ /las rnams kyang ni tha dad yin/ /rtsub
46a4(mdo 'grel): sogs dro bar ldan pas ni/ /rlung ni sogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /grang pas ldang byed rlung la sogs/ /yon tan drod ldan zhi byed 'gyur/ /rno sogs bsil bar dang ldan pas/ /mkhris pa sogs par byed 'gyur la/ /dro bas
46a5(mdo 'grel): ldang zhing ro rtul sogs/ /bsil bar ldan pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /snum sogs grang dang ldan pa yis/ /bad kan sogs par byed 'gyur la/ /gro bas ldang 'gyur de nyid ni/ /rtsub sogs yon tan gyis zhir 'gyur//
46a6(mdo 'grel): rang gnas nyid du 'phel sogs yin/ /skyel 'gyur rgyu las 'khrug pa dang/ /mi mthun pa yi yod tan 'dod/ /ldang pa log pa'i lam zhugs nyid/ /rang gi rtags ni ston pa dang/ /bde med nang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'o//
46a7(mdo 'grel): rang gnas gnas pa mnyam nyid dang/ /nad rnams ma byung zhib yin/ /sogs dang ldang dang rab zhi?/ /rlung ni sog sogs gsum tshe/ /mkhris pa dbyar la sogs par te/ /bad kan dgun smad sogs par ro/ /yang
46b1(mdo 'grel): dang rtsub pa la sogs pa'i/ /sman dang lus kyang de mtshungs pas/ /sog rlung ni sogs gyur gyi/ /dra ba'i dus kyis lang mi 'gyur/ /chu rnams 'jug ba sgyur ba dang/ sman yang de dang 'dra ba yis/ /mkhris pa sogs kyi dus kyi ni//
46b2(mdo 'grel): grang ba nyid kyis ldang mi 'gyur/ /chu dang sman ni bsil ba dang/ /snum pas dus ni mtshungs 'gyur yang/ /dgun smad bad kan sogs 'gyur gyi/ /bsgongs pas ldang bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /de ltar dus kyi rang bzhin 'di/ /zas la
46b3(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i dbang gis na/ /dus la bab par ma gyur kyang/ /'phral du sogs pa la sogs 'gyur/ /nad ni ldang gyur 'phral du lus/ /mgo nas rkang gi bar du khyab/ /ldog 'gyur chu yi rgyun bzhin du/ /cung zad cung zhig dag gis zhi//
46b4(mdo 'grel): nad 'khrugs sna tshegs tshul can ni/ /grangs med par ni gyur pas lus/ /thams cad nye bar gzir gyur pa/ /de rgyu tshul dang sgrub pa dag /re re nas ni bstan mi nus/ /de bas spyi yi brjod pa yin/ /nang rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/ /nyes
46b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgyu ni gcig bu nyid/ /dper na bya ni ldings gyur ba/ /nyin rangs kun tu song gyur kyang/ /rang gi grib ma dang mi 'bral/ /'gro kun 'di dang 'dra ba yin/ yang na ji ltar ma lus pa'i/ /'gro ba mi 'dra sna tshogs 'di/ /yon
46b6(mdo 'grel): tan gsum dang mi 'bral lo/ /de bzhin rang khams ma snyoms pa'i/ /rgyu yang gnas skabs thams cad du/ /nang rigs nyes pa gsum mi 'bral/ /de rnams kyi ni ldad pa'i rgyu/ /dbang don mi 'tshal phrad pa dang//
46b7(mdo 'grel): dus dang nyes pa'i las rnams so/ /de yang sman lhag ? sbyor bas/ /dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /dbang don rang yul chung du 'am/ /mi sbyor ba ni sman pa ste/ /shes cher stad pa lhag sbyor ba/ /rab 'phra'i 'od
47a1(mdo 'grel): dang 'jigs pa dang/ /shin tu nye dang shin tu ring/ /yid du mi 'ong mi sdug pa'i/ /gzugs la mig ni lta byed pa/ /log sbyor de ni mi bzang yin/ /de bzhin rab grags rul la sogs/ /dbang don ji bzhin
47a2(mdo 'grel): shes par bya/ /dus kyang grang dang tsha ba dang/ /char dus dbye ba gsum du 'dod/ /de dman grang sogs chung ba dang/ /ltag sbyor shin tu che mtshan nyid/ /rang gi mtshan nyid phyin ci log /log pa'i sbyor ba yin par bshad/ /lus
47a3(mdo 'grel): ngag yid kyi dbye ba yis/ /las kyi rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /lus la sogs pa'i las dman la/ /'jug pa dman pa'i min can yin/ /brtun das 'jug pa lhag sbyor ba'o/ /shugs bkag pa dang btsir ba dang/ /ma'i
47a4(mdo 'grel): bzang lus kyi las rnams dang/ /bcus dang ? 'chos gom 'khor sogs/ /ldang bzhin sbyar bar byed pa dang/ /'dod chags zhe sdang 'jig sogs dang/ /srog gcod la sogs las rnams dang/ /rnam bcud? yang smad
47a5(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /'di dang gzhan du byas pa rnams/ /de dag ma lus log sbyor yin/ /'di dag nad kyi rgyu yin no/ /ldang 'gyur de ni mdza' yas te/ /sna tshogs nad ni byed par 'gyur/ /yan lag nang grol lhu tshigs brten
47a6(mdo 'grel): yan lag khrag sogs pags pa yin/ /de ni phyi rol nad gnas te/ /de brten ma zhu yan lag na/ /lnga ba'i ba snabs 'brum pa sogs/ /gzhang 'brum skran dang 'or nad sogs/ /de dag phyi rol nang ces bya/ /nang nang
47a7(mdo 'grel): tsa sbubs? chen po dang/ /ma zhu zhu ba'i gnas la brten/ /gnas de las ni skyug tshad 'khru/ /dmu rdzing lung pa dbugs mi bde/ /nang gi cha yi gzhad 'brum skrangs/ /skran dang me dpal khor 'brum pa/ /mgo bo snying dang chu
47b1(mdo 'grel): so sogs/ /rus pa'i tshigs nang gnad yin no/ /de 'brel rtsa dang chu ba dang/ /chu ba chen sogs par ma yin/ /de la nad lam der gnas pa/ /gcod chen gzhogs byed 'jing kha yo/ /glad nang sogs dang tshigs rus dang/ /spyi yi
47b2(mdo 'grel): gzer dang gdon nad sogs/ /'byin khyab khyab zug dang snyom pa dang/ /lus tsha nad gzer bya ba dang/ /'jar zhing chags bskams yan lag 'khums/ /bsgongs dang rtse dang/ /'dar dang rtsub dang khong stong dang/ /skem
47b3(mdo 'grel): dang mgul dang dkris snyam dang/ /rengs dang ro dka' bro ba'o/ /mdog ni gnag gam dmar ba dag /rlung gi las yin mkhris pa'i las/ /lus tsha mdog dmar gro smin byed/ /rdul dang gnags dang 'jags ma red/ /'drul
47b4(mdo 'grel): dang rgyal zhing myos pa dang/ /kha'i ro kha dang skyur ba dang/ /mdog skya dmar rtsa ma yin pa'o/ /bad kan las ni 'khrang zhing snum/ /g.ya' zhing khong drang lci ba dang/ /tshigs dam sha rgyas rmongs bag dang/ /skrad zhing gnyid che
47b5(mdo 'grel): zas mi 'ju/ /mdog dkar kha ro lan tshwa mngar/ /las kyi mdza' las 'dam ring ngo/ /de ltar ji skad bshad pa yi/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni nang kun khyab/ /de ni ma yengs lta sogs pas/ /yang dag par ni shes par bya//
47b6(mdo 'grel): nad kyi gnas skabs dbye shes pas/ /nad pa skad cig re rer blta/ /goms pas nges par thob 'gyur te/ /las rnams grub pa gsal byed yin/ /rin chen la sogs bzang nan shes/ /bstan bcos 'ba' zhig las
47b7(mdo 'grel): mi 'byung/ /nang ni 'di ltar rnam gsum ste/ /la la tshe 'di'i nyes las byung/ /la la sngon gyi nyes las rkyung/ /gzhan dag da? gnyis 'dres las byung/ /nyes 'byung nang gzhi ji bzhin par/ /las skyes rgyun med pa yin
48a1(mdo 'grel): rgyu chung pa las dkyel che'i nang/ /nyes dang las las byung ba yin/ /dang po mi mthun bza' ba yin/ /las skyes las ni zad pa ste/ /gnyi ga las byung nyed dang las/ /zad pas zad par 'gyur
48a2(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /nad ni rang rgyud gzhan rgyud las/ /gnyis 'gyur mdza' ma'ang gnyis yin te/ /snga skyes snga ma'i tshul du bshad/ /phyi skyes pa ni bla gnyan yin/ /rang gnas ji bzhin gnas pa ni/ /rang rgyud can te mtshan nyid
48a3(mdo 'grel): gsal/ /gzhan dag de las go bzlog pa/ /dri ma'ang de bzhin shes par gyis/ /de ni nad de ldang ba na/ /ma yengs pas ni shes bya ste/ /de rnams gtso bo zhi byas pas/ /zhi 'gyur zhi bar ma gyur na/ /de bzhin phyi
48a4(mdo 'grel): nas gso bar bya/ /'on te bla gnyan stobs chen/ /myur gso de nad kyis gzir ba/ /lus la shas cher gnod byed yin/ /nad la rnam par mi mkhas zhes/ /ngo mtsha nam yang ma byed cig/ nad kyi 'gyur ba thams cad kyi/ /ming gi nges bstan
48a5(mdo 'grel): yod pa min/ /nyes pa de nyid 'khrugs nas ni/ /khyad par du ni ldang gyur nas/ /gnas gzhan dag tu song nas ni/ /nad ni mang por byed par 'gyur/ /de bas nad kyi rang bzhin ni/ /rang gnas gzhan du 'phos pa dang/ /rgyu yi khyad par
48a6(mdo 'grel): shes byas la/ sman dpyad kyis gso myur du bya/ /gnod bya yul dang nyams stobs dus/ /ma drod rang bzhin na tshong dang/ /snying stobs goms dang zas rnams kyi/ /gnas skabs rnam pa tha dad pa/ /'di dag 'phra mo yan tshad brtag/
48a7(mdo 'grel): nad dang sman gyi tshul brtags pas/ /gang zhig gso ba la 'jug pa/ /de ni nam yang 'khrul mi 'gyur/ /nad dkyil che ba'am chung bdag /phog rmya lus nyams che chung las/ /gnod par byed pas snang 'gyur bas/ /de la'ang
48b1(mdo 'grel): ma yangs nyid du gyis/ /sman pa ngan pa nad rnams ni/ /lci ba yang bar yongs rtog cing/ /nad nyung dag tu brtags pa yis/ /gso ba log pa dag tu 'gyur/ /de bas chung ba'am stobs chung ba/ /skyel chen nad la rab tu sbyor/ /spyangs pas chung dur
48b2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba yis/ /nad ni shin tu spongs pa yin/ /sbyor ba lhag par sbyor ba dang/ /log par sbyor bas phyin ci log /dri ma 'byung bar ma zad kyi/ /lus kyang shin tu ma rung 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu brtson pa dang/ /thams cad kun tu legs brtags nas//
48b3(mdo 'grel): ci nas nad med brtan gyur pa/ /de ltar sman dpyad sbyar bar gyis/ /de nas gzhan yang nad rnams ni/ /'phel zad dbye bas bshad bya ste/ /tha dang pa las gsum shes bya/ /ldan gsum de yang de dgu yin/ /ma nyams par 'phel bar gsum
48b4(mdo 'grel): nyid de/ /gcig rab lhag pa drug tu 'gyur/ /ma lus pa las bcu gsum yin/ /gnyis gcig lhag pa las drug ste/ /mtshungs las gcig yin rab dang ni/ /rab mchog rtag pa las drug yin/ /de ltar nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /phel ba'o/
48b5(mdo 'grel): zad la'ang de snyed yin/ /de dag re re 'phel snyam zad/ /drug ste slar yang de dag ni/ /gcig zad gnyis gnyis 'phel ba ni/ /go ldog bcas pas jug tu 'gyur/ /dbye pa drug cu gnyis su bstan/ /drug cu gsum pa bde gnas rgya//
48b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'di dag dang ma ? khrag sogs 'dres pa las/ /nang ni zad dang mnyam dang 'phel ba'i dbye ba yis/ /rab dang rab mchog dag las mdza' yas nyid 'gyur bar/ /rang bzhin ci 'dra ma yengs yid kyi shes par gyis/ /yan lag
48b7(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nas nad gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung nad gso ba ldum dang ni/ /dugs dang sbyang ba 'jam pa dang/ /mngar skyur lan tshwa bro ba yi/ /zas
49a1(mdo 'grel): dang bsku zhing mnye ba dang/ /dkri snam sman chu blugs pa dang/ /gri chang 'bras chang bu ram tshang/ /smu ma gro 'jam rtsi btang ba ni/ /'jam rtsi des pa de dag dang/ /skye gnas du ma'i snam dag ni/ /drongs che 'ju bar bya
