49a2(mdo 'grel): g.yos sbyar/ /khyad par du ni sha tshon dang/ /til mor dang sbyar 'jam rtsi bya/ /mkhris pa mang sar slud pa dang/ /mngar zhing bsil ba'i bkru sman dang/ /mngar dang kha dang bska ba yi/ /zas dang sman ni sbyin pa dang/ /dri bzang bsil
49a3(mdo 'grel): zhing yid 'od pa'i/ /dri ni nye bar rten pa dang/ /mgul du ngo shal sen mod do/ /nor bu brang bu gdags par bya/ /ga bur tsan dan zu shi ri'i/ /byug pas skad cig re re bsku/ /song la rdo thal can zla gzar/ /yid 'ong glu dang bser
49a4(mdo 'grel): bsil brten/ /bag phebs mdza' bo bde ba dang/ /bu la gzhon skad nyams rangs smra/ /chung ma yid mthun las byed cing/ /sdug cing yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /khang pa nyis rim chu bsil blugs/ /skyed mos chal brdzing bzang po
49a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rgya che sang ni stegs bcas pa/ /chus brlan bye ma bsil ba dang/ /spyil bu lus tshang shing khebs dang/ /chu 'gram pad+mar bcas par ni/ /bder gnas khyad par 'o ma dang/ /ming sar bza' dang bkru sman bya/ /bad kan cho gar ldan
49a6(mdo 'grel): par ni/ /skyag sman kru sman rnon po btang/ /zas ni rtsub chud rna zhing dro/ /tsha zhing kha dang bskal ba bza' / /chang ni yun rings lon par tung/ /rtse dga' dang ni gnyid mi log /rtsol ba'i chul ni sna tshogs dang/ /sems las rtsub pas nye
49a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /khyad par smar zhu skyug sman btang/ /sbrang rtsi chil 'joms sman bsten bya/ /bsnyung ba bdud bdug 'khur kang dpo/ /bde ba med nyid bde phyir bya/ /nang rnams so sor gso ba dag /nad las dpags te bshad pa yin/ /ldan
49b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni 'dus pa dag/ de ni so so'i tshul bzhin brtag/ rlung ni zung du 'jug pas na/ /rlung mkhris phal cher so ga'i bya/ /bad kan rlung la dpyid kyi bya/ /bad kan mkhris pa ston gyi bya/ /nad ni skye la sogs dus su gsal/ /ldang na gzhan don med par gso//
49b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad ldang dan tshab che ba/ /nad gzhan gnod pa med par gso/ /nad ni sbyor bas zhi bya ba/ /gang gzhan ldang bar byed pa dag/ de ni dag min gzhan dag ni/ /ldad par mi 'gyur rnam dag yin/ /rtsol drag tsha bo rno ba dang/ /gnod par 'gyur
49b3(mdo 'grel): ba spyod pas kyang/ /khong ba yan lag rus pa dang/ /gnad du rlung ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bzhin de la rtsa sgo ni/ /rnam par sbyangs pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /smin byas rlung ni tshar bcad pas/ /khong pa'i nang du 'byung bar
49b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /der gnas nas kyang rgyu dag la/ /sdod cing ring du thogs pa yin/ /de ni dus sogs stobs thob nas/ /gzhan la brten yang ldang bar byed/ /de la gnas gzhan gnas pa ni/ /de nyid stobs ni med nyid la/ /gso bar bya ba rang gi ni//
49b5(mdo 'grel): stobs kyis gzhan zil gnon byed na'o/ /bla gnyan nad ni zhi byas na/ /rang gnas gnas pa gso mi dgos/ /phal cher rtsibs logs 'gro ba'i nang/ /nad pa yun ring nyon mongs byed/ /lung me'i stobs ni shes pa yis/ /de la rings
49b6(mdo 'grel): thabs dag mi bya/ /de ni sbyor bas zhi bya 'am/ /khong du bde bar bsdu bar bya/ /khong du 'dus par shes nas ni/ /ji ltar nye ba bzhin du gsal/ /bu ga 'byung 'gags stobs nyams zhing/ /lci zhing rlung ni khong du 'khrul/ /khong snyoms
49b7(mdo 'grel): mi 'jug mchil ma mang/ /gshad gci srid dub zas mi len/ /nad rtsa ma zhil spyi yi rtags/ /rtse zhal de las bzlog pa yin/ /khong pa'i drod stobs chung nyid kyis/ /lus gzungs dang po mi 'ju ba/ /nad ni pho bar zhugs pa
50a1(mdo 'grel): dag/ dangs ma ma zhu yin par bshad/ /gzhan gnad nyid rab 'khrugs pa/ /rab rtug phan tshun 'dom las byung/ /ko twa pa yi dug bzhin du/ /nad tshabs chen po 'byung bar bshad/ /nad tshabs de dang 'dres par
50a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gnod pa gnod bya gnod 'gyur dang/ /nad gzhan gang dag de dag byung/ /ma zhu ba dang bcas par bshad/ /de ni lus kun zhugs gyur ba/ /nad nang zhugs te rtse ma bcil/ /ma smin dbyung bar mi bya ste/ /ma smin shing tog khur
50a3(mdo 'grel): bar mtshungs/ /de ni dbyung bar dka' bas na/ /rten ni 'jigs par byed bar 'gyur/ /de ni smin dang drod bskyes snam/ /dugs bya rtse bcil de bsal ba/ /ji ltar nye dang stobs ji bzhin/ /sbyangs pa'i dus su gsal bar bya/ kha nas rigs
50a4(mdo 'grel): par sman btang bas/ /ma zhu'i gnas las nad myur bsal/ /nam tshod yan chad yan chad sna sman gyis/ /zhu ba'i gnas yod mas btang bsal/ /steng dam 'og tu 'byung bar rtsom/ /nad ni rang nyid byung bas na/ /sman gyis nad ni mi dgag
50a5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /bkag na de nyid nad bskyed 'gyur/ /de bas dang por nad 'byung la/ /bsdad de phan par bza' bar bya/ /'khyil ba smin pa de dang des/ /smin byas de bzhin bsal bar bya/ /dpyad ston tha chung dbyid la 'dril/ /thun mongs dus su rim
50a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /srog dbyar dad dgun bsags pa'i/ /rlung sogs nad ni myur du bsal/ /sa ga dbyar dad dgun gyi che/ /rab cha char dang grang ba'i dus/ /de rnams dus mtshams thun mongs ste/ /de tshe nad ni mi bzang bsal/ /tha mal
50a7(mdo 'grel): bde gnas dbang sbyar kyi/ /nad la nad kyi dbang du ni/ /grang tsha char gyi dus dag gi/ /gnyen po ji bzhin byas nas ni/ /sbyor ba'i dus pa? bab pa na/ /bya ba dus la mi bsdad do/ /sman ni ma zas zas sngon dang/ /dbus dang mdza' dang kham
50b1(mdo 'grel): gyi bar/ /zas bar tsheg bu zas bcos dang/ /zas mnan mtshan mo btung ba'o/ /bad kan rdo 'das nas pa ni/ /nyams stobs ldan la ma zos gnyan/ /thur ser rlung la zas lngar btang/ /mnyam gnas ldang la bar du yin/ /khyab byed nad bar zas
50b2(mdo 'grel): ? mthar/ /gyen rgyu'i rlung la dgongs ka'i 'o/ /srog ces bya ba'i rlung ldang la/ /kham gyi bar dad zas bar ?/ /dug dang skyug lud dbugs mi bde/ /skom dad skye la tsheg bu'o/ /yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas/ /sman dang zas
50b3(mdo 'grel): bcos sbyar bar bya/ /skyigs bu lus 'dar lag 'dar dang/ /zas nyung za la mnan pa btang/ /nam 'tshong yan chad nad la ni/ /mtshan mo'i dus su btang ba bsngags/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas
50b4(mdo 'grel): gyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas gso ba'i thabs rnams pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u bshad par bye'o/ /gso ba rnam pa gnyis yin phyir/ /gso thabs rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /de gcig blta bar bya oba yin//
50b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa nyams ni smad pa'o/ /de dag rgyas byas smyung ba zhes/ /rnam phrangs dag tu bshad pa yin/ /lus sha rgyas phyir rgyas bya ste/ /de ni phal cher sa chu dang/ /cig shes las ni 'gyur ba yin/ /lus gang snum dang dgag
50b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ dugs dang khong rtsub bya ba ste/ /'byung ba'i de yang gnyis yin phyir/ /gnyis las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /de la 'ang spyad dang zhi bya ba/ /rnam pa gnyis po bsnyung ba yin/ /gang zhig nad ni phyir 'byin pa/ /sbyang yin de ni rnam
50b7(mdo 'grel): lnga ste/ /mas btang skyug sman lus nad ?/ /mgo yi nad bkru gtar gas dbyung/ /gang zhig nang ni mi sbyong dang/ /snyom gnas glong pa ma yin dang/ /ma snyoms snyoms par byed pa dag/ zhi ba yin te de rnams bdun/ /smin 
51a1(mdo 'grel): dang drod bskyed bkres skom dang/ /rtsol bcag nyi tshan bser bu bsil/ /rlung bcas mkhris pa zhi byed yin/ /rta bya nad dang sman dang chang/ /bud med mya ngan gyis nyams chung/ /khur dang lam dang
51a2(mdo 'grel): glo brdol dang/ /lus rtsub nyams mda' rlung shas che/ /sbrum ma bu btsas byis pa rgan/ /so ga'i dus dang gzhan yang rta/ /sha dang 'o ma ka ra dkar/ /mar sar mngar bag mas btang/ /gnyid log ngal bde bsku byug dang/ /khrus
51a3(mdo 'grel): dang bde gnas nyams dga' rta/ /gcin snyi ma zhu snum rab zos/ /rims btab brla rengs mdze nad can/ /shu ba khong 'bras mcher pa na/ /klad nad lkog nad mig nad dang/ /sbom po dgun dang gzhan dag kyang/ /rtag tu smyung
51a4(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba yin/ /de la sbyang bya shas che sbom/ /stobs ldan mkhris pa bad kan rgyas/ /ma zhu'i nad dang rims dang skyugs/ /tshad par 'khru dang snying na can/ /lus lci sgregs mad gshad gci 'gags/ /yi ga 'chus sogs
51a5(mdo 'grel): kyis na ba/ /'bring tsam spom sogs phal cher ni/ /dang por smin dang drod bskyed bya/ /nad ni 'di dag gis nyams thag/ /sbom dang stobs sogs chud ba la/ /bkres dang skom pas tshar bcad do/ /nad kyis nyam thag stobs
51a6(mdo 'grel): 'bring brtan/ /bser bu tsha rtsol gyis smad na/ /nyam chung mi lta smos ci dgos/ /nyams smad bya ba rtsa mi bya/ /rta bya nyams smad 'jam pos bya/ /yang na yul dang stobs sogs las/ /rigs pas de ni nye bar sbyad//
51a7(mdo 'grel): rta bas stobs ni 'phel ba dang/ /de yis bsgrub bya'i nad zad 'gyur/ /bsnyud pa dbang gsal dri ma rnams/ /mi srid khong yang yig 'byed/ /bkres dang skom pa lhan cig 'byung/ /dang ga snying dang sgregs pa dag/ nad kyi rtse
51b1(mdo 'grel): zhil spro ba che/ /snyom bag med pa dag tu 'gyur/ /de dag tshad la sogs pa dang/ /mi ldan rten par byed pa dag /rab sbom rab tu skem sogs 'gyur/ /de yang sman bcas bshad pa yin/ /tshul ni shin tu rta ba dang/ /nyams smad de nyid las shes bya/ /shin
51b2(mdo 'grel): tu tsho ches 'byung gcin snyi/ /rims dang dmu'i rdzing mtshan par rdol/ /lus rmongs gcin sri be snabs chags/ /mdze la sogs pa ming zad 'byung/ /de la tshil dang rlung bad kan/ /sel bar byed pa thams cad phan/ /rdzun khre rgod ku lang tha/ /nas dang sran chung
51b3(mdo 'grel): mon sran dri'u/ /dar ba dar rnying zho ga chu/ /sems las bya dang mi nyal bya/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras bu gsum bcas pa'am/ /sle tres bla sgang a ru ra/ /skyer khaN+Da dang rtsa bani/ /chen po lnga dang gu gul dang/ /brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang/ /agni mandI
51b4(mdo 'grel): khu bcas phan/ /nas tshig 'khus thal bi TAM ka/ bca' sgra lcags phye sbrang rtsi dang/ /nas dang skyu ru'i phye ma yi/ /sbyor bas shin tu tsho nad sel/ /tsha gsum 'bras gsum pu rtse shel/ /shi kru bi dang bong s+tha ri/ /shin kun go snyod kha ru tshan//
51b5(mdo 'grel): la la phud dang 'u su dang/ /kru trug bkres dang ser po gnyis/ /bri ha gnyis dang chu rtsi mo/ /ha pu sha dang pa ta dang/ /ke pu ka yi rtsa pa ste/ /'di rnams phye ma mar sbrang rtsi/ /til mar dag ni cha mnyams pa/ /nad phye'i cha ni bcu drug bskyed
51b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba 'thungs na de 'joms so/ /shin tu shas che bdag nyid kun/ /gzhan yang de 'dra'i nad rnams dang/ /snying nad mig ser sha bkra dang/ /lus dpugs mi bde lkog nad sel/ /blo dang yid gzhungs sems dran byed/ /zas 'ju
51b7(mdo 'grel): pho ba'i drod kyang bskyed/ /smyung grags rab skem mgo 'khor lud/ /skom dang che zhing yig 'chus/ /snum drod gnyid mig rna ba nyams/ /khu ba gzim dangs skem mdangs zad/ /chu so snying klan byin pa brla/ /sbu da rtsib logs na ri myas 'debs//
52a1(mdo 'grel): tshig mang stod du rlung nad 'jug /gnya' shing skyug bro rul tshigs na/ /bshad gci sri ba la sogs pa/ /smyung ba drags pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bar du tsho bas skem gnyid mchog /shin tu tsho drag pa yi sman/ /rta bar byed
52a2(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad sbyor/ /sems las med dang dga' ba dang/ /nges par brta bar bya ba dang/ /gnyid cher log pas skem pa yang/ /phag dang 'dra bar lus rgyas 'gyur/ /lus ni rtas shing 'tsho byed pa/ /sha dang 'dra ba gang yang med/ /sha mi za ba sha
52a3(mdo 'grel): za'i shas/ /lus ni shin tu rtas byed yin/ /sbom la nyams sman lci bas bya/ /de las bzlog pa skem la phan/ /nas dang bro ni gnyis ka la/ /de las 'os par byed pas brtag/ nad kyi dbye ba tha dad kyi/ /gcod 'khru la sogs dbye ba
52a4(mdo 'grel): yis/ /nad ltar tha dad gyur kyang ni/ /gso ba gnyis las yod ma yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas sbyangs pa la sogs pa sman gyi sde tshan 'dus
52a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /po son cha dang shing mngar dang/ /ku ba kha bo ni mA dang/ /bim+ba ga gon bi sha la/ /dug mo nung dang murba dang/ /de ba da li byi dang ka/ lcang ma tsi tra kru trug tres/ /ko sha pa ti ka rany+dza/ /pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang/ /shu
52a6(mdo 'grel): dag sug smel yungs kar te/ /'di dag skyug pa'i sman gyi sde/ /dan+ti dang nitri bithti?/ /'bras bu gsum dang bi sha la/ /sham ki ni dang snu ha dang/ /seng phrom dong ga ni li ni/ /khron bu dang ni kaM pi lya/ /'o ma ba gcin 'khru bar byed/ /bo son
52a7(mdo 'grel): 'cha' dang dug mo nyung/ /ru rta de ba de li dang/ /shing mngar shu dag rtsa ba bcu/ /thang shing ra sna la la phud/ /sha ta puShpa ba ta la/ /rgya sran nag po sbrang rtsi dang/ /rgyam tsha lce tsha shing nye ro/ /'di dag mas bkru sman gyi sde/ /a ba ma
52b1(mdo 'grel): b+ha byi tang ka /tsha ba gsum dang skyer pa'i rtsa/ /sur la dang shi ri sha/ 'bri hi shing bkru'i sa bon dang/ /seng ldeng ma du ka'i snying po'i rgyam tsha dngul rdog bong dreg/ sug smel gnyis dang go snyod sbom /mgo bo nang sbyong byed pa yin/ /thang shing rgya spos ru rta dang//
52b2(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba bcu dang ba la gnyis/ /bi ra ta ra'i sman sder gtogs/ /bi da ri sogs rlung nad sel/ /du rba dang ni byi tsher ma/ /nam+bi ba sha ka'i lo ma/ /kha sral phre'u 'ol ma se/ /nye'u shing pa zhes bya dang/ /shi ta pa ki spri yangku/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs shug pa
52b3(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /s+thir rnam gnyis pad+ma'i zer/ /bi n+ya thal tres sogs mkhris sel/ /do dag sogs dang arga sogs/ /mu ka ga sogs o son sogs/ /bye'u rug ba sogs gla sbrang sogs/ /dug mo nyung sogs bad kan sel/ /dzI ban+ti dang ram nye
52b4(mdo 'grel): ba/ /med ma hA me da dang/ /mung+ga mA Sha pa r+Ni dang/ /ldum bu zangs rtsib dang ni/ /dzI pa ka dang shing mngar te/ /sde 'di 'tsho byed ces bya yin/ /bi da ri dang e ran dang/ /phri shi kha li pu rna rna/ /de ba ha sa de ba dang/ /par+Ni gnyis dang kha sral
52b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'tsho byed lnga dang co tshung dang/ /thal tres dang ni lcum pa dang/ /ha nas pa ti zhes bya rnams/ /bi da ra sogs 'di snying phan/ /nyam chung rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /lus skem skran tshigs yan lag na/ /dbugs mi bde dang lung
52b6(mdo 'grel): pa lu/ /sel bar byed pa'i sde tshan yin/ /thal tres dang ni bu shes rtse/ /tang pa la dang ni ma du ka /tsan dan dkar dang dmar ba dang/ /shing mngar pa ru shag rnams/ /tshad pa mkhris pa khrag rgyas dang /skom dang rims kyis btab pa sel/ /shug
52b7(mdo 'grel): pa puN+Da ri ka dang/ /b+hid+d+hi rid+hi cu gang dang/ /sring gisle tres 'tsho byed bcu/ /nu zho skyed byed rlung khris sel/ /nyam chung tshim byed rtas byed la/ /'tsho byed ro ca nyid du byed/ /ba ru sha dang 'bras bu gsum/ /rgun 'brum dang ni katapa la/ /ta ka
53a1(mdo 'grel): ka'i 'bras ra dza dan/ /se'u 'bru bar da ru rnams/ /skom dang che dang gcin sri dang/ /rlung gi nad rnams sel byed yin/ /any+dza na dang pha li ni/ /spang spos pad+ma utpal/ /skyer khaN+Da dang sug smel dang/ /shing mngar nA
53a2(mdo 'grel): ga ge sar bcas/ /dug dang nang gi tsha ba dang/ /mkhris pa rgyas pa sel bar byed/ /pa to la dang pu rtse shel/ /tsan dan dkar po murba dang/ /sle tres srol rol bcas pa dag/ bad kan mkhris pa mdze dang rims/ /dug dang skyug bro yi ga 'chus
53a3(mdo 'grel): mig ser gyi ni nad rnams 'jom/ /sle tres dang ni shug pa dang/ nim+ba 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ /tsan dan dmar po zhes bya rnams/ /mkhris pa dang ni bad kan dang/ /rims dang skyug bro lus tsha dang/ /skom dad cher 'phel me drod bskyed//
53a4(mdo 'grel): dong ka dang ni dug mo nyung/ /ka ka tigta pa ta li/ /niM pa sle tres du rba dang/ /murba be dang ka tang dang/ /pa tha ci skrigs she rya ka/ /karny+dza gnyis pa to la/ /lo ma bdun pa kru kru ga tre sa/ /su sha bi dang po son 'cha'//sa ha ra tsa zhes bya
53a5(mdo 'grel): dang dad rgya shug gi ni 'bras bu rnams/ /de ni slon bro mdze nad dang/ /dug dang rims dang bad kan dang/ /g.yan pa dang ni gcig snyi dang/ /sma red pa rnams sbyod bar byed/ /a sa na dang ta ni sha /stag pa she da ba ta dang /ka ta ra dang sed ldang
53a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bat+ta dang ni shiM sha ba/ /a tsa sing+gi tsa nad na gsum/ /ta la a ka ra blak+Sha/ /sa lA khA ra pa tra dang/ /d+ha ba ba ti ka pra tog /tsha ga karna bad tsha ka /tha rams zhes ni bya ba ste/ /a san sogs de rnams kyi/ /sha bkra 'dze nad
53a7(mdo 'grel): bad kan dang/ /smin nad skya rbab gcin snyi dang/ /tsho chos nad ni sel par byed/ /ba ra sha sha rya ka gnyis/ /nyer shing tsitra mor Ta/ /bilpa a dza srid gi dang/ /'bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang/ /ka rany+dza gnyis dza ya gnyis/ /shing kru kru
53b1(mdo 'grel): sha ru rta'o/ /bar na sogs bad kan tshil/ /me drod chung dang rlung nad 'khyims/ /klad pa na ba'i nad sel zhing/ /skran dang khong 'bras 'joms pa yin/ /shing kun spang sa ma ru sha ka/ rgyam tsha brag gzhung nag tshur gnyis/ /gcin sri rde'u 'gagS
53b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /skran dang tshil ches bad kan sel/ /be lan+tar a ra ni/ /sbra rtog bri shasru sru'i rtsa/ /a ka ta dang gze ma dang/ /sa ha tsa ra ba na dang/ /ka sha brik+ShA da ni dang/ /'dam bu ku sha rnams gnyis dang/ /ku tha dang ni kha sral dang/ /ba lu
53b3(mdo 'grel): ka dang mor ta/ /ku ru ta dang ka daM pa/ /lcam pa zhes bya'i sman sde 'di/ /be lan+ta ra la sogs pa/ /rlung las gyur pa'i nad 'joms shing /rje'u rje'u phre yod dang/ /gcin sri ba yi nad rnams sel/ /gser phro ma sha bar ro tra/ /pa lak+Sha
53b4(mdo 'grel): dang dzhiny+dzi ni/ /thang shing kad pa la ra sna/ /ka tam+ba dang chu shing dang/ el ba lu a sho ka/ pa ri bo la mo tsa ka/ 'di ni seng phro ma sogs shes bya/ //tshil ches bad kan sel ba'i sde/ /mngal nad 'joms shing 'khru ba gcod/ /mdog dan dug nad sel//
53b5(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /arga dang ni a larga/ /nA ga dan+ti byi sha lya/ /ga bra ra sna bri shtsa ka la/ /a pa marga ka rany+dza/ /ka ka da ni ka rany+tsa/ /gi ti gar gnyis iM gu dang/ /arga la sogs sde tshan 'di/ /bad kan tshil ches dug rnams sel//
53b6(mdo 'grel): srin nad dang ni mdze nang 'joms/ /khyed par du ni rma la phan/ /bye'u rug rnam gnyis ku ther/ /ka la ma la pi TAM ka /kha ra pa tra ka tpa la/ /bri sha kar+Ni ka shun+ti/ /ske tshe ka bidtha'i lo ma/ /ga bra mon sne'u ka mu ka/ rgad mar bi sha muShthi dang//
53b7(mdo 'grel): bu srin /dang b+ha bo'o/ /bye rug pa la sogs kyi sde/ /bad kan tshil ches srin nad sel/ /cham pa yig 'chus lud pa/ /dbugs maM bde 'joms rma rang sbyong/ /musga dang ni snu ha dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsi tra ka/ /pa la sha dang rda ba
54a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /shi sha pa zhes bya ba rnams/ /skran dang gcin nad rde'u chags/ /skya rbab dang ni tshil ches nad/ /bad kan rgyas dang khu ba yis/ /nang rnams sel bar byed pa yin/ /dug mo nyung dang murba dang/ /par gyi dang ni pu rtse shel/ /na
54a2(mdo 'grel): le shaM dang bo da dkar/ /chu sgo sug seml pa ta dang/ /yungs kar zir u ra lu/ /a za mo dang po son 'cha'/shu dag zir nag po dang/ /shin kun dang ni bi tang+ga/ /pa shu gand+ha tsha ba lnga/ /rlung dang bad kan tshil ches dang/ /cham pa skran dang
54a3(mdo 'grel): rims dang gzer/ /gzhang 'brum gyi ni nad rnams sel/ /shu dag bla sgang thang shing dang/ /dong gra bo da a ru ra/ /ser po gnyis dang shing mngar dang/ /pri sna par+Ni du mo nyung/ /shu dag yung ba la sogs sde/ /be'u snabs tshad mar 'khru
54a4(mdo 'grel): smin gcod/ /tshil ches bad kan rgyas rlung phel/ /nu ma'i nad rnams sel bar byed/ /pri yaM ku dang ra gan du da/ /lig pu mig dang btang zil dang/ /lcum rtsa pad+ma ge sar dang/ /gtsod dang yab sha ka dang/ /shalma li dang de'i khu ba dang//
54a5(mdo 'grel): sa mang+ga dang phu na ma/ /tsan dan da ta ka'i me tog/ /aM pa sha dang shing mngar dang/ /na ma ka ra tu ni shing/ /rgya skyegs shing dang kha ru tsha/ /seng phrom bil rkang dad ki/ pad+ma'i ge sar ka taM ka/ sri yaM aM pa sha sde gnyis/ /zhu ba'i tshad par 'khru ba
54a6(mdo 'grel): sel/ /'byor byed mkhris pa dag la phan/ /rma yang 'tsho ba par byed pa yin/ /gla sgang shu dag kru drug tre sa/ /ser po gnyis dang kha ba gnyis/ /go bye pa ta bras bu gsum/ /pod da dkar nag ru rta dang/ /sug smel dang ni shu dag rnams/ /
54a7(mdo 'grel): nu zho mngal nad dri ma sel/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwadtha/ /u dum+ba ra seng phrom gnyis/ /'dzam bu gnyis dang ardzu na/ /ka pit+ta dang katpa la/ /slaksha a mra lcang ma dang/ /pi ya la dang ba la sha/ nan+ti rgya shug ? gdams? pa/ /bir shing mnga ma du ka/ n+ya gro d+ha
54b1(mdo 'grel): sogs sde tshan 'di/ /sa 'tsho 'khru gcod chags grubs sbyor/ /tshil che khrag mkhris skom dang che/ /mngal gi nad rnams sel bar byed/ /e la gnyis dang du ru ka/ /ru rta gan d+ha pri yaM ku/ /spang pos ba la bya ma ka/ snri ka tso ra tso tsha dang/ /shing tsha
54b2(mdo 'grel): gan d+ha pra tra dang/ /rgya bos bo la the ne ya/ /rgya mtsho'i ldu pa chu srin sen/ /thang shing dang ni a ka ru/ /gur gum shiri ba sa ka/ tsan dan gu gul rtse pog dkar/ /bu na ma dang kun tu ru/ /nA ga ge sar zhes bya'o/ /e la sogs te rlung bad kan/ /dug
54b3(mdo 'grel): rnams sel zhing mdog gsal byed/ /g.yan pa thor bu'i nad rnams dang/ /sha kra bas ldags sel bar byed/ /sha ma dandi kri ban+ti/ /ku tha ra na gra mu ga/ shing+gi na dang sa da la/ /khron bu dang niga bk+Shi/ /su dag shi ra kaM pi la/ /sle tres dong ga
54b4(mdo 'grel): ka rany+dza/ /bsha an+t+ra shing gru dang/ a bra shing ro tsha'i 'bras bu/ /dur byid la sogs sde tshan 'di/ /skran dang dug dang yig 'chus/ /bad kan dang ni/ snying nad dang/ /gcin sri ba yi nad rnams 'joms/ /de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum bshad/ /
54b5(mdo 'grel): sde chan de las ma rnyed na/ /de dang mtshungs pa gzhan dang sbyar/ /mi 'dra'i sbyor ba spang bar bya/ /sde tshan de dag gnod dang gnod bya tshogs ltos ba/ /cho ga bskol dang snum dang lhag pa la sogs ldan/ /btud dang snang stong mas stong yang na phyi
54b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu/ /bsku zhing byugs pas shin tu gso dka' i nad kun 'joms/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'o// //de nas snum gyi cho gar bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /snum byed
54b7(mdo 'grel): sman rnams phal cher ni/ /lci zhing bsil ba khong 'khru snum/ /rtul dang bral la mnyan zhib brlan/ /de las bzlog pa rtsub byed yin/ /zhun mar rgad dang tshil til mar/ /snum rnams kyi mi mchog rab 'dod/ /de dag las kyang zhun mar ?
55a1(mdo 'grel): sbyor byed 'jug pas mchog yin no/ /de dag sngon bzhin mkhris pa sel/ /phyi ma bzhin du cig shos sel/ /mar bas til mar lci de bas/ /tshil te tshil las rkang lci'o/ /de las gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi/ /
55a2(mdo 'grel): zung dang gsum pa che zhes bya/ /dugs bya sbyar bya chang bud med/ /rtsol chags sems las che ba dang/ /rgan po byis pa stobs chung sbeg/ rtsub dang khrag dang khus ba zad/ /rlung nang kyis nyen rab rib dang/ /shin tu dbye dka' la
55a3(mdo 'grel): snum bya/ /shin tu drod chung rab drod che/ /shin tu sbom dang ring ba dang/ /brla rengs chad 'khrum zhu dang/ /lkog nad dbyig dug da mu rdzing dang/ /brgyal skyug bad kan yig 'chus/ /skom dang cha da nad kyis nyen dang/ /dus min bu skyes sna sman dang/ /mas
55a4(mdo 'grel): btang bkru sman byas la min/ /de la blo ldan yid gzhungs sogs/ /'dod ba rnams la zhun mar bsngags/ /rmen bu gang kan srin bu dang/ /tshil ches rlung nad yod pa dang/ /lus yang 'khrang 'dod lto sra ba'i/ /lus can rnams la til
55a5(mdo 'grel): mar phan/ /rlung dang nyi tshan lam bud ming/ /khur dang rtsol bas lus zungs zad/ /rtsub nyon mongs bzod ma drong so/ /rtsa sgo rlung 'gags lhag ma phan/ /tshil dang rus pa gnad rnams dang/ /lton mes tshig rma byung lhung/ /mngal dang
55a6(mdo 'grel): na ba klan nang dang/ /tshil yang mchog tu phan pa yin/ /til mar dbyar phan zhun mar ni/ /dbyar thel de bzhin dpyid kyang bsngags/ /thun med dus la snum rnams ni/ /nyin mo nyi ma gsal tshe bsngags/ /rims la dgun yang
55a7(mdo 'grel): til mar btang/ /tsho ba'i dus suAng mar mtshan btang/ /mkhris pa rlung dang mkhris par bcas/ /ldan pa bla yang mtshon mo nyid/ /mtshan mo las gzhan rlung bad kan/ /nyin bar sbyar bas mkhris nad 'gyur/ /za sogs zas dang
55b1(mdo 'grel): mas btang dang/ /sna nas btang bsku khur bkang dbyo/ /mgo bskus sna mig dag pa yis/ /snum ni rigs par spyad par bya/ /ro yi dbye bo ro re yis/ /drug cu rtsa bzhir rnam par brtag/ snum ni gzhan gyis zil gnon zhing/ /chung du dogs pas rim par
55b2(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu med pas/ /dangs ma btang la spyad mi dgos/ /snum gyis las ni myur bsgrub pas/ /snu ma de'i tshe ga mchog yin na/ /gang zhig thun ni gnyis dang bzhi/ /brgyad kyis rim bzhin 'jug 'gyur ba/ /tshang chung 'bring dang
55b3(mdo 'grel): che ba ste/ /de las chung du bza' ba mchog /nad la sogs la brtags nas ni/ /thog mar shin tu chung du bza' / /sta ba'i zas ni zhu nyid na/ /sbyang phyir dangs ma mang du btung/ /zhi bya ltogs bcas zas med par/ /'bring tshad tsam ni bsngags
55b4(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /blta ba sha dang sha khu sogs/ /de yang 'bras can nyung bcas pa/ /byis pa rgan po skom gyis brdugs/ /snum 'bras chang dang che ba dang/ /bud med snum mi brtag bstan dang/ /drod chung bde dang dka' mi bzod/ /lto snyi nad skyel
55b5(mdo 'grel): tshung tsha dus/ /nyam chung pa la bsngags pa yin/ /dang po bar rang zas rjes zos/ /lus kyi smad bar stod las 'byung/ /nad rnams sel zhing lus kyi stobs/ /bskyed pa'i rim bzhin byed pa yin/ /de na legs par smin phyir dang/ /khar
55b6(mdo 'grel): chags pa ni phyi ba'i phyir/ /snum dang 'thung rjes chu tshan btung/ /e raNda ba la ta kar min/ /zhu 'am ma zhu'i dogs skyes na/ /slar yang chu tshan btung bar bya/ /des ni sgregs pa dag 'gyur zhing/ /de las khong yang yi ger 'ong/ /nang
55b7(mdo 'grel): par 'thung dam 'thungs pa dang/ /'thungs par gyur che kha zas ran/ /gshar do bad kan mi bskyed dang/ /shin tu snum min 'dras min za/ /kha lag chu don gyis bkru zhing/ /bud med mi bsten mtshan mo nyal/ /shugs dgag drag 
56a1(mdo 'grel): shul las rnams dang/ /khro dang mya ngan nyin tshan grang/ /bser bu'i khar 'dug rta zhon 'gro /mang smra rab mtho'i stan la 'dug /rngas ni rab mthor ba dma' dang/ /nyin nyal dung rdul gnas pa spang/ /gang gi nyin mo 'thungs
56a2(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /de ltar gzhan la'ang spang bar bya/ /rim 'di las rnams thams cad dang/ /nad zad pa las spyad par bya/ /zhi ba'i snum gyi nyer spyad ni/ /bkru sman btang ba lta bur bya/ /lto snyi zhun mar zhag gsum btung/ /lto sra ba yis zhag
56a3(mdo 'grel): bdun btung/ /yang na ji srid snum par btung/ /de phan chad ni goms par 'gyur/ /rlung ni bde gyur me drod 'bar/ /bshad pa snum zhing mi sri la/ /snum mi 'dod cing snyoms 'gyur ba/ /snum legs yin te rtsub go bzlog /snum grags
56a4(mdo 'grel): pa yis skya ba dang/ /sna dang kha rkub las 'jig 'gyur/ /tshad dang mi ldan dus min gnod/ /zas dang spyod lam log pa yis/ /snum chos byed skrad gzhad 'brum dang/ /khong rma rengs shing sems myos dang/ /g.yan pa mdze dang rims
56a5(mdo 'grel): skyug gzer/ /lto lbos mgo 'khor la sogs 'gyur/ /de la bkres skom skyug sman dug /zas skom sman ni rtsub pa dang/ /dar ba chad snying tshad ma dang/ /'bru rgod cing tse khre rgod dang/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras gsum pi pi ling/ /ba gcin
56a6(mdo 'grel): gu gul a ru ra/ /nad dmigs so so ji bzhin du/ /snum las nad gyur bcos thabs yin/ /rtsub pa dag ni smyung? byas dang/ /shin tu byas dang 'dra ba yin/ /rlon dro skams las byung snum/ /sha khu btung shing dugs spyad bya/ /khrus byed
56a7(mdo 'grel): pa'am skyug sman gtong/ /snum byas zhag gsum gnas par bya/ /nyin zhag zhan pa gcig cig ni/ /de bskyed pa yis bad kan bskyed/ /sha che tshil cha bad kan mang/ /me yi 'ju drod mi snyoms dang/ /snum la goms pa'i snum bya rnams//
56b1(mdo 'grel): de ni sngon du rtsub chos bya/ /de nas snum byas sbyangs 'gyur na/ /de la snum nad mi 'byung ngo/ /snum la goms par 'gyur bas ni/ /dri ma mthon par nus pa yin/ /byis pa rgan pa la sags pa/ /snum pa'o bar ni mi nus la/ /skyo bar mi byed sbyor ba
56b2(mdo 'grel): 'dis/ /'phral du snum ni sbyar bar bya/ /de la mar brngos sha khu dang/ /ma dad brngos pa'i thugs pa'am/ /til che snum bcas bu ram chung/ /bcas dang dkri sar dang ni/ /'o thug mar mang dro ba'am/ /bur ma zho dang bcas pa 'am/ /thug pa snum
56b3(mdo 'grel): ni bzhi pa la/ /lnga pa 'bras dang ldan par bya/ /bdun pa de dag 'bral snum bya/ /snum rnams lan tsha cher btab pa/ /de ni bad kan bskyed rtsub min/ /'phra zhing rdo la lus khyab byed/ /mja dang skra nad gcin si la/ /bu ram bcas zas 'o ma sha/ /til dang
56b4(mdo 'grel): ma sha chang dang zho/ /snum bya'i don du mi bya'o/ /'bras gsum pi pi ling gu gul/ /a rur la sogs bskol bas/ /de dag snum la ji bzhin du/ /gnod pa med par sbyar bar bya/ /nad kyis nyams chung gyur pa la/ /lus drong stobs
56b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed nus pa btang/ /skyes bu snum la brtan par byed pa rnams/ /nang gi drod 'bar khod pa dag pa dang/ /lus zungs 'phral rta stobs dang mdog bzang ldan/ /dbang brtan rgas sra lo brgya thub par bshang/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
56b6(mdo 'grel): po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dugs kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dugs sro bcing dang tha mal pa/ /chu dugs dbye bas rnam pa bzhi/ /sro ba gos dang lcags dang ni lag mthil la
56b7(mdo 'grel): sogs mer sror bsro/ /bcing ba shu dag spang ma dang/ /thang shing sha tha buShpa dang/ /'bru kun dri rnams ra sna dang/ /e ra N+Da tsa sha dag dang/ /snum bag tsha dang dar ba dang/ /lo mas sbrus shing tshwa cher btab/ /rlung las byung ba
57a1(mdo 'grel): 'ba' zhig sel/ /bad kan 'dres pa la be'u rug sogs/ /mkhris pa 'dres la shugs sogs kyis/ /brlan pa zhes bya yang yang bya/ /bkri ba snum zhib nus pa dro/ /spu 'jam pags rul mun pas dkri ma rnyed rlung 'joms
57a2(mdo 'grel): lo ma dang/ /dar dang snam bu ras kyis dkri/ mtshan mo dkris pa nyin par krol/ /nyin par byas pa mtshan mo dkrol/ /tha mal pa yi khu ba dang/ /bong ba gyo mo rngo sa phye/ /gas ma'i lo ma 'bru rnams dang/ /lci ril bya ma phub ma rnams/ /thabs rnams
57a3(mdo 'grel): du mas legs bsros pa/ /yul dang dus las dpags te sbyar/ /chu dugs shing bkru ba ran/ /e raN+Da dang ka rany+dza/ /bi'u rug pa dang ardza ka/ shi ri sha dang ba sha ka /'od ma arga ma la ti/ /a ba sha ka'i lo ma krum/ /shu dag la sogs
57a4(mdo 'grel): sman rnams dang/ /gsher sa chung gnas sha rnams dang/ /rtsa bcu nang dmigs ji bzhin du/ /so so'am lhan cig sbyar nas ni/ /snum ldan chang dang tsha dang ni/ /'o mchu sogs kyi btsos la/ /bum pa 'am sbu gu ring po ni/ /bkang la nad
57a5(mdo 'grel): kyis nyam thag pa'i/ /lus ni gos kyis dkris nas su/ /ci bde bar ni snum chu blugs/ /lus la rlung nad zhugs gyur pa/ /de nyid kyis 'dir bkang snod du/ /nad pa zhugs te gnas na ni/ /gcin sri gzhang 'bru ma sogs nad sel//
57a6(mdo 'grel): rlung med phyi nang rlung bcas shing/ /zas 'ju'i dus su dugs dpyad bya/ /nad dang nad pa yul dus kyi/ /dbang las chung 'bring chen bo bya/ bdag na gyis nyen la rtsub bya/ bad kan rlung las rtsu bsnum bya/ /rlung ni ma zhu'i gnas zhugs dang/ /bad kan zhu ba'i
57a7(mdo 'grel): gnas bsten la/ /gnas kyi dbang gis rtsub dugs dang/ /de bzhin snum lngar 'gro dugs bya/ /sta zur dag dang mig dang snying/ /rlig pa nyung duAm bya ba min/ /dugs kyis drang dang zug gzer ba la/ /yan lag mnyan par gyur pa dang//
57b1(mdo 'grel): dal gyis mnyes la khrus byas nas/ /de nas snum gyi cho ga sten/ /dugs grags pa yis khrag mkhris 'khrugs/ /skom brgyal skad 'gags yan lag 'jum/ /mgo 'khor tshigs ni rims 'debs shing/ /tshig gu mang po tal til snang//
57b2(mdo 'grel): lums kyi sgyur bro bar 'gyur te/ /der ni zhi bya'i sman gyis gso/ /dugs dang thal sman me btsa' dang/ /tshad 'khru skyug bro brgyal nad gso/ /dugs ni phal cher lci dro rno/ /de las gzhan pa zhi byed yin/ /gsher zhing brtan 'khru snum pa dang//
57b3(mdo 'grel): rtsub cing sba ba dugs sman yin/ /'jam dang rtsub dang zhi 'jar bag /gsher bag de ni sel byed yin/ /mdor na phal cher kha ba dang/ /bska dang mngar ba de sman yin/ /zhi zhing rtse bcil stobs thob 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i nad rnams
57b4(mdo 'grel): zad/ /bcil drags pags pa sha 'khrums shing/ /'dar snying kha 'gram nad du 'gyur/ /kha chu lag pa pags nag 'gyur/ /bcil drags pa yin nad du bshad/ /shin tu spom dang rtsub pa dang/ /nyam chung brgyal bar gyur pa dang//
57b5(mdo 'grel): dugs drags bcos dgos blo brdol dang/ /skem dang chad nad kyis btab dang/ /rab rib dmu rdzing shu ba mchod/ /mdze nad 'or nad rlung mkhris dang/ /'o ma zho dang mar sbrang rtsi/ /'thungs dang bkru sman btang ba dang/ /lus gnad tshig
57b6(mdo 'grel): dang gzhang nad yod/ /khro dang mya ngan 'jigs pas nyen/ /bkris skom mig ser skya rbab dang/ /gcin nad mkhris nang zla mtshan 'dzag/ /sbrum dang bu skyes dugs mi bya/ /nad tshabs chen 'jam par bya/ /cham pa ?
57b7(mdo 'grel): mi bde/ /skyegs bu lto sbos gshad 'gags dang/ /skad 'gags rlung ni nad rnams dang/ /bad kan be snabs 'khyil zhing lci/ /lus rengs sked pa'i rtsib logs dang/ /sgur dar lto nad 'gram nad dang/ /rlig pa skrangs dang
58a1(mdo 'grel): da rgan nad/ /rtsol dang rlung nad kyi zug dang/ /gcin 'gags thor bu smen bu dang/ /khu ba bkag dang rlung 'khyil la/ /de yi sman gyi dbye ba yis/ /dugs ni so so ji bzhin bya/ /dugs phan me yi sro min ba/ /rlung nad tshil dang
58a2(mdo 'grel): bad kan can/ /rlung med khang par rtsol ba dang/ /gos lci ba dang 'jigs pa dang/ /dkri dang stobs 'gyed dro ba dang/ /chad med bkres dang nyi tshan bzhag /nad gang nang grol gnas pa'i lus gzungs gnas/ /rtsar sor rkang lag rus
58a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang song pa'i/ /nad de dugs kyis bsrul bar byas nas ni/ /khong du bsdus la sbyang pa spyis dbyung bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas skun
58a4(mdo 'grel): sman dang bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /bad kan nad dam 'dres pa yi/ /bad kan rgyas la skyug sman btang/ /de bzhin mkhris pa bkru sman bya/ /rims sar tshad 'khrul thur du ni/ /mkhris pa khrag 'khru glo
58a5(mdo 'grel): gcod dang/ /mdze dang gcin nad 'brum thor bu/ /rkang 'bam mi dran lud pa can/ /dbugs mi bde snying 'phar 'bras mched/ /nu ma'i nad dng ro stod nang/ /khyad par ni ni skyug sman bya/ /skyug sman mi btang sbrum khong rtsug/
58a6(mdo 'grel): bkres dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba/ /byis ba rgan skem sbom snying na/ /blo skam smas dang nyams chung dang/ /rtag tu slon dang mcher pa na/ /rab rib lton srin bu yod/ /rlung khrag 'dren mar gyen du 'byung/ /so nams btang skad
58a7(mdo 'grel): mdzed dang/ /gcin srid mu rdzed skran can dang/ /slon rka drod che gzhang 'brum can/ /rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sras/ /rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no/ /de dag dug mthungs ma zhu dang/ /mi 'phros zas zos ma
58b1(mdo 'grel): gtogs so/ /rtag tu slon pa yan chad dang/ /phal cher ma zhu'i rims dag dang/ /ma zhu ba ni thams cad la'ang/ /dud pas bdug par las kun yang/ /bkru sman gyis gso skran gzhang 'brum/ /'brum bu mig ser ga nogs phyed lci/ /rims
58b2(mdo 'grel): rnying gzhu rdzis dbyig dug dang/ /skyug dang mcher nad skya rbab dang/ /long nang rab rib sngon por gyur/ /mchi 'dzag zhu ba'i gnas na zug /mngal dang khu ba'i gnas kyi nad/ /khong nang rtogs dang srin nang rma/ /dreg nang nam 'chod yan
58b3(mdo 'grel): chad nad/ /gcin bsri bshad ba 'gags pa dang/ /slon bya mje gcin nad sogs yin/ /khrus mi bya ba rims gsar dang/ /drang chung khrag mkhris thur du byung/ /rmas dang gzhar nad tshad pa 'khru/ /khong du brtson lus lto sra dang/ /snum ches pa dang
58b4(mdo 'grel): sken ches pa'o/ /de nas thun mong dus su ni/ /chog bzhin du snum gyis zhe na/ /nya dang ma sha til sogs kyis/ /nad par slon bya'i bad kan bskyed/ /mtshan mo gnyid log zas legs zhu /snga dro'i dus su zas shis byas/ /zas ma zos pa'i ma cung zad snum//
58b5(mdo 'grel): thug par zhun mar ldan pa btang/ /byis pa rgan pa nyams stobs chung/ /sman stobs chung ba nad dbang las/ /chang 'o bur ma shing sha khu/ /nad dmigs ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /sbrang rtsi rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ /sman chad lto ba las dpags te/ /sman la sngags
58b6(mdo 'grel): ni sngon 'das la/ /lkog mar phyin ma'i bar du blud/ /tshangs pas skye dgu'i bdag dang tha skar bu/ /drag po dbang po nyi zla sa me rlung/ /drang srong sman gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ /'byung po'i tshigs kyis khyed ni srung bar shog /drang srong rnams kyi bcud
58b7(mdo 'grel): kyis len pa dang/ /lha rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi lta bu dang/ /klu mchog rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bur ni/ /khyod la sman 'di nye bar gnas gyur cig/ ? gang te/ b+he la dzye gu ru bai DUrya pra b+ha rA dza ya/ /ta thA ga ta ya/ a rd+ha te/ sarb+hya kasaM bud+d+hA ya
59a1(mdo 'grel): tadya thA /oM b+hai Sha ? dzye ma hA b+hi Sha dzye/ sa mud+ga te swAhA/ shar du kha bstan 'thung du bzhug /'thungs nas de la sems dmigs te /yud tsam bsdad la dang khar 'khyil/ /mchil ma de nas slon du gzhug /ma gnod par
59a2(mdo 'grel): ni song mos sam/ /yang na chub 'jam po yis/ /lkog ma lce'u chung ma gnang ba/ /skyug ni bre bar mi drang ngo/ /'byung ba bzlog pa rlon par bya/ /pus mo dang mnyam stan la gnas/ /de ni slon tshe blo gnyis dang/ /'phral ba dag nas bsten
59a3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /de bzhin lte ba btsir ba dang/ /rgyab nas gyen du mnye bar bya/ /de ltar bad kan rno dro kha/ /mkhris pa mngar dang bsil ba slon/ /rlung 'dres bad kan snum pa dang/ /skyur dang lan tshwa dag gis slon/ /ji srid bad kan rgyun chad pa'am//
59a4(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa nang gi bar du skyug /shugs dal pi ling skyu ru ra/ /yungs kar rgya mtsho chu dag gis/ /yang dang yang ni blon du gzhug /de ni slon par ma gyur ba'am/ /sdod pa dang bcas slon pa'am/ /sman ni 'ba' zhig byung gyur na/ /sbyor nyes
59a5(mdo 'grel): de ni mchil ma mang/ /g.yan pa thor bu rims sogs 'byung/ /bde skyug bad kan mkhris pa dang/ /rlung ni rims kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba legs yin sbyor drags pas/ /lbu ba tshon can khrag 'drar snang/ /slon nas
59a6(mdo 'grel): khong smya lus tsha dang/ /lkog skams mgo 'khor mig mi mthong/ /rlung nad mi bzad ldad 'gyur zhing/ /srog gi khrag 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba legs pas slon na ni/ /yud tsam dal gso dud pa gsum/ /gang yang
59a7(mdo 'grel): rul pas bdug pa dang/ /de 'og snum gyis spyod pa bstan/ /de nas dgongs ka nang par ni/ /bkris tshe chu dron gyis bkrus la/ /sa lu rtsa snar 'bras kyis ni/ /thug pa la sogs rim bzhin bsten/ /thug pa gang po g.yos byas ma
59b1(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i/ /khu ba sha khu gsum dang gnyis dang gcig /mchog dang par mdza' ma'i sbyangs pa sbyangs/ /mi yis zas kyi dus su rim bzhin spyad/ /dper na mi chu rtsa dad lci sogs kyis/ /rnam par sngar na rims kyis mched pa na/ /tshe zhing brtan rnams
59b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad mchad par nus/ /sbyangs pa'i nad me thug sogs kyis de bzhin/ /slon tshad chung dang 'bring dang tshan po ni/ /bzhi dang drug dang lam brgyad blon par 'dod/ /de nyid bcu dang nyis ldab sum ldab 'khru/ /bre gang de bzhin nyid ldab bzhi ldab
59b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /skyug sman mthar mkhris bkru sman las byed dang/ /bad kan mthar dbyung 'khru ba mchog tu bshad/ /'khrub gnyis gsum bshad dang bcas mi rtogs/ /'khru ba gzhal te slon la 'thungs ma rtags/ /de nas blon pa de la ni/ /slar yang snum
59b4(mdo 'grel): dang dugs bya ste/ /bad kan dus 'das lto shes nas/ /legs par bkru sman btang bar bya/ /mkhris ba mang zhing lto snyil/ /lo mas kyang ni bkru bar byed/ /rlung shas che zhing lto sra na/ /dur byid sogs kyis kyang bkru dka' / /bkru sman mkhris la mngar dang
59b5(mdo 'grel): bska/? /bad kan la ni kha bas bya/ /rlung la snum dro lan tshwa can/ /mi 'khrun ni chu tshan blad/ /lag pa sres pas de yin/ /lto ba lags par dugs bya'o/ /ma 'khrus de bzhag ldang zas zos/ /nyi ma gnyis par slar yang btung/ /lto ba rab sra
59b6(mdo 'grel): snam dag ni/ /zhag bcu'i bar du yang btung bas/ /slar yang snum pa dugs kyis no/ /lus sbyangs nas ni bkru sman gyis/ /sbyor ba legs par brtags pa dang/ /sngar gyi nyes pa dran par bya/ /snying dang lte na yi ga 'chus/ /bad kan
59b7(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa slongs pa dang/ /g.yan pa lus tsha thor bu dang/ /cham pas 'debs shing bshar rlung 'gag /sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /sbyor legs ji skad bshad go bzlog /bshad bas mkhris pa bad kan rlung/ /rims kyis 'khru
60a1(mdo 'grel): shing 'byung bar na/ /bad kan mkhris pa me chu 'khru/ /skya zhing rnag dang khrag bcas pa/ /yang na sha bkrus lta bu 'am/ /tshil gyi dum bu 'dra nyid dam/ /gzhang 'byung skom dang che ba dang/ /mgo 'khor mig ni phugs
60a2(mdo 'grel): su bros/ /bkru sman grags las 'byung ba yin/ /de bzhin skyug sman grags nang 'byung/ /legs par 'khrus pa de la ni/ /dud bas bdug pa ma rtogs pa'i/ /cho ga skyug sman dang mtshungs pas/ /de nas slon dang 'dra bar bya/ /zas la
60a3(mdo 'grel): rims kyis spyad nas ni /de 'og nar ma'i kha zas bstan/ /sman 'thungs me drod chud pa dang/ /me dag nad kyis nya pa dang/ /zhu pa'i mtshan ma ma mthong na/ /de ni nyin par bsnyung byas la/ /snum dang dug dang sman rnams kyis/ /slongs pa'i
60a4(mdo 'grel): nad kyis nyen ma gyur/ /sbyangs dang khrag ni 'byung ba dang/ /snum chog la sbyar bsnyung ba yis/ /me drod zhan pa nyid 'gyur te/ /de bas thugs sogs rims gyis spyad/ /bad kan mkhris pa bri zhing chung/ /chang 'thungs rlung dang mkhris pa
60a5(mdo 'grel): che/ /de la thug pa mi blung gyi/ /rta ba la sogs rim pa phan/ /skyug sman ma zhu bar nad 'byin/ /bkru sman zhu nas 'byin pa yin/ /de yi phyir na skyug sman dag/ zhu ba la ni bsdad mi dgos/ /steng dang 'og tu 'byung rigs pas/ /gang tshe phyin ci
60a6(mdo 'grel): lag gyur na/ /de tshe skug la rkang bar ni/ /chu dron dag ni blugs par bya/ /lus kyi stobs ni chu drang blugs/ /'khru ba la ni de las bzlog /gang zhig nyams chung nang med dang/ /nad smin pa yis rang nyid ni/ /'khru bar byed cing 'brul yi/ /kha zas
60a7(mdo 'grel): 'byin la der 'khrur gzhug /sngar sbyangs pas ni nyams chud dang/ /nad kyi dkyil chung lus zad ma'i? /lto ni sra sti mi shes la/ /sman ni 'jam zhing chung du blud/ /de ma 'thungs pa mchog yin gyi/ /gzhan du dogs pa bcas mi rung//
60b1(mdo 'grel): nyams chung pa yin dmang pos/ /g.yos gyur cung zad cung zad cig/ sman ni 'jam pos lan mang zhig /de ni nyung 'gyur zhi bar bya/ /ma btsal de ni yun ring du/ /nyon mongs pa'am gsod par 'gyur/ /me drod chung dang lto sra la/ /thal sman rgya tsha mar bcas
60b2(mdo 'grel): pas/ /me yi drod ni bskyed nas su/ /rlung dang bad kan bsal bar bya/ /rtsub cing rlung mang lto sre la/ /rtag tu rtsol ba'i tshul can dang/ /me drod rab tu chel smad/ /mi 'khru bar ni zhu bar 'gyur/ /de la sngar ni 'jam rtse btang/ /de nas snum pa'i bkru sman bya//
60b3(mdo 'grel): sman ni rnon po'i rang bu yis/ /bshad ba cung zad dbyung bar bya/ /dri ma legs par 'khrus nas ni/ /snum khru bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dug gis 'phog dang thor bu byung/ /mdze dang 'or nang me dpal dang/ /mig ser skya rbab za khus nyen/ /ha cang snum
60b4(mdo 'grel): tshes sbyar mi byas kun la bkru sman snum phag btang/ /snum gyis zhen pa la rtsub pa/ /skyug sman la sogs las rnams la/ /slar yang bar skabs su/ /snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya/ /snum rjes la ni stobs bskyed bya/ /lus las nang
60b5(mdo 'grel): rnams bsal ba ni/ /gos kyi dri ma 'khru dang mtshungs/ /snum dang dugs dag ma byas par/ /gang zhig sbyar ba'i las byed pa/ /shing skam 'gugs par byed pa ltar/ /de yi lus na mi rungs 'gyur ro/ /sbyar pa legs par bstan pas ni/ /blo gros
60b6(mdo 'grel): gsal zhing dbang po stobs dang ldan/ /lus zungs brtan zhing khong ba'i mi drob 'bar/ /na tshong dag kyang ring du 'jog par byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas mas btang
60b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung shas che ba'i nad rnams sam/ /rlung la mas btang bsngags pa ste/ /de ni gso ba thams cad kyi/ /mchog ste de yang rnam pa gsum/ /bkrus drags 'jam rtsi mas btang gong/ /de yi gso bya skran dang ni/ 
61a1(mdo 'grel): lto spos dreg nad mcher pa dang/ /'khu ba 'ba' zhig gzer nad dang/ /rims rnying bying dang cham pa dang/ /khru ba rlung dang dri ma 'gags/ /rlig rlug rde'u nad zla mtshan 'jig /rlung gi nad ni mi bzang gso/ /bkrus drags mi bya snum grags dang/ /blo
61a2(mdo 'grel): brdol shin tu sdem ba dang/ /be snabs 'khru dang slon bro dang/ /sbyang byas sna sman btang ba dang/ /dbugs mig bde lung cham gzhang 'brum/ /skyigs bu lto spos me drod chung/ /gzhan skran kha zas bras zin dang/ /lto 'gags bu chu yod pa dang//
61a3(mdo 'grel): mdze can gcin nad sbrang mdog dang/ /sbrum ma zla bdun yan chad do/ /bkrus drags bya nyid 'jam rtsi bya/ /khyad par du ni me drod che/ /rtsub dang rlung nang gcig bus nyen/ /'jam rtsim bya'ang de nyid do/ /de bzhin skya rbab? mig ser dang/ /tshil ches
61a4(mdo 'grel): cham btab zas mi zos/ /bshang ba 'khru bar byed pa dang/ /lto ci ston bad kan can/ /mchil ma mang dang shin tu sbom/ /lto na srin yod rlung 'khyims dang/ /dug dag 'thungs dang 'brum bus btag /rkang 'bam lkog ma'i snga bcas//
61a5(mdo 'grel): de gnyis sbu gu ser sogs dang/ /shing rus 'od mal byas pa/ /ba lang 'jug 'dra bug rdol med/ /'jam zhing drang la kha zlum pa'o/ /lo gcig ma lon la sor lnga/ /lo tshad lo bdun pa yi par/ /tshang ni sor drug yin par bshad/
61a6(mdo 'grel): lo bdun pa yi bdun nyid de/ /bcu gnyis pa la sor brgyad bya/ /bcu drug yan chad sor dgu ste/ /nyi shu phan chad sor bcu gnyis/ /lo gzha dag la na tshod dang/ /stobs dang lus tshad brtags nas ni/ /tshad ni mngon par
61a7(mdo 'grel): bskyed par bya/ /rtsa ba rang gi 'the bor mnyam/ /rtse mo mthe'u chung tshad du bya/ /lo gcig lon ser nas gzung ste/ /de yi phyed phyed kyis bskyed bya/ /gang zhig rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad/ /sor mo gsum rtse shong pa mchog /mutka? ma
61b1(mdo 'grel): sha sran ma ? tshom/ /rgya shug 'bras shos rim bzhin bya/ /rtse ba'i bu ga'i tshad kyis ni/ /mthar ni gag pa gdags par bya/ /lce rtsa rang gi sor gnyis kyis/ /chod par gag pa gnyis pa bya/ /de ni skyal bu gdags par bya/ /ra lug ma he la sogs pa'i//
61b2(mdo 'grel): ? pa legs mnyes sra ba dang/ /mar btsos mu ga thog thug med/ /dring rtsa ris med srab par/ /sman ni legs par blugs pas la/ /srad pus dam par bcing bar bya/ /lgang med rgyal pa'i dpung ba'am/ /byin pa'i pags pa 'am ras stug bzang/ /ni ru ha tshad
61b3(mdo 'grel): dang po mi /lo gcig pa la srang gcig mchog /ji srid srang ni bcu gnyis par/ /lor srang res bskyed por bya/ /bcu gnyis pa nas bco brgyad par/ /de yang bdun cu'i bar tshad ni/ /de phan chad srang nyi shu nyid/ /bkru sman drag tshang ji lta ba//
61b4(mdo 'grel): de yi bzhi cha 'jam rtsi tshad/ /bkru sman drag bya snum dugs bya/ /'jam byas nas kyang stobs thob pa/ /'jam rtsi btang bar 'os shes nas/ /thog ma nyid du 'jam rtsi btang/ /dgun dpyid nyin bar btang de las/ /gzhan du mtshar btang la
61b5(mdo 'grel): la 'dod/ /bsku byug khrus bya sngon thang las/ /bzhi gsum phan zhing yang ba dang/ /snum dang rtsub ches ma yin bza' / /khu ba la sogs zos rjes btung/ /bcags la bshad gci bsal nas ni/ /mal du bde bar gnas byas la//
61b6(mdo 'grel): mthon sman med par mgo smad de/ /glo g.yon gyis ni phab nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bskum nas ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bar bya/ /de nas de la gce'u kha dang/ /gzhang sgo snum gyis bskus nas ni/ /gce'u lang+ga pa'i dbugs
61b7(mdo 'grel): bton la/ /kha bcings lag pa mi 'dar bar/ /rgyab kyi logs su 'dug nas ni/ /shin tu myur dang bul min dang/ /ha cang shugs drag dal min par/ /ran par lan cig kho na btsir/ /rlung ni lhag mar gnas pas na/ /lhag ma cung
62a1(mdo 'grel): zad lus par bya/ /btang nas lus ni gan rkyal bzhag /rku btsos lag pas gdab par bya/ /rting pas mjug tsos brdung bya zhing/ /rting pa bteg la lan gsum bsrig /de nas lus ni brkyang nas su/ /rngas dang bcas pa'i
62a2(mdo 'grel): rting bar ni/ /khu tshur gyis brdung lus kyang ni/ /snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya/ /tshor bas nyen par snum dag ni/ /myur du phyir 'byung mi byed do/ /gal te myur du phyir byung na/ /phan mi byed pas gzhan dag btang/ /me drod che zhing snum byung
62a3(mdo 'grel): na/ /dgod ka kha zas yang pa sbyin/ /'byung ba'i dus kyi dam pa ni/ /thun gsum yin te de phan chad/ /nyid tshan gcig ni bsdad nas su/ /de yi 'og tu reng bu yin/ /snum dbyung phyir ni 'bad bya ba 'am/ /mas btang ba ni rnon po bya/ /shin
62a4(mdo 'grel): tu rtsub pas ma byung zhing/ /snyoms bag la sogs nad med na/ /btang snyoms su ni bzhag par bya/ /de nas mtshan 'das nang par ni/ /bca' sga 'us su bskol chu lam/ /yang na chu mchan 'ba' zhig btung/ /'jam rtsi btang
62a5(mdo 'grel): nas nyin gsum mam/ /nyin lnga lon nas slar btang ba 'am/ /ji srid snum ni 'ju gyur pa'am/ /yang na rlung ni shas che dang/ /rtag tu rtsol byed me drod che/ /khong rtsub pa la nyin re btang/ /de ltar snum ni gsum mam
62a6(mdo 'grel): bzhis/ /snam? gyur rtsa sgo sbyang ba'i phyir/ /mas btang khrus kyis sbyang ba dang/ /snum med lus ni snum gyur btang/ /nyi ma gsum mam nyin lnga na/ /chos grangs bzang zhing dge ba lnga/ /nyin phyed cung zad yol ba'i tshe//
62a7(mdo 'grel): gtor ma bkra shis/ /chog byas/ /snum bskus dug pa bya bshang gci ni/ /bsal zhing shin tu bkris min la/ /skyes bu'i nang dmigs sman la sogs/ /'bad de shes par byas nas ni/ /sman pas de la mkhas pas ni//
62b1(mdo 'grel): mang dang lhan cig mas btang sbyar/ /sman gyi srang ni nyi shu dang/ /po son cha brgyad lhan cig bskol/ /bskol ma de yo bzhi cha yi/ /sman mar rlung la rjes su sbyar/ /mkhris pa bde bar gnas drug cha/ /bdag na shas ches brgyad cha
62b2(mdo 'grel): gcig /yang na kun la sman gyi ni/ /brgyad cha gcig gam ci nas kyang/ /mas btang bska slar mi 'gyur bya/ /bu ram dag ni srang gcig tsam/ /rigs pas sprang rtsi rgya mtsho sogs/ /lhag ma de kun snod cig blugs/ /bum par
62b3(mdo 'grel): chu bskol blangs pa yis/ /sro zhing gzar bus dkrug nas ni/ /rgyal pa'i nang blugs mjug mar ni/ /gtong tshe shin tu tshe grang min/ /shin tu snum min rtsub pa 'ang min/ /shin tu rno min 'jam pa'ang min/ /shin tu bska min sla ba'ang min/ /shin tu mang nyung tsha med
62b4(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ /cha cha skyur ba 'ang de dang 'dra/ /de la mkhas pa gzhan smra ba/ /snum dang sbrang rtsi gnyis so sor/ /srad ni gsum gsum byas nas su/ /rgya mtsho dag ni zho gnyis dang/ /nad med la btang sman srad gnyis/ /khu ba'i sman ni lhag ma kun/ /srang
62b5(mdo 'grel): bcu yongs su sbyar bar bya/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha snum rnams dang/ /sman phya khu ba'i rim pa ni/ /mas btang rgyal bar bcug byas te/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i tshe gar bshad/ /gan rkyal bzhag nas btang ma thag /rngas kyis brten te mas btang la/ /yid ni
62b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan du ma yongs pas/ /'khru ba tsog pus btang bar bya/ /'ong dus dam pa yud tsam ste/ /de las gzhan du 'chi byed yin/ /de la bcos pa'i thabs gyur snum/ /thal sman pa gcin khu skyur sbyar/ /myur bas snum la rno dro ba'i//
62b7(mdo 'grel): mas btang gzhan dag btang bar bya/ /yang na sman gyi ring bu dang/ /bsdang zhing dugs la sogs pa bya/ /rang nyid 'ong bar gyur na ni/ /mas btang gnyis pa btang ba'am/ /lan gsum lan bzhi'i bar du ste/ /ji srid legs
63a1(mdo 'grel): par gyur bar btang/ /de yi sbyor sogs bkru sman dang/ /'dra bar shes bya sbyor legs na/ /chu dron 'jam pos bkrus nas ni/ /sha khu 'bras chan nyung zas sbyin/ /mas btang drag bo'i las rnams kyis/ /dri ma bskyed pas byung gyur pa/ /de ni chu
63a2(mdo 'grel): dron gyis bkru dang/ /kha zas tshul bzhin zos pas 'byang/ /gal te rlung gis nyams thag na/ /slar yang 'phral du 'jam rtsi btong/ /de ni legs dang ma legs dang/ /grags pas snum 'thungs 'drar shes bya/ /gang zhig dus ni cung zad gnas/ /bshad dang bcas
63a3(mdo 'grel): par 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /thur du dbugs dang snum lhan cig /'byung 'gyur 'jam rtsi legs pa yin/ /bad kan la ni mas btang ba'i/ /'jam rtsi gcig gam gsum btang bya/ /mkhris pa la ni lnga 'am bdun/ /rlung la dgu 'am bcu gcig
63a4(mdo 'grel): btang/ /slar yang de la zung min pa /mas btang rjes la bya ba yin/ /bde mkhris rlung la rim bzhin zas/ /yu sha 'o ma sha khu btang/ /rlung 'joms sman ni legs bskol ba/ /dur byid rgyam tshar bcas par bya/ /snum mdar skyur sha khu
63a5(mdo 'grel): dron sbyar/ /mas btang gcig ni rlung la phan/ /n+ya gro b+ha sogs sde mtshan bskol/ /shug sogs ka ra ka ra dang bcas/ /mngar bsil bu ram shing khu mar/ /'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas mkhris sel/ /dong ka la sogs skol ba dang/ /du mo nyung
63a6(mdo 'grel): sogs bcas pa gsum /rtsub dang sbrang rtsi ba gcin bcas/ /rno zhing dro kha bad kan sel/ /gsum bo 'dus pa'i nad la lang/ /gang phyir rim bzhin sel ba yin/ /gsum po de las gzhan pa yi/ /mas btang gso zhes bzhan
63a7(mdo 'grel): mi 'dod/ /gang phyir slar yang spyi ma bya ba'i/ /nyes pa bzhi po yod ma yin/ /nad skyon dag par byed pa dang/ /zhi bar bya ba'i rim pa yis/ /mas btang gsum po nyid brtag cas/ /de skad gzhan dag smra ba yin/ /nad dang sman sogs
63b1(mdo 'grel): stobs las ni/ /'di dag thams cad tshad mar gzhal/ /bkru sman drag btang legs mtshan ma/ /ma mthong bar du 'phro ma bcas/ /dang por snum gcig tha mar lnga/ /bkru sman drag po bcu gnyis te/ /'jam rtsir byas pa mas btang ba'i/ /las ni sum
63b2(mdo 'grel): cur bshad pa yin/ /lus ni bco lnga 'dir gcig ni/ /thog ma'i snum de tha mar gsum/ /drug dang mas btang lnga bar bcas/ /mas btang ba sbyor 'dir brgyad yin te/ /ni ru ha dang snum gsum dang/ /thog ma tha ma gnyis ka'o/ /'jam rtsi 'am
63b3(mdo 'grel): bkru sman bas btang drag /gcig bu lhag par bsten mi bya/ /'jam rtsis nang slong me drod 'joms/ /ni ru ha sa rlung bskyed 'jigs yod/ /de bas snum rjes bkrus drag btang/ /khrus drag btang nas 'jam rtsi bya/ /de ltar rim pas snum sbyar bya/ /mas btang
63b4(mdo 'grel): las ni nyis gsum sel/ /snum gyi tshad ni chung ngu yis/ /tshad dang de ni mnyam byas pa'i/ /snum tshad 'jam rtsi'i tshad du bya/ /de ni byis rgan lam dang khur/ /bud med rtsol zhen pas dug dang/ /rlung nad kyis gzhom me drod chung/ /rgyal bo phyug po la bde
63b5(mdo 'grel): ba/ /yin pas rtag tu bsten par bya/ /nad 'joms spang ba med ba dang/ /stobs bskyed bshang ba bde bar 'byung/ /mas btang bud med ro smad kyi/ /mngal dang mo mtshan nad rnams la/ /bkrus grags gnyis gsum gyis dag par/ /mas
63b6(mdo 'grel): btang gong mas btang bar bya/ /de yi gce'u nad pa yi/ /sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /zlum zhing ba lang 'jug ma 'dra/ /rtsa ba dbugs su gag pa gdags/ /rtse mo yungs kar shod pa tsam/ /'jam pa gser la sogs la byas/ /kun ? sri
63b7(mdo 'grel): shing so man/ /me tog rtse mo ltar zlum phra/ /de yi rgyal bu 'jam zhing yang/ /tshang srang phyed dam gar rigs bya/ /de nas khrus byas zas zos la/ /'jam rtsi btang ba'i chog bya/ /khri stegs spus mnyam 'jam pa la/ /drang zhing bde bar 'dug
64a1(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /pho mtshan rdeg cing drang bar bya/ /spubs sbyang phyir ni thur ma ni/ /'jam ba rims kyis gzhug par bya/ /de dag pho mtshan dang 'tsham pa/ /'bras bu'i mthar thug par btang ba/ /mi 'dar 'jam rtsi rdo ltar bya/ /btsir de btang
64a2(mdo 'grel): la snum rjes bya/ /'jam rtsi'i rim ba bzhin du bya/ /mas btang cho ga 'di yis ni/ /gsum mam bzhi yi bar du btang/ /lhag ma 'jam rtsi ji lta bar/ /'di la thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /bud med zla mtshan dus su ni/ /mngal bya bas
64a3(mdo 'grel): na chags par 'gyur/ /de phyir de che btang bar bya/ /rab na dus min par yang btang/ /mo mtshan nyams dang gzer ba dang/ /mdal khrag rtag tu 'byung btang ba/ /gce'u sor bcu rtse mo yis/ /khu ga mung+ga shong sor bzhi/ /mngal gyi gnas su
64a4(mdo 'grel): btang bar bya/ /sor gnyis gcin 'bab lam du btang/ /gcin 'gags pa yi nad rnams la/ /bu mo rnams la sor gcig btang/ /'bring chad srang ni gcig pa ste/ /bu mo rnams la srad phyed nyid/ /mal du gan kyal 'dug nas ni//
64a5(mdo 'grel): brla ni legs par bskum sa nas su/ /pus mo bstod de nyid zhag ni/ /gcig la lan gsum lan bzhi btang/ /de ltar mas btang zhag gsum la/ /snum gyi tshad ni bskyed par bya/ /de nas zhag gsum mngal gso nas/ /slar yang zhag
64a6(mdo 'grel): gsum btang bar bya/ /skyug sman byas la phyed bkru sman/ /de nas zla phyed nas bkru drags/ /bkrus drags 'phral la 'jam rtsi btang/ /khrus btang zhag bdun nas 'jam rtsi/ /dper na le brgan le sogs bsres ba yi/ /gos ni
64a7(mdo 'grel): chu las tshon len ltar/ /de bzhin bangs? bar byas lu ba las/ maS btang ba ni ? 'byin/ /lus kyi yan lag nad grol dgu tu song nad dang/ gnad dang lus stong yan lag kun khyab nang/ /gang zhig yod pa de las skye ba'i rgyu/ /rlung ma rtogs pa gzhan dag yod ma yin//
64b1(mdo 'grel): bshad dang bad kan mkhris sogs nang sogs pa/ /gang phyir 'thor zhing sdus par byed pa yin/ /de ni rab 'phel 'gyur la zhi ba'i phyir/ /'jam rtsi ma gtogs sman gzhan gang yang med/ /de bas gso ba ma lus la mas btang/ /gso ba'i phyed
64b2(mdo 'grel): yin zhes ni la la 'dod/ /de bzhin nad rnying glo bur skyed byed la/ /gtar gang brag dbyung sman nyid 'gyur ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas sman sna nas btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u
64b3(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya'o/ /nam tshong yan chad nad rnams la/ /lhag par sna nas btang ba phen/ /sna ni klang pa'i sbo yin te/ /des na de nas nad de 'joms/ /bkru sman klang pa'i nang rnams la/ /blong bag lkog nang mchi ma 'dzag /skan dang thor bu srin rmen bu/ /mdze
64b4(mdo 'grel): snyoms tsham bas btab la btang/ /blta ba rlung las byung gzer dang/ /klad pa phyed na skad 'gags dang/ /sna dang kha bskams tshig mi thon/ /mig dbye dka' dpung bskyod dka' btang/ /zhib mig sngon sdong pags nad/ /skra yi skyon mig dmar la btang/
64b5(mdo 'grel): dang po rang sbyor ji lta'i snum/ /sman gyi lde gu sogs bskol dang/ /shing mdar rgyam tsha chang rnying sogs/ /ci rigs par ni bskol ba btang/ /blta ba 'u su'i khu ba dang/ /sha khu khrag dang chu 'ang sbyar/ /zhi ba snga ma'o ma dang/ /chu dang bcas par sbyar bar
64b6(mdo 'grel): bya chen? can dang ni tshang bran te/ /'di yi snum chad rnam pa gnyis/ /lde gu la sogs btsir ba yis/ /rno de spyi bo'i bkru sman yin/ /phyed ma bud pa'i bkru sman te/ /sbu ku sor drug kha gnyis pa/ /nang na sman dang bcas pa dag/ kha yi
64b7(mdo 'grel): dbugs kyis bus te btang/ /nges ni mgo nad mang po yang/ /phye ma yin bas 'byin par byed/ /'dzub mo'i tshigs ni gnyis pa'i bar/ /bsnyugs pa'i phyir phyung gyur pa las/ /thags pa bcu 'am brkyang dam drug/ ji srid 'dzag bar gyur bdag/
65a1(mdo 'grel): sna nas mchod tshad che 'bring chung/ /rim ba de nyid kyis shes bya/ /lde gu la sogs thig ba ni/ /gnyis kyis phri ste btang bar bya/ /chu dang chang dang sbyar dug mar/ /'thungs ba'am 'thung bar 'dod pa dag /kha zas
65a2(mdo 'grel): zos dang mgo bkrus dang/ /'khru bar 'dod dang gtar ga byas/ /cham sar shug 'ong gis gzer dang/ /bu btsas lung pa dbugs mi bde/ /sbyang byas mas btang chog byas/ /de bzhin dus min yul dmus la/ /sna sman btang bar mi bya ste/
65a3(mdo 'grel): tshab sa chen nad sogs ma gtogs so/ /de nas sna nas sman btang ba/ /bad kan dbang mkhris nyin phyed/ /rlung can phyi 'bring mtshan mo btang/ /nad med ba la ston ka dang/ /dpyid kyi tshe na snga dro gtang/ /dgun ni phyed dus so ka'i tshe//
65a4(mdo 'grel): phyed 'brad dbyar ni nyi dron bcas/ /klad pa rlung nad kyis thebs dang/ /skyigs bu btab dang mgo 'dar dang/ /gnye 'u rengs skad ni 'gags pa la/ /nyin re nang par dgongs ka btang/ /gzhan la nyin rer bar bcas la/ /nyi ma bdun du
65a5(mdo 'grel): de spyad bya/ /rtag tu bya ba'i las byas nas/ /dang po mgo snum bsku dugs bya/ /rlung med mal du gnas nas ni/ /nam tshod yan chad dugs kyang bya/ /de nas gan rkyal lus drang rkyang/ /rkang pa lag pa legs brkyang la/ /rkang pa
65a6(mdo 'grel): cung zad bstod nas su/ /mgo go yid tsam dmang par bya/ /sna khung gcig ni rab bkag la /rim gyis yongs su blugs bya ba/ sman ni chu don gyis sros la/ /sbu gu 'am ras bal gyis blugs bya/ /blugs nas rkang mthil
65a7(mdo 'grel): phrag pa dang/ /lag pa rna ba la sogs mnye/ /rim gyis rlugs la glo gnyis su/ /mchil mdor? la de nas ni/ /sman ni zad par 'gyur gyi bar/ /lan gnyis lan gsum snang btang spyad/ /gal te brgyal gyur bsil ba'i ?
65b1(mdo 'grel): mgo ma gtogs par gtong bar bya/ /bkru sman 'og tu snam dag ni/ /nad sogs tshul dpags de btang/ /sna sman btang mthar gan rkyal du/ /grangs brgyar de las bsdad par bya/ /dud pa rdubs la chu dron 'jam/ /gre ba mtshul pa dag phyir bya/ /snum
65b2(mdo 'grel): btang lags rgyur dbugs bder rgyu/ /gnyid log sad bde dbang po gsal/ /nyes pas mig 'gyur mig btsum skam/ /sna dang kha skams klang stong snyam/ /snum drags g.ya' dang lci ba nyid/ /mchil mang cham 'debs yig 'chus/ /legs
65b3(mdo 'grel): bkrus mig gsal yang ba dang/ /kha dang skad ni dag par 'gyur/ /bkrus nyen nad ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bkrus drags khong ni rmya bar tshang? phran glo rdol ring pa dang/ /byis pa rgan po skyid par gnas/ /dus min char 'bab par yang btang//
65b4(mdo 'grel): de ni cham pa drag btab dang/ /chang 'thungs rna ba 'on pa dang/ /klang rgyas srin bu zhuD bas ? nang bsdus phyir na mi phyung/ /chad phra ba ni gtang mi bya/ /nyin mtshan zas zos rlon nyid nyal/ /mdza' dang bud med lam ngal dub/ /mgo bskus 'khur bskang
65b5(mdo 'grel): dbo ba'i rjes/ /bshang gci mig sman btang rjes dang/ /so shing gi rjes dgos pa yi/ /rjes la thigs pa gnyis ba btang/ /lnga yis dang po'i bu ga dag /gsum gyis rim bzhin dal ba sel/ /lnga pos mig ni gsal bar byed/ /so
65b6(mdo 'grel): brtan rlung nang zhi bar 'gyur/ /sna sman la bdun ma lon dang/ /brgyad cu 'das la btang mi bya/ /bco brgyad ma lon dud mi bdug /'khur bskang lnga ma lon la min/ /lo bcu ma lon sbyang mi bya/ /bdun cu 'das la'ang mi bya'o/ /skyes
65b7(mdo 'grel): nas rgas pa'i bar du ni/ /tshong chung mas btang lta bur bsngags/ /de ni rtag tu brten gyur na/ /tshang che bltar yon tan bskyed/ /'di la bsdams pa gang yang med/ /gnod las chad chen ltar 'jigs med/ /sna sman don du til mar nyid// 
66a1(mdo 'grel): rtag tu bsten pa bsngags pa yin/ /mgo ni bad kan gnas yin phyir/ /snum gzhan bde gnas la mi bsngags/ /myur byed ring zhig byed ba dang/ /yon tan tshe ? chun byed ba'i/ /khyad par tshad chen tshad chung la/ /gal te
66a2(mdo 'grel): med par gyur na ni/ /grang zhig spang byas gnod byas ba'i/ /tshad chen dag ni su zhig ston/ /snum dangs btung ba rtag bshad du/ /spyil bu rlung dang tshad bar gnas/ /'jam lci tshad chen mas btang tshang/ /de dang 'dra bar rnam par brtan /dza la
66a3(mdo 'grel): sgron shing dzi biM ti/ /sla sgang shing tsha pu shel tse/ /go bi tsan dan skyer pa'i rtsa/ /shing mngar gla ba a ka ru/ /nye'u shing bilba puN+Da ri/ /ud+pal murba par+Ni gnyis/ /'bri ha ti gnyis bi tad+ga/ /gan d+ha pa tra suknel dang/ /ha re nu ga pad+ma yi/ /ge
66a4(mdo 'grel): sar dang ni ba la ste/ /sman ni 'di rnams cha mnyams la/ /tshar ba'i chus ni bskol bar bya/ /til mar las ni sman gyi khu/ /bcu gyur lhag bca' de la ni/ /til mar chu dang bskol bya ba /lan bcu nyid ni bskol nas ni/ /chos pa yi
66a5(mdo 'grel): ni bcu cha la/ /de mnyam ra yi 'o ma blugs/ /snar btang til mar yon tan che/ /thigs bran zhes bya 'di bsten bya/ /sna nas btang ba'i sman bstan pas/ /phrag pa mgrin pa dpung mgo ni/ /mkhregs shing mtho la pags
66a6(mdo 'grel): mdog gsal/ /dbang bstan skra dkar med par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu ba'o// //de nas sman gyi dud ba btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad bar bya'o/ /nam
66a7(mdo 'grel): tshod yan chad bad rlung las/ /byung ba'i nad rnams mi skye dang/ /skyes ba rnams ni bsal ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rtag tu dud pa rdub/ /de ni 'jam dang bar me rno/ /rlung dang bad rlung bad kan la/ /btang ngo mkhris khrag gis nyen dang//
66b1(mdo 'grel): bkrus dang dmu rdzing za khu nang/ rab rib sbos dang stong rlung nang/ lkog nad mas btang byas pa dang/ /nya dang chang dang 'o ma zho/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang dug 'thungs sogs/ /mgo nad skya rbab nang can ni/ /mtshan nyid ma log la mi btang/ /gal te
66b2(mdo 'grel): dud pa cher rdubs na/ /khrag dang mkhris 'phal 'on dang lod/ /skom dang brgyal dang rmongs bar byed/ /de ni bsil ba'i cho ga phan/ /bkres sbrid glal dang bshad gci gsal/ /bud med bsten dang gtar ga btag/ rkod dang so shing bcas pa
66b3(mdo 'grel): yi/ /mthar ni dud pa 'jam po btang/ /dus 'di dag dang mtshan zas zos/ /sna sman rjes la bar ma rdug /gnyid log sna sman mig sman khrus/ /slon ba'i rjes la rnon pos bkra/ /mas btang gce'u 'drar byas ba'i/ /dud gce'u sbubs gsum
66b4(mdo 'grel): drang por bya/ /rtsa ba 'thob shod rtse mo ni/ /rgya shug shod ba'i tshad du bya/ /de yi tshad ni rdub byed ba'i/ /sor ni nyi shu sum cu gnyis/ /bzhi bcu sna dang bar ma dang/ /'jam po la ni rim bzhin bya/ /drang por 'dug cing de las sems/ /kha gang das
66b5(mdo 'grel): nas ni lan gsum rdug /sna khung re re bkag nas ni/ snar ni dud pa rdub par bya/ /mgo dang snar gtogs nang skyob pa/ /dang por sna nas rdub par bya/ /bskyod ba'i don du kha nas rdub/ /gre bar gtogs pa de las bzlog/ dub kha nyid nang blon gyi/ /snar blon mig
66b6(mdo 'grel): la gnod par byed/ /du ba rdub dang 'byin pa yis/ /lan ni gsum gsum rdub par bya/ /'jam po nyin gcig lan gcig btang/ /bar ma lan gnyis sbyor ba ni/ /lan gsum lan bzhi btang bar bya/ /der sman gu gul a ka ru/ /gla sgang rdo dreg
66b7(mdo 'grel): s+the le ya/ /spang spos u shir ba la ka/ shing cha go n+tir shing mngar dang/ /bi la rkang e la ba lu ka /? dkar sh+ri be ta ka /bla ba sbrang tshil bya ma ka /bog nag gur gum ma sha dang/ /kun tu rung dang nas dang til/ /snum bcas 'bras bu snying
67a1(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang mar/ /zhib pog gnag rgya skyegs dang/ /rgun 'brum pad+ma ud+pa la/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad+ha/ /u duM ba ra bla ka sha dang/ /seng phrom shun pa khar dang/ /shing mngar klu shing shug pa rtsod/ /dri las
67a2(mdo 'grel): rgya spos ru rta bskol/ /rnon po dzo te sma ti dang/ /skyer pa dang ne tsa ba bcu/ /ldong ros ba bla rgya skyegs dang/ /gi ri kar kar 'bras bu gsum/ /dre yi sman la dos rno ba'i/ /mgo ba'i bkru sman sde tshen no/ /de dag zhag gcig chu spangs la/ /dus ba'i sman
67a3(mdo 'grel): rnams brtaD nas ni/ /thur ma sor ni bcu gnyis la/ /lan lnga'i bar du byug par bya/ /bdar bu mthe bo tsam sbom la/ /nas kyi dbyibs dang 'dra bar bya/ /grib mas sgam zhing khong stong med/ /snum gyis ji bzhin bskus byas la/ /rdub phyir me yis bsregs nas ni/ /dad ba'i
67a4(mdo 'grel): gce'u dang sbyar bar bya/ /kham phor kha sbyar bu gar ni/ /gce'u sor bcu 'am sor brgyad pa/ /bcug pa kha nas dud pa ni/ /lung pa can gyis rdub par bya/ /dud pa rdubs la lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /skad 'gags gnag dang dri mi zhim
67a5(mdo 'grel): gdong skya/ /skra skyon rna mi 'dzag g.ya' rmong bag dang/ /skoms dang skyigs bu cham pa'i nad mi 'byung/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi la'u nyi shu rtsa gcig ba'o// //de nas sman gyi khu
67a6(mdo 'grel): bas 'khur ba sgang pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /'khur bkad rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /snum dang zhi byed sbyong rma 'tshog /de las gsum ni rlung la sogs/ /gsum btang tha ma rma la phan/ 'dir snum mngar skyar lan tshe?
67a7(mdo 'grel): dang ? tsha ni snum ni bskom ba yin/ /zhi byed lha bska mngar sman bskol/ /sbyong ba kha dang tsha dang skyur/ /rma 'tshob byed pa kha ba dang/ /bska ba'i sman ni bskol bar bya/ /de la snum dang 'o ma dang/ /sbrang rtsi chu dang tsha dang chad/ /ba gcin 'bru yi
67b1(mdo 'grel): khu ba rnams/ /sman ni ji lta ji ltar dang/ /lde gur bcas pa bskol ba ni/ /ji tsam bzod ba rnam par spyad/ /so rtse so ni 'bul ba dang/ /rlung las gyur ba'i kha nad la/ /dro 'jam tsam ma ma bsil ba yi/ /til chus khur ba bkad ba phan/ /rtag tu 'khur ba
67b2(mdo 'grel): ? ste bzhag/ til mar dag gam sha khu bsngags/ /kha dror che tsha chos pa dang/ /'phral du rma ni byung ba dang/ /dug dang thal sman mes tshig la/ /zhun mar dag dang 'o mas dgang/ /sgrang rtsis khur bkang byas pas ni/ /kha yi dri ma spyod byed cing/ /kha yi
67b3(mdo 'grel): rna zhi tshob byed yin/ /kha tsha skom dang rab zhi byed/ /ro mi tshor dang dri che ba/ /kha man ma 'bras rtsabs bkang pas sel/ /de nyid cung zad tsha bcas bsil/ /kha skam sel bil dad ma pa yis/ /thal sman rnon 'khrus la bur bkang? dag /bad kan sogs
67b4(mdo 'grel): pa myur du sel/ /chu tshan dro 'jam 'khur bkang bas/ /kha ni yang zhing bde bar byed/ /rlung med nyi tshan bcas par ni/ /phrag pa 'jing pa dugs bya mnye/ /khur ba bkang nas gdong pa ni/ /cung zad brteg ste ji srid na/ /bad kan gyis ni kha gang ba'am/ /sna
67b5(mdo 'grel): mig 'dzag pa'i bar dru bzhag/ /ba bkad mi sbo bzhag 'khur bkang/ /gzhan du khar rdubs par 'gyur ro/ /khar rdub pa yis khyad par gso ba ni/ /gnye'u rengs mgo mig rnad nad kha nad dang/ mtshil ma dre nad snyig ga sra ba dang/ /snying 'phar snyom dang cham pa
67b6(mdo 'grel): yig 'chus/ /'khung bkang bshad ba'i sman rnams kyis/ /lde gu sman khu phye ma ste/ /kha mur bya ba rnam gsum yin/ /de ni bad kan nang la btang/ /gdor bskrus gsum ste nad sel dang/ /drag sel kha dog bzang byed ba'o/ /de dro bad kan rlung la
67b7(mdo 'grel): bsngags/ /ltag ma la ni rab bsil ba/ /de ni tshad spangs sor bzhi cha/ /sum cha phyed de rnam pa gsum/ /ma bskams bar du de bzhag ni/ /bskams ni pags pa la gnod 'gyur/ /de nas spangs nas bkru bar bya/ /de yi rjes la bsku byug
68a1(mdo 'grel): bya/ /nyin bar nyid log mang smra khro/ /mtshon nyin tshan mya ngan bang/ /de ni cham pa sna sman btang/ /ma zhu 'bram 'thams yi ga 'chus/ /mtshan nyid ma log la mi blta/ /de ni legs par sbyar ba yis/ /dus min skra dkar ngo
68a2(mdo 'grel): khams dang/ /gnyer ma rab rib mig sdo sel/ /rgya shug snying go ba sha ka'i rtsa/ /sred phrom yungs kar dkar po rnams/ /se ha'i rtsa ba til nag dang/ /skyer ba'i shun pa rme bu rnams/ /'jag rtsa tsan dan u shi ra/ /shirsha sha ta buShpa 'bras/ /ku
68a3(mdo 'grel): mud utpal ka la ha ra/ /? shing mngar tsan dan rnams/ /ka li ya ka u shir til/ /spangs spos rgya sbos shug pa rnams/ /da yis? kun da stag tshor ba/ /shing mdar rgya spos a ru ra/ /de ? tshig bcad phyed kyis bshad/ /rgu ba
68a4(mdo 'grel): dgun stong sogs drug sbyar/ /gdong bsku ba la goms pa rnams/ /mthong ba stan par 'gyur ba dang/ /gdong ni yongs su ma rnying la/ /'jam zhing pad+ma 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bsku dang blugs dang ras bal dang/ /pags pas g.yogs
68a5(mdo 'grel): dang rnam pa bzhi/ /de ni spyi bo'i til mar te/ /phyi bzhin du ni yon tan che/ /del? bsku ba tsub pa dang /g.ya' dang dri ma can la sbyar/ /blugs pa glog pa glad gzer dang/ /tsha dang rma smin gnag la btang/ /ras bal snum can skra 'bye dang/ /gza'
68a6(mdo 'grel): zhugs mig ni rengs la btang/ /bags pa bcings mgo bo tshor ba med/ /kha yo gnyid ni yar ba dang/ /kha dang sna skam rab rib dang/ /ma bzang mgo nad dag la sbyar/ /de yi chog khre'u ni/ /bus mnyam 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ /lus
68a7(mdo 'grel): bkrus bsku zhi? 'dugs byas la/ /dgongs ka ba'am ma nye yi/ /pags pa mgo bo dang mnyam la/ /rgyar ni sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /rna ba'i mthar thugs par bcing pa/ /'phral ba gos kyis dkris pa ni/ /gos sam lan pus bcing byas
68b1(mdo 'grel): la/ /ma sha'i lde gus bsku bar bya/ de nas nang dmigs ci 'dra la/ /snum bskol ba ni drod 'jam tsam/ /de ni spyi bo man chad nas/ /? drungs sor gcig nub tsam blugs/ /kha dang sna mchul phyin par bzhag /de ni rlung sogs nang rnams la/ /stong
68b2(mdo 'grel): phrag bcu dang brgya drug bzhag /nang med pa la stong phrag gcig/ mar sar phrag pa la sogs mnye/ /de ltar zhag bdun blugs par bya/ /rna ba gang par blugs te bzhag/ rna ba'i rtsa ba mnye bar bya/ /nang rtse zhing kyi bar bya zhing/ /rna ba se gol brgya bar bzhag/
68b3(mdo 'grel): bum mos g.yas ba'i lha ? ni/ /lag rtses bskor ba'i bar dad ni/ /mig 'byed 'dzums ni mnyam pa yi/ /yun ni grangs kyi chad du bshad/ /sbya bor til mar sbyar ba bskus nas ni/ /skrang/ /ra dmar ser skra 'byin gza' zhugs dang/ /mgo
68b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i rlang nad sel zhing dbang po gsal/ /skad gdangs 'gram pa mgo yi stobs skyed byed/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de na sman kyi thigs pa mig tu blug pa dang/ /? gyis mig bsku ba'i cho ga'i le'u
68b5(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya'o/ /mig nad dag mi thams cad la/ /dang por sman thigs blugs bas ni/ /zug nag ya drud mchi ma 'dzag/ mig tsha mig dmar rnam la phan/ /rlung la dren po bad drod 'jam/ /khrag mkhris la ni de bsil bsngags/ /rlung med
68b6(mdo 'grel): gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa mig phyang la/ /nya phyis nang sbyar ras bal ni/ /snyad ba li thigs pa blugs bya ba/ /sor gnyis tsam spangs las mig grwag thig pa bcu 'am bcu gnyis blug/ /de nas gos 'jam dag gis phyi/ /rlung dang bad
68b7(mdo 'grel): kan can dag la/ /gos 'jam gzhan ni chu dron la/ /spangs bas dug ni 'jam bo bya/ /mig blugs bas rab tsha snos/ /na zhing mig dmar rtul bar 'gyur/ /shin tu drang bas zug pa dang/ /'dzum mi shes dang na bar 'gyur/ /grags pas
69a1(mdo 'grel): mig mchu dmar dang drung/ /sbubs cing mig ni 'byed dkar 'gyur/ /shin tu chud pas nad skyel bskyed/ /mgo bas ni thu bar byed/ /bsku legs gnang rtsa sna sul dang/ /kha yi sbubs su sman gyis khyab/ /spyi bor gtogs pa'i nad kyis ni/ /
69a2(mdo 'grel): dri ma cis ni 'byin par byed/ /de nas lus sbyangs mig sman bsku/ /mig tsam la ni gnas gyur pa/ /cung zad skrangs dang shin tu g.ya'/ /rdum chags pas smin shes shing/ /cung zad drung dmar mchims dzag/ mig rdu stug la btang bar bya/ /bad kan dang ni
69a3(mdo 'grel): khrag mkhris dang/ /mchog tu rlung gis gzir lkabs/ /mig sman phyi dang rma gso dang/ /gsal bar mthong ste rnam pa gsum/ /de la phyi ba'i mig sman ni/ /bska dang skyur dang tsha dang kha/ rma gso sman ni kha ba ste/ /gsal sman mdar dang bsil ba yin/ /thur ma sor
69a4(mdo 'grel): bcu dbus 'phral/ /rtse mo sri zhi kha 'bus 'dra/ /phyi ba'i thur ma zangs kyis bskags/ /rma gso lcags nag byas sor tsam/ /bzang po gsal bar byed pa ni/ /gser dang dngul las byas pa bsdags/ /bdar bu khu ba phye ma ste/ /mig sman rnam gsum nyid
69a5(mdo 'grel): du brtags/ /de ni mig nang lci 'bring dang/ /yang ba la ni rim bzhin sbyar/ /mtshan mo nyal dang nyi ma'i gung/ /zos 'thungs nyi ma tsha ba yis/ /mig gi nad ni 'phel ba dang/ /skyel ni skye dang 'khrug par 'gyur/ /de bas de zhi phyir na dgongs/ /nyi ma sprin
69a6(mdo 'grel): bral dus su bsku/ /gzhan dag smra ba nyin par ni/ /mig sman rnon po btang mi bya/ /bkrus pas nyams chung gyur pa'i mig /nyi ma bltas na gnod par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo gnyid ni log pa dang/ /zla dus yin pas ltas 'gyur te/ /mig ni ma yi
69a7(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin pas/ /bsil bas gnod med bstan par 'gyur/ /mi gnad bad kan shes che ba 'am/ /phyi zhing gsal bar bya ?/ /rab tsha min pa'i nyin par yang/ /mig sman rnon po blugs par 'dod/ /lcags ni rdo las 'byung ba yin/ /rnob
69b1(mdo 'grel): de nyid las byung yan/ /de nyid kyis ni gnod byed nus/ /mig gi rang bzhin de dang 'dra/ /dgun tsha ma chen mo mig sman ni/ /rnon po phan pa ma yin te/ 'dzag mi 'gyur bas mig rengs dang/ /g.ya' dang mig gsal la sogs bskyed/ /mig sman mi btang 'jigs
69b2(mdo 'grel): dang slan/ /khrus btang zan zos shugs kyis nyan/ /khros dang rims btab mig phyir phyung/ /glad nad mya ngan gnyid ma log/ nyi ma mthong mgo bkrus dang/ /chan 'thungs dud pa ? pa dang/ /kha zas ma zhu nyi tshan gdungs//nyin nyal skom pa la mi gtang/ /mig
69b3(mdo 'grel): sman rab ? 'jam dang nyung/ /mang sla bska dang rtsub pa dang/ /shin tu bsil dang tsha ba yi/ /mig sman bsku bar mi bya'o/ /des nas mig ni ma phye bar/ /dal gyis nad pu khyab par bya/ /mig sman bskus nas mig chu ni/ /cung zad bskyod la mig sman ni/ /rnon po
69b4(mdo 'grel): myur du khyab par 'gyur/ /dbye dang mtshungs par mi bya'o/ /mig mchu gnyis ni bsdam par bya/ /bkru ba dag ni mi bya ba'o/ /gang tshe mig sman gyis bskus pa'i/ /sman gyi rtsom bzhi 'gyur na/ /nad kyi dmigs dang mthun pa yi/ /chu yis de tshe ba kru bar byas
69b5(mdo 'grel): de nas gos 'jam bcas pa yi/ /mthe bong dang ni 'dzub mo yis/ /mig ni ci ran phye ste phye/ /g.yon pas g.yas pa phyi bar bya/ /gzhan du mig sman blug pa yi/ /mig chu khyab pas nad bskyed 'gyur/ /sman gyi g.ye 'ba' ma rtul gyur na/ /rnon?
69b6(mdo 'grel): po'i dud pa rdur bar bya/ /mig sman rnon pos cha gyur na/ /slar 'chos mig sman bsil byed gzhug /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o// //de nas mig blta ba'i chog dang/ /mig sman
69b7(mdo 'grel): gyi phur ma bsres shing btsos pa'i khu ba mig du blugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mig 'dzums mi shes rengs bag dang/ /skam dang rtsub dang snang ba dang/ /rlung mkhris nang gyur zhu ma bag dang/ /rdzi ma byi zhing g.yogs par mthong//
70a1(mdo 'grel): dbye dka' rtsa ni brtse ba dang/ /mig gi rtsa 'gyur mi mthong dang/ /dmar zhing mchi 'dzag glang phyed na/ /rlung na kun 'gro ling gtog can/ /mig nad rtse zhil mchi ma 'dzad/ /na zhing dmar la rdul ma chags/ /thun mongs dus su nang
70a2(mdo 'grel): der? ma/ /dgongs ka gan rkyal nyal nas ni/ /lus dang mgo spyad rlung med pa'i/ /gnas su blta ba'i sman btang ngo/ /nas sam ma sha'i rjen zan gyis/ /mig sbubs mdza' bskor mnyam pa ni/ /dbangs su song gnyis bstan byas la/ /nad dmigs
70a3(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin sman bskol la/ /zhun mar chu tshan la sros te/ /mig ni btsums par blug bar bya/ /mtshan mo mi mthong rlung rab rib/ /dbye dka' soD la tshil zhun blugs/ /rdzi mi'i rtsa nub par bkad la/ /de nas bskyod cing dbye ba ni/ /de ni dal gyis byed du
70a4(mdo 'grel): gzhug/ tshar dag bgrang bya de la ni/ /mig chu mig 'gram dkar nag nad/ /grangs brgya sum brgya lnga brgya dang/ /brgya phrag bdun dang brgyad rim bzhin/ /dkrug dang rlung la grangs stong ste/ /mkhris pa nad med la drug brgya/ /bad kan la ni lnga brgya
70a5(mdo 'grel): bzhag/ de nas mig 'gram 'dzag sgo bya/ /sman mar snod du gzags byas la/ /dud brdubs nas nam mkha' dang/ /gzugs 'tshor ba ni blta mi bya/ /de ltar rlung la nyan dbye/ /mkhris pa nyin res par du bcad/ /bad kan bder gnas gnyis
70a6(mdo 'grel): bar bcad/ /tshim par gyur gyi bar du btang/ /chim pas gsal bar mthong nus shing/ /bde zhing mig yang dri ma med/ /mchim pa las go bzlog yin/ /tshim grags bad kan nad bskyed 'gyar/ /de ni lus kyi snum 'thung ltar// mi
70a7(mdo 'grel): gsal mthong ba nyams chung 'gyur/ /de bas lta ba'i rjes la ni/ /mthong ba'i stobs ni skyed byed pa/ /sngar bshad pa yi mig la/ /phur ma bcos pa sbyar bar bya/ /de ni rlung las snam can te/ /bad kan bcas te phyi ba phan/ /mthong nyams
70b1(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris bcas dang/ /khrag mkhris pa de gnas la gsal byed/ /khung nas mthus tshol slan can gyi/ /tshil dad rkang dang zhag brlon/ /'o ma dag dang btags pa dang/ /'tsho byed dag dang skyar ba'i snum/ /rim rags bya yi mchar bshad ?
70b2(mdo 'grel): tig lcags zangs rgya mtsho dud/ /rgya mtsho'i wu ba lig bu mig/ /ba bla zhig chu sbyar phyir/ /ri dags bya yi mtshar ba rkang/ /lto tshil rgyu ma snyed dad sha/ /mngar bag mar bcas nu zhos sbyar/ /btags pa gsal bar byed pa yin/ /sha dang sman gyi lde
70b3(mdo 'grel): gu ni/ /gong bu srad ba cig so sor byas/ /e ra Na n+ya gro pad+ma yi/ /'o ma snum pos rim bzhin du/ /dkris la 'jim pas byugs la ni/ /? dgon ba'i lci ba'i me/ /'bar bar yi dam su bsag par bya/ /chos nas de yi khu ba bcing?/ /mig
70b4(mdo 'grel): tu blta ba'i sman ltar blugs/ /phyi dang snum dad gsal ba las/ /brgya phrag gcig gnyis gsum par bzhag /dad par dro 'jam phyi lgsil blugs/ /de gnyis rjes la dud pas rdub/ /de ni sbyor ba blta dang mchungs/ /blta dang phur btsos thigs pa
70b5(mdo 'grel): blug/ sna sman mi bya la mi btang/ /ji srid dus ni sman gtong ba/ /de yi nyis 'gyur phrod pa bzang/ /me tog dzA ti ma ? kas/ /mig gcings mtshan mo gnas pa rab/ /sna sman mig sman blta ba la sogs pas/ /mig mthur bskyed phyir kun tu 'bad
70b6(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /mthong ba nyams na 'gro ba sna tshogs ba dang/ /mun ba'i rang bzhin tshul cig nyid du 'gyur/ /yan lags rgyad ba'i snyid por sdus pa las/ /mda' gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //de nas cha dbyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par
70b7(mdo 'grel): bya'i/ /zug rdu rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /lus ni sna tshogs gnod byed pa/ /'byin ba'i thabs su gang 'gyur ba yi/ /dbyad yin de bzhin gzhang 'brum dang/ /mtshan bar rdol sogs lnga ba dang/ /ba tsag bu thal sman ma btab ba'i ? yan lag
71a1(mdo 'grel): lhag ma bsrung phyir dang/ /mas btang la sogs dpyad ma rtogs/ /bum pa ku ba ra dang ni/ /'dzam bu'i tshul sogs dpyad yin/ /gang phyir cha dpyad chog bzhin/ /sna tshogs tshul du gdang bya ba/ /blo yis rnam dpyad bya ba ni/
71a2(mdo 'grel): rags rims tsam zhig bstan pa yin/ /seng ga kang ka dom bya rog/ ri dags bya sogs kha 'dra ba'i/ /mchu can cha dpyad byas nas ni/ /de yi ming yang gdags par bya/ /phal cher lcags kyi rgyu las ni/ /srid du sor ni bco brgyad pa/ /skam pa
71a3(mdo 'grel): 'brel pa'i mtshams su ni/ /sran chung lta bu'i gzer btab pa/ /rtsa ba lcags kyu ltar gug pa'i/ /cha dpyad bde legs yin zhes bya/ /rtse mo g.yung drung lta bu'o/ /de ni brtan par dus zug pa'i/ /zug rdu 'byin la sbyar bar bya/ /gzer btab rtse mo
71a4(mdo 'grel): gyis ba dag/ skam pa yin te sor bcu drug /der ni pags pa rtsa rgyus shar/ /zhen pa'i zug rdu 'byin la sbyar/ /skam pa sor drug zug rdu phra/ /rdzi ma ma rungs 'byin la sbyar/ /so 'phra drang zhang rtsa ba ni/ /gdu bus brgyan pa mu rtsu ti/ /des rma gting du zag
71a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /mig ga dzer? gting du lus la sbyar/ /nya mgo 'dra ba sor bcu gnyis/ /cha dpyad gnyis pa gcig pa bya/ /nya mgo lta bu zhes bshad de/ /rna khu zug rdu 'byin la sbyar/ /cha dpyad sbu gu tsan khong stong/ /rtse mo gcig rkam mang po bya/ /des ni bu
71a6(mdo 'grel): ga'i zug rdu dang/ /nang yod blta dang dbyung ba dang/ /bya ba sla bar bya phyir dang/ dgang bar bya ba'i don du bya/ /de yi zhing dang sbom srid tshang/ /bu ga'i tshad las dpag par bya/ /srid du sor bcu sboms sor lnga/ /gyi? ba'i zug rdu rtog byed yin/ /rtse mo lnga pa
71a7(mdo 'grel): bu gcan/ /rtse mo bzhi pa spyi 'dud bya/ /cha dpyad thur ma gnyis pa ni/ /mug gsum pa de yi tshad/ /cha dpyad bya ba rang dbyibs dang/ /sdom dang chung yi tshad ? mnyam pa'i/ /spu? gu de 'dra gzhan dag kyang/ /tsha dpyad shes ba byed du gzhug rtse mo
71b1(mdo 'grel): pad+ma'i snying po 'dra/ /srid du sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bzhi cha khong stong byas spu gu/ zug rdu 'byin pa yin par bshad/ /gzhang 'brum cha spyad pa yi ni/ /nu song 'dra ba sor bzhi pa/ /skyes pa'i sor lngas? 'khyud pa ste/ /bud med sor drug gis 'khyud bya/ /nad bltar la
71b2(mdo 'grel): sdug? gnyis/ /las la ? gcig pa bya/ /dbus kyi bug sor gsum pa/ /mthe bong shod pa tsam du byas/ /de steng rtse mo zlum po ni/ /dpangs su sor ni phyed pa bya/ /khar dkrol de 'dra bug med/ /cha dpyad gzhang 'brum brtsir la sbyar/ /mtshan mar rdol la rnam kun tu//
