71b3(mdo 'grel): bu g.yan chad bsal bar bya/ /sna yi shu ba'i 'brum pa las/ /bug gcig pa sor gnyis bya/ /zhengs du 'dzub mo'i tshad tsam la/ /mtshan mar rdo gyi dpyad 'drar bya/ /sor mo bsrung phyir ba so 'am/ /shing gi shubs ni ser bzhi bya/ /? yi num dra bug gnyis/ /
71b4(mdo 'grel): de yi kha ni dbye bar bya/ /mo mchan rma btag dbus su ni/ /khong stong sor ni bcu drug pa/ /phyogs bzhir gdu bus bcing bar bya/ /rtse mo pad+ma kha zlum 'dra/ /thur ma bzhi ni mnan pa yi/ /rtsa ba bsdams ? dbye bya/ /cha dpyad 'dzam rtsi sbubs 'dra la/ /rtsub 'theb
71b5(mdo 'grel): shod ce sran shod/ /rtse mo 'gag pa med pa la/ /rtsa bar dpags 'jam rgyal bu bcing/ /rna yi phug ni 'chas pa dang/ /sman bkru ba la sbyar bar bya/ /'od ma'i spu guAm sgro rtsa ni/ /'dra ba kha gnyis mu rdzing dpyad/ /dud pas mas btang la sogs spyad//
71b6(mdo 'grel): rang rang gi ni skabs su smras/ /rngab? sar kha zheng sor gsum pa/ /spangs su sor brgyan pa lam bcu/ /rtse mo'i bu g.yungs kar shod/ /lags bkag nu sor dbyibs 'dra bya/ /bsku ba srid du sor bcu gnyis/ / khyud bskor sor ni bco brgyad pa/ /kha zlum sor ni
71b7(mdo 'grel): gsum mam bzhi/ /nang par bad kan khrag 'dren byed/ /de bzhin bum pa de 'dra ba/ /glan pas skran yang 'ju bar byed/ /thur ma zhes bya'i cha byed ni/ /las dang dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa/ /ci rigs pa yi tshad ldan bya/ /de la rma tshol las la gnyis/ /srin
72a1(mdo 'grel): bu rta sla ? dbyibs/ /bu ga'i nad gi zug rngu 'byin/ /kha ni sran chur byed 'dra gnyis/ /sor brgyad pa dad dbu pa'i tshad/ /thur ma drug ste de la gnyis/ /sar ni bcu gnyis bcu drug pa/ /thal sman btang bsbrul kha 'dra/ /gnyis po sor ?
72a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis bcu pa/ /bskul dpyad kha ni? mda' stong 'dra/ /'byin pa'i cha dpyad lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /phur pa rtsam gug pa ni/ /mngal gyi phur ba zhes bya ste/ /srid du sor brgyad byas pa des/ /bud med mngal du bu shi dbyung/ /rde'u 'byin cha dpyad sprul mgo ?//
72a3(mdo 'grel): gdengs ka 'dra la rtse gug pa'o/ /mda' stong 'dra la sor bzhi pa/ /so dbyung ba la ? bar bya/ /rtse mo ras bal gyis dkris ba'i/ /phyi gsal thur ma drug bya'o/ /gzhad gi nye rang nad la gnyis/ /sor bcu pa dang bcu gnyis pa/ /sna yi sor drug
72a4(mdo 'grel): bdun pa gnyis/ /rna ba'i sor brgyad dgu pa gnyis/ /rna ba bsal la a shadtha'i/ /rtse'am blugs? par kha 'dra bya/ /thur ma 'dzam bu'i thor to 'dra/ /thal sman me btsal so sor gsum/ /'phra sbom rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /rgyu ma'i las la thur
72a5(mdo 'grel): ma ni/ /khar ba 'dra zhing dbus zlum la/ /rtsa bzla ba phyed 'dra bya/ /rgya shug tshig gu ? 'dra ba/ /sna yi thar to 'brum sregs byed/ /sor brgyad pa la rtse mo lcong/ /gsum pa thal sman sman rim la/ /mthe'u chung gung? mo srin lag gi /sen
72a6(mdo 'grel): mo lta bu'i so byas pa'o/ /pho? mtshan spyad dang mig sman sogs/ /cha dpyad rang rang le'ur bshad/ /nye ba'i cha dpyad ?  lod dang/ /thag pa ras dang tho ba dang/ /'breng bu rgyud ma lce rta lnga/ /yal gsen mo kha so dang/ /dus dang smin dang lag
72a7(mdo 'grel): rkang pa/ /'jigs dang dka' ba de'i bya ba'i/ /bye brag thabs ni shes pa'o mkhas pas blo lis dpyad par bya/ /cha dpyad gdud sku? bdag dang dgun srad dag bya dang/ /thal sman gang ? mtshon dbyung bcir 'dab cir ba dang/ /gzhi la dang smad dang bstod
72b1(mdo 'grel): dang bskyod dang bcag pa dang/ /bzlog dang drang por bya ba cha dpyad las rnams yin/ /legs par zug cig 'byin pa byed pa dang gzung bya blangs nas 'byin par byed phyir dang/ /yan lag kun la gnod pa med pa nas/ /cha dpyad kun gyi mchog ni kangka'i
72b2(mdo 'grel): mchu/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po la sdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gtar dpyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mgar ba mkhas pas cho ga bzhin/ /brdungs pa'i gtar dpyad nyi shu drub/ /spu ni chod
72b3(mdo 'grel): par nus pa dag /phal cher sor ni drug par bya/ /gzugs legs so ni legs pa dang/ /bzung bar bde kha nyid du bya/ /ya yo med cing thar legs pa'i/ /shin tu rno ba'i lcags la byas/ /rtse mo shin tu lags brdungs pa/ /utpal sngan pa'i
72b4(mdo 'grel): mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rang smin rjes mthun gzugs can ni/ /rtag tu nye bar bzhag par bya/ /rtse mo re re dag la yang/ /rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang bzhi/ /phal char gnyis dang gsum du bya/ /de nas khyad par dag la sbyar/ /de las dkyil
72b5(mdo 'grel): 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse/ /mdzub sen nad gi dbyibs 'drar bya/ /de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi/ /sha lhag la sogs gzhar dpyad sbyar/ /'phel btsags spu gri'i dpyad par lta bu/ /gcod dang dral dang 'byin pa sbyar/ /rtse drang skrangs nad mtho ba dang
72b6(mdo 'grel): zab pa las sbyar de las gzhan/ /lhag pa ring zhing rtsa gug pa/ /so thung na tshul ji bzhin skyar/ /utpa la dang sor phyed kyis/ /bral dang de bzhin dpyad par bya/ /sprul kha rtse sor phyad rna ba/ /sna yi thor bu dpyad la sbyar/ /rma tshol 'jam
72b7(mdo 'grel): po blta sla ba'i/ /mgo bo 'dras zhal brtag par bya/ /de las gzhan pa kha brtse 'dra/ /rtse sbug can ni dbugs dang sbyar/ /lcang ma'i lo 'dra/ 'bigs pa la/ /sha ri'i chu 'dra mda' bu gi/ kha 'dra rtse gsum khrag gzags? la/ /'jag rtse a
73a1(mdo 'grel): ti'i mchu 'dra ba/ /'bras bu ser gnyis khrag 'byin la/ /de 'dra'i so ni nang du blta/ /bcag 'bras zla ba kham pa 'dra/ /sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod bya/ /rtse mo 'bras dang ?  la/ /sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod
73a2(mdo 'grel): gang/ /de ni rtsa lto'i nang la sbyar/ /sta re spangs 'dra ba lang so/ /'dra ba'i btsag bras rgyar ni sor phyed ba/ /de yi yu byed bstan pa/ /rus pa'i sted gnas rtsa la gdab/ /zangs ma'i thur ma rtse gnyis pa/ /rtse mo me tog kha 'bus 'dra/ /de
73a3(mdo 'grel): yis mthong nyams mig sprin dbugs/ /rgya 'dra'i btsag bu bya ba ni/ /sor gdub 'dra las kha byung ba/ /bcag bras rgyar ni sor phyed pa/ /rigs pas 'phel bcig lta buAm/ /dkyil 'khor lta bu'i rtse 'dra bya/ /de ni 'dzum mo'i thor to
73a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /gdags su rung ba'i skya 'dra bya/ /sras bus bstod la gro ba'i nang/ /nad rnams bcad dang gral la sbyar/ /gre ba'i sha lhag thor tshugs 'dzin/ /lcags kyu rtse mo legs gug bya/ /rus pa gcod pa'i sog le ni/ /srid du sor bcu
73a5(mdo 'grel): zheng sor gnyis/ /so rnams 'phra zhing rab tu rno/ /yu ba chang bzungs legs par bya/ /rma yi chu rgyas skra bcad pa'i/ /chan pa chan pa 'dra bar bya/ /so yi so drang kha gnyis pa'i/ /sen mo'i 'drag bcad sor dgu la/ /zug rdu 'phra
73a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung bcad ba dang/ /dral dang dbugs dang phyi bar bya/ /zur ba zhi pa la sor gcig pa/ /dbyibs ni kun tu gcig 'dra gso byi ba yi btsags dpyed ste/ /so yi dreg pa phyi bar bya/ /khab ni mgo zlum mi zabs che/ /mkhrad pa gsum byed
73a7(mdo 'grel): las ni/ /sha che ba yi phyogs su ni/ /zur gsum srid du sor gsum pas/ /sha chung pa dang rus tshigs na/ /rna yod pa la srid sor gnyis /zhu dad ma zhu'i gnas gnad rma'i/ /khab rtsa 'bras dbyibs gzhu ltar dgu/ /srid du sor ni byed dang gsuM/
73b1(mdo 'grel): khab ni bdun dang brgyad kun yang/ /zlum po sor ni legs sbam pa/ /khri gcig la gtsugs par 'dra ba /btsan sdo gdong nad thig le gnag /skra 'byi ba la btsag par bya/ /kha brgyar zlum pa song byed pa/ /gcig tu sbams la gzar bu 'dra/ /lag pa gnyis kyis/ /btsugs nas
73b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /de yis sna yi khrag dbyung ngo/ /rtsa shal dbugs pa'i snyud? bu ni/ /yu ti ka yi kha 'bus 'bra/ /snyung bu sor ni phyed par bya/ /de yi tshad dbugs de yan chad/ /zur bzhi bar byas de yi ni/ /skrangs smin ma smin dogs la dbugs/ /rna drung sha ni stug po dbugs/ /snyung
73b3(mdo 'grel): bu kha ni sbom po la/ /sum cha sbu gu yod byas pa/ /sor gsum pa yis rna ba dbug/ pad+ma'i thal sman me btsa' dang/ /'chid bu rdo dum sen mo sogs/ /lcags min gtar dpyad phra mo ste/ /de yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /cha dpyad 'khrul 'khor sogs bas gyed//
73b4(mdo 'grel): mkho ba nad kyi dbyibs dang sbyar/ /'dren dang 'byin dang dral dang 'drub/ /dmigs tshol chi bsal zhal zhal gdab/ /btsag dbyed gsheg dbug rtsub pa dang/ /bzung sreg de yi bya ba yin/ /bcad dang dral dang phyi ba'i phyir/ /dpyad kyi btsag 'bras rtsa ba'i bar/ /mdzub
73b5(mdo 'grel): mo gud mo mthe ba mo yis/ /ma yongs pa dang legs par gzung/ /gtar ga gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung/ /mdzub mo dang ni mtho bos bzung/ /'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba ni/ /chad bar bcug ste rtse mo gdab/ /dbyung don yu ba nas bzung bya/ /gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya/ /lta
73b6(mdo 'grel): dpyad sna tshogs dag gi snod/ /gso ras bal snam men dri 'am/ /pags 'jam du kU la ? byed/ /rab tu stug bzheng sor dgu /srid du sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bal gyis bar bcad dbyed bcug la/ /legs par bzhag ste grub ba dang/ /thur mas kha ni rgyu bar
73b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /srin bu pad+ma bder gnas pa/ /khrag dbyung phyir ni spyad par bya/ /chu nang nya dang sbal sogs dang/ /mi ro'i dri ma rnag las byung/ /dmar dang dkar dang shin tu gnag/ mi srun sbom dang 'phyil ba dang/ /'ja' tshon dang ? stog ? yod de rnams drug can yid//
74a1(mdo 'grel): spang bya des ni khrag bzhibs na/ /g.ya' nag 'dzag rims mgo 'khor bskyed/ /de la dugs khrag mkhris gso bya/ /chu mdog rnams par gsol ba dang/ /dug med nya lcibs med las byung/ /rtsa snar ro stong sdo bkra zlum/ /rgyab tu dur mig 'dra lus
74a2(mdo 'grel): ? lto ni cung zad zer ba bzang/ /de yang legs par ma skyugs dang/ /rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag/ chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni/ /khrag gis myos pa yin bas spang/ /de nas cig shos skyer pa btags/ /chu sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug /gany+dzi 'am der ba'i nang du
74a3(mdo 'grel): gzhug /slar yang chur ni dbugs phyung nas/ /mar rams zhag nu zho 'am/ /khrag gi thigs pa bskus 'thung gzhug/ 'thungs tsho ro bstod mtheng gyur na/ /ras sam srab mos g.yog par bya/ /khrag ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las/ /pad+ma dang por nang khrag ni/ /'thungs
74a4(mdo 'grel): te dang ba'i 'o ma dang/ /'dres chu'i 'o ma len dang mtshungs/ /so yis 'debs pa'am g.ya' gyur na/ /de ni slar byung skyug tu gzhug /rgyam tsha til mar gyis kha bsku /phye ma 'jam po rgyab tu gtor/ /slar yang zhag bdun bar du ni/ /khrag myos bsrung la 'thung
74a5(mdo 'grel): mi gzhug /srin bu pad+ma legs skyugs na/ /sngon bzhin khong dri mas brtan par 'gyur?/ /drags nad la zhing snyoms lci 'gyur/ /skyugs ma legs na rengs byos 'gyur/ /bum pa chu dang sa blug pa/ /gzhan dang gzhan du gzhag par bya/ /kha chu rul bag sbyang
74a6(mdo 'grel): phyir bya/ /gzhan du dug dang bcas bar 'gyur/ /ma dag pa'am khrag ma phyung/ /skyer pa bur ma sbrang rtsis bskus/ /lan brgyar bkrus mar ras bal phyis/ /yi'us? byug la sman bsil bsku/ /nad kyi khrag dang bral 'gyur na/ /'phral du rtsa dmar nad med 'gyur/
74a7(mdo 'grel): mdag gnas nas bskyod gyur pa/ /rma yi gnas su 'dug pa'i khrag zhag lon na ni gnags par 'gyur/ /de bas de ni spar dbyung ngo/ /mkhris rgyas khrag gi nang la ni/ /ku ba bum pa sbyar mi bya/ /de gnyis me dang bcas pa yin/ /rlung dang bad kan la sbyar bya/ /bad
74b1(mdo 'grel): kan las gyur nad khrag ni/ /bskabs rngabs ru bzhi pa mi bya/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur khrag ? rus bzhibs te dbung bar bya/ /lus kyi gong du spang bu 'am/ /ras kyis dam du bcings nas ni/ /chub tshogs rus gnas rnams ni/ /dor de zhal zhal gdab par bya/ /gyen
74b2(mdo 'grel): du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni/ /thur du bab ma gdab par bya/ /zas dang nye dang 'phrad mi gdab/ /btab ba'i gnas 'ang? gdab mi bya/ /zhal zhal bya ba phyogs gcig 'dus/ /rtsa mdud srin bus khrag dbyung zhing/ /bem bem por gyur ra sogs gdag/ nad khrad lus khyab
74b3(mdo 'grel): gtar ga gdag /khrag nang 'dus la zhal zhal bya/ /gting na yod pa pad+mas dbyung/ /dpaD gnas ku bum rda bas rus dbyung/ /lus khyab khrag la gtang gnyid/ /rlung sogs gnas la rdabs rung dang/ /pad+mas sku bas rim bzhin dbyung/ /khrag byung bsil bskus la sogs
74b4(mdo 'grel): bas dang rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur te/ /rma nang g.yar zhing skrangs gyur na'ang/ /de ma zhun mar dron pos bsku/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gtar? ga gdab ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad
74b5(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /cung zad mdar zhing tshwa? la/ /grang dang tsha min bsgrub? min/ /pad+ma lam ? chu ser dang/ /rtsos dad ri bong khrag ltar dmar/ /dag cing dmar par 'byung ba ni/ /de nyid kyis ni lus gnas byed/ /de ni phal cher bad mkhris kyis/ /nang kyis 'khrug pas gnod bskyed
74b6(mdo 'grel): pas/ /me dpal 'bras dang mcher nad dang/ /sgrun dang mo ? bris dang rims/ /kha dang mig dang mgon nad dang/ /myos dang skom dang tsha bo dang/ /mdze dan dreg nang mkhris khrag dang/ /sgregs pa skyur zhing mgo 'khor byed/ /bsil dro snum dang rtsub sogs kyis/ /
74b7(mdo 'grel): nad gang gsas par gyur pa na/ /legs par 'chos par ma gyur pa/ /de ni khrag 'khrugs las gyur yin/ /khrag bdo gyur ba? ni/ /gtar ga? gdab pas dbyung bar bya/ /do yang bcu drug ma len dang/ bcu bdun 'das la khrag ? dbyung/ /nams chur dugs?
75a1(mdo 'grel): drags dugs ma byas/ /rlung gi nad kyis nyen pa dang/ /sbrum ma bu btsas zad ma zhu/ /khrag mkhris lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /tshad 'khru rims dang skyug pa dang/ /skye ? yan lag kun skrangs dang/ /snam 'thungs pa la sbyor ba dang/ /de
75a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin las lnga byas la min/ /ma bsdams gtar mi gdab cing/ yod po'am mi snang la mi gdag/ tshabs chen nad ni ma gtogs pa/ /grang pa cha tshar rlung dus min/ /mgo dang mig gi nad rnams la/ /dpral ba'i rtsa las gtar ba'am/ /mig 'gram sna
75a3(mdo 'grel): drung rtsa la gdab/ /rna ba'i nang la rna ba'i rtsa/ /sna yi nad la sna rtser ro/ /cham ba sna ba dang dbral rtsa gdab/ /kha nang rnams la lce dang ni/ /mchu dang rkan gyi rtsa gdab po/ /nam tshong yan chad rtsa bdud mgul/ /rna ba mu 'gram spyir gnas gdab/ /smyo byed mig
75a4(mdo 'grel): 'gram brad dpral rtsa/ /brjed byed 'gram pa'i mtshams su gdab/ /yang na kun yang smin mtshams gdab/ /'bras dang rtsib logs zug pa la/ /rtsib logs nu ma'i bar rtsa gdab/ /nyin gsum pa la phrag mtshams gdab/ /nyin bzhi pa la ltag
75a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i mgo/ /'khru ba gzer dang ldan pa la/ /mjug to'i gong ma sor gnyis par/ /khu ba'i mtshan nad pho mtshan rtsa/ /lkog ma'i sba bar brla rtsa gdab/ /gzugs 'khums pus mthil 'og gam ni/ /gong gi sor bzhi pa la gdab/ /'bras kyi
75a6(mdo 'grel): 'phrad bar byin pa'i nywa/ /'og tu sor gnyis par gdab bo/ /rkub chos bus mo'i lha da'i steng/ /nad la glad mo'i ltag sor bzhir/ /rkang tsha 'thad dang sprid pa dang/ /gting rtol rlung nad mcher pa dang/ /rkang sor sno/ /su chad pa la/ /rgya chigs las
75a7(mdo 'grel): gong sor gnyis gdab/ 'khums la rkang 'khums lta bur gdab/ /ji skad bshad pa ma mngon na/ /gnad ma rtogs pa gar nye ba'i/ /phyogs bzhan dag tu gtar ga gdab/ /de nas lus snum gtang ga yi/ /yo byad kun bsags stobs dang ldan/ /
75b1(mdo 'grel): gra shis byas shing kha zas ni/ /snam zos khu ba 'thungs pa dang/ /mi dang nyi tshan gyis gdungs bya/ /bus mnyam mtho ba'i stan la 'dug/ skra rtsa ras ni 'jam pos bcing/ /bus mo'i lha dar gru mo gtsugs/ /khu tshur nad du klong bcug pas/ /
75b2(mdo 'grel): mgul pa dam du btsir bar bya/ /so bsdam lud pa lu ba dang/ /'khur ba gnyis ni bud par bya/ /de las rgyab nas bcir ba dang/ /gos kyis dkri zhing mjub mo ni/ /g.yin pa lkog mar btsugs nas su/ /nang du legs par bzhug par bya/ /'di yi nad
75b3(mdo 'grel): du kha bltas rtsa/ /ma rtags bsdam pa'i cho ga yin/ /de 'og dman pa'i rtse mo las/ /gud mo gtang bar gyur pa yis/ /rtsa byung mngon la gdab byas nas/ /legs pa'am mthob mos mnan byas la/ /lag pa g.yon bas bzung ba ye/ /brtsags
75b4(mdo 'grel): bu sta res dbus su gdag /brtsags bu'i kha phyogs mi g.yo gtad/ /de bzhin gdab pa'am brtsir ba yis/ /bem rdol gdab las khrag dbyung ngo/ /na drung gi ni rtsa gdab pa/ /rtse mo mthe'o sa btegs nas ni/ /bcags te 'bras 'dra
75b5(mdo 'grel): gdab par bya/ /lce bteg bzlog ste sos mnan la/ /lce 'og rtsa ni gdab par bya/ /nu ma yan chad bsdams nas ni/ /mgul bar gnas pa'i rtsa gdab bo/ /lag pa gnyis su rdo bcangs te/ /lag pa pus mo brten te brgyad/ /mtshan
75b6(mdo 'grel): khung man chad mnyes nas ni/ /gong du bcings la mdo rtsa gdag /lag dar rtsa ni bder 'dug ste/ /gdab pa'i sor bzhi gong gi ni/ /phyogs su ras kyis dam bcings la/ /mthe bo chang par bcug nas ni/ /lag dang brkyang la
75b7(mdo 'grel): gdab par bya/ /rtsib logs rtsa ni dpung ba gnyis/ /thung du bcangs te gdab par bya/ /pho mtshan rtsa ni btegs ste gdab/ /byin rtsa ? mo ma bkug bar/ /rkang pa lags bzhag lus mo la/ /'og tu lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /lod mo'i
76a1(mdo 'grel): bar du dam brtsir la/ /rkang pa de yi steng gnyis pa'i/ /cung zad bkug ste bzhag pa yis/ /mnan la de las lag pa ltar/ /rtsa gdab de ltar ma smos pa'i/ /gzhan dag la yang gdab byas la/ /thabs shes btsags
76a2(mdo 'grel): dpyed de dang des/ /phyogs ni de dang de du gdab/ /sha tsha ba yi phyogs su 'debs/ /'bras 'dra 'bras kyi srid tsam gdab/ /dus pa'i steng rtsa sta re 'bras/ /nas kyi phyed tsam gdab par bya/ /legs par btab nas khrag gzags te/ /chings me bkrol nas
76a3(mdo 'grel): gzag mi bya/ /gdab ma legs pa dus cung zad/ /nyung zad 'byung la til phye gdab /gdab drags sgra dang bcas par ni/ /'byung zhing spyad kyang dka' bar 'gyur/ /sdangs dang 'gog par 'gyur ba dang/ /chings lhod mtshon rtul
76a4(mdo 'grel): drangs drags dang/ /nyam chung shugs nyen duD ma byas/ /khrag mi 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no/ /khrag ni leD par ma byung na/ /pi dang tsha gsum skyed pa dang/ /rgya spos rgya mtsho khyim dud bcas/ /til mar btags la rma la bsku/ /khrag ni legs byung til mar dang/ /rgya ma tshang
76a5(mdo 'grel): cas pa do 'jam bsku/ /le brgan rtse las mtshon ser ltar/ /dang po khrag nad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /leD bar byung na rang nyid 'chad/ /khrag bzang byung na'ang dbyung par? bya/ /brgyal 'gyur na ni chings ma dgrol/ /rlung ba yab kyis ba yab slar khrug dbyung/ /slar 'bog gyur
76a6(mdo 'grel): na nyi ma ni/ /gnyis pa'am gsum pa dag la gdab/ /rlung khrag gnag cing dmar la rtsug /shugs drags gsal zhing lbu ba can/ /mkhris khrag ser la rtsag nag mnam/ /gcin bag dro zhing tshon can yin/ /bad kan khrag ni 'jam
76a7(mdo 'grel): la skya/ /rgyun can 'jar zhing bska ba yin/ /'dres pa'i mtshan ma 'dres ma yin/ /nyes gsum dri ma rnyog ma can/ /khrag dan pa ni nyam che la'ang/ /tshad las lhag par dbyung mi bya/ /khrag dbyungs drangs na'ang 'chib 'am/ /
76b1(mdo 'grel): rlung nang mi bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la bsku? byug 'o ma khu/ /khrag bcung blung pa sman yin no/ /khrag phyung nas ni chings ma dag /dal gyis bkrol la chu bsil gyis/ /bkrus la til mar gyis byugs pa'i/ /gos 'jam gyis ni rma kha dkri/ nang khrag
76b2(mdo 'grel): yod na phyed 'phred dam/ /phyi de nyin bar slar yang dbyung/ /shin tu gnod pa'i khrag zla phyed/ /bsnum gyis rtas pa'i lus las dbyung/ /khrag nad cung zad lung kyang ni/ /nang ni lhag par mi bskyed pas/ /de phyir lhag ma yod gyur kyang/ /bzhag
76b3(mdo 'grel): gi shas cher mi dbyung ngo/ /lhag rdabs ru sogs gdab ba 'am/ /yang na dpyod bsil khrag mkhris gsal/ /sbyangs dang skam pa'i bye brag ni/ /gso bas de ni dad bar bya/ /nang khrag rab rgyas ma gyur ba'ang/ /de 'dra thabs kyis gso par bya/ /
76b4(mdo 'grel): khrag gi rgyun ni mchod na/ /bcas pa'i sbyor ba myur du bya/ /sred phrom rma shed pri yang ku/ /ma sha shing mngar yug snam bcag /gya dum zer ma gnag tshad pa/ /'o ma can shing shun lo ma/ /btabs ba'i phye ma rma khar gdab/ /shugs ?
76b5(mdo 'grel): chu drang sbyar blug /yang na rtsa btab de gong gi /rtse de nyid las gtar? ga gdab/ /yang na thur ma bsregs ba yis/ /rma kha myur du bsreg par bya/ /cing ba nyes pas lam log la gnas te/ /nang gi rgyas pas khrag ni 'byung gyur pa//
76b6(mdo 'grel): rang gi gnas su slar phyin ma gyur pa/ /de srid zad dang spyod lam phan pa bsten/ /shin tu tsha grad ma yin yang drod bskyed/ /khrag sel byed pa'i bza' dang btud ba phan/ /de tshe lus dang khrag bder mi gnas pas/ /khyad bar du ni
76b7(mdo 'grel): ma las bsrung bar bya/ /mdog dang dbang po gsal zhing dbang po yul/ /'dod cing zas 'ju shugs kyang bde bar 'byung/ /bde dang ldan zhing stobs rgyas phun sum tshogs/ /mi yi nang khrag dag pa yin par bshad/ /yan
77a1(mdo 'grel): lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /zug rngu'i bgrod ba rnam lnga ste/ /yo drang thang ka steng dang 'og
77a2(mdo 'grel): rnag dang skrangs dang nad dang bcas/ /yang dang yang du khrag 'dzag la/ /rmo yi nye 'khor mtho zhing blo/ /chu bur lta bu'i thor bu 'byung/ /sha ni 'jam 'gyur lus mdor na/ /khong du zug rngu yod ces bya/ /khyad par du ni pags pa'i nad/ /mtshon
77a3(mdo 'grel): lus mdog nyams sra ba dang/ /skrangs par 'gyur ro sha gnas pa/ /nad dang skrangs pa lhag par phel/ /btsir bar mi bzod smin pa dang/ /sma yi sgo ni 'grub mi shes/ /nya nad zug pa'i shar zug dang/ /'dra las skrangs pa med pa
77a4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /chu ba'i dra ba'i nad lus pa'i/ /chu ba las ni 'byung dka' zhing/ /bsgul dka' bskyod tshe rengs shing na/ /rtsa la brten pa rtsa skrangs 'gyur/ /bu ga'i sbubs gnas sbubs kyis ni/ /rang gi las dang yon tan nyams/ /rtsa chen
77a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'am dbugs dang khrag /ldu ba can du 'byung 'gyur zhing/ sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang/ /snying dang yan lag na bcas 'gyur/ /rus tshigs pog rengs mtshon lus pa/ /rus rtsa tshabs cher na bar 'gyur/ /rus nad
77a6(mdo 'grel): nang mang skrangs par byed/ /tshigs la gnas pa de dang 'dra/ /bskyod par dka' bdag tu 'ang 'gyur/ /nang grol nang yod 'khrug pa dang/ /spo zhing kha zas ngan skyugs gcin/ /rma yi khar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnad kyi nad du
77a7(mdo 'grel): mtshon lus pa/ /gnad zug mtshan nyid las shes bya/ /phags pa la sogs rang rang ni/ /ji ltar 'dzag las shes par bya/ /skyon med lus kyi rma 'tsho ba ste/ /de ni gnod pa med par gnas/ /nad 'khrugs snang pa la
77b1(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis/ /slongs nas slar yang gnod pa bskyed/ /gang yang rung bar pags pa nyams/ /bsku dang mnye dang dug byas nas/ /mdog dmar na zhing tsha la 'khru/ /yang na gang du mar bzhag 'ju/ /lde gus byugs pa myur du bskamS/
77b2(mdo 'grel): gnas te zug rngu bcas shes bya/ /shar lus sbyar par bya ba yis/ /skem byas lhod 'gyur sgul ba dang/ /btsan dmar sogs kyis shes par bya/ /nya dang rus tshigs nang grol gyi/ /zug rduAng de bzhin shes par bya/ /rus pa zug rngus ma
77b3(mdo 'grel): rungs 'gyur/ /rus pa bsku dang dugs bya bcing/ /mnye dang btsir las shes par bya/ /rus tshigs gnas ba rus 'dra dang/ /brkyang dang bskum las shes bar bya/ /chu ba rtsa dang rtsa chen nub/ /zug rngu ma nyams lam 'gro dang/ /shing rta thag
77b4(mdo 'grel): brta dang ni/ /ldan par nad pas bskyod nas su/ /myur du drangs nas de nas ni/ /bskyod pa zug rngu shes par bya/ /gnad zug sogs shig ma bshad de/ /de rnams sha sogs la gnas yin/ /phyir ni zug rngu bcas bskyod pa'i/ /bya bas nad
77b5(mdo 'grel): bcas las shes bya/ /mdor na zlum dang gyes pa dang/ /zur bzhi pa dang zur gsum pa'i/ /rma yi dbyibs las zug rngu ni/ /mi mngon rnam par shes par bya/ /de rnams dbyung ba'i thabs gyur gnyis/ /phyi drar ba dang mdun nas
77b6(mdo 'grel): drang/ /rtse nas drang der rtsa nas drang/ /de las bzlog par dbyung bar bya/ /dbyung sla gang na yod dral te/ /de nas thad kar drang bar bya/ /mtshon ni brang dang mtshon khung/ /brla drung rtsib logs zug pa dang/ /mdun drang
77b7(mdo 'grel): rtse mi mngon spyad bya/ /kha zhing che drang mi bya gang/ /zug rngu ma gyur mde'u dang/ /mi mngon gnod med pa mi 'byung/ /de nas lag pa zin 'gyur na/ /lag pa gnyis kyis drang bar bya/ /snang gzhan seng ge chu srin dang/ /bar
78a1(mdo 'grel): gyi karta ti'i mchus drang/ /mi mngon rma yi dbyibs las ni/ /gal te nus par dbyung gyur ba/ /kaM ka b+hid+ga? khrung khrung dang bya rog shar mdze'i mchus drang/ /pags sogs la gnas skabs pas drang/ /khong stod nang
78a2(mdo 'grel): nas nya mgos dbyung/ /sbu gur gnas pa 'dam bu 'dras/ /ltag ma gzhan gyis ci rigs drang/ /yang na dang po mtshon gyis dral/ /de nas rma yi khrag bsal ba/ /byas la mar gyi dugs bya zhing/ /bcings te spyod pa bstan par bya/ /
78a3(mdo 'grel): rtsa dang chu bar mtshon lus pa/ /thur mas bskyod de dbyung bar bya/ /snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni/ /chu drang gtor bas sngags byas la/ /gnas gzhan phyin ci 'phags 'gyur na/ /ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya/ /rma yi sgo
78a4(mdo 'grel): nas dbyung dka' ba/ /gzhan dag la yang de bzhin sbyar/ /rus par zug pa rkang par ni/ /gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya/ /de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i/ g.yog gis dam du bzung ste dbyung/ /'on kyang ma nus mde'u'i rtsa//
78a5(mdo 'grel): bkug la bzhu rgyud dam btags la/ /rta srab kyis ni kha lcags mthar/ /ma yengs pa yis dam btags te/ /yan lag lnga? po legs bsdams nas/ /rta ni lcag gis gzhu nas su/ /rdeg cing mgo bo bteD ba nas ni/
78a6(mdo 'grel): shugs kyis ji bzhin bstod pa nas ni/ /de ltar zug rngu dbyung pa'am/ /yang na shing gi yal gang gdags/ /mde'u rtsa phra ba srad bu dag /btags te zug rngu dbyung bar bya/ /rma sgrangs mde'u rtsa mi snang/ /skrangs ba
78a7(mdo 'grel): legs par btsar nas dbyung/ /dong bu thobs brdungs po yis/ /mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung/ /lam ma yin par 'byung ba gang/ /de nyid kyis ni dmar phyung bya/ /mde'u zur bcu ma ste dbyung ba 'am/ /dong bu'i
78b1(mdo 'grel): kha yis dbyung bar bya/ /rna ba med cing rma kha dbye/ /drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung/ /zhu ba'i gnas so zug rdu ni/ /bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung par bya/ /klung gnod dug? zhe dang/ /khrag dang chus gnod bzhibs pas bsal//
78b2(mdo 'grel): gre ba'i nang zhugs zug rdul/ /skud pa gre bar gzhug bya ste/ /pad+ma'i rtsa bar skud pas gdags/ /pad rtsa rdug rngu lhan cig drang/ /lcaD bsreg pa mig tshur bcug pa yis/ /lcags thur brtan por byas nas ni/ /rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyeD med
78b3(mdo 'grel): rgya skyegs kyis brkos zug rngu bsnyung/ /skra shad 'dzings pa 'thungs pa dang/ /gsher bas cher ma zug pa gdon/ /'phral du srad bu thoD pa yis/ /slon par bya'o des cig shos/ /kha snar drang par ma nus na/ /gzhan du thur du
78b4(mdo 'grel): ming par bya'o/ /zas kyis mnangs pa'i zug rdu ni/ /chu btungs phrag par rdeg pas gzhug /mig gi rma yi zug rdu phra/ /dar ram bal lam chu yis bsal/ /mig ni chus gang kha bub ste/ /sprug pa'am brkyang la btsir slon
78b5(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ /thal khung bskos te mi yin ni/ /ske ba'i bar du nub tu gzhug/ rna ba chus gang lag pa yis/ /mnyes la til mar rgyun blug la/ /rna ba thur du bstan nas ni/ /gdab pa'am yang na rdub par bya/ /rna ba'i nang du 'bu zhugs
78b6(mdo 'grel): na/ /rna ba tshwa chus rkang ba'am/ /tshwa chu dro 'jam nyid kyis dgang/ /shin 'bu ro dbyung thabs bya/ /rgya skyegs can dang gser dngul sogs/ /'byung khungs las byung yun ring gnas/ /mtshon ni phal cher lus kyi ni/ /drong
78b7(mdo 'grel): kyis 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /sa dang 'od ma shing ra rus/ /so dang skra dang rdo ba'ang? 'ju/ /dang 'ong tshal lcags ta la/ /shing nga tshal zug rngu ring bos kyang/ /phal cher de dag tshol 'gyur la/ /khrag dang sha yis chos
79a1(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /zug rngu sha yis ting du zug /phyogs de tsha ba'am med gyur na/ /de nas de ni snang bya'i phyir/ /gnye dugs spyang dang sha dbri blta/ /sman rnon bcing dang zangs skom sbyin/ /mtshon gyis btab
79a2(mdo 'grel): cing btsags pa yis/ /smin par byas nas rma dbral dang/ /btsal dang bye bas zug rngu dbyung/ /zug rngu gnas dang cha byed kyi/ /tshul ni mang po legs brtags te/ /blo ldan thabs ni de dang de/ /shes par byas la zug rngur byung/ /
79a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rma ni phal cher dang por ni/ /skrangs
79a4(mdo 'grel): dang smin las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas de nyid gso bya ste/ /de bsil byug blugs khrag dbyung dang/ /legs par sbyangs pa la sogs pas/ /smin par gyur las 'bad de bsrung/ /thor bu ma smin skrangs drod chung/ /mdog
79a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra sra zhing brtan par gnas/ /smin tshe mdog ni 'gyur ba dang/ /dmar zhing rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug /gas ba lta bu'i nad bcas dang/ /yan lag snyoms zhing glal bcas dang/ /lus grugs 'khrugs tsha yig 'chus/
79a6(mdo 'grel): rims 'debs skom dad gnyid med dang/ /mar 'khyags bzhag na 'ju ba dang/ /rma gtar reg na mi bzod do/ /smin 'gyur na ba'i shugs chung zhing/ /rnying cing skya la gnyer ma 'du/ /mdza' ma 'jum zhing
79a7(mdo 'grel): dbus su mtho/ /g.ya' dang skrangs ba la sogs chung/ /rgyal pa yi ni chu lta bur/ /reg na rnag ni phan tshun rgyu/ /rlung min mi na mkhris min che/ /med de bad kan med min spangs/ /khrag med dmar bar mi
79b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /de bas nang khrag dang bcas smin/ /smin ba thal drags khong stong dang/ /nad gyis zos pas pags ba srag/ /gnyer ma 'jum zhing mdog gnag la/ /ba sbu rnams ni 'byi bar 'gyur/ /bad kan shas che'i skrangs pa ni/ /smin
79b2(mdo 'grel): pa gting ring khrag gis gang/ /de bas smin brtags gsal ma yin/ /skrangs pa gang du bsil 'gyur zhing/ /pags mdog mi 'gyur na tshabs chung/ /rdo ltar rig na sra ba ni/ /mkhas pas the tshom med par de/ /khrag gis
79b3(mdo 'grel): smin bzhes bshad bya/ snying stobs nyam chung byis pa dang/ /thor bu smin pa chibs che ba sam/ /gnad dang rus tshigs la sogs par/ /'byung ba ma gtogs gzhan dag 'dra la/ /ma smin brtol na rtsa rgyus las/ /gnod cing khrag ni
79b4(mdo 'grel): mang du 'byung/ /nad tshabs rab 'phel rma gyes pa'am/ /rma 'byung thor bu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnag ni nang nas gnas gyur pa/ /'phel bas rtsa rgyus sha dang ni/ /khrag rnams myur du sreg byed de/ /rtsa bskams la ni me dang
79b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshungs/ /gang zhig ma smin brtol ba dang/ /gang zhig smin kyang btang snyoms 'jog /khyad par mi shes de dag ni/ /sme sha can 'drar shes par bya/ /ma brtol ba yi dang por ni/ /kha zas phan pa sbyin par bya/ /tshor ba mi
79b6(mdo 'grel): bzad bzod 'gyur bas/ /tshang 'thung pa la chang blud bya/ /zas zos pa yis mi brgyal zhing/ /nang du mtshon btab tshor mi 'gyur/ /rum bu bu shi rde'u chags dang/ /kha nang dmu rdzing can ma gtogs/ /de nas yo byad kun
79b7(mdo 'grel): bsags te/ /nang pa shar du kha bstan la/ /sman pa sngon phyogs bsdams nas ni/ /gnad sogs ma gtogs btsags bus gdab/ /sha zhugs rjes mthun shin tu rna/ /btsag bu rnag phyir bar du btang/ /de ni cig car
80a1(mdo 'grel): gdab par bya/ /smin pa chen po yod kyang ni/ /rma zhengs sor gnyis dral bya'am/ /sor gnyis pa yis zabs sor gsum/ /mdzub mo chu ba pu dag gis/ /gnas phyogs ji bzhin brtag pa'am/ /rmo tshal gyis ni
80a2(mdo 'grel): legs btsal zhing/ /kun tu legs par brtags par bya/ /gang nas gang du 'gro 'gyur pa'am/ /gang du mthong ba shes byas la/ /de dang der ni rma gtod de/ /legs phye phug ni med par bya/ /mchu dang zheng du ci nas kyang/ /nad ni gnad
80a3(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur bya/ /sman pa dpa' brtan laS la myur/ /mtshon rno mi rdul mi 'dar ba/ /kun tu rmongs par ma gyur pa/ /btsag bu 'debs pa'i las la bsdags/ /gyen du bcad rtsa dpral smin rtsa/ /rnyil dang skye rtsa lto spos dang/ /mchan
80a4(mdo 'grel): khung dang ni mig sbubs mchu/ /mkhur tshos brla drung chu so rtsa'o/ /gzhan dag gyen du bcad na ni/ /rtsa dang chu ba'ang ma rungs 'gyur/ /btsag bus btab nas nad pa ni/ /tshig snyan chu ni bsil ba yis/ /dbugs phyung nas ni de 'og
80a5(mdo 'grel): rma/ /sor mos kun nas btsir ba dang/ /bska ba'i chu yis legs bku zhing/ /sman chur bcug pa'i gos kyis phyi/ /gu gul yungs kar a ru ra/ /shing kun ka ra rgya ma tsha dang/ /sha dag nim pa'i lo ma ni/ /mar dang sbyar bas
80a6(mdo 'grel): gdug par bya/ /til gyi lde gu mar spang rtsi/ /rang gi sman ni ji lta bas/ /byugs shing de nas rma tshangs gzhug /de nyid kyis ni de g.yogs la/ /mar dang phye sprus bsku ba dang/ /de 'og bkog tse stug po ni/ /gzhag ste shin tu ma
80a7(mdo 'grel): yengs bas/ /gos kyis legs par bcing bya ste/ /blo dang g.yas dang g.yon dag gam/ /steng dang 'og tu ma song bya/ /rma tshas bkog tshe dkris mang bcas/ /phra zhing sra la gtsang ba la/ /spos kyis bdugs te 'jam la gnyen/
80b1(mdo 'grel): kham khum med cing rmal phan/ /bcings nas de gnod pa bzlog phyir bsrung bar bya/ /de rnams la ni gtor ma spyan/ /lak+Sh+ma gu? gu a ti gu ha/ /spang spos pra ma tsa ri ni/ /tsha tra a ti tsha tra dang/ /durba shu dag yungs kar dang/ /rtag tu de yi spyi
80b2(mdo 'grel): por btags/ /de nas snum gyi tshe gar bshad/ /nyin re'i kun spyod bshad par bstan/ /nyin par nyid log rma g.ya' zhing/ /kha dmar nang skrangs rnag 'khyims 'gyur/ /bud med dran nam ma reg pa'am/ /mthong bas khu ba byung gyur na//
80b3(mdo 'grel): ma phrad na'ang 'khrigs pa las/ /byung ba'i skyon ni thob bar 'gyur/ /kha zas dag ni gang gems las/ /nas dang gro dang drug cu pa/ /sran chung mung+ga ta bi ra/ /ni sho nA ga dzI pan+ti/ /la phug gzhon nu brta ka /rgyu sne'u tan+tu li ya ka /ka re ba
80b4(mdo 'grel): la ka rkota/ /ka du ka pa lap to la/ /rgyam tsha se 'bru skyu ru ra/ /chu bskol pa ni bgrangs pa dang/ /'bras rnying chang dang snum nyung zad/ /zos rjes chu tshan btung ba dang/ /skams sa'i sha ni zas gyur na/ /rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dus su
80b5(mdo 'grel): ran par bza' ba dang/ /phan pa zos na bde 'ju 'gyur/ /ma zhu ba yi rlung la sogs/ /ldang zhing nad ni stobs can 'gyur/ /de las skrangs dang rnag pa dang/ /tsha dang spos par 'gyur ba yin/ /'khrug? sar brta nga ti la dang ma sha dang/
80b6(mdo 'grel): chang dang brlan can las byung sha /'o ma bu ram shing las gyur/ /skyur dang lan tshwa tsha ba dang/ /gzhan gang 'khru ba gcod byed pa dang/ /tsha dang bsil dang lci kha spang/ /'bru sar la sogs sde chen 'di/ /rma dang ldan pa'i nad kun bskyed
80b7(mdo 'grel): chad ni rno ba tsha rtsub 'gyur/ /rma la myur du gnas par byed/ /ba la u shi ras ba yab cing/ /'di ni bskyed par mi bya la/ /drag shul mi gzugs phrug mi bya/ /bskyod pa'i tshe na bag bya'o/ /mdza' dang bram ze rgan sogs kyis/ / 
81a1(mdo 'grel): gtam ni yid la dga' ba mnyan/ /nang las thar ba'i re bcas pas/ /rma ni myur du 'tshob bar 'gyur/ /nyin gsum lon tshe rma yi las/ /slar yang bkrus sogs las rnams ni/ /snga ma bzhin bya de bzhin du/ /nyin zhag
81a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis par mi bya'o/ /tshabs tshor na zhing mi 'byar la/ /rma ni yun ring zhig na 'tsho ba/ /rma tshangs sam ni lde gus sran/ /snum ches rtsub ches dam pa dang/ /lhod grags bzhag nyes mi bya ste/ /snum ches rma ni red bar 'gyur/ /rtsub ches sha
81a3(mdo 'grel): 'chang shin tu na/ /gas shing khrag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dam dang lhod grags bzhag nyes pas/ /rma yi kha ni 'drud par 'gyur/ /rma ni rnag bcas skrangs shing mtho/ /rgyu bcas rna phug bcas pa 'di/ /rma chas 'jam po nang gnas
81a4(mdo 'grel): pas/ /rma yi skyon ni dag par byed/ /skrangs pa ha cang ma smin brtsol/ /smin zhing gnags par 'gyur ba spyad/ /phan pa'i sman dang zas dang dkri/ shin tu dmar mi gnod pas gso/ /snang pa'i rma ni gsar du byung/ /ral zhing kha bye
81a5(mdo 'grel): 'phral du btsom/ /smin pa chen po bkas pa dang/ /rna bshal bu ga chang pa'ang bcom/ /mgo dang mi phugs sna dang mchu/ /mkhur tshod rna ba dpung pa sla/ /mgul
81a6(mdo 'grel): pa phrag pa rlig pa dbyi/ /pho mtshan bzhad dang lto ba sogs/ /phugs ring pa yi gnas rnams dang/ /sha che mi 'gul ma yin dang/ /chu so mchan khung la sogs dang/ /sha chung mgul pa'i rma dag dang/ /dbugs dbyung zug
81a7(mdo 'grel): rdu yod pa dang/ /thal sman dug mas tshig mi bcom/ /bcom pa rus dum khrag skam dang/ /rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni/ /sha chad dum bu 'phyar ba dang/ /rang gi gnas su brlen pa yang/ /rus tshigs bcu gcing khrag
81b1(mdo 'grel): gzags? la/ /skud pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem/ /bsbubs ni nye ba'am rim mi bya/ /blang ba che ba ma chung mi bya/ /de nas spro sring byas nas mthar/ /rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang/ /khyed bzang ma'i dud pa dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang sa la ki//
81b2(mdo 'grel): ser phrom mdor ba snum bcas pas/ /bskus bcing la sogs sngon bzhin bya/ /rma kha khrag ni ming 'gyur gang/ /? cung zad blung bya ste/ /rma 'byor byed pa khrag yin pas/ /phyung ste legs par grub par bya/ /de las bcings pa yul la sogs/ /brtags
81b3(mdo 'grel): na nges par sbyar bar bya/ /ba la gos bags pa dang gsum dro/ /zar ma 'dis ni bas ? ni/ /gro grang ngan pa shing ba la rngal/ /ras bal rgyus pa shing shun yin/ /zangs lcags zha nyer ro nye yis/ /bad kan tshil ches rmal glan/ /chags thur shi
81b4(mdo 'grel): byas rabs? pa dang/ /shing shun dmigs rtsal sogs pas bcing/ /dbyibs ni rang min rjes mthun yin/ /cing ba bco lnga rnam bya ste/ /shugs dang bkra shis lhod par bcing/ /mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing/ / mda' lcags khri
81b5(mdo 'grel): dang dam bcing dang/ /sge'u bla res og shal dang/ /lung mthil zungs glan zlum pa dang/ /yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar/ /de las gang zhig gang legs sbyor/ /de ni de ru legs par spyad/ /brla dang mjug cos mchan
81b6(mdo 'grel): khung dang/ /chu so spyi bor dam du bcing/ /lag dag gdong dang rna ba dang/ /rgyab dang rtsib logs mgul pa lto/ /pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing/ /mig dang tshigs su lhor par bcing/ /lhad cing ? ni bad kan dang/ /rlung shas
81b7(mdo 'grel): tshe la ran par bcing/ /ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing/ /dam bcing shin tu dam du bcing/ /dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe/ /zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas bgrol/ /khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni/ /dam bcing gnas
82a1(mdo 'grel): su ran par bcing/ /ngan bcing gnas su lhod par bcing/ /lhod cing gnas su bcing mi bya/ /de gnyis sog ston gyi tshe/ /snga dro phyi dong grol bar bya/ /ma bcings sha sbrang sbrang bu dang/ /lhag pa bser bu
82a2(mdo 'grel): sogs pas gnod/ /rma rer gyur zhing der snum dang/ /sman ni yun ring gnas mi 'gyur/ /sbyar pa 'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang/ /'tsho bas kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur/ /bcings na chags cing phye mar gyur/ /? sam 'bur 'gyur
82a3(mdo 'grel): dral? 'gyur tam/ /rtsa dang rgyus pa chad par grub? kyang/ /rman bde bar myur du 'tsho/ /ldang dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /spyod lam kun la gnod pa med/ /rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyan dang/ /sra zhing rab na 'tsho ba dga' / /'jam zhing mnyam
82a4(mdo 'grel): la nab med/ /rma ni myur du dag cing 'tshog rma ni yun ring sha chung dag rtsub par 'byor bar ma gyur nan? gzhi? dus tshigs ji bzhin du/ /sman dang lo mas dgag par bya/ /ma rnyings gzhon zhing bu ga med/ /kun las legs par kheb pa dang/ /phyis shing
82a5(mdo 'grel): mi rtsub lo ma ni/ /'o ma can shing rtag pa dang/ /ardzun dang kataM pa'i/ /lo? ma yis ni g.yog par bya/ /mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang/ /'bras zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /byi ba sprul gyi dug dang ni/ /tham sman
82a6(mdo 'grel): rno dang dug gis phog /rma ni bcing bar mi bya zhing/ /sha 'drul gzhang khang mi bzang rnams/ /'drul zhing tsha dang na bcas par/ /skrangs skabs med bal mi bcing ngo/ /rma gang legs par ma bsrungs bar//
82a7(mdo 'grel): sbrang ma srin pu 'jug byed de/ /de yis zas pas na ba dang/ /skrangs dang nag khrag 'jigs pa byed/ /der ni bkru dang dag par ni/ /ba'u rug la sogs sde tshan sbyar/ /sapta barna karny+dza/ /arga dang ni ni pa dang/ /
82b1(mdo 'grel): ? dang mi shing tsha rnams/ /ba gcin dang ni btags pa yi/ /lde gu de la bsku ba dang/ /thal sman chu ni blug pa phan/ /yang na sha rlon gyis g.yogs la/ /de ni myur du dbyung bar bya/ /'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas/ /myur du 'tshob par
82b2(mdo 'grel): mi bya ste/ /de ni gnod pa'ang tshung dus kyang/ /slar zhing 'grams par 'gyur ba yin/ /'tshob par gyur kyang ma zhu dang/ /drag shul bud med bsten sogs spang/ /zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar/ /tsheg 'bad par bsrung bar bya/ /
82b3(mdo 'grel): gnas skabs de dang der ni byung gyur tshe/ /nad gzhi ba la sogs stobs kyi rjes 'brangs te/ /phyi ma nas bshad brgya cher legs brtags la/ /thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /
82b4(mdo 'grel): mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas thal sman rnon po dang me btsa' gdab pa'i cho ga'i ye'u bshad par bya'o/ /btsags dpyad gcigs dpyad rjes 'dra ba/ /mang po kun las thal sman mchog /dka' 
82b5(mdo 'grel): ba rnams suAng bcas pa'am/ /dbug pa la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /btsags bus gdab par dka' ba la'ang/ /de yis sgrub par rung ba dang/ /shin tu gso dka' i nad rnams la/ /gang zhig tuAng rung ba yin/ /de ni
82b6(mdo 'grel): gzhad 'brum me drod nyams/ /rde'u 'gags sbyar dug skran sogs btang/ /rme ba sha bkra sna 'thor dang/ /phyi rol gzhang 'brum tsher med mdze/ /thor bu 'brum phan mtshan mar rdol/ /rma log sogs la
82b7(mdo 'grel): byug par bya/ /khrag mkhris rlung can nad stobs chung/ /rims dang tshad 'khu snying klad nad/ /skya rbab yig 'chus pa dang/ /rab rib can dang slen khrus btang/ /lus kun khyab pa'i 'or nang dang/ /'jigs dang sbrum
83a1(mdo 'grel): ma zla mtshan can/ /pho mtshan mo mtshan skrangs pa dang/ /byis pa rgan po zas ma zhu/ /rtsa bo che dang rus tshigs gnang/ /rus pa gzhon nu chu brtsa/ /lto bsrubs mgul blte ba dang/ /sha
83a2(mdo 'grel): srab phyogs dang rlig pa dang/ /pho mtshan bu ga san mo phrag /mig mchu ma gtogs mig nang rnams/ /tsha grang char dang yul dmus tsha/ /gnyi ga yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /mu ga ka nag sha mya ka/ chu shing pa ri ba tra ka /a
83a3(mdo 'grel): sha kan 'ja mu'i shing/ /ba la sha dang a po ta/ /ingra? prik+Sha arga ga dang/ /nak+ta ma la muk+tika /sri shing a pa marga dang/ /ka ka dza ka tsi tra ka /agni manda til+lA ka /rlon shing rtsa ba la sogs bcas/ /dum bur
83a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su btugs pa dang/ /ko sha ta ka rnam bzhi dang/ /nas kyi sog mgra ma rnams/ /rlung med gnas su bsags nas de/ /rdo leb steng du so so bzhag /muSh+kaka yi phung po dang/ /rdo thal jo gang bcug par bya/ /de nas
83a5(mdo 'grel): til byi sdong bus sreg /tshig nas me ni shi bo dang/ /rdo thal thal ba logs shig dbye/ /thal ba gzhan dag ? gang ste/ /muk+ka'i thal lhag blangs nas ni/ /so sor phye ste chu dang gcin/ /srang stong dag dang bsres nas bzhu/
83a6(mdo 'grel): tshags ni bzang pas de btsags pa/ /ji srid 'byar bag dmar zhing dang/ /rna bar gyur ba'i bar du ni/ /thal ba'i dangs ma de blangs la/ /lcags snod bzang por bskol zhing bcug /de nas 'tshod par byed ba der/ /rdo thal
83a7(mdo 'grel): bsregs rdo'i dum bu dang/ /nya phyis k+Shi ra pag dang/ /dud gi lte ba lcags snod gzhug ma mdog can du lan mang bya/ /thal sman cha ni phul gang dang/ /me bsad de nyid dang btags la/ /lde gu der ni gzhug par bya/ /khyim bya
83b1(mdo 'grel): rma bya bya rgod dang/ /ka ka phug ron rtug pa dang/ /bya dang rkang bzhi'i mkhris pa dang/ /ba bla ldod ros lan chwa rnams/ /zhib btags bcug bya de nas ni/ /gzang bus de yang kun tu dkrub/ gang tshe lbu par bcas par khol/ /chu bul sbom
83b2(mdo 'grel): bska lde? gu 'dra/ /de tshe phab la grangs pa dang/ /lcags snod bcug ste nang nas gzhug/ 'di ni thal sman 'bring po yin/ /'jam pa ma btags par bcugs la/ /bsur la slar ni gdon par bya/ /rnon por snga ma bzhin bcug la/ /
83b3(mdo 'grel): langka? ling+ka dan+ti dang/ /shu dag por tsi tra ka /sardzi ka dang khron bu dang/ /shing kun karny+dza'i lo ma/ /ta la'i lo ma kha ru tsha'i/ /phye bcu gzhag bdun de bzhag bya/ /rnon po da ni rlung bad kan/ /tshil skyes thor bu sogs la btang/ /'di
83b4(mdo 'grel): nyid nang tshebs 'brid la 'bring/ /'jam po khrag mkhris gzhang 'brum la sa pa'o/ /mthu bskyed phyir ni 'o mchu/ /thal sman chu ni slar yang gzhug /shin tu rno min 'jam dang mnyen/ /'byar bag sna rno dkar ba dang/ /rtse can de
83b5(mdo 'grel): bar 'jil ba dang/ /mi 'dzag byugs na cang mi che/ /thal sman yon tan bcu dang ldan/ /btsag bu me btsa'i las kyang byed/ /dkrugs pas bzhib pa lta bu dang/ /lus ni btsir pa lta bu dang/ /nang kyi rjes 'gro snyags pas na//
83b6(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba nas ni 'byin par byed/ /rtsa ba nas ni 'byin par byin par byed/ /las byas nang dang bral nas kyang/ /rang nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /thal sman gyis ni gso ba'i nad/ /mtshon rtsad blud pa'am ? dag byas/ /thal sman thung ma
83b7(mdo 'grel): gos kyis ni/ /dkris pa bgos te glan nas su/ /grangs brgya'i bar bar du bsdad nas phyi/ /de la gzhang 'brum bskus gos kyis/ /g.yogs te lag pas dgab? par bya/ /mig mchu'i nad la mig mchu bzlog/ mig 'bras nag po
84a1(mdo 'grel): ras bal gyis/ /bkab ste legs bar byug par bya/ /thal sman par lo tsam srab bsku/ /sna yi bu ga'i thor bu ni/ /nyi ma la bltas 'dug ba la/ /sna rtse legs par btags nas ni/ /grangs ni lnga bcu'i bar du bzhag /rna
84a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i thor bu la da bzhin/ /thal sman bskus pa'i 'og tu ni/ /phyis la legs nyes rtogs bya ste/ /legs tshig mar dang sprang rtsi bsku/ /'o ma rang skyur zho ga chus/ /dpal bsad de nas mar bcas pa'i/ /mngar dang bsil bas
84a3(mdo 'grel): byug par bya/ /bza' btung bad kan bskyed pa dang/ /bsrul ba'i phyir ni sbyin par bya/ /gal te rtsa ba brten gyur pas/ /thal sman gyis bsags mi 'drul na/ /'u su skyur snyigs shing mngar dang/ /til gyi lde gus de tshe bsku//
84a4(mdo 'grel): til gyi lde gu shing mngar bcas/ /mar gyis bskus na rma 'tsho ba byed/ /smin pa 'dzam bu ltar kun gnag /legs tshos de las go bzlog pa/ /dmar zhing na la g.ya' sogs byed/ /bsrags nyes yin te de slar bsregs/ /
84a5(mdo 'grel): bsregs drags khrag ni 'dzag pa dang/ /brgyal zhing tsha dang rims sogs 'gyur/ /gzhang khar bsregs drags khyad par du/ /'gags pa'am shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bu bzad par 'gyur ba'am/ /
84a6(mdo 'grel): gzhang kha 'byung bas 'chi bar 'gyur/ snar drags sna yi mtshul bar ni/ /nyams pa'am yang na yo ba'am/ /yul ni 'dzin mi nus par 'gyur/ /rna ba sogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /'di ni mchog tu skyur
84a7(mdo 'grel): blug /shing mngar mar dang til btags byugs/ /rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba dang/ /bsil ba'i spyod pa thams cad phan/ /skyur ba'i reg pa bsil bas na/ /thal sman de dang 'dres gyur na/ /de yis
84b1(mdo 'grel): gyur du mdar gyur pas/ /myur bas chab shin tu 'jil/ /me btsa' thal sman las mchog ste/ /de bsregs pa yis slar mi 'byung/ /sman dang thal sman mtshon dbyad kyis/ /ma grub pa yang gub byed yin/ /pags
84b2(mdo 'grel): bsha dang rtsa rgyus dang/ /tshigs dang rus sogs de la gdab/ /rme ba mdzer nad klad nad dang/ /mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na sogs la/ /pags bsres bal ba lang so/ /me shel mnga' smyug sogs me gdab//
84b3(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum smen bu mtshan bar brdol/ /bug rma long la sogs la/ /sha bsregs pra tshil mar bsregs dang/ /bu ram 'dzam+bu'i chu yis bsrags/ /pags pa 'byar dang khrag mchod/ /thig le gnag sogs
84b4(mdo 'grel): pags nad na/ /de dag nyid kyi rtsa sreg go /bsreg min thal sman bkag pa dang/ /nad na mtshon lus rma chen 'byung/ /khrag zag pa dang lto ral pa'o/ /lags bsres mar dang sbrang rtsi bsku/ /snum dang bsril bas byug
84b5(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /legs pa'i mtshan ma khrag mi 'byung/ /sgra gcan chu bur phri'u 'byung/ /ta la'i 'bras smin thi ba 'dra/ /na ba chung zhing 'tshob par sla/ /bag med pas bsrags thams cad dang/ /bsrags nyes bsregs ni
84b6(mdo 'grel): drags pa dang/ /mtshos mtshan nyid dang bcas bzhi/ /ma tshos pags mdog mi sdug tshi/ /chu bur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsrags nyes chu bur che rab tsha/ /bsregs drags pas ni sha 'phyad dang/ /pags pa
84b7(mdo 'grel): 'khum zhing rab tu tsha/ /dud pa 'khyims pa lta bu dang/ /rtsa sogs 'khums shing skam dang brgyal/ /rma yi gting zab 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ma tshos pas/ ni me bsrang cing/ /tsha ba'i sman ni btang bar bya/ /khrag bska shing tun?
85a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /zags par gyur na nad tshabs chung/ /bsregs nyes bsil dang dro ba'i sman/ /dang bor btang na de 'og bsil/ /bsregs legs na ni bcu hang dang/ /buk+Sha tsan dan btsag yug snams/ /sle
85a2(mdo 'grel): tres brtags pa mar bcas bsku/ /de 'og mkhris me dbal ltar spyad/ /bsregs drags mkhris ba me dbal gyi/ /cho ga thams cad myur du sbyad/ /snum gyis shin tu bsregs drags pas/ /der ni rtsub pa'i cho ga 'di bya/ /snying
85a3(mdo 'grel): po gsang ba lta bu ni/ /gnas 'dir rdzogs par byas pa yin/ /'dir don phra ba mdor bshad kyi/ /rgya cher kun tu bstan ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu tham pa'o// //
85a4(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas te gnas dang po rdzogs so// //de nas lus kyi rum du zhugs pa'i gnas dang po bshad par bya'o/ /de yang drang srong cha no rgyan shes kyi bu la
85a5(mdo 'grel): sogs pas 'di skad bshad do/ /khu khrag skyon med par sems can/ /rang la nyon mongs kyis bskul nas/ /tshogs pa mngal du 'chags 'gyur te/ /gtsub shing las ni me byung mtshungs/ /sa bon bdag nyid 'byung ba che//
85a6(mdo 'grel): 'phra mo sems kyi rjes 'gro dang/ /ma yi kha zas dangs ma las/ /rim gyis mngal du rnam par 'phel/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i gzer gyi me/ /me shel dang ni phrad gyur pa'i/ /shing la 'gro bar mi snang ste/ /sems can mngal gnas de dang
85a7(mdo 'grel): 'dra/ /rgyu yi rjes su 'gro bas na/ /'bras bu de dang skal mnyam nyid/ /sems can skye gnas sna tshogs 'dzin/ /zangs ma la sogs bzhus dang mtshungs/ /de bas khu ba mar? ba las/ /phal cher skyes nas skyes gyur la/ /zla mtshan mang pas
85b1(mdo 'grel): bud med de/ /de gnyid mnyam las ma ning 'gyur/ /khu khrag rlung gis mang du phye/ /ji lta bas las mtshe mar 'gyur/ /skye gnas mi mthun gzugs mi sdug /gnod pa'i dri mas skye bar 'gyur/ /bud med zla ba re re khrag/ dangs ma las byung zhag gsum
85b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzag /lo ni bcu gnyis yan chad nas/ /lnga bcu'i bar 'dzag de nas zad/ /bud med lo ni bcu drug lon/ /skyes pa nyi shu yon dang 'dus/ /mngal gnas lam dang khu ba khrag /rlung dang sems ni dag gyur pa'i/ /bu ni stobs dang ldan pa skye/ /de las lo ni
85b3(mdo 'grel): ma tshang ba'i/ /nad can tshe thung skal ngan pa'i khu ? chaD mi 'gyur/ /rlung sogs dul dang mdung pa can/ /dri ma skyon dang ldan bshad pa'i/ /khu khrag sa bon byed mi nus/ /rang gi mtshan mas skyon byung bshad/ /khrag gi rul zhing bad kan dang/ /rlung gis
85b4(mdo 'grel): mdud pa can 'drar 'gyur/ /khrag dang mkhris pa rnag 'dra la/ /rlung dang mkhris pa zad par 'gyur/ /'di dag gso dka' nyes gsum ldan/ /bshang gci 'dra bar gsor mi rung/ /rlung la sogs pa gnod 'gyur ba/ /rang gi sman gyis gso bar bya/ /rus
85b5(mdo 'grel): pa'am dad ka'i me tog/ /seng ldeng se'u 'bru ardzu na/ /mar dang bskal ba blud pa'am/ /a sa na sogs bskol bas blun/ /khu khrag mdud 'dra ba la sha'i/ /thal ba sru sru'i rtsa ba phan/ /rnag 'dra pa ru sha ka dang/ /n+ya grod+ha sogs bskol pa blad/ /khu ba zad
85b6(mdo 'grel): la ro rtsa'i dpyad/ /bshad 'dra slon khrus shing gun dang/ /bu shel tsitraka bskol blud/ /zla mtshan mdud 'dra ba tha dad/ /tsha gsum dug mo nyung bskol blung/ /zla mtshan rul dang rnag 'dra la/ /tsan dan blud bya phyis bshad pa'i/ /gsad ba'i gnod sor
85b7(mdo 'grel): bshad kun dang/ /'jam btsir byas pa gang yin bya/ /khu ba dkar zhing lci ba dang/ /mar dang bskad? mang ba dang/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi til mar 'dra/ /mngal du legs chags zla mtshan yang/ /rgya skyegs khu ba'i bong khrag /'dra zhing bkrus na dag 'gyur bzang/ /khu khrag 
86a1(mdo 'grel): skyon med nad med cing/ /phan mtshun bu ni chags pa dang/ /ro ci'i snum gyis rtag pa dang/ /sbyad pa byas shing 'jam rtsi btang/ /mchog tu skyes pa'o me mar/ /mngar pa'i sman gyis rta bar bya/ /bud med til mar sha dag ni/ /mkhris
86a2(mdo 'grel): pa bskyed pa nye bar spyad/ /bud med nyam chung bzhin ras dang/ /nu ma rked pa mgul ba dang/ /mig dang dku g.yo skyes pa 'dod/ /zla mtshan ldan phar shes par bya/ /dper na nyi ma nub pa na/ /pad+ma'i kha ni zlum par 'gyur/ /de bzhin zla mtshan dus
86a3(mdo 'grel): 'das ba ni/ /dpal ni khu pa len mi 'gyur/ /zla ba gcig tu bsags pa'i khrag /rtsa chen gnyis las dus su ni/ /cung zad gnag cing dri bral ba/ /rlung gis mngal gyis sgo ru 'byin/ /de nas zla mtshan mthong nyid nas/ /zhag gsum par
86a4(mdo 'grel): du sems dge bsam/ /rgyan dang khrus ni spang pa dang/ /ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya/ /nas thugs 'o mas btsos nyung zad/ /blud cing lto sbyang nyams dmang bya/ /lo ma 'am rdzas skyogs lag par ni/ /bza' zhing 'khrig pa spang par bya//
86a5(mdo 'grel): de nas zhag na bzhi pa la/ /khrus byas gos 'phreng dkar zhing gtsang/ /pha dang 'dra ba'i bu 'dod cing/ /mdun du khyo ni blta bar bya/ /zla mtshan zhag ni bcu gnyis dus/ /de las dad po'i zhag gsum dang/ /bcu gcig ba smad tshes gzungs
86a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /bur 'gyur gzhan du bu mor 'gyur/ /de nas bu phyir slob dpon gyis/ /cho ga cho ga bzhin byas la/ dbang sa rigs phyag tshal la sogs las/ /sngags kyis bye ba med par bya/ /de ltar 'dod spyod don ldan zhing/ /yid la
86a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i bu skye 'gyur/ /bu 'dod bza' bran dben par ni/ /'dod spyad zhes bya dam pa smra/ /gzhan du rig bzangs las kyang da/ /bu dan rigs bsregs me 'drar 'gyur/ /ji lta ba yi bu 'dod pa/ /de yi tshul du de yis spyad//
86b1(mdo 'grel): yul de'i skye ba skyod pa dang/ /de yi yo byad la bsam bya/ /las mthar skyes las zhun mar dang/ /'o ma 'bras chen bcas pa bza' / /skar mkhan lung gis mal khrir ni/ /skyes pa dang po rkang pa g.yas kyis/ /'dzeg bya bud med g.yon gyis
86b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzeg /de yi g.yas logs dang du nyal/ /til mar mon sran dre'u bza' / /de ni sngags kyi tshig brjod bya/ /a d+hi ri si/ A yu(mdo 'grel): ra si/ sarba ta/ pra tiSh+Tha si/ d+ha twa d+ha tu/ pid+ha ba twa/ b+ha d+hadu/ brahma brtsa swa b+hA ba zhes bya ba'o/ /tshangs pa
86b3(mdo 'grel): phur bu khyab 'jug dang/ /nyi zla tha skar bu gnyis dang/ /legs ldan mdza' bo chu lha rnams/ /bdag la dpa' ba' i bu stsol cig/ de nas phan tshun spro bskyed de// /dga' dang bcas pas gnas par bya/ /bud med der sems gan rgyal
86b4(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /yan lags legs par gnas 'dug bya/ /de ltar nyes bar rang gnas 'dug /sa bon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'phral du mngal chags mtshan ma ni/ /mngal du mtshan ma 'dzin pa dang/ /'dod ngoms
86b5(mdo 'grel): ci dang g.yo ba dang/ /khrag dang khu ba rjes 'dres dang/ /snying 'phar ba dang snyoms pa dang/ /skom dang rmya dang ba spu ldang/ /zla ba dang po mi gsal zhag/ /bdun nas nur nur po ru 'gyur/ /'di ni mngal gyi bu bskyed pa/ /gsal/
86b6(mdo 'grel): bar ma gyur gong du bya/ /skyes bu byed pa 'di stobs ldan/ /las kyang zil gyis gnon bar nus/ /skar ma rgyal skyes bu yi gzugs/ /gser ram dngul lam lcags las byas/ /me tog gyur bsregs 'o mar bcug/ de ni snyim
86b7(mdo 'grel): gang blud par bya/ /yang na go ra dan+ta dang/ /a pa mag ji ba ka/ zangs rtsi ba dang she dya ga/ gcig gam gnyis sam gsum zhig gam/ /thams cad chu la btags la ni/ /skar ma rgyal la bag che blud/ /bri ha twi ni dkar po'i rtsa/
87a1(mdo 'grel): 'o mar btab pa rang nyid kyis/ /bu 'dod sna khung g.yas par blug /bu mo 'dod na g.yon par blu ba /lag rma'i na rtsa 'o mar sbyar/ /bu bskyed gnas par ba ster byed/ /de bzhin n+ya gro'i myu gu brgyad/ /sbyar pa sna
87a2(mdo 'grel): 'am kha nas btud/ /'tsho byed kyis ni sman sde rnams/ /phyi dang nang nas nye bar sbyar/ /mngal 'dzin yid 'ong phan pa yi/ /khyod dang 'khor gyi bsnyen bkur bya/ /mar sar zhun mar 'o ma rnams/ /rtag tu de la blud par bya/ /la po dri med pa
87a3(mdo 'grel): rtsol drags dang/ /khung dang gos ni lce ba dang/ /nyin nyel nub mo gnyid ma log/ stan sra ga bur 'dug pa dang/ /mya ngan khro dang 'jigs dang skyo/ /shugs dang sred pa dgag pa dang/ /rgyud la lam 'gro rno dang cha/ /lci dang bshad
87a4(mdo 'grel): 'gags zan za dang/ /gos dmar gyon dang g.yangs dang/ /khron lta sha za chang 'thungs dang/ /gan rkyal nyal dang bud med dang/ /mi 'dod gang yin de kun spang/ /de bzhin gtang ga gdab slon khrus/ /mas btang zla brgyad par mi
87a5(mdo 'grel): bya/ /'di dag gis ni mngal 'jig pa'am/ /dgu bskams pa'ang 'chi bar 'gyur rlung ni bskyed par byang pas mang/ /sbur po 'on long mi thung 'gyur/ /mkhris pa can gyis spyi cher ser/ /bad kan sha bkra skya rbab 'gyur//
87a6(mdo 'grel): nad gzhan 'jam zhing bde ba dang/ /rnon po ma yin sman gyis gso/ /nur nur po las zla gnyis par/ /gor gor mer mer nar nar po/ /de la bo mo ma ning rim/ /de nas gsal 'gyur mtshan ma ni/ /ring cing
87a7(mdo 'grel): dgu ni lci ba dang/ /brgyal skyugs yi 'chus pa dang/ /glal dang mchil mang snyom bag dang/ /spu yi phrad pa gsal ba dang/ /skyur la dga' zhing nu ma rgyas/ /nu zhor bcas zhing rtse mo gnag/ rkang ba skrad zhing kha zas tsha/
87b1(mdo 'grel): sred pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /'di yid snying ni ma las skyes/ /ma yi snying yang de dang ni/ /'brel pas de phyir sbrum ma ni/ /sred pa dgag par mi bya'o/ /de la snod par gyur pa'ang/ /phan dang bsres te cung zad sbyin/ /sred po bkag na
87b2(mdo 'grel): mngal gyi bi ? mi sdug pa 'am 'jig par 'gyur/ zla ba gsum bar da yi lus mgo bo dpyi gnyis dpung pa gnyis/ /yan lag lnga ni gsal dod 'gyur/ /yan lag 'phra mo rnams kyang 'byung/ /mgo bo sogs dang cha mnyam du/ /bde dang sdug
87b3(mdo 'grel): bsngal shes ba 'byung/ /mngal gnas lta ba ma yin ni/ /snying gi rtsa dang 'brel ba'i phyir/ /de yis de ni 'phel 'gyur te/ /zhing gi yung ba dag dang mtshungs/ /bzhi par yan lag gsal dod 'gyur/ /lnga par sems
87b4(mdo 'grel): ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /drug par chu ba rtsa dang sbu/ /sen mo pags pa mdog stobs 'gyur/ /bdun pa dngos po thams cad kyis/ /yan lag kun ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /mngal gnas nad kyis nyen gzir na/ /de che snying dad
87b5(mdo 'grel): 'brel ba'i phyir/ /g.ya' dang tsha bar byed pa dang/ /pags gas rma bran 'byung bar 'gyur/ /der ni mar sar rgya shug chu/ /mngar ba'i sman sde bskol ba phan/ /lan tsha nyung zhing snum bag can/ /yang zhing mngar ba'i
87b6(mdo 'grel): kha zas bza' / /tsan dan pu shel tsi'i lde gus/ /brang dang nu ma lto la bsku/ /'bras bu gsum pa'am e ne ya/ /sha bkra ri bong khrag skyer bsku/ /ka ra bi ra'i lo ma dang/ /til mar bskol bas bskus te
87b7(mdo 'grel): ma nye ? pa to la dang nim pa btsod/ /be'u rug gis kyang bsku bar bya/ /skyer pa shing mngar chu yis ni/ /bkru dang bsku ba bsten par bya/ /zla ba brgyad bar ma dang bu/ /thangs de rim gyis gzi mdangs 'pho//
88a1(mdo 'grel): de yis de gnyis zhum dgar 'gyur/ /byis mdangs ma la mi gnas pas/ /de tshe btsas na mi 'tsho la/ /bud med the tshom bcas skabs 'gyur/ /'dir ni 'o ma can blud cing/ /mngar ba'i sman dang
88a2(mdo 'grel): bskol ba yis/ /mar gyi 'jam rtsi btang bya zhing/ /phyi sa snying pa dag bya'i phyir/ /la phug skam dang rgya shug skyur/ /bskal ba dag dang bskol ba bsngags/ /shat puShpa'i lde gu ni/ /rgya mtsha til mar 'jam rtsi btang/ /de tshe
88a3(mdo 'grel): zhag gcig 'das pa na yang/ /dus su btsas yin de phan chad/ /rlung gis dkur na bkag gyur na/ /lo yi bar du gnod pa bskyed/ /zla dgu lon na snum bcas pa'i/ /'bras chan sha khu blud pa bsngags/ /snum mang
88a4(mdo 'grel): nas thugs sbyin pa'am/ /sngar bshad pa yi 'jam rtsi btang/ /de nyid la bcug ras bal ni/ /mtshan bltar? brtugs gzhug par bya/ /rlung 'joms lo ma bskol ba'i chu/ /bgrangs pas nyin re bkrus pa phan//
88a5(mdo 'grel): zla dgu phan chad lus la ni/ /snum med par ni mi bzhag go /nu zho g.yas pa sngar phyung zhing/ /g.yas logs nas ni brten pa dang/ /'dri tshig skyes pa'i mi can smra/ /dga' zhing rmi lam skyes pa mthong// ?
88a6(mdo 'grel): ni g.yas par tho ba dang/ mngal yang kun nas zlum pa dag /bu skye gzhan du bu mor 'gyur/ /gang yang skyes ba phrad 'dod dang/ /glu gar rol mo la dga' dang/ /dri dang phreng chags bu mo skye/ /de 'dras pas
88a7(mdo 'grel): ni ma nyid 'gyur/ /sku yis dbus ni mtho ba yin/ /mtsha ma logs gnyis mtho bas ni/ /lte ba dam bar 'dug pa yin/ /dgu pa'i dad po nas brtsams te/ /sa phyogs shis shing yo byad ni/ /phun tshogs ldan pas
88b1(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i zhag /de ni btsas khyim zhugs par bya'o/ /der ni bud med btsas myong pas/ /bskor te btsa' ba' i dus par bsdad/ /deng dam sang ni bu btsa' rtags/ /snyom zhing dku dang mig lhod dub/ /smad du lci zhing yig 'chus/ /mchi lam
88b2(mdo 'grel): med zhing gcin mang 'gyur/ /brla dang rked pa blto ba dang rgyab/ /snying dang chu so brla rtsa na/ /mtshan mdze na zhing zug pa dang/ /'gul zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang dbang med gyur rjes su ni/ /de 'og mdal gyi tshu 'dzag 'gyur/ /de
88b3(mdo 'grel): nas mngal nang nas byung rtsom/ /bkra shis bsrungs pa'i cho ga byas/ /lag par 'bras bu skyes mi bzhag /les bskus chu ni dron por blug /mar dang bcas pa'i thug pa blud/ /de 'og sal mal bcas 'dug/ brla gnyis bkug ste gnas
88b4(mdo 'grel): rkyal gnas/ /yan lag yang nas yang du bsku/ /lte ba man chad mnye bya zhing/ /glal? dang 'chag pa byed du zhug /de ltas mngal gnas thur du 'byung/ /de rtags snying ga la 'phos nas/ /mngal gnas lto bar zhugs nas ni/ /chu so'i
88b5(mdo 'grel): steng na gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas dbang med nad ldan de/ /myur du khri la bzhag bar bya/ /de 'og mngal nas legs btsir nas/ /de yi mtshan ni dbye bar bya/ /dang por dal gyis bcir bya zhing/ /btsal khar drag tu btsir bar bya/ /de
88b6(mdo 'grel): nas bu skye'i sgra dang ni/ /chu dang rlung gis dga' ba bskye/ /bcas pa'i nang kyis gzir ba yi/ /srog bral 'bral ba slar gso ba/ /mngal du thogs na sbrul nag pa'i/ /bags pas mo mtshan bdug par bya/ /byar ? me tog
88b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba'am/ /lcam pa'am yang na pi sha la/ /rkang pa'am lag par gdags par bya/ /sha ma dbyung ba'i phyir yang ni/ /de dag nyid bya de nas brdeg /dpung pa gnyis nas bzung ste sbrug /rting pas mjug rdo rje gwa pa dad/ /rkub cos
89a1(mdo 'grel): dam du btsir bar bya/ /skra yis lkog ma rkan reg bya/ /snu? ha'i lo ma spyi bor blog /ltag ba ku ba langka li/ /sprul lpags ru rta yungs kar rnams/ /re re 'am gnyis sam ma lus pa/ /mo mtshan
89a2(mdo 'grel): byug pa 'am gdug par bya/ /ru rta 'am bal bu'i lde gu ni/ /chang dang ni rlung par bya/ /ku langtha'am bal ba za/ /chang rnying dag la btab ste blung/ /shu ti yungs kar zi ra dang/ /shi kru ti k+Sha ku krug tres/ /shing kun ru ta po son cha// 
89a3(mdo 'grel): 'o ma ba gcin yungs mar dang/ /bskol ba bshad ba'i sgo 'am ni/ /mo mtshan nas ni 'jam rtsi btang/ /shu ti shu dag ru rta dang/ /yungs kar pi pi ling lde gu/ snum dang lan tshwar bcas pa yi/ /mas btad sha ma myur du 'byin//
89a4(mdo 'grel): der thog rgyu ni rlung yin te/ /de bcom sha ma myur du 'byung/ /yang na lag bkrus sor mo bregs/ /mkhas pa yis ni drangs te dbyung/ /sha ma byung na mo mtshan dang/ /yan lag til mar gyis byugs mnye/ /mngal nad gzer ni chu so
89a5(mdo 'grel): mgo /lto ba gzer la thal sman ni/ /rnon po zhib tu btags pa dag/ mar ram chu mtsham sbyar ba blud/ /'u su bskol chu bu ram dang/ /tsha gsum dri bzed gsum btab blud/ /de nas byis pa'i nyer spyod kyi khyis pa ma ma skyong du gsung? /bu btsas bkres yod til mar ram/ /mar las
89a6(mdo 'grel): tshad chen blung bya ba/ /tsha ba lnga phye ran btab sbyin/ /de 'og bu ram chu dro na nam/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol chu blud de/ /des ni rlung nad ldang mi 'gyur/ /khrag dan dag kyang dag par byed/ /rim 'di zhag ni gnyis
89a7(mdo 'grel): gsum bya/ /snum mi 'phrod la ? ga 'di/ /snum med par ni bsten par bya/ /'thungs nas lto ba til mar dang/ /mar bskus nas ni gos kyis dkri/ /zhu nas khrus byas thug pa ni/ /sngar bshad sman dang bskol
109b1(mdo 'grel): brlung?/ /zhag gsum phan chad bi da ri/ /la sogs sman sde'i khu bar bskol/ /nad thug phan zhing snum mad pa'am/ /goms pa'i dbang las 'o thug blud/ /zhag bdun phan chad de la ni/ /rims kyis btab pa'i cho ga phan//
109b2(mdo 'grel): zhag ni bcu gnyis ma lon par/ /sha ni sbyin par mi bya'o// /mngal du 'phel dang bcos pa'i nad/ /gsher dang khrag 'dzag btsir ba yis/ /nad de gso dka' yin pa'i phyir/ /btsas tshe 'bad de rim gro bya/ /de ltar
109b3(mdo 'grel): zla ba phyed dang gnyis/ /kha zas gdams sogs dang bral nas/ /btsas pa'i ming dang bral ba'am/ /zla mtshan byung bar gyur bar du'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /lus kyi gnas kyi
109b4(mdo 'grel): le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas lus kyi rum du zhugs pa'i nang kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o/ /sgrun mas spangs par bya ba dag /bsten pa'am nad kyi dbang las ni/ /zla mtshan byung ba'am gzer
109b5(mdo 'grel): zhing ni/ /phyi nang snum dang bsil thabs bya/ /u shir pad+ma tsan dan dang/ /'o ma can shing shug pa yi/ /lde gu mar ni bsku ba dang/ /ras bal spangs ba bshad sgo dang/ /mo mtshan gnyis su tham bur gzhug/
109b6(mdo 'grel): lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar gyis ni/ /bsku ba 'am bud med de yi lu/ /u shir la sogs chu nang gzhug /khang sbrang rtsi ku mu da/ /pad+ma utpal ge sar ni/ /'o ma'i mar sbyar ka she ru/ /sh+ringka? ta ka sbyin
109b7(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /gasta? pri ya ma ku btang ni/ /chu skyes rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ /u ruM ba ra gzhon nu dang/ /ldan pa'i 'o ma skem ru blung/ /sa lu rtsa ba ka ko la/ /bA la gnyis dang shing mdang dang/ bu ram shing dang bskol ba yi//
90a1(mdo 'grel): 'o ma sa lu rtsa snar can/ /sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa'am/ /skam sa'i sha khu ldan par bka' / /bkru sman ma gtogs khrag mkhris kyi/ /gso dpyod bshad pa thams cad bya/ /zla gsum
90a2(mdo 'grel): ma mtshang bar du ni/ /khrag bskags phyir ni 'bad par bya/ /be'u sna bas ldan pa'am dgag bya ba/ /der ni bsil phan rtsub pa dang/ /snyung ba gla sgang u shing/ /sle tes 'u su a ra la/ /bi tsher dang ni sar ba ta//
90a3(mdo 'grel): tsan dan pa la bo da dkar/ /bskol ba'i chu ni blung par bya/ /rtsa 'bru las g.yo zas sbyin dang/ /mung+ga la sogs khus be'u snabs ni/ /bsal la snum sogs sngon bzhen ni btang/ /mngal ni rnam par 'jig 'gyur
90a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /mngal nang dag pa bya phyir dang/ /nad kyis gzir ba mi dra ne phyir/ /chad rno ci nus btud bar bya/ /de nas rtsa ba lnga bo ni/ /chud du'i thug pa rtsub ste blud/ /chad mi 'thung la thug pa ni/ /tsha ba lnga dang
90a5(mdo 'grel): bskol pa dang/ /bil ba la sogs lnga dang bskol/ /til dang rtsa 'bru can byin bya/ /zla pa dang mnyam nyin zhag rim/ /mngal 'jig pa la thug sogs sbyin/ /yang zhing snum dang lan chwa med/ /drod bskyed
90a6(mdo 'grel): ldan la phan pa yin/ /nad dang lus zungs ljan ljin ni/ /skam phyir cho ga 'di bya'o/ /de phan chad zad snum 'tham rtsi/ /stobs drong bskyad 'tsho byed sbyin/ /snying por ldan pas cher skyes la//
90a7(mdo 'grel): ma mtshan nas ni khrag 'dzag pas/ /mngal du skye bar ma nus la/ /lto na 'gul dang bcas par gnas/ /de ni so na gnas shes bya/ /des ni lto brgyas mi 'gyur/ /mya ngan sgyu de dang rtsub sogs sog?
90b1(mdo 'grel): yang na mngal na khrag 'jag pas/ /mngal du skya bar ma nus la/ /rlung khag skems shing bskams gyur pa'i/ /mngal de klu yi lto zhes bya/ /'dir ni lto ba rgyas gyur kyang/ /'grib cing yun rang lon na 'phar/ /de gnyis
90b2(mdo 'grel): rta dang rlung 'joms sman/ /mngar ba dag dang bskil ba yi/ /mar dang 'o ma tshim sbyin zhing/ /skyes ma thag pa'i sha sbyin bya// /de nyid kyi ni tshim bya'i phyir/ /khyogs dang gzhon par bskyon te bsgul ba/ /sngon po zhes bya mi
90b3(mdo 'grel): ma gul la/ /khra dang ba lang na sha dang/ /sgra sgrogs bya dang rma bya yis/ /sha khu mar ni mang po dang/ /mon sren dre'u dag dang ni/ /la phug dang ni khu ba blud/ /bilba gzhon nu mA Sha til/ /phye dang 'o ma sbyar ba blud/ /tshil bcas
90b4(mdo 'grel): sha dang sbrad char sbyin/ /rked pa bsgrub bsten par bya/ /de ni rtag tu dga' ba bskyed/ /de 'dras mdal ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rgyas pa gzhan du lo tshad nas/ /dka' bas bcas pa'am skye mi 'gyur/ /sbrum ma rtug pa 'gags
90b5(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ /snum mam mthun pa'i 'jam rtsi yis/ /myur ba kho na gso bar bya/ /gzhan du sbrum ma bu bcas 'chi/ /mngal du nad rab bsags pas sam/ /mi mthun pa'am gnod gzhan gyis/ /nang du shin lto
90b6(mdo 'grel): drang zhing/ rengs dang sbo dang nad tsha bas che/ /mngal mi mgul dang mgo 'khor skom/ /dbugs 'byin dka' zhing dub pa dang/ /dga' ba med cing mig gyur dang/ /dbang med nad ni med po 'byung/ /de la chu dron blugs
90b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /bu ram sbrad ma lan chwar bcas/ /btags pas mo mtshan bsku ba dang/ /shalma li dang zar ma yi/ /khu ba mar dang lde gur byas/ /nang du yang dang yang du /zhug/ sngags dang sha ma 'byin sbyor bya/ /gal te bu
91a1(mdo 'grel): shi ma byung na/ /de nas sman pa rgyal po la/ /zhus bde bar myur du dbyung/ /sha lma li yi thad chu mar/ /bcas pas lag pa mo mtshan bslu/ /lag pas dbyung nus de nyid kyi/ /lus ni legs par mi
91a2(mdo 'grel): gnas na/ /bcus shing bskyur dang bzlog pa dang/ /gtsir dang 'deg gzhan la sogs kyis/ /lugs dang mthun par drangs nas ni/ /mngal gyi sgor ni drang por drang/ /gang zhig rkang lag mgo ba ni/ /yon por
91a3(mdo 'grel): mngal du gnas gyur dang/ /rkang pa gcig ni mtshan du byung/ /gnyis pa bshad sgror tshud yon po/ /de ni 'gags pa zhes bya ste/ /tshon gyis bcad par 'os pa yin/ /las nges dkyil 'khor sor bdun
91a4(mdo 'grel): ba can/ /bcag bu gnyis ni bsngags pa yin/ /'phel btsag rtse mo rno bas na/ /mngal du btang bar mi bya'o/ /dang por mgo bo'i thod pa ni/ /phye ma rnam par dbyung bar bya/ /de nas mchan khung brad? kos ko/
91a5(mdo 'grel): rkan gyi phyogs ni gang rung bar/ /gtad de mngal gyi lcags kyu ni/ /brtan po dag dang mkhas pas bya/ /mgo bo ma phye mig sbubs dang/ /mkhur chos nas kyang drang bye zhing/ /phrag pa thogs nas dpung par bcad//
91a6(mdo 'grel): lto ba rlung gis spos gyur pa/ /nang grol bkral tam rgyu ma ni/ /phyi rol tu ni bton te dbyung/ /rked bar thogs na de bzhin du/ /de yi rus tshigs dbye bar bya/ /rlung gi dbang gi yan lag gang/ /mngal du thogs
91a7(mdo 'grel): pa de dang de/ /dum bur btubs la legs phyung ste/ /'bad de bud med bsrung bar bya/ /rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur pa/ /mngal gyi gnas skabs sna tshogs byed/ /de phyir de ni mkhas pa yis/ /gnas skabs
91b1(mdo 'grel): dag ni bltas te spyad/ /ma dang lhan cig 'chi 'gyur bas/ /gson po med la du spyad mi bya/ /'chi bar gyur pa dag la ni/ /yud tsam btang snyoms bzhag mi bya/ /mo mtshan 'gags dang nyams pa dang/ /gzer nad dbugs
91b2(mdo 'grel): kyi nyams thag dang/ /sgregs pa mnam dang lus grangs pa'i/ /mngal du bu shi bud med spang/ /de nas sha ma ma thon na/ /sman pas mngon bzhin dbyung bar bya/ /de ltar zug rdu phyung nas ni/ /chu dron gyis ni bkru bar bya/ /lus la
91b3(mdo 'grel): snum gyis byug pa dang/ /mtshan du ras bal snum can gzhug /des ni mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing/ /de yis gzir ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /la la phung dang bor da dkar/ /rasna shing kun sug mel dang/ /tsha ba lnga
91b4(mdo 'grel): yi phye ma snum/ /sbyar ba'am lde gu chu bskol blud/ /de bzhin nad rnams 'dzag pa dang/ /tshor bzhi phyir zhag gsum ni/ /bu tsa shel dang po da dkar/ /ba sha ba yi shun pa dang/ /shing kun te dzo ba ti rnams/ /btags
91b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phya ma 'am bskol ba blud/ /de nas zhag bdun bar du ni/ /snum nyid nye bar btud bar bya/ /dgongs ka chad ni rnying pa dang/ /de bzhin legs sbyar chad btung bya/ /shirsha ka ku bar bskol spangs/ /ras bal mo mtshan
91b6(mdo 'grel): nang du gzhug /brla gnyan gzhan dag gang byung pa/ /de la rang gi gso ba gso/ /rlung 'joms sman ni 'o mar bskol/ /zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan/ /zhog bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan/ /zhag bcu'i bar du sha khu btung/ /de phan chad ni yang shing btung /nyung du bza' zhing snum bsku
91b7(mdo 'grel): dugs/ /bA la'i til mar la sogs bsten/ /zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de/ /de ni rim gyis ci bder spyad/ /bA la'i rtsa ba'i khu ba ni?/ /chu drug 'o ma de mnyam dang/ /nas dang rgya shugs ku lartha?/ /rtsa ba bcu ba'i cha gcig dang/ /bskol
92a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i tsha ni char byas pa'i/ /til mar cha ni bcu bzhi dang/ /me tha gnyis dang thar shing rtsod/ /dam nye ba gnyis tsan dan dang/ /thal tres ru rta tsi pa ka/ rgyas spos rgyam tsha zangs rtsi ba/ /gla sgang rdo
92a2(mdo 'grel): dregs shu dag dang/ /pu na rnab a ka ru/ /a sho gand+ha nyer shing dang/ /k+Shi ra ku shu shing mdar dang/ /ba la ra sa shu ti dang/ /bar ni gnyis dang sug smel dang/ /shing tsha ganda pa tra rnams/ /zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu
92a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /til mar me chung la bskol ba/ /rlung nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ bud ces byis pa rus pa gnang/ /gnang dang skem la bsdags pa yin/ /rims skran gdon dang smyo byed dang/ /gcin nad rgyu ma
92a4(mdo 'grel): skyes pa sel/ /thad la 'bar gyis sngar gyis ni/ /nad rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad/ /ma ni shi che chu sor ni/ /mngal nas gal te kun 'phar na/ /de yi skye pa'i dus yin pas/ /dral te byis pa myur du dbyung//
92a5(mdo 'grel): shing mngar ka ko la sa bon dang/ /pa la sya rang thang shing bzhi/ /til nag sru sru'i rtsa ba dang/ /btsong dang nye'u shing zhes bya bzhi/ /brik+Sha dang ni pa ya smya?/ /utpal thal tres pri yaM ku /bi tsher thal tres ra sna dang/ /pad+ma dza ri
92a6(mdo 'grel): shing mngar dang/ /bring ? gnyis gtang pa la dang/ /'o shing myu gu shun pa dmar/ /pri sna pa r+Na bA la dang/ /sh+ri trug gze ma sle tres dang/ /shi ta tag dgun pad rtsa/ /shing mngar kha ra ka she ru/ /tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs pa yi//
92a7(mdo 'grel): bdun po 'di dag 'o mar sbyar/ /zla ba bdun la rim bzhin du/ /mngal 'dzeg pa la btang bar bya/ /ka bat+ti dang bilpa dang/ /bri ha tI dang bu ram dang/ /kAN+Da kA ri pa to la'i/ /rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang/ /de bzhin 'o ma sha rnams ni//
92b1(mdo 'grel): zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na btang/ /dgu pa thal tres e raN+Da/ /pa ya sye dang shid mngar dang/ /zla ba bcu par pa yatsha/ /'o ma dang ni bskol ba blung dang/ /yang na shing dang dong gra dang/ /thang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin/ /bud med dang la du rlung gis khra ka
92b2(mdo 'grel): bsgongs te/ /gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas/ /bu chags yin zhes mi mkhas pa dag smra/ /sman kha rnon dros khrag ni 'ba' zhig zags/ /blun po mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer/ /mdangs 'phrog yin phyir de lus
92b3(mdo 'grel): mngon sum du/ /'phrog par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni/ /gzhung 'dod ma ni btang snyoms 'jom mi bde/ /lus kyis gnas las le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o//
92b4(mdo 'grel): mdor na yan lag rnam drug ste/ /mgo dang khog pa dpung pa gnyis/ /brla gnyis yin te de nyid lag/ mig snying lag pa rkang pa sogs/ /sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro drI/ /go rim bzhin du nam mkha' rlung/ /me chu sa yi yon tan yin//
92b5(mdo 'grel): yon tan re res phyi ma skyed/ /de la mkha' la lus bu ga/ rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid /rlung la reg pa pags dbugs 'byin/ /me las mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid/ /chu las lce dang ro dang gsher/ /sa las sna dri dus pa yin/ /'dir ni
92b6(mdo 'grel): ma las skyes 'jam khrag/ sha dang rkad dang gzhang kha sogs/ /pha skyes brtan dang khu chu dang/ /rtsa bo che sogs skra rus yin/ /sems las sems byung dbang po rnams/ /skyes gnas sna tshogs rnams kyang 'byung/ /goms
92b7(mdo 'grel): pa las byung nad med tsho/ /le lo med stobs gzi' mdangs yin/ /mdangs ma las byung lus skye dang/ /gnas dang 'phel dang mi brkam nyid/ /snying stobs can gtsang yod par lta/ /chos dkar la dga' blo gros
93a1(mdo 'grel): ldan/ /rdul can mang du smra ba dang/ /nga rgyal tshul 'chos khros phrag dog/ mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang/ /gnyis dang le lo skye ba'o/ /de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin lus/ /de la khrag skyes pags rim bdun//
93a2(mdo 'grel): 'o ma las ni spris ma bzhin/ /sman pa'i tshe ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus zungs gnas ni nang gsher gyi/ /rang gi drod gyis sman pa na/ /bad kan rgyus pa shams g.yogs/ /char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra/ /bdun po de dag
93a3(mdo 'grel): gnas bdun ste/ /dang po khrag yin gzhan rim bzhin/ /bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhug /rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad/ /bud med mngal /gnas brgyad pa ste/ /mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas/ /'di la nang
93a4(mdo 'grel): grol yan lag gnas/ /snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma/ /pho pa drod pa rgyu ma dang/ /gnyer ma long ga lgang pa'o/ /srog gi gnas ni rnam bcu ste/ /mgo dang lce yi rtsa ba dang/ /lkog ma khrag dang snying lte ba/ /chu so
93a5(mdo 'grel): khu chu dang dang sa bzhad?/ lus l rtsa dra chu ba ste/ /re re bcu drug yod par bshad/ /? dra drug dang srub 'dra bdun/ /po mtshan lce dang mgo la brten/ /de dang btsag bu gdab mi rung/ /sha yi thag pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rus pa'i tshogs
93a6(mdo 'grel): 'dus bcu bzhi yi/ /mtshams ni dgu phrag gnyis yod pa/ /so dang sen mor bcas pa yi/ /rus pa sum brgya drug cu yin/ /thad la 'bar rus sum brgyar 'dod/ /tshigs ni nyes brgya rtsa bcur
93a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /rgyun shes bu ni tshigs kyi grangs/ /nyis stong dag ni yod par 'dod/ /rgyus pa dgu brgya skyes pa la/ /sha ni spang tshad lnga brgya yod/ /bud med kyi ni nu ma dang/ /mo mtshan la gnas nyi shu lhag/
93b1(mdo 'grel): rtsa tshe na rtsa ba snying la gnas/ /de dag kun gyis lus kun khyab/ /dangs ma'i bdag nyid dangs su 'gyur/ /de ni 'byal ba kun dang 'brel/ /rtsa ba sbom zhing rtse rab phra/ /lo ma'i rtsa ltar byes pa yin/ /gyes pa de las rtsa bran
93b2(mdo 'grel): ni bdun brgyad dag tu gyur ba yin/ /de la yan lag re re zhing/ /brgya brgya der ni gnas pa yin/ /de las dbugs par mi bya ba/ /rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin ces bya/ /nang na gnas pa'i gsum po yin/ /rked par//
93b3(mdo 'grel): bcu drug phra gnyis te// /de las brla yi rtsa gnyis dang/ /rkad pa'i gnas rnams gnyis gnyis te/ /de brgyad bcog bus gdab mi bya /rtsi ba logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug /de las gyen 'gro zhes bya spang//
93b4(mdo 'grel): rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/ /sgal tshigs gyi ni ngos gnyis na/ /de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba/ /mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o/ /rgyab bzhin lto ba gnas rtsa dang/ /pho mtshan steng na gnas
93b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /spu yi 'phreng pa ngos gnyis rtsa/ /gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis mig dab po/ /brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las/ /bcu bzhi dbug par mi bya ste/ /nu mjid de yi rtsa ba dang/ /snying
93b6(mdo 'grel): ga dag ni so sor gnyis/ /gnod bral gnang ni gnyid po dang/ /mi gsal zhes bya gnyis kyi gnyis/ /mgrin pa ltag pa 'dra ba las/ /sngon po mjid pa ltag pa dang/ /'gal ba dang ni ma mo brgyad//
93b7(mdo 'grel): bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya/ /'gram pa bcu drug de la gnas/ /mtshams ni 'brel par byed pa spang/ /lce yang 'gram pa dang 'dra'o/ /'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang/ /k+tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang/ /sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/ /de la dri tshor byed gnyis dang/ /rka na
94a1(mdo 'grel): du 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis spangs/ /mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug /'byed dang 'dzum pa'i las byed pa/ /gnyis gnyis dang ni mig 'gram gnyis/ /dug po de dag spang bar bya/ /mig dang snar gnas dpral ba la /brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu
94a2(mdo 'grel): las/ /bzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis/ /skra mtshams gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi ste/ /bdun po de dag mtshon gdab spang/ /rna bar bcu drug de las 'dir/ /sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang/ /de nyid las ni mur 'gram gyi/ /mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis
94a3(mdo 'grel): po spang/ /spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni/ /gyen 'gro skra mtshams bdag po las /so so re re spang bar bya/ /de ltar yan lag re re'i rtsa/ /dbye ba dbug min shes phyir bshad/ /de la lus la dbug mi rung/ /ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod/ /dog dang rtsa
94a4(mdo 'grel): mdud shin tu phra/ /yo dang tshigs la gnas mi dbug /rtsa ni bdun brgya de rnams las/ /bzhi char khrag ni so sor rgyu/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan khrag /nad med khrag ni de ltar nas/ /de ni lus la phan 'dogs te/ /gzhan du gnod bskyed par 'gyur
94a5(mdo 'grel): de la gnag dang dmar dang phra/ /skad cig re re gang zhing stongs/ /mgul pa rlung ni khrag rtsa yin/ /reg na tsha zhing myur du rgyu/ /mdog sngo ser bar 'dug pani/ /mkhris pa khrag rtsa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /dkar snum brtan gang bad kan rtsa/ /'dres pa'i mtshan
94a6(mdo 'grel): nyid 'dren ma yin/ /mi mngon mnyam gnas snum pa dang/ /mdog dmar khrag rtsa nad med yin/ /rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi/ /lte ba la ni brten pa yin/ /de rnams kyis bskor lte ba yin/ /'khor lo'i lte ba rtsibs bsgom mtshungs/ /das ni steng 'og thad
94a7(mdo 'grel): sa ru/ /lus 'di rjes su 'dzin pa yin/ /phug sna dang rna ba gnyis/ /mig gnyis rkub chos po mtshan gyi'o/ /bud med nu ma gnyis khrag sgo/ /gsum gyis lhag bar gyur pa yin/ /nang gi sgrog gi gnas gyur pa'i/ /bu ga bcu gsum yod par
94b1(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /srog dang lus zungs dri ma chu/ /zas rgya mi mthun bsten pa yis/ /de las gnod pas nad skyed la/ /skyon med dag bas bde bar byed/ /rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam shing/ /zlum dang sbom dang phra ba yin/ /pu ga'i dbyibs ni ring po ste/ /lo ma'i rtsa
94b2(mdo 'grel): 'phros lta bu yin/ /zas dang spyod lam dag gis gang/ /nad kyi mthu dang mnyam gyur dang/ /gang yang lus zungs ma mnyam ste/ /bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin/ /mang du 'byung ba 'am pa 'gags pa'am/ /rtsa ni mdung pa chags pa'am/ /lam gzhan dag tu
94b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba ni/ /bu ga'i rgyun 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin/ /par ma'i rtsa ba phra mo las/ /ring du rgyu ba byed pa lta ba /rang gi dangs mnyer 'phel ba'i/ /lus kyi sgro ni bug yin/ /bug rnams ni brdol 'gyur na/ /'dar myos lto sbos skyug dang rims/ /dpal dang ga ?
94b4(mdo 'grel): dang bshang gci 'gags/ /yang na 'chi banyid du 'gyur/ /de bas sman pas bu ga brtol/ /re thag bcad te gos par bya/ /'phrul du rma byung cho ga yis/ /'bar de zug rdu dbyung bar bya/ /zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni/ /'ju byed yin zhes sngar bshad do/ /nad dang
94b5(mdo 'grel): lus zungs dri ma yi/ /drod yin zhes ni rgyun shes zer/ /de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing/ /'dzin pas 'dzin byed ces bshad do/ /de nyid thang la 'phang gzhung gis/ /mkhris bas 'dzin pa'i cha du bshad/ /tshe dang nad med ? gzi mdangs/ /lus zungs me
94b6(mdo 'grel): drong stobs 'phel byed/ /zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor zhugs pa/ /zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin/ /de ni stobs ldan zos pa rnams/ /zhu nas thur du 'dren par byed/ /stobs zhan phyir ni kha zas ni/ /ma smin nyid du 'byung bar byed/ /'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de//
94b7(mdo 'grel): de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin/ /de bas me drong nyams gyur na/ /'dzin byed nad ni skyed par byed/ /? gang lus kyi lus zungs mdangs/ /stobs dpag bdog sogs rgyas byed/ /de rgyu ba zas me dred ni/ /mi 'du dangs ma sogs ci 'gyur//?
95a1(mdo 'grel): dus su zos 'gyur la /lto bar srog ni rlung gis drangs/ /kom gyis gong po rnam par phye/ /snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin/ /mi mnyam gnas kyis bus nas ni/ /ma zhu'i gnas na gnas smin byed/ /phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar/ /lto
95a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i ma yis 'ju bar byed/ /dang po ro drug zas kyang ni/ /mngar ba nyid du gyur nas su/ /lbu ba can 'gyur bad kan 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i gnas na pho ba na/ /rnam par 'tshe bas skyur nyid gyur/ /mkhris 'gyur 'phos pa'i rjes la ni/ /ma drod kyis skams zhu ba dang//
95a3(mdo 'grel): kha zhing gong bur gyur rlung skyed/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /nam mkha' bcas pa'i dreng lnga bo/ /rang dang yon tan zas lnga pa'o/ /sa sogs kyis smin de 'og tu/ /de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas/ /smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin/ /sa du gtogs bas sa
