95a4(mdo 'grel): nyid dang/ /lhag mas lus btogs lhag ma rgyas/ /zas de zhu ba'i tshigs ma dang/ /dangs ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur/ /de la zas kyi tshigs ma bla/ /gcen 'gyur bskab pa bshad par 'gyur/ /dangs ma las khrag de las sha /sha las tshil te de las
95a5(mdo 'grel): dus/ /dus rkang de las khu ba yin/ /khu ba las ni mngal gnas 'gyur/ /lus zungs tshigs ma rim bzhin du/ /bad mkhis bu ga'i dri ma dang/ /rdul dang ba spu sen mo dang/ /mig bags bshad rnams mdangs yin no/ /de ltar lus zungs smin pa las//
95a6(mdo 'grel): dangs ma tshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur/ /lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig /phan tshun nye bar brten pa yin/ /zas? 'jud bas ma sogs rim gyis/ /bu chur 'gyur bde la ni /nyin zhag cig 'dod bzhan dag ni/ /zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod//?
95a7(mdo 'grel): zungs kyis rdzas kyi rgyun/ /'khor lolta bur yongs su 'khor/ /ro co la sogs mthu yis ni/ /'phral du khu ba la sogs kyed/ /phal cher sman gzhan nyid zhag ni/ /gcig gis las rnams byed ba yin/ /khyab byed gyis dang? ? zungs rnams/ /'thor bar
35b1(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i las kyis ni/ /cig car rgyun ma 'chad kun tu/ /lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor/ /gtor tshe bu ga'i skyon gyis ni/ /dangs ma gang du chags gyur te/ /der ni gnod pa skyed byed pa /mkha' la sbrin chags char 'bab mtshungs/ /nang kyang ma snyoms gyur pa las//
35b2(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig 'dus na ldang bar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'byung ba lus zungs me'i/ /las ni yongs su bshad pa yin/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /dangs ma lus zungs rang rang gi /smin byed kun la zas 'ju'i me/ /de ni lhag pa yin par 'dod/ /de ni rtsa bar 'phel 'phel/ /zad gyur
35b3(mdo 'grel): gag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin/ /zas skom rigs shing phan pa yis/ /de 'bad pas bsrung? gnas gyur na/ /tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na gnas/ /mnyam las gzhan 'gro drong mi snyoms/ /mkhris
35b4(mdo 'grel): pa shas che rno bar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis gnod me drod chung/ /me dod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno/ /chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin/ /gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa/ /legs par 'ju nyid mnyam pa yin/ /legs par ma zos myur 'ju 'am/ /legs zas ring zhig
35b5(mdo 'grel): 'ju mi mnyam/ /zlas ni legs par ma zos kyang/ /myur 'ju me drong rno ba yin/ /zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang/ /ring nas 'ju zhing kha bskams dang/ /spro dang rgyu ma 'khrug pa dang/ /lci ba ma drong chung ba yin/ /me drong nyams na 'chi 'gyur cing/ /skyon med na ni yun
35b6(mdo 'grel): ring 'tsho/ /ma snyoms nang ni skye 'gyur bas/ /de phyir me drod gtso bo yin/ /lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang/ /dus skyes rigs pa las gyur gsum/ /de la lus sems las byung ba/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs/ /na chod dus chig ba las byung ba/ /dus
35b7(mdo 'grel): skyes yin de rig ba las/ /byung ba spyod lam zas kyis bskyed/ /de bzhin skyed sbyor pas byung ba/ /yul phyogs shing chu nyung ma/ /skams nad nyung skyed byed yin/ /rlan can de las bzlog pa yin/ /cha mnyam thun mong yin ? bshad/ /rkang la chal dang zhag dang
96a1(mdo 'grel): gcin/ /mkhris pa bad kan phyis khrag /dngos mchu rnams lus gnas yin/ /snyim pa re res bskyed par bya/ /dangs dang klad rgyas khu chu ni/ /re re'ang rang gi khyor gang yin/ /bud med nu zho snyim do dang/ /zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi yod do/ /lus zungs
96a2(mdo 'grel): mnyam gnas tshad 'di yin/ /de las 'phel dang zad shes bya/ /khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas /spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs las/ /gang zhig nyes pa lhag 'gyur des/ /rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad/ /khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang/ /stobs ldan pa
96a3(mdo 'grel): dang gzhan ldang byed/ /rang dbang can dang nad mang phyir/ /nang rnams phal cher rlung stobs can/ /de nyid kyis ni rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams ni/ /nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can skra gshor pags pa gas/ /grang lhags mi bzad brtan bran blo gros spyod mdza' sred/ /blta dang
96a4(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba g.yo zhing smra ba shin tu mang/ /bad kan nor nyung tshe thung gnyid srab dang/ /gcom chung tshigs thogs g.yo zhing skang 'dzer dang/ /chad lta mang du za zhing sgreg dang bcas/ /glu dang rgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga' / /mngar sgyur kha dang tshe bo'i ro goms sred/ /lus
96a5(mdo 'grel): skyem dbyibs ring 'gro che sgra dang bcas/ /mi brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa min/ /bud med mi chags bu mang skyed mi 'gyur/ /de yi mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang/ /zlum zhing mi mdzes 'ching blta bu dang/ /phye na'ang gnyed log lta bur snang ba yin/ /de ni shing ? 'dzeg mkhar
96a6(mdo 'grel): 'bu rim/ /skal ngan ser sna che zhing khengs pa dang/ /rku zhing byin snying rtsa ring bcas pa dang/ /khyi dang lba dang rnga mo bya rgod khra/ /byi ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i rlung can yin/ /mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung ba'i phyir/ /mkhris pa rgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che/ /mdog
96a7(mdo 'grel): ser lus tsha rkang lag gdong yang dmar/ /skra ser spu nyung dba' zhing nga rgyal che/ /phreng ba byug pa rgyan la lhag par dag la/ /spyod bzang gtsang sbra che zhing mnyes gshin pa/ /'byor ldan rtul phod blo gros stobs dang ldan/ /'jigs nyen dgra yang skyabs 'ongs skyob
96b1(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /yid gzhungs tshigs 'tshams shin rab tu lhod/ /bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung/ /gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo nang gyur la/ /zas ni mngar dang kha dang ska bsil za bar dga' / /than pa mi bzod rdul zhing dring la/ /bshad
96b2(mdo 'grel): gci bza' gtung khro dang phrag dog mang/ /rmi lam dod kha ba la sha'i me tog /glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mnga' nyi ma mthong/ /'di yi lus phra mig ser g.yo ba dang/ /rdzi ma srab cing nyung ba grang la dga' / /khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /mig ni myur bar dmar
96b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba yin/ /tshe ni ran cing stobs ni 'bring ba dang/ /mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag las sran chung 'gyur/ /stag dang dred dang spre'u byi la dang/ /gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin/ /bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil cing/ /rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing
96b4(mdo 'grel): sha rus 'brel/ /bkras skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod/ /blo ldan snying stobs cha zhing dam bcas brtan/ /pri yaM ku dang dur bA 'dam bu'i mdog /tshon dang 'gi wang pad+ma gser mdog can/ /lag dar ring zhing brang ni yangs la rgyas/ /dpral ba'i dbyes che skra ni 'thug cing
96b5(mdo 'grel): gnag lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang/ /mdangs che khu bcung bu tsha g.yog 'khor mar/ /chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed/ /dgra la zhe sdang 'dam ring khon 'dzin byed/ /glang po'i mchog ni dregs bcas lta bur 'gro/ /rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdzi rnga seng ge yi//
96b6(mdo 'grel): sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan/ /byis pa'i tshe na'ang du dang brkam shas chung/ /zas ni kha bska che dang dro zhing rtsug /nyung du zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan/ /mig gi mdza' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs/ /dkar gnag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan/ /smra dang khra dang
96b7(mdo 'grel): bza' btung spyod pa nyung/ /tshe ring nor mang ring blta tshig 'jam smra/ /dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan/ /rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mdza' ring/ /byas bzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo mtshar ldan/ /bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten/ /rmi lam pad+ma bya yi 'phreng
97a1(mdo 'grel): bar bcas/ /chu'i gnas dang sprin kyang mthong ba'o/ /tshangs ba drag po dbang po chu lha dang/ /nam mkha' lding dang dad pa glang po mchog /de bzhin seng+ge dang ni khyu mchog dang/ /bad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya/ /rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung
97a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed/ /gtsang spra yod par smra tshogs kyi/ /yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad/ /na tshong bcu drug bar byis pa/ /de las lus zungs dbang po gzi/ /'phel 'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar na/ /zad pa phan chad rgan po yin/ /rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi/
97a3(mdo 'grel): lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod/ /sbu med gnag dang shin tu sbom/ /ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas/ /smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan/ /gang yin de ni de snod yin/ /skra ni rab snum 'jam pa dang/ /phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan/ /dbral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'phyad/ /zla ba kham ba 'dra ba
97a4(mdo 'grel): bzang/ /rna brgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes/ /rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas/ /mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang/ /rdzi ma 'thug cing snyoms pa bzang/ /sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung/ /sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang/ /mtshun dmar zhing ma 'phyangs pa/ /'gram pa yangs shing mi
97a5(mdo 'grel): 'bur bzang/ /kha tshe so yi thags dam la/ /snum zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyoms/ /lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab/ /kos ko che zhing sha yis rgyas/ /mgrin pa zlum zhing sha rgyas zlum/ /pags pa mtho zhing sha yis rgyas/ /lte ba zlum zhing g.yas su 'khyil/ /rkang lag legs
97a6(mdo 'grel): sems 'jam la dmar/ /snum zhing kun dmar sha rgyas ba/ /sor mo ring zlum bu ga med/ /rgyab zheng che zhing sgal tshigs nub/ /tshig 'tshams mi mngon dam pa dang/ /tshig gsang mdza' o zhing brtan pa dang/ /mdog snum kha dog brtan lar gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis
97a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung snying stobs brtan/ /phongs pa'i tshe yang zhum pa med/ /mngal gnas brtsams ste nad med pa/ /gong nas gong du zhing bzang ba/ /shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni/ /'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur/ /de ltar yon tan kun ldan ba'i/ /lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag
97b1(mdo 'grel): du /tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi/ /dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas/ /pags pa khrag sogs snying stobs bar/ /brgyad po'i phyi ma bzhin du mchog /stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir/ /lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad/ /snying po kun dang ldan pa
97b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /mchog tu bkur bar bya bar 'gyur/ /rtsom pa kun la 'dar bcas dang/ /bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur/ /dregs dang zhum pa med par ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal bsten gyur pa/ /snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs/ /mun pa can ni de lta min//
97b3(mdo 'grel): sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bden/ /tshangs par spyod dang byas pa bzo/ /byams ldan bcud kyis len rten ga /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel pa'i sde'o/ /lus kyi gnas las le'u gsum pa'o// //
97b4(mdo 'grel): de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o/ /gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa/ /de las bcu gcig brla dang ni/ /de bzhin lag dang gnyis so sor/ /lto ba la gsum brad la dgu /rgyab la bcu bzhi na mchod ni/ /yan chad sum
97b5(mdo 'grel): cu rtsa bdun yod/ /rkang ba'i mthil na gung mo yi/ /thad kA na ni mthil 'phrog ba/ /gnad yod ces ni rnam bshad de/ /de phug nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te/ /de phug bskyod ba'i nad kyis 'chi/ /de gong sor gnyis
97b6(mdo 'grel): par shes bya/ /rkang pa 'khor zhing 'dar bar byed/ /long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste/ /de bcad skad? dang nang skyed byed/ /byin pa'i rkang pa gnyis kyi bar/ /long mo gnad rongs bems por byed/ /byin pa'i nad na nya zhes/ /khrag zad pa
97b7(mdo 'grel): yis 'chi bar byed/ byin pa brla mtshams bus mo ste/ /de phug gson yang 'theng por 'gyur/ /phus gong sar gsum par gnyan gong/ /de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed/ /brla'i nad blar dbang zhes bya ba/ /de phug khrag zed brla skams 'gyur//
98a1(mdo 'grel): brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba/ /khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed 'joms/ /brla rtsar rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad/ /ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed/ /de dag brla yi dpung de bzhin/ /mkhrig ma 'dir ni long mong mtshungs/ /gru mo
98a2(mdo 'grel): byin 'dra de gnyis phug /zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni/ /mchan khung nang na mtshon khung 'dzin/ /de ? zha ba nyid du 'gyur/ /long ka'i gnad ni gzhan zhes bya/ /de phug gzhar rlung gis 'phral gsod/ /lgang pa gzhu ltar yo ba yi/ /cho? sa'i gnad ni sha
98a3(mdo 'grel): khrag nyung/ /dbus na kha cig thung du ltas/ /rked pa'i dbus gnas srog 'phral 'joms/ /rde'u 'byin rma bug gnas ma gtogs/ /der yang ngos gnyis de phug 'dra/ /gcin 'dzag gnas dang gcig de phug /rma ni 'tsho ba shin tu dka' / /lus
98a4(mdo 'grel): kyi zhu dang mzhu'i gnas/ /dbus na lte ba rtse kun gyi/ /rten yin de'ang 'phral gsed byed/ /ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor gyur/ /'dod chags sogs gnas snying zhes bya/ /brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas/ /nu mjid nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya/ /steng 'og sor
98a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis nu ma'i gnad/ /de phug bad kan khrag gis ni/ /rim bzhin lto'i gyings 'jig par byed/ /dangs bral brang gi nges gnyi na/ /rtsa sbubs gnyis bor rlung rgyu ba/ /de phug khong ba khrag gis gang/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi/ /rgyab kyi
98a6(mdo 'grel): sgal tshigs brang gi bar/ /de gnyis kyi ni ngos gnyis na/ /phrag pa gnyis kyi logs na ni/ /mi gsal zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/ /de gnyis phug pos khong pa ni/ /khrag khengs brnag ste 'chi bar byed/ /sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis
98a7(mdo 'grel): na/ /rked pa cha gnyis la gnas dang/ /rku btsos lhag gnas skal tshigs rten/ /rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad/ /de snang khrag zad skya rbab dang/ /gzugs nyams pas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi//
98b1(mdo 'grel): rkang pa'i mchams ni gang yin pa/ /ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na/ /khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/ /de snang bskyod pa nyams pa dang/ /ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtsi ba logs gnyis dang 'brel/ /sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi /gnas ni
98b2(mdo 'grel): g.yogs par gyur pa dag /ro rmad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas/ /de sna dor smad skrangs bar byed/ /nyam chung 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsi ba logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel/ /rked ba'i ngos gnyis dbus na gnas/ /thad ka nad ni gyen gnas pa/ /rtsi ba
98b3(mdo 'grel): logs mtshams su de phug na /khod pa khrag gis gang ba dang/ /lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur/ /num gnyis kyi thad kyi che/ /rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa/ /rtsa chen zhes byad de phug na/ /khrag zad nas ni 'chi bar byed/ /dbung mgo gnyis
98b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'brel ba dang/ /sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/ /phrag pa gnyis kyi sogs pa ste/ /de snang skams shing tshor bral 'gyur/ /mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis kyi/ /dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar/ /phrag par phrag pa la brtan gnang/ /de phug
98b5(mdo 'grel): lag pa bya ba nyams/ /srol gong gi ni ngos gnyis na/ /'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa/ /bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis/ /gnyis po mjing ba'i gnang du bshad/ /de phug skad 'gags mi sdug 'gyur/ /lce yis ro ni tshor ba med/ /lkog ma'i sbubs kyi
98b6(mdo 'grel): ngos gnyis na/ /lcer dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa/ /so sor bzhi gzhi yod ma mo/ /de bcad 'phral du srog 'joms so/ /mgo bo rke mtshams ltag pa ste/ /de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur/ /rna ba gnyis 'og lco pa na/ /rna rtsa zhes bya 'on par 'gyur/ /sna
98b7(mdo 'grel): yi bug gnyis dang ni/ /rna ba'i lam 'gro mgrin nad gnas/ /sbrul mgo zhes bya de bcad na/ /dri mi tsher bar byed par 'gyur/ /mig gnyis kyi phyi rol mtshams/ /smin ma skyes pa yi mdza' 'o/ /mig zung smin ste dang dma' bar gnas//
99a1(mdo 'grel): 'khyil pa phug pas yod par 'gyur/ /rna mtshan dbral ba'i nang na ni/ /mur 'gram ces bya 'phral 'chi byed/ /mur 'gram gnyis te skra mtshams na/ /'deg pa zhes bya gzhag pa'ang/ /smin mtshams par gnas gsum char la
99a2(mdo 'grel): 'ang/ /zug rdu dag ni ma phyung zhing/ /sman nas rang nyid byung nas 'tsho/ /phyung na 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lce mig sna dang rna pa yi/ /bu ga'i bzhin 'dus pa dag /rkan dang sgor ru kha bzhin ste/ /bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams kyi/ /gnad ni sum mdo
99a3(mdo 'grel): ris zhes bya/ /de bcad srog ni 'phral du 'dor/ /thod pa'i ni mchams lnga pa'o/ /thad ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mdza' / /de snyad pas ni mgo 'khor dang/ /smo zhing dran pa nyams ste 'chi/ /spyi bo'i steng du gtsug 'khyil pa'i/ /rtsa dang ldan
99a4(mdo 'grel): sprul 'dus pa na/ /spu 'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i/ /gnad kyis srog ni 'jig bar byed/ /gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul/ /rab na de gnang yin zhes bya/ /sha rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang/ /rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus ba ru/ /gnad ces bya
99a5(mdo 'grel): stengs na da re/ /srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin/ /mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi/ /gnad ni rnam pa drug tu brtag /srog gi gnas su thun mong pas/ /gnad ni gcig tuAng gnas pa yin/ /sha gtogs bcu ste byin lag nya/ /mthil 'phrog?
99a6(mdo 'grel): nu rtsa nu mjing do/ /rus pa'i gnad brgyad mur 'gram dang/ /rkyed pa can dang gzhon nu dang/ /ro smad dang ni sogs pa'o/ /rgyus ba'i gnang ni nyi shu gsum/ /gnyan gong zhes bya pir dang ni/ /per? mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang/ /phrag pa gzhag
99a7(mdo 'grel): dang chu so'o/ /rtsa chen gnang ni rnam dgu ste/ /gzhang dang rengs bral rna rtsa dang/ /sum mdo'i res zhes bshad pa'o/ /rtsal gnas gnad sum cu bdun /rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo/ /'gram pa mtshan khung 'dzin sprul mgo /ljon shing snying dang lta ba dang//
99b1(mdo 'grel): rtsi ba logs mtshams dang nu ma'i 'og /mig gsal gzhag dang brla dbang dang/ /dmar bo zhes bya bzhi po'o/ /tshigs la nyi shu 'khyil bdag /khrig ma gnyis dang khung bu dang/ /mtshams mdza' gru mo long mo dang/ /ltag ba bus mo bdag po'o/ /gzhan dag
99b2(mdo 'grel): gzhar sha'i gnad ces zer/ /mchan khung gnyis dang ljon shing ni/ /rgyas pa la brten rna rtsa dang/ /sum mdo'i ris dang rengs bral dang/ /mig 'gram rtsa ni gnad yin gyis /rtsa chen gnas par de ma bshad/ /sha yi gnad bcad khrag rgyun 'dzag /sha bkrus
99b3(mdo 'grel): 'drar gyur sla ba dang/ /skya zhing dbang bo nyams pa dang/ /myur du 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /dus gnas gnad bcad rkang bcas ni/ /sla dang bar bar chad cing 'dzag /rgyus pa'i gnad bcad na zhing 'khrug /brkyang bskum mi shes gnod bar 'gyur/ /'gro
99b4(mdo 'grel): dang rten gnas nus pa chung/ /dbang po nyams pa 'am 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rtse chen gnad bcad lbu ba dang/ /sgra bcas 'byur zhing dran nyams 'gyur/ /rtsa'i gnad bcad khrag ska zhing/ /rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'byung/ /de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /sgom
99b5(mdo 'grel): rmong skyigs bus 'debs pas 'chi/ /lus ni gram lta bus khyag /'tsho bas kyang sgur po'am thed por 'gyur/ /tshigs gnang stobs dang spyod pa nyams/ /lus skam tshigs ni skrangs bar? 'gyur/ /lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzhang/ /snying dang chu so sum mdo'i ris//
99b6(mdo 'grel): ma mo brgyad de bcu dgu go/ /'phral du srog ni gsod par byed/ /de rnams 'phral du mi 'chi'ang/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi/ /rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsi ba logs mtshams/ /rked pa can gzhan mtshams kyi mdza' / /nu rtsa dbang ? yi gnang/ /rgya tshigs
99b7(mdo 'grel): mi gsal rtsa chen gyi/ /ro smad nu 'jir sum cu gsum/ /zla ba'am zla phyed gson nas ni/ /dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed/ /bde ga dang bzhag pa zhes bya gsum/ /der ni zug rngu phyung gyur na/ /rlung gis sha dang tshil dab rkang/ /klad rgyas rnams ni skyems par
100a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ /mtshon byung lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /sbrul mgo mig zung rna rtsa dang/ /sngon po 'gram gnas lhag pa'i gnad/ /phrag pa'am phrag sogs 'khyil ba dang/ /ljon shing bla dbang khung
100a2(mdo 'grel): bu dang/ /mig dmar bus mo'i gnad dang bcas/ /mtshan 'dzin bar 'dra gre mo'i gnad/ /de ltar gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhi/ /rkang lag 'ja' byed gyur ba'am/ /gal te tshabs cher snad 'gyur na/ /des ni srog kyang 'joms par byed/ /par mgo
100a3(mdo 'grel): 'dra dang long mo dang/ /mkhrig mi'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs tshe/ /de las jon shing mtshan khur 'dzin/ /brla dang pir 'go lta bu ste/ /bcu gnyis so cig tshad yin no/ /mkhrig ma dang ni lo ngo ma dang/ /nu ma'i rtsa bsor gnyis tshad/ /pus mo gru mo
100a4(mdo 'grel): sor gsum tshad/ /gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying/ /sdong po mtshams mdza' ma mo dang/ /pir 'dra sum mdo'i ris 'grem pa/ /gdad ni nyi shu rtsa dgu'i tshad/ /rang gi lag mthil tshad yin no/ /lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug /sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod//
100a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste/ /'bras tsam gyi ni tshad duAng 'dod/ /rtsa bzhi bshad pa gang yin pa/ /lus kun rtas pa byed pa gang/ /de ni gnad la gnas pa yin/ /des na de phug khrag drag byung/ /lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir/ /rlung las
100a6(mdo 'grel): nang ni mi bzad 'debs/ /rlung gis mkhris ba rgyas par byed/ /mkhris ba rgyas par gyur pas na/ /skom dang mgo 'khor kha skams myos/ /lus rdul rigs 'bye lus lhod dang/ /de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro /gnad chod na ni myur ba ru/ /tshogs
100a7(mdo 'grel): ni phyogs su bcad pas na/ /rtsa ni 'khums par byed pa yin/ /de la srog chags rnams kyi srog /khrag gnas na ni gnas pa yin/ /de bas gnad min log phog na/ /nges par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'ga' zhig sman pa'i
100b1(mdo 'grel): yon tan dang/ /phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis/ /'cho kyang dbang po ma tshar 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad de gnang du ni/ /thal sman me btsa' la sogs spang/ /gnad du phog pa chu ngus kyang/ /phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin/ /de bzhin gnang
100b2(mdo 'grel): la brten pa'i gnad/ /rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya/ /lus kyi gnad las le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas lus kyi lus 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya
100b3(mdo 'grel): ba le'u bshad par bya'o// //ji ltar 'bras bu'i me tog dang/ /me yi du ba char dang sbyin/ /phyis byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi/ /'chi ltas med na ming chi
100b4(mdo 'grel): la/ /'chi ltas snang na 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /'chi ltas 'chi ltas mi shes pa/ /mi mkhas 'chi ltas med mi shes/ /la la rten dang brten pa po'o /khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod/ /nad kyi tshul ni mang po las/ /'chi ltas tshul
100b5(mdo 'grel): du 'byung 'gyur la/ /nad zhi na ni zhi 'gyur la/ /brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog /gzugs brnyan bya ba la sogs dang/ /dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang/ /tha mal pa las rgyu med
100b6(mdo 'grel): bar/ /gzhan du gyur gang mdor na ni/ /'chi ltas yin par de shes bya/ /skra dang ba spu ma bskus par/ /snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang/ /gang zhig mig ni rab yo dang/ /mi 'gyur phyir byung khung pur zhugs/ /yo dang dgrang
100b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'jum pa dang/ /btsum zhing smin ma smad ba dang/ /'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang/ /sre mo'i mig ltar blta ba dang/ /thab 'dra dang mgal ma 'dra/ /mchi ma 'jag cing rdzi ma 'khrubs/ /sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang/ /zhom dang 'bum 
101a1(mdo 'grel): phran gyis khyab dang/ /skrangs dngags? dang rnyid pa dang/ /gang gi ma mchu 'phyad pa dang/ /ya mchu gyan la brdzes pa dang/ /gnyi ga 'dzam bu smin 'drar snang/ /so gnag gseg mar bcas pa dang/ /dmar zhing so zhon gnog
101a2(mdo 'grel): can/ /glo bur du ni 'byung ba dang/ /lce ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin/ /skrangs dang bskams dang lce dang gnag /gos dang rtsub dang tshang ba med/ /mjing pas mgo ni mi thag dang/ /rang gi ltag pa khur ltar lci/ /'gram ba kha na gnas pa yi/ /kha zas ldad par
101a3(mdo 'grel): mi nus pa/ /gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag /shin tu lci dang shin tu yang/ /dug dang gnad pa med par ni/ /phug rnams las khrag 'byung dang/ /gang zhig pho mtshan nub pa dang/ /rlig pa rab tu 'phyang ba'am/ /de las go bzlog gyur ba rnams//
101a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'chi bdag dbang gyur yin/ /gang gi rtsa ris sngon med pa/ /zla ba tshes pa lta bu ni/ /dpral ba'am chu so'i steng na snang/ /de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/ /lus can gang gi lus la chu/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur ni/ /rgyal tshe chu ni ma tshigs pa/ /de ni zla
101a5(mdo 'grel): ba drug na 'chi/ /spyi bor du ba'am snum bcas snang/ /de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /spyi bo 'am smin mtshams gsar du ni/ /mchams bya ba'am rtsub 'khyil snang/ /nad med zhwag ni drug gis 'chi/ /nad pa zhag gsum na 'chi 'gyur/ /lce gnag
101a6(mdo 'grel): kha ni mnam pa dang/ /mig g.yas phugs su bros pa'am/ /byin mgo la babs pa dag /gang yin da ni yongs su spang/ /gang zhig khrul byas byugs pa dang/ /lus kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du/ /snying kha shin tu myur bar bskams/ /de ni
101a7(mdo 'grel): zla phyed las mi 'tsho/ /glo bur du ni lus kyi mdog /cig car tha mal pa las nyams/ /de bzhin nad ni sogs pa dang/ /rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi ba yin/ /gang gis sor mo drangs pa dang/ /sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'chi/ /de bzhin lud pa
101b1(mdo 'grel): sbring sogs la/ /gang zhig sngon med sgra byung ba'am/ /dbugs 'byin thung ba 'am ring ba'am/ /dri gnam pa'am dri zhim 'gyur/ /lus ni khrus byas ma byas rung/ /mi ma yan pa dri 'byung ba'am/ /gas rma dri mar byung ba na'ang/ /de ni lo gcig nas 'chi
101b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gang zhig shig dang sbrang ma sogs/ /dri zhim pas ni 'du ba'am/ /dring bas ni spong 'gyur na/ /don? lo gcig las mi 'tshe/ /gang zhig rtag tu lus chal/ /grang ba nyid du snang ba dang/ /bsil ba shin tu tsha bar snang/ /rgyu med bar
101b3(mdo 'grel): ni rdul dang rengs/ /gang zhig grang ba'i chu bur 'byung/ /lus grang ba las tsha ba skyes/ /gang gdungs than pa la mi dga' / /de ni gshin rje'i dbang gyur yin/ /gang zhig snying ga dro gyur la/ /lto ba shin tu grang gyur zhing/ /gshang ba 'khru zhing skom dang che//
101b4(mdo 'grel): de ni ro dang 'dra ba yin/ /bshang dang gci ba mchil snabs sam/ /khu chu nang nub gyur pa'am/ /mchil ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /gang yin de la gcig nas 'chi/ /sa ni nam mkhar mthong ba dang/ /nam mkha' sar ni mthong gyur dang//
101b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs med gzugs can lta bu dang/ /gzugs can gzugs med ltar gnas mthong/ /de bzhin 'od can 'od med mthong/ /dkar po gnag dang yod pa dang/ /mig nan med par zla ba ni/ /gzugs mngar? ri med mthong ngo/ /gnyid ma
101b6(mdo 'grel): log par dri za sran/ /yi dags gzhan yang de 'dra ba'i/ /gzugs mi sdum pa mthang 'gyur ba/ /gang yin de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sme bdun dang ni nyer gnas pa'i/ /skar ma sgrib mang ma mthong dang/ /dgu tshigs gung tsug ma mthong
101b7(mdo 'grel): ba/ /de ni la gcig mi 'tsho'o/ /'brug sgra chu bo'i sgra dang ni/ /gling bu pi waM rnga yi sgra/ /sgra gzhan med kyang thos pa 'am/ /yod ba thos par ma gyur dang/ /rna ba'i bu ga bkab ba na/ /'ur 'ur po yi sgra mthos/ /de bzhin dri dang
102a1(mdo 'grel): ro dang reg /gang zhig log par shes pa dang/ /yang da yod ye mi tshor dang/ /me mar shi ba'i dri mi tshor/ /cho ga bzhin byas nad med skyes/ /cho ga log pas bde gnas dang/ ga?  gang gi lus ni rdul g.yogs
102a2(mdo 'grel): 'dra/ /lus la snang ba mtshar dang/ /dka' ? thub drag dang tshog ni/ /sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor med pa ru/ /dbang po las 'das shes pa skyes/ /de rnams 'chi bar shes par bya/ /skad 'gags dman zhing mi gsal dang/ /gang
102a3(mdo 'grel): zhig skad ni 'dzer gyur dang/ /smra 'dod ba na 'phral du ni/ /brjed 'gyur de ni mi 'tsho'o/ /skad gsang shin tu nyam chung gyur/ /mdog dang stobs ni nyams pa dang/ /rgyu med par ni nad 'phel bar/ /snang ba dag kyang 'chi
102a4(mdo 'grel): bar bshad/ /skad gsad nyams par gyur pa dang/ /bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba dang/ /de 'dra'i sgra ni thos pa dag /ring du yongs su spang bar bya/ /lus dbyibs dang na tshad dang ni/ /mdog gam gzi mdangs gang dag
102a5(mdo 'grel): gis/ /gzugs brnyan 'gyur ba rmi lam du/ /mthong na'ang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma me long chu sogs la/ /gang zhig dbyibs dang tshad dang ni/ /lus kyi rnam pa snang gyur ba/ /gzugs brnyan zhes ni de la bshad//
102a6(mdo 'grel): mdog dang gzi mdangs la brten gang/ /lus rtogs gzugs brnyan lta bu yin/ /gang gi gzugs brnyan bcad pa dang/ /gyes dang lhag dang 'khrug pa dang/ /mgo med mgo gnyis yon po dang/ /mi sdug gzhan du gyur pa
102a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mtshan nyid las gyur ma yin na/ /de ni tshe zad yin zhes bya/ /gang gi mig gi rgyal mor ni/ /gzugs brnyan snang bar ma gyur dang/ /nam mkha' la sogs lnga po yi/ /gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs lnga/ /nam
102b1(mdo 'grel): mkha' dang zhing sngo ba dang/ /snam bcas mdog dang bcas pa yin/ /rlung las rdul can dmar dang gnag /thal mdog rtsub cing mdog nyams yin/ /me yi dmar zhing dang bar snang/ /mdangs ldan blta na sdug pa yin/ /chu skyes baiDUrya 'drar
102b2(mdo 'grel): snang/ /dag cing rab snum ba de ba yin/ /sa yi stan snum dag pa dang/ /'thug cing dkar dang sngo bsangs yin/ /rlung ni nad 'chi sdug bsngal bskyed/ /gzhan dag bde ba bskyed pa yin/ /me yi thams cad mdog can
102b3(mdo 'grel): te/ /de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad/ /dmar dang ser dang dkar nag po/ /ljang dang skya dang nag po'o/ /de rnams la ni gang gsal gyur/ /snum dang dri ma med de dge /dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang/ /zhum pa sdug bsngal bskyed pa yin//
102b4(mdo 'grel): mdangs kyis mdog ni zil gyis gnon/ /'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin/ /mdangs kyis nye bar snang ba yin/ /'od ni ring nas snang ba yin/ /'ga' zhig mdangs dang kha dog gi /mtshon ma'i khyad par med min te/ /mi rnams
102b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma bzang ngan byung/ /dus su mdangs la brten pa yin/ /gang zhig rkang pa 'drud pa dang/ /phrag pa yo bas 'gro ba dang/ /gang zhig phan zas mang thos kyang/ /rtog tu stobs ni nyams gyur na/ /gang zhig nyung zos bshad gci
102b6(mdo 'grel): mang/ mang zos bshang gci nyung ba dang/ /nyung zos bad kan gyis nyen zhing/ /dbugs ring 'byin zhing sa la 'gro/ /gang zhig dbugs ring byung nas ni/ /thung ngu rdubs te shugs 'byin dang/ /thung ngu dbugs byin bsnum pa dang/ /shin
102b7(mdo 'grel): tu 'dar bar byed pa yang/ /gang zhig lag dar bskums nas ni/ /mgo bo lag pas 'degs pa dang/ /gang zhig dbral ba las rdul 'dzag /tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur pa dang/ /nyam che ba'am nyam chung gyur pa gang/ /ldang ba'i
103a1(mdo 'grel): tshe na mi dran 'gyur/ /gang zhig gan rgyal nyal nas ni/ /rkang pa rnam bar bskyod pa dang/ /rtsig pa mal stan la sogs pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu nyes pa dang/ /rgyu med par dgod smyos tshul gyis/ /mchu la ldang/
103a2(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dang/ /ya mchu ldag par byed pa dang/ /sgra bcas par yang gang byed dang/ /lus mdog nag po ser po dang/ /dmar po'i gzugs brnyan snang ba dang/ /sman pa sman dang kha zas dang/ /bla ma mdza' bshes la
103a3(mdo 'grel): gang brtan/ /'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi/ /dbang gyur yin par shes par bya/ /gang zhig drod chung sems g.yengs dang/ /rtag tu mdangs ngan yid mi bde/ /gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la/ /byin yang za bar mi byed dang//
103a4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang/ /mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob pa'am/ /de las nyams par gyur ba dag /de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug /tha mal bar ram nad pa yi/ /gang zhig yon tan skyon rang bzhin/ /snga las
103a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan du 'gyur bar snang/ /de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/ /dang dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin/ /blo gros stobs ni rgyu med par/ /'di drug las ni ldog gyur pa/ /zla ba drug las 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'gro dang tshig ni smyo ba 'dra//
103a6(mdo 'grel): 'dar rmongs zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /skra phyi ba na tshor ba med/ /zhag drug nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru/ /ming par kha zas mi chud dang/ /bran g.yog log par byed gyur ba/ /de ni 'chi ba dang 'drar bshad//
103a7(mdo 'grel): gang zhig rtag tu gnyid log pa 'am/ /gnyid med de yang mi 'tsho'o/ /mchims gdong ni khebs pa dang/ /rkang pa shin tu rdul ba dang/ /mig ni mi sdug par snang ba/ /gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar gyur/ /sngon chad dga' ba'i
103b1(mdo 'grel): dngos po gang/ /dga' mi 'gyur ba de mi 'tsho/ /gang zhig 'phral du 'gyur ba yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad snang ba dang/ /'phral du ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ /de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rims ni stobs dang ldan pa dang/ /gting du
103b2(mdo 'grel): zhen zhing yun ring dang/ /bla bcas mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /ring cing skrangs dang me drod nyams/ /tshig mi gsal zhing thogs pa dang/ /mig dmar snying ni gzer ba dang/ /snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung/ /phyi dro de las gzhan du 'gyur//
103b3(mdo 'grel): bad kan lud par bcas pa dang/ /stobs dang sha ni zad na 'chi/ /khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar/ /yang na gnag pa'am tshon can nam/ /dmar dang ser dang ljang mdog tu/ /khrag gi gzugs ni rab tu snang/ /ba sbu'i bu gnas 'dzag dang/ /lkog
103b4(mdo 'grel): ma snying gar gos pa dang/ /gos la ma chags dri nga la/ /shugs byung shin tu mang ba 'byung/ /rgan bo skya rbab rims thabs skyag /lung pa skra dang tshad 'khru gsod/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde rims skyug /skom dang tshe 'khru 'or nad dang/ /gcod
103b5(mdo 'grel): can srog dang rtsib logs gzer/ /khrag skyug phrag pa tshan 'chi/ /skyug pa shugs dang ldan pa dang/ /bshad gci dri yod tshon can dang/ /lung pa bshad nag khrag dang bcas/ /dbugs mi bde yun ring na mchi/ /skom dang nad gzhan
103b6(mdo 'grel): gyis nyams snang/ /lce 'byung dran ba stor na 'chi/ /chang nad shin tu grang pas nyen/ /sha zad til mar gdod bskus 'dra/ /gzhan 'brum rkang lag lte ba dang/ /bshad sgo rlig pa kha skrangs dang/ /snying ga rtsi ba logs yan lag na/ /slon bro
103b7(mdo 'grel): gzhang rnams rim gyis nyen/ /tshad 'khru mcher ba'i dum bu dang/ /sha bkrus pa'am snum nag dang/ /til mar 'o ma mar 'dra yang/ /zho dang rkang zhag chang rnying dang/ /klad pa gnag cha 'dra ba dang/ /sha brdungs chu dang sbrang rtsi 'dra//
104a1(mdo 'grel): rab dmar ka nag dang snum pa dang/ /snag 'dra sla bska rnag dang bcas/ /lus zungs sna tshogs 'byung ba dang/ /bshang ba med pa'am mche ba'am/ /'byar bag sbrang ma lta bu dang/ /ri mo can dang tshon can dang//
104a2(mdo 'grel): gzhang ga gnyer ma phyir byung dang/ /sgra gcan rus tshigs gzer ba dang/ /bshang sgo bye zhing stobs zad dang/ /zas ni ma nyams 'byung ba dang/ /skom bcas rims dang skyug pa dang/ /lus tsha lto sbo rgyun 'khrug 'chi//
104a3(mdo 'grel): rde'u 'gags rlig ba skrangs pa dang/ /gcin 'gags nad kyis nyams thag gsod/ /gcin snyi skom dad tsha 'brum bcas/ /sha rul tshad pas 'khru ba 'chi/ /thor nang dang ni snying ga rgyab/ /nu ma phrag pa spyi bor byung/ /tshigs
104a4(mdo 'grel): dang rkang pa lag par gnas/ /gcin sri nang can stobs chung dang/ /sha rnams thams cad 'drul pa dang/ /skom dang tsha myos rims btab 'chi/ /me dpal nad ni 'gags pa dang/ /skyigs bu mgo 'khor dbugs ma bde/ /skran ni rgya chen
104a5(mdo 'grel): kun nas zlum/ /sra zhing rus sbal ltar mthong dang/ /rtsa mngon rims thabs skyug pa dang/ /skyigs bu lto sbos zug gzer bcas/ /lud pa cham pha snying 'phar dang/ /tshad 'khru skra dang dbugs mi bde/ /dmu rdzings gshang gci 'gags
104a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /dbugs mi bde skrangs skyigs bu dang/ /rims dang mgo 'khor brgyal slon 'khru/ /nyam chung mi ni gsod 'gyur zhing/ /mig skrangs pa dang mtshan gug dang/ /pags ba rul zhing sra ba dang/ /bkru sman gyis bkrus lto spo zhing/ /yang dang
104a7(mdo 'grel): yang du 'phel ba 'chi/ /skya rbab skrangs dang bcas pa dang/ /mig dang sen mo ser por snang/ /snyom tsha yig 'chus dang slon/ /brgyal dang lto blos tshod 'khru 'chi/ /skrangs nang bl gnyan sna tshigs ldan/ /skyes pa rkang gnyis dang por skrangs//
104b1(mdo 'grel): bud med mgo nas skrangs nas 'chi/ /gnyi ga'ang mtshan dang mtshan khung bskrang/ /ri mer bcas 'dzag skyug pa dang/ /rims dang tshad 'khru dbugs mi bde/ /skrangs pa'i tha mar rims tshad 'khrugs/ /de gnyis zad mthar skrangs pa dang/ /lus can
104b2(mdo 'grel): nyam chung gyur ba dag /skrangs par gyur na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig skrangs pa rkang bar gnas/ /byin pa'i nyar ni phyin pa dang/ /dbyi yi bar du gnod gyur pa/ /de ni sman pas spang bar bya/ /gang gi gdong lag rkang par ni/ /lhag bar skam
104b3(mdo 'grel): par gyur ba'am/ /lus ma rtogs 'di shas cher skrangs/ /de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /me dpal lud pa kha dog nyams/ /rims brgyal yan lag bcag snyam sems/ /mgo 'khor kha bskam snying ga na/ /lus snyam tshad bas 'khru ldan spang/ mje
104b4(mdo 'grel): ni yan lag 'drul ba dang/ /mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang/ /drang nyams srin bu rnams kyis gtses/ /skom dang ched pas 'khru ldan 'chi/ /rlung nad bags pas tshor med byed/ /lus 'dar skad dang nad kyis gzer/ /drag nang rmongs shing brgyal ba dang//
104b5(mdo 'grel): myos dang gnyid che rims mgo rings/ /yig 'chus dang dbugs mi bde/ /'khums shing chu bur rul ba 'dra/ /mgo nad yig 'chus dbugs mi bde/ /rmongs bag 'khru zhing skom mgo 'khor/ /skad 'gags lus zungs me drod zad/ /lus nyams chung nad
104b6(mdo 'grel): kun gsod byed/ /rlung gi nad dang brded byed dang/ /mdze nad khrag dang dmu rdzing gcod/ /skran can gcin nag ldan ba yi/ /sha zad nad tshangs chung yang spang/ /sha dang stobs ni shin tu zad/ /nad 'phel yi ga 'chus ba dag /nad pa gang la snang 'gyur
104b7(mdo 'grel): te/ /zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi/ /rlung nang rtul 'dra 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /mi bzod snying gang gnas pa dang/ /skom dang kyis ni yongs gdungs pa/ /'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/ /rlung nad nya ni lhod byed cig /sna ni yon bor 'chus byed pa//
105a1(mdo 'grel): gang gi 'gram ba zad par snang/ /'phral du srog ni 'phrog pa yin/ /rlung na da lte ba gzhang bar song/ /yang na brlung brag gnyis na gnas/ /stobs ldan rlung ni nyams chung pa'i/ /gzhang dang snying ga nyams byed pa 'am//
105a2(mdo 'grel): drim? chu so'i ldag lnga ba/ /bkag ste nad ni bskyed pa dang/ /chu sor? gzar bar byed 'gyur la/ /skom dang 'khru bar byed pa dang/ /chus bshang sgor gnas nas ni/ /rlung ni dbugs mi bde bskyed dang/ /rtsib ma'i rtsa mo 'dags byed cing//
105a3(mdo 'grel): snying gar rlung ni brten pa yang/ /mig dgrad 'gyur ba med byed pa/ /'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/ /'phral du rims dang tshabs btab/ /skom dang brgya ba dang stobs zad dang/ /tshigs mtshams bral bar gyur ba rnam/ /nye bar 'chi
105a4(mdo 'grel): par gyur ba yin/ /nang par gang gi gdong las ni/ /rlul ni shas cher 'dzag 'gyur zhing/ /khar chags rims kyis gdung pa rnams/ /da yang 'tsho bar dka' ba yin/ /gang gi lus las 'brum phran ni/ /byu ru'i mdog 'drar snang gyur
105a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /byung nas myur du mi snang 'gyur/ /de ni ring por mi thogs 'chi/ /'brum pa sran chung bshus 'dra bzhin/ /de bzhin byu ru'i mdog 'dra ba/ /nang du kha blta tshad 'brum 'dra/ /'brum bu lus ni 'jig byed yin/ /mig ser gdong ser
105a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa dang/ /mur 'gram gnyis kyi sha zad pa/ /skrag cing lus ni tshe bdag /gang yin de ni spang bar bya/ /rgyu med phugs pa dag las rma/ /'phel zhing mched par byed pa dang/ /rlung skyes gang yin na ba mang/ /mkhris pa las gyur
105a7(mdo 'grel): tsha ba med/ /bad kan las gyur rnag med dang/ /gang zhig rnag skyes zug gzer med/ /phye mas khyab dang rnyad par snang/ /gang du glo bur dag tu ni/ /rgyal mtshan mdung la sogs gzugs snang/ /rma de thams cad spang bar bya/ /mtshan par?
105b1(mdo 'grel): rdal ni gshang gci rlung/ /'byung zhing srin bus gces pa dang/ /dus mo phan tshun mdzer ba dang/ /rkang ba btegs nas btung 'gyur dang/ /yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i/ /nad pa de ni 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /so yis sen mo'i rtse gcod cing/ /sen
105b2(mdo 'grel): mos skra 'am rtswa gcod dang/ /sa la shing bus 'dri ba dang/ /bod bas bod ba brdeg pa dang/ /spu ldang gcin ni bska ba dang/ /lud pa bskams shing rims kyis 'debs/ /skad cig dgod cing spyags glu lan/ /mal la rkang bas brdeg pa dang/ /skad
105b3(mdo 'grel): cig re re bu gsol/ /nad ba gang yin de mi 'tsho/ /gdong la ?  pho bab dang/ /'dzar skyas so san thig la chags/ /lto la sna tshogs rtsa snang ba/ /glu bur byung ba de mi 'tsho/ /gyen dur bug sa rtseg drod yal zhing/ /brla dbrag gnyis su gzer
105b4(mdo 'grel): gyis nyen/ /dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa/ /blo dang ldan pas yongs su spang/ /gang gi nad ni 'phel 'gyur dang/ /rang bzhin yongs su nyams pa ni/ /gang la 'phral du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /slan pas nad pa gang zhig
105b5(mdo 'grel): la/ /sman gyi bya ba byas gyur ba/ /'bad kyang sos par ma gyur na/ /de yi srog ni rnyad pa dka' / /mkhas shing mang du grub pa dang/ /tsheg? bzhin du byin gyur yang/ /sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang/ /da la gso ba'i thabs med do/ /gang gi sman ni sbyor
105b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshe/ /rgyu med par ni phyin ci log /mdog dang ro sogs yongs gyur na/ /nad med yin de mi 'tsho/ /gang gi gnas su shing bcas ma/ /rlung med kyang ni shi gyur dang/ /nad pa gang shi khyim du ni/ /snod ni shin tu mang po dag /chag gam ltung
105b7(mdo 'grel): bar gyur pa dag /de yi srog ni rnyed pa dka' / /mi gang nyams chung gyur pa yang/ /glo bur gsos par snang gyur pa/ /de yi srog kyang ma nges pa/ /yin par rgyun shes bus bshad do// //nyed du 
106a1(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo rnams kyis ni/ /dris kyang nyan par mi bya ba/ /sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing/ /de yi gso ba'ang khas mi blang/ /gshin rje'i pho nya sha za sogs/ /gzhan gyis nye bar bstan pa gang/ /sma gyi ? bas ni 'joms
106a2(mdo 'grel): pas na/ /de phyir de yis yongs su spang/ /tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun/ /tshe shes pa la gnas pa yin/ /phebs 'chi ltas gnas pa kun/ /sman bas 'bad de shes par bya/ /tshe dang stobs rnams gnyi gzad?/ /de gnyid ? par ma gyur yang
106a3(mdo 'grel): yang bzhin? ni ma spongs pas/ /srag chags rnams ni 'chi par bshad// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas las le'u lnga ba'o// //de nas lus
106a4(mdo 'grel): kyi gnas kyi pho nya la sogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /ya mtshan can dang dge sbyong dang/ /rigs mthun las ni 'grub par bshad/ /de las go bzlog pho nya ni/ /las ni 'grub mi rtags su bshad/ /dman dang 'jigs ring sa dang sa
106a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rtsub dang bkra mi shis smra dang/ /mtshon cha dbyug thogs mgo reg dang/ /ma ni sma ra zla ba can/ /bkra mi shis pa'i ming dang ldan/ /sdug las bud med dri ma can/ /mang po nad pa mi sdug dang/ /phreng ba byug pa dmar pos
106a6(mdo 'grel): brgyan/ /til mar 'dam bsdus gas rnying dang/ /mdog ngan rlan can gos gcig ?/ /bong bu rda me? he zhon/ /shing dang bad ba nyed ba dang/ /ring nas 'bod pa'i pho nya 'ongs/ /sman pas yongs su spang bar bya/ /bkra mi shis
106a7(mdo 'grel): pa sems dang smra/ /gcer bu gcod dang 'jigs pa dang/ /mtshun gtor me la sreg pa dang/ /'chi ba rnams la ster ba dang/ /sar nyal skra bshig skud pa dang/ /du dang ma bsdams gnas skabs su/ /sman ba gnas
106b1(mdo 'grel): che pho nya 'ongs/ /mi ni 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /nad dang mtshan nyid mtshungs pa yi/ /yul lam dus su sman pa gnas/ /bad chen 'bod du 'ongs mthongna/ /nad ba de ni gso mi bya/ /lte ba kha dang sna reg dang/ skre? dang spu dang sen mo so/ /mcha'
106b2(mdo 'grel): rgyab nub mgrin pa dang/ /lto dang srin lag dag dang ni/ /ras bal phub ma zha nye rtsa/ /rdus gtun brdungs dang phyag ma rdo/ /zhib mgos kyi mdza' ma dang/ /thal ba sol ba kha tshar sog /thag pa gtun dang zhags pa spang/ /gzhan yang thog gis chag
106b3(mdo 'grel): pa thogs/ /? nya de 'dra sngon du mthong/ /'chi ba dag cu ston pa yin/ /de bzhin mtshan phyed nyi ma'i gung/ /thun mtshams dang ni dus tshigs dang/ /tshes dus chos bzhi tshe dgu dang/ /sgra gcan 'jug rings 'char dus sogs/ /ba nye smin drug sgag chu stong/ /gre
106b4(mdo 'grel): dang khrums stong snub dang ni/ /gang du pho nya nad pa yi/ /mtshan nyid la ni brten pa'i tshig /mi dge smra dang mi shes mthong/ /de ni sman pa 'gro mi bya/ /dbang po mchod mi ro 'am/ /mi rus kyis ni brgyan pha 'am/ /chang dang tshig dang nyams chag dang/ /de yi tshig tu
106b5(mdo 'grel): smra ba 'am/ /ro ni cha dang drag ba'am/ /dri ni shas cher rol pa dang/ /reg kyang rgya char mi bzang dang/ /gang yang de 'dra gzhan dag ni/ /de kun mdun du smra ba 'am/ /yang na de skad smra ba'i tshe/ /pho nya 'ongs bar mthong na ni/ /nang pa de ni gos mi bya/ /kyi
106b6(mdo 'grel): hud? kyi ? cho des 'debs/ /'o 'dod dmod ma 'grel sbring sgra/ /gos dang gdugs dang lham 'jigs dang/ /sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ba dang/ /shing chen rgyal mtshan gang ba'i snod/ /chu nang nub par mthong ka
106b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bsad sogs yid du mi 'ong smra/ /thal ba phyag dar gyis gtor dang/ /byi la bram dang sbrul dang ni/ /sbre'us lam ni bcad pa dang/ /'bar ba'i phyogs su ni dags bya/ /gdugs? ba dag ni sgrog pa dang/ /'brun pa bum?
107a1(mdo 'grel): dar ba dang/ /lan tshwa dang rnying pags pa dang/ /yungs kar zhag dang 'bru mar dang/ /rtswa dang 'dam bu bud shing dang/ /ma ning mi srun sme sha can/ /rgya dag dang ni snying rnams dang/ /slon dang bshad ba gtong
107a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rnag dang mtshan ma ngan pa mthong/ /snying po med dang 'khrig pa spyod/ /ras bal sogs dang dgra bo mthong/ /mal stan dang ni khyogs la sogs/ /kha bub tu ni gnas par mthong/ /nad pa dag dang gzhan dag dang/ /snod
107a3(mdo 'grel): sogs ngan mthong mi shes so/ /skyes pa'i ming can bya g.yon nas/ /bud med ming can g.yas 'dug bzang/ /bya dang ri dags g.yas 'dug bzang/ /khyi dang wa ni de ltar min/ /ri dags rnams ni zung mi shes/ /ci sha
107a4(mdo 'grel): bya rgod khany+dza ?/ /ne'u ler dang rma bya rnams/ /mthong ba rtag tu shis pa yin/ /'ug pa byi la sbrul mthong ba/ /rnam ba kun tu shis ma yin/ /go nga dang ni ri bong sbrul/ /dze ha ka ni ming thos dge /mthong dang sgra sgrogs
107a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar min/ /dred dang spe'u de las bzlog /dpral ba'i phyogs su 'ja' tshon mthong/ /mi shes rgyab tu mthong na shis/ /me yis gang ba'i snod dag ni/ /chag dang khong stong gnas pa dang/ /nad pa 'chi 'gyur khyim du ni/ /sman pa
107a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug par byed pa'i tshe/ /zhe sogs bkra shis 'og nas bshad/ /gang ba'i snod phyir byung mthong dang/ /pho nya la sogs mi shas mthong/ /da lta'i nad pa spang bar bya/ /de las gzhan par snying rje rgyud/ /dag pas 'bad de gso
107a7(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /zho 'bru bu ram shing dang khre/ /sbrang rtsi zhun mar bri yaM ku/ /nang thug dngul rdo bum pa dang/ /dril bu mar me chu skyes dang/ /durba ta dang sha rlan dang/ /'bras yos 'bras bu kha zas dang/ /bum pa rin po che yis gang/ /
107b1(mdo 'grel): bu mo gzhon rang shing rta dang/ /mi ni mag 'phang mthos pa dang/ /lha rnams dang ni rgyal bo dang/ /gos dkar gyon dang me tog dkar/ /khyim dang rda yab rta dkar mthong/ /dam pa bram ze gtsug tor dang/ /rta babs dang ni g.yu drung dang/ /sa ni
107b2(mdo 'grel): bskos bas gyur ba dang/ /me ni rab tu 'bar ba dang/ /bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang/ /me yis shing rta legs gang dang/ /ba ni ba'u dang bcas pa dang/ /shang shang ti'u sha bkra dang/ /dad pa khu byug rma bya dang/ /sa ra sa ni
107b3(mdo 'grel): sgra snyan sgrog /de bzhin phyugs gcig btags pa dang/ /gdu bu me long yungs kar dang/ /gi waM rnams ni mthong ba dang/ /byug ba'i dri zhim gyis byug dang/ /khu ba dkar zhing mngar ba dang/ /khyu mchog de bzhin pa lang rnams/ /rjes
107b4(mdo 'grel): su mthun pa'i sgra sgrogs dang/ /ri dags bya dang mi rnams ni/ /yid 'ong skra snyan smra ba dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bsgreng/ /mngon par bstong pa byed pa dang/ /rdza rda dud dang rnga po che/ /sgra dang bkra shis sgra sgrogs pa/ /
107b5(mdo 'grel): bram ze rig byed 'don pa dang/ /bde ba'i rlung ni rjes mthun rgyu/ /lam dang khyim du 'jug che yod/ /nad sas mtshan nyid yin shes bya/ /de ltar pho nya dge bshad nas/ /de 'og rmi lam bshad bya ste/ /rmi lam shi ba'i me?
107b6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ /lhan cig chad 'thung khyim drangs gang/ /mi de rims kyi gzugs can gyi/ /'chi bdag gis ni myur 'khyer 'gyur/ /lus dang gos dang phreng ba dmar/ /bud med rgod pa drangs mi gang/ /de ni khrag mkhris dag
107b7(mdo 'grel): gis 'chi/ /ma he rta phag bod bu dang/ /rnga mo zhon ta lho phyags 'gro /de ni gcod chen nad kyis 'chi/ /lcug mchar can 'od ma 'am/ /ta la snying ga skyes pa rmi/ /gang yin de ni skran gyis 'chi/ /gang zhig me ni mi
108a1(mdo 'grel): 'bar la/ /sbyin sreg byed cing mar gyis bskus/ /gcer bur 'dug dang pad+ma ni/ /snying gar byung ni ? yis 'chi/ /gang zhig rmo sha can lhan cig/ snum mangs 'thungs ba rmi ba de/ /gcin nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /srin
108a2(mdo 'grel): pa lhan cig gar byed cing/ /chu la byang rmi sbyong byed 'dzin/ /ra ? gar byed shi ba yi/ /mis khyer rmi brjod byed 'dzin/ /bod bu rnga mo bya la spre'u/ /seng+ge stag dang khwa dag dang/ /wa 'am mi rol zhon rmis/ /de ni 'chi bdag khar sed ?
108a3(mdo 'grel): snam khur sha khu la zos rmis/ /sang nas de 'dra slon gyur ba/ /gang yin de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /nyi zla gzas zin rmis mig na/ /nyi ma zla ba ltung ba yi/ /rmi lam mthong na long bar 'gyur/ /spyi bor 'od ma'i lcug sogs skyes/ /de bzhin
108a4(mdo 'grel): bya rog chan 'cha' dang/ /mgo bo chang par rmis pa dang/ /khra dang bya rgod tshags kyis bskor/ /de bzhin yi dags sha ? mo/ /byad ma rme sha can gyis bskor/ /'od ma'i tshal dang tshor ma dang/ /rtswa yi tshad ching nang du chung/ /g.yang
108a5(mdo 'grel): sar lhung dang dur khrod nyal/ /phyag dar thal ba'i nang du ?/ /chu dang 'dam la sogs bar nub/ /chu rgyun gyis ni myur du khyer/ /glu gar dang ni rol me byed/ /gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'chang/ /lus 'phel na tshod rgyas pa ?/ /
108a6(mdo 'grel): bag ma len zhing kha sbu 'dreg /zas btsos snum za chan 'thung dang/ /skyug dang 'khru ? ba dang/ /lcags dang gser dag rnyed pa dang/ /btsongs dang brtsod las phan pa dang/ /mchis lha gnyis ni stor ba dang/ /rkang ?
108a7(mdo 'grel): lhung ba rmi ba dang/ /shin tu dga' dang rab khros pa'i/ /shi ba'i gnyen gyis sbyos pa dang/ /mar ma gza' dang skar ma dang/ /so mig lta yi gzugs rnams ni/ /lhud ba 'am 'jig pa rmis pa 'am/ /ri bo ral bar gyur
108b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /nag tshal dmar ba'i nad dang ni/ /sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang/ /ro bsregs sa dang mun par zhugs/ /ma yi mngal du zhugs pa dang/ /brag dang khang pa sa lhung dang/ /de bzhin nya yis ming ba dang/ /chos gos gyon pa'i
108b2(mdo 'grel): mi srun dang/ /gcer bu ba dang dbyig thogs dang/ /mig dmar kha dog nag pa ni/ /mthong ba nam yang shes ma yin/ /bud med sdig can gdod gnag dang/ /skra dang sen mo nu ma ring/ /gos dang phreng ba dmar po thogs/ /rmis pa dus
108b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan yin par 'dod/ /nad ni stobs dang ldan pa yis/ /yid 'jug bug 'ga' pa'i phyir/ /mi bzad rmi lam mthong gyur te/ /nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nad med the tshom bcas gyur zhing/ /'ga' zhig thar par 'gyur ba yin//
108b4(mdo 'grel): mthong dang thos dang nyams myong dang/ /gsol ba btab dang brtags pa dang/ /'byung bar gyur dang nad las 'byung/ /rmi lam rnam pa bdun du bshad/ /de las dang po'i lnga po dang/ /rang gi rang bzhin nyid mo brjed/ /shin tu ring thung 'bras
108b5(mdo 'grel): bu med/ /cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin la/ /cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin can/ /mtshan stod rmi lam 'bras bu ring/ /mthong ba chung du byed pa yin/ /nad par mthong dang gnyid ma log/ mi mthun gtam gyis bar ma chod/ /de yi nyin par 'bras
108b6(mdo 'grel): chen 'gyur/ /sbyin dang sbyin sreg la sogs kyis/ /rmi lam 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmi lam ngan mthong nas/ /slar yang gnas skabs de nyid du/ /rmi lam bzang po mthong gyur na/ /'bras bu bzang po nyid thob 'gyur//
108b7(mdo 'grel): lha dang bram ze khyu mchog dang/ /ba lang rgyal po mdza' shes gson/ /skyes bu dam pa grags ldan dang/ /me 'bar ba dang dang ba'i mtsho/ /bu mo khye'u ser ba dang/ /gos dkar gyon zhing mdangs dang ldan/ /skyes bu zab lus 'bang? dang/
109a1(mdo 'grel): khrag gis lus kun byugs pa dag /gang gis mthong par gyur ba dang/ /gzugs dang sha rlon me long dug/ snal ma dkar po gos dang ni/ /mi gtsang gis byugs 'bras bu rnyed/ /ri bo khang bzang 'bras
109a2(mdo 'grel): bcas shing/ /'dzeg dang seng+ge glang chen ma/ /rta dang ba lang dag la zho na/ /chu bo mchod na rgya mtsho brgal/ /shar dang byang du 'gro ba dang/ /'grod min 'gro dang shi ba dang/ /nyam pa las thang lha rnams dang/ /pha mas mngon bar
109a3(mdo 'grel): bstod pa dang/ /du dang lhung las ldang ba dang/ /dgra bo 'pham bar byas ba dag /gang rmis tshe ring nad med dang/ /nor mang po ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nang ba'i g.yog 'khor ni/ /bkra shis cho ga phun sum tshogs /dad
109a4(mdo 'grel): ldan rjes su mthun pa dang/ /nor mang bsdus par gyur ba dang/ /snying stobs mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing/ /sman pa bram ze sogs la gus/ /gso dbyad rnams la skyo ba med/ /de ni nad med gyur mtshan nyid/ /rtag tu shis pa
109a5(mdo 'grel): bldas pa dang/ /bkra mi shis pa rnam par yod/ /'di dag 'di nyid mthong ba yi/ /drang srong rnams kyis shes par bshad/ /de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'tshe/ /mtshan nyid gang phyir bshad bas na/ /de phyir lus kyi gnas yin pas//
109a6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni lus kyi gnas su bshad/ //yan lag brgyad ba'i snying bo bsdus pa las/ /lus kyi gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas te gnas
109a7(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa rnams kyis/ /'di skad ces bshad do/ /nad dang sdig pa rims gnod byed/ /'gyur byed sdug
109b1(mdo 'grel): bsngal ma zhu'i skyon/ /zad byed 'tsho dka' 'khun gnad bskyed/ /ming gi rnam grangs sgra bshad do/ /nad gzhi sngar 'byung tshul dang ni/ /de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang/ /dkyel 'gyur shes par bya ba ste/ /nad ni rnam pa ldar shes bya//
109b2(mdo 'grel): gzhi dang rgya der skye mched dang/ /rkyen dang slong bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /rnam grangs kyis na nid gzhi bshad/ /gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas/ /nad ni 'byung bar 'dod gyur la/ /bye brag phyed par ma gyur ba/ /nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par
109b3(mdo 'grel): chud phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o/ /de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur ba/ /tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad/ /dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtags dang ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams yin no/ /rgyu dang nad ni mi mthun zhing/ /mi mthun pa yi
109b4(mdo 'grel): don byed ba'i/ /sman dang zas dang spyod laM rnams/ /nye bar bsgyur bas bde 'gyur bam /nyam rtas byed par shes bya ste/ /de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad/ /de las bzlog pa'i ma goms nad/ /mi 'phrod nad ces bya ba'o/ /gang gi
109b5(mdo 'grel): nad ni dkyil gyur pas/ /ji bzhin rjes su 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur ba/ /skyes shing 'ong ba dkyil gyur yin/ /de ni grang brtag gtso bo dang/ /stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin//
109b6(mdo 'grel): grangs ni ji ltar 'di nyid las/ /rim ni brgyad du bshad pa yin/ /nad rnams spyir ni bsdus pa yin/ /cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin/ /rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni/ /nad rnams gtso bor bshad pa yin/ /rgya sogs ma lus
109b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig las/ /stobs ni che chung shes par bya/ /nin mtshan dus dang zas zos chas/ /nyes pa ji bzhin nad kyi dus/ /de ltar nad gzhi'i don bshad nas/ /de ni rgyas par bshad bar bya/ /nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi ni/ /nad ni
110a1(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs par gyur pa yin/ /de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa/ /brten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshad/ /gsum pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum/ /gnod 'gyur sngar ni bshad pa yin/ /kha dang tsha dang bska cung zad
110a2(mdo 'grel): tsub dang bcud med sra ba dang/ /bkag dang nan gyis bcing ba dang/ /mtshan mo mi nyal skad che ra smra/ /bya ba'i sbyor drags mya ngan 'jigs/ /phems las drag shul bud med drags/ /so gnyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes/ /rlung gi nad ni
110a3(mdo 'grel): ldang bar 'gyur/ /mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang rno/ /lan tsha khro dang lus tsha dang/ /ston ka nyi phyed mtshon phyed dang/ /tsha ba'i dus su ldad bar 'gyur/ /mdar skyur lan tshwa snum pa dang/ /lci dang bad kan skyes bsil dang/ /'dug dang bde dang
110a4(mdo 'grel): gnyid ma zhu/ /nyin par gnyid log brtas grags dang/ /slon sogs sbyor ba nyes ba dang/ /zos ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus/ /snga dro mtshan stod bad kan sdang/ /'dres ba las ni ldan pa yin/ /thams cad bsten pas 'dus par
110a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan yang 'dren mar zos/ /ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang/ /lhag par zos pa la sogs dang/ /chang dan btung ba nyed pa dang/ /tshod ma skam dang la phug rjen?/ /til tshigs sa zhags so ba'i chad//
110a6(mdo 'grel): sha rul sha skam sha ring rnams/ /de dang de yis nyes gsum bskyed/ /de bzhin kha zas sbos pa dang/ /dus tshigs log ba bdun gyi rlung/ /gdon zhugs dug dang dbyig dug zos/ /be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas//
110a7(mdo 'grel): bcas skar la ni gza' zhugs dang/ /log par sbyor ba sna tshogs dang/ /sdig pa'i las la sbyor ba dang/ /bud med bu btsas log par byung/ /gso ba log par byas las ldang/ /de ltar so so'i nad ldang bas/ /nad kyi
110b1(mdo 'grel): gnas su 'gro byed pa/ /rtsa srugs rnams su phyin pa dang/ /nad rnams lus la myur du bskyed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// //de nas rims kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya 'o/
110b2(mdo 'grel): rims ni nad bdag sdig can dang/ /'chi bdag mdangs zi 'chi byed yin/ /khros pas myur ba'i mchod sbin rlag/ drag po dpral ba'i mig las byung/ /skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed ba/ /mi 'phrod sna tshogs brtan las byung/ /mi bzang ming ni
110b3(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs pas/ /skye gnas bum rnams la gnas/ /de ni nad rnams so sor 'dres/ /'dus dang glo bur las brgyad gyur/ /de la nad rnams rang rang gi/ /rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang pa yis/ /ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs gyur ba/ /lhan cig gnas nas
110b4(mdo 'grel): sgo bkag/ zhu ba'i gnas nas me drod ni/ /phyi rol tu ni 'byin par byed/ /de dang lhan cig mngon khyab nas/ /lus kun tsha bar byed pa yin/ /yan lag shin tu cha byed pas/ /rims ni de yis sgyed par byed/ /rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu/ /rdul
110b5(mdo 'grel): ni mang du mi 'byung ngo/ /de yis sngon tshul skyid zhan dang/ /nyams mi dga' zhing lus lci la/ /ri mo tshor zhing yig 'chus/ /glal byung mig 'khrug mchi mar bcas/ /yan lag na zhing 'ju stobs chung/ /nyams chung gnyid ni che ba dang/ /?
110b6(mdo 'grel): ldang bya snyangs byed 'dod dang/ /byin ba'i nyan lus snyom dang/ /phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro/ /skur dang tsha dang drod la phreng/ /kha zas mngar po la mi dga' / /byis ba la sdang skom dang che/ /sgra me grang lhags rlung dang chu/ /grib ma nyi mtshan rgyu med
110b7(mdo 'grel): par/ /dga' dang mi dga' dag tu byed/ /de rjes rims ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /rims thebs 'jang nye'i tshe nang thabs/ /chung zhing tsha ba mi snyoms la/ /yan lag de dang der 'pho zhing/ /na ba de dang de gsor 'gyur/ /rkang pa ? po ? pa
111a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang/ /tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur shes/ /brla dang rked ba na ba dang/ /rgyab ni brdungs pa ltar sems dang/ /lto ba btsir ba snyam sems dang/ /rus pa bcag pa snyam pa dang/ /rtsib ma lhag par nad dang/
111a2(mdo 'grel): snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug/ brang du btsugs pa lta bur gzer/ /phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung ba ni/ /bcom snyam sems shing sgrog tus na/ /'gram pas kha zas ldad mi nus/ /gla la 'byung rna ba sgra dang bcas/ /mur 'gram 'gram zug cing mgo bo na/ /
111a3(mdo 'grel): lce yis do ni mtshor ba'am/ /yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur/ /dri ma rnam ni srid pa dang/ /pags mig kha dang sen mo dang/ /bshad sgo rtsu cing dmar ba dang/ /mchil ma yig 'chus srid chung/ /zas mi 'ju zhing rdul mi 'byung/ /gnyid yar mchu
111a4(mdo 'grel): dang gre ba skam/ /skom dang che zhing lud pa bskams/ /lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa bsgama/ /sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ldang/ /pags pa so dag rtse ba dang/ /rka lag 'dar zhing sbrid pa thogs/ /mgo 'khor tshig ni brla ba dang/ /drod bag la dka' bya
111a5(mdo 'grel): snyang byed/ /rlung gi rims su shes par bya/ /lus kun ci gzar khyab pa dang/ /glal zhing kha'i ro kha ba dang/ /bsil 'dod kha snar thor bu 'byung/ /mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga' / /bshad sla mkhris pa rlon pa dang/ /mchil ma khrag bcas sgres
111a6(mdo 'grel): pa skyug /thor bu dmar po 'byung ba dang/ /pags pa la sogs par rtsa sngo/ /rdul 'byung dbugs ni ma nam pa dang/ /skom dad rab che mkhris pa'i rims/ /lhag par yig 'chus shing rmongs/ /bug 'gag cing rims shugs dal/ /mchil ma
111a7(mdo 'grel): kha na dmar ba bo/ /dang kha lcig cing dbugs mi bde/ /cham btab snying na skyug pa 'byung/ /lud pa lus rengs pags so skya/ /yan lag thor bu grang mo 'byung/ /snyom zhing lus 'dar bad kan rims/ /rang gi dus su thams cad ni/ /'byung zhing
111b1(mdo 'grel): 'phel ba nyi 'gyur ba/ /nad gzhir bshad ba'i mi mthun bsten/ /bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin/ /rang rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni/ /ldan pa'i rims yin gzhan yang ni/ /mgon brgyal slon lus tsha rmongs bag 'gyur/ /gre ba kha bskams mi dga' rus
111b2(mdo 'grel): tshigs na/ /gnyid med mgo 'khor spu ldang skom dang che/ /kha klal tshig ma rlung mkhris 'dres ba'i rims/ /tsha mig yin 'chus shing glad chigs na/ /cham pa lung pa lung pa dbugs mi bde bshad sri/ /khong bsil rlongs bag rab rib mgo 'khor ?/ /bad kan
111b3(mdo 'grel): rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin/ /bus rdul rengs dang tsha bsil sor mi gnas/ /skom dang lud pa bad kan mkhris bab 'byung/ /rmongs bag smyo dang kha bro kha dri chags khad kan mkhris pa 'dres ba'i rims kyi rtags/ /kun nas 'byung ba rtags
111b4(mdo 'grel): kun ldan/ 'dir yang thang re tsha bsdang?/ /da bzhin drang dang nyin mo ni/ /gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid chung ba'am/ /rtag par gnyid 'od ba 'am yar/ /rda'? cher 'byung ba'ang rdul mi 'byung/ /gla dang gar dang rgod sogs pa/ /spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing/
111b5(mdo 'grel): mig dmar mchim 'jag dang bcas/ /zhum zhing mchi ma 'khrugs par snang/ /byin snying rtsig lo bas naM ba dang/ /mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor/ /rna ba sgra dang med dang bcas/ /mgul pa grams gang snyam sems/ /lce rtsub kun nas
111b6(mdo 'grel): bsegs ltar snang/ /lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems/ /mchil mar khrag mkhris bad kan 'byung/ /mgo bo yo zhing skom dad che/ /thor bu 'brum phran mdza' 'khor ba/ /dmar zhing gnag pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /snying na bshad gci sri
111b7(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ /yang na nyud ba'am rab mang 'byung/ /kha nang snum zhing nyams stobs chung/ /bcom chung 'gyur zhing slab dang/ /nas smin dka' zhing rmugs pa dang/ rgyun du gre ba 'jor ba ni/ /'dus ba'i rims te mngon ? byed/ /de ni mdangs 'phog
112a1(mdo 'grel): ces kyang bshad/ /nad kyis bkag cing me drod nyams/ /mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs 'gyur ba/ gsor mi rung ste de las gzhan/ /gso dka' 'am dbang po mchar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang 'dus pa las byung ba/ /gang du mkhris
112a2(mdo 'grel): ba logs shig gnas/ /pags pa'am nang grol tshab dag/ 'debs pa'am tshe ba snga phyir 'byung/ /de bzhin bad kan ? grang ba/ /de gnyis tsha lnga gso dga' yin/ /drang lnga de ni mkhris pa yis/ /bad kan gsher ba bskams pa dang/ /grang ba zhi
112a3(mdo 'grel): byas kha sgyur brgyal/ /myos dang skom dang che bar 'gyur/ /tsha ba snga na de rjes la/ /rmugs rlon mchil ma khon snyom 'gyur/ /glo bur drag shul las byung dang/ /mngon zin byad byas dmod 'byung bzhi/ /de la smad dpyad med tshig soD//
112a4(mdo 'grel): dal ba drag shul las byung yin/ /de ni phal cher rlung nad kyis/ /khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas/ /na bcas mdog nyams skrangs dang btses/ /zug gzer bcas pa'i rims bskyed 'gyur/ gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang dug
112a5(mdo 'grel): khros 'jigs mya ngan 'dod las byung/ /mngon par zin las byung rims yin/ /'dir rton rgya med rgod cing du/ /sman gyi dri skyes brgyal ba dang/ /sbrid pa klad nad skangs par 'gyur/ /dug las brgyal dang tshad pas 'khru/ /
112a6(mdo 'grel): mdog gnag lus tshe snying nad 'gyur/ /khros las lus 'dar klad nad 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'jigs las gla bar 'gyur/ /'dod las mgo 'khor yid 'chus tsha/ /do tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur/ /gdon la sogs pa'i
112a7(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa'i rims/ /'jigs sogs gsum gyi rlung gi rims/ /khro las mkhris ba ldang bar 'gyur/ /dmod pa byed byas las byung gang/ /'dus ba'i rims ni mi bzad pa/ /de ni shin tu bzod dkar bshad/ /de la byad byas
112b1(mdo 'grel): sdags kyis ni/ /sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du tsha/ /thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus/ /de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom/ /cha bcas rgyal bas zin 'gyur ba'i/ /rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel/ /de ltar rims ni brgyad du
112b2(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /de dag mdor na rnams gnyis te/ /lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni/ /grang dang tshab phyi nang gnas/ /rang bzhin dang ni gyur ba dang/ /gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dangn /smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o/ /lus rims thog mar lus tshe
112b3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /sems kyi dang po snying tsha 'gyur/ /rlung dang bad kan cig car ni/ /'byung tshe grang ba'i rims su 'gyur/ /mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste/ /'dres las 'dres pa'o nang gnas pa/ /rims nad dkyil na bskyed 'gyur nas/ /nad na cha zhing
112b4(mdo 'grel): bshad gci sri?/ /phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang/ /phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla/ /dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su/ /rlung sogs rims 'byung rang bzhin rims/ /gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka' / /phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims/ /yin
112b5(mdo 'grel): yang gso bar dka' ba yin/ /dbyar dus rlung nad ldang 'gyur na/ /mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur/ /ston ga mkhris pa nad slong ste/ /bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur/ /der ni bsnyung ba byas gyur yang/ /gnod par 'gyur ba ma
112b6(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /bad kan dpyid ldang de yang ni/ /de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung/ /nyams stobs che zhing nang stobs chung/ /brla gnyen med rims gso bar sla/ /rnams kun 'gyur ba shes bya bar/ /gsor mi rung ba sngar bshad do/ /rims kyis
112b7(mdo 'grel): nang ? che zhing tsha/ /khong rmya ma yin gtsang mar dang/ /bshad gci kha zas mi 'du la/ /bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid/ /rims shugs stobs skom dang che/ /bla zhib mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /bshad gci bder
113a1(mdo 'grel): 'byung nad bskyod pa/ /smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin/ /ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang/ /zhag bdun bsnyung byas la smin bshad/ /rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni/ /stobs chung che las rnams ldar bshad//
113a2(mdo 'grel): phal cher 'dus bar gyur ba yi/ /rims su mang du 'gyur bar bshad/ /rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa/ /nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi ba'o/ /lus zungs bshad gci rgyu ba yi/ /bu ga nad kyis khyab byas ba'i/ /lus kun tsha bar gyur
113a3(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /gnod byas sogs dang mnyam par 'phel/ /stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs/ /khyad par du ni dangs mar gnas/ /gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod bar dka' / /rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi drod kyi dri ma dang/ /lus
113a4(mdo 'grel): zungs myar du zad par byed/ /de 'og rnam kun lus gzungs sogs/ /dag pa'am ma dag rims kyis ni/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhag bdun nam bcu 'am bcu gnyis gnas/ /phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar/ /'cho
113a5(mdo 'grel): ba'am 'chi ba dag tu byed/ /de skad ? bzhin 'jug gis bshad/ /ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung/ /bdun pa nyis lnga ba gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig ldab/ /'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyi tshigs/ /'tsho dang 'chi
113a6(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa yin/ /rims dus dag dang ma dag las/ /yun rings dus su 'ang gnas pa yin/ /nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang/ /kha zas mi 'phrod sogs bsten pas/ /nad dkyil chud yang gnod byas sogs/ /brten te stobs che
113a7(mdo 'grel): nyid gyur las/ /gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'brir gnas/ /mi bzang ba ni nyid du 'gyur/ /de rnams kyi ni nad kyi stobs/ /rang gi dus su rims stobs skye/ /slar yang de dag bcos thabs kyis/ stobs cha chung las ldog par
113b1(mdo 'grel): byed/ /nad zad rims ni phar gyur ba/ /bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim/ /thim bas lus ring sha mdog dan/ /rmongs pa gal bsogs de mis bskyed/ nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir/ /dang sam rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las/ /las kun myur du khyab pa ni/ /nad
113b2(mdo 'grel): kyis skye bar byed ba yin/ /des na rgyun tu rtag rims 'byung/ /de las bzlag pa tshul mi 'dra/ /mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam la/ /bya ba'i dus mi mnyam yun ring/ /phal cher nad ni khrag la brten/ /rtag ba'i rims ni byed par
113b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de yang nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang/ /nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang/ /de ni sha yi rtsa la brten/ /gsum pa tshil gyi rtsal gnas/ /mkhris ba rlung gnyis sbyi nas 'dzin/ /bad kan mkhris 'gyur sum mngon/ /rlung dang
113b4(mdo 'grel): bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin/ /de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin/ /nyin bzhi ba rims nad chil dang/ /rkang dang rus pa'i nang na gnas/ /gzhan dag chil nyid la gnas zer/ de yi nus pa bstan pa ni/ /bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na/
113b5(mdo 'grel): rlung gis klad pa na bar byed/ /rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yi/ /nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o/ /nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na/ /nyin gcig na bar mi byed do/ /nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung/ /zas dang spyod pa las byung zhing/ /de
113b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni/ /yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur/ /nad kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa/ /nad sos nye che zhu bar 'gyur/ /de tshe nad pa dbugs drag rdul/ /'khun zhing slon byed 'dre ba dang/ /lus 'dar chag mang tshe ba dang/
113b7(mdo 'grel): ? drang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang/ /dran stong rims kyis shugs kyis gzir/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang/ /bshad ba nad dang bsrang bcas pa/ /sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin/ /lus ni yang zhing rmya dang rmongs ? tsha ba ?
114a1(mdo 'grel): na thor bu 'byung dang dbang po rtas shing bde/ /yid ni sor gnas rdul sbring bder 'byung yi ga 'byed/ /mgo bo g.ya' ba rims nad 'byang ba'i mtshan ma yin// //yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus
114a2(mdo 'grel): ba las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis ba'o// //de nas khrag dang mkhris dang lud ba'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur/ /lan tshul sogs tsha ba dang/ khre rgod yu ta la yi zas/ /de bcas shin tu
114a3(mdo 'grel): bston drags dang/ /mkhris pa can gyis mkhris nad ni/ /gsher dang khrag rgyas nad du 'gyur/ /de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur pas/ /lus kun khyab par byed par 'gyur/ /mkhris pa khrag las gyur ba dang/ /'dros dang gnod bya las dang gcig
114a4(mdo 'grel): mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas/ /khrag gi ming du bstan pa yin/ /de ni khrag gnas mchin ba dang/ /mcher ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mgo bo lci zhing yig 'chus/ /bsil 'dod sgeg ba dud can skyur/ /skyug cing skyug mdog gtsog
114a5(mdo 'grel): bar snang/ /lud ba dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor/ /khong snyoms khrag dmar nya dri dro/ /kha dri mi zhim skad 'gags la/ /mig la sogs pa'i kha dog ni/ /dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang/ /rmi lam du yang kha dog de/ /'dir ni mthong bar
114a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ /bstod du sna mig rnang kha/ /smad du bshes sgo pho mo'i mtshan/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang/ /khrag rab rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /stong kyi bad kan yin gso sla/ /de ni bkru sman btang bas gso/ /sman mang yod cing
114a7(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa yi/ /sman gyi mchog ni bkru sman yin/ /zla la yod pa'i bad kan yang/ /der ni de yis sbyangs byas 'gyur/ /de la smin mdar dang bsko/ /bad kan dag la phan pa la/ /gang ldog dang gis bad kan sel/ /kha dang bska ba?
114b1(mdo 'grel): smos ci dgos/ /thung du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir/ /de ni skyug sman btang bas gso/ /mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung pa yin/ /skyug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchag yin/ /rtsal yod pa'i rlung nad kyang/ /de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur/ /de la ro ni mdar bskab//
114b2(mdo 'grel): 'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin/ /bad kan rlung ni 'dres ba'i nad/ /gnyi gar 'byung ba gso dka' ste/ /bzlog ba'i thabs ni med phyir dang/ /sman yang yod pa ma yin no/ /'di las bzlog bar bya ba'i thabs/ /sbyangs ba 'am yod ba ma yin te//
114b3(mdo 'grel): sbyangs bas bzlog par bya ba dag/ sman pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin/ /de bzhin nye bar zhi ba yang/ /'di la yod ye yod ma yin/ /'dres par gyur ba'i nang la ni/ /thams cad sel bya'i zhi bya phan/ /de la nad dang rjes mthun ba'i/ /gtang ga btab ste
114b4(mdo 'grel): brtag par bya/ /rlung khrag gnag ? dmar dang rtsug /mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag ma nam/ /bad gan khrag ni 'jam la skya/ /nyes gsum dre ma rnyog pa can/ /bla gnyan 'byung bar gyur pa dag /'gyur bar shes las rtogs par bya/ /khrag dang mkhris
114b5(mdo 'grel): pa shin tu dmar/ /yang na gnag ba'am 'cho btsam/ /de la lud pa myang gnod byed?/ /de phyir de nyid bshad par bya/ /lud pa rlung mkhris bad kan dang/ /blo brdol glo gco la sdud bshad thams cad ma gsos zad byed 'gyur/ /phyi ma bzhin du
114b6(mdo 'grel): stobs chen yin/ /de rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags/ /gre ba g.ya' zhing yi go 'chus/ /gre nang gra mas gang snyam sems/ /de la thung/ /stong du song ste brang du phyin/ /de tshe mgul pa'i nang du zhe na/ /mgo bo'i rtsa rnams
114b7(mdo 'grel): bkang nas ni/ /de nas yan lag 'degs bltar/ g.yengs byed mig brtol tsam du na/ /rgyab brang rtsib logs na zhing zug /kha ru 'byung zhing rgyu ba ni/ /lugs pa snod chags 'dra sgra 'byung/ /nad gzhi dbye bas nad kyang ni/ /tha dang shugs dang bcas pa
115a1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /nad gang sgra ni ma snyom pa'i/ /de las lud pa 'byung ba yin/ /rlung nad skyes pa rlung 'khrugs pa/ /brang dang gre ba kha bskams shing/ /snying brang rtsib logs klad pa gzer/ /rmong bag khong 'khrugs skad 'gags shing/ /
115a2(mdo 'grel): lud pa skams po 'byung byed cing/ /na ba'i shugs pa drag sgra cher 'byung/ /lus kun brtse byas bad kan skam/ /mthon par dka' zhing nyung du 'byung/ /mkhris pas mig dang bad kan ser/ /kha nad kha zhing rims mgo 'khor/ /khrag mkhris slon zhing skom
115a3(mdo 'grel): dad che/ /skad 'gags dud 'dud 'dra skyur ba dang/ /khud pa'i shugs kyi rgyun 'byung ba/ /skar mda''phro ba lta bur snang/ /bad kan las brang na tshabs chung/ /mgo lci snying ga gang snyam sems/ /gre bar bskus 'dra snyoms par byed/ /cham 'debs zas
115a4(mdo 'grel): skyug yig 'chus/ /spu rtse khud pa bska ba dang/ /snum zhing dkar ba 'byung par 'gyur/ /stobs 'gyed la sogs drag shul rnams/ /mi nus bzhin byas de dang des/ /rlung gis brang na glo dral la/ /mkhris pa rjes 'brangs dkyel gyur pa//
115a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs te lud pa lu bar byed/ /des ni bad kan khrig bcas dang/ /ser zhing gnag la skams pa dang/ /ril ril po mnam mang du 'byung/ /'byung tshe gre ba na ba dang/ /brang ni dbral snyam du sems/ /khab ni rnon pos phug snyam sems//
115a6(mdo 'grel): gzer gyis 'debs par byed pa dang/ /tshigs 'bye? rims dang dbugs mi bde/ /skad 'gags lus 'dar skom dad tshe/ /phug ron lta bur 'khung 'byin te/ /rtsib logs gser 'gyur de nas ni/ /rims gyis stobs dang me drod dang /nus ma
115a7(mdo 'grel): nyams ni 'bri bar 'gyur/ /za byed kyis gcin khrag dang bcas/ /rgyab dang rked ba ngan par 'gyur/ /gtso bor rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/ /lus zungs zed byed nad rgyal lo/ /glo gcor gis ni gnas byed cing/ /lud pa lu zhing bad kan 'byung//
115b1(mdo 'grel): rnag khrag mnam zhing ser ba dang/ /drul zhing rtsa sdo dmar ba dang/ /rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems shing/ /snying ni ltung ba snyam du byed/ /rgyu med ? dang grang ba 'dod/ /zas mang za zhing nyams stobs zad/ /bzhin ni snum zhing dang bar snang/ /mig ni
115b2(mdo 'grel): mdangs ldan lta sdug 'gyur/ /de nas de la zad byed 'byung/ /thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar glo brdol las byung lud/ /nyam chud lus ni 'jigs byed de/ /stobs ldan gso btsam du rung/ /glo gcod las byung de dang 'dri/ /de gnyis
115b3(mdo 'grel): gsar 'byung mgon ldan 'grub/ /nad gzhi tha dad gsum gsor rung/ /gnyis 'dres kun kyang rgan po ni/ /na tshod cad btab 'tshe ba tsam/ /lus pa yal bar bor ba las/ /dbugs mi bde dang zad byed slon/ /skad 'gags la sogs nad 'byung
115b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de phyir de ni myur du gso// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bus btab pa'i nad gzhi bshad bar bya'o/ /lud
115b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'phel ba'am sngar nad gzhi/ /'khrugs pas dbugs mi bde 'byung 'gyur/ /mzhu tshad 'khru slon dug 'thungs/ /skya rbab rims btab las kyang 'byung/ /phran tshegs mun can chad pa dang/ /chen po gyen 'byung rnam pa lnga/ /bad kan gyis
115b6(mdo 'grel): ni rgyu lam bkag/ rlung ni sna tshogs khyab par gnas/ /srog dang zas skom rgyu ba'i lam/ /slu gu nad kyis bkag pas na/ /ma zhu'i gnas nas 'byung ba'i dbugs/ /brang gnas dbugs mi bde bar byed/ /de yi rdun tshul snying rtsib logs/
115b7(mdo 'grel): gzer zhing srog rlung mi mthun rgyu/ /spos dang mur 'gram na ba oyin/ /des ni drag shul 'drangs drags pas/ /bskyod ba'i rngam pa phran tshogs 'gyur/ /de ni rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur/ /rlung gis rtsa spubs logs rgyu byed/ /bad kan
116a1(mdo 'grel): slongs bar gyur nas ni/ /klad pa'i mgul pa'i nang song ste/ /brang dang rtsi ba logs na bar byed/ /lung ba'i ngar sgra 'dzer mi dran/ /cham pa mi bzang yig 'chus/ /mi bzang shugs ni skyed byed cing/ /dbugs
116a2(mdo 'grel): mi bde ba de shugs kyis/ /srog la gnod 'gyur lung pa'i mthar/ /skad cig bde ba byed pa yin/ /nyal cha shin tu mi bde la/ /'dug na cung zad bde bar 'gyur/ /mig gdangs dpral ba'i phyogs nas ni/ /rdul 'dzag shin
116a3(mdo 'grel): tu nabs nyan/ /kha bskams dbugs ni stud mar 'byung/ /dro ba 'dod cing 'dang dang bcas/ /char 'dab grang dang ser bus phog/ bad kan bskyed pas rnam par 'phel/ /mun can de ni 'tsho bya 'a ma/ /nyams ldan gsar du btab gso sla//
116a4(mdo 'grel): rims dang brgyal las byung grang ba'i/ /sman gyis zhi de rab mun can/ /dbugs 'chad dbugs 'byin rgyun chad cing/ /nang gcong nad kyis gzer bar byed/ /rdul bcas brgyal dang spos dang bcas/ /lgang pa tsha zhing gcin
116a5(mdo 'grel): 'gag byed/ /mig mi sdug cing thur du blta/ mig gcig dmar bzhing dran pa stong/ /kha bskams smre zhing skad ka sangs dma'/ /gzi mdangs nyams shing sems bral ba'o// /chen po ba ro cher 'byung zhing/ /sgra cha sdur pa drag pa dang//
116a6(mdo 'grel): bskyod pa bzhin du 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /khyu mchog rgyags ba'i da ro 'dra/ /shes dang rnams shes rab nyams shing/ /mig 'khrug bzhin ni 'gyur ba dang/ /ro stong zhum par 'gyur ba dang/ /bshad gci 'gags shing skad gsang
116a7(mdo 'grel): nyams/ /mgul bsgams yang dang yang mi dran/ /rna ba mur 'gram klad rab na/ /gyen 'byung dbugs ni ring du 'byin/ /slar ni thur du rdub mi nus/ /bad kan gyis kha rtsa sgo 'gag/ rlung ni 'khrugs pas gzir gyur pa/ /gyen du blta zhing
116b1(mdo 'grel): 'khrul byed bas/ /mig ni kun tu lta byed la/ /gnod rnams 'chad par byed bzhin du/ /skad 'gags smre sngags 'don par byed/ /'di dag ma tshang gsor rung la/ /tshang na nges par srogs 'phrog byed/ /dbugs mi bde rgyu sngon tshul dang/ /grangs
116b2(mdo 'grel): dang rang bzhin rten cig yin/ /skyigs bu las 'byung bran tshegs dang/ /zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang/ /zab pa dag dang rnam pa lnga/ /de la rlung gis rigs zos dang/ /rtsub tsha sra dang ma goms ba'i/ /zas dang skom gyis btsir gyur pa'i//
116b3(mdo 'grel): rlung gi skyigs bu nang med pa/ /sgra mi drag cing sbring 'byung ste/ /gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom gyis/ /zhi 'gyur skyigs bu bzang 'byung yin/ /drag shul gyis rlung cung zad bskyod/ /skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nam
116b4(mdo 'grel): chod rtsa ba nas 'byung byed/ /de ni shugs ngal 'jam pa yin/ /rtsol ba drag pos 'phel 'gyur la/ /zas zos tsam gyis ngal bar 'gyur/ /zung 'jug tshigs ni ri rab la/ /gang zhig zas las 'byung gyur pa/ /'ju bar nye bar tshe na 'debs//
116b5(mdo 'grel): zas zhu zin nas 'phel 'gyur pa'i/ /mgo dang mgul ba 'dar byed cing/ /spo zhing shin tu skom dad bskyed/ /gla dang slon dang tshad par 'khru/ /mig gdangs glal ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyigs bu zud 'byung shugs drag la/ /zhu dang
116b6(mdo 'grel): bcas par de shes bya/ /skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul/ /smin ma mur 'gram gnyes rengs shing/ /mig nad mchi 'dzag? har por blta/ /lus rengs tshig ni thogs byed cing/ /dran dang 'du shes 'khrul bar byed/ /mig ba'i
116b7(mdo 'grel): spubs ni 'gags byed cing/ /gnang kyi tshogs ni/ skyod par byed/ /rgyab dgu lus ni khor skem byed/ rtsa ba chen zhing sgra chel?/ /nang tshabs zhing stobs cher 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i gnas sam lte 'og nas/ /snga ma 'dra bar gang zhig 'byung/ /de 'dra'i tshul ni
117a1(mdo 'grel): bsdud mar 'byung/ /glal dang rkang lag bya snyangs byed/ /brag ca zab 'byung zab mo yin/ /de rnams las ni dang po yi/ /gnyis po gso bar bya ba yin/ /tha ma'i gnyis dang zung 'byung ba/ /mtshan nyid
117a2(mdo 'grel): kun rdzogs shugs drag spang/ /'di dag thams cad yun rim bsags/ /rgan po bud med kyis dub dang/ /nang kyis nyam chung zas bcad pa/ /glo brdol nang can spang bar bya/ /nang kun gyis 'chi byed mod kyi/ /skyigs bu
117a3(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde ba ltar/ /nad gzhan myur du gsod mi byed/ /'di dag 'chi tshe nges 'byung 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas glo gcong chen
117a4(mdo 'grel): po zod byed kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nang ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing/ /nang mar sngon du 'gro 'gyur la/ /rgyal po za byed skems byed dang/ /nang kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bshad/ /rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi/ /rgyal po'i gcong du
117a5(mdo 'grel): sngon gyur zhing/ /gang yang nang kyi rgyal bor 'gyur/ /de phyir gnod pa'i rgyal por bshad/ /lus dang sman ni zad byed cing/ /zad las byung bas zad byed yin/ /mdangs sogs skams bas skem byed yin/ /de rnams las de
117a6(mdo 'grel): gsal bas rgyal/ /drag shul brten dang shugs bkag dang/ /khu chu dangs ma snam zad dang/ /zas skom tsha gra dang bral bsten/ /bzhi po 'di dag de yi rgu/ /de yis rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ /bad kan bslangs nas thams cad du//
117a7(mdo 'grel): lus kyi tshigs kun la zhugs te/ /de yis rtsa sgo la gnod cing/ /bu ga'i sgo ni bkag ba'o/ /yang na shin tu kha bya 'gyur/ /stod smang thad kar gnas nges ni/ /rang gi nad me ji bzhin bskyed/ /de 'byung 'gyur ba'i sngon tshul
117b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /cham 'debs sbrid pa shin tu mang/ /mchil ma kha nang ro mngar bro/ /lus dang me drod nyam chung byed// /gzhong snod zas skom la sogs ni/ /gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mthong/ /phal cher zas skom la sogs dang/ /sbrang ma rtsa dang skra
117b2(mdo 'grel): sogs 'bab/ /snying 'phar slon bro yi gas chus/ /kha zas zos kyang nyams stobs zad/ /lag bar blta zhing kha gdong skrang/ /mig ni shin tu dkar por snang/ /lag par dag ni 'jal bar 'dod/ /lus la 'jigs su rung bar mthong//
117b3(mdo 'grel): bud med chad dang sha la dga' / /smod dang glang po 'gems bar byed/ /skra dang sen mo shin tu ?/ /rmi le du ni phye ma leb/ /rtsad pa sdig sbrul gcan zan spre'u/ /bya rnams kyis ni gces par mthong/ /skra rus phub ma thal sogs kyi//
117b4(mdo 'grel): phung po la ni 'dzeg pa dang/ /yul dang grong ni stongs pa dang/ chu klung bskams par rmi lam mthong/ /skar mda' ri bo ltung pa dang/ /ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi/ /stod du gnas na cha mkhas 'debs/ /lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde//
117b5(mdo 'grel): phrag ba spyi bo na ba dang/ /skad 'gags yi ga 'chus bar 'gyur/ /smad gnas bshad sma rtug skam byed/ /nad grol nang nas smon par byed/ /thad kar gnas pas rtsi ba logs zug/ tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur ro/ /de ltar nad tshul bcu
117b6(mdo 'grel): gcig ni/ /gcod chen ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de rnams kyi no bla gnyan dag/ skad 'gags brang phun ba dang/ /kha glal lus grugs mchis snabs mang/ /drod nyams kha mnam yin shes bya/ /de la rlung 'gyur glad ba dang/ /rtsi ba
117b7(mdo 'grel): logs zug sha yan lag na/ /skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur/ /mkhris rgyas rka lag phrags ?/ /tshad 'khru khrag tu slob pa dang/ /kha mnam rims 'debs myos par 'gyur/ /bad kan las gyur yi ge 'chus/ /slon lud lus
118a1(mdo 'grel): dang yan lag lci/ /mchil snabs mang zhing cham pa 'debs/ /dbugs mi bde skad 'gags drod nyams/ /nang kyis me drong nyam chung bas/ /'byar bcas pad kan rgyas gyur nas/ /rtsa sdubs sgo ni 'gags pa dang/ /lus
