118a2(mdo 'grel): zungs drod ne chung 'gyur bas/ /dangs ma rang gi gnas su ni/ /ma zhu bas gnyan da dang de/ /bskyed cing sha sogs mi 'gyur la/ /khrag ni g.yen du 'byung bar byed/ /khar ba nyid du zas 'ju bas/ /dangs mar 'gyur bar mi byed phyir/ /phal cher dri
118a3(mdo 'grel): ma nyid 'gyur gyi/ /lus zungs 'phel bar mi byed do/ /dangs ma khrag tu me 'gyur la/ /shar 'gyur ba lta smos ci dgos/ /za byed can ni bshang 'phel ba /'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed/ /mtshan ma chung yang nyam chung zhing/ /nad kyi
118a4(mdo 'grel): sman gyi stobs mi bzod/ /sbar bya de las gzhan ba ni/ /thams cad ldan yang gas bar bya/ /nang ni sna res 'dus ba dang/ /za byed tshil las gyur ba drug/ skad 'gags kyi ni bye ba yin/ /de la rlung g.yo nyam chung rtsub /gre ba gra mas gang snyam
118a5(mdo 'grel): byad/ /da la snum dro 'o ma ban/ /mkhris pa las gyur rkan lkog cho/ /skam zhing smre ba rim nus 'gyur/ /bad kan mgul pa byungs snyam byed/ /skad kyi gsang dma' ngar ngar 'jer/ /thogs bces 'gyur ro thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ma thams cad
118a6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yin/ /za byed las ne drung snyam byed/ /du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na/ /tshil 'gyur bad kan bdag nyid can/ tshegs mi brda sprod mi nus 'gyur/ /'dir na 'dus dang tha ma spang/ /yi ge 'chus pa'i nang rnams ni/ /lce snying gnas pa so so
118a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni/ /gdung ba las gyur lnga ba yin/ /kha ni bskd dang kha mngar bro/ /rlung? sogs gsum dang rims bzhin sbyar/ /kun las gyur pa ro bro med/ /mya ngan khro sogs nad ji bzhin/ /slon bro nad gzhi rnam re kun/ /mi sdug
118b1(mdo 'grel): yul las 'byung lnga ba/ /'di dag stod du rgyu ba'i rlung/ /'khrugs pas nas ni thams cad phul/ /de rnams grongs dang kha tsha go?/ mchil ma yig 'chus sngon 'byung/ /rlung 'gyur lte ba rgyab tu zug/ rtsi ba logs na zhing zas slon nas/ /cung zad 'byung
118b2(mdo 'grel): zhing cad ba dang/ /ro bska lbu ba can du skyug /sgregs pa'i sgra bcas mdog gnag la/ /sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bcas/ /lud pa kha bskams klang snying na/ /skod 'gags pa dang khong snyoms bcas/ /mkhris 'gyur thal chu 'dra ba lo/ /dud kha ?
118b3(mdo 'grel): sngon mdog ser skyug/ khrig bcas ro skyar skyar cha zhing dro/ /skom dad brgya la tsha gdung bcas yin/ /bad kan las byung snum kha bsil/ /nal nal por 'dug 'dra ba'i ris/ /ro mngar lan cha bro tsha bas ?/ /chags shing pa sbu rtse bar byed/ /gdong skrangs khan pa?
118b4(mdo 'grel): mngar bar bro/ /snem zhing? snying na lung pa can/ /gsum char las byung rtags kun ldan/ /'chi ltas las bshad ? yang/ /krul dang mi gtsang btsog ba dang/ /skyug bro mthong dang thos sogs kyis/ /yid gdungs snying la phog 'gyur slon/ /mi sdug
118b5(mdo 'grel): yul las byung ba yin/ /yid mi bde skom srin be'u snabs/ /rlung sogs nyid la gnas par brtag /gzer dang 'phar dang snying na ba/ /bye brag tu ni srin bu'i na da/ /srin bu snying nad mtshan ma las/ /de ni shes par bya ba yin/ /snying nang na re
118b6(mdo 'grel): re 'dus/ /sren pu las gyur rnam lngar bshad/ /rlung gis shin tu zug cing na/ /gas dang bshags pa snyam du sems/ /bcom snyam sems shing skam la rengs/ /snying gis stong snyam zag par byed/ /rgyu med zhum zhing mi dka' la/ /'dzags
118b7(mdo 'grel): shing dgra ni mi bzod la/ /'phar zhing 'dre la btsus snyam byed/ /rmongs bag dbugs zung gnyid tshung 'gyur/ /mkhris 'gyur skom dad mgo 'khor brgyal/ /cha rdul snying ba skyur lus snyom/ /mkhris ba skyur ba slon par byed/ /dud pa kha?
119a1(mdo 'grel): 'ong ser rims 'debs/ /bad kan las gyur snying ga rengs/ /khong na rdo bcug lta bur lci/ /drod nyams mchil mang lud pa lu/ /gnyid cho snyoms rims i ga 'chus/ /nyis gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan//
119a2(mdo 'grel): srin bus mig ni gnag ba dang/ /mun par zhugs snyam byed snying 'phar/ /lus bskams g.ya' zhang bad kan 'dzag/ 'di ni rtag tu sog le yis/ /snyed la 'drung pa lta bur sems/ /mi bzad nad des myur gsad pas/ /de ni rings/
119a3(mdo 'grel): bar gso bar bya/ /skom dang rlung mkhris bad kan dang/ /'dus pa dangs ma zad pa dang/ /nad 'dres pa las drug tu 'gyur/ /de ltar gyur pa thams cad la/ /rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgya yin te/ /de 'khrugs lus zungs bsil ba ni//
119a4(mdo 'grel): bskams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lus kun 'dar zhing mgo 'khor tsha/ /skom dang khong tsha rmongs par byed/ /lci drung mgul pa glo ba dang/ /skam dang skom 'thung rgyu ba'i rtsa/ /bskams pas skom dang skye bar 'gyur/ /de
119a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/ /kha bskams skom gyis mi ngoms dang/ /zas la mi dga' skad 'gags dang/ /gre ba lce mchu rtsub mor 'gyur/ /lce 'byin byed cing khong snyoms la/ /gla zhing sems ni mos pa dang/ /de bzhin
119a6(mdo 'grel): skom gdungs nad du 'gyur/ /lus bskams rmya zhing 'on pa dang/ /rmongs bag? mgo 'khor snying nad ste/ /'di lta bu yi nang rnams ni/ /skom bas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur/ /rlung 'gyur khong rma nam chung la/ /mur 'gram
119a7(mdo 'grel): zhug cing klad ba 'khor/ /sna les dri dang ro mi tshor/ /'o na zhing gnyid med nyams stobs zad/ /chu grang 'thungs na skom 'phel 'gyur/ /mkhris ba kha nang ro kha brgyal/ /dmar por ma thob zhing rtag par ni/ /kha skam khong tsha dgu
119b1(mdo 'grel): mnam pa'o/ /bad kan ldan pas skom ldan pas skom rgya'i rtsa/ /bkag pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas/ /de tshe de yis bad kan ni/ /'jam bzhin de yis skom par byed/ /mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/ /gnyid che kha nang mngar ba bro/ /lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung//
119b2(mdo 'grel): rmongs bag slon gyur yig 'chus/ /lus snyoms kha zas mi 'dzu ba'o/ /kun las gyur ba rtags kun ldan/ /be snubs las gyur kha zas ni/ /ming dka' rlung mkhris las gyur yi/ /tsha bas ngal bas 'phral du na/ /chu grang bsten gyur skom dang che
119b3(mdo 'grel): khong bar tsha ba bsdus pa yis/ /gang skom de ni mkhris skyes yin/ /gang yang chang drags me drod rno/ /snum zos skyes pa 'am mkhris 'byung yin/ /snum zhing skyur dang lan cha'i bag /zos pas bad kan las skyes 'gyur/ /? byed las ni skom
119b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'gyur/ /dangs ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra/ /khong bskams gcin nad rims nad sogs/ /yun rings nad ni rims skom nang/ /gang zhig skom dad mi bzang skyes/ /de ni 'dres las 'byung bar bshad// //yan lag brgyud
119b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u lnga'o// //de nas char nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya/ /rno dang drod che rtsub phra skyur/ /nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang/ /gsal dang dang bar byed par bshad/ /mdangs ni 'di
119b6(mdo 'grel): las go bzlog yin/ /dug kyang rno sogs yin mod kyi/ /sems la gnod par byed pa yi/ /nus pas 'chi bar byed pa na/ /dug ni lhag par mthu bo che'o/ /chang ni rno sogs yon tan gyis/ /mdangs kyi yon tan brtul la sogs/ /bcu
119b7(mdo 'grel): bo bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas/ /sems ni skyur bar byed pa yin/ /ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis/ /bag med pa yi gnas la gnas/ /rnam rtog dan bcom rmongs pa rnams/ /bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur/ /'breng dang chen po bar gyi tshe//
120a1(mdo 'grel): rdul dang mun pa zhi rang bzhin can/ /glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar/ /rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med/ /'di ni kha na ma tho'i gnas/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'i gzhi/ /'di gcig ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i lam//
120a2(mdo 'grel): mang po ston par byed pa yin/ /ra ro gsum pa'i tshe na ni/ /sems med par ni ro ltar nyal/ /nyes pa'i bdag nyid shi ba las/ /shin tu ma rungs gnas skabs 'thob/ /chos dang chos min bde dang sdug/ don dang don min phan dang gnod//
120a3(mdo 'grel): gang la chags pas mi shes pa/ /de ltar mkhas pas ji ltar bsten/ /chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang/ /khro dang srog dang bral ba gnas/ /smya byed myos dang brgyal bar byas/ /brjed byed dang bcas kun song nad/ /gang du dran pa 'am
120a4(mdo 'grel): cig yod/ /der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung/ /mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang/ /nad dam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /chad ni sde tshan gsum blo brtan/ /ngo tsha srogs kyang 'jigs par byed/ /nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang/ /zas cher
120a5(mdo 'grel): za dang snum bag za/ /snying stobs lang tsho ldan pa yang/ /rtag tu chang 'thung de'i rigs skyes/ /tshil dang bad kan shas che la/ /rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas chung dang/ /me drod che zhing bstan pa rnams/ /shas cher ra ror mi 'gyur ro/ /de las
120a6(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa chang dang can/ /khros dang chang rtsub skyur shas che/ /ma zhur bcas dang ma 'thungs pa/ /gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur/ /rlung mkhris bad kan kun las 'byung/ /chang nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi//
120a7(mdo 'grel): shas che ba las ming du btags/ /de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid/ /rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang/ /'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che/ /tsha gang rims 'debs yig 'chus/ /mgo po rtsi ba rus na dang 'dar/ /gnad 'jig lhag pa na ba dang/ /brla?/
120b1(mdo 'grel): rengs rab rib khyer ba dang/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med/ /rdul cher 'byung zhing bshad ba 'gags/ /sgrangs shing sems ni 'khrul pa dang/ /gla zhing slon par byed pa dang/ /mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba'o/ /rlung
120b2(mdo 'grel): gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong/ dbugs mi bde zhing klad na 'dar/ /rmi lam du ni 'phyan? zhing 'phur/ /gshin po rnams dang gtan smra rmi/ /mkhris las lus cha skad 'gags dang/ /rmongs bag tshe 'khru skom mgo 'khor /lus
120b3(mdo 'grel): mdog ljang dang ser ba dang/ /mig dang mkhur tshos dmar bar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis slon snying na dang/ /gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /chad spangs pa las 'phral du ni/ /mang du 'thung dam
120b4(mdo 'grel): ma goms 'thung/ /de las 'joms dang lus skam nang/ /rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung/ /nyams chung ba las mchog tu 'byung/ /'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang/ /lkog ma bskams shing gnyid rab che/ /sga dra ga mi
120b5(mdo 'grel): bzod glong bag 'gyur/ /lus bskams yan lag mgo rab na/ /snying dang mgul nang rmongs phag dang/ /lud pa skom dang slon rims 'debs/ /gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni/ /dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed/ /nam yang
120b6(mdo 'grel): de la lus sems kyi/ /skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// /rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod zas/ /mchog tu bstan nas nang gsum 'byung/ /dangs ma khrag dang sems rgyu pa'i/ /rtsa sbubs bkag pa las byung ba /myos dang brgal
120b7(mdo 'grel): dang kun song nas/ phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che/ /'dir myos nad sna re re kun/ /khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung/ /rlung las gtam las chags pa dang/ /mang smra nyung smra spyod pa 'khrul/ /lus ni rtsub gnag dmar 
121a1(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ /myos pa rlung? las skyes pa yin/ /mkhris pa las khro dmar ba dang/ /ser por snang zhing rtsod la dga' / /bad kan tshig nyung 'brel smra skya/ /sems las che zhing le lo che/ /'dus pa mtshan
121a2(mdo 'grel): nyid kun dang ldan /khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan par 'gyur/ /chang gis yan lag skad spyod 'gyur// /dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid ra ba che/ /de ni kun las myos tshabs
121a3(mdo 'grel): che/ /khrag sogs pa yis rlung sogs pa'i/ /mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya/ /brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /nam mkha' dmar sngo gnag par ni/ /mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems/ /myur du
121a4(mdo 'grel): sangs par byed pa dang/ /snying na 'dar zhing mgo 'khar la/ /skam zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur/ /mkhris pas dmar ba'am ser por ni/ /nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/ /sangs nas rdul dang bcas
121a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /cha bskom gdungs pas nyon? pa dang/ /'khru zhing kha dog ser dang dmar/ /mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur/ /nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/ /ring nas sangs bas 'gyur ba
121a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /snying na bcas par mchil ma mang/ /pags pa rlon pas g.yogs pa bzhin/ /yan lag lci zhing tshong ba chung/ /nyes pa gsum gyis mtshan kun ldan/ /brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste/ /myur du 'gyel zhing brgyal 'gyur
121a7(mdo 'grel): te/ /'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin/ /lus can myos dang brgyas pa'i nang/ /la shugs yod par gyur kyang ni/ /rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /kun zhugs sman med par mi zhi/ /nad ni shin tu stobs che la/ /'dus pa las gyur
121b1(mdo 'grel): kun zhugs pa/ /srog gi nas la brten pa yis/ /lus ngang dag gis spyod pa 'phrog/ /de yis skyes bu ro dang ni/ /shing dang rtsig par 'dra bar byed/ /rings par gso bar ma byas na/ /myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /mtsho zab chu srin mang po can
121b2(mdo 'grel): chu ? 'jug ngogs med par ni/ /kun zhugs pa yis nub byed pa/ /mi ni myur du gnod par bya/ /rigs pas brten dang bral ba'i chang 'thungs pas/ /myos drags khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khrung gyur zhing/ /rigs
121b3(mdo 'grel): dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur/ /stobs dang dus dang yul dang goms pa dang/ /rang bzhin grogs dang na tshong nang rnams pa/ /legs brtags da dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thung/ /de ni dung rtsi 'thung dang mtshungs pa yin// //
121b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nang gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe /gzhang 'brum 'byung bas gsod byed pas/ /de
121b5(mdo 'grel): phyir bshad pa'i lam 'gegs pa/ /gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /nad kyis pags tshigs sha rnams ni/ /gnod byed dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /sha yi myu gu gzhang sogs su/ /skyes te gzhang 'brum yin par bshad/ /lhan cig
121b6(mdo 'grel): skyes dang phyis 'byung dang/ /skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi/ /dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin/ /gzhang na rgyu ma sbom por brten/ /sor ni phyed dang lnga yod de/ /gnyer gsum sor ni byed deng gnyis/ /rim pa de yi nang ma ni/ /phyir
121b7(mdo 'grel): 'phul bar ma sol ba yin/ /de yi phyi rol 'jums pa yin/ /de yi phyi rol sor cig kha/ /nas ni phye dang gnyis kyi tshad/ /de phan chad ni spu skye 'gyur/ /de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu/ /gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid// /gzhang
122a1(mdo 'grel): 'brum sa bon gnod pa yang/ /pha mas mi bzod zos pa dang/ /sngon las de gnyis dang 'dus pa/ /'khrugs pa las gyur de dag ni/ /gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad/ /rigs 'byung nad kun de dang 'dra/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du//
122a2(mdo 'grel): rtsub cing lta ba dka' ba dang/ /nang du kha bltas dkar ba dang/ /bla gnyan mi bzod can gso dka' / /cig shos drug sta nang tha dang/ /'dres dang 'dus pa khrag las byung/ /rlung dang bad kan gnyis las skam/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can/ /nang rnams ldang
122a3(mdo 'grel): rgyu lngar bshad pa/ /'khrugs pas de yis khong pa yi/ /ma drod nyams shing bshad pa 'phel/ /gzhan yang nyal po rab drags dang/ /gzhon pas khong dkrugs stan dag ni/ /ma snyoms sra dang tsog pur 'dug/ 'jam rtsi'i gce'u sa dang ni/ /sngo dang gos kyis
122a4(mdo 'grel): drud pa dang/ /shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang/ /rtag tu 'khru bar byed pa dang/ /bshad dang gci dang phyin gyi shugs/ /bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang/ /rims dang skran dang tshad bar 'khru/ /'or nad skya rbab be snabs kyis/ /skem bas gnod par
122a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yi/ /spyod pa bsten las gnod par 'gyur/ /bud med zla grangs ma tshang 'phyil/ /zla ba rdzogs pas gzir las byung/ /de 'dra ba dang gzhan yang rlung/ /thur ser 'khrugs pas dri ma ni/ /gzhang gi gter mar de bzhag pas/ /de ni
122a6(mdo 'grel): mi mngon gyur par gnas/ /gzhan 'dru ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi sngon tshul me drod nyams/ /brla ni rengs shing na ba dang/ /byin pa'i nywa na mgo 'khor zhing/ /yan lag na zhi dmig gnyis skrang/ /bshad ba 'khru ba'am
122a7(mdo 'grel): yang na sri/ /rlung chen nang na 'khyil ba dang/ /phal cher lte ba'i 'og na rgyu/ /nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems/ /rang bar 'byung zhing sgra gcan 'byung/ /rgyu ma kru la krul zer zhing sbo/ /skem zhing sgregs pa mang du 'byung/ /gcin mar
122b1(mdo 'grel): ? nyung yig 'chus/ /sgregs pa dud 'drar skyur ba 'byung/ /mgo dang brang dang rgyab tu gzer/ /snyom zhing kha dog nyams pa dang/ /blod bag dbang po nyam chung ba/ /khro zhing bsnyen bkur dkra' ba dang/ /ma zhu skem nad skya rbab dang/ /dmu ?
122b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la so mi skye/ /gzhang 'brum skyes par gyur pa la/ /'di dag nyid ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de yis 'og gi la bkag pas/ /thur du sel ba'i rlung lag ste/ /lus dang dbang po lun gnas pa'i/ /rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrugs par byed/ /de
122b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin bshad gci mkhris pa dang/ /bad kan lus zungs brten bcas pa/ /'khrug cing me drod nyams par byed/ /de nas gzhang 'brum nad can la/ /phal cher thams cad nyer 'byung pa/ /skam zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus/ /stobs zad khong
122b4(mdo 'grel): rmya bzhin mdangs nyams/ /lung ltod snying po med 'gyur zhing/ /'bus zos pa yi shing 'dra la/ /bla gnyan ma lus dag gis 'debs/ /ji skad bshad pa'i nad gzer zhing/ /lud pa skom dang skad 'gags dang/ /kha ro mi tshor cham 'dabs
122b5(mdo 'grel): sbo/ /skyid skyur rkang lag na zhing slon/ /sbring pa skrangs dang rims nad dang/ /khu ba zad cing rab rib slon/ /rde'u chags nad kyis gzer ba dang/ /skad 'gags zhum la sems khong chud/ /mchil ma mang 'dor yig 'chus/ /rus tshigs kun
122b6(mdo 'grel): dang snying lte ba/ /gzhang dang sna rtsa gzer dang bcas/ /gzhang nad 'bru ni ma smin btsos/ /khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bag 'dzag/ ? skam gci pa 'am sla bar 'khru/ /smin dang ma smin par bar 'khru/ /skya zhing ser dang sngon po yi/ /khra ni sbyin bag 'khor
122b7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur/ /skam zhing tsog tsog tsha ba dang/ /rnying cing dmar nag rengs pa dang/ /mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang/ /phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang/ /rtse mo rno zhing gas pa dang/ /bim+ba rgya shug kha rdzur//
123a1(mdo 'grel): ? kha la sa bon dang 'dra zheng/ /la la ka taM me tog 'dra/ /la la yungs kar lta bur skye/ /mgo dang phrag pa rtsi ba logs brla/ /chu so dag tu lhag par na/ /sbrid pa sgreg ba bshad pa sri/ /snying 'phar yi ga 'chus par
123a2(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /khud dbugs mi bde me drod nyams/ /rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed/ /des nyes rtug skam nyung du ni/ /sgra bcas ? sla 'dren ma dang/ /na zhing dbu ba 'byar bag can/ /rtug skam tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /pags pa
123a3(mdo 'grel): sems mo bshad gci dang ? mig dang gdang ni gnag par 'gyur/ /skran dang mcher ba dmu rdzing dang/ /rtun 'dra de nyid las byung 'gyur/ /mkhris shas che las rtse mo ni/ /sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang/ /'phra zhing dri
123a4(mdo 'grel): mnam khrag sla 'dzag/ srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin/ /mchar pa'i dum bu ni tso lce/ /srin pu pad+ma'i mchu 'drar snang/ /tsha zhing gnags la rims dang rdul/ /skam dang yig 'chus rmongs bskyed/ /bshad dro sla zhing sbo la
123a5(mdo 'grel): tsha/ /ser zhing dmar bar 'khru bar 'gyur/ /nas rul nang 'dra pags pa dang/ /sen sogs sngo ser ljang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan shas che rtsa ba sbom/ /mthug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar/ /skrang zhing rgyas bsnum ?/ /bgreng zhing snum la lci
123a6(mdo 'grel): zhing brtan/ /'byar bag tshor ba chung zhing 'jam/ /g.ya' zhing reg na dga' bar byed/ /ka ri ra pa na sa yi/ /rus pa pa yi nu sor 'dra/ /chu sor zug cing sbom gzhang na/ /lte ba lang pa bcang snam sems/ /lung pa dbugs mi
123a7(mdo 'grel): bde snying na/ /mchil ma cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /gcig sri 'go bo tshor ba med/ /grang ba'i rims ni skyed par byed/ /khu chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams/ /slan zhing ma zhu'i nang kun bskyed/ /bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang//
123b1(mdo 'grel): 'khru dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dzag par mi byed rdo la mi byed/ /bags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar/ /'dres las mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin/ /'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /khrag shas che las gzhang 'brum ni/ /mkhris
123b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la/ /n+ya gro da yi myu gu 'dras byu ru 'o la ma se mdog 'dra/ /shin tu cha bro na ba dang/ /bshad ba shugs kyis rab btsir las/ /'bral du khrag ni 'byung ba dang/ /de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur/ /sbal pa 'dra zhing
123b3(mdo 'grel): khrag zad las/ /byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen gyur/ /mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang/ /mdangs 'phrog dbang po zhan par 'gyur/ /mungka ko dri ba'i phye ma/ /tsu na ka ri ra sogs pa/ /rtsub dang bshad pa sri bas rlung/ /rang gnas
123b4(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa stobs ldan pas/ /thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga ni/ /bkag ste smad du rab bskams nas/ /bshad pa gci ba 'phyen rnams ni/ /'gags pas nang ni mi bzang bskyed/ /de yis khong ba rgyab rtsib logs/ /snying gar nad ni shin tu
123b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /lto spos gsus pa na ba dang/ /snying cu rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/ /chu sor shin tu zug pa dang/ /'khur pa skrangs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung ni gyen la song gyur na/ /da las slon rims yi ga 'chus/ /snying nang ba'u snabs ma zhu dang//
123b6(mdo 'grel): gcin sri bshad ba 'khru ba dang/ /'or dang rab rib dbugs mi bde/ /mgon lung pa chams pa 'debs/ /yid kyis 'gyur ba skam dang khrag /khris pa skan dang rma rdzing sogs/ /rlung gi nang rtags de dang de/ /shin tu mi bzang 'byung bar
123b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gzhang 'brum gyen du 'khyil gyur pa/ /'di ni mchog tu gnod byed yin/ /rlung shas che ba'i khong par ni/ /de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes dang nang gsum ldan/ /phugs ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa/ /da dag gsar
124a1(mdo 'grel): mi rung ba yin/ /me drong stobs che sogs kyis 'tsho/ /'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni/ /bar mer gnas pa gang yin ba/ /lo gcig yin ched lon gyur pas/ /de dag gso dka' yin par bshad/ /phyi rol
124a2(mdo 'grel): gnyer mar byung ba dang/ /nang gcig shas che las byung ngang/ /skyes nas ring po ma lon gang/ /gzhang 'brum de ni gso ba sla/ /pho mtshan sogs kyi 'og nas ni/ /rang rang bskabs bshad lte bar skyes/ /rta bla ba yi kha 'dra zhing//
124a3(mdo 'grel): 'byar bag can la 'jam pa yin/ /pags pa'i mner? pa sems pa ni/ /khyab byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus/ /phags pa'i phyir la thor bur byed/ /'dzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par gnas/ /pags pa'i 'jer pa yin par shes/ /rlung gis
124a4(mdo 'grel): zug cing rtsub bar 'gyur/ /mkhris pas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis de snum nyid dang/ /rmen bu mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni/ /'bar de gzhang 'brum gso bar byed/ /de yis
124a5(mdo 'grel): gzhang ni myur 'gags nas/ /dmu rdzing? na pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas tshad par 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nang gzhi bshad par

124a7(mdo 'grel): zin/ /gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang/ /'bru dang shugs ni bkag las byung/ /de 'dras chung ni 'khrugs pa yis/ /chu khams thur du bskyod gyur la/ /de nyid kyis ni me drong nyams/ /de rog khong ba khyab nas ni/ /bshad ba sla
124b1(mdo 'grel): ba nyer du byed/ /de ltar tshad 'khru 'byung bar bshad/ /de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma ni/ /bshad lam snying ga lte bar zug/ /lus snyom bshad bsri ba dang/ /sbo zhing kha zas ma 'ju pa'o/ /de las rlung 'gyur bshad chung bcas/ /nyung ?
124b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing gzer sgra bcas/ /'gegs cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ /rtsub pa dbu bar bcas pa'am/ /gong bu yang dang yang du 'byung/ /de bzhin bu ra ma tshig ba dang/ /sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems/ /kha mnyams gzhang ni/

124b4(mdo 'grel): gzer byas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas/ /gzhan bar thor bu 'byung ba yin/ /bad kan las gyur bskab dang/ /'byar pa gang dkar zhing nal nal bo/ /snum zhing be'u snabs bad kan bcas/ /rgyun tu 'khru zhing lci la mnam/ /bska zhing nang rjes
124b5(mdo 'grel): 'brang ba dang/ /gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus/ /nyung zad nyer zad 'khru dang bcas/ /ba spu rtse zhen klong bcas dang/ /chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci/ /bshad sa kyang bshad ba ma btang snyam/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /'jigs pas

124b7(mdo 'grel): bcas ngang ma zhu med/ /khrag bcos khrag med de dang ni/ /dang po bshad gci chur 'bying 'gyur?/ /dri ma nam lto ni sbo ba dang/ /bkhreg cing mchi la snabs shin tu myang/ /smin pa de las bzlog pa yin/ /bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'byin/ /gang
125a1(mdo 'grel): zhig tshad 'khru 'bad ba ni/ /med des pho ba'i nang du 'gyur/ /mi drong nyams par byed pa yi/ /zhes brten pa yis me drod nyams/ /gang zhig zhu nas bshad ba ni/ /be snabs gnas dang be snabs med/ /'khru ba de ni
125a2(mdo 'grel): tshad 'khru ste/ /rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed/ /ma zhu khams ma zhu dang/ zhu ba smin ba'ang mi 'khra 'gyur/ /rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba 'ang/ /rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung/ /pho bar ma zhu sogs shing 'khru/ /yun rnga na bar
125a3(mdo 'grel): byed pa yin/ /de ni nad sna re re 'dus/ /las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de yi sngon tshul sdom? ba dang/ /ring nas 'dzu zhing skyur bag 'byung/ /mchil ma kha yis ro mi tshor/ /rmya snyam skom zhing yig 'chus/ /lto ? slon ni bro ba dang/ /rna ba rgu ma sgra
125a4(mdo 'grel): dang bcas/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang/ /du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs/ /brgyal zhing mgon bshad ba 'gag rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur/ /de la rlung la rkan bskams shing/ /rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang/ /rtsib logs brla
125a5(mdo 'grel): dang chu sor na/ /yang yang sgo zhing gsung pa dang/ /ro rnams kun la skam pa dang/ /bsres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/ /bras zhu nas ni sba ba dang/ /zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi snying nang skran gzhan 'brum/ /mcher pa skya rbab 'byung
125a6(mdo 'grel): par dogs/ /bshad ba 'byung dka' bska slar 'byung/ /de yang be snams sgra can 'byung/ /bshad ba yang dang yang du 'byung/ gzhad na lung ba dbugs mi bde/ /mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang/ /ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur/ /man ma
125a7(mdo 'grel): zhing sgreg skyur snying lkog tshe/ /yi ga 'chus shing skom dang che/ /bad kan las gyur ? dka' zhing/ /zas klon yi ga 'chus ba dang/ /khar chags mchil ma mang ba dang/ /lung ba snying nas cham pas 'debs/ /snying ga mer mer por sems
125b1(mdo 'grel): gir? lto ba tshor ba chud zhing lce/ /sgregs pa dri ma nam mngar 'byung snyom/ /bud med la dga' me drod chung/ /be snabs bad kan 'dres par 'khru/ /bshad pa gci ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ring pa min yang nyams stobs chung/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid 'dren
125b2(mdo 'grel): mar ldan/ /ma snyams la sogs me drong gsum/ /yan lag char cha gang bshad ba/ /de yong pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/ /snyoms pa bde gnas rgyu yin na/ /rlung nang rde'u dang mdze nad dang/ /gcin snying mu dzing mtshan par rdol/ /gzhang 'brum pho nang
125b3(mdo 'grel): ces bya brgyad/ /nang chen gso bar dka' ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o/ /bde nas gcin 'gags pa'i nang gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /lgang ba lgang pa'i mgo po mtshan//
125b4(mdo 'grel): rked pa rlig pa gzhag ni/ /gzhang kha'i rus par brtan gyur zhing/ /gcig tu 'brel ba yin bar bshad/ /lgang ba kha ni thur bltas kyang/ /gcin 'dzag pa yi rtsa sga nas/ /rgyun mi 'chad bar 'dzag pa yis/ /ngos gnyis las ni phre 'us 'gengs//
125b5(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa gang yin de yis ni/ /gcig 'gags pa dang gcin snyi ba'i/ /gso dka' gnas la brten pa'i nang/ /nyi shu skyed par byed pa yin/ /lbang? pa chu so pho mtshan na/ /cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung/ /sri pa rlung las gyur pa yin/ /mkhris pa
125b6(mdo 'grel): las gyur ser rtse na/ /mdog dmar bad kan las gyur pa/ /lgang pa pho mtshon lci zhing skrangs/ /'byer ba ga ngal gyis 'byung zhing thogs/ /nad kun las byung mtshan kun ldan/ /gang che rlung gis lgang pa'i kha/ /bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa/ /bang
125b7(mdo 'grel): kan khu tshur bcas pa ni/ /rim gyis bskams par byas pa las/ /mi bzang rde'u chags 'gyur te/ /ba lang mkhris bar gi khri ltar/ /thams cad bad kan la brtan 'byung/ /'di yi sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni/ /lgang pa spo zhing de yin ni/ /nye 'khor 
126a1(mdo 'grel): kun tu rab tu na/ /gcin yang lhag bar dbye bro zhing/ /gcin 'gags rims 'debs yig 'chus/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid lte ba dang/ /lgang mgo lgang ba'i srubs na zhing/ /de yis gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas/ /gcin gyi sgo ni
126a2(mdo 'grel): 'chad cing 'byung/ /de byung zin nas bde bar byed/ /sla zhing ba lang tshil 'dra la/ /de bskyod pa yis khrag tu 'gyur/ /drag shul spyod bas rab tu na/ /de la rlung 'gyur shin tu na/ /so 'thams sdoms shing lus 'dar la/ /pho mtshon nyid cing lte ba
126a3(mdo 'grel): 'tshir/ /rgyan tu na zhing 'khun par byed/ /bshad ba 'phyen dang bcas par 'byung/ /gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang yod/ /rde'u gan gcing rtsub pa dang/ /chu sor tsher mas gang snyam byed/ /mkhris pa lgang ba tsha ba dang/ /btsos pa snyam byed rab tu dro//
126a4(mdo 'grel): go bye'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra la/ /rde'u mdog dmar ser la gnag/ bad kan gyis bsil lci ba dang/ /lgang ba'i nang du zug cing na/ /rje'u che zhing 'jam pa la/ /sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na dkar/ /'di dag byis pa rnams la ni/ /phal cher 'byung
126a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gnas dang sha ni chung ba'i phyir/ /gzung dang 'byung ba bde ba yin/ /mi chen khu ba las byung rde'u/ /khu ba bkag las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnas las 'phos pa phyir ma byung/ /rlig par gnas ba rlung gis ni/ /bskams nas
126a6(mdo 'grel): nye bar bsdus gyur pa/ /de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin/ /lgang par gcin ni sri byed cing/ /che zhing skrangs par byed ba yin/ /de ni skyes ma thag tu ni/ /khu ba zhu ste sla bar 'gyur/ /phyogs dor mnan na zhu bar byed/ /rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas/ /rlung
126a7(mdo 'grel): gis phye mer bshig gyur pa/ /de 'dir tshul bzhin 'byung zhes bya/ /gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung 'gyur/ /lugs bzhin mi 'byung rde'u chags/ /gcin ni bkag par byas gyur bas/ /rlung gis sgang pa'i kha bkag nas/ /gcin 'gags
126b1(mdo 'grel): na zhang g.ya' bar 'gyur/ /lan 'ga' rang gnas las spags nas/ /lgang pa rgyas te kha bye zhing/ /mngal 'dra sbom zhing log par 'dug/ der ni na zhing tsha bar byed/ /'phar zhing bcus ba snyam du sems/ /thigs pa tsam du 'dzag pa dang/ /lgang bcing
126b2(mdo 'grel): rgyun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa gnyis po 'di dag ni/ /rlung gis lgang ba'i nad ces bya/ /gas dka' gnyis pa rlung gi yin/ /mthu chen shin tu gso dka' yin/ /bshad lam dang ni lgang pa yi/ /bar na rlung ni brten gyur pa/ /gtun 'dra sra? zhing
126b3(mdo 'grel): mtho ba dang/ /mi 'gyur gnas byed mdung pa can/ /rlung nad gtun 'dra de spos bcas/ /bshad gci 'phyan ni 'gags byed yin/ /log rgyu 'khyil par gyur pa yi/ /rlung gis chu sor mi bzad gzir/ /gcin las zhugs te 'khyil byed
126b4(mdo 'grel): cing ? rengs byed lci zhing gcus snyam byed/ /gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas 'byung/ /yang na bshad gtso gtong tshe 'byung/ /'di ni rlung nas 'khyil ba yin/ /gcin ni yun rings bkag gyur pa/ /sri zhing 'byung bar ma 'gyur la/ /gcin thon
126b5(mdo 'grel): nas ni nad tshabs 'bri/ /gcin bkag pa yis gnod gyur pa/ /gang che rlung gis bzlog gyur ba/ /lte ba'i 'ag? nas lte ba'i bar/ /gcin gyis gang 'gyur de yi tshe/ /rab tu ni zhing? spo ba dang/ /zas mi 'ju zhing dri ma 'gags/ /de ni ltor gcin
126b6(mdo 'grel): 'gags shes bya/ /gcin byung bu ga 'chus ba 'am/ /rlung gis 'gags nas gcir nyung? 'byung/ /lgang pa mtshan sbubs nor bu ni/ /gnas nas de 'og rim gyis 'dzag/ nas bcas pa 'am nad med pa/ /gcin ni chad dang bcas bar 'byung
126b7(mdo 'grel): lhag ma lus te mtshan lci yin/ /pho mtshan na zhing khong lce ba'o/ /lgang pa'i kha na zlum zhing sra/ /cung zhag 'bral du 'byung 'gyur na/ /gcin sogs rde'u lta bur na/ /gcin gyi mdud par de bshad do/ /gcin snyoms pa las nyal ?
127a1(mdo 'grel): byas/ /rlung giS khung bskyod gyur ba/ /gnas las bskyod ba gcin gtong tshe/ /sngon nam phyi nang tha zla chu dang/ /mdog 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khu ba 'dres par de bshad ngo/ /rtsub cibg skems la rlung gis ni/
127a2(mdo 'grel): gang tshe rtug skam nang gyur ba/ gcin 'byung bu ? song nas ni/ /bshad ba dang 'dres de yi tsho/ /bcin ni bshad pa'i dri can 'byung/ /bshad ba 'gags pas der bshad do/ /mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni/ /rdo tsha nyi tshan la sogs kyis//
127a3(mdo 'grel): 'phel zhing rlu ba ni zhugs gyur ba/ /lgang ba'i nye 'khor tsha zhing na/ /gcin ni ser por 'byung 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na khug bcas khrag nyid 'byung/ /tsha zhing sri la yang yang 'byung/ /de ni tsha rlung zhes byar bshad/ /rtsub cing lus
127a4(mdo 'grel): ni rmya ba yi/ /lgang bar gnas pa'i mkhris pa rlung/ /gcin zad tsha dang na bar bcas/ /bskyed ba de yang de skad bshad/ /bad kan mkhris pa gnyig la/ /rlung gis bskyod par gyur na ni/ /de tshe gcin sri ser ba dang/ /dmar zhing dmar la bska
127a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung/ /de ni tsha bcas gi wang dam/ /dung gi phye ma'i mdog 'dra ba 'am/ /yang na skam zhing mdog kun ldan/ /de ni gcin nyams nang du bshad/ /de ltar gcin 'gags ba las byung ba yi/ /mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni//
127a6(mdo 'grel): de 'og? gcin snyi las byung ba'i/ /nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus ba las/ /nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu ba'o// //de nas gcin snyi ba za gu'i nang dmigs bshad par
127a7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shu ste/ /de la bad kan las gyur bcu/ mkhris pa la drug rlung gyur bzhi/ /de rnams chal gcin bad kan bskyed/ /zas dang sgom gyi tshul las ni/ /phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed/ /mdang dang skyur dang
127b1(mdo 'grel): lan na dang/ /lci zhing 'khyil ba bsil ba dang/ /'bru mar chad dang gsher ba'i sha/ /dngar ba bu ram bu ram shing/ /gnas gcig stan gcig la rtag gnas/ /mal stan chog gar mi ldan la/ /brten nas gcin snye'i nad skyed byed/ /bad
127b2(mdo 'grel): kan 'khrugs las lgang ba'i gcin/ /snyi 'gyur lus gsher rdul chil dang/ /sha klong lgang bar brten gcin snyi/ /mkhris pas khrag kyang zad byas nas/ /bad kan sogs zar gcin gnas bskyed/ /rlung 'khrugs pa rang de zad las//
127b3(mdo 'grel): lus zungs lgang bar 'khrus de bskyed/ /de byung bso bya 'tsho tsam dang/ /spang bya gcan nang rnam gsum 'gyur/ /mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang/ /nang dmigs chen po nyid kyis 'byung/ /de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid dang/ /gcin rnyog can
127b4(mdo 'grel): mang du 'byung/ /gnang dang gnod bya khyad med kyang/ /de 'dus khyad par nyid dang ni/ /gcin gyis mdog sogs dbye ba yis /gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag bar bya/ /dang zhing mang la dkar zhing bsil/ /drid med cing chu 'dra la/ /gcan snyi
127b5(mdo 'grel): chu yi za khu yin/ /cung zad snyog can spyi bag can/ /bu ram shing khu lta bur mngar/ /za khu bu ram shing khu yin/ /zhag lon na ni bska bar 'gyur/ /za khu gar po zhes bya'o/ /steng nas dangs ma 'og nas bska/ /chang 'dra chang gi za khu
127b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /bla bu ldang zhang 'bras rtags 'dra/ /dkar zhing mang 'byung 'bras bye dang/ /khu chu 'dra pa'a mkhu ba 'dres/ /khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin/ /gcin ni bye brtsigs de ma can/ /bya ma'i ? zhes bya'o/ /gcin snyi mang du
127b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing bsil/ /mngar ba de bsil za khu yin/ /ngal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung/ /bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu yin/ /khu chu 'dra ba'i nal nal bo/ /'byil bag kha chu'i za khu yin/ /dri ro kha dog rig bya ni/ /nas
128a1(mdo 'grel): tshig 'khrus 'dra nas tshig can/ /za khu sngon po kha dog sngon/ /za khu nag po gnag tsha 'dra/ /gcin snyi tsha zhing mdog ser ba/ /de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin/ /mnam zhing btsong kyi khu ba 'dra/ /bcod kyi za ces
128a2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /dri nga tsha zhing lan tshwar bcas/ /khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin/ /zhag gzi khu zhag dang 'dras/ /zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin/ /rkang 'dres pa'i rkang nyid ni/ /yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu/ /glang chen myos ltar gyun tu
128a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gcin shuD dal bar 'byung 'gyur la/ /chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung/ /glang che za bu zhes bya'o/ /sbran rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /lus zungs zad bas rlung 'khrugs pa'am/ /nad kyis rtsa sbubs bkag ste
128a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /zad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing/ /skad cig zad stongs gang 'gyur ba/ /gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad kyi dus sum ma bcas na/ /sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'gyur/ /gang
128a5(mdo 'grel): zhig thams cad mngar gyur pas/ /phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin/ /sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun/ /mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin/ /zas mi 'ju zhing yig 'chus/ /slen lung gnyid che cham pas 'debs/ /bad kan las byung za
128a6(mdo 'grel): khu la/ /bla gnyan de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /pho mtshan lgang bar zug pa dang/ /rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /tsha skyur skom dang brgyal dang 'khru/ /mkhris pa las gyur bla gnyan yin/ /rlung las skyes pa'i rlung 'phar zhing
128a7(mdo 'grel): lus 'dar snying na zas la brkan/ /gzer zhing gnyid med skam pa dang/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung/ /kham phor rus sbal 'dra ba can/ /dgu'o me dpal phra mo dang/ /bran chung 'dra dang yungs dkar 'dra/ /bu bcas 'byung
128b1(mdo 'grel): dang bi tsa ri/ /khong 'bras zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu/ /gcen nad ma bcos pa las 'byung/ /tshigs dang gnad dang ngag che ba'i/ /sog gi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mdza' ma mgo zhing dbus dma' ba/ /gnag cing rdag dang nad bcas la/ /dbyib pa dang tshad ni
128b2(mdo 'grel): kham khor 'dra/ /thor bu kham phor zhes bya'o/ /nang du zug cing na byed la/ /nye 'khor dag tu cher mchad la/ /'jam zhing rus sbal rgyab 'dra ba'i/ /'bras nang rus byal can zhes bya/ /sra zhing rtsa yi dra ba can/ /snum zhing 'jajg la khyon che pa/ /na zhing mang zub
128b3(mdo 'grel): bu ga ni/ /phra mor ldan pa dra ba can/ /nang du zug cing na la mnags/ /rgyab baM lto ba dag tu ni/ /thor bu chen po kha dog gnag/ dgu bor 'dug pas dgu bor bshad/ /skyes ma thag tu bags pa cha/ /shin tu na byed me dpal te/ /dmar zhing gnag la gas pa
128b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /cha zhing rlmugs byed med pa la 'dra/ /sran chung 'dra ba'i tshang dang dbyibs/ /mnyam pas sran chung can yin no/ /char dang 'byibs ni yungs kar 'dra/ /myur du smin zhing nang chabs che/ /yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis/ /yongs su bskor bas shur bu
128b5(mdo 'grel): can/ /bu bcas cha zhing mang ba la/ /rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab 'gyur ba'o/ /ldum? bu bi da ri ltar ldum/ /sra ba bi da ri zhes bya/ /khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin/ /de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum/ /bu bcas dang ni bi da ri/ /chil chen las
128b6(mdo 'grel): byung mnags dka' yin/ /gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing/ /tshil chu las byung ma nags nus 'gyur/ /de rnams nad shes ji ltar tshil/ /gcin snyi ba yi dbang la 'byung/ /'di dag za khu mong par ni/ /gnod 'gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur
128b7(mdo 'grel): te/ /ji srid dngos bor mi snang ga/ de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /kha dog ljang ba 'am dmar ba'i gcin/ /za khu'i sngon chul med pa yi/ /gcin 'byung gang de za khu min/ /de ni khrag mkhris iyn zhes bya/ /lus rdul yan lag manm zhing
129a1(mdo 'grel): stong pa dang/ /stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags/ /snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed/ /lus sbom skra dang sen me ring ba dang/ /bsil bag la dga' gre ba rkan bskams shing/ /kha nang ro mang rkang thil lag
129a2(mdo 'grel): mthil cha/ /gang du btsas par grog mang 'du 'gyur ba/ /gcin zad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung chul/ /za khu sbrang rtsi mdag 'dra 'byil ba dang/ /sbrang rtsir 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog /lus brtas bad kan can gyi? khu 'am/ /nyes pa zad pas rlung
129a3(mdo 'grel): gi bdag can yin/ /sngon tshul bcas ba'i bad mkhris zag khu dang/ /gang yang rims kyis rlung nang za khur 'gyur/ /mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso ba dga' / /gal te tshil nad shas chung 'gyur gso sla/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
129a4(mdo 'grel): po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs dang sgran gyi nad gzhi bshad bar bya'o/ /kha zas khong du rab tsha dang/ /rtsub dang skam dang cha 'gyur thos/ /nyal ba'i spyod pa mi
129a5(mdo 'grel): bde ba/ /khrag nad skye 'gyur de dang nges/ /pags pa sha tshil rus ba dang/ /khrag dang chu ba chu ba che/ /phyi dang nang du skrangs 'gyur ba/ /rtsa ba chi zhing nad chabs che/ /zlum pa'am 'jod bar gnas pa gang/ /khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug
129a6(mdo 'grel): nad dmigs rna re 'dus pa dang/ /khrag dang rmas pa las byung ba'o/ /'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der/ /rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho/ /nang gi shin tu mi zad cing/ /rting rib skra ltar sra ba yin/ /khrag mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang sha/ me dang ma sna
129a7(mdo 'grel): ltar myur gsod byed/ /lte ba chu so mcher mchin pa/ glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang/ /mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhad duAng 'byung/ /de las rlung gyur nang cha bas drag/ dmar nag ring zhig len nas ni/ /'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms//
129b1(mdo 'grel): rang zhing mgo 'khor sba ba dang/ /g.yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas/ /mkhris 'gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag/ sgom dang tsha rim rmongs bag bskyed/ /ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin/ /bad kan las skya g.ya' dang bcas/ /slon zhing bsil la su ba dang/ /glal
129b2(mdo 'grel): zhing lci la yi ga 'chus/ /'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs/ /'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin/ /'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mchan nyid/ /don gyi dbang las shes par bya/ /'brum du na/ /bos? khabs shing gnag/ rab tsha na zhing rims kyas 'debs//
129b3(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi ma nang/ /khrag 'gyur bud med nyid la 'byung/ /mtshon la sogs pas rmas pa yis/ /rma 'byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las/ /rma kha tsha ba rlung gis phul/ /khrag bcas na khris pa 'byung bar byed/ /khor 'bras bla gnyan nad mar zhing
129b4(mdo 'grel): khrag mkhris mchan nyid can dag byed/ /bla gnyan de yi dbye ba yang/ /gnas kyi dbye ba las bshad do/ /lto bar byung na skyigs bu ste/ /chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur/ /mcher ba dbugs mi bde mchin par/ /dbugs 'byung 'gag skom mgo 'khor
129b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /glo ba byung na lkog nad 'gyur/ /snying 'byung yan lag kun gzir snyam/ /ram rmongs mun? ? snyam du byed/ /snyang 'phar na bar gyur pa yin/ /lto ba rtsib logs phrag pa'i bar/ /na zhing lto sbos 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu so 'doms par byung
129b6(mdo 'grel): brlan/ /mkhal mar byung na rkang pa rgyab/ /rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur/ /gzhang du rlung ni thur 'byung 'gag/ zhu dang ma zhu phyar zhu nyid/ /de dag ? nad lta bur bshad/ /lre ba yan chad snying gar 'jig/ lte ba man ching? gzhad du 'jug/ lte ba ?
129b7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa gnyis gar 'jig/ khong 'bras kyi ni nad dmigs rnams/ /'jog las rma ltar shas par bya/ /de las 'dus pa las gyur ba dang/ /snying dang lta ba chu sar nang/ /phye 'am nad ? byed pa'am/ /smin te kha nas 'jag pa ni/ /nyam chung
130a1(mdo 'grel): bla gnyan lden pa sbang/ /de bzhin bud med bu btsas ba'am/ /sbrum ma 'am nu zho yod pa dang/ /nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi/ /rtsa sgo kha cher phyin gyur nas/ /phyi yi kheng 'bras mtshan nyid can/ /skrangs shing srab 'byung
130a2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ phu? mo rnams kyi nu rtsa'i sngo/ /phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung ni rgyu lam 'gaD bas 'khrugs/ /skrangs dang gzer ni bskyed cing rgyu/ /chu bo rlig bar phyin ba dang/ /rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni/ /btsir nas rlig pa pags pa dag/ 'phel zhing
130a3(mdo 'grel): rlig rlugs nyid du byed/ /nang khrab gcin tshil rgyu ma las/ /rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur/ /rgyu ma gcin skyes ba 'ang rlung/ /rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan/ /rlung 'gyur rkyal ba gang 'dra zhing/ /rag na rtsub cing rgyu med na/ /mkhris
130a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur u dum pa ra yi/ /'bras bu smin 'dra cha dro 'drul/ /bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum/ /g.ya' zhing sral nang chabs chung/ /khrag gyur gnag cing 'brum bus khyab/ /mkhris ba'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan/ /tshil 'gyur rlig rlugS
130a5(mdo 'grel): bad kan 'dra/ /'jam zhing ta la'i 'bras bur mtshungs/ /gcig ma nags pa la brtan pa'i rnams/ /gcin las 'byung bar de 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba chung yis gang ba ltar/ /g.ya 'gyur na dang bcas shing 'jam/ /gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi//
130a6(mdo 'grel): log tu skrangs bar byed bar 'gyur/ /rlung 'khrugs ba yis zas dang ni/ /chu grang las ni rgyal ba dang/ /shugs bkag bcir dang khu dang lam/ /yan lag khrog bar 'chus pa dang/ /rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang/ /gang tshe rgyum phra ma'i
130a7(mdo 'grel): cha/ /rlung gis lag par phul gyur te/ /rlung gis lags nas thur du bskyod/ /chu ? tshigs su phyin pa dang/ /de tsho mdud pa ltar hab kyis /yal bar gor na rlig pa cher skya zhing/ /sbo zhing na la rangs par rlung gis byed/ /rab tu gzir
130b1(mdo 'grel): zhing nang na sgra dang bcas/ /gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung ste/ /rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste/ /rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin/ /rtsub cing gnag la dmar ba'i rtsas/ /phra mo dra bas khebs pa yin/ /skan brgyad nad ni so sor
130b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'dres dang 'dus ba las gyur dang/ /zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis/ /brgyar pa bud med rnams la 'byung/ /rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru sogs/ /? sman sogs dang las rnams kyis/ /skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang/ /bkres
130b3(mdo 'grel): te chu grong 'thungs gyur pa'am/ /skom 'thungs rjas la gang zhig ni/ /rkyal dang mchod pa la sogs pa/ /brten pas lus ni dkrugs byas drang/ /slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang/ /rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba yi/ /shugs bkag pa 'am btsir
130b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ snum rang dugs ni ma bsten par/ /sbyang ba'i las ni byed pa 'am/ /sbyangs bzhin myur du cha ba dang/ /bad kan bskyed pa'i/ /ba sgom spyod/ /rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni/ /so so 'am 'dres pa 'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am/ /kun nas
130b5(mdo 'grel): khrag dang bcas bgyur pas/ /sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas/ /steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su/ /gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung/ /shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs/ /skran+ni bskyed bar 'gyur ba yin/ /skem pas bad kan
130b6(mdo 'grel): mkhris bshad ba'i/ /rgyun srang 'gags bar 'gyur ba yis/ /rlung ni khang bar gnas bcas la/ /rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin/ /rang gnas ldang 'gyur rang dbang can/ /gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can/ /god? par gyur
130b7(mdo 'grel): pas gzugs med kyang/ /gzugs can ltan gnas skran zhes bya/ /chu so lte ba snying ga dang/ /rtsig legs la ni gnas pa yin/ /rlung las mtshan pa klad par gzer/ /rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug bshad ? khab kyis
131a1(mdo 'grel): btsags snyam na/ /dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin/ /lus rengs kha ni bskams pa dang/ /skem zhing me drod mi snyoms la/ /pags sogs gan gcing rtsub pa dang/ /rlung skran g.yo ba'i yin ba'i
131a2(mdo 'grel): phyin/ /dbyings ni rtag par mi mngon zhing/ /gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang/ /grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni/ /skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin/ /mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs sgyur brgyal/ /'khru zhing lus rdul skoms rims 'debs//
131a3(mdo 'grel): pags pa la sogs ser por snang/ /skran ni reg par mi bzod dang/ /tsha zhing 'phar la dro ba dang/ /rang gi gnas ni sreg snyam byed/ /bad kan slong bag mig 'chus/ /me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs/ /chem pa khong snyam dang ga lci/ /lud
131a4(mdo 'grel): pa lu zhing pags sogs dkar/ /skran phugs ring zhing sra ba dang/ /lci zhing rang gnas brtan nang chung/ /phal cher rang gnas 'dug pa dang/ /rang gi dus su nad skyed byed/ /gnyis las byung ba'i skran gsum po/ /mtshan nyid 'dren par ldan
131a5(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /kun skyes mi bzang na zhing tsha/ /rgyur min sra mtho de gso dka' / /khrag gi skran ni gang yin pa/ /de ni bud med nyid las 'byung/ /zla mchan dus sam bu gsar btsas/ /yang na mngal gyi nang can gyi/ /bud med rlung bskyed brten
131a6(mdo 'grel): gyur bas/ /rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur ba las/ /zla re 'byung bar byed pa yi/ /zla mtshan mngal du bkag pa ni/ /de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing/ /mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de/ /snying 'phar nu 'dzag yid mi bde/ /skems pa la soD
131a7(mdo 'grel): tshul du snang/ /de ni rims kyis rlung 'dres 'ang/ /mkhris pa nad ni rgyu yis na/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i/ /skran ni khrag de skyed byed yin/ /na zhing swa la cha zhing 'khru skam dang ? soD bar zla gnyan 'byung/ /nang kyi khrag la brtan pas//
131b1(mdo 'grel): med la gnas dag ? lhag par gzer/ mngal nas drig? 'dzad pa dang/ /na zhing 'phar la zug par byed/ /mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med/ /'o na kyang skran ni 'gul gzer ldan/ /de nyid der ni gong bor gnas/ /lan 'ga' 'gyur bar byed pa yin/ /'di ni ltor 'phel
131b2(mdo 'grel): mi byed kyi/ /skran ni 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /rang gi nang gzhi la brten pas/ /des der skran nang thams cad bskyed/ /yun ring nas ni smin 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na ma smin khong 'bras kyang/ /nang khrag la ni brten pa'i phyir/ /shin tu myur bar smin par byed
131b3(mdo 'grel): de phyir myur du tsha 'gyur bas/ /khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/ /nang nas skran ni chu so dang/ /lto ba mtshan pa snying na zhing/ /me drod mdog nyams nyams stobs 'bri/ /shugs ni 'gags par 'gyur ba yin/ /phyi rol de las bzlog pa ste/ /khong pa'i yan
131b4(mdo 'grel): lag na tshabs chung/ /phyogs de mdog ni nyams pa dang/ /phyi rol tu ni mtho zhing 'phags/ /lto spo ltag par mi bzang na/ /rgyu ma sgra bcas mi bzad na/ /lto sbos lto ba na ba dang/ /rlung gi nang kyis steng 'og bkag/ de ni nyen gyi zhes byar bshad/ /sra zhing
131b5(mdo 'grel): gtun 'dra mdud pa can/ /gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas/ /han gyi mtshan ldan gtun pu ni/ /'phreng gnas de dang chu la 'dra yin/ /zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang po mtshan/ /rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu/ /thur du zug pa yin par bshad/ /de las bzlog pa gyen du
131b6(mdo 'grel): zug pa'o/ /sgregs pa mang zhing bshad ba 'gags pa dang/ /'drangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas/ /sbo zhing nye na langs kha zas 'ju mi nus/ /skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i
131b7(mdo 'grel): gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /nad kun me drod nyams las skye/ /lhag par dmu rdzing nang skye zhing/ /ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas/ /dri ma sogs skye bar 'gyur/ /nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa
132a1(mdo 'grel): steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni/ /srog dang thung ser la gnod de/ /pags ba'i sha yi bar gnas nas/ /lto ba bkar ste dmu rdzing bskyed/ /de yang rnams pa brgyad 'gyur te/ /nang gzhi tha dang 'dus mchin pa/ /dri ma
132a2(mdo 'grel): 'gags dang rgyu rtol ba/ /des gzir rkan dang mchu bskams shing/ /rkang ba lag pa gsum ba skrad/ /spyod ba kha zas nyams bstobs 'bri/ /skems zhing gsus pa cher skyes la/ /mi ni yi dags gzugs can 'gyur/ /de ni 'byung 'gyur
132a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma dag/ bkres ba med cing zas kun ni/ /ring nas tsha zhing sgyur bcas 'ju/ /'ju dang ma'i 'ju mi shes la/ /'drangs par za yang mi nus shing/ /stobs ni rtag tu zad bar 'gyur/ /cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde/ /bshad
132a4(mdo 'grel): pa 'phel zhing 'gag par byed/ /rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang/ /chu sor na zhing zas yang pa/ /cung zad zos kyang gsus ba rgyas/ /rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig/ dmu rjid nad ni thams cad la/ /snyom zhing nyams chung 'gyur ba dang/
132a5(mdo 'grel): dri ma sri zhing ma drod chung/ /tsha zhing skrangs la gsus pa sbo/ /mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad chu med par du smug /skrangs med yur? ltar lci ba yin/ /rtsa 'dra'i skar khur ris kyis khebs/ /rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer/ rlung
132a6(mdo 'grel): gi lte ba rgyu mar zug/ shugs skyes na ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /snying ga lte ba rkang pa dang/ /gzhad dang tshu sor na bar byed/ /rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu/ /gshad ba 'gag cing gci ba nyung/ /ma drod chu min skam pa min/ /khar ni ro bra med pa
132a7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni/ /rkang lag rlig pa lro ba skrad/ /lto ba rtsib logs rkeng rgyab na/ /tshigs rnams dbye ba snyam du sems/ /lud pa bskams shing yan lag snyoms/ /ro smrang lci zhing bshad gci 'gag/ pags pa
132b1(mdo 'grel): la sos gnag la smug/ glo bur tu ni 'phel zhing 'bri/ /gsus pa zug zhing na ba dang/ /rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas/ /brdabs na rgyal ba dbugs kyis ni/ /gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ni/ /'dir rlung nad dang sgar bcas par/ /thams cad du
132b2(mdo 'grel): ni rgyu bar byed/ /mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs brgyal/ /lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha/ /mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs/ /sar zhing gsus ba'i mdog rtsa sngo/ /rtsa na dmar ser dag gis khyab/ /rdul dang tsha bar bsreg pas bsreg/
132b3(mdo 'grel): dang 'byung rag na 'jam pa dang/ /myur du smin zhing nyer gdung 'gyur/ /bad kan dmu rdzing lto tshigs na/ /tshor ba med cing skrangs la lci/ /gnyid che slon zhing yig 'chu se/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde pags sogs/ /skye zhing lto ba mkhrang la
132b4(mdo 'grel): snum/ /rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che/ /ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang/ /rig na grang zhing gsus pa lci/ /nad gsum 'khrugs ba de dang de/ /bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul/ /dbyi ba dug dug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur/ /khrag bcas gri ma gsags
132b5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /ltor song gnod pa skyed byed te/ /kha skam mgo 'khor ba rgyal bcas pa'i/ /rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing bskyed/ /myur du smin zhing mi bzad na/ /de ni grang dang rlung dang char/ /phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur/ /mang du gros bas bsgyod
132b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /bzhon pa dag tu 'gro ba dang/ /las lam nyal bo drogs pas dub/ /s?gs drags dang nad kyis skem/ /g.yon legs dag tu gnas pa'i mcher ba ni/ /gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang/ /yang na dang sam sogs bas khrag?
132b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas byas de ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de ni gtun su bzhin rabs/ /de nas rus sbal rgyab 'dra bar/ /rims kyis 'phel bar 'gyur na yin/ /lto bar dmu rdzing tshogs par byed/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dang/ /kha yis ro ni mi tsher
133a1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /sba zhing ngan la rims kyis 'debs/ /sha mdog skya zhing mi snyug la/ /brgyal zhing slon bar byed ba dang/ /tsha zhing myos dang ldan bar 'gyur/ /rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug ba'am/ /sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcaS//
133a2(mdo 'grel): de la rims kyis nang rnams ni/ /bshad 'gags ba dang lto sbos dang/ /rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis 'debs/ /lus lci sra zhing yig 'chus/ /mcher ba lta bur mchin g.yas logs/ /gnas 'phos dmu rdzing bskyed ces bya/ /bya sgro su
133a3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas ba'i zas/ /zos bas bshad lam gnas 'gags te/ /gzhad 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang/ /rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang/ /thur du sel ba'i rlung 'brugs te/ /bshad ba bad mkhris bkag nas ni/ /lto bar dmu rdzing chags par
133a4(mdo 'grel): byed/ /des ni tsha skom rims sbring 'byung/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde bla na/ /glad snying lte ba gzhad kha na/ /dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus/ /lto bar rlung ni 'khyims bar byed/ /brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug/ rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur//
133a5(mdo 'grel): phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni/ /ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rus sogs zug rdur bcas ba'i zas/ /zos sam shin tu dran zos ba/ /rgyu ma rdol lam gas 'gyur nas/ /bu ga de nas ma zhu bar/ /phyir 'dzag bshad lam
133a6(mdo 'grel): las byung zhingn /bshad bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni/ /sha rul lta bur ma nam pa ni/ /spyin pag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ltag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs?/ /dmu rdzing mi bzad skye bar 'gyur/ /da ni lte ba man chad rgyas
133a7(mdo 'grel): chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur/ /nang kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan/ /dbugs mi bde skom mgo 'khor khyab/ /rgyu rdo la dmu rdzing zhes bshad de/ /gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer/ /snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni/ /
133b1(mdo 'grel): 'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa 'am/ /me drod bri ba'am/ ha cang ni/ /skem bas chu 'thungs drags pa las/ /rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chur 'dres/ /chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas/ /de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de 'og dmu rdzing
133b2(mdo 'grel): gyur ba yin/ /de nas dmu rdzing de las ni/ /skom dang rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas/ /dbugs mi bde lung yi ga 'chus/ /sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab/ /rkyal pa chus gang reg pa 'dra/ /bskyod na sgra dag lus 'dar la/ /dmu rdzid chen po
133b3(mdo 'grel): che zhing snum/ /bstan zhing de ni lte ba zlum/ /thams cad yal bar bor nas ni/ /nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te/ /smin pas sla zhing zags 'gyur ba/ /tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag/ phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rdul 'byung/ /'gags na thad kar
133b4(mdo 'grel): 'khyil zhing gnas/ /chu de byid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /spyi bag gyur na de tshe ni/ /lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum/ /brtabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing/ /mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la/ /lta ba dang ni rgyab tu 'gro/ /de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skyes
133b5(mdo 'grel): lto ba 'phel zhing de las lhag/ /rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni/ /dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mchar/ /'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso ba dka' / /gzhan dag
133b6(mdo 'grel): phal cher zla phyed gsod/ /thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u/ las bshad brla gnyan ldan pa'ang gsod/ /skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur ba dag/ phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad/ /stobs ldan tshur ni ma gyur
133b7(mdo 'grel): zhing ? gsar du 'byung ba 'bad pas gos/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nas skya rba ba dang 'od nad dang me dpal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o//
134a1(mdo 'grel): ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pa/ /mkhris pa lhag par ldad 'gyur la/ /de la rlung ni stobs che bas/ /snying la gnas ba'i mkhris pa ni/ /gtor che rtsa chen bdu'i nang bsam/ /lus kun la ni khyab byar
134a2(mdo 'grel): bas/ /bad kan pags pa sha khrag la/ /gnod byas par dug nas ni/ /sha dang pags pa de dag las/ /pags mdog tha dang dkar ba dang/ /ser zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur/ /de las skya ba'i shas che nas/ /de phyir skya rbab nang
134a3(mdo 'grel): ces bshad/ /nad de lus ni lci ba dang/ /lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang/ /mdangs kyi yon tan zad byed cing/ /de las khrag dang chil chung ste/ /snying po med cing dbang po lhod/ /yan lag brdungs ba snyam byed cing/ /snying ni zags
134a4(mdo 'grel): pa snyam du sems/ /mig phugs skrad zhing nyams la ni/ /mchil mang skad gsan dma' ba dang/ /zad mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod/ /spu 'byi me drod nyams ba dang /ro smad bying zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /dbugs mi bde zhing rna skra
134a5(mdo 'grel): 'bod/ /mgo 'khor la bar byed pa yin/ /de ni nang gzhi tha dad 'dus/ /sa zhag zos las rnams lngar 'gyur/ /'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing/ /pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang/ /yig 'chus shing gcin mdog ser/ /
134a6(mdo 'grel): rdul med khong ba'i me drod chung/ /lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin/ /da la rlung gyur lus na zug/ rtsa sen mig dang bshad gci rnams/ /mdog gnag rtsub la 'dar ba dang/ /skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor/ /rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na//
134a7(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa las rtsa sen mo sogs/ /ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed/ /skom dang rdul brkyal bsil ba 'dod/ /lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang/ /'khru zhing sgregs ba skyur la tsha/ /bad kan rtsa sogs dkar? pa dang/ klong zhing
134b1(mdo 'grel): kha nad lan tsha bro/ /ba ? ldang zhing skad 'gags la/ /lus pa lu zhing slong byed/ /'dus 'gyur mtshan ma 'dres ma nags dka' / /sa zhag dka' bas rlung bskyed la/ /tsha bro mkhris pa dang ra bad kan/ /dangs ma la sogs gnod
134b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /rtsub pas zas zos rtsab gyur nas/ /zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te/ /snga ma bzhin du skya rbab bskyed/ /de nas lte ba rkang ba dang/ /kha dang pho mtshan skrangs bar byed/ /bshad pa wu dang bcas pa 'khru/ /bad kan khrag dang bcas t par 'byung/ /gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab/ /de yis mkhris bskyed zas zos bas/ /khong ba yan lag gnas mkhris gnas/ /bshad khrag bsregs te mig ser bskyed/ /des ni mig dang pags pa gdong/ /bshad gci sen mo kha
134b3(mdo 'grel): dog ser/ /lus cha skom dang zas mi 'ju/ /sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur/ /de ni mkhris ba'i shas chen/ /skya rbab nad med par de 'byung/ /yal bar bor na cher skrangs te/ /gos dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin/ /ha lung sa
134b4(mdo 'grel): ni ltar nag ser/ /rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dang che/ /bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs/ /khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri/ /ha liM sa ka khrag ngan gyur/ /chu ser can zhes bya ba yin/ /de rnams kyi ni bla gnyan sngar/ /'or nad
134b5(mdo 'grel): gtso bo yin par bshad/ /de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o/ /rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang/ /khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar/ /'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags/ /pags pa sha la gnas 'gyur te/ /'od nad mthong zhing
134b6(mdo 'grel): mkhrad bar byad/ /de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad/ /rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las/ /gzugs dbye dgu yi bdag nyid can/ /nad gzhi tha dad gnyis bad kun/ /snang dang dug gis phog las 'byung/ /yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis/ yan
135a1(mdo 'grel): lag kun skrangs phyogs gcig gnyis/ /khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi/ /dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du 'dod/ /'od nad kyi kyi ni spyi yi rgyu/ /nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid/ /nad lasl smyur sogs kyis nyams chung/ /myur du lhag
135a2(mdo 'grel): par zas las 'byung/ /de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang/ /skyur dang snum bdil lan tshwa dang/ /thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang/ /mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar/ /sa zos sha ci sha skam dang/ /ma zhung la dang bud med drags/ /rkang mthil lam
135a3(mdo 'grel): du 'gro ba 'am/ /bzhon bas drag tu bskyong 'gyur yin/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde chang 'khru/ /gzhad 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni/ /mngal nas khrag zags rims kyis btab/ gsung dang chu ser slon nyes dang/ /sbrum ma dang ni med pal gyi/ /nad
135a4(mdo 'grel): dang skya rba ba dag gis btab/ /gzhid yang log par gsos gyur ba'i/ /nad de brad du gnas na ni/ /stod skrangs chu sor gnas smad skrangs/ /dbug na gnas pa rab tu skad/ /yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrad/ /nyid lag la brten de skrangs
135a5(mdo 'grel): byed/ /de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha/ /yan lag snyoms bar byed pa yin/ /rlung las skrangs pa 'pho zhing rtsub/ /rtsa sbubs smug cing gang ba dang/ /pags 'khums 'dar ba rtse reg na/ /na zhing bzug la bems bems po/ /myur bar
135a6(mdo 'grel): ldang zhing myur du zhing/ /skrangs pa mnan na dma' bar 'gyur/ /snum dang dro bas nyes na zhi/ /mtshan ma chung zhing nyin mo che/ /pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis/ /bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed/ /mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag/
135a7(mdo 'grel): spu ni dmar ser gyur ba dang/ /myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur/ /dang por dbus su byung dang srag /skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul/ /mnam zhing 'drul la skom mgo 'khor/ /bsil pag 'dod cing thung du 'khru/ /dri ma nam reg na mi
135b1(mdo 'grel): bzod 'jam/ /bad kan g.ya' spu pags pa dkar/ /mkhrad zhing bsil la lci ba dang/ /snum zhing 'jam la brtan zhing 'thas/ /gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams/ mnan na mi 'byin ldang dka' zhing/ /zhi dga' mtshan mo skrad tshabs che//
135b2(mdo 'grel): 'od ma btsags bu sogs ral yang/ /khrag mi 'byung bar spyin bag 'dzag/ dro dang reg pa la mngon dga' / /gnyis 'byung gsum po rang ji bzhin/ /rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dran ma yin/ /'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /mtshon la sogs pas
135b3(mdo 'grel): snang gyur zhing/ /bcad dam bsgral lam rmas la sogs/ /kha ba ma dang rgya mtsho'i rlung/ /bse rtsi ka pi'i kha chu yi/ /khu ba gram sogs reg pas/ /skrangs pa mched pa 'gyur pa yin/ /shin tu tsha zhing dmar bar snang/ /phal cher mkhris
135b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtsha nyid can/ /dug skyes srog chags dug can ni/ /lus la song dang gcin gyis bog/ srog chags dug med pa yi yang/ /so dang mche ba sen mos zug/ gcin rtug khu bas smes ba dang/ /dri ma can gyis gos kyis reg/ /dug shing
135b5(mdo 'grel): rlung la reg pa dang/ /dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung/ /mnyes zhing g.yol 'phyang ba dang/ /myur gsod tsha zhi ngan bar byed/ /'or nad gsar 'byung brla gnyan med/ /gso sla so dka' sngar bshad zin/ /me dpal nad dang snad ba'i bar/ /
135b6(mdo 'grel): gnod ba 'or nad mtshungs pa yin/ /de ni phyi nang gnyig ste/ /gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' / /de la nad ni ji bzhin du/ /'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldar gyur la/ /khyad par du ni tsha ba yis/ /lus la myur
135b7(mdo 'grel): du mched par byed/ /de yang nad gnas nad du mched/ /phyi rol phyir mched gnyi gar gnas/ /gnyi gar mched par byed pa yin/ /de la nad na gnas pa ni/ /gnad rnams tsha gdung myos par byed/ /bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang/ /skom dang
36a1(mdo 'grel): rab che gcin nad sogs/ /mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang/ /me drod stobs nyams las shes bya/ /phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin/ /de la rlung gyur me dpal ni/ /rlang gi rims der nad thabs 'dra/ /skrang zhing mgul
36a2(mdo 'grel): ba zug ba dang/ /yan lag snyom zhing ba sbu rtse/ /mkhris 'gyur myur du mched cing 'gro/ /mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar/ /bad kan las g.ya' dag na 'jam/ /bad kan las byung rims 'dur ma/ /me dpal sogs kun yal
36a3(mdo 'grel): bar bod/ /rang gi nang tshul bsags gyur na/ /da ni smin rdol rang rang gi/ me dpal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin/ /rlung mkhris la ni rims 'debs blon/ /brgyal zhing chang 'khru skom mgo 'khor/ /rus tshags chag snyam me drod nyams/
36a4(mdo 'grel): mun zhugs snyam sems yig 'chus/ /yan lag thams cad me mdag ni/ /'bar bas khyab pa lta bur tsha/ /phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched/ /khyab pa'i yan lag de dang de/ /me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa 'am/ /sngo ba'am dmar baS
36a5(mdo 'grel): khyab phyir la/ /me bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung/ /myur du mched cing khyab par byed/ /gnang kyi rjes 'jug me dpal na/ /de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung/ /yan lag na zhing dran ba stor/ /gnyer yang dbugs kyi rdam pa drag/ skyigs

36a7(mdo 'grel): bag sang dka' ba/ /de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin/ /bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung/ /bad kan de brdol mang du phye/ /khrag 'phel ba yi khrag brdol te/ /bags pa chu ba sha la gnas/ /gnod bcas thar bu phra zhing ring/ /zlum zhing
136b1(mdo 'grel): sprom la sra ba yi/ /'dzer pa'i greng ba chags byed cing/ /mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/ /kha bskams skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor/ /rmongs pag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus/ /yan lag na zhing

136b3(mdo 'grel): cing drod nyams dus chag snyam/ /skom zhing dbang po mi gsal lci/ /khe snabs 'khru zhing dang kha 'khyil/ /de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro/ phal cher ma zhu'i gnas na zhugs/ /phyogs gcig tu ni rab min/ /thor bu ser po dmar po dang/ /dkar pos phyogs

136b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /'brum bus khyab skabs rims 'debs ni/ /shin tu tshal dmar zhing sngo/ /nad dmigs tha dang las gyur gsum/ /gnyis gyur brla gnyan med gso sla/ /rma dang 'dus pa las byung dang/ /thams cad gnang ni khyab pa dang/

137a1(mdo 'grel): gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /kha zas spyod lam log pa dang/ /khyad par du ni mi 'brod bsten/ /dam pa smod dang srog gcod dang/ /gzhan gyi nor 'phrog sogs brten dang/ /sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang//

137b3(mdo 'grel): tsher 'thug dang shas cher 'drul/ /tsha ba'i nang dang khrag shas che/ /myur du smin zhing 'drul bar byed/ /'bu can u du war yin/ /brtan zhing 'bras la lci zhing 'jam/ /dkar dmar myur du mi mched la/ /phan tshun 'da' 'brel shu ba rlo/ /g.ya'

140b7(mdo 'grel): gnyid log pa na dang bar 'gyur/ /mchil ma g.yon du 'thor ba dang/ /mig gcig 'dzums par 'gyur ba dang/ /nam chong yan chad mi bzang na/ /gzhogs phyed dag gam ro smad na/ /la la de gzhogs phyed nas bshad/ /gzhan dag phyogs
141a1(mdo 'grel): gcig gus ces zer/ /rlung ni khrag la brten gyur te/ /spyi bo 'dzin ba'i rtsar zhugs pa/ /rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed/ /rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung/ /rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung/ /rtsa dang
141a2(mdo 'grel): rgyus pa bskam byas nas/ /gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod/ tshogs kyi sel mtshams lhod par byed/ /de yi lus phyed thams cad mi las sbyor mi nus tshor ba med/ /de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer/ /gzhan dag phyogs
141a3(mdo 'grel): gcig bskams sar 'chad/ /lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra/ /yan lag kun la brten pa yin/ /rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs phyed bskams/ /shin tu gso dka' yin par bshad/ /gzhan dang 'dres pa 'ang gso dka' yin/ /za byed
141a4(mdo 'grel): rgyun can spang par byed/ /ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis/ /rgyun srad bkag ste lus rengs pas/ /brkyang bskum kun las nyams 'gyur pa/ /shing 'dra shing ltar rengs pa yin/ /phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung/ /de gnas rtsa ni
141a5(mdo 'grel): 'bums byas te/ /dpung ba bskyod par mi nus byed/ /dbung ba 'jas ba'i rlung nad yin/ /gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel/ /chu brgyab tu 'khums byed cing/ /lag dar bya ba nyams byed pa/ /rlung de ba shi rtsa ru bshad/ /gang
141a6(mdo 'grel): tshe rlung ni rkeng par gnas/ /brla yi chu ba'i nang du zhugs/ /de tshe mi de thed por 'gyur/ /brla gnyis la zhugs 'phye bor 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'gro bar rtsoms pa na/ /lus 'dar theng bo lhar 'gro ba/ /tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhor gyur
141a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de ni sran ma'i thed por bshad/ /kha zas dro grang skam rlon 'dres/ /lci dang snum ches brten ba dang/ /zhu dad ma zhu mi bdes bskyod/ /nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log pas/ /ma zhu shin tu sogs 'gyur ha/ /gal te brla nang zhuD?
141b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur na/ /bad kan tshil dang rlung bcas pa/ /nad gzhan zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /bar rus nang du gang byas te/ /bad kan gyis te dengs gyur la/ /de tshe de yis brla rengs byed/ /'di gas mi nus drang tshor ba med/ /gzhan gyis yin
141b2(mdo 'grel): snyam sems shing lci/ /mi bzod par ni 'gro ba nyams/ /sems khongs tshud cing yan lag na/ /snyoms slon rims 'debs yig 'chus/ /rkang ba sgyid zhe na 'degs pa dka' / /bem bem por 'dug ldan pa yin/ /de ni bsla rengs nad ces
141b3(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /gzhan dag phyug po'i rlung zhes zer/ /brlung dag khrag las skyes pa skrad/ /pus mo'i steng byung nad tsha bas che/ /ci sbyad mgo lhar sbom gyur ba/ /co sbyad mgo 'dra yin zhes bya/ /rkang pa na zhing mi mnyam 'dor/ /ngal ba la ni gang tshe
141b4(mdo 'grel): rlung/ /long mor gnas te nad bskyed pa/ /de ni rlung nad tsher mar bshad/ /rting pa sor mor 'brel pa yi/ /chu bar rlung gis gnod 'gyur gang/ /brla gnas 'jug par byed pa de/ /gzugs 'khums zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /bi sha tsi dang gzuD
141b5(mdo 'grel): 'khums bshad/ /mi bzang na pa kha lir bshad/ /gang gi rkang pa rtse gyur zhing/ /bem bem por ni gyur pa dag/ bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur pa/ /rkang brtse bar de bshad do/ /mkhris pa khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung/ /rkang pa gnyis su cha? byed
141b6(mdo 'grel): cing/ /khyad par du ni 'gro tsho tsha/ /de ni rkang tsha zhes byar bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'o// //de nas dreg nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /khrag ni 'khrugs
141b7(mdo 'grel): par byed ba'i zas/ /tsha ba dang ni mi 'phrod pas/ /bstan dang sbyor ba log pa dang/ /nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log dang/ /nyal po drags dang skyid par gnas/ /'chag? pa'i spyod pa ma brten dang/ /snang dang spyad pa ma byas pas/ /mi yi
142a1(mdo 'grel): khrag ni 'khruD 'gyur zhing/ /rlung bskyed zos pas rlung nad ni/ /'phel bas 'khrugs te lam gzhan zhugs/ /de bzhin khrag kyang lam 'gags la/ /dang por gnod par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang/ /mtheng nad stobs
142a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rlung khrag 'dres/ /ming du de ni rnam par bshad/ /de yang dang por rkang par rgyu/ /mchog tu gzhon sogs 'phyang las 'byung/ /de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan nyid ni/ /mdze ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan mar mtshungs/ /de bzhin lus
142a3(mdo 'grel): nyams yan lag lhod/ /pus mo byin pa brla rked pa/ /lag pa rkang pa tshigs rnams su/ /g.ya' zhing 'gul dang na ba dang/ /chag nyams sems zhing tshor med lci/ yang dang yang du ldang ba dang/ /slar yang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rkang pa
142a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas/ /lan 'ga' lag pa dag tuAng gnas/ /byi ba'i dug ni ldang ba ltar/ /lus kun la ni khyab par 'gyur/ /thog mar pags pa khrag la gnas/ /byung ba rtogs par bla zhes bya/ /de nas rims kyi lus zungs kun/
142a5(mdo 'grel): khyab ste rtogs par dka' zhes bya/ /rtogs sla pags g.ya' la sogs ldan/ /zangs ltar dmar rang sngo ba dang/ /bya rnying bcas shing rab gro cha/ /rtags dka' sda bas lhag par na/ /skrangs zhing mkhang la tshos par byed/ /gzhan dang tshigS
142a6(mdo 'grel): dang rus pa rkang/ /bcad snyam sems shing nang du rgyu/ /shugs dang ldan tshe sbur? po dang/ /zha'o 'theng por byed 'gyur la/ /lus ni kun tu rgyu ba yin/ /de la rlung shas che 'gyur lo/ /gzer 'gul zug pa'i shas tsha zhing/ /skrangs ?
142a7(mdo 'grel): cing gnag pa dang/ /sngo zhing 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur/ /rtsa chen sor mo'i tshigs rnams ni/ /'khums shing lus bcum bzhin du na/ /grang la mi dga' reg na bde/ /rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med/ /khrag shas che skrad jib tu chug?
142b1(mdo 'grel): dmar zhing tsha ba tsag tsag byed/ /snum dang rtsub pas zhi mi 'gyur/ /g.ya' dang 'brul bar ldan pa yin/ /mkhris 'gyur tsha zhing rmongs bag dang/ /rdul zhing brgyal myos skom dang che/ /reg mi bzod cing na la dmar/ /skrang zhing smin la

142b4(mdo 'grel): rlung las/ /srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang/ /'drangs drags snod dang lam gyis dub/ /shugs bkag nan gyis btsir ba yis/ /'khrugs na mig la sogs pa la/ /nye bar gnod pa skyed byed cing/ /cham pa nyam thag skom lud pa//

142b6(mdo 'grel): 'debs slon zhing yi ga 'chus/ /mgul par lba ba sogs bskyed cing/ /nam tshong yan lag brten nad bskyed/ /khyab byed 'gro dang 'dug drags dang/ /rtsed mo drags dang mi bzang spyod/ /kha zas mi mthun rtsub 'jigs dgang//

151a6(mdo 'grel): dugs/ /lags par bya ste blung bar bya/ /ldong ros rgya mtsho pi pi ling/ /til mar dang sbyar mig sman gzhug/ shing kun stag tshil cha mnyam byas/ /rgya mtshar bcas pa'i sna sman bya/ /de bzhin mar sting seng+ge'i tshil?/ /rgyam tsha dag dang
151a7(mdo 'grel): sbyar te btang/ kha la ga sa ni pa'i lo// shu dag ru rta a ru ra/ /yungs kar nas bcas mar sbyar ba'i/ /bdug pa'am byi la'i rtug pas bdug /gu gul shu dag bya ma ka /sa rdza ? ni ba dang/ /arga dang ni a ru ra/ /thang? shing bcas
151b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i spos sbyar ba/ /'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i/ /bdug pa yin te rims kun sel/ /sros bdug sna sman btang bya ba/ /sems kyis bskur bar gang bshad dang/ /'phags pa la brten sman gyis ni/ /rims nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /mchog tu phal
151b2(mdo 'grel): cher mi bzad rims/ /de ni glo bur 'od rjes 'brel/ /mi bzad rims zhir ma gyur na/ /rang gi gter ga ji bzhin gdab/ /dangs ma la gnas thams cad la/ /skyug sman btang dang smyung ba bya/ khrag la gnas pa sman chu blugs/ /bsku dang byug dang gtar ga
151b3(mdo 'grel): bya/ /shar gnas bkru sman rnon po bya/ /tshil gnas tshil ni dbri bar bya/ /rus par gnas pa rlung zhi ba'i/ /bsku dang dugs dang mnye ba bya/ /rims der rlung nad zhi bya dang/ /khyad par du ni 'jam rtsi bya/ /ma 'dres rlung dang me ngal dang/ /'brum bus gnod

152a1(mdo 'grel): nyams stobs rdzogs par 'gyur gyi bar/ /rtsol dang khrus dang nyal po dang/ /zas lci ma go ma goms tsha byed dang/ /gang gzhan rims skyed byed pa spang/ /rims brel gyur kyang 'phral du ni/ /zas kun brten par mi bya ste/ /rimS
152a2(mdo 'grel): ni myur du ldog byed nas/ /nyam chung mi ni myur gsod byed/ /gang phyir myur du gsod 'gyur bas/ /de phyir de ni khyad par du/ /gnas skabs de dang de dag tu/ /sman dpyad de dang de dag bya/ /sman dang nor bu sngags dang bcas pa dang/ /dam

155b1(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /yu sha dang ni tshong ma dang/ /kha ba tshed ldan sbyor le gu/ /kha ba dang ni sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bad kan shas cho? nad la phan/ /bad kan shes chung sa lu dang/ /drug cu pa'i chan sha khu phan/ /btung bar khar 'am ma rgun chuAm/ /bu ram shing?
155b2(mdo 'grel): blug/ /mkhris pa'i lud par ram nye ba/ /bri ha tI gnyis med gnyis/ kha sha ka dang li dong gra/ /sha khu dang ni 'o ma'am/ /thug pa'i yu kar sbyar te blud/ /rgun 'brum dang ni pi pi ling/ /rtswa yi rtsa ba lngar bshad dang/ /chun bskol ba yi khu ba dang/ /de dang 'o

155b7(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i thug pa sbyin par bya/ /skom na rtsa ba bcu bskol chu/ /chu chan chang ma sbrang rtsi blud/ /dong ga ma nu'i rtsa ba dang/ /pa to la yi rtsa bar bcas/ /nub gcig chur spangs sbrang rtsi btab/ /zas dus gsum mam nang par blud/ /pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba 
156a1(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang ni ba ru ra/ /rma bya khyim bya'i mjug sgro ni/ gnag tshar byas dang nam tshig thal/ bi sha gla sgang pi pi ling/ /dur byed sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ste/ /tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs lde gu/ /gsum pa bad
156a2(mdo 'grel): kan lung ba sel/ /sbrang rtsi na le sham sbyar lhag/ /a ka ru sbrang rtsi nyid kyis/ kaN+Da ka ri parta ka/ /brid+ga ra dzi'i khu ba dang/ /ka sa marnga ra spangs btsir/ /khu ba bya drug nag po'i khu/ /sbrang rtsi so sor sbyar ba lhag/ /thang shing zur bar sna dang/ /byi
156a3(mdo 'grel): tshor kata ta sring gi/ gla sgang bca' sga pi pi ling/ /kha ra a ru skyu ru ra/ /'bras yos kha ra dkar po dang/ /skya ru ra yi lpags ba rnams/ /sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar lde gu/ /gsum po rlung 'dres bad kan sel/ /se'u 'bru srang gnyis bu ram
156a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /srang brgyad tsha ba gsum srang res/ /skad snyan drod bskyed yi ga 'byed/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde cham sel/ /bu ram ya bak+Sha ra dang/ /na le sham dang pi pi ling/ /se 'bru rim gyis srang gnyis dang/ /zho re srang phyed chad du sbyar//
156a5(mdo 'grel): lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/ rims kyis skabs bshad a ru ra/ /sogs dang karka ta sring gi/ bskom ba'i khu ba blud bar bya/ /yang na dur byid la la phud/ /gla sgang ma nub she la/ /pi pi ling bcas pa gcin nam/ /chur bskol
156a6(mdo 'grel): ba gcin lud pa sel/ /pi pi ling ni til mar brdos/ /lde gu zho gnyis kha rar bcas/ /rgya sran bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar/ /lung na bad kan lung pa 'joms/ /rtsa ba bcu khu bre bzhi dang/ /mar bre gang dang ma nu dang/ /zur ba bil
156a7(mdo 'grel): ba bye'u ? pa/ /shing kun tsha gsum zho gnyis bskol/ /blud pa'i rjes la thug pa btung/ /de kun bad kan rlung nad 'joms/ /nirku? lo bskol ba'i Shu/ /mar bskol lung pa 'joms byed yin/ /bi TaM ka yi khu ba'i nang/ /tsha
156b1(mdo 'grel): ba gsum bcug mar bskol phan/ /ba spu ba gnyis byi rug pa/ /ka sa mar dang sle tres dang/ /pa to la dang bri ha tI/ /pha nid dza gI khu ba ni/ /'o ma mar dang bcas pa la/ /tsha ba gsum dang legs bskol 'thungs/ /lud ba'i rims drag zad byed dang/ /gzhang?
156b2(mdo 'grel): 'brum nad kyi 'jigs pa med/ /kaN+Da kA ri'i rtsi ba dang/ /'bras bu lo mar bcas pa yi/ /khu pa bre bzhi'i tshad la ni/ /mar bre gang ba la gang dang/ /tsha ba gsum dang bi TAM ka/ shu dag dang ni le'u 'bru dang/ /kha ru tsha dang nas tshig thal/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang
156b3(mdo 'grel): skye ru ra dang ma nu dang/ /bi shi ba dang bri ha tI/ /a ru ra dang ya ba ni/ /? btres dang rgun 'brum dang/ /dbyi mong bi tsher barShb+ha/ /star bu karka ta sh+ri gi/ ta ma la gi ga pra'i rtsa/ /nga snga gze ma'i lde gu dang/ /bskol ba'i mar des lud kun dang/ /skyigs bu dbubs
156b4(mdo 'grel): mi bde la'ang phan/ /kaN+Da kA ri'i sman mar 'di/ /bad kan nang ni sel byed yin/ /bya gri srang brgya brdungs chu srang/ /nyis stong bzhi bcu brgyad nang bskol/ /btsags bar tsha ba gsum rasna/ /sle tres kra trug phye ma dang/ /kan+ta ta siM ga bra'i rtsa/ /gla sgrub pi
156b5(mdo 'grel): pi ling rtsa ba/ /byi tsher ba rnams srang phyed phyed/ /zhun mar srang ni bcu drug dang/ /khar? dkar po srang bzhi bcu/ /slar yang de ni bskol bya ba/ /gzar bu la chags bsgrangs nas ni/ /pi pi ling dang mig rkang dang/ /sbrang rtsi rnying pa dag las ni/ /srang
156b6(mdo 'grel): ni brgyad brgyad gzhug par bya/ /lde gu 'dis ni snying nad skran/ /gzhang 'brum lung dbugs mi bde sel/ /bgag ni zhi ba dung pa rdub/ /shas cher sbyar ba'i dud pas rdub/ /ldong ros ba bla shing mngar dang/ /spang spos gla sgang i gu da'i// shan ?
156b7(mdo 'grel): du ba lung 'joms pa'i/ /cho gas dung ba brdubs nas ni/ /mchil mang mthar ni bu ram bcas na /'o ma 'thungs pa'i dung rdub des/ rlung dang bad kan shas che ba'i/ /lud pa rnying pa'am myur du sel/ /bad kan lud pa mun zhugs snyim/ /gal
157a1(mdo 'grel): te mkhris pa rjes 'brel la/ /der ni gnas skabs ji bzhin du/ /mkhris pa'i lung gso'i sbyor ba bya/ /rlung ni bad kan 'brel ba la/ /bad kan bsal ba'i bya ba bya/ /mkhris pa dang 'dres rlung bad kan/ /lud par
157a2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa bsal bar bya/ /rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid skam/ gsher las snum dang rtsub chos bya/ /lud pa bad kan las gyur pa/ /mkhris par bcas pa kha bas gso/ /glo nang 'grams la 'phral du ni/ /rgya skyegs sbrang rtsi'i 'o
157a3(mdo 'grel): ma blud/ /zhu nas sa lu'i 'bras chan ni/ /'o ma kha rar bcas pa bza' / /rtsib logs chu son bcas te/ /mkhris dod shes chung chang sbyar btung/ /bshad pa khru gla sgang bo nga dkar/ /pa ta dug mo nyung bcas btung/ /rgya
157a4(mdo 'grel): skyegs zhun mar pra tshil dang/ 'tsho byed sde tshan ka ra dkar/ /smyig rkang kha ra mnyam 'o mar/ /bskol ba me drod che la blud/ bu ram shing dang pad+ma'i tshigs/ /pad+ma ge sar tsan dan dkar/ lo mar bskol ba sbrang rtsir
157a5(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /glo 'grams 'byor bar bya phyir blud/ /nas rjen phye ni 'o ma ru/ btsos te mar dang sbyar ba'am/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi'i ma'i phye/ /skyo ma rims tshad ldan la blung/ /lud pa can la sman mngar dang/ /bskol ba'i
157a6(mdo 'grel): zhun mar blung par bya/ /yang na bu ram chu bskol bsgrangs/ /sbrang rtsi na le sham btab blud/ /yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma/ /'o mar bskol ba mar btab blud/ /yang na bcud kyi lan tshigs/ /pi pi ling yang sbyin par bya/ /lung can dus tshigs
157a7(mdo 'grel): gzer ba la/ /rgun 'bru shing mngar ma du ka/ smyig rkang pa la pi pi ling/ /zhun mar sbras rtsir bcas pa sbyin/ /dri sna gsum ni zho re dang/ /pi pi ling srang phyed kha ?/rgun 'brum 'bra go ma du ka /srang re zhib tu btags nas ni/ /spang
157b1(mdo 'grel): rtsis ril shur sbyar ba yis/ /ro tsa byed cing khrag mkhris dang/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde slon byo/ /brgyal myos skyigs bu mgo 'khor dang/ /blo brdol skad ni 'gags pa dang/ /mtshan pa lus skem rlung 'khyil dang/ /mchil mar khrag 'byung rtsib log
157b2(mdo 'grel): na/ snying nad skom dang rims kyang 'joms/ /barsha bu dang kha ra dkar/ /sa lu rtsa snar btags pa'i phye/ /rgun chu 'o ma mar du bskol/ /mchi la me khrag tu 'byang la blung/ /shing mngar dang ni sa du ka/ tendu? li ya 'or bcos phan/ /khrag ni gang tsha drag tu
