157b4(mdo 'grel): kar dkar dang nas dang gro/ /'tsho byed grangs rtsi sbrang rtsir bcas/ /yang na 'o mar bskol te blud/ /glo 'grams nyams chung ring la sbyin/ /sha za'i sha yi khu ba ni/ /mar dang brdos pa'i pi pi ling/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa de la blud/ sha dang khrag ni 'phel byed
157b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /u dum+ba ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /a shadtha dang bla lak+Sha dang/ /sA la'i shing dang bri yaM ku/ /ta la'i rtse mo 'jam bu'i shun/ /pi ya li dang shug par bcas/ /a shwa kar nor bcas pa ni/ /'o mar bskol ba las byung ba'i/ /mar dang 'bras chan bza' ba ni/ /blo 'grams
157b6(mdo 'grel): khu ba nyams stobs dang/ dbang po'i nus pa zad la sbyin/ /rlung mkhris kyis nyen yan lag zhigs/ /na la mar des bskus pa bsngags/ /rlung nad kyis na nyin pa la/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol til mar bsku/ /mtsho byed sde tshan zhun mar ni/ /snying dang rtsib
157b7(mdo 'grel): logs na la blud/ /yang na blung nad 'joms pa dang/ /khrag mkhris sel ba gang yin bya/ /shing mngar na ga ba la gnyis/ /'o ma dang mnyams mar bskol bar/ /pa ya sa dang pi pi ling/ /smyig rkang lde gu bskol ba ni/ /glo 'grams pa yi nang la phan/ /'tsho
158a1(mdo 'grel): byed sde tshan bca' sga dang/ /nye'u shing pa dang ram nye ba/ /ba spu ba gnyis bA la dang/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba kha sral khre'u/ /ri di zur ba kam la/ /sti? gar kam ya sya/ /rtsa ba lnga ni chung ngu dang/ /rgun 'brum star ga'i 'bras bu sogs/ /mdang
158a2(mdo 'grel): zhing snum la stobs bskyed ba'i/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btags lde gu/ /de dang zhun mar bre gang bskol/ /'o ma sha ra skyu ru ra/ /bi du ri dang bu ram shing/ /khu bar shi? 'khu bar bcas/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/ khre phyed kha ra srang lnga bcu/

160b2(mdo 'grel): ni dag byed cing/ /dangs ma legs bar rgyu byed pas/ /lus ni rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ /dbyi mod par gyi 'bras bu gsum/ /rtsa ba bcu dang tsi tra ka/ rgya sran pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /pa ta rgya shug nas tshur bskol/ /li dong gra dang pi rtser pa/ /zur
160b3(mdo 'grel): ba ma nu pi pi ling/ /karka ta yi sring gi btags/ /mnyam pa'i zhun mar dag dang bskol/ /bskol ba 'dir ni shar gnyis/ /lan tshan lnga ni btags te gzhug /de las ran par 'thungs nas ni/ /zad byed lud pas nyen pa sel/ /ka sa mar dang
160b4(mdo 'grel): a ru ra/ /gla sgang pa ta ka pa la/ /dong gra pi pi ling tang pa la/ /pu tse shel tshad zho gnyis gnyis/ /mar ni bre gang 'o ma dang/ /rgun chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol/ /zad byed rims dang mchin pa'i nad/ /lud pa kun sel dge ba yin/ /kaN+Da kA ri ba sha ka/
160b5(mdo 'grel): sle tres rtsa ba 'bras bu dang/ /myu gu lo mar bcas pa rnams/ /bskol ba'i khu ba mang du btsos/ /lud pa'i rims kyis btab pa dang/ /yi ga 'chus pa'i nang rnams sel/ /se 'bru'i khu ba nyis 'gyur rim/ /tshe ? ldan bar bskol ba'ang phan/ /ya
160b6(mdo 'grel): bak+Sha mar dang sbyar/ /zas zos pa yi 'og tu blud/ /pi pi ling dang bru ram bskog yi'o mar bcas phan/ /'di ni me drod sbyar phyir de/ /zad byed lud tsan gyis mar btung/ /nad kyis 'gags pa'i mid pa brng/ /rtsa spubs rnams na dag bar byed//
160b7(mdo 'grel): nas ni bre gang bcos pa ru/ /rnam par rgyal ba nyi shu btsos/ /chos nas de byung mnyes nas der/ /bu ram rnying pa srang drug dang/ /pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang/ /ldong ros zho ni skyer khan dang/ /zho gcig tshad ni bcug nas ni/ /slar yang bskol ba'i lde
161a1(mdo 'grel): gu de/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde sel byed/ /reg 'jam sgro rtsa bsregs nas ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/ /yang na rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/ /lde gu zos na lud pa dang/ /dbugs mi bde bsel
161a2(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /e raN+Da'i lo thal ba ni/ /til mar tsha gsum bu ram bcas/ /lde gu 'am be'u rug e raN+Da'i/ /lo ma'i thal ba de bzhin bya/ /tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma ni/ /bu ram rnying pa mar sbyar phan/ shug pa tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/ /bi TI ka dang?  thang
161a3(mdo 'grel): shing dang/ /ba la ra sna phye ma kun/ /de dang mnyam pa'i kha rar sbyar/ /yang na sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar/ /lde gu lud pa sel byed mchog /de bzhin na le sham gyi phye/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas/ /a rur dang bca' sga ni/ /bu ram dang ni bcas pa yi/ /ril bu
161a4(mdo 'grel): khar ni bzhag gyur ni/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde kun sel/ /yang na pa ru ba 'ba' zhig /lud pa sel bar byed pa yin/ /seng phro ma a mre kha ra dang/ /bcas pa'i lde gu mar dang brdas/ /thug pa zan dron nang du gdag/ /slon bro skom dang lud pa dang/ /ma zhu tshad
161a5(mdo 'grel): 'khru sel bar byed/ /kaN+Da ri khu bar bskol/ /mutka'i khu bar legs g.yos pa'i/ /skyu ru ra sel se 'brur bcas/ /lung pa kun gyi sman gyur yin/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol 'o ma 'am/ /mchu yis zas tshol khron rko dang/ /khud na gnas pa'i
161a6(mdo 'grel): sha khu ni/ /zad byed lung pa can la sbyin/ /glo brdol gyis dud rdub la gang/ /btung bar bcas pa bstan pa yang/ /zad byed lung par de btang bya/ gang yang gtsong chen skabs su bshad/ /stobs bskyed me drod bskyed pa dang/ /rtsa rgyun spyod bar byed pa'i sman//
161a7(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs zad byed lung can la/ /stobs bskyed thams cad bsngags pa yin/ /gang phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i/ /zang byid lud ba mi bzad bas/ /de phyir nang stobs ji bzhin du/ /'dus pa'i nad la phan pas gso/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/
161b1(mdo 'grel): gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde? ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gang phyir skyigs bu dbugs mi bde/ /rgyu mtshungs sogs pas de yi phyir/ /gso ba'ang gcig ste des nyes la/ /thog mar dugs kyis nyer dpyad bya//
161b2(mdo 'grel): snam dang lan ? mar byug/ de yis bad kan bu gang 'gags/ /shin tu zhen pa zhu nas ni/ /khong par gnas pa legs par 'byin/ /bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen gyur cing/ /rlung ni lugs dang mthun par rgyu/ /'jam zhing rlan gyur zas snum dang/ /rlan can shar bcas
161b3(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'am/ /yang na zho yi spris ma spyir/ /de nas de la slon 'jam btang/ /mchog tu lud pa snying nad dang/ /skad 'gags pa la skyug sman sbyin/ /rgya mtsha sbrang rtsi pi pi ling/ /sbyar ba 'am rlung la phan pa btang/ bad kan gyi ni gnad bcas pa/ /bsal na bde

162a2(mdo 'grel): sam/ /dro 'jam tsam gyis dugs bya zhing/ dkri dang ldan par bya ba'i dugs/ /dugs kyi le'ur bshad dugs bya/ ma zhur de gso'i cho ga dpyad/ /sbyor drags rlung shas che gyur na/ /rlung nad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /sha khu snum sogs ba tsha min/ /bsku ba
162a3(mdo 'grel): dag gis zhi bar bya/ /bad kan ma slongs dugs ma byas/ /nyams chung ba la sbyang byas bas/ /rlung gi gnas rnyed gnad rnams ni/ /skam par byas nas srog 'phrog byed/ /de bas sman khu snam dang ni/ /lde gu sogs kyis de zhi bya/ /skem zhing gol brdol tshad
162a4(mdo 'grel): 'khru 'khru dang/ /khrag mkhris tsha ba las byung ba'i/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba la/ mngar snum bsil sogs dag gis gso/ /ku langtha dang rtsa ba bcu/ /bskol ba'i skams sa'i sha khu phan/ /shing kru brta ka dang ni/ /ka sa mar dang ba sha ka la phug lo pa'i

162a6(mdo 'grel): go snyod kha ru tsha/ karta ka si thug pa phan/ yang na rtsa ba bcu sbyar ba'i/ /thug pa blud na lung pa dang/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde nad sel/ /rtsa ba bcu par sna dang/ /zur pa ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ /bilba gnyis dang ma nu dang/ karka ta sred pi pi ling/ /bca'

163b7(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /bcas pa'i 'o ma'i ma skyo ma'am/ /rgun 'bum? ta bal bi da ri/ /yang na sha khur ldan pa yis/ /bkru smin 'jam po btang bar bya'o/ /lto sbyangs? pa la rta ba dang// drod ? che brgyad pa do bya/ /zas skom yig ? ba dang//

165a3(mdo 'grel): dud pa rdub sogs bya/ /de'ang rlung las gyur pa la/ /ka sa mar dang brta ka/ bri gaM ra dza'i khu ba mar/ /bskol ba'am arnga ga la bskol/ /dro 'am zos rjes la blud na/ /lud pa lu dang skad 'gags sel/ /rgya shug lo ma'i lde gu ni/ /mar brngos rgyam tshar
165a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'am/ /shing mngar dang ni pi pi ling/ /be TAM ka dang rgun 'bru dang/ /ha na sa bar+Ni rtsa ba rnams/ /til mar bskol ba snar blugs bya/ /'bras tshan mar dang bu ram bcas/ /zas la de rjes chu tshan btung/ /'o thug snum can blud pa dang/ /snum gyi dugS
165a5(mdo 'grel): kyi cho ga sbyad/ /mkhris pa las gyur 'o ma'i shing/ /lde gu bskol ba'i zhun mar ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas te de rjes ni/ /'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa blud/ /shing mngar ma du ka yi thug /zhun mar bcas ba blud pa'am/ /ba la dri bzang bid? ri// shing mngar k+Sha
165a6(mdo 'grel): ti bi dang/ /rgyam tshar bcas pa bskol ba'i mar/ /skad 'gags sna sman bla med yin/ /bra buN+Da rI ka shing mngar/ /pi pi ling dang bri ha ti/ /ba la 'o ma mar bskol te/ /skar 'gags pa yi sna sman mchog/ /mngar ba'i sde tshan phye ma ni/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde
165a7(mdo 'grel): gu sbyin/ /bad kan las gyur tsha ba dang/ /zas rtsub ba gcin blud bar bya/ /katba la dang skyu ru ra/ /cha gsum til mar sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /ya bak+Shar tsha ba gsum/ /ku krug tres dang dbyi mo dang/ /a ru ra dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /nas thug til mar zhun mar dang/
165b1(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling dang skyu rur sbyar/ /bca' sga dang ni pi pi ling/ /bza' ba'am skyug sman rnon po bsten/ /sha khar dang sbrang rtsir bsres/ /mngar ba'i sman dang lhan cig bskol/ /'o ma 'thungs bas skad gsang ni/ /chen bo smra bas 'gags nad sel/ /yi ga 'chus
165b2(mdo 'grel): la sna tshogs zas/ /phan pa'i sman dang sbyar ba sbyin/ /phyi dang ni sbyar ba dang/ /sems dga' yid dang mthun sman sbyin/ /dus gnyis su ni so shing dag /bca' zhing kha ni sbyang bya zhing/ /bskabs kha ni bkru ba dang/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dung pa rdub/ /da yis kyi ni
165b3(mdo 'grel): ril bu dang/ /khar ga pur bcas pa sbyin/ /'bras bu zla ba'i zer ltar dkar/ /bza' ba yig 'byed pa'i mchog/ de las rlung 'gyur yig 'chus/ /ha re nu dang pi pi ling/ /ba TAM ba dngar?  sna dang/ /rgya mtsha dang ni dong gra dang/ /sug smel ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ /nas
165b4(mdo 'grel): tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba ni/ /shing kun bcas pa mar ram ni/ /chang gi dangs mar sbyar te btung/ /shu dag chus ni slon du gzhug/ mkhris gyur bu ram chus slon gzhug khar dang ni zhun mar ram/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/ /bad kan nim+ba'i
165b5(mdo 'grel): chus slon gzhug /la la phud dang dong ki'i chu/ /sbrang rtsi'am chang rnying rno sbyar ba/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi'i chang bcas blud/ /ha ra nu sogs phye ma ni/ /sngar bshad chu tshan sbyar ba blud/ /sug smel dang ni shing tsha dang/ /nag duShpa na le sham/ /pi pi ling dang bca' 
165b6(mdo 'grel): sga rnams/ /rims bzhin cha res bskyed phye ma/ /kha ra dag dang mnyam sbyar bas/ /mchil ma yig 'chus pa dang/ /snying dang rtsib logs na lung pa/ /dpugs mi bde dang mgul nad 'joms/ /la la phud dang da trig dang/ /stur? bu bca' sga se'u 'bru dang/ /rgyu
165b7(mdo 'grel): shug zho ni gnyis gnyis byas/ /khar srang bzhi 'u su dang/ /go snyod shing cha kha ru tsha/ /zho re pi pi ling 'bru brgya/ /na la sham ni nyi brgya dag/ phyer btags yig 'byed pa'i mchog /yid 'ong phyi sa 'gags pa dang/ /lud pa snying ga rtsib legs na/ /mtshar pa
166a1(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum pho nad sel/ /bal bu'i lo ma na le sham/ /dong kra dang ni pi ling/ /go rim bzhin du cha res bskyed/ /shing tsha sug smel dang po'i phyed/ /pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi/ /kha dang sbyar ba'i phye ma de/ /drong bskyed yig
166a2(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa dang/ /lud ba lu dang dbugs mi bde/ /yig 'chus dang slon bro dang/ /mcher pa snying nad rtsib logs zug/ skya rbab tshad 'khru rims nad 'joms/ /rlung 'khyel ba ni bde rgyu byed/ /sug smel shing tsha bu shel tso/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis byas pa
166a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /nA ga ge sar srang phye dang/ /band+ha pa tra srang phyed gzhug/ phye btags bu ram rnying ba ni/ /srang ni nyi shu lnga ni bskol/ /sprus te zho gnyis tshad ril bu/ /byas ba'i yon tan de dang mnyam/ /arga sle tres rak+Sha chur/ /nas dang nub gcig spangs
166a4(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /chu dang zan ni sbrus nas su/ /byin te nyams stobs ldan slon gzhug/ de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha/ /bsregs pa tsha dang khar sbyar sbyin/ /zas ni skam zhing rab yang dang/ tsa na ka sogs khu ba blud/ /bad kan gyi bar mchil
166a5(mdo 'grel): ma mang/ /rlung gis mchil ma skyong par byed/ /de ni bad kan mchil mar bshad/ /snam dang bro bas de bsal bya/ /rims 'di cham pa dag dang ni/ /slon ba'i nad la'ang sbyar bar bya/ /mchog tu cham par bsku ba dang/ /snam pa ? kyi
166a6(mdo 'grel): chog bsten/ /mgo dang lkag ma rtsi logs su/ /'bras khur snam bcas dugs bya zhing/ /lan tshwa sgyur dang kha dang tsha/ /sha khu snum dang bcas pa sbyin/ /mgo bo snying ga rtsib logs gzer/ /nad gzhi ji bzhin gser ba dpyad/ /chu dang
166a7(mdo 'grel): rlan can gnas pa'i sha/ legs sbyar dkri ba'i dugs bya zhing/ /de ni snum bzha'i sbyor ba bsdags/ /nad gzhi'i 'bras bar gyur ba la/ /rgya sbos shing mdar shing ta dang/ /tsan dan mar gyi lde gus byug/ ba lang stsa ? la mar dang/ /shing
166b1(mdo 'grel): mdar utpal mar de bzhin/ /ba spu ba dang shing tru dang/ /ba la ram nye bi da ri/ /sna sman dud ba rdub pa dang/ /zas zos 'og tu snam bsten cing/ /til mar gyis ni bsku ba dang/ /de bzhin 'jam rtsi'i las rab bsngags/ /yang na rdabs rwa la sogs pas/ /nad
166b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs ji bzhin nas khrag dbyung/ /shug ba tsan dan pu shel tse/ /mar bcas lnga gu bsku ba'am/ /du rwa shing mngar btsod dang ni/ /nA ga ge sar mar sbyar ba sku/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol til mar/ /lan brgya bskus pa'i mar gyis ni/ /bsku ba'am 'od
166b3(mdo 'grel): ma shing mdar chus/ /byugs mar gyur pa'am bsngags pa yin/ /phal cher me drod nyams pa'i phyir/ /ma zhu be snabs bcas 'khru na/ /de la pho ba'i tshad 'khru ba'i/ /skabs su bshad ba'i sman bsten phan/ /zad byed ldan pa'i bshad pa ni/ /rnam pa
166b4(mdo 'grel): kun tu bsrung bya ste/ /de yi lus zungs kun zad pas/ /de stobs bshad ba'i stobs kyis gnas/ /rigs pas sha rnams kho na sbyin/ /skom du rgun chang blud par bya/ /shugs ni bkag par gyur pa yis/ /gcod chen gyis ni glags mi thod/ /chang dang
166b5(mdo 'grel): chang dangs rgun chad dang/ /chad rnying bu ram sbrang chang dang/ /ci rigs par ni blud pa dang/ /sha ni sbyin pa nyid du bya/ /bu ga'i rgyun 'gags dag phyir dang/ /stobs dang mdangs ni rgyas bya'i phyir/ /snum dang 'o ma chus gang ba'i/ /snod du lus ni bcing
166b6(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /phyung nas bsres pas snum gyis ni/ /bsku zhing lag pas bde bar mnye/ /bde bar 'jug par gyur ba la/ /dal gyis de gu dril bar bya /ji pan+ti ti dang du rba dang/ /btsod dang a shwa gand+ha dang/ /a ba ma dga' ba spru ba/ /a grinaM
166b7(mdo 'grel): ti'i shing mngar dang/ /ba la yungs kar bi da ni/ /ru rta 'bras dang zar ma dang/ /mon san dre'u til dang phabs/ /thams cad gcig tu btags nas no/ /nas kyi phyi ni sum 'gyur dang/ /zho dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar/ /'di dag yi
167a1(mdo 'grel): ni bril phyis bya/ /sha rgyas mdog bzang stobs skyed byed/ /yung dkar ser po'i lde gu dang/ /'tshe byed sde tshan dang sbyar ba/ /khrus kyi sman gyis khrus bya zhing/ /dus tshigs bde ba'i chus khrus bya/ /dri dang phreng ba
167a2(mdo 'grel): sogs pas brgyan/ /bkra mi shis pa 'jig pa brten/ /mdza' bshes ldang zhing glu dang ni/ /rol mo mnyan zhing dga' ston bya// 'jam rtsi 'o ma zhun mar dang/ /sha dang chang bsten tshul la gnas/ /lha la brten pa'i cho ga dang//
167a3(mdo 'grel): mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas slon pa'i nad dang skom dang gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /slon nang phal cher ma zhu
167a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /gnas 'khrugs las byung de yi phyir/ /rlung ma gtogs la dang po ni/ /snyung byas skyug sman btang ba phan/ /stobs ldan rgyun du smon gyur cing/ /nang mang gyur la btang bar bya/ /de 'og rim gyis bkru sman ni//
167a5(mdo 'grel): yid 'od chang rgun chu sogs sam/ /'o mas btang gyur de mod las /gyen 'byung nad ni thug du 'byung/ /zhi ba'i sman ni rtsub pa ste/ /nyams chung ba'ang de nyid bya/ /zas ni skam zhing yi gar 'ong/ /goms shing yang ba bsngags
167a6(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /de bzhin smyung ba yu sha dang /sha khu 'ba' cha skam pa la/ /tshod ma lde gu bza' ba dang/ /btung ba'i dri bzang pa na ka/ /ro drug zas skom sna tshogs dang/ /'bras bu khrus dang mnye ba dang/ /dri zhim 'bras bu me tog
167a7(mdo 'grel): skyes/ /zas dang bskom la sbyong ba dang/ /zos ma thag tu 'phral du ni/ /chu grang gis ni gdod bkru bya/ /rlung las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad/ /rgyam tsha mar bcas dro ba'am/ /tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum sbyar bas/ /lud pa dang ni snying
167b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzag dang/ /bcas pa sel bar byed pa yin/ /se 'bru'i khu ba bca' sga dan/ /lus su zho dang mar bskol ba'am/ /chu dang 'o ma cha mnyam pa/ /khron gyi zag tshul sha khu ni/ /'bras sgyur rgyam tsha mar shas che/ /kha zas snam po bca' ska dang? go
167b2(mdo 'grel): dang se'u 'brur sbyar ba'am/ /rgyam tshar bcas pa dra? 'jam phan/ /'dir ni bkru sman las tshwa dang/ /snum dang dro bar bcas pa phan/ /mkhris pa las gyur bkru sman phyir/ /rgun chu bya ram shing kun dang/ /dur byid sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang/ /zhun
167b3(mdo 'grel): mar seng phom sbyar ba btang/ /'phel te bad kan khyab yi/ /mkhris pa mngar dang kha ba yis / /gyen du drangs la dag gyur nas/ /'bras yos khar bcas pa las/ /skye mo 'am nas thugs blud par bya/ /so lu drug cu pa yi chan/ /skam
167b4(mdo 'grel): sa'i sha khu mung+ga'i khu/ /sa phag bsregs te chu nang gsung/ /shin tu bsgrangs pa'i chu blud pa'am/ /mung+ga 'u su bu shel tse/ /pi pi ling dang nub gcig spangs/ /yang na rgun chu bu ram shing/ /sle tres chu mang 'o ma blud/ /'dzam bu a mra'i lo
167b5(mdo 'grel): ma dang /u sher n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/ bskol te bsgrangs pa'i sgrang rtsi ni/ /btab ste blud na slon pa dang/ /rims dang tshad 'khru brgyal ba dang/ /skom dang che ba mi bzang sel/ /sku ru ra'i khu tsam dan bcas/ /mung+ga ba la'i chu blang phan/ /rgya
167b6(mdo 'grel): shug tshig gu kha ra dang/ /'bras yos pha tshil pi pi ling/ /dngul rdo 'a sbrang rtsi 'am a ru ra/ /rgun 'brum mam rgya shug dang sbyar phan /bad kan las gyur nim pa dang/ pi pi ling dang po son cha/ /yungs kar chu dron gyis slon
167b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /nyams chung ba la smyung ba bya/ /dang ga la sogs khu ba bskol/ /bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/ /nas kyi skye ma slon 'joms pa'i/ /sman mang dang ni sbyar ba blud/ /bad kan 'joms zas yi gar 'ong/ /btung ba zin
168a1(mdo 'grel): thig pu srin/ /ldod ros dang ni pi pi ling/ /na le sham ni skyur rtsi che/ /ka bi da Ta yi khu ba dang/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa slon nad sel/ /ka pit+ta dang tsha ba gsum/ /byi tsher sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin/ /mthun pa'i spyod pa byas pa yis/ /mi sdug
168a2(mdo 'grel): yul mthong las byung sel/ /srin bu las byung srin bu yi/ /sman du bshad pa rnams kyi gso/ /lhag ma nad dmigs ji bzhin du/ /de zhi gyur ba'i nad kyi gso/ /slon pa'i skabs su rlung gi nad rnams ni/ /lud zungs zad pa nges par ldang 'gyur ta//
168a3(mdo 'grel): de bas 'dir ni skyug sman sbyor drags pa'i/ /skabs bshad bcad dang rta ba'i chog bya/ /bu ram zhun mar sha khu dge ba cha/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang/ /'o thug dang ni phan pa'i lde gu yis/ /rgyun tu slon pa zhi ba nyid du bya//
168a4(mdo 'grel): snying nad rlung 'gyur tol mar ni/ /skyur rtsabs dar ba zho kha chu/ /ldan pa tsha can dro 'jam blud/ /de ni lto spos skran kyang 'joms/ /til mar lan tshwad bcas dang sgyur ba gcin/ /bskol ba 'ang de dang mtshungs/ /pi wa ra sna rgya shug nas/ /thad shing
168a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni ba spru ba/ /rgya sran rtsa ba lnga pa rnams/ /bskol ba'i chu dang til mar ni/ /bskol ba de ni snar btang dang/ /btung dang 'jam rtsir btang bar bya/ /bca' sga rgya mtsho bye'u rug pa/ /sle tres shing kun ma nu dang/ /a ru ra dang mar bskol ba/ /snying nad
168a6(mdo 'grel): rtsi ba logs gzer skran 'dzoms/ /kha ru tsha ni srang gnyis dang/ /zhun mar bre gang bskol rtsi ba logs/ /snying nad skran dbugs mi bde sel/ /se 'bru bca' sgra kha ru tsha/ /shing kun star ba bye mar sbyar/ /rlung nad gzhan dbang
168a7(mdo 'grel): can snying nad/ /dbug mi bde bsal mchog yin/ /ma nu zur ba bca' sla dang/ /sgyur rtsi che rtsa a ru rI/ /lde gu la bak+Shar dang/ /mngar sgyur lan tshwa ldan pa 'thungs/ /bcad snyam bsams pa'i gser 'joms byed/ /rgya mtsha la la phud shar/
168b1(mdo 'grel): shu dag go snyong? bca' sga dang/ /thang shing skyur rtsi chen po dang/ /zung ba ma nub lak+Sha/ bskol khu 'jam 'thungs yon tan mtshungs/ /tsha lnga zur ba a ru ra/ /bu ram ma nu skyur rtsi che/ /chang btags lde gu mar til mar/ /brdos te rgyam tshar ldan 'thungs na/ /snying
168b2(mdo 'grel): nad rtsi ba logs mo mtshan zug/ skran dang dmu rdzing nad rnams sel/ /'di la snum gyis dugs phar zhing/ /sman mar gyi ni sbyar ba phan/ /skol ba rtsa ba chud du lnga 'am/ /bca' sga dang ni bskol ba'i chAm/ /chad gi dangs ma zho kha chu/ /'bras khu'i rang sgyur
168b3(mdo 'grel): blud par bya/ /bya rmyang rengs gser ma zhung bcas/ /snying la rlung gis gnod 'gyur la/ /bya ba 'di bya snying 'dzag cing/ /'phar dang gcin snying bcas pa la/ /srag pa khrud khrud rma bya dang/ /co ga khyim bya scum ma phan/ /snying nad bcas pa la'i mar/ /yang na skyid

168b6(mdo 'grel): gnad/ /bzhi pa dag la spang bar bya/ /rlung can rengs dang be snabs can/ /tshor med lhag ma rnams la'ang spang/ /bad kan 'dres gyur de la ni/ /rtsub drod bshad pa'i bya ba bya/ /mkhyis? gyur rgun chu bu ram chu/ /khar sbrang rtsi ba ru sha/ ldan pa'i bkru sman yid 'ong
168b7(mdo 'grel): bas/ /sbyangs la mkhris sel rim pa bya/ /glo brdal rims kyis mkhris skabs bshad/ /phyi nad gi ni spyad pa bya/ /pu tse shel dang shing mngar btags/ /kha dang bcas pa'i chu blug bya/ /ra sna khar rgun 'bru dang/ /'tshe byed utpal brangs rtsig/ kha la
169a1(mdo 'grel): bra gror mnye ba/ /med gnyis dang ma he'i mar/ /'o mar bcas pa bskol ba ni/ /mkhris gyur snying nad sel byed yin// shing mdar pra puN+Da ri ka/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka she ru/ /bca' sga ba lar bcas de dang/ /'o mar bcas

169a6(mdo 'grel): yang na brag? zhun bcud len dang/ /tshangs pa'i bcud? len sgyu ru pa'i/ /lde gu 'am ri Shis bshad pa'am/ /bdud rtsi'i mar ni 'di sbyar bya/ /gang zhig ban zos gser gyis 'debs/ /zas zhu gyur nas zhi gyur ba/ /de la rurta bi TAM ka/ /lan tsha gnyis
169a7(mdo 'grel): dang seng phrom dang/ /thang shing bod pa dkar por bcas/ /phyi ma chu bsgol dro sbyar blud/ /gang zhig zhu nas cher gzer ba/ /de la snum gyis bkru sman ni/ /'bras bu dang ni de bzhin du/ /rtsa ba'i bkru smar sbyin par bya/ /phal cher rlung ni lam
169b1(mdo 'grel): 'gegs pa/ /ma zhu'i gnas su 'khrugs par gyur/ /de la smyung dang smin pa dang/ /spyad pas bde bar rgyu bar bya/ /'bu 'joms pa yi sman kun gyis/ /'bu yi snying nang gso bar bya/ /skom dad la rlung mkhris ba 'joms/ /chog phal cher bsngags pa
169b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /kun la phyi nad bsil pa dang/ /de bzhin zhi dang sbyang bar bya/ /char chu grang mo sbrang rtsir bcas/ /sa'i chu'i yon tan de ldan bsdags/ /bong ba rdza skyogs bye ma'am/ /gshag ma bsregs bcug dangs mar byas/ /bskol te kha rar bcas pa
169b3(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /durba la sogs rtsa ba lnga/ /bskol te khar btab pa'am/ /'bras yos phyir sbyar skyo ma'ang bsngags/ /nas rjen tshag tshe sbrang rtsi dang/ /khar btab pa grang mo'ang phan/ /de bzhin nas thugs lu dang/ /ko tra pa ni rnying pa dang/ /'o ma bsel zhing
169b4(mdo 'grel): nus bsil ba'i/ /sman dang bskol ba'i kha zas ni/ /nad pa chu grang gis bkrus nas/ /khar bsrang rtsi sbyin pa sngags/ /skam sa'i sha dang lan tshwa skyur/ /med cing mar dang brdos ba'am/ /de bzhin mungka sogs khu ba/ /'tsho byed sde tshan khu bar bcas/ /sna sman
169b5(mdo 'grel): 'om mar bsil sman/ /bskol ba'am bu ram shing khu phan/ /skom sel mkhur ba bkang ba ni/ /mdo gnas las bshad byas pa'ang phan/ /tshar mas bshad pa'i lde gu sogs/ /rtsol ba chung zhing sems dga' dang/ /chu bo mtsho ni chen po sogs
169b6(mdo 'grel): dran pa dang ni mthong ba phan/ /skom dang rlung las gyur pa la/ /zho ni bu ram bcas pa bsdags/ /sha khus nyams rtas ba di ri/ /sogs ta bskol nas bsgrangs pa phan/ /mkhris 'gyur u dum bar smin/ /khu bar khar btab pa lan/ /yang na de
169b7(mdo 'grel): bskol bsgrangs pa 'am/ /shi rab sogs sde tshan chu/ /sde tshan de 'dra bskol khug/ bsgrangs pa kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/ /mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang/ /'o ma can shing bskol de bzhin/ /ba dza bU ra rgun 'brum dang/ /lcang ma rgya gro d+ha'i los?
170a1(mdo 'grel): ku sha 'jag ma'i rtsa ba dang/ /shing mngar chu ni bskol ba'ang phan/ /rims la phan sman rgun 'brum sogs / /snying po lnga yi chu blud phan/ /bdag na las byung rim pa ni/ /chu mchog bskol bas slon du gzhug /bilba?
170a2(mdo 'grel): 'u su tsha ba lnga/ /'jag ma kru krug tres bskol blud/ /yang na skyer pa chur bskol la/ /khar sbrang rtsi btab pa blud/ /mung+ga'i khu ba ba tol/ /nimpa'i lo ma tsha gsum bcas/ /nas zan 'khur tad rnon po dang/ /sna sman lde gu rnon po 'ang brten/ /nyes kun ma zhu
170a3(mdo 'grel): de 'joms pas/ /de bzhin slon gyi bya ba 'ang bsngags/ /go bya shu dag tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu skyur ba'ang chu tshan na mi/ /zho kha chu dang btung ba bsngags /zas kyi nyes 'byung dus shes pas/ /thug sla 'am skyo ma bsil ba blud//

170a5(mdo 'grel): bsres pa'am bur chu blud/ /lan tshwa skyur dang bcas khrus bya/ /snum bcas ma drod rab rnol/ /rang bzhin bsil ba'i chu blud bya/ /snum ma zhu la chu tshan blud/ /zhu las bskol la thug pa blud/ /zas snum zos pas skom dang 'gyur/ /kha
170a6(mdo 'grel): ba dang mnyam bu ram chu/ /bu ram sogs zas zos la skom/ /chu dron blud la de slon bya/ /gdod chen las byung gtsang la phan/ /thams cad nang gi rtag pa phan/ /skom zhing nyams chung khong rtsub la/ /sha khu 'am ra yi 'o ma blud//

170b1(mdo 'grel): kyi gzer/ /chu chu dang phrad par ma gyur na/ /'chi ba'am yun ring ba yi nad/ /rnyed par 'gyur pas de yi phyir/ /goms pa'i zas skom sman gyis ni/ /de yi skom dang myur bsal bya/ /de bsal nad ni gzhan dag kyang/ /gso ba nyid du nus pa

175a1(mdo 'grel): dus dang nad shes ba'i/ sman ba yis ni dar ba dag/ zhag bdun nam ni zhag bcu 'am/ /zla ba zla gcig bar du blud/ /yang na phyi dro 'bras yos kyis/ /byed dang dar ba'i lde gu sbyin/ /dar ba zhu nas dor ba yi/ /thug ba rgya mtshar bcas pa
175a2(mdo 'grel): blud/ /de rjes dar bar g.yos pa'i zas/ /snum can byin la dar ba blud/ /yu sha 'am sha khu dar ba can/ /a lu'i 'bras chan ran bar bza' / /rtsub dang mar bed phyung ba dang/ /gang la mar ni ma byung ba/ /dar ba nang dang me drod kyi/ /stobs las de ni
175a3(mdo 'grel): rnam gsum sbyar/ /dang bas legs bcom gyur pa yi/ /gzhang 'brum slar ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de blugs gyur na rtsa yi ni/ /tshogs kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtsa sbubs dar bas dag byas pa/ /lus zungs dangs mar gyur pa gang/ /des ni nyams
175a4(mdo 'grel): dga' mdog dang stobs/ /mchog tu rgyas par byed par gyur/ /rlung dang bad kan dag gi nad/ /rgya phrag dar brnying pas 'joms/ /gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod pa yis/ /kaN+Da kA ri'i lde gus pa skus/ /snod du dar ba sar pa ni/ /snum gcig bzhag
175a5(mdo 'grel): ste sdud par bya/ /'u su zir go snyod dang/ /pi pi ling gnyis ta bu sha/ shu ti bi pi lng rtsa ba ? a la phud dang tsi tra ka/ ya pa na gi'i phye mar dang/ /dar ba sbyar bas mar gyi snod/ /bzhag par gyur pa de las skyur/ /kha ba dang ni rab sbyar? min/ /skyur
175a6(mdo 'grel): dgar ba bro ba ni/ /ldang ba'i dar snying ci 'dod blud/ /drong bskyed na dog bzang yig 'byed/ /rlung dang bad kan sel byed cing/ /gzhad skrangs na bas nyams thag pa/ /'joms shing stobs ni 'phal byed yin/ /kru krug tres kyi rtsa ba'i? shun/
175a7(mdo 'grel): btags pa'i lde gus bum pa bsku/ /der ni zho 'am dar ba gzhag/ /smin pa'i gzhad 'brum sel byed blung/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba a ru ra/ /sle tres tsha ba lnga dag la'ang/ /cho ga 'di nyid sbyor bar bya/ /po ta ta til pa li/ /shu nyi tsha bi lnga g.yer ma gzir bu su
175b1(mdo 'grel): bi lnga'i rkang/ /phye mar btags te sbyar bar bya/ /'bras bu skyur ba mang til mar/ /yu sha sha khu thugs sogs bya/ /sman 'di nyid dang chu dang mar/ /bskol ba'ang drod skyed byed pa yin/ /rims 'di bshad ba sla ba yin/ /rtug pa 'gags ba bshad bya ste/ /snum sogs
175b2(mdo 'grel): zan dang ldan pa yi/ /chang dang lan phro btab pa blud/ yang na dar ba bu ram chang/ /chad skyur char dangs lan tshar sbyar /zas mngar mar dang til mar gyis/ /brdos pa'i kar nyadza'i lo ma/ /steng du phye btab byin gyur na/ /rlung gi rtug pa 'gags pa sel/ /bca' 
175b3(mdo 'grel): sga bu dam bcas pa 'am/ /pa ta bu ram mar lan tshwa/ /ba gcin la spangs a ru ra/ /bu ram gas? pa byed pa'ang rung/ /a ru ra ni nyis brgya gcin/ /bre bcu drug tu gcin du'i bar/ /bskol ba'i sbrang rtsi bcas pa dag/ gnyis gnyis zas nas bad kan gyi
175b4(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum mdzo dang 'or nad dang/ /skran dang dmu rdzing gcan snyi 'bu/ /rmen bu shu bas khyab tsho ces/ /skya rbab rlung? 'khyil 'joms par byed/ /a za sring gi rtsa ba yi/ /lde gu ra gcin sbyar 'thung zhing/ /bu ram btag zos na/ /gzhad 'bru ma myur du 'jig
175b5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /dur bying 'bras bu gsum khur sbyar/ /yang na ngar gas ru ra/ /pi pi ling bcas a ru ra/ /mar dang brngos pa'i bu ram bcas/ /yang na dur byid dan dar bcas/ /zos na bde bar 'bung bar byad/ /gzhang na gnas pa'i nad bsal na/ gzhang
175b6(mdo 'grel): 'brum zad par byed par 'gyur/ /sa 'zu'i khu bzir dang/ /bca' sga bu ram la la phud/ /pa ta dang sbyar dar ba ni/ /rlung gi rtug 'gags sal byed yin/ /rgun chad yang na bu ram chad/ /bca' sga krug tres dang bcas/ /yang na chab ni pa ta dang//
175b7(mdo 'grel): spa 'bras kha ru tsha bcas blud/ /pi pi ling ni bcu bcus bskyed/ /til ni srang phyed btags gyur ba/ /'o ma bcas 'thungs lu so stobs dang/ /me drong skye barbyed pa yin/ /phyi tsher ba dang belba dang/ /la la phud dang dong kra rnams/ /re re dang sbyar
176a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyang/ /gzhang 'brum nad ni sel bar byed/ /chu bri drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang/ /a ru ra shun bre byed dang/ /skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang/ /ga ping+gi? ni srang btsu dang khi sha la ni srang lnga dang/ /seng phrom shing tshe

176a3(mdo 'grel): drod bskyed cing gzhang 'brum dang/ /gnad sbyar ba ba? mdzad dmu rjed/ /dbyi dug rims skran mchin nang dang/ /snying nang skran dang gcong chen dang/ /slon dang srin bu'i nang rnams 'joms/ /chu bre bcu drug nang dan+ti/? rtsa bcu 'bras gsum tsitra ka /srang

176b3(mdo 'grel): yi/ /sha khu skyur po legs sbyar bas/ /khyim bya 'am be'u'i sha khu ni/ /phyed dang gyis 'gags la blung/ /rgya sne'u dur bying tsitra ka dan+ti pa ti amli ka/ la sogs lo ma gzhan yang ni khang kan rlung 'jom mtshong ma ni/ /yang zhing bshad pa sla bar

176b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin par bya/ /chad dang bur chang ka ri'i chu/ /rgun chang dar ba rtsa ba mo dang/ /char gnyis dang ni zho kha chu/ /yang na chu nyung bskol ba 'am/ /'u su bca' sgra bskol ba 'am/ /kaN+Da kA ri bskol ba blud/ /zas kyi thog ma 'am bar dag tu/ /rlung gi

179b6(mdo 'grel): ka dang sug sme la phyir btags bsres/ /de ni gzhang 'brum mdze dang skran dang ni/ /mcher pa dmu rdzing nang ni 'joms byed cing/ /rtag tu bsten na me drod skye bar byed/ /tsha ba gsum til 'bras bu gsum/ /biT'dka? dang go byed tsitra ka bu ram ril
179b7(mdo 'grel): ra bu byas te gzhang 'brum dang/ /pags pa'i nang ni sel bar byed pa yin/ /sor na yi rtsa ba khu sbyar bcug /'jim pas bskus te cho ga bzhin bsregs pas/ /lan tsha til mar bcas pa zos gyur na/ /gzhang 'brum sel bar byed pa dam pa yin/ /na le
180a1(mdo 'grel): sham dang pi pi ling dong kra kru krug tres ni cha re bskyang pa dang/ /tsi tra'i bzhi 'gyur su ran dang sbyar/ /bu ram ril bus gzhang 'brum gcod par byed/ /sor na yi bcu drug cha btags shing/ /tsitra ka ni de yi cha byed bya/ /bca' sgra?
180a2(mdo 'grel): cha gnyis na le sham cha gcig/ bu ram ril bu bcas pas gzhang 'brum sel/ /a ru ra? dang dong gra bi pi ling/ /ka rany+dza dang bi tra bi TAM ka/ ka ra mnyam phye rgod ma'i kha lta bur/ /zas ci mang du zas kyang 'ju bar byed/ /dug me nyung laM ga li ?
180a3(mdo 'grel): ling/ /tsi twa ka dang a ba marga? yi/ /sa bon rtsa mkhris rgya mtsha rnams/ /ril bu bcas pa gzhang 'brum sel bar byed/ /gal te gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod na ni/ /rgyam tsha tsi tra ka dang dug mo nyungs/ /tsi ri bi lba nim+ba bcas pa dag/
180a4(mdo 'grel): btags pa'i phyi ma dar bar bcas pa btung/ /gzhang 'brum skam la ba la te ka ste/ /gsher la dug mo nyung shun sman mchog yin/ /kun la dus kun tu ni dar rnying mchog/ stobs skyed byed cing nang rnams 'joms pa yin//
180a5(mdo 'grel): rtug pa 'gags pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rlung sel mi drod skyed par byed ba la/ /bza' dang btung ba gang yin de bstan bya/ /de las go bzlog ba ni spang bar bya/ /gzhang 'brum tshang 'khru pho ba'i nad rnams ni/ /phal cher phan tshun rgyur gyur
180a6(mdo 'grel): yin bas na/ /me drod chung na skye ba'i tshe na min/ /de bas de la mchog tu me drod bsrung/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus ba las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /'khru ba
180a7(mdo 'grel): phal cher ma zhu ba'i/ /gnas brten me drod nyams pa las/ /'byung pa de bzhin rlung 'gyur dang/ /dang pa smyung ba byas pa phan/ /gzer dbe bad kan gyis nyams thag/ 'khru ba can ni slon du gzhug /nad ni gang zhig sogs pa dag/ /ma smin zas
180b1(mdo 'grel): zas dang 'dres gyur na/ /'khru ba dag ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /shin tu slongs te 'byung 'gyur dang/ /rang nyid 'khru byed de la ni/ /btang snyoms bzhag pa de nyid phan/ /ma zhu 'khrul dang por ni/ /gcod pa'i sman ni btang mi bya/ /gal te 'gags byed lto
180b2(mdo 'grel): spos lci/ /gzer dang tshor ba chung 'gyur la/ /a ru ra btang nad 'khyil ba/ /'byin bas srog ni ster byed yin/ /nad tsha bas 'bring la khyad par du/ /bu ti kha tib pa ling/ /bcas sga shu dag a ru ra/ /'u su legs par bskol ba blud/ /yang na bil ba
180b3(mdo 'grel): 'u su dang/ /gla sgang don ga ba li ka /ba tha shu thag kha nu cha/ /dong ka bi tang a ru ra/ /bca' sgra gla sgang bong da dkar khi lba shing kun dug mo nyung/ /nad gzhi chung ba'i chag 'khrul/ /smyung ba byas ba bsngags ba yin/ /yang na shu dag bor ba dkar
180b4(mdo 'grel): gla sgang par bta bskol ba'am/ /ba li ka dang dang dong gra ni/ /bskol ba'i chu dag blud pa bya/ /bsras shing nyams chung zas dus su/ /ba zas yang ba rigs bas sbyin/ /des da'i kha zas yi gar 'ang/ /me drod lus stobs skyed par byed/ /dar ba'am
180b5(mdo 'grel): rang skyur dag gam ni/ /nas thug dag gi skyo ma 'am/ /cha dang ma rgun chang dag gis ni/ /btung ba gang 'os nyer spyad bya/ /kha zas byin pa'i 'og tu ni/ /khilba gzhon nu zur ba dkar /'u su shing kun btig se'u/ /zi ra spa 'bras pa la sha /la la
180b6(mdo 'grel): pung dang kha ru tsha/ /rgyam tsha rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/ /tsha ba lnga dang pa tha ste/ /smin gcod dred ni skyed par byed/ /bad kan mkhris pa'i shas che la/ /sa la barna bi dang/ /bilpa brisna br+Ni dang/ /se 'bru bskol ba'i thug pa phan/ /bi bi ling rtsa a ru
180b7(mdo 'grel): ra/ /thug bas rlung ni bde rgyu byed/ /nad gzhi mngal 'gags pa dang/ /me drod che bar gang zhig 'khru/ /pi pi ling dang 'bras bu gsum/ /bi TAM ka bskol bkru sman btang/ /sbyang byas nas ni ba drag/ /rlung 'joms med na bskyed 
181a1(mdo 'grel): pa blud/ /gang zhig ma zhu smin gyur dang/ /me drod skyes nas 'khru gyur zhing/ /'byar bag lbu can nad bcas pa/ /sri zhing yang dang yang du ni/ /yang yang 'khru zhing bshad chung ba 'am/ /bshad bas ma
181a2(mdo 'grel): 'dres mkhreg bcas la/ /zho dang 'o ma mar til mar/ /bca' sga bu ram bcas pa blud/ /yang na rgyu shug 'bras bu spangs/ /bu ram til mar ldan pa sbyin/ /bshad ba sri la phan tshod ma/ /snum mang de bzhin sha
181a3(mdo 'grel): khu dang/ /zho dang se 'bru g.yos pa dang/ /sa lu'i 'bras chan ma sha til/ /mung+ga legs par g.yos pa'i zas/ /de ni bkres bar gyur tsha sbyin/ /zur ba'i rtsa ba ka pi ta/ /pa ha sa sti ka'i tshod ma/ /shu sha la la phung dang ni/ /karka
181a4(mdo 'grel): ru dang sring gi ni/ /yang na tshir byi ta yang rung/ /u po ta ka dzI baM ti/ ba gu rtse dang rgya sne'u dang/ /lcam pa 'am yang na e raN+Da/ lo na ka yi khu ba dang/ /rus sbal bye'u lo ba ka/ rma bya sreg pa khyim bya yi/ /sha khu dang yang sbyin par
181a5(mdo 'grel): bya/ /bilba ba gla sgang ba ru ra/ /bca' sgang dka' i me tog/ /dar ba bskol ba nas thug gam/ /zho dang sbyar bar 'khru ba sel/ /ka bit+ta dang ka tsu ra/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba yu ti dang/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang rdo dreg dang/ /se 'bru gso ma ras bal dang/
181a6(mdo 'grel): shalma li yi lo ma phan/ /bilba gzhon nu'i lde gu dang/ /til btags lde gu yang de dang mnyam/ /zho yi spri skyur snum bcas dang/ /sbyar dug mkhreg pa 'joms par byed/ /'u su zir na le sham/ /da trig zur ba kha ru tsha/ /se'u 'bru
181a7(mdo 'grel): pa ta dad ki/ /'bras gsum tsha lnga ka pi ta/ /nas tshig 'khus thal la la phud/ /a mra 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu'i rkang/ /bilba drug 'gyur lde gur btags/ /zho dang bu ram mung+ga'i khu/ /til mar mer dang g.yos pa dag/ gzhan gyis mi
181b1(mdo 'grel): thub sbyar dug 'di/ /drod bskyed smin byed 'khru ba gcod/ /yig 'byed cing mkhreg pa sel/ /rgya shug bilba gzhon nu dang/ /lde gu 'bras dang nas dang ni/ /mung+ga ma sha til rnams dang/ /'bru yi yu shar rnam par brtag/ /bshad ba zad cing kha bskams la//
181b2(mdo 'grel): zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba dang/ /mang? dang til mar lhan cig brngos/ /'bras chan de dang sbyar ba ni/ /bshang zad kha ni bskams la sbyin/ /yang na zho spris snum gnyis brdos/ /bu ram bca' sga bcas pa sbyin/ /yang na chad ni snum gnyis brdos/ /tshod
181b3(mdo 'grel): ma'i dong du sbyin ba'am/ /'bras bu skyur po snum gnyis brdos/ /sgog pa la byas yu sha 'am/ /snum gnyis dang brngos phye zan ni/ /tsha ba gsum gyi phyi btab sbyin/ /de bzhin ma sha legs btsos pa/ /mar gyi snying po blugs pa'am/ /de? thug
181b4(mdo 'grel): lug thug dag gi sha/ bcos te btsigs pa'i khu? ba dang/ se'u 'bru'i khu ba'i chu dang ni/ /'u su dang kra snum bcas bskol/ /sa lu rtsa snar bcas pa ni/ /za zhing de nyid 'thungs pa yis/ /rtug pa zad pa las byung ba'i/ /nad las myur du thar bar 'gyur
181b5(mdo 'grel): bur mi til mang bilba gzhon/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga yi/ /lde gus rlung gis gnod gyur pa'i/ /gzer thabs mkhreg dang bcas pa sel/ /sang phrom shun lpags ? dka' i /me tog rgyu shug 'dab ma rnams/ /zho spris sbrang rtsi ka pi ta'i/ /khu bar
181b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba blud na phan/ /rlung gis rtug 'gags shes cher ni/ /na zhing mkhrigs par byed pa dang/ /ba snabs khrag bcas skom gdungs la/ /'o mtshim par blud na phan/ /til mar mar gyi steng du ni/ /gzhos ma thag pa'i 'o ma blung/ /yang na e raN+Da'i
181b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa'am/ /bilba gzhon nu bskol ba blud/ /gla bsang nyi shu 'o ma yi/ /sum 'gyur gyi ni chu bskol ba/ /'khru ba gzer bcas sel bar byed/ /pi pi ling dman le sham/ /zhib tu bags pa'i phyi dang byin/ /de ni yun rings gnas pa yi/ /mkhreg pa sel?
182a1(mdo 'grel): bar byed par 'gyur/ /ma zhu med cing gzer gyis nyen/ /smyung ba la sogs pas nyams smad/ /khong rtsub me drod brtags nas ni/ /mar ni thal sman rno bcas sbyin/ /yang na rtsa ba chu bskol chu/ /zho dang chang gi dangs mar bskol/ /lce myang
182a2(mdo 'grel): tsha dang tsha ba lnga/ /til mar 'phral du nang 'joms byed/ /bca' sgra srang drug pi pi ling/ /mu la kru trug tes rgyam tsha/ /srang gnyis til mar bre gang dang/ /zho dang bskol ba'i til mar ni/ /'khru ba'i nad ni sel byed yin/ /sha dang 'o mar phyogs gcig/
182a3(mdo 'grel): btung dang 'jam rtsi bsku ba ru/ /til mar 'ba' zhig phyogs gcig sbyar/ /bshad mkhregs gzer ni 'joms byed yin/ /de ni rlung sel mchog yin la/ /rlung mkhrugs ma gtogs gzer mi 'byung/ /khams gzhan 'joms pas 'bar gyur
182a4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rlung ni rang gnas brten khyab ste/ /me drod chung la til mar ni/ /sbyar bas bde bar byed pa'i mchog /til mar bcas pa rlung gnas su/ /mkhregs pa gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /dri ma zang cing nang gzhan rang gi ni/ /gnas las 'phos pas
182a5(mdo 'grel): rlung ni stobs che ba/ khong pa gzer zhing mkhreg par byed pa la/ /phyi nang til mar mas btang su zhig 'tsho/ /gzhang ni 'byung bar gyur ba la/ /'o mar bskol ba'i mar rgya shug/ skyur ba'i tsing+ga ri'i khu gzho dang dong krar btags pa blung/ /skyur
182a6(mdo 'grel): ba de nyid bcug pa dang/ /'u su na le sham zir/ /kha ru tsha dang tsha ba lnga/ /se'u 'bru dag dag sbyar ba ni/ /zhig tu btags pa'i lde gu phan/ /rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba yi/ /zur ba shu? ti'u? rta 'am/ /shu dag tsi tra ka sbyar ba'i snum gyi 'jam rtsi btang
182a7(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /mkhreg dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang/ /gcin sri rked ba na ba la/ /mngar dang skyur bar bskol ba yi/ /mar ram til mar 'jam rtsi btang/ /gzhang 'brum gzhug pa dga' ba la/ /bsku zhing dugs ni 'jam bya sa gzhug/ /dbus su
182b1(mdo 'grel): phug pa'i pags pa ni/ /'ur thil 'ching ba dag kyang bya/ /rtsa ba lnga yi chen po yi/ /khu ba dang ni 'o mar bskol/ /bya ba rgyu ma bton pas kyang/ /rlung 'joms lde gu lta bu bya/ /til mar bskol gzhang 'byung ba la/ /btung dang bskubs de gso
182b2(mdo 'grel): byag? mkhris pa ma zhu rno dang dro/ /spangs la sngon bzhin smyung ba bya/ /skom byas yan lag drug pa'i chu/ /rtsa mkhris thal tres bcas pa blud/ /bkres na kha zas thug pa sogs/ /gri hi sogs nya'u shing/ /kha la rnams gnyis bar+Ni gnyis//
182b3(mdo 'grel): bskol ba drong skyed byed pa phan/ /blung kyang rjes su 'brel gyur na/ /dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang/ /bong da dkar po bcas btags phye/ /sbrang rtsi bsres pa 'bras chu blud/ /pa ta dug mo nyung shun 'bras/ /skyer pa pi pi ling rtsa'am/ /bong nga bilba dug
182b4(mdo 'grel): mo nyung/ /gla sgang ba li ka bskol ba 'am/ /yang na bong nga bkar mur ba/ /skyer pa dngul rdo dug mo nyung/ /bong nga bca' sga dug mo nyung/ /gla sgang katpal sbrang rtsir bcas/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon ni/ /srang gcig bskol ba'i khu ba blud/ /gang zhig sha
182b5(mdo 'grel): khu bcas sbyar za/ /mkhris bcas lto ba'i nang sel 'gyur/ /de bzhin gla sgang bskol ba'i khu/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud pas phan?/ /shalma li yi 'dab ma'i rtsa/ /bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba'am/ /rtsa mkhris gla sgang dug mo nyung/ /skyer khaN+Da dang bcas pa 'am
182b6(mdo 'grel): yang na skyer pa ba li ka/ /bilba'i rkang dang byi tsher ba/ /til dang ser phrom many+dza ra/ /btsong dang pad+ma ud+pa? la/ /dong kra da dka' i me tog/ /se'u 'bru'i shun pa utpal bcas/ /tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad sbyor ba/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'bras chung blud
182b7(mdo 'grel): skyer ba sang phrom dug mo nyung/ /sug smel ? smin 'khru sel/ /ser phrom dang ni a parta/ /pra yi ku sogs sde tshan dang/ /bskol ba so so blud de bzhin/ /pu rtse shel dang shing mngar dang/ /se'u 'bru'i myu gu spra yi ku/ /zho dang 'u su'i 'bras
183a1(mdo 'grel): bur bcas/ /thug ba lde? gu sbyar thug bya/ /de bzhin bilba ka bi tha/ /a mra 'dam bu'i rkang las sbyar/ /smin pa'i khu bar ra'i 'o ma/ /mchog tu phan te des kyang ni/ /stobs ldan nad gzhi che ba'i phyir/ /ma zhi na ni bkru sman btang/ /rims
183a2(mdo 'grel): kyis bshang ba khrag dag tu/ /gang zhig 'khru bar gyur ba la'ang/ /pa la sha yi 'bras bu yi/ /khu pa dang sbyar 'o ma blud/ /de nas 'o ma dro 'jam tsam/ /nyams stobs ji bzhin blung bar bya/ /de ni dri ma bsal bas na/ /lto yi nang ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyi lce ba

183a7(mdo 'grel): dug mo nyung na bu ram phran/ /ltar bskol dug ma nyung sogs sde/ /aM brta sogs sbrang rtsir bcas/ /lde gus 'khru ba thams cad sel/ /smin zhing nad med mi drod cha/ /khrag dang bcas par ring nas 'khru/ /sna tshogs mdog tu 'khru
183b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba/ sman 'bum bcos pa sbyar bar bya/ /katpa la yi shun lde gu /bilba'i lwo? mas dkyis nas ni/ /'jim pas bskus de me nang bsreg/ /khu ba btsir las bsgrangs ba ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'am kha ra bcas ba ru /'khru ba can la ci rigs blud/ /de bzhin

183b6(mdo 'grel): ri dags khrag gi mang brngos sbyin/ /'o ma dang bza' 'o ma btung/ /'o ma srub mar zhag gsum bsten/ /yang na gong ma srog gi ni/ /sha khu dang zas nang med 'gyur/ /nye shing btags ba 'o ma dang/ /lhan cig blud cing 'o mar bza' //
183b7(mdo 'grel): yang na de dang bskol ba yi/ /mar gyis tshad 'khru myur du sel/ /rgya skyegs bca' sga bi pi ling/ /skyer ba'i shun ba pu tse shel/ /dug mo nyung dang bcas bskol mar/ /thugs sla thug pa dang sbyor bas/ /nad gzhi gsum las
184a1(mdo 'grel): byung ba yi/ /mi bzad 'khru ba'ang myur du sel/ /sa nag dung dang shing mngar dang/ /sbrang rtsir khrag 'bras chur blud/ /khrag ni 'khru ba sel bar byed/ /pri ya ku dang sbrang rtsi 'ang phan/ /til nag btags

184a5(mdo 'grel): btang nas ni/ /be sna pas 'khru dang gzhang 'byung dang/ /mkhreg a'i nad rnams sel byed cing/ /skem po stobs ni skyed par byed// stag tsher ba dang bskol ba li/ /mar gyi 'jam rtsi btang bar bya/ /dang por bshad pa khrag
184a6(mdo 'grel): 'dres 'byung/ /yang na phyis ni 'khru gyur pa/ /de la nyem shing bskol ba'i mar/ /lte gu'i don du sbyar bar bya/ /kha ra cha phyed dang sbyar la/ /sbrang rtsi bzhi cha bcug pa yi/ /mar sar phan pa'i zas zos na/ /nang med myur du
184a7(mdo 'grel): sel bar 'gyur/ /u duM ba ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /a shadtha yi myu gu ni/ /brdungs te zhag gcig chu nang spangs/ /mnyes te btsags par mar bskol la/ /kha ra de yi phye btab cing/ /sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab ste blud/ /gang zhig khrag ni
184b1(mdo 'grel): thur? du 'am/ /gyen du 'byung bar byed la sbyin/ /bad kan 'khru ba rlung bshad pa'i/ /ma zhu smin bya mchog tu bya/ /rjes su 'brel pa de la ni/ /bilba gzhon nu gla sgang dang/ /a ru ra dang bca' sga bskol/ /sbyin cing mi drod bskyed pa zlud/ /shu nga gdong
184b2(mdo 'grel): ? TAM ka/ pu di ka dang thang shing dam /pi pi ling gnyis kru trug tres/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba 'am/ /pa tra tsi tra dug mo nyung/ /shu dag bi pi ling rtsa ba/ /bu tsa shel dang a ru ra/ /bskol ba 'am yang na btags pa sbyin/ /bad kan tshad par 'khru
184b3(mdo 'grel): smad blud/ /kha ru tsha dang tsha ba gsum/ /shu dag shing kun bong de dkar/ /a ru ra yi chu tshan bcas/ /bad kan 'khru bas nyen la blud/ /ka pit+ta yi rkang dang ni/ /tsha gsum sbrang rtsi sha kha ra 'am/ /katpa la dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /sto yi nang ni sel byed yin/ /pi
184b4(mdo 'grel): pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /tsi tra ka dang dar bar bcas/ /bilba gzhon nu byin na yang/ /'khru ba'i nang ni sel bar byed/ /pa ta gla sgang mon dza ra/ /bilba dong kra dad ka 'am/ /bu ram da rar bcas pa yis/ /'khru ba shin tu gso dka' ang sel/ /bi pi ling rtsa
184b5(mdo 'grel): la la phud/ /dri bzang bzhi dang dong gra dang/ /na le sham dang kru trug tres/ /'u su zi rab li ka/ /kha ru tsha rnams cha mnyams dang/ /da trig dang ni dad ki/ /bilba dang ni pi pi ling/ /se'u 'bru dang ni la la phud/ /sum 'gyur ka ra drug 'gyur dang/ /ka bit+ta ni
184b6(mdo 'grel): brgyad 'gyur byas/ /phye mas tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad/ /zad byed skran dang lkog ma'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams/ /gzhang 'brum cham pa yi ga 'chus sel/ /mig rkang dang ni dri sna bzhi/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis la la phud/ /'u su zir zho
184b7(mdo 'grel): bzhi bzhi/ /pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /srang ni re re se'u 'bru dang/ /kha ra srang brgyad cag sbyar 'di/ /phye ma se'u 'bru brgyad ba yin/ /yon tan gong ma dag dang 'dra/ /kha zas rlung gis 'khru bar bshad/ /sbyar thug la sogs ci rigs sbyin/ /na le
185a1(mdo 'grel): sham dang bi TAM ka /ka bi ta dang dong grar bcas/ /tsang gi ri dang rgya shug skyur/ /sbyar dug bad kan 'khru ba sel/ /bad kan zang la sngar bshad pa'i/ /rgya skyegs la sogs srang drug pa/ /nas thug dang ni bsres pa yi/ /mar ni
185a2(mdo 'grel): rnying pa sbyin par bya/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis bkag pa/ /bad kan shas cher 'khru ba'am/ /gzer zhing mkhreg par byed ba la/ /sbyin bag 'jam rtsi bsngags pa yin/ /shu dag bilba pi pi ling/ /ru rta shu ti rgya mtshar bcas/ /bilba'i mar ram
185a3(mdo 'grel): til mar ni/ /shu dag sogs dang bskol ba btang/ /bad kan rlung gis shas cher gzir /cung zad dro ba'i 'jam rtsi btang/ /bad kan zad cing yun ring du/ /'khru zhing nyams chung gyur pa na/ /rlung ni nges par stobs che bas//
185a4(mdo 'grel): rang gi gnas na brten te skye/ /de stobs che bas 'phral gsod byed/ /de phyir de ni myur du gso/ /rlung gi rjes la mkhris pa ste/ /mkhris pa'i rjes la bad kan ni/ /gso ba 'am gsum las dang por ni/ /gang zhig shas cher gyur pa
185a5(mdo 'grel): gso/ /'jigs dang mya ngan dag las kyang/ /myur du 'khrubs pas de phyir dang/ /rlung bsal ba yi gso ba dang/ /dbugs dbyung ba dang dga' bar bya/ /gang zhig gcin med phyi sa dang/ /phyin ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ /me drod
185a6(mdo 'grel): che zhing lto ba yang/ /de yi khong nad zhi ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas las le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas po ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /pho ba la ni brten pa'i nad/ /ma zhu ba
185a7(mdo 'grel): ltar gso bar bya/ /'khru bar bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /de yi ma zhu smin par bya/ /zas kyi dus su nas thug sogs/ /tsha ba lnga sogs ldan pa dang/ /tsha bro yang pa'i kha zas dang/ /gzhan yang drod skyed sbyor ba sbyin/ /ma zhur thug ba po dang? dkar
185b1(mdo 'grel): bca' sga skyur dang bcas pa sbyin/ /btung bar 'khru ba las bshad pa'i/ /chu dang dar ba chang sogs blud/ /pho ba'i nad la dar ba ni/ /drod bskyed 'khru gcod yang bas na/ /phan te zhu rjes mngar ba'i phyir/ /mkhris pa rkyed par mi byed do/ /bska zhing drol
185b2(mdo 'grel): sbyong byed dang/ /rtsub phyir bad kan la yang phan/ /mngar skyur kha bas rlung la phan/ /bsrubs ma thag tu tsha mi bskyed/ /skyur ba bzhi po bre gang dang/ /tsha ba gsum ni srang gsum dang/ /rgya tsha srang bzhi khar ni/ /srang brgyad phye mar byas ba de//
185b3(mdo 'grel): tshong ma sran tshod btung ba sogs/ /btung ngo drug sogs la yang gdab/ /ma zhu lung pa dbugs mi bde/ /yi ga 'chus dang skran mchin pa/ /pho ba'i snying nang skya rbab 'joms/ /dong gra gla sgang bo dang dkar/ /bskal ba ma zhu sel byed blud
185b4(mdo 'grel): de yi lde gu chu tshan nam/ /bca' sga 'am a ru ra bcas blud// shu dag la sogs rgyam tshar bcas/ /yang na chang dang sbyar ba blud/ /bshang ba ma smin 'khru bcas la/ /se'u 'bru'i chu dang bcas pa yi/ /bilba dong kratsi tra ka/ /khu ru tsha na
185b5(mdo 'grel): btags ba sbyin/ /bad kan rlung gyur ba snabs can/ /khong ba gzer la dug mo nyung/ /shin tu bong nga kha ru tsha/ /shu dag a ru ra chu dron/ /skyug pa'i rjes la gzer zhing sgong/ /a ru ra dang kha ru tsha/ /zir na le sham bcas phye/ /chu
185b6(mdo 'grel): dron dang ni bcas par blud /do dgra pa ta pi pi ling/ /thal tres 'bri ha ti gnyis dang/ /dug mo nyung dang tsi tra ka/ tsha ba rnam lnga thal sman gnyis/ /phyir btags chang zho de'i dangs ma/ /chu dron rang skyur dag las blud/ /des ni me drod 'phel
185b7(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /khong pa'i rlung ni sel mchog yin/ /lan tshwa lnga dang thal sman gnyis/ /tsha ba lnga dang na le sham/ /la la phud dang shing kun las/ /skyur rtsi chen po'i ma se 'bru 'am/ /rgya shug khu bas ril bur byas/ /smin dang drod skyed byed 
186a1(mdo 'grel): mchog yin/ /bal bu'i lo ma dbyi mo dang /pi pi ling ni srang re dang /pi pi ling dang de rtsa srang/ /gnyis gnyis bca' sga srang gsum dang /dri sna bzhi dang pu shel tse/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis phyir zhib btags/
186a2(mdo 'grel): pu raM suM 'gyur dag gis ni/ /ril bu byas pa rtag tu bza' / /de rjes yu sha sha/ /du chang/ /chang rnying po ma zho kha chu/ /thug ba blud na rlung dang ni/ /bad kan las gyur slon bro dang/ /pho ba'i rtsi bi logs snying ga na/ /rims dang 'or nad skya
186a3(mdo 'grel): rbab dang/ /skran dang chan nad gzhang 'brum dang/ /cham pa mchil ma dbugs mi bde/ /lung ba rnams ni 'joms bar byed/ /bshad pa 'gags la de nyid ni/ /bca' sga go ru a ru ra/ /bcug ste de la sbyin par bya/ /mkhris
186a4(mdo 'grel): gyur slon bro la sogs la/ /kha ra bzhi 'gyur bcas par ni/ /bskol ba las ni ril bu bya/ /yang na bu ram kha ras bya/ /me dang phrad par gyur ba las/ /de ni mchog tu yangs bar 'gyur/ /de bas 'di ni ma zhu smin/ /rlung
186a5(mdo 'grel): las gyur ba'i pho nang la/ /drod bskyed sman dang bcas pa dang/ /mar ni nyung zad nyung zad blud/ /me drod chung zhing skyes gyur nas/ /bshad gci rlung ni 'gags gyur na/ /zhag ni gnyis gsum snum btang dugs/ /bsku byas
186a6(mdo 'grel): mas btang drag po bya/ /de nas o raNda'i ma raM/ /seng phro ma gyi ni mar dang ni/ /thal sman dag gis rlung zhi nas/ /g.yos ba'i nad la bkru sman btang/ /sbyangs nas khong pa ? ba 'gyur te/ /bshad pa 'gags la 'jam rtsi
186a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /drod bskyed skyur zhing rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman btsos til mar de la btang/ /de ltar bkru sman drag bkru sman/ /'jam rtsi chog bzhin byas nas/ /kha zas yang ba dang ldan pa'i/ /zhun mar slar yang bsten bar bya/ /rtsa ba
186b1(mdo 'grel): lnga dang tsha ba gsum/ /a ru ra dang lde myang cha/ /ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /thal smin rnam gnyis gzir dang/ /pi TAM da dang zur ba mar/ /tsha dang skyur rtsi chen po yi/ /khu ba dang ni sge'u gsher dang/ /la phug sgam po rgya shug skyur/ /se 'bru tsug
186b2(mdo 'grel): ? ga'i khu ba/ /dar ba zho dang chang dangs dang/ /rtsa ba mo dangs ma rtsa ba mo dang/ /skyur btsags dang ni de bskol ba/ /me drod bskyed ba'i dam pa yin/ /gzer dang skran dang dmu rdzing dang/ /lung ba dbugs mi bde ba dang/ /rlung dang bad kan 'joms
186b3(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /yang na skyur rtsi chen po yi// khu ba bskol ba'i mar blud bya/ /'di yis til mar bskol ba yis/ /bsku byug byas na rlung sel to/ /rlung dang bad kan 'dres ma zhuAm/ /bad kan rlung shas che ba'am/ /sman ni 'di dag nyid kyi phye//
186b4(mdo 'grel): chu dron sbyar ba blud par bya/ /mkhris pas me drod nyams gyur ba/ /bkru sman dag gam slon sman btang/ /yang dang yang du 'khru gcod dang/ /tsha mi bskyed pas drod bskyed bya/ /phye ma snum dang kha ba yi/ /me drod nye bar bskyed par bya/ /ba
186b5(mdo 'grel): ? la dang kyi lce ba/ /nimpa bu tse shel rtsa mkhris/ /barba ta dang dug mo nyung/ /shun bags 'bras bu mur ba dang/ /shing kun ra bo'i 'bras bu dang/ /shu dag skyer ba'i shun wags ba/ /shug pa dang ni pu shel tse/ /tsan dan gla sgang la la
186b6(mdo 'grel): phung/ /sa nag bod nga tshi ba gsum// shing tsha sug smel thang shing dang/ /gand+ha ba tra bye ma ni/ /sbrang rtsi'i lde gur byas bza' ba'am/ /chang dam chu dang sbyar 'thungs na/ /snying nad skya rbab pho ba'i nad/ /skran gzer rims dang yi ga 'chus/ /mig
186b7(mdo 'grel): ser 'dus pa'i nad dang ni/ /kha ba'i nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /rtsa mkhris gla sgang pu tse shel/ /tsha ba gsum dang dug mo nyu ba/ /tsi tra ka ni chag nyis dang/ /dug mo nyung gi shun pags ni/ /bcu drug cha sbyar zhib tu btags/ /de ni
187a1(mdo 'grel): bu ram chu grang blud/ /pho ba'i nad dang skran sel zhing/ /mig ser skya rbab rims kyi nang/ /yi ga 'chus dang 'khru ba 'joms/ /dong kra bong nga gla sgang dang/ /pa ta bal ba skyar khan dang/ /dug mo nyung gi sa
187a2(mdo 'grel): bon dang /tik+ka da da ka'i me tog/ phye mar btags pa sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /'bras grus chu dang blud na ni/ /mkhris ba las gyur pho ba'i nad/ /mkhreg 'khrug gzhang 'brum gzhang kha na/ /khrag tu 'khru ba dag la 'ang phan//
187a3(mdo 'grel): tsan dan shug pa pu shel tse/ /pa ta mur be gla ba dang/ /shu dag thal tres dbyi mo dang/ /lo ma bdun pa ba sha ka/ /pa to la dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /u dum+ba ra a shadtha/ /blug sha ka bi tha na dang/ /bu tse shel dang li ga dur//
187a4(mdo 'grel): nimpa srang ni gnyis gnyis la/ /chu bre bcu drug bskol ba der/ /ki ra tik+ta dug mo nyung/ /ram nye tik+ta pi pi ling/ /bskol ba de 'thungs mkhris pa yi/ /pho ba'i nad la blud bar bya/ /mdzer bshad tik+ta'i mar yang blud//

187b2(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin du byas pa'i chang/ /phan pa'i zas dang bcas bsten na/ /pho ba'i nad ni thams cad sel/ /de bzhin rgun 'brum bu ram shing/ /'bra go'i khu ba bsnan pa blud/ /shing kun shu dag pu tse shel/ /bo nga pa ta dug mo nyung/ /gze ma tsha ba lnga

187b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis 'thungs nas ni/ /zhu bas/ bzas mngar zos na/ /des ni bad kan rlung nang ni/ /kun dang dug dang dbyig dug 'joms/ /rtsa mkhris dang ni pu tse shel/ /ba tol nimpa parwa ta/ /bsregs la ma he'i gcin dang ni/ /'thungs na me drod skye byed

187b7(mdo 'grel): gsum dang a ru ra/ /nas tshig 'khrus thal sa rdzi ka'i/ /thal sman lan tshe lnga po rnams/ /phyer btags dro 'jam chu dang blud/ /mdog stobs me drod 'phel byed yin/ /bad kan can gyi pho ba'i nad/ /rlung bcas de la mar dang bskol//

189b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bsku dang blugs pa dang/ /lus bcings pa ni bsal bas bya/ /nye zhing gzem bi da ri/ /rgun 'brum rtsa yi rtsa ba lnga/ /bskol ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang/ /kha ra btab pa blud par bya//

189b6(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar/ /rgun 'brum lde gu chu sbyar ba'am/ /rgun 'brum chur ni spangs pa blud/ /bad kan las gyur dugs byas la/ /skyug sman bza' ba rno dro sbyin/ /nas yos thal sman rno ba dang/ /dar ba bcas pa sbyin par
189b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /sug smil chang dang sbyar ba'am/ /skyu ru ra yi khu b dang/ /gzhang rus gze ma sug smel dang/ /tsha gsum sbrang rtsi chu bar bcas blud/ /yang na kaN+Da kA ri'i khu/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar ba blud bar bya/ /shi ti ba ri'i sa bon ni/
190a1(mdo 'grel): zhib btags dar bar sbyar ba blud/ /d+ha ba sadta bar+Ni dang/ /sle tres dong ka dug mo nyung/ /ke'u ka dang sug smrel dang/ /ka rany+dza bskol sbrang rtsir bcas/ /de sbyar thug pa 'am byu ru yi/ /phye ma 'bras
190a2(mdo 'grel): kyi chu dang blud/ /ta ba la yi 'bras bu'i chu/ /lan bdun btsags ? til mar bcas/ /nas tshig 'khus thal ba ta li/ /ba ri pa ta til thal chu/ /shing tsha sug sme na le sham/ /cha? dang sbyar ba
190a3(mdo 'grel): blud par bya/ /'di dag re re lde gur sbyin/ /bu ram so yis bcad cing bza' / /'dus pa'i bdag nyid can kun la/ /'di dag gnas skabs ji bzhin phan/ /rde'u chags ring po ma lon dang/ /rlung gis klad
190a4(mdo 'grel): nad sogs la'ang sbyar/ /rde'u chags nad ni mi bzad te/ /'chi bdag dang ni 'dra bar 'dod/ /gzhon ba'i tshe na snyan gyis gso/ /'phel nas 'dral bar 'os ma yin/ /de yi sngon byung tshul la ni/ /snum chos
190a5(mdo 'grel): la sogs rim pas bsngags/ /sru sru'i rtsa ba pra tog dang/ /a sman da ka pa si ri/ /nya shing lcam pa pu shel tshe/ /a ti ba la ba lu ka/ /spang ma 'bri sha da ni dang/ /sha ka'i 'bras bu bya gri gnyis/ /gungtha
190a6(mdo 'grel): gze me ku langtha/ /nas dang rgya shug ba ra na/ /ka ta ka yi 'bras bu dang/ /u sha ka sogs phye ma btab/ /'di dag khu ba mar bskol blud/ /rlung 'gyur rde'u 'jig bar byed/ /bra dog mi sha ra ma lo//
190a7(mdo 'grel): e raN+Da dang bra hi tI/ /kaN+Da kA ri gze ma dang/ /bu ram shing phran rtsa ba yi/ /lde gu zho dang sbyar te blud/ /rde'u chags bsil byed yin/ /ku sha 'jag mo 'dam bu dang/ /ku ta nye'u shing ig+ga tha//
190b1(mdo 'grel): sru sru'i rtsa ba 'jag zlum dang/ /bi da ri dang ba sa hi/ /'bras kyi rtsa ba gze ma dang/ /ba lu ga dang pa ta li/ /pa tur dang gla bar bcas/ /ba spru ba dang sri sha dang/ /de rnams bskol khu mar du bskol/ /ga
190b2(mdo 'grel): gon sa bon la sogs dang/ /utba la yi sa bon dang/ /shing mngar ni brag shun phye/ /de dag mkhris gyur rde chags sel/ /bar ra na sogs rlung 'joms te/ /sug smel ha ri nu ka'i sde/ /gu gul ru
190b3(mdo 'grel): rta na le sham/ /tsi tra ka dang bye'u rug ba/ /de dag lde gur byas pa gzhug /u sha ka yi sde tshan bcug/ mar bskol ba yis bad kan las/ /gyur ba'i rde'u myur du 'joms/ /rang rang sman ni 'di nyid kyis/ /thal sman
190b4(mdo 'grel): 'o ma thug sogs sbyar/ /tsi tra ka dang a ko la/ /ka ta ka da sha ka dang/ /utpa la yi 'bras bu rnams/ /bu ram bcas pa chu dron blud/ /rde phan 'jig bar byed ba'i mchog/ khrung khrung ma bod bu'i rus/ /gze ma ta la ba
190b5(mdo 'grel): tri ka? a za mo dang ko dampa'i/ /rtsa ba dang ni bca' sgra na'i/ /chang dam chu dron bcas pa blud/ /rde'u phran chags pa 'jig par byed/ /ma ri tsa ka'i sa bon gyi/ /phye ma sbrang rtsi sbyar ba dang/ /lug gi 'o ma zhag bdun ni//

190b7(mdo 'grel): chag pa sel/ /yang na lcam ba'i rtsa ba ni/ /gcin tu chan la sogs pa bud/ /yang na de la 'o ma byud/ /nad kyis nyen pa sel bar byed/ /a ru ra yi rus pa btsos blud/ /yang na 
191a1(mdo 'grel): 'o ma can zas bza' / /yang na barti? shi ka yi/ /rtsa ba 'bras bur bcas pa blud/ /gcin 'gags lhag ma rnams la ni/ /'di yi gso ba lhag ma'ang sbyar/ /pri ha tI sogs sde

191a4(mdo 'grel): sogs bskol ba'am/ /khyim bya'i sha yi khu ba blud/ /bi da ra dza la sogs dang/ /bskol ba'i brag zhun sbyin pa'am/ /yang na chang ni nad med blud/ /rta 'am shing rtar bskyon nas ni/ /mgyogs par 'gro bskyod 'gyur na/ /rde'u

191b2(mdo 'grel): zan ma zos shing bkra shis byas/ /pus mo sleb pa'i bang leb la/ /'dug pa'i mi yi bde bar brten/ /ro stod gan rgyal bzhag nas ni/ /gos ni dkris pa'i steng du gzhag/ de nas de yi skyid khung dag /bkug nas ras kyis

191b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i bar du btsir/ /de nas g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo dang/ /gung mo'i sen mo bregs nas ni/ /til mar bskus te rkub tu ni/ /srubs mtshams bar du gzhug par bya/ /rde'u lte ba'i gnyer ma nas/ /pho

191b7(mdo 'grel): mtho bar gyur nas cha dpyad kyis/ /legs pa kho nar dbral bar bya/ /gzhan du byas na de yi ni/ /rma nas gcin ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /skyes pa'i rma ni dbral nyes na/ /gcin 'dzag pa dang gcig tu 'gyur/ /chu so dbral pa'i rde'u rgyu/ /gcig las grub kyi gnyis
192a1(mdo 'grel): las min/ /zug rdu byung nas chu dron gyi/ /nang du de ni bcis par bya/ /de ltar khrag gis gang mi 'gyur/ /gang la mtshan mas 'o ma can/ /shing gi khu ba btsir bar bya/ /de nas gcin ni dag bya'i phyir/ /bu mar 'drangs pa sbyin pa dang/ /rmal mar
192a2(mdo 'grel): dang sbrang rtsi bsku/ /dus gnyis nas thug mar bcas pa'i/ /dro 'dzam? gcin bskyed zhag gsum blud/ /bu dam mang po'o ma dang/ /'bras chan nyung bzhag bcu sbyin/ /de nas 'bras bu skyur ba dang/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha khu sbyin/ /'o ma tsan shing sha khu yis//

192b1(mdo 'grel): sbyar pa ma byas la de nyid/ /gcin nang can ni kun la blud /skyer ba skyu ru ra bskol khu/ /sbrang rtsi bcas pa nang par blud/ /skyer pa thang shing 'bras bu gsum/ /gla sgang chu skol blud pa'ang phan/ /tsi tra skyer pa 'bras bu gsum/ dug mo nyung ni sbrang
