195a1(mdo 'grel): rnag ni logs par mi mdzag na/ /ba ra na sogs chu dron nam/ /shi ku sbrang rtsi blud pa 'am/ /de dang sbyar ba'i nas thug blud/ /rgya shug rgya sran nas kyi ni/ /yu sha dang ni bza' ba bsngags/ zhag bcu yan chad kyi lce ba//
195a2(mdo 'grel): mar btab seng phrom dag gis ni/ /nyams stobs ji bzhin sbyang bar bya/ /sbyangs nas tik+ka sbrang rtsi blud/ /'di la kun kyang skran lta bur/ /nad thabs ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /khong 'bras kun dang gnas skabs dang/ /thams cad du ni gu gu la btang
195a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin brag zhun rang rang gi/ /spyod pa bcas te khu bar blung/ /'bad de smin pa las bsrung bya/ /smin nas shin tu gso dka' yin/ /gzhan yang myur du tsha byed pas/ /khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/ /gal te gcin snyi las gyur na/ /gcin
195a4(mdo 'grel): sni ba yi gso bar bya/ /nu mar byung la 'di ltar ni/ /mi bcing thams cad rma ltar gso/ /dbral te nu zho 'zag pa dang/ /nu sor nag po mi gnod bsrung/ /ma rmin gnas skabs thams cad du/ /de yi nu zho btsir zhing bzho/ /rgyu rlugs rlung shas
195a5(mdo 'grel): cho ba la/ /dur bying snum can gis sbyang zhing/ /a mra'i 'bras bu ser phrom mar/ /e raN+Da dang skyi re pa'i/ /mar dang sman mar 'dren mar sbyin/ /de nas rlung 'joms sman khu snam/ /lde dgu mas btang drag por bya/ /sha khu bcas pa'i zas sbyin
195a6(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /shing mngar snum bkol 'jam rtsi btang/ /rlung 'dzoms du gag sku mnye bya/ /smin nas dral la rma ltar gso/ /rgyu rlugs khrag mkhris las gyur las/ /smin nas ma smin ji bzhin du/ /rma dang skrangs pa'i gso ba bya/ /rgyun tu khrags kyang dbyung
195a7(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /bad kan las gur skyer ba yis/ /phye ma ba gcin sbyar ba blud/ /'di la gnyid bya ma gtogs bar/ /bad kan rmon bu'i gso ba bya/ /smin nas dbral te dznA? ti yis/ /me tog go bye am go la/ /lo ma bdun pa pa to la/ /ni ba yung pa'i ta ka/ dug mong nyung
195b1(mdo 'grel): dang til mar bskol/ /rma sbyang phyir ni blud pa bsngags/ /tshil las gyur pa bye'u rug sogs/ /ba gcin sbyar te btags pa mgo ba'i bkru sman dag gis bya/ /rlig pa'i srubs ni ma gtogs par/ /'phel btsags kyis ni dpral nas ni//
195b2(mdo 'grel): tshil ni legs par dbyung bar bya/ /rma ni sbrang rtsi nag tshur dang/ /rgyam tsha nges par bskus nas bcom/ /de la tshil ni sbyang ba'i phyir/ /ldong ros sug smel sum na/ /go bye pi pi ling mU la/ /til mar dag ni bsku bar bya/ /rma ni 'byor par gyur gyi bar
195b3(mdo 'grel): snam dang dugs kyang bstan par bya/ /gcin byung snum gyi dugs bya zhing/ /ras ma phra mo dkri bar bya/ /srubs mtshams 'og tu dmu rdzing bzhin/ /legs par dbral te gzags par bya/ /rma bkag bcing dang 'byor par bya/ /rgyu ma byung bar
195b4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa dag/ rlig par phyin par ma gyur la/ /rlung gi rgyu rlugs bzhin du gso/ /ba sbru ba ni srad brgyad dang/ /rtsa ba bcu pa e raN+Da/ /a shwa gand+ha nyer shing dang/ /pa yas sa? dang du rba gnyis/ /'dam bu ku sha bu ram shing/ /a ha ga lar bcas pa ni/
195b5(mdo 'grel): re re srang ni bcu gcur byas/ /chu bre brgya rtsa nyi shur brgyad/ /bskol ba brgyad cha lus ba ru/ /der ni bu ram srang sum cu/ /e raN+Di yi mir bre do/ /'o ma mar ni bre do do/ /pi pi ling dad de rtsa ba/ /sing mngar rgun 'brum sle myang tsha/ /la la bud dang dong krang?
195b6(mdo 'grel): bzhug/ /de btsos skyid ba zhes bya/ /gzhon sha can gyi bcud len yin/ /rlung dang than pa lam du 'gro/ gzhon sogs bsrung ba bsdam mi dgos/ /skyid de ba dang phyug po dang/ /bde la brtan dang bud med dang/ /bud med rgan mo'i khyo dang ni/ /dpal bskyed?
195b7(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa bzlog byed cib/ /dus kun tu ni bsten gyur na/ /mdog mdangs sha ni rgyas byed cing/ /rgyu rlugs khong 'bras skran gzhang 'brum/ /pho mtshan mo mtshan rlung gis nyid? 'or nad dmu rdzing mchin pa dang/ /rtug skam nad ni sel byed mchog/ snum gyi bkru man 'jam rtsi yis/ /gol/
196a1(mdo 'grel): te rgyu rlugs ma zhi na/ /dang po 'jam rtsi brtad nas ni/ /de nas chu sor gnas pa ni/ /zla ba skam pa'i kha 'dra bas/ /rlung lam dgag phyir bsreg par bya/ /mthe bong steng gi rgyus pa ni/ /ser zhing snal ma 'dra ba gang/ /khab kyis bteg ste thad ka
196a2(mdo 'grel): ru/ /gang na nad yod bcad de bsreg /gzhan dag de las logs gzhan nam/ /srin lag sor mo bsreg ces zer/ /kha cig 'di ni bad kan rlung/ /las gyur skran mtsher la bya zer/ /bi sha tser nad gdan yod/ /mthe'u chung srin lag dag la bya//
196a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas las le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas skran gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung gyur skran ni mi bzad na/ /phyis phyen ni 'gags gyur na/ /rtsub dang grang byung rlung
196a4(mdo 'grel): nad la/ /phan pa'i til mar dag gis gso/ /zas skom 'jam rtsi sbyang ba dang/ /bsku byug snum tshos dugs dpyad bya/ /spo dang zug dang rangs pa dang/ /'gags pa la ni mchog tu bya/ /snum tshos dugs ni byas pa yis/ /bu ga'i rgyun srang gnyen
196a5(mdo 'grel): phyed la/ /rlung shas che ba gzhom bya zhing/ /phyi sa sri ba sel skran 'joms/ /lte ba yan chad skyes pa yi/ /skran la mchog tu snum klud phan/ /zhu ba'i gnas brten 'jam rtsi bya/ /lto bar gnas la gnyi ga bya/ /rlung can skran ni drong che la//
196a6(mdo 'grel): phyis rlung ni 'gags gyur la/ /bza' btung nyam rtas byed pa dang/ /snum dang dro ba sbyin par bya/ /rlung gyur skan la bad kan dang/ /mkhris pa bsrung zhing ni ru ha/ /'jam rtsi bcas pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /yang dang yang du bya ba yin/ /'jam rtsi
196a7(mdo 'grel): mchog tu skran 'joms par/ /shes bya des ni nang gi nad/ /dang po rang gi gnas su bcom/ /'phral du skran ni sel bar byed/ /de bas skran la rgyun tu ni/ /mas btang drag po 'jam rtsi bcas/ /btang bar gyur bas rlung bad kan//
196b1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i bdag nyid can rnams sel/ /shing kun dang ni tsha ba gsum/ /rtsa ba ru tsha dang kha ru tsha/ /se'u 'bru ma nu go snyod dang/ /zi ra 'u su la la phud/ /star bu ya bak+Sha ra dang/ /zur pa shu dag tsi tra ka /a za gand+ha sug smel dang/ /byi rug pa ni zho dang
196b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa mar bskol rlung gi skran sel zhing/ /gzer dang lto spos 'joms par byed/ /spa ma'i 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/ /zi ra go rnyod tsha ba lnga/ /a za mo dang lce myang tsha/ /zho dang 'o ma mar dang ni/ /se'u 'bru la phug rgya shug gi /khu ba bskol bas rlung
196b3(mdo 'grel): gi ni/ /skran dang dmu rdzing lto spos dang/ /rtsi ba logs snying dang lte ba gzer/ /mngal nad gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang/ /rims nad yig 'chus pa 'joms/ /rtsa ba bcu pa su sha bi/ /pa la ka sha ma nu dang/ /bra
196b4(mdo 'grel): sgrub? gnyis e ran dang/ /ra sna a shwa gand+ha dang/ /ga pra'i rtsa ba zur pa kar/ /sle tres gand+ha pa la sha/ srang ni gnyi gnyis tshad byas dang/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad nang du bskol/ /nad dang rgya shug rgya sran dang/ /ma sha bre rnye lhan cig tu/ /chu bre
196b5(mdo 'grel): bcu drug nang du bskol/ /khu ba der zho bre bzhi dang/ /mar bre gang dang slar bskol la/ /se 'bru a mra ta ka dang/ /kha lung khu ba bre rer bcas/ /de bzhin rtsab mo skyur tsha ba tsha/ /g.yer ma shu dag ga bri'i rtsa/ /ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /tsi tra//
196b6(mdo 'grel): ka/ dang 'u su dang/ /ya ba na ga la la phud/ /star bu zi ra nag po dang/ /go snyod zi ra spa mi'i 'bras/ /ka ra bi ra zangs rtsi ba/ /u sha ka dang dur byed dang/ /dan+ta murba bi tanga+ga?/ /se 'bru ta sti pi pi ling/ /gze ma spang spos sru'i ru'i
196b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa/ /ga gon rgyal mog gon gyi/ sa bon shu ti thal sman gnyis/ /bye'u rug pa thal tres dang/ /ni li ni yi 'bras bu dang/ /lan tsha gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /bcas pa'i zhe ni sman mang nges/ /sngar bshad nad ni gso dka' ba dang/ /rjed byed do smyo byed gcin
197a1(mdo 'grel): sri dang/ /rlung nang gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /'u su dbyi mong bi TAngka/ /tsi tra ka ni lde gur byas/ /'o ma mar bskol rlung skran 'joms/ /sgog skya'i rtsa ba srang brgyad dang/ /rtsa ba chen po lnga srang ldang/ /chu srang
197a2(mdo 'grel): stong dang de bskol la/ /gzhi tsha lus bas 'bru yi/ /bu ba chad dang 'bras khu skyur/ /zho rnams de yi phyed phyed dang/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /shing kun dbyi mod la la phud/ /dbyi mod ltar bu lce myang tsha/ /thang shing srang ni phyed phyed dang
197a3(mdo 'grel): mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol/ /rlung las gyur pa'i skran kun 'joms/ /gcod chen skabs su bshad pa yi/ /srang drug pa yi mar yang blud/ /'o ma'i skyin pa chad dngas sam/ /se 'bru zho spris sbyar ba'i mar/ /rlung las gyur pa'i sran mel to/ /rlung
197a4(mdo 'grel): las gyur ba'i sran sel to/ /rlung gi skran la bad kan 'phel/ /drod nyams yi ga 'chus pa dang/ /snying brgal khong lci snyom gyur pa/ /de la skyug sman btang bar bya/ /gzer ma lho spo bshad skri la/ /gnas shes byas nas snum bcas pa'i/ /sman mar sman gyi
197a5(mdo 'grel): phye ma dang/ /khu ba'i ril bur byas pa yi/ /rgya shug se 'bru chu don dang/ /dar ba chang dang skyur rtsabs dang/ /chang dangs bcas par mang bar blung/ /yang na phye ma la sogs pa/ /thub pa slo bor byas pa ni/ /nad par yang na zas sngon blung/ /phye ma kha lang khu ba dang/ /lan
197a6(mdo 'grel): mang sprus par gyur ba yi/ /las ni byed par nus gyur pas/ /ril bus rlung dang bad kan 'joms/ /shing kun shu thag a ru ra/ /a ji gand+ha se 'bru dang/ /'u su pa ta ti mus/ /ma nu zur pa dkar po dang/ /sba ma'i 'bras bu tsi traka/ /thal sman gnyis dang lan tshab
197a7(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /tsha ba gsum dang zir dang/ /dbyi mo de trig star bu'i phyes/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/ /snying gi'i rtsi ba logS chu so dang/ /mjug to mngal dang chu sor gzer/ /bad kan rlung shas gyur ba'i nas/ /gso dka' skran dang phyen dang ni/ /gcin dang phyis
197b1(mdo 'grel): 'gags pa dang/ /lkog mar 'gags shing snying nad dang/ /rkya rbab yig 'chus pa dang/ /mcher pa gzhang 'brum skyigs bu dang/ /rgyu rlugs lto sbos me drod nyams/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/ /rgyam tsha dang ni la la phud/ /a za mo dang pi pi ling/ /drong gra rim
197b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin cha res bskyed/ /thams cad dang ni cha mnyam pa'i/ /a rur bsres phye ma 'di/ /me ni mngon sum nyid yin no/ /tsha ba gsum dang ti mus/ /rgyam tsha dang ni zi ra gnyis/ /cha mnyam shing kun brgyad cha'i phyed/ /mar bsres kham gyi dang po zos/ /me drod drag po skyed byed
197b3(mdo 'grel): cing/ /rlung gi skran ni 'joms par byed/ /shing kun shu dag kha ru tsha/ /dreng gra dang ni la la phud/ /rnam rgyal ma nu ru rta dang/ /dur byed dan+ta'i rtsa bar bcas/ /cha re bskyed pa'i phye ma 'di/ /chu dron sbyar 'thungs lto ba'i nad/ /skra na dang dmu rdzing la sogs pa/ /seng+ge re dags
197b4(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams ni/ /mthu rtsal gyis ni zil non ltar/ /nad rnams 'joms par byed pa yin/ /lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling/ /a za mo dang a ru ba'i/ /phye ma chu dron sbyar blud na/ /skran can bad rlung las gyur tshogs/ /lcags mdangs lus phug bzhin du 'joms/ /ka rany+dza
197b5(mdo 'grel): yi lo ma dang/ /in+d+ra ba ru na dbyi mod/ /kru krug tres dang bcas sgra dang/ /pi pi ling dang na le sha/ ma lus rim bzhin rgyam chas bkab/ /bsreD la pa ta Ta te zho dang ni/ /zho kha chu sbyar blud pa dag /skran dang dmu rdzing 'or nad dang/ /skya rbab gzhang 'brum nad rnam
197b6(mdo 'grel): sel/ /shing kun sum 'gyur rgya mtsha dang/ /de las e raN+Ta yi mar/ /sum 'gyur de las sgog skyu yi/ /khu ba sum 'gyur sbyar ba dag /blud na skran dang dmu rtsing dang/ /rgyu rlugs gzer gi nad 'joms 'gyur/ /ba lung khu ba shing kun dang/ /se 'bru
197b7(mdo 'grel): rgyam tsha kha ru tsha/ /chung gi dangs ma sbyar blud na/ /rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad sel/ /bca' sga zho gnyis bu ram zho/ /gzhi dang til nag bkrus srang gcig /gcig tu phye mar btags byin cing/ /'o ma dro? 'jam rjes blud na/ /rlung gi snying nad skran gzhi'i
198a1(mdo 'grel): 'brum/ /mngal sel rtug pa 'gags pa sel/ /rlung gyur skran la e raN+ya'i/ /mar ni chang dang sbyar ba blud/ /bad rlung 'dre ba la 'ang de nyid blung/ /mkhris pa 'bres pa 'o ma bcas/ /gal te mkhris pa 'phes gyur te/ /tsha 'gyur rlung gi skran can la/ /bdun
198a2(mdo 'grel): par rjes su 'byin byed pa/ /snum bcas bkru sman btang bar bya/ /nges kyang tsha ba ma bri na/ /de la btang ga gdab par bya/ /sgog skya bshus pa skam po ni/ /srang bzhi chu dang 'o ma ni/ /brgyad 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol/ /'o ma 'dres pa blud gyur na/ /rlung 'gyur
198a3(mdo 'grel): sgran dang rtug 'gags dang/ /rlung nad gzugs 'khums mi zad rims/ /snying nad khong 'bras zad byed rnams/ /'o ma de yis myur du 'joms/ /til mar chang dang ba gcin dang/ /rang skyur ya bak+Sha rar bcas/ /rlung na skran dang dmu rdzing dang/ /lto
198a4(mdo 'grel): sgos cig car 'joms par byed/ /ci tra pi pi ling mU la/ /bca' sga shing kun e raN+Da/ /rgyam tsha kha ru tsha bcas pa/ /bskol ba rlung na gzer ba dang/ /lto spos rtug 'gags seb mchog dang/ /ma nu e ratna'i rtsa ba/ /nas dang bya tsher ba sha ka/ /chu dang
198a5(mdo 'grel): bskol te blung na ni/ /lto nad spos dang gzer 'jom byed/ /ma nu e raN+Da 'jag mI/ /rtsa ba thang shing bca' sga rnams/ /chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud/ /khong pa phrag pa rgyab gzer 'joms/ /brag zhun dang ni ba yas?/ /rtsa ba chen po lnga bskol ba/ /rlung
198a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur skran nad can la blud/ /rtug skam nad la nas kyi ni/ /chag tshe snum dang ldan pa sbyin/ /pi pi ling dang la phug gi khu bdag ni sbyar ba sbyin/ /nas kyi zan don 'o mar bcas/ /rlung gi rtag 'gags nas la sbyin/ /yang na mon sran dre'u yi/ /snum mang lan
198a7(mdo 'grel): tshwa ldan par sbyin/ /du ri byad dan+ti ni li ni/ /a ru ra dang kam+bi lya/ /nas tshig la bus thal kha ru tsha/ /dong kra mar dang bcas par ni/ /dri mar bcas par kru sman btang/ /ni li ni dang 'bras bu gsum/ /ra sna ba la bu tse she la/ /kaN+Da kA ri bi TAng+ga
198b1(mdo 'grel): srang re chu bre bzhi nang bskol/ /khu ba brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /mar bre gang dang zho bre gang/ /shu dag kri sna srang gcig bskol/ /de las mar srang re re ni/ /nas thug thug la sbyar te blud/ /zhu zhing legs par 'khus nas ni/ /sha khu bza' ba sbyin par bya/ /ni li ni yi
198b2(mdo 'grel): sman mar 'dis/ /skran mdzo dmu dzi da kho khams dang/ /'or nas skya rbab rims nad dang/ /sha kri mdzer ba smyo byed 'joms/ /khyim bya rma bya gong ma sreg /khrung khrung byes su sha khu dang/ /sa lu'i 'bras chan chad dang mar/ /rlung gi skran rde sel ba yin/ /nyung zhing snum
198b3(mdo 'grel): la sla zhing dro/ /kha zas rlung skran can gyis bza' / /btung bar chad gi dangs ma 'am/ /'u su bskol ba'i chu tshan blud/ /mkhris gyur skran ni snum dre las/ /'byung ba de la rgun 'brum dang/ /a ru ra bskol bu ram bcas/ /ki pi la dang sprang rtsi'am/ /cho ga 'am khrag
198b4(mdo 'grel): mkhres gsor bshad pa'i/ /bkru sman blud de 'khrus pa phan/ /rtsub dro las byung skran la ni/ /tig ta 'am ma sha ka bskol ba'i/ /mar ni blud par byas pa 'am/ /rtswa yi rtsa ba lnga pa 'am/ /'tsho byed sde tshan bshad pa 'am/ /mar bskol blud na mchog tu phan/
198b5(mdo 'grel): n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan nam/ /'tsho byed sde mtshan 'o ma phan/ /de yang bshal du med gyur par/ /sman pas bkru sman dang bskol ba'i/ /mar ram 'o ma dag gis ni/ /bkru sman nye bar btang bar bya/ /skye ru ra dang bur shing gi /khu ba mar ni bre gang dang//
198b6(mdo 'grel): a ru ni bzhi cha bcug /bskol ba'i mar blud mkhris skra nas la/ /yang na mkhris pa'i khong 'phris gsor/ /bshad pa'i seng phrom sman ram blud/ /rgun 'bram shing mngar pa yas sya/ /shug pa tsan dan sbrang rtsi rnams/ /'bras bkrus chu dang blud
198b7(mdo 'grel): na ni/ /mkhris pa'i skran ni sel bar 'gyur/ /kyi lce ba ni srang gnyis dang/ /chu re do ni bskol nas su/ /brgyad cha lus pa btsegs pa ni/ /de 'jam 'o ma cha mnyam blud/ /yang na de seng 'tshan ni/ /me drod ji bzhin blud par bya/ /de yis ming ni
199a1(mdo 'grel): bsal bas na/ /mkhris pa can gyi skran zhing 'gyur/ /cha la mar grang bsku ba 'am/ /bsil ba'i sman mar bcas pa bsku/ /chu skyes lo mas reg bya zhing/ /snod chus gang ba reg pa phan/ /gzer dang me drod bri 'gyur zhing/ /tsha
199a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i dang po tshul can gyis/ /mkhris pa'i skran la khyad par du/ /khrag ni lan mang byung ba phan/ /rtsa ba chad skran mi tsha zhing/ /nye bar zad par 'gyur ba dang/ /khrag ni skyur bar mi 'gyur la/ /khrag las gyur ba'i nad kyang med/ /gnyid cing nad
199a3(mdo 'grel): ni sel ba la/ /skam sar skyes pa'i sha khu brtas/ /rtas na nyes ba lhag lus la/ /slar yang mar ni bsten par bya/ /khrag dang mkhris pa 'phel 'gyur pas/ /skran ni smin par phyogs pa la/ /gso ba'i bya ba ma rnyed cing/ /mkhris pa'i
199a4(mdo 'grel): 'khor 'bras ltar gso bya/ /sa lu ba dang ra'i 'o ma/ /pa to la skam sa'i sha mar/ /ba ru sha ka skyur ru ra/ /rgun 'brum 'bro go se 'bru dang/ /kha rar bcos pa'i kha zas bza' / /btung ba ba la 'bri ha ti/ /la sogs bskol ba blud par bya/ /bad kan
199a5(mdo 'grel): las gyur dang po ni/ /slon bya de mi bzod smyung bya/ /kha dro tsha ba'i thug sogs kyis/ /rim par de 'og me drod bskyed/ /shing kun la sogs dang thal sman/ /shing kun stang bu nyis 'gyur btad/ /gal te 'bur ram ting ring 'gyur/ /tshor ba chung
199a6(mdo 'grel): zhing sra la brtan/ /lto spos la sogs ldan pa'i skran/ /dugs byas nas ni snyi bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur skran can gyis/ /mar tsha thal sman bcas cha blud/ /nas tshig 'khus thal tsha ba gsum/ /rgya mtsha shing kun kha ru tsha/ /se 'bru'i rtsa ba bcu
199a7(mdo 'grel): bskol mar/ /bad kan las gyur skran myur 'joms/ /bse shing 'bras bu srang gnyis dang/ /rtsa ba chung du lnga srang re/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus pa de dang ni/ /mhyam pa'i 'o ma mnyam pa'i mar/ /bi TAng+ga dang shing
199b1(mdo 'grel): kun dang/ /nas tshig 'khus thal lce myang tsha/ /kaN+Da ka ri rtsa ba ru tsha/ /zur bar sna shing mngar dang/ /pi pi ling dang dong kra rnams/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis bcas par bskol/ /go phye yi ni sman mar 'di/ /bad kan skran ni sel ba'i mchog /mchis
199b2(mdo 'grel): pa mtsher ba'i nad dang ni/ /skya rbab dang ni pho ba'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/ /de nas skran can de yi lus/ /ma lus par ni dugs byas la/ /skran kun la ni thog ma nyid/ /snum 'chos dugs ni byas gyur na/ /gso ba gang zhig
199b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba de/ /grub pa'i rtsub chos kyis mi 'grub/ /snum zhing dugs kyis brlan lus kyi/ /skran ni rnying par gyur pa dang/ /ji skad bshad pa'i bum pa ni/ /bzhag pas bskongs nas de gsal bya/ /de nas ras nad chung byas
199b4(mdo 'grel): te/ /tshad shes pa yis skran dbral bya/ /shing sbyang ras mig me long rnams/ /ji snyed pa yis legs par bcing/ /de skran gcig pu dbye bya yi/ /snying dang rgyu mar reg ma bya/ /til dang zar ma'i sa bon dang/ /yungs kar a
199b5(mdo 'grel): raN+Da yis byug /bad kan skran ni lcags kyi snod/ /dro 'jam tsam gyis dugs bya'o/ /de ltar gnas las bskyod nas ni/ /bad kan skran la snum bcas pa'i/ /bkru sman dang ni 'jum rtsi dang/ /rtsa ba bcu pa ldan par
199b6(mdo 'grel): sbyang/ /pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra/ /rgun 'brum sha ma dur byid sogs/ /srang re dang ni bskol ba las/ /e raN+Da yi zhun mar ni/ /re re 'o ma drug 'gyur dang/ /lhan cig bskol bar gyur pa 'di/ /'dres pa'i sman
199b7(mdo 'grel): mar zhes bya ste/ /skran can 'khru bar byed pa'i mchog /rgyu rlugs khong 'bras gzer ba ni/ /rlung gi nad la bdud rtsi yin/ /yang na ni li ni sman mar/ /srang gnyis tshad du blud pa 'am/ /de bzhin skyid de ba'i smon? par/ /dmu rdzing skabs bshad
200a1(mdo 'grel): mar yang phan/ /danda tsi tra a ru ra/ /srang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /brgyad cha lus btsags a ru ra/ /bcas pa bu ram dandar mnyam/ /bcug la til mar dur byid phye/ /srang bzhi bca' sga pi
200a2(mdo 'grel): pi ling/ /zho gnyis bskol grangs lde gu de/ /sgrang tsi til mar cha mnyam pa/ /dri sna bzhi bzhis srang re gzhug /de las a ru ra gcig dang/ /lde gu srang gcig bcas zos na/ /bde bar nad ni bre gang 'khru/ /skran dang snying nad gzhang 'brum na/ /glo nad da lto spos
200a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i nad/ /mdze dang dmu rdzing nad slong dang/ /yi ga mchus dang mcher pa'i nad/ /skya rbab mig ser 'joms par byed/ /'di ni dan+ti ci tra ka/ /a ru ra yi lde gu yin/ /su ta k+Shi ra'i rlan dang ni/ /bur byid dang ni legs bsregs te/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi zhi gnyis
200a4(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /lnga gu legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/ /ru rta dur bying a ru ra/ /dan+ta gu gul nas tshig 'khus/ /ba gcin bcas blud yang na ni/ /gu gul nyi tshe ba gcin blud/ /cho ga grub pa las bshad pa'i/ /bkru sman drag po skran 'joms btang ba rtsa ba thug cing lhun
200a5(mdo 'grel): che la/ /sra zhing lci la tshor ba med/ /gting ring ma smin pa yi skran/ /thal sman dang ni chad rnying dang/ /me yi las kyis bsam par bya/ /bad kan shas che thal sman ni/ /gzhang 'brum rde'u pho ba'i nad/ /gso ba'i skabs bshad btang bya zhing/ /zhag gcig
200a6(mdo 'grel): zhag gnyis kyis chod pa/ /yang na zhag gsum ngal sos la/ /lus kyi nyams stobs nad dag ni/ /'phel 'bri'i las la brtson par bya/ /thang shing dur byed danda dang/ /pu rtse shel dang cha ba lnga/ /brdzi ka thal nas tshig khus/ /pa ta dang ni 'bras
200a7(mdo 'grel): bu gsum/ /ru rta ba ser su gand+ha/ /zi ra nag po srang phyed phyed/ /lan tshwa lnga ni srang re dag /brtags pa'i phye ma til mar dang/ /zhag dang zha dang mar dang sprus/ /rdza mar du ba ma sher bsreg/ /rdza ma mi yi mdog 'gyur de'i/ /thal ba blang pa 'o ma
200b1(mdo 'grel): mar/ /dar ba chad sogs sbyar te blud/ /skran dang rtug 'gags rgyu rlugs dang/ /gzhang 'brum dmu rdzing pho ba'i nad/ /srin nad rjed byed smyo byed gdon/ /mngal nang khu chu las gyur rde'u/ /byi ba sbrul gyi dug rnams kyang/ /thal ba'i sman 'dis sel bar byed/ /bang
200b2(mdo 'grel): kan las gyur sgran la snum/ /sha khu 'o ma mar bsten la/ /thal sman btang na skran dag ni/ /gnas nas dum bu dum bu ru/ /bcad nas thur du 'byin par byed/ /me drod chung zhing yi ga 'chus/ /chad goms snum can za ba la/ /rgyun srang nges? phyir mnan srang dang/ /chad rnying
200b3(mdo 'grel): skyon med blud par bya/ /sa lu drug cu pa rnying pa/ /rgya sran skam sa'i srog chags sha/ /tsi tra su ti ka rasdza/ /agni mandal la phud/ /ba ra ni yi myu gu dang/ /shi kru pilba gzhon nu dang/ /la phug gzhon nu skam po dang/ /kha lud shing kun star bu dang/ /'bru nas tshig 'khrus thal ba//
200b4(mdo 'grel): cha ba gsum dang ngar ba dang/ /mar dang til mar kha zas sbyin/ /btung bar chad gi dangs ma dang/ /skyur rtsa bas dar ba zho ga chu/ /bi ta la la phud phye ma/ /rtsa ba lnga bskol khu ba 'am/ /rgun chad snying pa blud par bya/ /pi pi ling dang de rtsal/ /go stong rgyam tsha kru trug tre//
200b5(mdo 'grel): chang gi snyigs mar bsres ba yis/ /skran ni myur du sel bar byed/ /slon dang smyung ba dugs dang ni/ /sman mar blung dang kru sman dang/ /'jam rtsi thal sman man na chad dang/ /chad rnying ril bu phan zas kyis/ /bad kan skran can gting zug pas/ /gal te zhi bar ma gyur na/ /de la khrag dbyung tha mar ni

200b7(mdo 'grel): bu'i lags ni bsregs pa ngam/ /tin+tu ka yi shing gis bsreg /de nas bsil bas me dpal ni/ /zhi nas rma ltar gso bar bya/ /ma zhu rjes 'brel smyung byas na/ /thug pa sogs kyis me drod bskyed/ /rang rang rim dang 'dres pa las/ /'dren ma'i gsogs

201a2(mdo 'grel): khrag las gyur pa'i skran dang ni/ /bud med zla mtshan med la blud/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba pi pi ling/ /thang shing ka rany+dza'i shun pa/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba yi/ /phyi ni til bskal chur sbyar ba/ /blud na khrag skran nad sel byed/ /pa la sha yi thal ba ni/ /bre brgyad til
201a3(mdo 'grel): mar mar bre brgyad/ /bskol te tshad bzhin blud na ni/ /sgran ni snyi bar byed pa yin/ /gal te snyi bar ma gyur na/ /mngal gyi bkru sman btang bar bya/ /til gyi lde gu thal sman bcas/ /yang na su dag k+Shi rar sbyar/ /yang na de nyid dang bsres pa'i/ /nya ni kha bo btang bar

204a6(mdo 'grel): sta phyir ni 'byin par byed/ /dug gis myur du 'jig par byed/ /de bzhin nad med 'gyur ba 'am/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /nad bsal nad de chu grang gi/ khrus byas 'o ma 'am thug ba blud/ /dur byid kyi ni tshod ma'am/ /rya sne'u
204a7(mdo 'grel): man+ti ka pa rni/ /ka la sha ka sne'u yi/ /khu ba dang ni bskol ba la/ /skyur dang lan tshwa snum med cing/ /shin tu tshos pa'am ma chos min/ /zas med zla ba gcig sbyin la/ /de nas bskol na khu ba blud/ /de ltar zla ba gcig gi bar//
204b1(mdo 'grel): tshod ma nad ni bsal gyur nas/ /nyams chung ba la rtas byed pa/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma blud par bya/ /mcher ba'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi ni/ /ji bzhin chos snum dug bya ste/ /zho dang 'bras chan bcas byin la/ /lag pa g.yon nas gtang ga gdab/ /nyams stobs bskyed nas slar
204b2(mdo 'grel): yang ni/ /snum blung nas ni sbyang bar bya/ /rgya mtsho'i nyi phyis thal sman dang/ /'o ma sbyar ba blud par bya/ /mu ta ka rany+dza'i thal ba/ /skyur khu kha ru tsha dang ni/ /pi pi ling gi phye btab blung/ /shing kru bskol ba'i pi pi ling/ /rgyam tsha ci tra ka btab blud/ /shin
204b3(mdo 'grel): kun sogs phye thal sman dang/ /mar sbyar me drod ji bzhin sbyin/ /dong gra dan+ta pi pi ling/ /cha mnyam a ru ra gnyis 'gyur/ /ba ru tsha ni cha phyed bcas/ /phye ma chu dron sbyar ba blud/ /bi TI ka dang kru trug tres/ /phye dang rgya mtsho shu dag rnams/ /khams skyogs
204b4(mdo 'grel): nang sres 'o mar bcas/ /blud na skran dang mcher nad 'joms/ /rgya shug lo ma til mar bsres pa dang/ /legs par mnyes shing bsregs te de 'og tu/ /gtun bus btsir la de 'og 'o ma blud/ /mcher ba'i dmu rdzing tshogs na 'jig par 'gyur//
204b5(mdo 'grel): ro hi ta yi mjug ma gtubs/ /dum bu a ru ra bcas chu 'am/ /gcin gyi nang du zhag bdun ni/ /spangs la de ni blung gyur na/ /mig sar mcher ba skran gzhang 'brum/ /srin nad gcin snyi dmu rdzing 'joms/ /ro hi ta ka'i dgun lpags ni/ /srang
204b6(mdo 'grel): ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i chad/ /rgya shugs bre de bcas pa ni/ /bskol ba'i khu ba byas nas ni/ /tsha ba lnga ni srang re dang/ /de dag kun dang mnyam pa yi/ /re hi ta yi shun lpags phye/ /mar bre gang dang btsos nas ni/ /'di blud pa yis myur du ni/ /mcher pa
204b7(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'phel ba sel/ /chu shing til gyi sdong po'am/ /bu ram shing srang thal ba ni/ /til mar bskol ba blud gyur na/ /bad rlung las gyur mcher nad 'joms/ /ma zhi skran gyi cho ga ltar/ /rlung nad bad kan shes cha ba/ /mcher

206b7(mdo 'grel): byed/ /yang na lcags phye ba gcin nam/ /'o mar zhag bdun bzhag pa blud/ /zhu nas kha zas 'o ma 'am/ /sha khu mang po bcas pa sbyin/ /stong smad sbyangs nas a ru ra/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin/ /bi sha la dang bu tse shel/ /

209b1(mdo 'grel): yang zla gcig par/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma blud pas gso/ /ti lu sa dang nas tshig thal/ /la la phud dang tsha ba lnga/ /na le sham dang se 'bru dang/ /ba ta 'u su star bu dang /bilba gzhon nu zho gnyis gnyis/ /chu bre bzhi bskol mar bre gang// bskol ba blud na
209b2(mdo 'grel): 'on nad dang/ /gzhang 'brum skran dang za khu 'joms/ /zho dang rtsi tra ka bsres las/ /byung ba'i mar ni dar bar bcas/ /tsi tra ka btab bskol ba ni/ /yon tan gong ma mtshungs pa yin/ /thang la 'bar dan tig ta che// dge ba 'am a
209b3(mdo 'grel): ru ra'i sman mar/ /dus shes pa yis sbyin par bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba ni/ /bre bzhir a ru ra brgya bskol/ /der ni bu ram srang brgya gzhug/ tsha ba dri sna gsum dang ni/ /nas tshig khus thal cung zad btag/ /bsgrangs nas
209b4(mdo 'grel): brangs rtsi bre phyed gzhug/ de byin nas ni 'or nad dang/ /rims skran gcin nad lus skem pa/ /ma zhu khrag mkhris rlung dang ni/ /sgregs skyur kha dog mi sdug dang/ /gcin nad rlung gi khu chu'i nad/ /dbugs mi bde dang yig 'chus//
209b5(mdo 'grel): mcher pa'i nad dang sbyar ba'i dug/ dmu rdzing gi ni nad rnams sel/ /nas dang sa lu 'bras rnying zas/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i chu dang bsko la/ /lan tsha nyung zhing snum shas chung/ /byin na 'or nad sel bar byed/ /rgya sran mung+ga'i khu ba ni
209b6(mdo 'grel): thal sman rtsa ba gsum dang ldan /de bzhin skam sa'i sha ru sbal/ /skyin 'khor byi dur sha khu sbyin// btung bar dar ba sar ba dang/ /chad ni sman dang bcas pa blud/ /il ba zur pa ji baM? ti/ /ma nu tsi tra ka ra bi/ /ya bak+Sha ra bilbI rkang//
209b7(mdo 'grel): da trig zho ra'i tshad du byas/ /mar dang til mar nang du brdos/ /byin na 'or nad skran gzhang 'brum// me drod chung dang gcin nad sel/ /tsha ba lnga dang sbyar ba yi/ /thug pa 'am yon tan de dang 'dra// rde dreg ru rta ston yang/ /ha re nu ka
210a1(mdo 'grel): a ka ru/ /sh+ri bai a ka shug pa dang// chu srin sder mo pri yaM ku/ /pri ka thang shing spang spos dang/ /pi pi ling dang dbyi mod dang/ /kunda na taM bya ma ka/ ma li ka dang dri sma bzhi/ /bal bu'i lo ma gla sgang dan/ /ganda
210a2(mdo 'grel): bla sha las ni/ /bsku ba'i til mar dag dang ni//khrus kyi chu dang lde gu dang/ /nim ba arga ba spu ba// nagta ma la'i chus khrus bya/ /yang na phyogs gcig skrangs pa las/ /la ra bi ra ba spru ba/ /ki shu ka dang bi la sha/ 'bras bu gsum
210a3(mdo 'grel): dang seng phro ma dang/ /na la ka dang thang shing dang/ /spang spos go sha ta ki dang/ /bod nga ta la'i lo ma dang/ /dza yan+ti dang 'ol ma se// ka ka da ni sa li shing/ /bi sha kirna dbyi mod dang/ /ri tibri ti glang bo'i sna/ /lde gu dro 'jam
210a4(mdo 'grel): bskus pa phan/ /de nas rlungs gyur 'or nad la/ /zla phyed bar du dur byid dam/ /yang na e raN+Da mar blud/ /rlung gi rtug 'gags la de nyid/ /zas kyi sngon du 'o ma 'am// sha khu blud cing rlud 'joms pa'i/ /sman gyi dugs dang bsku
210a5(mdo 'grel): ? bya// phyogs gcig bsgrangs la kha lung dang/ /agni man+ta spung spos dang/ /bcas sga thang shing lde gu bsku/ /mkhris gyur tir ta Shi sman mar dang/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol ba blud/ /skom dang che dang rmong bag che/ /'o ma bsku byug
210a6(mdo 'grel): bsil ba sbyar/ /pa to la rtsa kyi lce ba// shing mngar thang shing pu tse shel// skyer ba tsan dan a ru ra/ /de na lcang ma bi la sha/ pi pi ling dang mar bskol blud/ /khong tsha mgo 'khor skom dang che/ /'dus pa'inad dang me dpal skrad/ /lus tsha
210a7(mdo 'grel): rims dang bcas pa sel// bad kan las gyur dong kra sogs/ til mar dang ni bskol ba blud/ /rgyun srang 'gags cing me drod nyams/ /mod bag yig 'chus pa la/ /thal sman chad rnying mnan chad dang/ /ba gcing dar bar
210b1(mdo 'grel): bcas pa blud/ /pi pi ling dang 'ba' cha rnying/ shi kru'i shun pa zar ma dang/ /ba gcin lde gu dro 'jam spyir/ /ru rta ag mi mAn+ta dang// rgya sran dong ka tsi tra ka/ ba gcin chus bskol bas khrus bya/ /tsa ro a ka ru yis byug/ na ga ba la sar la/ /a ?
210b2(mdo 'grel): srin gi aM ba ta/ /a dza gand+ha zhes bya ba dang// a shwa gand+ha'i lde gu ni// yan lag phyogs tcig skrang pa phan// nad gzhi ji bzhin yan lag ni/ /nye ba'i phyogs nas gter da bya/ /'dres pa'i nad la nad gzhi ni// shas che'i dbang du
210b3(mdo 'grel): gso ba bya// go snyod pa ta gla sgang dang/ /kaN+Da kA ri tsha ba lnga// skyer pa d+hu dron sbyar blud pa/ /rtsa mkhris bca' sga chu dron blud/ /nad gzhi gsum gyi 'or nad ni// yun ring lon zhing tshabs chen sel// sle tres dang ni a ru ra/ /thang shing
210b4(mdo 'grel): gu gul ba sbrub// ba gcin sbyar blud dmu rdzing dang/ /mdze dang skya rbab srin bu'i nad// gcin nad bad kan za khu dang/ /rlung ni stong du 'joms pa sel/ /de ltar rang rang nad kyis dbang byas bshad// snang ba las byung ba la khrag
210b5(mdo 'grel): dbyung zhing/ /bsil sman mar bsku byugs shing blugs par bya/ /dug skyes slangs la dug sel sbyor ba bya/ /grong dan brla can chur gnas sha ring slon/ /tshod skam til gyi zas dang bu ram shing/ /phyer btags zas dang zho
210b6(mdo 'grel): dang lan tshwa dang/ /kha zas rul bag chang skyur yos sha skam/ /'dras pa'i zas dang lci dang ma goms za/ /tsha ba bskyed dang nyin par gnyid log dang/ /mtshan mo gnyid ma log dang nyal po rnams/ /'or nad can gyis de dag
210b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad spang/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas las le'u bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas me dpal gso ba bshad bar bya'o/ /me dpal nad la thog ma nyid/ /smyung ba dang ni rtsub
211a1(mdo 'grel): chos dang/ /khrag dbyung skyug sman bkru sman btang/ /snum 'chos spyad par bya'o/ /po son cha ni dug mo nyung/ /shing mngar bcas pa 'am pa to la/ /nim+ba'i lo ma pi pi ling/ /skyug sman btang na de dpal
211a2(mdo 'grel): 'joms/ /kyi lce ba yi khu ba 'am/ /rgun 'brum 'bras bu gsum yang rung/ /dur byid phye ma/ btab pa 'am/ /'o ma mar sbyar bkru sman ni/ /khong na zhen pa'i nad la ni/ /khyad par du ni spyad pa btang/ /spyad min nad tshabs chung
211a3(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /zhi sman can dan utpal btang/ /gla sgang ni mA ba to la/ /ba to la sogs nyid dag gam/ /thal tres ga? sgang skyu ru ra/ /pu shel tse ni chu bskol blud/ /me dpal skom dad can la ni/ /bi tsher ba dang bar ba te/ /sle tres bca' sga
211a4(mdo 'grel): bskol ba ni/ /khu ba bsgrangs ba blud bar bya/ /skyer ba sran chung pu tse shel/ /ni ma shing mngar kyi lde ba/ /bskol ba mar dang bcas pa glud/ /yan lag nad zhugs nad khrag nyid/ /thog ma nyid du khrag dbyung bya/ /phags pa sha dang rgyus
211a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'grul/ /khrag rul ba las byung ba yin/ /smin zhing bad kan zad pa dang/ /rlung dang mkhris pa shas cha la/ /tig ta tig ta chen po'i mar/ /kyi lde ba bskol mar phan/ /khrag dbyung khong ba dag gyur nas/ /nad ni sha phags la gnas la/ /phyi rol nas ni
211a6(mdo 'grel): byug sogs kyi/ /'phral du me dpal zhi bar 'gyur/ /rlung gyur shu ti gla sgang dang/ /'o ma u su par hi/ /a ta ka la pi pi ling/ thang shing shing kru ru rtsa ni/ /lde gus byug pa byas na phan/ /mkhris pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde/ /de bzhin pad+ma utpa la soD//
211a7(mdo 'grel): n+ya gro d+ha rtsa gzhon nu dang/ /chu shing nang gi lo mar bcas/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba lde gu dang/ /lan brgyar bkrus ba'i mar gyis byug/ pad+ma can gyi 'dam bsil ba 'am/ /mu tig btags par gyur ba la/ /dud dam byung ru nya phyis sam/ /yug snam
211b1(mdo 'grel): mar dang bcas pa byug/ bad kan las gyur 'bras bu gsum// shug pa bcod dang pu tse shel/ /ka ra bi ra 'dam bu'i rtsa/ /a nan da yi lde gus bsgu/ /da ba lo ma bdun pa dang/ /seng ldeng thang shing bsku sman dang/ /gla sgang dong kar bcas ba 'am//
211b2(mdo 'grel): ba ra na sogs lde gu bsku/ /dong la yi ni lo ma dang/ /shal sman ta ka'i shun lpags dang/ /in dra ba ru na'i lo ma/ /sh+ri sha 'ol ma sa'i me tog/ chu blugs rma bsku sman mar dang/ /lde gu'i phye ma ji bzhin du/ /sman ni 'di dag nyid kyis bya/ /rlung
211b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas mar ni shas cher bya/ /bad kan gnas shes ma smin la/ /dro dang rtsub pa shas cher sbyar/ /de bzhin mkhris ba'i gnas zhugs la/ /khrag mkhris la ni mar ldan bya/ /shin tu bsil zhing srab pa dang/ /gos srab nang du bzhag pa ni/ /nus pa chung
211b4(mdo 'grel): ba yang yang dang/ /gzhan dang gzhan ni sbyar bar bya/ /'dres pa'i nad la las 'di ni/ /'dren mar bya ba bsngags pa yin/ /me ltar tshal lan brgya ni/ /bkrus pa'i mar sar 'ba' zhig phan/ /mar gyi nying khu blugs pa 'am/ /shing mngar bskol ba'i chu
211b5(mdo 'grel): grang dam/ /ud pal pad+ma kha ra'i chu/ /'o ma bu ram shing khu blug/ btung ba bsku dang blugs pa dang/ /tig ta chen po'i sman mar phan/ /rme'u khrag mkhris sel ba yi/ /gso ba ci rigs legs byas la/ /rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/ /glan dang
211b6(mdo 'grel): dkri ba la sogs phan/ /rmen bu me dpal gzer bcas la/ /til mar rtsa ba bcu dang bskol/ /ba gcin dron mo chu bran blugs/ /yang na shi kru'i lde gu 'am/ /nag ta ma la'i shun pa 'am/ /la phug skam po ba? ru ra'i/ /lde gu dro 'joms bsku pa
211b7(mdo 'grel): phan/ /dan ta shing tsha ci tra ka/ arka sna ha'i 'o ma dang/ /bu ram go bye rus nag mtshur/ /lde gus rdo yang 'digs byed na/ /bad kan las gyur rmen bu'i nad/ /phyi rol gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /yun ring gnas pa'i rmon bu la/ /la phug rgya
212a1(mdo 'grel): sran ku langtha'i/ /khu ba thal sman se 'brur bcas/ /gro yi zan dang nas kyi zan/ /rgun chang sbrang rtsi bu ram chad/ /kha ra chang gi dangs mar bcas/ /kha lung khu bar bcas pa dang/ /'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor lde gu/ /pi pi ling dang
212a2(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsir byas/ /thang shing dang ni sle tres dang/ /brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang/ /gla sgrang go khye'i sbyor ba dang/ /sbrang rtsi yi ni sbyor ba dang/ /mgo bkru sman dud rdub ba dang/ /sngar bshad skran ni bshig ba dang/ /lcags gser lan tshwa bsregs pa dang//
212a3(mdo 'grel): rdabs btsir bar bya ba yin/ /sman 'di yis ni 'jig par byed/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs de dag ni/ /byas kyang zhi bar ma gyur cing/ /shing tu sra bar gnas gyur la/ /nang stobs che bar gyur ba ni// de 'og 'di la thal sman nam/ /lde gu 'am gser
212a4(mdo 'grel): gyis bsregs pa phan/ /smin par byed pas ma nags byas la/ /dpral nas de nas dbyung bar bya/ /'di la khrag ni ma nags 'dod la/ /yang dang yang du gnod par bya/ /khrag bsal 'og tu slar yang ni/ /rlung dang bad kan sal sman btang/
212a5(mdo 'grel): tsha zhing smin bas mnags gyur la/ /phyi nang rma ltar gso bar bya/ /skyer pa srin sman kam+bi lya/ /bskol ba'i til mar rmal phan/ /bad kan mkhris ba shas che la/ /du rba'i khu ba mar bskol phan/ /gso ba'i las kun phyogs dang steng/ /khrag byung
212a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni phyogs gcig yin/ /me dpal de ni khrag mkhris das/ /ma 'dres pa las byung mi 'gyur/ /'di yi rten ni khrag nyid yin/ /de bas khrag ni mang du dbri/ /nad bzhi mar po me dpal la/ /bkru sman ma gyur mar mi sbyin/ /de yis nad ni sra
212a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bas/ /pags pa khrag dang sha mdzor byed// //yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus ba las/ /gso ba'i gnas las le'u bco brgyad ba'o// //de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mdze can kun
212b1(mdo 'grel): la thog ma nyid/ /snum blud pas ni gso bar bya/ /de la rlung shas che ba la/ /rtsa ba bcu pa sle tres dang/ /sha rang+ga dang e raN+Da/ /me sha sring gi mar ram ni/ /til mar bskol te blud pa phan/ /nimpa pa ta pu tse shel/ /skyer ba ba ta byi tsher ga/ parba ta dang kyi lce ba//

212b3(mdo 'grel): dpal dang/ /'brum phran lus tsha skom dang che/ /mgo 'khor g.yan pa skya rbab 'bras/ /rma 'grams 'bras kyi phreng ba dang/ /thor bu khong 'bras skran dang ni/ /zad byed smyo byed smyos pa dang/ /snying nad rab rib de khabs dang/ /sha bkra mig ser pho ba'i nad//

212b5(mdo 'grel): pa pa ta 'bras bu gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang thal tres gnyis/ /nim+ba tsan dan pi pi ling/ /shing mngar sle tres bi sha la/ /dug mo nyung dang pu shel tse/ /rtsa mkhris mur pa ba sha ka/ nye'u shing pu sha pa to la/ /gla sgang byi tsher gyi lce ba/ /skyu ru ra khu nyis 'gyur
212b6(mdo 'grel): te/ de rnams mar gyi brgyad 'gyur chu/ /bskol ba tig ta chen po ste/ /yon tan yang ni sngar bas lhag/ /bad kan las gyur nim ba dang/ /lo ma bdun pa tsi tra ka/ ru rta dong kra tsha ba gsum/ /sa la pi la ya'i mar blud/ /kun la go bye'i mar ram ni/ /
212b7(mdo 'grel): yungs kar tu ba ra'i mar blud/ /bi tangka dang a ru ra/ /go bya'i lnga gu mar bskol blud/ /dod ka'i rtsa ba dag dang mar/ /lan brgya'i bar bskol mar yang blud/ /seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu bsten na/ /mdze nad myur du sel bar byed/ /'di dag
213a1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis ci rigs par/ /snum 'chos bsku ba byas pa 'ang phan/ /snum gyis zhen la me dpal ni/ /skabs su bshad pa'i sman sbyar btang/ /dbral ba lag pa rkang ba las/ /'di gtar ga 'ang gdab bar bya/ /mdze nang
213a2(mdo 'grel): tsha chung zhal zhal gdag/ ra sogs kyis kyang khrag dbyung bya/ /mdze nad 'joms pa'i snum gyis ni/ /'di la bar bar rtas par bya/ /khrag phyung bkru sman gyis sbyang byas/ /lto stong gyur ba mje? can la/ /ci nas rlung gis 'di
213a3(mdo 'grel): yis ni/ /lus mi 'jig pa de ltar bya/ /nim+ba sa? tres ba sha ka/ 'bras bu gsum dang ba to la/ /kuN+Da kA ri ka rany+dza/ /lde gu chu dang mar bskol ba/ /sman mar rdo rje can zhes bya/ /des na me dpal mig ser rims/ /khrag nad lud ba
213a4(mdo 'grel): mdze nang 'joms/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /dur bying kaN+Da kA ri gnyis/ /danda dod gra pu tse shel/ /shu ngag bod ka tsi tra ka/ pa tar bcas pa zho gnyis gnyis/ /snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang/ /bre gang mar bskol ltos sra ba'i/
213a5(mdo 'grel): snum 'chos bkru sman dag tu sbyar/ /mdze dang sha bkra 'dzer pa dang/ /rgyu rlubs rde'u 'gags skran 'joms byed/ /'di ni rdo rje chen por bshad/ /danda bre bzhi chu bre ni/ /bcu drug bskol te dmar bskol/ /ko sha Ta ki srang gcig gdab//
213a6(mdo 'grel): de blud steng 'og sbyong byed yin/ /a brda ka srang brgya bcu/ /bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha ?/ /khu ba de ni de'i rtsa ba// mar mi bra gad bskol bar bya/ /blud na de bzhin zhag gcig gis/ /bar du chod de legs zhu zhes/ /khre rgod dang mar bskol
213a7(mdo 'grel): ba blud/ /mdzo nad sha bkra 'bras kyi phreng/ /sel zhing bu mang dran 'dzin 'gyur/ /ni li ta ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi/ /dzA ti'i khu ba mar bcas pa 'am/ /seng lded a sa ni chur bcas/ /dbang po bsdams brtan mdze nang 'joms/ /sa lu nas dang gro
213b1(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /ci tse khre dang mung+ga dang/ /sran chung dang ni tu ka ri yi/ /tshod ma kha bo skam sa'i sha/ 'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/ /seng ldeng nim+ba ge dbye sbyar/ /chan ni sman dang sbyar ba 'am/ /dar ba so mar tsar bcas/ /bza' dang btung ba mdze la phan/ /skyur tsha

213b7(mdo 'grel): phyir ma bzhin du nyis 'gyur bcas/ /phyi ma sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos/ /mjo dang sha bu tshor ba chung/ /sal ba'i sman gyi mchog yin no/ /'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling/ khi TAdgaM dang sbrang rtsi ni/ /til mar mar sbyar lde gu 'am/ /ka ka u dum+ba ra
214a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ nim+ba gla sgang bi TAM ka/ tsha ba gsum gyi lde gu ni/ /dug mo nyung gi khu bar bcas/ /blud na pags nad thams cad 'joms/ /dug mo nyungs dang tsi ta ka/ nim+ba thang shing sed lded dang/ /lo ma bdun ba a sa na/ /

214a7(mdo 'grel): ba ri/ /ci tra? dang ta ? rnams/ /go rim bzhin du cha res bskyed/ /ba gcin sbyar ba 'am ril bu ni/ /byin ni mi bzad mdze yang 'joms/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /til dang go bye'i phye ma ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi
214b1(mdo 'grel): kha ra ra sbyar/ /ril bu byas pa cha bdun pas/ /mdze yi nad rnams 'joms byed cing/ /bcud kyi len dang ro rtsar 'gyur/ /so ma ra tsa tsi tra ka/ skyer ba du ba ra'i rus pa/ /go bye srin sman 'bras bu gsum/ /bsten na mdze nad ma lus 'joms//
214b2(mdo 'grel): so ma ra tsa bi TAngka/ /go bye tsi tra ba ra hi/ /a ru ra dang lam ka ling/ /til nag po dang pi pi ling/ /bu ram dang ni ril bur byas/ /mdze yi nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /so ma ra tsa pi pi ling/ /de yi rtsa ba bi Tangka'i/ /snying po
214b3(mdo 'grel): lcags skyu skyu ru ra/ /til mar lde gu mdze nad 'joms/ /a ru ra dang go bye til/ /bu ram ril bu mdze nad 'joms/ /so ma ra tsa bi TAngka/ /bu ram ril bu byas pa'ang phan/ /sed lded brag shun bi TAM ka/ sbrang rtsi mar dang
214b4(mdo 'grel): ldan za zhing/ /phan dang ran par zos na ni/ /'brum phran sha bkra shu ba 'joms / /kha ra lcags phye bi tAngka/ /ci tra ka dang skyu ru ra/ /pi pi ling gi lde gu yis/ /mdze nang shin tu gso dka' 'joms/ /gla sgang tsha gsum 'bras
214b5(mdo 'grel): bu gsum/ /rtsa ba lnga gnyis thad shing bcod/ /nim+ba shing tsha lo ma bdun/ /shing tsa tsi tra ka dang ni/ /mur ba bi sha la'i phye ma/ /gnas phye rgun chang sbrang rtsi ni/ /cha gcig sbyar ba 'di rtag tu/ /'thungs na mdze nad 'joms
214b6(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /'or nad skya rbab sha bkra bcas/ /pho nad gzhang 'brum rgyu rlugs dang/ /mtshan par brdol dang 'brum phran dang/ /g.yan pa zhu ba'i nad rnams 'joms/ /tu pa ra yi rus pa 'am/ /go bye so mar dza dang//
214b7(mdo 'grel): tsa tra ka'i rtsa brag zhun rnams/ /bcud len cho ga ltar bstan na phan/ /de ltar nang gsal nang gi ni/ /nad sbyangs nas ni phyi rol gyi/ /pags par gnas na sman blugs pa na/ /nad kyi dri ma ma dag la/ /sman
215a1(mdo 'grel): rnon byugs na mdzo nad ni/ /slongs pas slar ni 'phel par 'gyur/ /rting zug sra zhid kor kor po'i/ /mjo la dugs bya snyi ba dang/ /'bur bar gyur nas mtshon gyis ni/ /zhal zhal btab cing byugs bar bya//
215a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig pags pa kun nyams shing/ /mtshan gyis btab tu mi rung ba/ /de la khrag ni phyung nas su/ /thal sman rnon pos bsku bar bya/ /mdze nad rab sra rtsub pa dang/ /tshol ba med cing yun ring lon/ /sngaD bcas dugs ba sku blud par byas ? bzhin rdzes
215a3(mdo 'grel): su sbyar/ /mdzo nad rengs shing tshor ba med/ /rdul mi 'byung zhing g.ya' ba la/ /lci skam rgya mtsho'i wu ba'?/ /mtshon gyis bdar la lde gus byug/ gla sgang dod kra 'bras bu gsum/ /po son cha dang ka rany+dza/ /lo ma bdun pa dug mo nyung
215a4(mdo 'grel): ru rta skyer pa pri yam ku/ /yungs kar sbyor bas lus bkru zhing/ /lde gus slon sman bkru sman dang/ /bzhar zhing lus ni bskus gyur na/ /pags pa'i nad dang mdze nad dang/ /skrad dang skya rbab mdzo nad 'joms/ /ka ra ba ra nim+ba dang//
215a5(mdo 'grel): dug? mo nyung dang dod ka dang/ /tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba gcin bskol/ /bskus na mdze nad 'joms par byed/ /ka ra pi ra kar? rtsa ba/ /dug mo nyung dang ka rany+dza'i/ /'bras pa skyer ba'i shun wags ni/ /so ma na yi myu gu bcas/ /bskus
215a6(mdo 'grel): na mjo 'joms grub pa yin/ /sh+ri sha'i shun wags ras bal gyi/ /me tog dang ga'i lo ma dang/ /mon sne'u me ru bzhi po ni/ /btags pa'i lde gus mjo? nas 'jom?/ /nam+ba ser po rnam gnyis dang/ /bye'u rug pa dang
215a7(mdo 'grel): ba to la/ /rus rta a sha gand+ha dang/ /thang shing shi kru yungs kar dang/ /g.yer ma'u su gla ba dang/ /tsa rod cha mnyam phye mar byas/ /dar bar sbyar ba'i ta'i dmar gyis/ /bskus ba'i lus byugs dril gyur na/ /mdzo nad
215b1(mdo 'grel): g.yan ba zlum por bcas/ /'brum phran skangs ba'i nad rnams sel/ /gla sgang dngul rdo dang ni skyer ba dang/ /nag tshu ra kam+bi la dang ru rta dang/ /seng phrom mu zi bod dkar bi TAngka/ /ldong ros ba kla ka ra bi ra shun/ /phye mar byas ba'i til mar gyis bskus ba'i//
215b2(mdo 'grel): steng du phye ma'i don du blug na/ /shu ba g.yan ba 'brum bu phra mo dang/ /rkang shu la sogs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar snu ha'i shing dum btags/ /ldeg gu me mar mur bcos te/ /'dod chags pa shugs kyis ngo tsha bzhin/ /bskus na glang

215b5(mdo 'grel): sel?/ /ta ma la lo na le sham/ /ru rta ldong ros nag tshur bcas/ /zangs kyi snod du til mar dang/ /zhag bdun legs par spangs pa des/ /zhag bdun bsku zhing nyi mar 'phrad?/ /sha kra 'joms par byed pa yin// sha kra sar ba zla ba gcin

219b2(mdo 'grel): gnas la sems dga' dang/ /kha zas stobs bskyed ro tsa phan/ /khu ba rgyu ba 'gags gyur na/ /bkru sman btang pas gso bar bya/ /'khrus shing zas rim bsten gyur nas/ /sngar bshad pa yi gso ba bya/ /rlung las mngal chags
219b3(mdo 'grel): bskams gyur dang/ /byis pa skam por gyur pa la/ /ka ra taM pa la shing mngar rnams/ /'o ma spyad bskol blud pa phan/ /rgyus pa tshigs dang rtsar zhugs la/ /snum tsha dkri ba'i dugs pas phan/ /yan lag 'khums la ma sha dang//
219b4(mdo 'grel): rgyam tsha til mar bskol bas bsku/ /khrag gzags drags la yan lag ni/ /tshor ba med la khyim dud pa/ /rgyam tsha til mar sbyar bas bsku/ /dkri ba'i gdugs ni sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan dbang can gyis zin gyur cing/ /mig 'gyur
219b5(mdo 'grel): mi shas 'dar ba med/ /pho mtshan mi lngad rdul mi 'byung/ /phyi rol rtsol ba med gyur pa/ /khri yi bcing pa ma non pa/ /de la myur du gso dpyad bya/ /der ni thog mar snum zhen bya/ /dus byas sna sman rnon po dag/ bu ga sbyang phyir btang ba dang/ /bi da ra
219b6(mdo 'grel): yi sde bskol dang/ zho dang 'o ma sha khu dang/ /mar bskol ba yi dangs ma byung/ /des na rlung nad tshabs che la/ /'phral du khyab par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgya sran nas dang rgya shug sogs/ /thang shing la sogs sde tshan ni/ /rlan can sha ni bskol ba dang/ /skyur
219b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'o ma dag dang ni/ /mngar ba'i sde chen btab pa yi/ /snum chen dag ni bskol pa yis/ /blud dang bsku dang lus lci dang/ /btung rang sna sman 'jam rtsir bya/ /snum dang dugs ni legs sbyar ba/ /de dang des ni rlung nad 'joms/ /nad shugs
220a1(mdo 'grel): bar ma dag la ni/ /bad kan sel zhing rno ba yi/ /spyi bo'i bkru sman lan mang btang/ /bud shing btang bar bya ba yis/ /dbyugs rgyu'i gnas ni dag gyur nas/ /des ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /kha ru tshwa dang a ru ra/ /tsha ba
220a2(mdo 'grel): gsum bskol rlung chen sel/ /seng phro ma srang brgyad 'bras bu gsum/ /bre gad rtsa ba chen po lnga/ /e raN+Da dang 'bri ha ti/ /dur phyir srang re chu bre ni/ /bcu drug nang du bskol nas su/ /bzhi cha lus pa de dang ni/ /mar bre gang dang zho bre bzhi/ /nas
220a3(mdo 'grel): tshigs 'khus thal srang gsum bskol/ /de bsten rlung nad ma rungs pa/ /yan lag phyogs gcig kun la bzhugs/ /mngar gyi nad dang rgyu rlugs dang/ /skran dang dmu rdzing 'joms par byed/ /ram nya ka dang a sho ka'ang/ /cho ga seng phro ma lta
220a4(mdo 'grel): bur bya/ /gso ba 'di ni gzhan dbang can/ /rlung nad ma 'dres pa la bya/ /nad gzhi 'dren mar 'dren mas bya/ /bad kan bcas pa'i gzhan dbang can/ /snying ga'i rtsi logs na ba la/ /dbyer ma shing kun a ru ra/ /ma nu dang ni lan tshwa gsum//
220a5(mdo 'grel): nas bskol khu ba sbyar ba blud/ /shing kun bca' sna rtsabs ru tsha/ /se'u 'bru star bu bcas pa blud/ /bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa la/ /snying nad gso ba'i skabs bshad phan/ /da rgan phye dgye nang bkug gnyis/ /glad pa gzhogs phyed na
220a6(mdo 'grel): ltar gso/ /til mar gyis bkang snod du bsnyal/ /'dir ni nang bkug rab gso rkang/ /so dang bzhin gyi mdog nyams shing/ /yan lag lhor cing dran pa nyams/ /rab tu rdul ba'i gzhung rengs yin/ /de ni zhag bcu las mi 'tsho/ /de
220a7(mdo 'grel): las gzhan shugs sman gyur 'tsho/ /lus rgu ba dang 'on glen dang/ /'thed dang zha bo gzhogs byed nyams/ /phye bo 'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur/ /'gram pa nyams par 'gram pa snum/ /dugs byas nas ni rang gnas gzhug/ kha
220b1(mdo 'grel): gdangs pa kos ko ni/ /bteg ste mkhas pas gzhug par bya/ /'thams par gyur pa lhag ma la/ /phyogs gcig bkug pa lta bur gso/ /lci ldib gnas skabs ji bzhin/ /rlung nad kyis ni gso bar bya/ /glad pa gzhogs phyed na ba la/ /sna sman spyi
220b2(mdo 'grel): bo'i til mar dang/ /mig dang sna ba rkang bar bya/ /skrangs pa skyug sman btang bar ba/ /tsha zhing dmar bcas gtar ga gdab/ /gzhogs phyed bskams la snum chos dang/ snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman btang/ /dbung 'jas? la sna sman dang/ /zas kyi rjes la snum sbyin
220b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba brla rengs pa la snum chos dang/ /sbyang byas phan pa ma yin te/ /bad kan ma zhu chil bar gnas/ /de phyir de la rtsub chos kyis/ /zad par bya bas gso bar bya/ /nas dang khre dang khre rgod sbyin/ /tshong ma lan tshwa med pa ni/ /til mar cung zad

224b1(mdo 'grel): phan pa yin/ /der ni phyug pI rlung nad kyi/ /gso bya dreg nad ga ? bar bya/ /khrag ni dangs par byed pa yi/ /snum dang sman gyi sbyor ba bya/ /srog sogs rlung ni cig car 'khrugs/ /ji skad bstan dang nang gzhi bzhin/ /ji ltar nye bar snyan rnams ni/ /nad
224b2(mdo 'grel): tshul ji bzhin sbyin par bya/ /mzhu bcas la dugs dang smyung/ /smin dang rtsub sman byug pa dang/ /rlugs sogs kyis ni ma zhugs la/ /byas la ma 'dres rlung gso bya/ /skem dang bya snyad yan lag 'khums/ /rengs dang 'da ? bu tshor ba med//
224b3(mdo 'grel): 'gam nyams kha ye 'thed po dang/ /zha'o dreg nad kyis 'theng dang/ /tshigs 'khrul gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ /tshigs dang rkang rus la zhugs nad/ /'di dag gnas ni gting rang bas/ /de bas 'di dag gsar btab dang/ /bla gnyan med
224b4(mdo 'grel): ci de nyams stobs ldan/ /'bad nas 'tsho yi gzhan du min/ /mkhris gyur 'dres la grang dro yi/ /gso ba'i rim gyis mang du bya/ /'tsho byed sde dang bskol ba yi/ /sman mar dag kyang blud par bya/ /skam sa'i sha dang sa lu nas/ /bkru sman
224b5(mdo 'grel): 'o mar bcas 'jam btang/ /rtsa ba lnga dang ba lar bskol/ /'o ma mas btang sbyor ba bya/ /sman mar bskol ba'i til mar gyis/ /'jam rtsi'i dus su btang bar bya/ /shing mngar bal til mar dang/ mar dang 'o ma bskol ba blung/ /rtsa ba
224b6(mdo 'grel): lnga yi khu ba 'am/ /chu ni grang mo nyid blugs bya/ /bad kan bcas la nas kyi zan/ /skam sa'i ri dags bya yi sha/ dugs dang mas btang bkra sman no/ /slen sman bkru sman bcas pa btang/ /mar rnying til mar yungs kar las/ /byung ba'i mang
224b7(mdo 'grel): ni zlud pa phan/ /bad kan mkhris pa 'dres ba las/ /dang po mkhris pa gso bar bya/ /khrag dang 'dres pa dreg nang kyi/ /gos ba ji skad bshad par bya/ /dugs bsku sha khu 'o ma dang/ /snum dang bcas pas sha bkra sel/ /phyug pa'i rlung la
225a1(mdo 'grel): gcin snying dang/ /chil dang rlung 'joms sman gyis gso/ /rus pa rkang gnas snam chen gyis/ /khu chur gnas la sngar bshad pas/ /zas dang 'dres la 'ju byed pas/ /drod bskyed skyag sman yang pa btang/ /gcin
225a2(mdo 'grel): 'dres gcin ni sel ba dang/ /dugs dang 'jam rtsi gong mas gso/ /bshad 'dres e raN+Da'i med dang/ /'jam rtsi sman ni 'khru byed phan/ /lus zungs kun zhugs rlung nang la/ /bad kan mkhris par mi gnod dang/ /gang yang rlung ni
225a3(mdo 'grel): bdar rgyu ba'i/ /sman de rlung nad de la btang/ /'khru bar mi byed snum pa dang/ /rtsa rgyun myong bar byed pa dang/ /mas btang bas ni mngar ba dang/ /snum gyis 'jam rtsis gso bar bya/ /nyams stobs ci yod brtags nas ni/ /bkru sman
225a4(mdo 'grel): 'jam po btang bar bya/ /bcud kyis len ni thams cad kyi/ /sbyor ba dag kyang bsngags pa yin/ /mchog tu brag zhun sbyor ba dang/ /de bzhin gu gul nyi tshe'am/ /bar srang stong tshig brgya bcas/ /pa la sangs bshad lde guAng phan
225a5(mdo 'grel): thur sel 'dres la drod bskyed dang/ /'khru gcod rlung ni bde rgyu byed/ /gcin gyi gnas ni sbyong byed pa'i/ /sman rnams de la btang bar byas de ltar srog la sogs pa yi/ /'dres pa'i gso pa mdor bshad yin/ /sman pas de gso
225a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas par ni/ /blo yis brtags te ni rigs bya/ /stod du rgyu ba spyi bor bsdu/ /thur sel de las bzlog par bya/ /me dang mnyam gnas mnyam par bya/ /khyab byed gsum du sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi po bas kyang sreg bsrungs te/ /der
225a7(mdo 'grel): gnas nas ni lus gnas 'gyur/ /de ltar rlung ni lam gzhan zhugs/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su bzhag/ khrag mkhris 'dres pa ma btogs pa/ /'dres pa'i nad ni thams cad la/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bzhin/ /sgog skya bsten na
225b1(mdo 'grel): sel bar byed/ /mkhris bar 'dres la mkhris sel bas/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar bya/ /khrag dang 'dres la de nyid dang/ /ther po'i nad bshad sman bya'o/ /khrag mkhris rlung ni sel ba yi/ /bcud kyis len ni sna tshogs sbyar/ /nad gzhi ji ltar bstan pa bzhin//
225b2(mdo 'grel): gso ba de ltar yang dag bshad/ /nyam thag 'phral du sel ba 'di/ /che yi rig byed gnas 'bras bu/ /gso ba phan pa gnod sel dang/ /sbyor ba sman dang rtsi dang mi/ /zhi bar byed dang sngags bya ste/ /de dag sman ming rnam grangs yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i
225b3(mdo 'grel): snying po bsdus pa las/ /le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las gso ba'i gnas te gnas bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas skyug sman gyi chog bshad par bya'o/ /de yang rgyun shes kyi bul sogs pa
225b4(mdo 'grel): drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de/ /skyug sman mchog ni po son cha? dur byed rtsa ba bkru sman mchog/ gzhan dag nad kyi dbang las ni/ /khyad par du ni gyur pa yin/ /po son cha de mdog skya zhing/ /shin tu sgo? ba'ang ma yin pa/ /nyin zhag
225b5(mdo 'grel): chos grangs shis pa la /sos ka dbyid kyi mtshams su btu/ /phyi nang 'jag ma'i snod du ni/ /bcug ste bcings la ba lang gi/ /lci bas snod re byugs nas ni/ /'bru yi nang du bzhag par bya/ /'jag mas dkris pas 'jam pa dang/ /sbrang rtsi lta bu dri zhim
225b6(mdo 'grel): la/ /zhag brgyad 'das par gyur ba dang/ /phyung ste de ni nyi mar skam/ /de 'og legs bar bskams pa dang/ /nang gi 'bras bu phyung nas ni/ /zho dang zho kha chu mar gyi/ /lde gu mnyes la slar yang skam/ /de nas legs pa ? sbas te bzhag
225b7(mdo 'grel): dgos pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/ /de nas de la tshad tsam du/ /blangs nas cham chom brdungs nas ni/ /shing mdar do/ bye byi da ra? 'am/ /bi ? lcar ma shla sman ?/ bu ti a pa marga dang/ /arga gad yang rung ba ni/ /bskol ba'i chu yi nang du ni/ /
226a1(mdo 'grel): nub gcig legs par spang bar bya'o/ /de nas sman gyi khu ba de/ /mnyes shing btsogs la nang par ni/ /mdo nas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /legs par blung nas skyug tu gzhug/ bad kan las gyur rims cham pa/ /skran dang khor
226a2(mdo 'grel): 'bras rnams la ni/ /ji srid mkhris pa snang gi bar/ /khyad par du yang skyug tu gzhug/ po son cha yi 'bras bu ni/ /phye ma bskol ba'i khu bar ni/ /'bras bu gsum phye cha gsum dang/ /ko ? te ra sogs khur bcas/ /blung na rims dang dmu rdzid dang/ /
226a3(mdo 'grel): rman bu 'bras dang 'brum chen dang/ /rtun 'dra'i rlung nad sel bar byed ? mkhris pa bad kan gnas zhugs la/ /dzi mu da sogs khu ba blud/ /snying tsha khrag mkhris dag la ni/ /de 'bras 'o mar bskol ba yi/ /'o thug bcas blud bad kan slon/ /cham
226a4(mdo 'grel): pa mun 'thibs byed pa la/ de bskol 'o ma las byung pa'i/ /zho yi sbris ma 'am zho blud bya/ /po son cha sogs lnga gu dang/ /bskol ba'i 'o ma las byung ba'i/ /mar sar bad kan gyis dros nyams/ /lus bskams pa las skyug sman bya/ /mo
226a5(mdo 'grel): son cha yi khu ba ni/ /bse shing tshogs btsags nas ni/ /gzang bu chags pa'i bar du bskol/ /byin pa bde bas skyug tu gzhug/ lde gu de 'am de'i khu ba/ /gza' dang btung bar sbyar te btang/ /pe son cha yi 'bras bu'i khu/ /dug mo
226a6(mdo 'grel): nyungs sogs sde tshan btab/ /nim+ba arga gang yang rung/ /bskol ba'i khu ba bcas pa ni/ /blud na nyams rtas las byung dang/ /gting zug kun kyang sel bar byed/ /po son cha yi me tog ni/ /zhib btags phreng bsgos bsnams nas ni
226a7(mdo 'grel): thug ba sha khu sogs doms blud/ /skyid de ba ni bde slon 'jug/ po son cha yi me tog dang/ /'bras bu gzhon nu de bzhin sbyar/ /dzi ta mu sogs de dang 'dra/ /dzi ta mu ni khyad par du/ /rims dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /
226b1(mdo 'grel): skyigs? bu la sogs nad la btang/ 'di yi me tog 'o mar bcos/ /'bras bu smin pa 'o thug bcas/ /sbu bcas 'o ma'i spris mar sbyar/ /sgya 'am sngo gyur 'o mang bcug/ zho ni skyur por gyur pa 'am/ /mnan pa'i chang gi dangs mar ni/ /mnyes te zhu bar
226b2(mdo 'grel): gyur ba blud/ /bad kan lud pa yi ga 'chus/ /skya rbab gcod chen nad la btang/ /ku ba ko shat ki yang/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di nyid bya/ /smin zhing bskams par gyur pa yi/ /dzi mu ta yi 'bras bu dag/ phye ma srang phyed 'o mar bsres/ /rlung mkhris
226b3(mdo 'grel): nad kyis nyen la blub?/ dzi mu ta 'bas ba nyis sam gsum/ /brdungs pa de yi khu ba ni/ /dong ka la sogs dgu pa ni/ /gang yang rung ba la spangs te/ /mnyes pa btsags par gyur pa dag/ /bad kan mkhris rims can la blud/ /ji mu ta yi phye ma'i
226b4(mdo 'grel): lde gu/ /chu grang dang ni sbyar ba dag/ mkhris rims can blud bad kan dang/ /rlung 'dres rims la chu dron sbyar/ /lung pa dbugs mi bde dang sdug/ slon rims bad kan gyis nyen dang/ /mun 'thibs byed pa'i nang ldang ba/ /sku bab? kha po'i skyug sman
226b5(mdo 'grel): bsngags/ /de ni ma tog 'bras bu med/ /myu gu gzhon nu 'o mar btsos/ /bad kan mkhris pa las gyur rims/ /mkhris pa shas cher gyur la blung/ /'bras bu smin pa'i nang gi ni/ /'bras bu phyung ste 'o mar bcug /zhor gyur lud par bugs
226b6(mdo 'grel): mi bde/ blud de slon du gzhug bar bya/ /'bras bu'i nang na zho ga chu/ /mdzo dug skya rbab nyid la blud/ /de dang dar bab? bskol ba ni/ /rgyam tsha sprang rtsir bcas pa blud/ /yang na de yi sa lon ni/ /ra yi 'o mar bcas pa dag/ dug skran dmu rdzir
226b7(mdo 'grel): chen bu dang/ /'bras dang rkang 'bam nad la blug /bad kan las gyur lud pa rims/ /lkog ma'i nad dang ma zhu la/ /gu ba kha ba'i khu ba ni/ /phye dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud/ /skran dang rims rnying bying pa la/ /nga
227a1(mdo 'grel): gu sha khur sbyar blud na/ /legs pa kho nar slon gyur zhing/ /nyams chung bar yang 'gyur ma yin/ /ku ba kha bo'i me tog dang/ /'bras bu phye ma bskol ba yi/ /me tog phreng ba mnam pa ni/ /skyid de ba yi skyugs sman
227a2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /skran lud dmu rdzing lkog ma'i nad/ /bad kan gnas la brten pa'i rlung/ /bad kan kha dang mgrin par gnas/ /bad kan 'phel bar gyur pa dag/ brtan zhing dkyel ni skyes pa la/ /ko sha ta ka'i skyug sman bsngags/ /'tsho byed nye'u
227a3(mdo 'grel): shing zangs rtsi ba/ /kha sral phre'u ram nye gnyis/ /sh+ri ba dang ni me da dang/ /ma hA me da ma du li/ /'di dag re re'i phye ma dang/ /ko sha ta ka'i phye mar bcas/ /sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar ba ni/ /lung pa snying ni tsha la bsngags/ /de rjes chu dron
227a4(mdo 'grel): blung pa ni/ /bad kan mkhris tsha ldan la bsngags/ /'u su g.yer ma'i khu ba dang/ /de yi khu bas dug 'joms so/ /bampi ka sa ma rnga 'am/ /ba spru ba yi khu bar ni/ /ra tsa ko sha ta ka yi/ /rdog ma gcig gam gnyis mnyes pa'i//
227a5(mdo 'grel): dngos ma snying gi nad la blud/ /de bskol 'o ma las byung mar/ /po son 'cha' sogs bskol ba blud/ /ko sha ta sogs kha dang tsha/ /mdze dang skya rbab mcher pa'i nad/ /'or nang skran nad sbyar dug sogs/ /gting zug pa la
227a6(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa yin/ /po son cha sogs drug so sor/ /bskol ba dang ni rlan can sha/ ko sha ta ka cha mnyam bskol/ /khu ba rgyam tshar bcas pa blud/ /po son cha sogs pi pi ling/ /cha mnyam ko sha ta kar sbyar/ /yang na
227a7(mdo 'grel): ko sha ta ka yi/ /khu ba bu ram shing khu blud/ /dug mo nyung ni skyid de ba/ /bad kan mkhris pa khrag bcas dang/ /rims dang shu ba snying nad dang/ /dreg nad kyis 'thed mdze la bsngags/ /dug mo nyung gis bon de/ /yungs kar
227b1(mdo 'grel): ram ni ma du ki/ bskol ba'i khu pa 'am rgyam tsha'i chu/ /yang na kri sa ra ldan blud/ /de yi sa bon arga yi/ /'o mar zhag bdun spangs pa ni/ /po son cha dang dzI paM ta/ /ku ba kha po'i dzI baM ti/ /dzI baM ka ni bskol ba ni/ /khu pa gang yang rung ba blung/ /skyug
227b2(mdo 'grel): sman gyi ni gtso bo yi/ /cho ga phyogs tsam bshad pa yin/ /blo dang ldan pas tshul 'di yis/ /gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /cho ga grub pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas
227b3(mdo 'grel): bkru sman bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dur byid bska zhing mngar la rtsub/ /zhu rjes tsha bar gyur pa yin/ /bad kan mkhris pa zhi byed de/ /rtsub pas rlung ni 'khrug par byed/ /de 'dir sman gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad
227b4(mdo 'grel): kan sel/ /cho ga'i khyad par la brten nas/ /nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/ /dur bying rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /de rtsa dmar nag dkar ba yis/ /rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yin/ /de la tri byid mchog tu bshad/ /nyes pa med cing bde bar
227b5(mdo 'grel): 'khru/ /brgyal rmongs byed cing lkog ma ni/ /rtsub cing gnod pa byed pa dang/ /rno zhing myur du 'khru byed pa/ /lto sra nad gzhi shas che dang/ /sdug bsngal gyis nyen nad pa la/ /ma sha dur byid bsngags pa yin/ /de ni za bsu zug cing 'jam//
227b6(mdo 'grel): thad kar 'phros pa ma yin pa/ /btus la snying po bor nas ni/ /shun pa bskams te sba bar bya/ /de nas de yi 'og phye ma/ /rgyam tsha dong ka cung zad btab/ /rlung nad la na skyur las blung/ /mkhris pa sbrang rtsi kha ra mar/ /'o ma rgun 'brum bu
227b7(mdo 'grel): ram shing/ /khu ba btang bal mngar ba yi/ /sman de 'bras bu gsum gyis ni/ /khu bar bcas pa blud par bya/ /bad kan nang la pi lu yi/ /khu ba ba gcin chang skyur rtsa bas/ /tsha ba lnga sogs phye ma ni/ /bad kan 'joms? dang ci rig ba
228a1(mdo 'grel): sbyar/ /dur byid lde gu khu ba dang/ /bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs kha ra/ /sbrang rtsi dri bzang gsum dang bcas/ /lde gu yid 'ongs kru sman yin/ /ardza gand+ha mig rkang dang/ /ka ra dur byid byi da ri/ /phyer btags sbrang rtsi

228a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshul byas de bza' bya/ /shing tsha sug smel mnyam ni ling/ /de mnyam dur bying sha ka ra/ /phye ma sbrang rtsi rgun chu dang/ /phye ma skyo mar sbyar te blud/ /rlung mkhris bad kan las gyur dang/ /me drod chung ba'i nang dang ni/ /skyid

228a5(mdo 'grel): pa byin na ni/ /skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang/ /gzugs 'khums lung pa yi ga 'chus/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur nang/ /mang po gzhan dag sbyor bar byed/ /pi pi ling rgya byi TAngka/ /'bras bu gsum dang 'u su dang/ /
228a6(mdo 'grel): tsi tra ka dang na la sham/ /pi pi ling dang dug mo nyung/ /za ri ha sti pi pi ling/ /ti ma mu sa dang lan tshwa lnga/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis phye mar byas/ /dur byid dang ni til mar gnyis/ /srid na brgya brgya char bsres dang/ /skyu ru ra yi
228a7(mdo 'grel): khu bre gsum/ /bu ram srad ni lnga bcu me/ /chu bskol de las ran tsam ni/ /zos na mdze dang gzhung 'brum dang/ /mig ser za khu skran dang ni/ /dmu rdzid mtshan mar brdol ba dang/ /pho ba'i nad dang skya rbab rnams/ /'jomS
228b1(mdo 'grel): shing chog bsrung mi dgos/ /bu skyed bar yang de yi byed/ /bu ram dge ba can zhes bya/ /dus kun tu ni 'phrod pa yin/ /tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum/ /gla sgang dang ni bi TuM ka/ skyu ru ra ni thams cad ni/ /mnyam pa'i dur byid khar dang/ /
228b2(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi'i ril bu byas zos na/ /gcin sri rims dang blon bro dang/ /lud pa sha skem mgo 'khor dang/ /za byed lus tsha skya bab dang/ /me drod chung dang dud nad sbyong/ /dur byid dug mo nyung maS bon/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga rnams/ /sbrang
228b3(mdo 'grel): rtsi rgun 'brum chus sbyar ba/ /dbyar gyi dus kyi bkru sman yin/ /dur byid gla sgang byi tsher dang/ /kha ra tsa na dan ba li ka/ shing mngar sa ta la'i phye ma/ /rgun chu dang sbyar ston gyi yin/ /dur byid pa ta kru krug tres/ /zi ra shu thag sa ra
228b4(mdo 'grel): la/ /khron bu'i phye ma chu dron sbyar/ /dgun gyi dus su blud par bya/ /dur byid kha ra cha mnyam pa/ /so ka'i dus kyi bkru sman yin/ /dur bying sba 'bras kyi lce ba/ /sa ta la dad pu tse shel/ /khron bu legs par btags nas ni/ /ba
228b5(mdo 'grel): gcin nad du zhag gsum spangs/ /'di ni dus kun sbyor ba ste/ /snum zhen dri ma nad rnams 'byin/ /sha ma dur bying byi tshor ba/ /gla sgang ha sti pi pi ling/ /dug mo nyung dang ni li ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang pu tse shel/ /phye ma sha khu
228b6(mdo 'grel): mar dang ni/ /chu dron dang sbyar thams cad du/ /khong rtsub la yang sbyar bar bya/ rims dang snying nang dreg nad dang/ /rtug skam la sogs nad rnams la/ /dor ka'i bkru sman lhag par ni/ /'jam mngar bsil pa phan pa yin/ /byis pa
228b7(mdo 'grel): rgan po blo brdol dang/ /skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/ /'jam zhing skyon ni med pa'i phyir/ /mchog tu dod ka'i bkru sman btang/ /'bras bu'i dus su legs smin pa'i/ /de yi 'bras bu btung nas ni/ /de ni yon tan ldan gyur pa/ /khur
229a1(mdo 'grel): gcig bye ma'i nang du gzhug/ zhag bdun lon nas phyung nas ni/ /nyi ma la ni bskam par bya/ /de nas rkang ni phyung nas su/ /snod ni gtsang mar bzhag par bya/ /byis pa lo bzhi lon pa nas/ /lo ni bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar/ /
229a2(mdo 'grel): lus tsha rtug 'gags kyis gzir la/ /rgun chur sbyar te blud par bya/ /dod ka'i rkang ni mnyes pa dang/ /bskol ba'i chu ni grang mo blud/ /yang na chang dangs zho kha chu/ /skyu ru ra yi khu ba 'am/ /rang skyur dag dang bcas pa 'am/ /dur byid lde gur
229a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba sbyin/ /danda'i khu bar de yi rkang/ /bu ram rnying par bcug nas ni/ /zla ba gcig gam zla phyed bar/ /mnan pa'i chad ni blud par bya/ /seng phrom rtsa pa'i shun pa ni/ /nang gi shun lpags bor nas ni/ /bskams te phye mar byas nas ni/ /
229a4(mdo 'grel): de la cha gnyis bskol te gzags/ /ser phrom cha ni gsum ba spangs/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba dang/ /cha de slar yang spang bar bya/ /slar yang bskams te phye mar byas/ /de la zho gnyis ba gcin nam/ /chang gi dangs ma'am zho kha chu/ /rgya
229a5(mdo 'grel): shug skyu ru ra'i khu ba/ /gang yang rung dang sbyar te blung/ /seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ /lde gur byas dang kha ra dang/ /mar dang bskol ba'i lde gu de/ /bkru sman gyi ni dam pa yin/ /sh+ri khaN+Das nad kyi tshogs/ /shas cher sogS
229a6(mdo 'grel): pa'ang 'jig par byed/ /myur du 'khru zhing dregs pas na/ /lto snyi nyams chung byis ba dang/ /rgan po nad pa yun ring la/ /de ni btang bar mi bya'o/ /skran dang dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i drug/ pags nad gcin nad sprad rtsi 'dra/ /skya rbab bskrangS
229a7(mdo 'grel): dad dug gis phog/ nad kyi sems 'khrugs gyur la btang/ /de ni tshor ma rnon po yis// mang pos khyab par gyur pa mchog/ lo gnyis pa 'am lo gsum pa/ /khyad par du ni dgun gyi mthar/ /de ni mtshon gyis rnam bcad la//
229b1(mdo 'grel): de las 'o ma blang bar bya/ /bilba la sogs rtsa ba lnga/ /'bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang/ /bskol ba'i khu ba dang mnyam pa'i/ /su ta'i 'o ma dang bsres la/ /de 'og me yi mdag mar skam/ /ril bu byas pa zho kha chu 'am/ /chad dam pa gcin la sogs blung/ /dur
229b2(mdo 'grel): phyir sogs dgu 'bras pu gsum/ /khron bu sa tal dang bcas/ /su ta'i 'o mar zhag bdun spangs/ /sha khuAm mar dang sbyar te blud/ /cha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /dur byid danda tsa tri ka/ de bzhin bu ram chus sbyar blud/ /shi gi ni yi 'bras
229b3(mdo 'grel): bu ni/ /phub ma med cing ma bskams btu/ /de bzhin sapta la'i rtsa ba/ /de dag rnon por khru byed yin/ /bad kan dmu rdzid sbyar ba'i dug/ skrad sogs nad la btang bar bya/ /de gnyis ril bu zho gnyis tsam/ /chad dang rgyam tshar sbyar ba ni/ /bad rlung
229b4(mdo 'grel): las gyur snying nad dang/ /de bzhin skran gyi nad la btang/ /danda dra ban+t+ra'i rtsa ba/ /glang po'i so ltar brtan zhing sbom/ /dmar zhing gnag la rno zhing dro/ /myur du 'khru bar byed pa yin/ /lci zhing rlung nad 'khru byed cing/ /mkhris pa bad kan 'ju
229b5(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /de ni sbrang rtsi pi pi ling/ /lde gus bskus la 'jag ma dang/ /'jim pas bskus te mer bsreg cing/ /nyi ma cung zad dro bskams pas/ /'di yi rno ba bsal bar bya/ /de ni chad dang zho kha chu/ /dar ba mnan chad pi lu yi/ /khu ba gang yang
229b6(mdo 'grel): rung sbyar blud/ /nyams chung skran dang gcin snyi dang/ /dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug rnams sbyor/ /ba lang ri dags shar yi/ /khu bar sbyar bas skyu rbab dang/ /lto srin mtshan bar brdol nad sel/ /de bskol khu ba lde bu dag/ rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bskol//
229b7(mdo 'grel): mar gyi mi dpal khong 'bras dang/ /'brum phran mchan khung tsha ba sel/ /til mar bcas pas skran za khu/ /gzhang 'brum rtug 'gags par rlung sel/ /snum chen sbyar bas khu chu bshad/ /phyen 'gags rlung gi nang rnams sbyong/ /dur byid la
230a1(mdo 'grel): sogs dgu po ni/ /bkru sman gyi ni rab mchog yin/ /a ru ra yang dur byid kyi/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /bu ram srang brgyad a ru ra/ /nyi shu danda tsitra ka/ srad re pi pi ling dur byid/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis lhan cig sbyar//
230a2(mdo 'grel): ril bu bcur byas zhag bcu par/ /ril bu re re zos rjes la/ /chu dron blud cing cho ga 'dis/ /de dag thams cad zos gyur na/ /kun zos bsrung ba mi dgos par/ /'dis ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /mchog tu skya rbab pho ba'i nang/ /pags nad
230a3(mdo 'grel): zlum po gzhang 'brum dang/ /g.yan pa'i nad rnams sel ba yin/ /chung du 'am don ni chen po 'am/ /chen po la'ang las ni nyung zad dag/ 'dre dang dbye ba byas pa dang/ /dus dang sbyor ba ldan par byed/ /shing cha nA ga ge sar dang/ /a mra ta
230a4(mdo 'grel): ka se'u 'bru dang/ /sug smel kha ra sbrang rtsi dang/ /kha lu chang sogs de dang de/ /yi rang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /rig pas bkru sman btang bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //
230a5(mdo 'grel): de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi nyes pa grub par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /skyug sman lto ni snyi ba 'am/ /ltogs pa 'am bad kan shas chung ba 'am/ /shin tu rno ba 'am grang ba'ang chung/ /ma zhu ba 'am nyams chung ba//
230a6(mdo 'grel): blud na nad 'byung re ba nyams/ /de tshe thur byung nad slong 'gyur/ /de la slar yang snum 'chos bya/ /sngar gyi skyon dran skyug sman btang/ /bkru sman ma zhu bad kan dang/ /ldan pa'am shin tu rno ches la/ /dro ba 'am shin tu
230a7(mdo 'grel): shas ches pa/ /yi gar mi 'ong mangs pa yis/ /gyen du brgal bar gyur pa dag/ sngar bshad des pa de la ni/ /grub pa'i sbyor bde bzhin bya/ /de yang snod du ma chags na/ /gsum po de la blud mi bya/ /gzhan du
230b1(mdo 'grel): goms pa'ang zhim pa yi/ /sman ni gnod pa med pa btang/ /snum 'chos dugs ni ma byas la/ /sman ni snyi zhing rtsub pa yis/ /nad slongs byed bar ma nus pas/ /mgo 'khor skrang dang skyigs bu dang/ /mun par mthong dang skom dang che//
230b2(mdo 'grel): byin snying na zhing lus g.ya' dang/ /bla dang kha dog mi sdug pa'i/ /nad ni skyed par byed pa yin/ /snum chos dugs byas sman nyung zhing/ /me drod che bas zhu gyur pa 'am/ /grang bas rengs pa 'am ma zhu bas/ /nad slongs nas ni ma
230b3(mdo 'grel): phyin pas/ /nad ni de dag nyid bskyed cing/ /de nyid sbyor nyes thams cad yin/ /de la til mar rgyam tsha bsku/ /gshag ma rdo yis dugs bya zhing/ /mas btang drag byas skam sa'i sha/ kha zas byin la 'jam rtsi ni/ /po son cha dang
230b4(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling/ /thang shing til mar bskol ba btang/ /rlung 'joms rlung gi snum 'chos bya/ /slar yang bkru sman rnon pos sbyang/ /nad gzhi che zhing khong rtsub la/ /me drod chung dang sman chung ba/ /rtug skam bcas pas slongs pa dang/ /nad
230b5(mdo 'grel): kyis lam ni 'gags par 'gyur/ /mi bzang sbo dang lte ba dang/ /rgyab dang rtsib log mgo po na/ /phyi sa gcin 'gags dbugs mi bde/ /mi bzang pa ni skyed par byed/ /bsku dang dugs dang rengs bu sogs/ /mas btang drag po
230b6(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi bya/ /rtug skam gso ba'i gso dpyad lab/ /thams cad sbo bdag la phan/ /rtsa ba lnga pa nas tshig 'khus/ /shu dag pu ti ka rany+dza/ /rgyam tsha nas thug legs sbyar bas/ /gzer nad rtug skam lto sbos 'joms/ /thal
230b7(mdo 'grel): sman se 'bru pi pi ling/ /shing kun bca' sga star bu dang/ /rgyam tsha bcas pa'i chang dam ni/ /mar ram chu dron bcas pa blud/ /mkhregs cing yongs su 'dzag pa dang/ /na zhing bcad snyam sems ba sel/ /sman 'thungs gyur pa'i shugs 
231a1(mdo 'grel): bkag na/ /rlung la sogs ba'i nad rnams ni/ /'khrugs te snying gi phyogs stod nas/ /snying nas mi bzang skyed par byed/ /skyigs bu lud pa rtsib logs na/ /rmya zhing mig 'gul kha chu 'dzag /dran pa nyams shing lce 'cha'
231a2(mdo 'grel): la/ /so ni krig krig 'cha' bar byed ? de la sman pas ma rmongs bas/ /mkhris pas nyen la mngar ba dang/ /bad kan gyis nyen kha ba yi/ /skyug sman dag ni myur du btang/ /de nas de la smin byed pa'i/ /nad kyi ltag ma smin par bya/ /
231a3(mdo 'grel): de yi me drod lus kyi stobs/ /rim gyis mngon par 'phel par byed/ /shas cher slon gyur rlung gis ni/ /nang gi snying ni gzer gyur pa/ /de la snum gyur lan tshwa sbyin/ /mkhris pa bad kan de las gzhan/ /sman ni 'thungs par gyur
231a4(mdo 'grel): nas shugs/ /bkag par gyur ba'ang bad kan gyis/ 'gags pa'am shin tu sbyangs gyur pa'i/ /lus la rlung ni 'jug 'gyur bas/ /rengs dang 'dar dang zug pa dad/ /lus snyoms dkris snyam sems shing zug/ de la rlung ni 'joms

231a6(mdo 'grel): gyi lhag ma slon du gzhug/ skyug sman drags la bkru sman btang/ /'khrus drags skyug sman 'jam po btang/ /de la chu rang klugs pa btang/ /ro sman bcing bas bcad par bya/ /tang zil tsan dan pu she tso/ /ra khrag kha ra'i chu
231a7(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /'bras yos phye ma'i skyom ni/ /sbyor drags sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /slon sman sbyor ba drags pa la/ /chu brang? dag ni blugs par bya/ /rgun 'brum la sogs khu ba mar la sbrang rtsi kha ra'i skyo ma blud/ /sgrags pa
231b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par shin tu skyug/ mur pa 'u su sla sgang dang/ /stang zil ma du ka bye ma/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin/ /slon mthar lce ni 'khums pa la/ /snum dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang/ /ldan pa'i mkhur pa bkang ba dang/ /yid 'ong lug sha sha khu phan/ /

231b3(mdo 'grel): kyi sbyor ba bya/ /sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa yi/ /srog ces bya pa'i khrag phyung na/ /gang phyir de ni srog 'phrog pas/ srog len pa ni yin par bshad/ /khrag de dang ni zas bcas pa/ /khyi 'am bya rog la byin la/ /zos na srog ces brjod

232a1(mdo 'grel): po bsdus ba las/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas sman mas btang ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /ba la sle tres ra sna 'bras bu gsum/ /rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis srang re'i
232a2(mdo 'grel): tshad ? po son cha brgyad pa sha srang lnga bcu chu nang bskol te bzhi cha lus gyur pa/ /btsags phal la phud dang po son cha/ /bilba ru rta sha da puShpa dang/ /shu dag gla sgang pi pi ling rnams kyi/ /lde gu bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dang ni//

232a5(mdo 'grel): ba chung du lnga/ /kye lce ba dang e raN+Da dang nas/ /bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang ra sha'i khu/ /de'i phyed bcug la bskol te bre gang lus/ /bri yam ku dang gla sgang pi pi ling/ /lde gur bcas shing til mar zhun mar dang/ /sbrang na?

232b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /nA ga ge sar muny+dza te ka dang/ /tsan dan rnam gnyis btags pa mar dang ni/ /sgrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan byas pa/ /bskrangs ba'i ni ru ha ni btang bar bya/ /slar phyung skam sa'i sha khu 'am 'o ma dang/ /'bras chan byin la lus

233b7(mdo 'grel): nang bskol/ /bzhi cha lus pa btsags nas ni/ /'o ma bre do dang bsrel la/ /'o ma lus pa slar yang bskol/ /skam sa'i sha khu bzhi cha dang/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha shing mngar dang/ /shu tri dur byid pi pi ling/ /dug mo nyung dang skyes
