234a4(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /mas btang rlung ni sel ba'i mchog/ shin tu ro tsar byed pa yin/ /rma bya'i gshog pa mkhris pa dang/ /rgyu ma rkang pa mchu rtug pa/ /bor ba'i shin 'ba' shig dang/ /rtsa ba lnga pa chung du ni/ /srang re dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /chu dang
234a5(mdo 'grel): 'o mar bskol nas ni/ /'o ma lus par sbrang rtsi mar/ /bcas dang de bzhin bi da ri/ /shing mngar shu ti pi pi ling/ /po son cha yi lde gur bsres/ /rgyam tsha chung zad btab pa yi/ /'jam rtsi stobs 'phel ra rtsa'i mchog/ gong ma bsregs
234a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa la'ang/ /cho ga 'di ni so sor bya/ /khron gyis gzas tshol thams cad dang/ /mthu rtsal mchu yis gzas tshol ba/ /chu la gnas pa'ang de bzhin te/ /nya la 'o ma spang bar bya/ /sram dang ne'u le byi la dang/ /reg 'jam
234a7(mdo 'grel): byi ba rnams kyi sha/ re re srang bcu rtsa ba lnga/ /'o ma'i nang du bskol nas ni/ /'o ma der ni po son cha/ /pi pi ling dang lan tshwa gnyis/ /kha ra til mar sbrang rtsi mar/ /'jam rtsi btang na bcud len yin/ /rtsol bas dkrugs glo
234b1(mdo 'grel): 'grams pa dang/ /dbang po nyams dang gzi mdangs stobs/ /khu chu bshang gci 'gags pa dang/ /dreg nad kyis 'theng nad rnams dang/ /rta dang glang po shing rtas g.yengs/ /rkang lag chag grugs gyur pa la/ /slar ni bde bar 'tsho byed cing/ /ro rtsa byed
234b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mchog yin no/ /kha sral bu ram shing phran las/ /g.yos su byas pa'i 'o thug blud/ /snum zhing bsdam pa mi dgos pa'i/ /grub pa'i sman ni sbyar bar bya/ /nad 'joms bsrung dang bcas pa yi/ /snum gyi 'jam rtsi bshad bya ste/ /rtsa ba bcu pa pa la
234b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ra sna a sha gand+ha dang/ /ba sbru ba dang e raN dang/ /sle tres ga pra'i rtsa ba dang/ /ba sha ka dang bu ti ka/ sa ha ra tsa nyer shing pa/ /ka ka na se srang re dang/ /nas dang ma sha zar ma dang/ /rgya shug rgya sran khyor re'i tshad/ /chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi bskol//
234b4(mdo 'grel): de las bre ni bcu drug lus/ /'tsho byed sde ni srang re bcug/ til mar bre ni bzhi dang bskol/ /'di ni 'jam rtsir btang gyur na/ /rlung nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags zhag/ 'tsho byed sde dang bcas par bskol/ /shu ti nas dang bilba
234b5(mdo 'grel): sgyur/ /til mar bskol bas rlung nas sel/ rgyam tsha mdog dmar gyur gyi bar/ /mer bsregs mar gsur nad rlung 'joms/ /dzI ban+ti dang po son cha/ /med rnam gnyis sra ba ni/ /shing mngar ba la shu ti dang/ /zangs rtsi ba dang pi pi ling/ /ka ka na
234b6(mdo 'grel): si nyer shing ba/ /kha sral sh+ra ri ka ka ri/ /zur ba karka ta sring gi/ shu dag btags pa'i lde gu dang/ /til mar mar dang 'o ma ni/ /bzhi 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol/ /'jam rtsi nyams rtas rlung mkhris 'joms/ /stobs dang khu ba me drod
234b7(mdo 'grel): 'phel/ /khrag dang khu ba'i nad sel byed/ /bu skyed par yang byed pa yin/ /rgyam che ru rta bo son cha/ /shu ti lcang ma shu dag dang/ /ba la ka dang shing dang ra dang/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba kadpa la/ /thad shing dong kra ma nu dang/ /me da dbyi mong tsi tra ka/ zur
235a1(mdo 'grel): ba bong da bi TAngka/ /shA? ma dur byid ta re nu/ /sti ra bilba ni yi ni/ /ting mu sa dang pi pi ling/ /danda ra sna cha mnyam pa/ /a raN+Da yi mar ram ni/ /til mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi yis/ /bad kan nad 'joms rgyu rlungs dang/
235a2(mdo 'grel): rtug skam skan dang gzhang 'brum dang/ /mcher pa'i nang dang gcin snyi dang/ /rung 'khyil ba dang lto spos dang/ /rde chags nang ni myur du sel/ /yang na bilba la sogs pa'i/ /rtsa ba lnga dang til mar bskol/ /yang na bad kan sel sman sbyang
235a3(mdo 'grel): til mar dang btang bad kan 'joms/ /yang na po son cha brgyad 'gyur/ /skyur bskol 'jam rtsi bad kan sel/ /'jam rtsi 'jam pa rmongs 'gyur la/ /rnon pos nye bar sbyang par bya/ /rno bas gnod pa snum pa dang/ /mngar zhing bsil
235a4(mdo 'grel): pa 'jam pa btang/ /rnon po ba gcin pi lu dang/ /tsi tra ka dang lan tshwa? dang/ /thal sman dang ni yungs kar rnams/ /dus la bab par btang ? bya/ 'o ma mar sogs 'jam po yin/ /nad stobs dus dang nad gzhi rang bzhin dag/ rnam
235a5(mdo 'grel): bar phye ste 'jam rtsi btang bar bya/ /rang rang gi ni sman gyi sde tshan gyis/ /dang rang gi ni nad rnams bsal bar bya/ /tsha bas nyam thag la bsil ba/ /bsil bas nyen la dro 'jam sbyar/ /de dang 'tsham pa'i sman ldan par/ /'jam
235a6(mdo 'grel): rtsi btags te btang bar bya/ /sbyang bar bya ba'i nang rnams la/ /rtas byed 'jam rtsi mi btang zhing/ /mi gang mdze gcin nang kyis nyen/ /chil rgyas nad la btang mi bya/ nyams chung glo 'grams pa dang brgyal ba dang/ /lus skam ring
235a7(mdo 'grel): dang sbyangs pa'i lus can dang/ /gang yang dri mas tshe ni bzung 'gyur la/ /spyod par byed pa'i mas gtad btang mi bya/ /yan lag brgyad bI snying po bsdus ba laS/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ //
235b1(mdo 'grel): de nas sman mas btang ba'i chogs nad phyin te sos par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /snum 'chos dugs ni ma byas dang/ /lto lcib la sman grang snum/ /tsha nyung sman tshad tshungs pa 'am/ /sman ni bska ba btang 'gyur na/ /de yi nang ni slongs gyur dang/ /
235b2(mdo 'grel): stobs chung ba yi nad ma phyin/ /sbyor ba nyes pa skye par 'gyur zhing/ /phyen dang phyi sa gcin sri dang/ /lte ba chu son zhing tsha/ /dang kar chags shing gzhang skrangs dang/ /g.yan pa'i thor bu mdog mi sdug/ mi dga' me drod chud par 'gyur/ /tshad 'khru'i
235b3(mdo 'grel): nyes pa bar ma la/ /sngar bshad sman gyi khu pa gnyis/ /de las gcig ni dro ba yi/ /btung ba blugs par bsngags pa yin/ /po son cha yi reng bu dugs/ /dus shes pa yis bkru sman btang/ /bilpa'i rtsa ba dur bying dang/ /thar shing nas dang
235b4(mdo 'grel): rgya shugs pa/ /rgya sran chang dang ba gcin bcas/ /mas gtang 'gags pa sel bar byed/ /nad gzhi shas che lus rtsub dang/ /lto sra nus pa chung btang na/ /mas btang nad gzhi slongs nas ni/ /rlung gi lam ni 'gags par byed/ /rlung ni
235b5(mdo 'grel): lam log zhugs pa nges/ /lto sbos nad rnams gzir bar byed/ /gzhan dang lto ba tsha ba dang/ /rlig pa chu son byed cing/ /snying gar 'gags pas gzer ba dang/ /phan tshun du ni 'gro bar byed/ /de la lus bsku dugs byas pa'i/ /
235b6(mdo 'grel): lus la reng bu gzhug par bya/ /bilba ba sogs sam pi lu dang/ /yungs kar ba gcin bcas mas btang/ /tsi twa thang shing til mar ni/ /bskol ba'i 'jam brtsi btang bar bya/ /shugs ni bkag par gyur pa 'am/ /btsir drags
235b7(mdo 'grel): par ni byas pa 'am/ /lan tsha snum shas chung la tsha/ /sman chung ba yis mas btang ba/ /'jam rtsis rlung gi gyen? du la?  phul/ l/kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yis brgyal dang snying nad dang/ /skom dang tsha ba la sogs 'byung/ 
236a1(mdo 'grel): brgyal ba'i nad ni mthong 'gyur na/ /de yi rdol chu grang gtor/ /ngal sos bar du g.yab pa dang/ /dbugs rdub 'byung ba byed du gzhug/ kha sbub bzhag ste rgyab rtsib logs/ /lto ba lag pa dron pos mnye/ /skra
236a2(mdo 'grel): na btegs te sprug pa dang/ /sbrul dang mche bcan 'jigs bstan/ /mtshon dang thog pab rgyal po'i mis/ /skrag bcas mas btang thur du 'thungs/ /lag pa gos kyis mgul bar bsdum/ /ci nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur bya//
236a3(mdo 'grel): srog dang gyen du rlung bkag pas/ /thung sel shing du bde 'gyur ba/ /grub pa yin na mas btang ba/ /myur du 'dren par byed pa yin/ /ru rta gla gor zho sha yi/ /lde gu skyur rtsabs sbyar te blud/ /dro dang rno dang 'khru ba yis/ /mas
236a4(mdo 'grel): btang lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed/ /dur bying a ru ra pa gcin/ /sbyar blud lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed/ /zhu ba'i gnas 'dug dugs byas la/ /rtsa ba bcu pa rgya shugs nas/ /rgya sran pa gcin bskol ba yi/ /
236a5(mdo 'grel): mas btang drang por gyur bar bya/ /sle tres smyug ma'i lo ma dang/ /bu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa/ /lo ma zung ba thang shing dang/ /pu ti ka ni ba bcin bskol/ /til mar bu ram rgyam tshar bcas/ /bkru sman lde gur bcas ba
236a6(mdo 'grel): btang/ /mas btang brang na gnas pa la/ /bilba la sogs lnga bskol btang/ /mgor gnas snang blugs dud pa rdubs/ /yungs kar lde gus mgo bo bsku/ /mas btang drod ches rno skyur drags/ /bska ches
236a7(mdo 'grel): dugs ni drags ba dang/ /nad gzhi chud zhing lto snyi la/ /yang dang yang du btang ba yis/ /sbyor ba drags pa nyid 'gyur pas/ /lto ba'i nad ni skyed par byed/ /de la bkru sman sbyar drags dang/ /gso ba mtshungs pa
236b1(mdo 'grel): nyid du bya/ /mas btang thal sman skyu rno dro/ /lan tshwa can nam mkhris can la/ /gzhan tsha 'brung cing gnod pa dang/ /yongs su 'dzag par byed par 'gyur/ /khrag ni btsos pa lta bur 'byung/ /mkhris pa'ang mdog mang 'byung bar byed/ /
236b2(mdo 'grel): lan mad shugs drag 'byung ba dang/ /yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de la khrag mkhris 'khru ba sel/ /gso bar rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /tsha ba sogs la dur byid kyi/ /lde gu rgun chur sbyar ba blud/ /de yis bshad rlung
236b3(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa ni/ /bsal nas tsha ba la sogs 'joms/ /dag gyur nas thug grang mo ni/ /kha ra dad ni bcas bar blung/ /'khru ba drags par gyur pa yis/ /bshad ba zad la kha zas ni/ /ma sha'i khu ba zan dron sbyin/ /zho dang chad

236b7(mdo 'grel): btang/ /skom dang lus tsha rmongs bag dmar/ /mdog nyams rims 'debs mun par mthong/ /mkhris pa dang 'dres yin zhes bya/ /kha mngar mas btang byas te sbyang/ /lus snyom sgyid zhan rim drag 'debs/ /cham pa

237a7(mdo 'grel): pas bya/ /bzlog pa dag ni de la bya/ /snus chos ma gyur mi btang ste/ /des ni gzhang kha chags 'gyur zhing/ /de la nad bcas rmongs bag dang/ /g.ya' dang skrad ba skyed par byed/ /de la mas btang rnon po dang//

239b2(mdo 'grel): ru ra'i phye ma/ /gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye mo/ /sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin/ /de nas mngal chu rgyam tsha ni/ /mar dang bcas pa skyug tu gzhuD?/ /skye dgu'i bdag po'i cho ga yin/ /bcas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug/ snying la gnaS
239b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rtsa rnams ni/ /btsas nas kha ni bye ba'i phyir/ /nyi ma gsum ma ma bzhi pa la/ /bud med kyi ni nu zho 'byung/ /de bas nyin zhag dang po la/ /dus gsum du ni sbrang rtsi mar/ /phyi cher ba dang sbyar ba la// sngags kyis btab ste
239b4(mdo 'grel): sbyin ba byin/ /gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa la/ /lak+Shi ma dang bskol mar blud bya/ /de nas dang bo'i nu zho ni/ /bkag pa de la mar sar ni/ /zho gnyis tsam gyi tshad sbyin zhing/ /nu zho dus gnyis blud par bya/ /ma nyid kyi ni nu zho blud/ /de ni
239b5(mdo 'grel): lus ni 'phel byed yin/ /de med ma ma shin tu byams/ /skyon med 'khrig pa spangs pa dang/ /rigs dang rang bzhin de dang mnyam/ /nad med na tshod dar la bab/ sbu ma shis shing snyam chags med/ /gnyis kyi 'o ma blud par bya/ /de gnyis
239b6(mdo 'grel): zas dang sbyong lam ni/ /phan pas 'bad de gso bar bya/ /mya ngan khro dang smyung ba dang/ /lus dub nu zha nyams pa'i rgyu/ /bu ram chad ma gtogs chang dang/ /rlan can sha khu 'o ma dang/ /'o ma can sman mya ngan sogs/ /go bzlog nu zho'i
239b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu yin no/ /mi mthun zas ni zos pa dang/ /ltogs dang sems ni nyams pa dang/ /lus zungs gnod byas sbrum ma yi/ /'o ma byis sbrum ma yi/ /'o ma byis pa'i nad skyed byed/ /nu zho med na da 'am pa'i/ /'o ma 'bri ha ta sogs rtsa 'am/ /sti ra
240a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis bskol kha rar bcas/ /yon tan de ldan blud par bya/ /drug pa'i mtshan mo khyad par du/ /bsrung dang gtor ma'i bya ba bya/ /de yi gnyen gyis mel tshe bya/ /shin tu dga' ba nyid kyang bya/ /zhag bcu rdzogs
240a2(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa dang/ /rang rig 'tsham pa'i cho ga ni/ /byed du bzhug cing btsas ma blang/ /lus la ldong ros ba bla dang/ /gi hang tsan dan a kar btags/ /rgyu skar lha'am nye dus la/ /gras pa'i yi ge mnyam pa yi/ /ming ni

240a4(mdo 'grel): yi/ /gos la gdon ni 'joms byed pa'i/ /sman gyi bdug pas 'dug pa bya/ /bya rog bsad pa snum gsum dang/ /bcas pa'i bdug pas bdug pa sngags/ /bse ru la sogs gson pa yi/ /rang btags nor bu bzang po spu/ /bra mi 'tsho byed in+t+ri sogs//
240a5(mdo 'grel): sman ni bzang po gdags par bya/ /mchog tu rtag par shu dag ni/ /lag gnyis mgul dang spyi por gdags/ /des ni tshe dang yid gzhungs dran/ /bde bskyed byed gdon laS bsrung/ /zlab bdun nam brgyad pa na/ /nad med nyin zhag shis pa la/ /ma ma'i bang du
240a6(mdo 'grel): spro bsrings la/ /dgun gyi dus su rna ba dbug/ khye'u'i dang po g.yas pa dbug/ bu mo'i g.yon bar dbug par bya/ /sman pas khab ni g.yas pas bzung/ /g.yon pas rna shal bzung nas ni/ /rna ba'i khyon gyi dbus las ni/ /mkhur chos
240a7(mdo 'grel): kyi ni phyogs dag tu/ /pags pa dag ni phug nas su/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba dang/ /mi 'gyur brtan por bzung nas ni/ /rgya skyegs kyi ni khu bas bsku/ /dbus su rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i/ /bug drang po cig char dbug /de nas rtsa ni gnas pa'i phyir//
240b1(mdo 'grel): steng 'og pos gnyis btang mi bya/ /nag po gnang sgra dmar po ste/ /rtsa de phug na dmar zhing na/ /skrad zhing tshal sra ba dang/ /gnye'u ring gzhan dbang can nad bskyed/ /de rnams nad gzhi ji bzhin du/ /gso ba dag ni bsnyur te bya/ /gnang du phug na khrag med
240b2(mdo 'grel): cing/ /na dang rma sogs 'byung mi 'gyur/ /khab rjes skud pa snum can ni/ /rjes su gzhug pa nyid du bya/ /til mar rlon par bsku ba dang/ /rgya cher der ni bskyed par bya/ /rna shal phug nas phan zas sbyin/ /de 'og sdong bu sbom po gzhug/ zhag gsum bzhag nas
240b3(mdo 'grel): rma 'tshobs nas/ /rim gyis de ni bskyed par bya/ /de nas de yi so skyes nas/ /nu zho 'thungs las rim gyis bzlog /sngar bshad 'o ma sbyin bya zhing/ /kha zas yang dang rtas byed sbyin/ /nu zho spangs nas pi ya la'i/ /rkang dang shing mngar 'bras yos dang//
240b4(mdo 'grel): pilba gzhon nu sug smel dang/ /kha ra 'bras yos drod bskyed sbyin/ /'khru gcod dad ka'i me tog/ kha ra 'bras yos skyo ma sbyin/ /gnod pa skyed par mi byed pa'i/ /sman gyi de ni nad bsal bya/ /shin tu drag nang ma gtogs gzhan/ /rna sman bkru
