244a7(mdo 'grel): bsrung pa'i phyir/ /gdon ni skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga/ /bud med kyi ni gzugs can bdun/ /lha chen po yi sbrul pa yin/ /skem byed sa ga lug thug gdong/ /khyi gdon yi dags zhes bya dang/ /bya gdon srul mo grang ba yi/ /srul mo
244b1(mdo 'grel): long ma lus srul mo/ /de bzhin bzhin gyi rgyan can ma/ /nam grub ma gru skem ma'o/ /de rnams kyis ni bzung ba'i tshul steg tu du dang rims kyis 'debs/ /sbyi tshul skram dang glal ba dang/ /smin ma 'degs shing rmya ba dang/ /lbu ba slon zhing gyen du blta/ /ma
244b2(mdo 'grel): mchu sos 'debs gnyid yar dang/ /du zhing 'khun la nu zho la/ /mi dga' skad ni 'gyur ba dang/ /glo bur du ni sen mo yis/ /rang gi ma ma'i yan lag 'brad/ /de la skem byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags/ /mig gcig mchi ma zag pa dang/ /yang dang yang du
244b3(mdo 'grel): mgo bo brde ba/ /phyogs cig nyams shing lus rengs la/ /rdul bcas skye ba rengs pa dang/ /so cha nu zho la mi dga' / /sdangs shing du la skad gsang nyams/ /kha yo kha chu skyug pa dang/ /mi zad par ni gyen du blta/ /tshil khrag dri pro yid mi dga' / /bshad
244b4(mdo 'grel): ba khu tshur la bcangs shing/ /mkhur tshos mig dang smin ma gcig/ g.yo zhing mig ni gnyi ga dmar/ /des ni yan lag nyes nyams pa 'am/ /'chi ba kho nar byed par 'gyur/ /skem byed rjed byed mtshan ma ni/ /dran pa nyams shing yang dang yang/ /skra
244b5(mdo 'grel): 'bal skye ba 'gugs pa dang/ /rnam par 'dud cing glal bzhin du/ /bshang dang gci bas 'byin par byed/ /lbu bar skyug cing gyen du blta/ /rkang lag smin mas gar yang byed/ /nu ma rang lce so yis 'debs/ /kun tu g.yo zhing gnyid yar rims//
244b6(mdo 'grel): khrag ni rnag gi dri blo ba'o/ /lug thug gdong gi rtags kyi nad/ /sbo zhing rkang pa lag pa dag/ 'dar zhing lbu ba skyug pa dang/ /skom dad che 'khru chang kha sdems/ /skad gsang dma' zhing mdog mi sdug/ 'khun zhing slon par byed pa dang/ /lud pa
244b7(mdo 'grel): skyigs bus 'debs gnyid yang/ /so yis mchu gnan yan lag sdud/ /rengs shing lug thug dri bro la/ /gyen du lta zhing rgod pa dang/ /bar du 'gugs shing rims kyis bde bas/ /brgyal zhing mig gcig sbrang? ba yin/ /khyi yi gdon gyi rtag
245a1(mdo 'grel): gyur ba/ /'dar zhing ba sbu ldang ba dang/ /rdul zhing mig ni 'dzum pa dang/ /rgyab tu 'gag cing lce dang so/ mchu dang rkan sgra 'byin zhing skyug kha shang ba'i dri 'byung khyi skad 'byin/ /yi dags kyi ni gdon gyi rtags/ /ba sbu ldang zhing yang yang dangs
245a2(mdo 'grel): blo bur la du rims kyis 'debs/ /'khru zhing slon byed lud pa lu/ /glal skom mi ro'i dri dang ldan/ /lus ni skyod cing g.yo ba dang/ /skem zhing dengs la mdog mi sdug/ khu tshul sdems shing mchim 'dzag/ bya gdon lus stod 'khru bar byed/ /
245a3(mdo 'grel): lce rkan lkog mar rma 'byung zhing/ /thod bur na zhing tsha la gnag/ tshigs dag tu ni yang yang 'byung/ /mtshan mo skye la nyin mo 'bri/ /kha 'am bshad sgo ma nags pa dang/ /'jigs shing bya yi dri dang ldan/ /rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin
245a4(mdo 'grel): phrul mo'i slon zhing 'dang ba dang/ /lus snyoms mtshan mo gnyid yang dang/ /skyigs bu lto sbos 'khru ba dang/ /skom zhing gcin ni sri ba dang/ /lus lhod ba sbu gshor ba dang/ /kha ltar dri ni mnam pa yin/ /grang ba'i srul mo 'dar ba
245a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /du zhing zur gis blta ba dang/ /skom zhing 'khrul rgyu ma 'khrug/ zhag ltar dri ni mnam pa dang/ /yan lag log gcig grang pa dang/ /cig shos dro ba nyid yin no/ /srul? mo long ma'i slon ma dang/ /rims dang lud pa gnyid
245a6(mdo 'grel): chung dang/ /shang ba sla zhing mdog mi sdug/ dring bskus bas myur du bskams/ /mthong ba nyams shing mig na g.ya'/ /mig skrad glo bar gyur pa dang/ /skyigs bu mi rgod nu zho 'drang/ /mdog mi sdug cing dang ro rtsub/ /mdog
245a7(mdo 'grel): nyams nya yi dri dang ldan/ /yang na dri ni skyar bcas yin/ /bzhin rgyan can gyi rkang pa dang/ /lag pa rdo ni mdzes pa dang/ /rtsa ni nag por snang ba yis/ /lto ba khyab cing rims kyis 'debs/ /yi ga 'chus shing yan lag na/ /ba
245b1(mdo 'grel): gcin lta bu'i dri 'byung 'gyur/ /rnam gru gnag cing sdo ba dang/ /mig dang rna ba snang byed 'grub/ /mig 'gul skyigs bu lung pa lu/ /kha ni yo zhing mar pa dang/ /lug thug dri ldan rims 'debs skyem/ /bshad ba sngo zhing sla ba yin/ /nam gru skem
245b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i lus kun ni/ /rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba dang/ /skra 'byi zas la mi dga' dang/ /skad gsad zhum zhing mdog mi sdug/ bshad ba kha dog sna tshogs dang/ /lto bar rtsa yi mdud pa chags/ /du zhing bya rgod dri ldan la/ /yun ring na par byed
245b3(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /lto ba rmen bu zlum po 'byung/ /bshad ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung/ /lce yi dbus ni dma' ba dang/ /rkan ni gnag 'gyu de spang bya/ /kha zas mang du zos kyang ni/ /byis pa gang zhig lus skem byed/ /skom pas nyen zhing mig nyams ba/ /de ni nam gru skem mos
245b4(mdo 'grel): gsod/ /'tsho ba ? dga' mchod bar 'dod/ /gdon rnams 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no/ /de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/ /byin tsho sna nas 'dzag pa dang/ /lce nyams mig ni gting du 'bros/ /'degs byed mig ni 'chi mar bcas/ /nyams chung chig ni dman pa dang//
245b5(mdo 'grel): dring ba yi 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skem zhing rang gi bshad dang gci/ /lag pas nyed cing smos mi byed/ /lag pas btegs ste 'bad pa yis/ /bdag dang de bzhin gzhan la brdag/ mtshon dang shing sogs kyis brdeg cing/ /'bar ba'i mi la 'jug
245b6(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /chu nang sbyid zhing khron par ltung/ /gzhan yang de 'drar byed par 'gyur/ /skom dang tshe zhing tsha bas rnag/ slon bar byed bar 'gyur ba dang/ /bu ga kun nas khrag 'jog cing/ /mchi ltas byung ba de spang bya/ /dga' ba 'dod pas gzir 'gyur
245b7(mdo 'grel): ba/ dben par bud med 'dod smra dga' / /dri dang me tog phreng rgyan dga' / /mgu zhing zhi ba gso ba dga' / /lce ni kha la nyug ba dang/ /mchu rkan phre ba bskams pa dang/ dogs bas da lta zhing du ba dang/ /sems khong chung cing zhum pa dang/
246a1(mdo 'grel): zas 'dod ltogs par gyur kyang ni/ /byin na za bar mi 'dod la/ /gtor ma 'dod pas zin pa ste/ /de ni gso sla yin par bshad/ /srog 'dod pa la grub pa yi/ /sngags bzlas sbyin sreg byas pas gzhon/ /cig shos la ni ci
246a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod par/ /dga' dang gtor ma sogs sbyin pas/ /de nas gsor rung gdon la ni/ /byis pa khang pa dben par bzhag/ zhag gsum chag chag phyag dang byas/ /rtag tu me ni bzhag pa yi/ /bu ti'i me tog bsil ma dang/ /'dab ma sa bon
246a3(mdo 'grel): yungs kar gtor/ /gdon 'joms til mar sbyar ba yi/ /mar mes gdon ni 'joms par byed/ /nad g.yog nyal po chad dad sha/ yongs su spangs par gyur ba yi/ /mar ni rnying pas bskus nas ni/ /bal ni m+ba star ga ni/ /dod gra thad
246a4(mdo 'grel): shing kotra ka/ 'dzam bu dang ni sh+ra ma la/ /ka tri na dang lcam pa dang/ /a pa marga ma ta li/ /mu tu sh+ri tru zhes bya dang/ /ka ka dza ka shwa ta che/ /bil rkad 'o ma can gyi shing/ /ka dam+ba bcas karny+dza/ /chu ni dro 'jam dag gis bkru/ /stag dang gzigs
246a5(mdo 'grel): dang seng ge sbrul/ /dom gyi lbags ba mar dang bcas/ /bdug pas khrus byas 'og tu 'dug/ /bu ti yungs kar sha raM ka/ shu dag go bye la lpa phud/ /ru rta mar bcas gdugs bas ni/ /gdon kun las ni thar byed yin/ /yungs kar nimpa'i?
246a6(mdo 'grel): lo ma dang/ /shu dag kar bi ra'i rtsa/ /dro ba mar sbyar bdugs pas ni/ /gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /ba lang ra dad rus pa spu/ /lpags byi la'i rtug pa dang/ /ni ma'i lo ma spa? ce shel/ /mar dang 'bri ta ? gnyis dang/ /ngas pa la?
246a7(mdo 'grel): sa bon po son cha/ /nas dad ra spu thad shing dang/ /yungs kar rma bya'i sgro dang po ga?/ skra dang phub ma pha bam dang/ /rdza mar ra thug gcin dag spangs/ /zhib btags pa yi bdug pas ni/ /'byung bo'i gdon ni thams cad ?/
246b1(mdo 'grel): mi bzang rims nad 'joms par byed/ /byi tshor a mra'i tshig gu dang/ /rgya spos mngar sde na me shan/ /pri sna par+Ni gla sgang rnams/ /lde gu byas pa mar dang ni/ /'o ma rtsa ba bcu bskol khur/ /bcas bskol de ni gdon 'joms mchog/ ra sna i shu ma
246b2(mdo 'grel): ti gnyis/ /ba la rtsa ba chen po lnga/ /gla sgad btags te mar dang bskol/ /cha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka/ thal tres pa tra bi TA ka/ shing mdang shing kun pa ya sya/ /thad shing pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /dug mo nyung dang bcas pa yi/ /lde gu med dang bskol ba ni/ /rtag tu
246b3(mdo 'grel): byis pa la phan zhing/ /nad dang gnod pa thams cad 'joms/ /me drod stobs dang kha dog bskyed/ /sha ri pa dang mu ra dang/ /pra ti shu dag sham gi ni/ /nyung dkar a shwa gand+ha dang/ /bye'u rug par bcas mar dang bskol/ /de ni btud dang bsku
246b4(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /gdon rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /mar gang 'byung po'i rig pa ru/ /'og nas ba bshad ba dag dang ni/ /de bzhin gtor ma sbyin sreg dang/ /khrus ni sngags rgyud shes par bya/ /pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa/ /bar bar yi rtsa ba
246b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sku ba kha bo bi sha la/ /ka tra ka dang bilba dang/ /ka pi ta bskol des mtshan mo/ /byis ba bkrus na shes pa yin/ /gdon dang bral yang brla gnyan nad/ /rjes su 'brel pa thams cad la/ /byis pa'i nad gsol bshad pa yi/ /sman
246b6(mdo 'grel): gyis ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gnas phyi ma'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /byis pa gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //
246b7(mdo 'grel): de nas 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /shes dang rnam shes tshig dang ni/ /spyod dang snying stob pa rang bzhin dag/ gang gi rang bzhin 'gyur ba snang/ /de la 'byung po'i gdon yod bshad/ /'byung
247a1(mdo 'grel): po'i gzugs dang rang bzhin dang/ /smra dang 'gro sogs spyod pa dang/ /gang zhig 'dra bar byed pa rnams/ /de la de ni zhugs par bshad/ /de ni lha dang lha min sogs/ /dbye bas rnam pa bco brgyad bshad/ /de 'dzin rgyu ni
247a2(mdo 'grel): 'phral gtam ni/ /sngon chad shes rab 'chal pa yis/ /blo yis nyes pa byas gyur nas/ /de yis chags pa sogs bskyed nas/ /brtul zhugs spyod dang chos lugs nyams/ /mchod 'os rnams ni brnyas pa dang/ /gzhung lugs nyams
247a3(mdo 'grel): pa de dag ni/ /sdig dang bdag ni gsod byed ni/ /gdon ni glags skabs tshol byed pas/ /lha la sogs pa'ang rjes gnod byed/ /glags ni sdig la sogs pa dang/ /mi dge'i las ni smin pa dang/ /gcig bu khang stong gnas
247a4(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ /dur khrod sogs par mtshan mo gnas/ /gcer bur rgya pa'am bla ma smod/ /'khrig pa tshul min spyod pa dang/ /gtsang sbra med par lha mchod dang/ /mi gtsang gzhan dang 'dres pa dang/ /sbyin sreg sngags gtor mchod sbyin
247a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /phyin ci log tu byed pa dang/ /mdor na nyin re sogs spyod par/ /spyod pa bstan pa las 'das pa'o/ /lha yi gdon gyi yang ngo yi/ /chos gcig bcu gsum dag la 'dzin/ /lha min gdon ni yang ngo yi/ /bcu gsum mar do
247a6(mdo 'grel): bcu gnyis la/ /dri za'i gdon ni bcu bzhi dang/ /bcu gnyis dag la'ang 'dzin par byed/ /klu gdon tshes lnga la 'dzin byed/ /gnod sbyin gdon ni yang ngo yi/ /tshes bdun bcu gcig dag la 'dzin/ /tshangs pa'i srin po'i yar do yi//
247a7(mdo 'grel): chos brgyad? bco lnga dag la 'dzin/ /srin po sha za sogs mar do'i/ /tshes gcig chos dgu bcu gcig la/ mtshun lha gnam stong chos bcu dang/ /brgyad dang dgu pa dag la 'dzin/ /rgan po la sogs gzhan dag ni/ /phal cher dus de'i thun
247b1(mdo 'grel): mtshams pa'o/ /lha yi gdon gyis dbang byas pa/ /gdon ni pad+ma kha bye 'dra/ /lta stangs zhi zhing khro ba med/ /tshig nyung rdul dang bshad gci nyung/ kha zas la ni 'dod pa med/ /lha dang bram ze byung ba dga' / /gtsang zhing sam skri ta'i skad smra/ /yun ring nas ni mig
247b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzums shing/ /lus dri zhim zhing mchog ster byed/ /gos phreng dkar po chu bo dang/ /ri mtho kha ba mtho la dga' ?/ /gnyis med tshugs pa med pa yin/ /lha mig gdon gyis zin pa ni/ /yon por blta zhing rang bzhin dan/ /lha dang bla ma bram ze dang/ /'jiD
247b3(mdo 'grel): med khengs shing dpa' ba dang/ /khro zhing rtsol ba che pa dang/ /da ni drag po khyab 'jug dang/ /skye med brgya byin yin zhes bshad/ /sha dang chad la dga' zhes bya/ /dri tha'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /rang spyod la dga' lus dri zhim/ /snying dga' glu dang
247b4(mdo 'grel): gar yang byed/ /khrus dang skyed mos tshal la dga' / /gos phreng byug pa dmar la sred/ /sgeg dang rtsed mo la dga' 'o/ /klu yi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /mig dmar khro zhing mi 'gyur lta/ /yon 'od 'gro zhing blta ba dang/ /nyin mtshan dbugs
247b5(mdo 'grel): rgod lce las ni/ /kha chu 'dzag cing kha 'gram ldag/ bu ram 'o ma khrus la dga' / /kha sbub tu ni nyal bar byed/ /gdugs mthong na ni 'jigs pa yin/ /gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /mig dmar dgrang cing skrag la 'bul
247b6(mdo 'grel): lus ni dri zhim gzi mdangs ldang/ /gtam dang glu dang khrus nas ni/ phreng ba byug pa la dga' zhing/ /nya yi sha sred dga' ba dang/ /dga' mgu stobs che nad med la/ /lag rtsa bskyod cing su zhig la/ /ci zhig sbyin zhes smra bar byed/ /gsang
247b7(mdo 'grel): tshig smra zhing dman pa dang/ /bram ze la ni brnyas pa byed/ /khro ba chung zhing mgyogs 'gro ba'o/ /tshangs pa srin pos zin pa'i rtags/ /rgod cing gar la dga' ba dang/ /spyod pa gtum zhing glags skabs tshol/ /gshe zhing myur du 'gro ba dang//
248a1(mdo 'grel): sman pa bram ze lha la sdang/ /rang la shing dang mtshon sogs brdeg/ kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing/ /bstan bcos rig byed 'don pa yin/ /srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /khro gnyer bcas shing khro bar blta/ /rtabs bag tu
248a2(mdo 'grel): ni byed ba dang/ /brdeg cing rab tu rgyug pa dang/ /du zhing gdod ni 'jigs rung ston/ /zas ma zos dang stobs dang ldan/ /gnyid med mtshan mo rgyu ba dang/ /ngo tsha gtsang sbra med cing dpa' / /gdug cing tshig rtsub smra ba dang/ /khro zhing phreng ba dmar
248a3(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /bud med sha chad khrag la dga' / /sha 'am khrag ni mthong ba na/ /mchu ni bldag par byed pa dang/ /zas za'i tshe na rgod pa yin/ /sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /sems ni bde bar mi gnas shing/ /yongs su rgyug par
248a4(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang/ /mi gtsang la dga' glu gang dang/ /rgod dang chad dang sha rlon dga' / /spyos na gdong ni zhum pa dang/ /rgyu med par ni du ba dang/ /bdag nyid sen mos 'brud pa dang/ /khong rtsub lus nyams skad gsang dma'//
248a5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ba ni brda sprod cing/ /'brel dang mi 'brel tshig mad smra/ /dran pa nyams shing gnas stod dga' / /mi rtan gcer bu dri ma can/ /srang bar 'khyam zhing gos gyon zhing/ /rtswa yi phreng ba rgyun tu thogs/ /shing 'dzeg rta la
248a6(mdo 'grel): zhon par byed/ /de bzhin phyag dar phung por 'dzeg/ /mang du za bar byed pa yin/ /yi dags gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /spyod tshul dri ni yi dags 'dra/ /sngar zhing zas la mi dga' dang/ /rtsa gcod byed pa zhes kyang bya//
248a7(mdo 'grel): grul bum gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /tshig mar smra zhing kha gdod gnag/ /dal gyis 'gro bar byed pa dang/ /rlig pa skrangs shing 'phyang ba yin/ /mi na byad stems zin pa'i rtags/ /shing rdo bod ba sogs thogs shing/
248b1(mdo 'grel): tshal ba gyon te 'gro ba drag/ /gcer bur rgyug cing 'jigs bag tu/ /lta la rtsa yis brgyan du byed/ /dud khrod gnas ni stod pa dang/ /srang bar shing gcig brden pa dang/ /til zas chad dang sha la ni/ /rtag tu mig ni chags pa dang/ /tshig rtsub
248b2(mdo 'grel): de ni smra ba yin/ /g.yangs byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags/ /chu 'dod zas ni mi slong dang/ /sngags shing mig ni dmar ba dang/ /tshig rtsub smra bar shes par bya/ /ro langs gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing/ /tshig bden
248b3(mdo 'grel): smra la yongs su 'dar/ /gnyid che bar ni shes par bya/ /yi dags tshun lha'i gdon gyi rtags/ /mig mi gsal zhing bzhin ras zhun/ /rkan ni skam par byed pa dang/ /mig dang rdzi ma bskyod pa dang/ /gnyid che me drod chung pa dang//
248b4(mdo 'grel): g.yon phyogs nas ni gos gyon zhing/ /sha dang bu ram til la dga' / /tshig 'khrul ba ni yin zhes bya/ /bla ma drang srong rgan dang grub/ /dmod pa'i sems kyis rjes mthun pa/ /spyod lam kha zas rang bzhin las/ /ci 'dra gdon ni
248b5(mdo 'grel): de yin bshad/ /zho nu'i tshogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing/ /gcar bu skra ni gyen du brdzes/ /yid mi bde zhing dus tshigs ni/ /yun ring gyur pa'i gdon de spang/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//
248b6(mdo 'grel): de nas gdon nad thams cad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /'byung po 'tsha pa mi 'dod dang/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang/ /brtul zhugs tshul khrims mnyam 'jog dang/ /sbyin shes btsol sogs pas bsal/ /shing kun ba bla tsha ba gsum//
248b7(mdo 'grel): gla rtsi sgog skya arka'i rtsa/ /spang spos a tsa lo ma dang/ /zla ba 'bam po ku ku ti/ shu dag gand+ha pri yam ku/ /sarba gand+ha til dang ni/ /ka ka and+ha ra ma nye ba/ /? ta ka ka ta sri ma gi/ sla tri sa mahA na pa lo/ /yungs kar dang ni lig bu
249a1(mdo 'grel): mig/ gdon 'joms sman ni gzhan dag dang/ /bong bu rta dang khyi lug dang/ /rnga mo go da dred dang ni/ /sre mo re 'jam byi la gung/ /ba lang seng ge sta ka dang ni/ /rgya mtsho yi ni srog chags kyi/ /pags pa mkhris pa sen mo so//
249a2(mdo 'grel): sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying dang/ /til mar dang ni bskol ba dag/ btung dang snar ni blug pa dang/ /bsku ba'i don du sbyar bya zhing/ /'di dag phye mas bdug par bya/ /'di yi ril bu byas nas ni/ /mig sman sna sman bya ba dang/ /'di yi lde gus byug pa dang//
249a3(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i khu ba blug par bya/ /sbyor ba 'di yis smyo byed dang/ /rjed byed bcas pa'i gdon zhi byed/ /yungs kar ha ti pi pi ling/ /pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /skyu ru ra dang go da dang/ /sre mo byi la rtsa sha yi/ /mkhris pa dang btags sna sman dang//
249a4(mdo 'grel): bskur byug blug sogs byas gdon 'joms/ /nyung kar shu dag shing kun dang/ /pri yam ku dang ser po gnyis/ ki ri kar+Ni dkar nag gnyis/ /'bras bu gsum dang shel ta dang/ /nim pa'i lo ma ka rany+dzar/ sh+ri sha gnyis dang sa bon dang//
249a5(mdo 'grel): thang shing dang ni tsha ba gsum/ /mar dang ba gcin de bzhi 'gyur/ /bskol ba don grub ces bya ste/ /btung dang snar blugs las sbyar na/ gdon ni thams cad myur 'joms byed/ /mchog tu lha min gdon sel byed/ /rjed byed dug dang bkra mi
249a6(mdo 'grel): shis/ /smyo byed rjed byed rims rnams 'joms/ sman de nyid ni ra thug gi/ gcin dang sbyar te blud pa dang/ /snar blugs smin sman byug pa dang/ /khrus dang dril ba la sbyar ba/ /sngar bshad yon tan de 'dra zhing/ /rgyal po'i sgor yang
249a7(mdo 'grel): don 'grub byang/ /yungs kar shu dag tsha ba gsum/ /a shwa gand+ha ser po gnyis/ /shing kun kun dang rtsa ba dang/ /ka rany+dzu yi sa bon dang/ sh+ri sha yi ni me tog dang/ /ka bi ta yi 'bras bu dang/ /rgyam tsha ru rta rgya spos dang/ /kyi ri karni dkar po dang/
249b1(mdo 'grel): son ka yi rtsa bar bcas/ /ba gcin dag dang legs bsgos shing/ /ba lang mkhris pa bu ram dang/ /ril bu byas pa'i sbyor ba de/ /mig bskus snar blug bsdu? byas na/ smyo byed rma ni red ba dang/ /mtshan mo mi mthong mun 'thib byed/ /bgegs dang lus chur
249b2(mdo 'grel): nub pa brgyal/ /dug bskus mda' yis phog pa dang/ /gdug ba sbrul gyis zin pa sel/ /ngas bal sa bon rma bya'i sgro/ /me tog sman ma bri ha ti/ /shing tsha spang spos po son cha/ /byi la'i rtug pa phub ma dang/ /shu ngag mi skra sbrul lbags dang/ /glang
249b3(mdo 'grel): po'i so dang glang gi rwa/ /shing kun dang ni na le sham/ /cha nyams bdug par byas pa yi/ /skem byed smyo byed sha za'i rigs/ /srin po lha yi gdon 'joms mchog/ gand+ha pa tra tsha ba gsum/ /gur gum pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /kan ta ka ri skyer ba dang/
249b4(mdo 'grel): thang shing dang ni yungs kar? gnyis/ /ba li ka dang dug mo nyung/ /tsan dan dkar po rgyam tsha dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang bu shel tse/ /shu thag spangs ma bu rtse shel/ /tsan dan dkar po ba la dang/ /shing mngar sug smel ldong ros dang/ /shug pa
249b5(mdo 'grel): rgya pos sh+ri ba sa/ /ma du ka yi snying po dang/ /bo da gnyis po pri yam ku/ /dbyi mo ru rta skyer khaN+Da da/ /cha mnyam zhibs btags lde gu dang/ /mar rnying gcin kun cha mnyam bskol/ /gdon khus 'debs zhes bya bar brjod/ /de blud gdon 'joms
249b6(mdo 'grel): mchog yin no/ /rgya sbos shing mngar ka rany+dza/ /rgya skyegs da da pa to la/ /shu dag shing kun pa to la/ /yungs kar kaN?  ka ri dang/ /ser po gnyis dang pu tse shel/ /rgya shug karta pri yam ku/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /thang shing sle
249b7(mdo 'grel): tres bi h+rAdka/ /ko sha ta ki ka kaN+Da/ /shi dru ni ma ba dug mo nyung/ /sh+ri sha'i me tog sa bon dang/ /gla sgang ru rta danda dang/ /gi ri karni tsi tra ka/ /bilba cha mnyam lde gur byas/ /mar rnying can gyi sde tshan bcas/ bskol te yun ring bzhag pa de/ /khus
250a1(mdo 'grel): 'debs chen po zhes bshad do/ /rim pa kun gyi sbyar na ni/ /gdon rnams kun dang smyo byed dang/ /mdze dang rims ni myur du 'joms/ /gdon ni nyi ma gang gang la/ /'dzin pa'i nyi ma de dang der/ /mchog tu sbyin sreg gtor ma sogs//
250a2(mdo 'grel): sman pas rab tu 'bang de bya/ /khrus dang gos dang sha dang tshil/ /tshang dang mar dang bu ram sogs/ /gang zhing gang la sred gyur pa/ /de tsha de ni de la sbyin/ /rin chen dri dang phreng ba dang/ /sa bon mar dang sbang rtsi dang/ /zas kun kun la sbyin bya ste//
250a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni sbyi yi cho ga'o/ /lha dang bla ma drang srong rgan/ /grub la lha yi gnas su sbyin/ /de yang lha yi gdon la ni/ /byang gi phyogs su gtor ma sbyin/ /lha min gdon la ci 'dod par/ /mtshams kyi gnas su nub tu sbyin/ /dri za'i gdon la ba lang ngam//
250a4(mdo 'grel): gos dang rgyan bcas gtor ma sbyin/ /mtshun lha klu yi gdon 'bab chu/ /klu la shar lho mtshams su sbyin/ /gnod sbyin rang gi gnas sam ni/ /nu gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su sbyin/ /srin po'i lam gyis bzhi mdo 'am/ /tshang ching 'jigs su rung
250a5(mdo 'grel): bar sbyin/ /srin po'i lho yi phyogs su sbyin/ /tshangs pa srin po'i shar du sbyin/ /sha za la ni khang stong du/ /nub phyogs bsu ni gnas te sbyin/ /phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar po dang /dri dang 'o thug 'bras chan dang/ /zho dang gdugs ni dkar po dang/ /lha
250a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ni gtor mar 'dod/ /shing kun yungs kar shu dag dang/ /tsha pa gsum ni srang phye phye/ /mar bre gang dang ba yi gcin/ /bzhi 'gyur dang ni lhan cig bskol/ /de btung snar blugs bkrus pa yis/ /lha yi gdon las thar bar byed//
250a7(mdo 'grel): shu dag shing kun sgog skya rnams/ /ra gcin sbyar ba snar blug dang/ /mig bskus lha yi gdon las thar/ /lha min? gtor ma 'bras bu ni/ /mang po dag dang bu shel tso/ /klu yi gdon la dzA ti dang/ /'bras yos bu ram snum khar dang//
250b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras chan bu ram bcas pa dang/ /zas mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang/ /sa nag nA ga ge sar dang/ /shu dag pad+ma bu shel tse/ /utpal pad+ma dmar po yi/ /'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /ser phrom lo ma dkar po dang/ /rgya sbos nA ga ga
250b2(mdo 'grel): sar dang/ /yungs kar chu grang la btab pa'i/ /snar blugs mig tu bskus pa'ang phan/ /gnod sbyin gdon la 'o ma zho/ /mar dang 'bras chan bsres pa dang/ /gu gul pad+ma thang shing dang/ /pu shel tse dang gos dang gser/ /dbyig ni gtor mar sbyin
250b3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /mar dang 'o ma ba gcin ni/ /cha mnyam bskol dang btung ba dang/ /snar blugs lus la bskus na phan/ /a ru ra dang ser po gnyis/ /sgog skya shu dag na le sham/ /nam pa'i lo ma ra gcin btags/ /lde gus sna sman mig sman bya/ /tshangs pa srin po'i
250b4(mdo 'grel): gtor ma ni/ /nas bre bzhi ni btsos pa yi/ /chu bre bcu drug til btags bsres/ /gdugs dang gos dang byug pa sbyin/ /seng ldeng srang ni nyi shu dang/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ shing kun shu dag shu ti dang/ /yungs kar nim pa'i la mar
250b5(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /sgog skya srang ni phyed phyed dang/ /zhun mar phul ni bdun dag dang/ /bag cin sum cu bskel ba dra/ /btung dang snar blugs bskus na phan/ /srin po'i gdon la til phye dang/ /me tog dkar po 'bras chan 'dres/ /sha btsos rjan pa niShpa
250b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /nag ta ma la sh+ri sha ni/ /shun bags me tog 'bras bu dang/ /de bzhin pa ta la nag po/ /balbi'i? rtsa ba tsha ba gsum/ /shing kun yungs kar dug mo nyung/ /sgog skya skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu/ /ra gcin dang ni sbyar ba'i sman//
250b7(mdo 'grel): snar blug mig tu blugs na'ang phan/ /'di dag nyid dang mar gyi ni/ /bzhi 'gyur ba gcin bskol ba ni/ /btung dang snar blugs bskus pa yis/ /srin po'i don ni zlog par byed/ sha za la ni bu ram chang/ /til tshigs til gyi phye ma zho/ /la phug lan tshwa 
251a1(mdo 'grel): phye zan mar/ /'byung po'i 'bras chan gtor ma sbyin/ /ser po rnam gnyis rgyam tsha bcod/ /shu ti dong gra bri yam ku/ /shing kun sgog skya tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu gsum dang pa ta lo/ /shu dag gi ri karni kar/ /sha ri sha yi me tog
251a2(mdo 'grel): mar/ ba gcin bzhi cha bcas par bskol/ /btung dang bsku ba byas na phan/ /yang na de nyid rang gcin btags/ /mig bskus smar ni blugs na phan/ /lha dang drang srong mtshan lha dang/ /dri za'i gdon la sna sman sogs/ /rnon po btang bar mi bya zhing/ /'di la zhun
251a3(mdo 'grel): mar btung la sogs/ /sman ni 'jam po spyad par bya/ /sha za ma gtogs thams cad la/ /ma mthun sbyin par mi bya ste/ /mthu stobs tsha ba de khros nas/ /nad pa sman pa bcas gsod byed/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ mgon
251a4(mdo 'grel): po phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /nad kun gso par mdzad pa yi/ /sngags bzlas nas ni nad kun sel/ /de bzhin smyo byed brjod byed dang/ /gzhan yang sems 'khrul byed pa 'joms/ /rig sngags rgyal mo rma bya che/ /gtsang byas de la rtag tu
251a5(mdo 'grel): skrag/ 'byung po bdag mo lha chen dang/ /de yi 'khor gyi tshogs mchod cing/ /de yi sngags grub bzlas na yang/ /gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /gang yang 'og nas bshad pa yi/ /le'u gnyis las smos pa dang/ /gang 'di bshad pa de dag
251a6(mdo 'grel): kun/ /phan tshun sbyor ba byas na phan// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas smyo byed gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /smo byed nad gzhi re re dang/ /'dus
251a7(mdo 'grel): sogs dug las gyur pa drug/ smyo byed ces bya lus dang ni/ /sems kyi nad la log pa ru/ /zhugs pas myos par gyur pa yin/ /bza' btung gnod ba dag dang ni/ /snying dang ma goms dri mar bcas/ /mang nyung ma snyoms bsten pa
251b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /yid zhum snying stobs chung ba dang/ /nad kyi shugs ni dkrugs pa dang/ /rid cing sbyod pa ma snyoms dang/ /mchod 'os mchod par mi byed dang/ /sems las kyis ni sems nyams dang/ /dug dang nye ba'i dug las gyur/ /'di yis snying stobs zhan
251b2(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /snying gi nad la gnod byas te/ /blo ni dri ma can byas te/ /yid rgyu ba yi lam bkag nas/ /smyo byed dang ni skyed par byed/ /de yi blo dang rnam shes dang/ /dran pa 'khrul zhing lus kyi ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal las nyams te/ /shing rta kha lo bsgyur ba
251b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /med pa lta bur rtsom pa ni/ /kun kyang bsam pa med par spyod/ /de la rlung gyur lus sbeg cing/ /rgyu med du zhing tshig rtsub smra/ /rgod dang 'dzum dang gar byed dang/ /glu len rol mo byed pa dang/ /lus bskyod pheg ni rdob pa dang/ /gling bu pi wang
251b4(mdo 'grel): la sogs kyi/ /sgra yi lang mo yang yang zlos/ /rgyun du kha nas lbu ba 'dzag/ phan tshun rgyug cing mang du sma/ /rgyan min pas ni rgyun du byed/ /bzhon pa min pas 'gro ba rtsom/ /kha zas la ni gang du bar byed/ /de snyed na ni mi 'dod byed/ /mig zlum
251b5(mdo 'grel): mig ni dmar ba dang/ /kha zas zhu nas nang ldang 'gyur/ /mkhris las sbyo zhing khro ba dang/ /khu tshur bor ba brdeg cing rgyug/ grib ma chu ni grang mo 'dod/ /gcer bur 'dug cing lus mdog ser/ /med par men 'bar ba dang/ /skar ma mar me
251b6(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'o/ /bad kan slon zhing yi ga 'chus/ /kha zas rtsol dang smra ba nyung/ /bud med 'dod cing dben la dga' / /kha chu sna bas ni 'dzag pa dang/ /'jigs rung gcang? sbra la mi dga' / /gnyid che gdong ni skrang ba dang/ /nub mo shas cher smyo
251b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /thos ma thag tu ldang ba yin/ /'dus pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma ni/ /kun ldan de yi bdag nyid can/ /smyo byed mi zad par shes bya/ /de ni sman bas yongs su spang/ /nor dang chung ma la sogs bral/ /mnag bska ba las sems gdungs pas//
252a1(mdo 'grel): smyo zhing zhum la yang yang brgyal/ /kyi hud kyi hud smre sngags 'don/ /glo bur du ni du zhing brgyal/ /de yi yon tan mang du sems/ /mya ngan gyis gdung sems khong chud/ /gnyid yir rnam par 'khyams pa yin/ /dug gis
252a2(mdo 'grel): gdong ni sngo ba dang/ /gzi nyams dbang po stobs chung pa/ /shugs kyi bar duAng 'khrul par byed/ /mig dmar de ni spang bar bya/ /de nas rlung 'gyur smyo byed la/ /dbang po snum gyi btung ba blud/ /lam 'gags rgyu la ngang bor ni/ /snum bcas
252a3(mdo 'grel): spyad pa 'jam po bya/ /bad kan mkhris gyur dang po ni/ /snum dang dugs bya skyug sman dang/ /bkru sman mas btang byas pa dang/ /mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang bya/ /de ltar lus ni dag byas nas/ /yid ni dran ba rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ltar na yang rjes
252a4(mdo 'grel): 'brang na/ /sna sman mig sman rnon? po btang/ /sems dang dbugs 'byung skrag pa dang/ /'jigs dang brdeg dang sdig mo dang/ /lus dris byug dang bsku ba dang/ /dud rdub sman mar blung bdag/ /sbyar te de ni dga' 'gyur na/ /yid ni tha mal 'ang
252a5(mdo 'grel): la sbyar/ /shing kun dang ni rtsa bas ru tsha/ /tsha ba gsum ni srang gnyis gnyis/ mar bre bzhi ni ba gcin bcas/ /bskol bas smyo byed 'byung po dang/ /rjed byed gdon ni sel mchog yin/ /b+h+raM sta'i bskol khu bre do dang/ /mar bre gang dang tsha ba gsum
252a6(mdo 'grel): sha mdur byid bimpa dang/ /shangka puShpa dod ka dang/ /sapta la dang pi DAngka/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis lde gu bskol/ /b+h+ra mha'i sman mar zhes bshad de/ /mar ni srang res bskyed de btang/ /che tshad srang bzhi'i mar zos na/ /smyo byed rjed byed
252a7(mdo 'grel): mdze yi nad/ /sel zhing mo gsham bu skyed byed/ /skad snyan tshig gsal dran pa dang/ /yid gzhungs pa la ni skyed par byed/ /'bras bu gsum dang bi TAngka/ /pa tra e la thang shing dang/ /e la ba lu ka dang ni/ /thal tes rnam gnyis
252b1(mdo 'grel): ser bo gnyis/ /s+thi ra rnam gnyis ? yang ku/ /rgya spos ru rta bri ha ti/ /nA ga ge sar dod ka btsod/ /se 'bru bal bu'i lo ma dang/ /dzO ti kha 'bus bi TAngka/ /danda shu dag ut ba la/ /tsan dan dkar po zho gnyis gnyis/ /zhun mar bre gang bcas
252b2(mdo 'grel): bskol ga/ dge ba'i sman mar zhes bshad 'dis/ /'byung po'i gdon dang smyo byed dang/ /rjed byed lung ba sdig can 'joms/ /skya rba bab g.yan pa skem dang dug/ rmongs bag gcin snyi dbyig dug rims/ /khu ba med pa 'am bu med ba 'am//
252b3(mdo 'grel): dran pa gdon gyis brlams pa dang/ /yid gzhungs med cing tshigs khrus dang/ /dran nyams me drong chung la phan/ /stobs bskyed bkra shis tshe ring zhing/ /mdangs bskyed skal ldan lus rgyas byed/ /bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di la
252b4(mdo 'grel): thal tres rnam gnyis sogs/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig chu nang bskol/ /de yi khu pa mar dang ba/ /lan cig skye bo bzhi 'gyur dang/ /med rnam gnyis ram nye ba/ /bur tsha brda dong kha sral bre'u/ /bu ram shing dang bar+Ni gnyis/ /bskol ba yi ni sman mar 'di/
252b5(mdo 'grel): dge ba chen po zhes bya ste/ /rtas byed 'dus pa'i nad 'joms shing/ /snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag/ spang sbos bu ta ke shi dang/ /chu rtsa shu dag kha sral bre'u/ /kyi lce ba dang ram nye ba/ /tsa rong dza ya pu tso shel/ /sle tres ce tra pa ra ha/ /a ti
252b6(mdo 'grel): ca ta ya ta la/ /ma ha bu ru sha dan dang/ /na gu li gnyis skyu ru ra/ /briShtsi ka la ka dam+ba/ /sa la par+Ni bcas bskol mar/ /sha za chen po'i mar zhes bya/ /des ni nyin bzhi ba'i rims dang/ /smyo byed rjed byed gdon 'joms shing/ /blo dang yid
252b7(mdo 'grel): gzhungs dran pa bskyed/ /byis pa rnams kyi lus 'phel byed/ /bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra ba yin/ /b+h+ramti in+d+ra bi DAngka/ /shing kun spang spos murba dang/ /ra sna sgog skya bo da dkar/ /shu dag bye'u rug ba sha la/ /nA ga dan+ti byi tsher ga/ dzo ti smra ti
253a1(mdo 'grel): tsha ba gsum/ /a ru ra dang sa nag rnams/ /glang po'i gcin btags ril bur byas/ /grib bskams snar blugs mig bsku zhing/ /lus bskus spos bdugs smyo byed sel/ /yungs kar dang ni sbyar ba yis/ /sna
253a2(mdo 'grel): sman rnam pa sna tshogs phan/ /yungs mar gyis ni lus bsku dang/ /yungs kar phye ma snar blud bya/ /mdog nas bstan pa'i cho ga ba zhin/ /dud rnon shing kun bcas pa phan/ /wa dang re 'jam 'ug pa dang/ /byi ba ra thug dzA ti ka'i//
253a3(mdo 'grel): gcin dang rtug pa sbu dang ni/ /phags pa mkhris pa sen mo dang/ /spos bdag mig sman lus bsku dang/ /byug dang blug pa bcad par bya/ /bad kan rlung 'gyur la phan cher/ /khyi dang ba lang nya sha ni/ /rul pa'i gdug pas bdug
253a4(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /mkhris gyur la ni tik+ta'i mar/ /'tsho byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar/ /bza' dang btud pa bsil ba dang/ /mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gtor ma gdab/ /yang na sha tshon gyis 'drangs bya/ /de
253a5(mdo 'grel): 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas/ /sems myos pa las thar bar 'gyur/ /khrom pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug/ ltogs pa nyid du byas te skam/ /de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i/ /gtam snyan mdza' bos sems dga' bya/ /yang na
253a6(mdo 'grel): sdug pa dang bral pa 'am/ /rmad du byung bas bstan pa 'am/ /bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te/ /nyin mtshan la ni gan rkyal bzhag/ kha sral phre'u 'am lcags tsha 'am/ /til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya/ /yang na lcags
253a7(mdo 'grel): kyis ba zhus nas ni/ /bcings te g.yang? sar skyur bar bya/ /yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i/ /mun khang mi ni med par gzhug/ mche ba ston pa'i sbrul dang ni/ /glang dang seng ge glang po ches/ /de ni skrag tu gzhug pa'i//
253b1(mdo 'grel): yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu yis/ /dam du bcings te phyir byung nas/ /rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang/ /'di bsang bya zhes skrag tu gzhug/ lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jigs bas/ srog ni 'jigs ba rab 'jigs pas/ /de phyir
253b2(mdo 'grel): kun tu 'khrul pa'i yid/ /nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /nad dmigs dus sogs bltos te bya/ /sdug dang nor dang bral ba las/ /gang gi yid la gnod 'gyur ba/ /de la de 'dra gnod 'gyur pa'i/ /sbro
253b3(mdo 'grel): srid dbugs dbyung ba yis gso/ /'dod dang mya ngan 'jigs pa dang/ /khro dang 'jims pa chang las gyur/ /gnyis dag gis ni gcig la gcig/ de dag gnyis kyis zhi bar bya/ /bshad pa'i mtshan ma las lhag pa/ /gdon dang
253b4(mdo 'grel): rjes 'brel yin zhes bya/ /gal te smyo byed gdon las gyur/ /gdon gsor bshad pa'i sman sbyar bya/ /til btags phye ma nas dang zan/ /snum zhing mngar ba'i kha zas dang/ /'bras ni khrag tu sbrus pa dang/ /sha ni bcos pa rje na
253b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /'bru chad sbyar chang mnan pa'i chang/ /a ti muk+ta'i me tog dang/ /dzA ti sa ha ra dza yi/ /me tog bcas pa'i gtor ma ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo ba lang ltas/ /chu bo 'dus pa dag tu sbyin/ /gang zhig sha dang chad spangs shing/ /phan
253b6(mdo 'grel): la brtson zhing gcad sbra tsha/ /snying stobs can la lhan cig skyes/ /glo bur smyo byed 'byung mi 'gyur/ /dbang po'i don ni gsal ba dang/ /de bzhin blo dang yid gsal pa/ /lus zungs tha mal bar gnas pa/ /smyo byed dang bral mchan ma
253b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /byi ma'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //de nas rjed byed gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rjer byed dran pa nyams pa ste/ /de ni snying stobs blo 'khrul dang/ /sems las mya
254a1(mdo 'grel): ngan 'jig sogs kyi/ /gnod 'gyur sems las byung ba yin/ /lus sems rtog pa'i nad kyis ni/ smyo byed bzhin du 'khrugs gyur pas/ /snying stobs nyams shing snying dang ni/ /'du shes rgyu pa'i rtsa sbubs khyab/ /mun pa
254a2(mdo 'grel): zhugs shing snying sems rmongs/ /'jigs su rung ba'i bya ba byed/ /so 'cha' lbu ba skyug pa dang/ /lag pa rkang pa g.yob pa dang/ /gzugs med par yang mthong ba dang/ /'khru zhing sal 'gyel ba dang/ /smin ma mig g.yo nad shugs
254a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bral nas sad par gyur pa dang/ /de ni dus gzhan dag tu yang/ /de bzhin du ni spyod pa yin/ /rlung la sogs dang 'dus pa yi/ /dbye bas rjed byed rnam ba bzhi/ de ni skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshul/ /snying 'dar khong stong mgo
254a4(mdo 'grel): 'khor la/ /mun par mthong zhing sems khong chud/ /smin ma mi sdug mi 'gyur dang/ /sgra mi thos shing rdul 'byung la/ /ba chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang/ /mi 'ju yi ga 'chus shing brgyal/ /lto spos nyams stobs zad pa dang/
254a5(mdo 'grel): gnyid med skom zhing yan lag na/ /rmi lam glu len gar byed dang/ /til mar chang ni 'thungs pa dang/ /de gnyis gcin du 'byung pa rmi/ /de la rlung 'gyur brla 'gul zhing/ /yang dang yang du 'gyel ba dang/ /yang dang yang du dran bstod/
254a6(mdo 'grel): 'du shes rnyed nas mi gsal du/ /mig 'bur yang yang dbugs 'byin zhing/ /lbu par skyug cing 'dar ba dang/ /so 'cha' mgo ni brdeb pa dang/ /rlung gi gre pa rgyas par byed/ /yan lag kun tu brdeb pa dang/ /sor mo mi snyoms 'gugs
254a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /mig dang pags pa sen mo ni/ /gnag cing rtsub mor snang ba dang/ /gzugs ni mi brtan rtsub pa dang/ /mi sdug bzhin ras ngan ba yin/ /mkhris pa las gyur rjed byed ni/ /dran pa yang yang nyams pa dang/ /mig gdong pags
254b1(mdo 'grel): ba lbu ba ser/ /sra la brdeg par byed ba dang/ /'jigs rung 'bar zhing khro ba yi/ /gzugs mthong skom dang che ba yin/ /bad kan las gyur ring nas 'dzin/ /yun ring nyid nas sad par byed/ /g.yo 'gul nyung zhing kha chu mang/ /kha mig pags
254b2(mdo 'grel): pa sen mo dkar/ /gzugs rnams dkar po mthong ba yin/ /mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa spangs/ /de nas blo sems dran ba dang/ /snying ga'i sbubs ni sang byed pa'i/ /slon sman la sogs las rnams ni/ /rnon po yi ni spyad par bya/ /rlung 'gyur
254b3(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi mang du bya/ /mkhris gyur phal cher bkru sman btang/ /bad kan phan cher skyug sman ni/ /btang bas rjed byed gso par bya/ /rnam kun tu legs dag cing/ /legs par sgro ni bsrings pa la/ /rjed byed las na thar bya'i phyir/ /zhi bar
254b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i sbyor ba nyon/ /ba lci'i khu ba 'o ma dang/ /zho dang gcin dang mar bskol ba/ /rjed byed rims dang smyo byed dang/ /mig ser sel bar byed pa blud/ /rtsa ba bcu dang 'bras bu gsum/ /dug mo nyung shun ser po gnyis/ /a pa marga lo ma bdun//
254b5(mdo 'grel): ni li ni dang pu tseco shel/ /dong ka buSh+kar mu la dang/ /phal gul rtsa ba byi tsher srang/ /gnyis gnyis chu bre bcu drug nang/ /bskol ba la ni bzhi cha lus/ /ga bra'i rtsa po du pa ri/ /pa ta danda dur byid dang/ /tsha ba gsum dang ro hi sha/ mu rba rtsa mkhris bu de kha
254b6(mdo 'grel): ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/ /ma du yan te thal tres gnyis/ /lcang ma dang ni tsi tra ka/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis mar bri gang ka? de bzhin snga ma'i gsher rdzas bskol/ /'di ni pa yi rnam lnga che/ /rjed byed rims dang dmu rdzing dang/ /mtshan mar rdol ba sel
254b7(mdo 'grel): mchog yin/ /'or nad gzhang 'brum mig ser dang/ /sbya rbab skran dang lud pa dang/ /gdon rnams 'joms par byed pa yin/ /b+h+re sta'i shu dag ru ja dang/ /shangka pushaba par rnying bcas /bskol ba'i mar ni yang zhungs byed/ /skyo byed bkra mi shis pa
255a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rjer byed sdig pa 'joms par byed/ /'tsho byed sde tshan srang re dang/ /til mar zhun mar bre re bsres/ /'o ma bre ni bcu drug bskol/ /'thungs na rjed byed las thar byed/ /'o ma bu ram shing khu dang/ /bre ba ni dang ni tang bal gyi//
255a2(mdo 'grel): khu ba brgyad 'gyur dag dang ni/ /'tsho byed sde tshan zho gnyis gnyis/ /zhun mar breg bcas bskol blud/ /des ni rlung mkhris las gyur ba'i/ /rjed byed myur du sel bar byed/ /de bzhin 'jag ma pi da ri/ /ku sha bu ram shing 'o ma/ /bskol ba 'thungs
255a3(mdo 'grel): pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /ku sman na yi khu ba mar/ /bco brgyad 'gyur dang shing mngar gyi/ /lde gu bces ba bskol bas ni/ /rjed byed sel bar byed pa dang/ /bro dang tshig bsal skad snyad byed/ /ba ni ser skya'i mkhris pa yi/ /sna sman btang yang mchog tu phan//
255a4(mdo 'grel): khyi dang wa dang byi la dang/ /seng ge sogs kyi mkhris pa bsngags/ /go ta sre mo glang po che/ /ba lang dreng dang bri sha ta'i/ /mkhris pa til mar bskol ba dag/ lus bsku snar ni blud na'ang phan/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /nas tshig 'khus thal ko
255a5(mdo 'grel): nyon tshe/ /pha nid dza ka sra rtsi bog/ a ba marga ka rany+dza'i/ /sa bon til mar ra gcin dang/ /bcas pa bskol ba snar blug pa 'am/ /phye ma sna nas bus ba'ang phan/ /sre ma 'ug pa sbre'u dang/ /bya rgod khyi rta bya rog sbrul/ /mchu dang sgro dang rtug pa yi/ /dud
255a6(mdo 'grel): pas 'di la 'dug par bya/ /til mar sgog skya bcas ba 'am/ /'o ma nye'u shing bsten na'ang phan/ /b+h+raM mhi'i ma ru rta'i khu ba 'am/ /shu dag sbrang rtsir ldan pa'ang phan/ /nad bzhi mnyam du 'khrugs pa las/ /lus dang sems la brten 'gyur
255a7(mdo 'grel): nad/ /skyes par gyur ba gang yin de/ /rjed byed gnad ni chen por gnas/ /de bas gso bka' 'di la ni/ /bcud kyi len gyi gso bar bya/ /des nyen me dang chu la sogs/ /yang ba las rtag tu srungs/ /thar pa na ni yid 'khrul bas/ /khyed
255b1(mdo 'grel): kyis 'di ltar byas so zhes/ /mi brjod yul ni yid 'ong bas/ /mnyam pa'i sems ni brtan par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gdon gso ba'i
255b2(mdo 'grel): yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas mig mchu'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/ /nang gzhi nad kun las bshad pa'i/ /gnod par nad ni 'khrugs pa dang/ /mchog tu mig la gnod pa dang/ /phal cher mkhris pa skyes pa yis/ /rtsa las gyen du
255b3(mdo 'grel): brgyud nas ni/ /mig gi yan lag mig mchu gra/ /dkar nag mtheng byed rgyal mo 'am/ /mig kun la gnas nad skyed byed/ /de la rlung ni mig mchu yi/ /rtsa la zhugs par gyur pa dag/ nyal nas ldang cho mig mchu ni/ /har ba gnang dang bcas par byed/
255b4(mdo 'grel): mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam sems/ /btsum par dka' zhing mchi ma 'dzag/ mnyes na bde ba nyams su byed/ /de ni 'dzum dka' yin zhes bshad/ /rlung gis mig mchu bskyod nas ni/ /yang dang yang du 'byed cing 'dzums/ /de ni 'dzum pa zhes
255b5(mdo 'grel): bshad do/ /gra mtshams lhod cing tshor ba med/ /rtag tu 'dzums shing mig nyams ba/ /gang yin de ni rlung gnod yin/ /mkhris pas mig mchu'i mdza' mar ni/ /'brum bu ku mu da yi ni/ /sa bon 'dra slar gang gyur pa/ /'brum phran ku
255b6(mdo 'grel): mu ngo zhes bya/ /tsha ning 'drul la nad dang bcas/ /dmar zhing reg na mi bzod la/ /mkhres pa mig mchur skyes pa de/ /mkhris pa pskyes pa yin zhes bshad/ /mkhris rdzi ma'i nang gnas shing/ /g.ya' zhing tsha bar byed pa dang/ /de rjes rdzim
255b7(mdo 'grel): 'byi ba de/ /rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur mig mchu'i nang/ /'brum phran dkar po yungs kar 'dra/ /mthug skrangs g.ya' na mig rdul khebs/ /sbyin bag can 'dzag po dag kyang/ /har bag 'drul la rdu mas khebs// 
256a1(mdo 'grel): bad kan gyis bslad mig mchu'i nang/ /bad kan las gyur rmen bu dkar/ /na zhing smin ma med g.ya' sra/ /rgya shug tsam ma ma de las ni/ /cung zad chung ba chags pa yin/ /khrag las 'brum phran dmar ba dang/ /de mtshungs
256a2(mdo 'grel): 'brum phran gyis khyab pa/ /brtsegs pa zhes bya des bskyed dmar/ /reg mi bzod pa mig mchu slongs/ /mig mchu'i nad du sha lhag ni/ /sra zhing snum la tsha zhing na/ /mdog ser de ni khrag 'dzag cing/ /bcad cing 'phel byed mig
256a3(mdo 'grel): 'brum yin/ /mig mchu'i mdza' ma dbus su ni/ /g.ya' zhing tsha lan bcas brtan/ /mung+ga tsam gyi khrag 'brum dmar/ /'brum phran mig nad ces bya'o/ nad kyis min mchu'i phyi rol skrangs/ /nang du bu ga phra mos khyab/ /'dzag bcas nad du
256a4(mdo 'grel): chu yod de/ /pad+ma'i rtsa 'dra bad rtsa yin/ /nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs pas/ /mig mchu'i nad ni ldang ba dang/ rgyu med par ni bskyed 'gyur ba/ /de ni mig mchu 'khrugs zhes bya/ /nad kyi mag mchu dri ma khrag/ skrangs rnags nad
256a5(mdo 'grel): bcas mig mchu sngo/ /g.ya' zhing skrangs la dmar ba dang/ /mig mchu 'byar ba 'byar zhes bya/ /mog mchu'i nang ni sra zhing rtsub/ /'brum phran bye ma 'dra zhes bya/ /gnag cing 'dam 'dra 'dam bu'o/ /mdog 'dra sha ni mang bos
256a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas/ /na shas che ba zhes bya'o/ /byis pa so skyes tshen 'byung/ /des ni byis pa'i mig skrangs zhing/ /mig dmar lta par mi nus la/ /mig mchu gser zhing sbyin? bag 'dzag/ rna ba sna dang mig nyed byed/ /gang yin de ni sgra ngan yin//
256a7(mdo 'grel): rdzi 'gags rdzi ma 'dus shing zhum/ /mig mchu yang de 'drar gyur ba/ /rtsub cing nang du kha bltas la/ /spu gzhan yang ni tsher ma ltar/ /rtse ma rnon po skye 'gyur zhing/ /des bdar mig ni sgrangs pa dang/ /tsha zhing rlung la sogs mi
256b1(mdo 'grel): bzod/ /bton na cung zad bde bar byed/ /mig bugs skra mtshams phyi rol tu/ /thor bu skrad zhing mtho ba dang/ /dmar zhing mchi ma rnag khrag 'dzag yang yang rgyas pa rlon pa yin/ /nang gzhi gsum dang khrag las ni/ /mig mchu'i nang na sha'i
256b2(mdo 'grel): dum bu/ /rman bu sra la nad med pa/ /phyi rol mi mnyam g.yo 'dzer pa/ /de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi bo/ /mig mchu la gnas nad yin no/ /de la dang po sman gyis gso/ /de 'og gnyis dang 'brum bu spang/ /rdzi ma 'gags pa gsor rung tsam/ /
256b3(mdo 'grel): lhag ma mtshon gyis gso bar bya/ /de dag bas kyang 'jim? 'byi/ /btsag par bya la mig mdzer bcad/ /chags dang bad rtsa ku mung/ /brtsegs dang 'brum phran rlon pa 'dral/ /mig mchu'i sha sngo bye ma 'dra/ /'byar dang bskyed bya zhes bya bzhin dam bcas
256b4(mdo 'grel): shas cher byas pa dang/ /skra ngan bcas pa mtshon gyis bzhar/ //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad ba'o// //de nas mig mchu'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /'jum pa la
256b5(mdo 'grel): dga' mar rnying ni/ /rgun 'brum lde gu'i chu bskol bar/ /kha ra btab dang sna sman dang/ /dud pa mig sman snum can btang/ /ku mu nga la zhal zhal gdab/ /de steng rgyam tsha gdab par bya/ /shing mdar dang ni sgyu ru ra/ /ba to la bskol chu glugs
256b6(mdo 'grel): bya/ /rlung med gnas la g.yo mkhas kyis/ /sbyang byas gan rgyal nyal ba la/ /mig mchu bzlog ste dri 'jam chur/ /bsros pa'i gos kyi gdugs byas la/ /gos kyis legs par dkris nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i 'thab 'dzub kyis bzung zhing/ /'gul
256b7(mdo 'grel): zhing 'gyur ba med par ni/ /de nas mig mchu kun tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bu'i mtshon gyis ni/ /'phred du gdab cing mtshan ma byas/ /de nyid kyis sam lo rtsub 'am/ /shes pa li yi lo ma 'am/ /yang na brgya mtsho'i wu ba blud/ /khrag
257a1(mdo 'grel): ni ras bal ye 'us phyi/ /khrag bcad legs par drung shes nas/ /rang rang sman ni sbrang rtsi dang/ /bcas pa de la bsku bar bya/ /de 'og chu dron gyis bkrus la/ /mar gyis blug par bya ba dang/ /rna ba'i steng dang 'og gi
257a2(mdo 'grel): bar/ /nas kyi zan dang sbrang rtsi dang/ /mar dang bcas pas dkris par bya/ /zhag ni gnyis pa la bkrol te/ /ji lta bar ni sman blugs shing/ /bzhi par sna sman la sogs bya/ /zhag ni lnga pa dag la dgrol/ /mnyam zhing sen mo ltar
257a3(mdo 'grel): dmar la/ /skrangs g.ya' drung sogs nad med pa/ /mig mchu gzhar legs yin zhes bya/ /de las bzlog pa slar bzhar bya/ /bzhar drags pa ni na ba dang/ /rdzi ma 'byi zhing mig mchu 'gyur/ /de la snum dang dugs la sogs//
257a4(mdo 'grel): rlung la phan ba'i sbyor ba sngags/ /mar sar gyis ni bsku bya zhing/ /seng phrom dkar po mar sar gyis/ /legs par bsku ba byas nas ni/ /e raN+Da yi rtsa ba yi/ /lde gus bskus te phur ma btso/ tshos ba bkrus te bskams
257a5(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /btags pa thum po byas nas ni/ /ra 'am bud med 'o mar ni/ /mnyes pa mig tu blug bar bya/ /de nyid sa lu thug po che'i/ /lde gu bskus te de ltar byas/ /zho dang zhe kha chu spangs pa/ /mig ni bzhar drags 'gyur la blug/ yang
257a6(mdo 'grel): na zho kha chu nyi tshe/ /blugs shing skam sa'i sha khu sbyin/ /'brum phran sra zhing mtho ba ni/ /'bras kyi rtse mos brtol bar bya/ /de rjes btsir te chog ni/ /lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bya/ /zhal zhal gdab dang 'dra ba la/ /rim 'di'i
257a7(mdo 'grel): mig mchu'i nad kun sbyar/ /khrag mkhris las gyur mngar ba yi/ /sde tshan dang bskol mar gyi gso// snum gyur nas ni gtar ga gdab/ /dur byid bkru sman btang ba mchog/ bzhar zhing khrag ni phyung nas kyang/ /shing mngar
257b1(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i chus bkru zhing/ /tsan dan dkar po'i 'o ma bskol/ /mig mchu la ni blugs pa phan/ /rdzi ma 'byil khab kyis ni/ /ba spu'i bug btsags pa 'am/ /srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung ngo/ /yang na 'o ma 'am bu ram shing/ /khu
257b2(mdo 'grel): bas slon bya mngar bsil sman/ /bskol ba'i mar ni btang bar bya/ /nag tshur dkar bo'i phye ma ni/ /bye'u rug ba'i khu bar bsras/ /zangs kyi snod du bcug pa ste/ /rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig sman mchog/ mig mchu'i sha drud
257b3(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang/ /rgyam tsha'i phye ma gdab par bya/ /chu dron gyis bkrus seng ldeng dang/ /na le sham dkar tu ba ri/ /chu bskol pa 'am ser po gnyis/ /shing mngar dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blug khang
257b4(mdo 'grel): gan las gyur zhal zhal bya/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha pi pi ling/ /ldong ros stang zil zhib btags la/ /sbrang rtsi bcas pa bsku bar bya/ /skyug sman mig sman sna sman ni/ /bad kan sel ba thams cad phan/ /chags pa la'ang 'di dag
257b5(mdo 'grel): bya/ /ma zhi ma btsa' gdab par bya/ /sgra ngan pa ni seng ldeng dang ? mA'i lam 'bras bu gsum/ /mar dang sbyar ba 'am pi pi ling/ /shing mngar rgyam tsha bskal ba ni/ /ma ma blud de slon du gzhug/ rgun 'brum dang ni a ru ra/ /pi
257b6(mdo 'grel): pi ling bskol brku sman sbyin/ /ser po rnam gnyis pi pi ling/ /glang sgang lde gus nu ma bsku/ /yungs kar mar bcas dud pas bdag/ sbyang bar byas nas btal?/ /gla sgang dangni rgun 'brum dang/ /sle tres 'bras bu gsum bskol
257b7(mdo 'grel): blud/ /byis ba'i mig mchu blud ba 'am// srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung bya/ /a sman+ta ka sgyu ru ra/ /dzam+bu'i lo ma bskol ba blug/ byis pa'o ma mar bsten pas/ /phal cher bad kan nad byung bas/ /de bas dang po skyug sman nyid/ /nad
258a1(mdo 'grel): kun la bsngags ba yin/ /lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling/ /a ba marga'i 'bras bu mar/ /'o ma shu dag sbrang rtsir bcas/ /po son cha ni shing mdar bcas/ /'o ma kha zas 'o ma dang/ /zas la brten pa'i byis ba
258a2(mdo 'grel): la/ /rim bzhin blud pas nad kun ni/ /sbyang ba bya phyir slon sman btang/ /mchog tu sgra ngan nad la phan/ /sabta la yi khu ba mar/ /bskol ba gnyis ka sbyong byed sbyin// seng phrom shing mngar ser po gnyis/ /nimpa'i lo ma bu tse shel//
258a3(mdo 'grel): zangs kyi khu bar bcas reng bu/ /sgra ngan gyi ni nad la phan/ /yang na lcags kyi phye ma bsres/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi mar bcas phan/ /sug smel sgog skya ka ta ka/ pha ningtsa ka na le sham/ /dung bcas chu dang bdar ba dang/ /katpa bcas
258a4(mdo 'grel): ril bu yang phan/ /rdzi ma'i 'gags nad sel ba la/ /sbyang ba byas bar gyur pa yin/ /smin ma'i 'og gi cha gnyis dang/ /rdzi ma'i 'og gi cha gnyis dang/ /rdzi ma'i cha gcig par bar ni// nas kyi tshad tsam nas kyi dbyibs//
258a5(mdo 'grel): 'phreng du bral la ras rlon pas/ /de yi khrag ni bsal nas ni/ /khrag ni chad par gyur ba dang/ /par mtshams mung+ga tsam bzhag la/ /khab ni yon pos 'tshem par bya/ /dpral bar ras kyis bcings nas ni/ /de bzhin skud
258a6(mdo 'grel): bas 'tshom par bya/ /shin tu dam dang lhod par min/ /des ni legs par 'tshem par bya/ /de nas sbrang rtsi mar gyis byug/ 'di la bcing bar mi bya'o/ /na na n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/ /khu ba 'o mar bcas pa blug/ zhag lnga ba la
258a7(mdo 'grel): skud pa ni/ bsal ta yug rnam phye ma ni/ rma la legs par gdab par bya// sna sman mig sman rnon po btang/ /zhag bcu'i mthar yang ma sos na// mig mtshur brten gnyer bzlog sta bsreg/ rdzi ma'i lhag ma tsher bzung gis/ phyung la de
258b1(mdo 'grel): yi gnas dag ni/ /me yi mdog 'dra'i khab rtses bsag/ phyi rol rlon pa bsreg pa dang/ /thor bu bcad par gyur ba la/ /me 'am thal sman rnon bos bsreg/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u
258b2(mdo 'grel): dgu pa'o// //de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag gi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o/ /rlung 'khrugs pas ni cha rgyu ba'i/ /rtsar song nas ni chu 'dra ba'i/ /mchi ma mig mchu mig phugs kyi/ /mtshams
258b3(mdo 'grel): ni mtshim 'dzag par 'gyur/ /des ni nad med rtsad mar la/ /skrangs 'gyur de ni chu 'dzag yin/ /bad kan las gyur gcin bag mang/ /dkar ba bad kan 'dzag pa yin/ /bad kan gyis skrangs rtse mo rno/ /lan tsha'i chu bur 'dra ba 'byung/ /rtsa ba che
258b4(mdo 'grel): zhing g.yo la snum/ /mdog dkar 'jam zhing smin bag can/ /che zhing smin dka' g.ya' dang bcas/ /gzer med bcing ba lta bu yin/ /khrag la mchim khrag 'dzag dmar/ /shas cher dro ba khrag 'dzag yin/ /mig mchu gra mtshams
258b5(mdo 'grel): dkar po ru/ /'brum phran za zhing gzer dang bcas/ /dmar zhing muta 'dra la gas/ /khrag 'dzag de ni tshigs can yin/ /rnag 'dzag dri ma khrag dang bcas/ /mig phug kyi ni gra mtshams na/ /yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing/ /sha bags
258b6(mdo 'grel): 'drul pas mchi mar bcas/ /rnag sla 'dzag pa rma 'phra zhing/ /skred zhing g.yos ba che ba dang/ /mig phugs mtshams skrangs rnag 'dzag cing/ /nad bcas rnag gi chu ser 'dzag/ mig phugs kyi ni mtshams nang na/ /skrangs thug tsha
258b7(mdo 'grel): bcas chu ser can/ /mig zur ram ni mig phugs su/ /g.ya' zhing rdzi ma'i bu gnas/ /rnag 'dzag srin dang rmen bu 'byung/ /na bcas srin gyi rmen bu can/ /bcings pa lta bu srin rman bu/ /rnag gi chu ser tshigs can dag/ mtshon gyis gso
259a1(mdo 'grel): bya lhag ma lnga/ /'dzag pa chu ser bcas pa spang/ /mkhris pa dkar po'i thig le ni/ /rnag pa 'am sngo ba 'am ser po bskyed/ /gur gum me long dri mas gos/ /ltar snang na dang tsha ba med/ /'khru zhing skom dang rims dang bcas/ /nad
259a2(mdo 'grel): gzhi nya phyis can zhes bya'o/ /bad kan las dkar sha lhag dkar/ /ring nas 'phel ba mig 'dzer dkar/ /nad med pa la skrangs ba dang/ /mdog dkar lhun che 'jam pa dang/ /lci snu mchu yi thig pa 'dra// pad kan mdud pa zhes byar bshad/ /
259a3(mdo 'grel): thig la 'bras phye ltar dkar ba/ /mtho ba 'bras phye 'dra zhes bshad/ /dkar po'i ri mo dmar pos khyab/ /tsha zhing na dang bcas pa dang/ /skrang zhing mtshams gos pa med// khrag gyur rtsa yi nges par bshad/ /rtsa'i nyes ? pha bar bor nas ni/ /
259a4(mdo 'grel): dmar ris de nyid 'phel bar 'gyur/ /khrag bcas rtsa ni rtse bar byed/ /de yis mi gnyis blta mi nus/ /rtsa yi dra bas g.yogs shing stug/ mtha ba rtsa yi dra ba yin/ /khrag gi mig mdzer 'jam zhing mnyam/ /pad+ma 'dra ba sha lhag yin/ /nad
259a5(mdo 'grel): med ri bo khrag ltar dmar/ /thig le ling tog dmar po yin/ /'jam zhing nad med myur du 'phel/ /dkar po khyab byed dmar nag gi/ khyab ba'i mdzer ba zhes bya'o/ /dri ma khrag bcas rtsa'i mdzer pa/ /rtsa rgyus dang 'dra rtsa mdzer yin/ /khrag skam
259a6(mdo 'grel): gong po ltar gnag cing/ /shin che zhing rgyas pa gang/ /de ni sha lhag mdzer ba yin/ /? zhing reg na rtsub pa dang po?/ /rtsas g.yogs mig 'bras rnag dang nye/ 'brum phran yungs kar lta bus rtsa/ /nya phyis rtsa rtse rtsa'i nyes pa/ /'bras phye mdud pa'i ling tog dmar/ /drug po
259a7(mdo 'grel): sman gyis gso bar bya/ /lhag ma bdun pa mtshon kyis gso/ /de yang sar ba sman gyis gso/ /mdzer pa bshad pa lnga po gang/ /rgyus ba dang ni brtsags g.yogs pa/ /nag por phyin zhing pags gas 'dra/ /mthon po bcad par bya ba
259b1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /mthong byed steng du phyin pa spang/ /nag po 'am mthong byed la mkhris pas/ /bags pa brtol te ling tog ni/ /zug dmar mchi mar bcas pa bskyed/ /de yis mig 'bras dkyil 'khor rnag/ 'dzam bu smin pa 'drar snang zhing/ /dma' ba rma yi ling tog
259b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ /de ni gso dka' rim gnyis dag/ brtol ba gso btsam yin no/ /der ni zug pa la sogs mang/ /nag po khab kyis phug snyam byed// rim pa gsum ni brtol pa dang/ /rma yis khyab par gsor mi rung/ /bad kan las gyur dud ltar dkar// shas
259b3(mdo 'grel): tsher mig na gso sla dkar/ /dmar zhing mchim sbyin pa ga 'dzag/ 'brum phran dmar zhing shin tu na/ /ra yi ril ma 'dra zhing 'bur/ /khrag skyes ra ril 'dra ba spang/ /nad khrag btsas pas rtsa'i ling tog/ de yis mig 'bras nag po khebs/ /na zhing
259b4(mdo 'grel): tshal dmar pa yi/ /rtsa yis kun tu rgyas 'gyur la/ /rgyu med mchim grang dro dang/ /bskal 'dzag pa de spang bya/ /nad gzhi khrag las mthong bcas rnag/ 'bras bu dkar po sgyur byed de/ /sprin dkar gyis ni g.yogs 'dra zhing/ /niShpa pa ni bkas
259b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'dra// shin tu mi bzad na zhing dmar/ tsha zhing skrangs pas gzir ba dag/ smin bas nyen pa'i ling tog ste/ /mi ba zad na bspang? bar bya/ /gang gis mtshan ma nyams pa 'am/ /nang sngo ba 'am dmar bcas pas// shin tu 'bur ba 'am gting
259b6(mdo 'grel): ring ba 'am/ /mchi mar bcas shing rtsa rmas khyab/ /rnying pa 'am mtho dman can dag gam/ /dbus 'chad ling tog spang bar bya/ /nag po'i nang ni gsor rung ba dang/ /mi rung dbye bas rnam lnga yin/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus ba las//
259b7(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas mig zur dang mig gis 'bras bu dkar po dang nag po'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /mig nang bcings pa sman pa yis/ /dugs byas rtse mo 'bras 'dras dbug/ rtse mo dkyil 'khor
260a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra bas bzhar/ /de 'og rgyam tsha pi pi ling/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du bcing/ /ba to la'i lo skyu ru ra/ /bskol ba'i sman khu thigs bas blug/ tshigs can lcags kyu'i cha byad kyis/ /phyi yi
260a2(mdo 'grel): mtshams kyi cha gsum bzung/ /'phen btsags kyis ni phyed bcad bya/ /gzhan du mchi ma rgyu la gnod/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tshas bskus nas ni/ /mig mdzer lta bur gso bar bya/ /chu ser rnag 'dzag gtar ga gdab/ /de nas de ni bcing bar bya//
260a3(mdo 'grel): mi mnags cho gar bshad pa yi/ /las kun chog ji bzhin bya/ /rgyam tsha sgra gsher nag tshur dang/ /lcags dang zangs ni zhib btags pa'i/ /phye ma'i mig sman btang ba 'am/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i khu ba blug/ srin bu'i rmen bu lci ba
260a4(mdo 'grel): yis/ /dugs byas brtol te phyi bar bya/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /nya phyis mkhris mchi 'dzag ltar gso/ /bad kan 'dus pa 'bras phye gnyis/ /gtar ga ma gtogs bad kan gyi/ /mchi ma
260a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzag pa bzhin du gso/ /tsha ba gsum dang katpa la/ /ba lung khu ba'i mig sman btang/ rgyam tsha dzA ti kha 'bus ba/ /thang shing bca' sga btags pa'i phye/ /chang gi dangs mas ril bur byas/ /mig sman skrangs dang g.ya' ba sel/ /rtsa
260a6(mdo 'grel): mnyes? bya rtse ling tog dmar/ /rtsa ? khrag 'dzag lta bur gso/ /rtsa yi nyes la khyad par du/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman bsku/ /rtsa brtse ba la sbrang rtsi dang/ /skyer ba khaN+Da zhib par bsku/ /ling tog dmar po zho kha chu/ /sbrang rtsi kha
260a7(mdo 'grel): ra'i thigs ba blugs/ /shel dang gur gum shing mngar dung/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman btang/ /yang na sbrang rtsi dung sbyar ba 'am/ /kha ra rgya mtsho'i wu ba pan/ /mdzer pa bshad pa rnam lnga las/ /dud pa lta bu'i rnyog can dang/ /gang
260b1(mdo 'grel): yang dmar zhing zho 'dra ba/ /de sman ling tog bzhin du bya/ /cig shos gan rgyal bzhag dugs byas/ kha lung dang ni rgyam tsha? dag sbyar pa'i mig sman bskus nas ni/ /mig bcums nas ni mnye bar bya/ /de ltar mig ni 'khrugs bcas pas/ /sha lhag
260b2(mdo 'grel): skyes pa bskyod nas ni/ /mgo bo mi 'gyur dam du bzung/ /mig mchu mchog tu mi 'gul bya/ /mig zur du ni blta bzhin du/ migs phugs mtshams nas mdzer pa mtho/ /gang du gnyer ma 'dus gyur ba/ /der ni lcags kyus dam bzung ?//
260b3(mdo 'grel): ha cang mi che mu ci tra'am/ /khab bam skud pas blangs nas ni/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra bas dral/ /de nas bton te dral nas kyang/ /mig phugs mtshams su bsnyen nas ni/ /cha bzhi lus par bcad bya ste/ /mig phugs rtsa dang mchi ma ni/ /
260b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzag pa'i rtsa la mi gnod bsrung/ /mig phugs zur bcad mchim 'dzag/ mig gi rtsa sbubs rma can 'gyur/ /mig 'gram mdzer pa cher skyes la/ /mig phugs zur du bltas te bya/ /legs par bcad de tsha ba gsum/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir?
260b5(mdo 'grel): bcas pa bsku/ /zhun mar dron po blug pa dang/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar bskus te bcing/ /de nas zhag gsum la sogs nas/ /bkrol nas ka rany+dza'i sa bon// 'o ma bskol ba de bzhin blug/ ser po rnam gnyis pa tol/ /shing mngar dang ni rkya skyegs
260b6(mdo 'grel): shing/ /kang NA yi me tog ni/ /kha 'bus sbran rtsir btsas pa blug/ zhag bdun nas ni de dgrol bya/ /legs par bcad na nad med 'gyur/ /bcad drags mchod las nad 'gyur/ /sman khu blugs dang mig sman sogs/ /phyi ba dang ni rtas pas gso//
260b7(mdo 'grel): kha ra ldod ros i li ya/ /rgyam tsha bca' sga zho re dang/ /skyer pa khaN+Da sred byed dang/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis/ /bad kan las gyur rab rib dang/ /chu ser gyis gang ling tog dang/ /mig mdzar bcad ba'i lhag ma sel/ /'bras
261a1(mdo 'grel): bu gsum ni gang rung ba'i/ /zhun pa chus btags lde gur bcas/ /kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bsreg de nas tshig nas phye mar btags/ /sman ni lhag ma'i khu ba yis/ /so so legs par bgos nas ni/ /gnag tsha der bskams
261a2(mdo 'grel): slar yang btags/ /rgyam tsha nyis 'gyur bcas pa yi/ /mig sman gsum po de dag ni/ /phyi ba'i mchog tu mu khyud 'chad/ /rtsa yi dras g.yogs rtsa gang zhig/ sra bas phyi ba'i sman dag gis/ /ma zhi 'brum phran de la ni/ mig mdzer tshe
261a3(mdo 'grel): ga bzhin du gso/ /ling tog nang gzhi'i dbang las ni/ /snum rtsub 'bras bu gsum sbyin zhing/ /tik+ta chen pa'i smin mar sbyin/ /gtar ga bkru sman khu ba yi/ /thigs pa blugs pa la sogs bya/ /snang pa'i ling tog dur byid chu/ /lan
261a4(mdo 'grel): gsum bskol ba'i mar blud bya/ /de 'og gtar ga 'am pad+ma yi/ /mig las khrag ni dbyung bar bya/ /utpal rgun 'brum ram nye ba/ /shing mngar bid ri bskol ba/ /kha ra ra yi 'o ma 'am/ /chu bskol thigs pa blugs par bya/ /
261a5(mdo 'grel): mig dmar mchim nad zhi nas/ /de rjes phyi ba'i mig sman phan/ /dzA ti kha 'bus rgya skyegs dang/ /yug snam tsa ni ral bur byas/ /khrag dang mkhris pa dang byed cing/ /snang ba las gyur ling tog sel// phag dang rnga mo glang po che/ /
261a6(mdo 'grel): ba lang ra rta bong bu'i so/ /rgya mtsho'i wu ba me tog dang/ /na le sham ni bzhi char sbyar/ /so yi ral bu snad pa yi/ /ling tog gis khyab sel bar byed/ /ta ma'i lo ma ba lang so/ /rgya mtsho'i wu ba bod bu'i rus/ /zangs ma dud
261a7(mdo 'grel): gcin ril bur byas/ /ling tog thams cad sel bar byed/ /rin chen so dang ro dang ni/ /khams dang sug smel tsha ba gsum/ /sgog skya ga rany+dza'i sa bon// rmal phan pa'i sman rnams ni// rma bcas rma med gting zug
261b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bags gnas ling tog 'joms sman yin/ /sna sman snum blud sha khu ni/ /blud bas dma' ba bstod par bya/ /nad med ling tog dma' ba ni/ /phur ma bcos dang rtas pas bstod/ /ling tog dkar po skyer ba dang/ /shing mngar thal tres
261b2(mdo 'grel): seng phrom chu/ /blug ba'am seng phrom gtums pa ni/ /chu dran la spangs thigs pa blugs/ /shing mdar 'bri ha ti'i rtsa ba/ /rgyam tsha dong gra zangs ma ni/ /sgyu ru'i 'bras bu chu dang btags/ /lde gu zangs ma'i snod la bskus/ /nas mar skyu ru
261b3(mdo 'grel): ra'i 'o ma/ /dud bas de 'og mang du bdugs/ /de las ril bur bya ba ni/ /de ni chu dang sbrang rtsir btags/ /mthon ka chen po zhes bya ste/ /ling tog dkar po sel mchog yin/ /ling tog brtan zhing mthug pa la/ /khrag ni lan mang dbyung bar bya//
261b4(mdo 'grel): mgo dang lus kyi bkru sman dang/ /phur ma btsos pa'i pa lan mang btang/ /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /rgyam tsha shing sha'i 'bras bu 'am/ /'bras bu gsum bskol rgyam tsha bcas/ /blud pas gnas las bskyod par bya/ /dud dang rgya shug
261b5(mdo 'grel): ka ta ka/ rgun 'brum shing mdar sbrang rtsi dang/ /mu ra so yi dri ma ni/ /sh+ri sha yi ni me tog bcas/ /tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad pa 'di/ /mig sman sbyor ba btang bar bya// sgyu ru ra ba ni dza khu/ /lam ka li yi thal ba ni/ /nub gcig
261b6(mdo 'grel): spangs te bskams sa'i phye/ /ling tog bskyod pa'i mig sman yin/ /mung+gA sbun pa med btags pa/ /dud dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan/ /sbrang rtsi ma du ka'i snying po/ /ba ru ra'i rkang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /ba lang rta bod rnga mo'i so//
261b7(mdo 'grel): dung dang rgya mtsho'i wu ba dang/ /a rdzu na'i chus ril bur byas/ /bskyod pa'i ling tog 'jigs par byed/ /bstod pa 'am zug rdur bcas pa yi/ /ling tog sbu la sogs pa phyi/ /rtsa yi ling tog mthong gnod med/ /snad pa'i ling
262a1(mdo 'grel): tog lta bur gso/ /shing mdar stag tsher ram nye ba/ /'bri ha ti dang a ka ru/ /skyer pa'i mig sman ra'i 'o ma/ /btags pa'i lde gu nas dang mar/ /bcas pa'i dud pas bdug par bya/ /skyu ru ra yi lo ma dang/ /ril bur byas pa'i mig sman
262a2(mdo 'grel): mchog/ ma so sar yi ril ma 'dra/ /mdzer pa lta bur mtshon gyis gso/ /ra'i ril gsor ni mi rung dang/ /ling tog de 'dra de bzhin gzhan/ /nad ma zhi na snam blud cing/ /gtar ga gdab pa la sogs bya/ /smad byas de ni bsal byas shing/ /dkar
262a3(mdo 'grel): zhing mtho ba gso bar bya/ /rgya star go bye lung thad dang/ /ta la smig ma ka ri ra/ /bsres pa'i thal chu btsags pa dang/ /rnga mo'i rus pa'i phye ma bsre/ /mig sman ling tog gso dka' dang/ /mdog mi sdug pa 'joms par byed/ /gso
262a4(mdo 'grel): sla la yang 'di nyid ni// bsten pas sel bar nus pa yin/ /ra yi ril ma ngos gnyis nas/ /khab gyis phug ste chu gzags nas/ /mthe bos mnyam du btsir nas ni/ /rma yi nad ni sha phye dang/ /tshil ni rlon pas bkang nas ni/ /dkri
262a5(mdo 'grel): zhing dkri zhing dgang bar bya/ /zhag bdun nas ni rma 'byor nas/ /mig 'bras nag po mnyam brtan la/ /mig sman snum can btang bya zhing/ /mar dang 'a ma'i sna sman blug/ de lta na yang rgyas 'gyur na/ /dbug dang bcad sogs bya
262a6(mdo 'grel): ba dag/ bcad drags pa yis mig nang du/ /zhugs par mi 'gyur ci rigs bya/ /ling tog la ni rtag par rang gi sman/ /bskol ba'i mar blud sna sman bstan pa dang/ /ci nas mthong ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar/ /mig sman rnon
262a7(mdo 'grel): po rtag tu bsten par bya/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu gcig ba'o// //de nas mthong bar byed ba'i mig nad kyi nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o//
262b1(mdo 'grel): nang ni rtsa yi nang zhugs pa/ /rim pa dang po gnas nas ni/ /gzugs ni mi gsal mthong 'gyur cing/ /rgyu med par yang gsal bar mthong/ /rim pa gnyis par phyin pa na/ /med pa dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing/ /yod cing nye ba bsgribs nas
262b2(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /ring na phra ba mthong mi 'gyur/ /nye dang ring bar gnas pa'i gzugs/ /phyin ci log tu shes par 'gyur/ /nad kyis zlum bo'i dbyibs 'dra bar/ /zlum po nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong byed dbugs gnas gcig
262b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis mthong/ /mang du gnas na du ma mthong/ /mthong byed nang du zhugs pa ni/ /che chu go ni bzlog par mthong/ /'og tu gnas pas nye mi mthong/ /steng du gnas pas ring ba min/ /ngos la gnas pas g.yas g.yon min/ /nad ni
262b4(mdo 'grel): rab rib ces byar bshad/ /nad ni rim pa gsum par brten/ /sngon po nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /de yis steng mthong 'og mi mthong/ /gos srab kyis g.yogs ltar mthong zhing/ /kha dog ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang/ /rim gyis mthong
262b5(mdo 'grel): ba nyams par 'gyur/ /da ltar na yang yal bar dor/ /rim pa bzhi bar phyin nas ni/ /mthong byed mtshan mo nyams byed cing/ /mig gi rgyal mo khebs par byed/ /de la rlung 'gyur rab rib ni/ /long long por ni mthong ba dang/ /g.yo zhing
262b6(mdo 'grel): rnyog can rtso dmar snang/ /ched dga' gsal bar mthong ba dang/ /dra ba sga shad sprang bu dang/ /'od mthong de ni yal bar bor/ /sngon bor gyur la mig dmar la/ /bzhin la sna ni med par mthong/ /zla ba med sogs bu mar mthong/ /yon pa
262b7(mdo 'grel): 'ong? drang por mthong bar 'gyur/ /sngon po 'phel na mthong byed ni/ /rdul gyis khebs pa lta bur mthong/ /gsal zhing dmar ba 'am rgya che ba 'am/ /phra ba 'am mthong ba nyams par 'gyur/ /de ni mthong ba nyams pa yin//
263a1(mdo 'grel): rlung gis mig gis rtsa 'khums 'gyur/ /mthong byed gting du zhugs pa dag/ ting ring zhes byar bshad/ /mkhris 'gyur rab rib glo gang ni/ /srin bu me khyer me sgron 'od/ /rma bya sreg pa'i sgro dang 'dra//
263a2(mdo 'grel): phal cher dngos por mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong byed mig ni khar g.ya''dra/ /de lta bu ni mthong ba dang /nyi zla khyim dang ma dang ni/ /smig rgyu 'ja''tshon mthong bar 'gyur/ /bung ba ltar sdo mthong ba med/ /'bras bu snum pa
263a3(mdo 'grel): mthong nyams yin/ /mkhris pas mig ni chung zhes bshad/ /chung mthong de ni thung du yin/ /ser zhing dngos po ser por mthong/ /mkhris pas tshig par gyur zhes bya/ /bad kan rab rib phal cher ni/ /snum zhing
263a4(mdo 'grel): dkar bar mthong ba dang/ /dus dang zla ba kun? dang/ /kunda'i me tog lta bus khyab/ /sdong po 'od med nyi zla dang/ /sgron mes khyab pa lta bur mthong/ /mig 'bras dkar por snang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan mthong nyams
263a5(mdo 'grel): des sngon khyab/ /snum zhing mthong ba nyams 'gyur la/ /chu yi thigs pa pad+ma yi/ /'dab ma'i steng na gnas ltar g.yo/ /dron zhum bar 'gyur ba dang/ /grang pas yongs su khyab par byed/ /zla ba me tog kun dud/ /shel ltar
263a6(mdo 'grel): snam zhing dkar ba yin/ /khrag gis rab rib dmar ba dang/ /mun par gyur pa mthong ba yin/ /sngon po dmar ba gnag par ni/ /mig gis de ltar mthong ba yin/ /mtshan ma nyams pa'ang de 'drar mthong/ /'od med
263a7(mdo 'grel): mthong ba nyams ba yin/ /ldan pa'am ni 'dus pa yi/ /rab rib la sogs mtshan ma ni/ /'dren ma yin par shes par bya/ /blo bur du ni rab rib dag/ gsal dang mi gsal 'khrugs par byed/ /lhag ma dag gi
263b1(mdo 'grel): mthong byed ni/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs dag tu snang/ /gang gis mthong byed nad kyis khyab/ /sre mo'i mig 'bras snang bar 'gyur/ /de ni nyin mthong mtshan mo yin/ /ne'u le lor bzhes de bshad/ /nyi ma nub par gyur ba na/ /'od mi snang tshe ring
263b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /mthong byed nyams par byed pa ni/ /nad kyis long ba gnyis pa yin/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa na/ /mthong ba'i lam nas dri ma ni/ /zhu zhing med par gyur nas ni/ /nyin mo gsal bar mthong bar byed/ /tsha bas gdungs te
263b3(mdo 'grel): med la ni/ chu grang nang du zhugs gyur na/ /nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs te/ /drod ni gyen 'gro de nas mig tsha zhing na kar khrim can/ /nyin mo long long por mthong zhing/ /mtshan mo long bar gyur ba dag/ de ni dro bas tshig ces bya/ /
263b4(mdo 'grel): shas cher skya zos nad dang ni// khrag dang bcas pas mig khyab gyur/ /'drul zhing g.yo la dri ma can/ /de ni sgyur gyis tshig ces bya/ /mya ngan rims dang 'go nang kyis/ /rlung sogs gdungs par gyur ba la/ /rlung sogs 'khrugs shing dud 'thul
263b5(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /de ni dud pa can zhes bya/ /snying stobs chung bas glo bur du/ /ngo mtshar can gyi gzugs mthong ba 'am/ /nyi ma 'od can sogs mthong nas/ /mig la brten pa'i rlung la sogs/ /gzi byin nyams pas mig gi ni/ /mthong ba nyams
263b6(mdo 'grel): par byed par 'gyur/ /bai DUrya'i mdog mkhrang ba ga? dang/ /rang bzhin gnas ltar nad med 'gyur/ /'di ni phrad pa las byung ba'i/ /mtshan ma nyams pa zhes byar bshad/ /'di las bad kan ma gtogs mtshan/ /nyams dang thung du gting
263b7(mdo 'grel): zhe na yang/ /mig sngon drug dang ne'u la'i/ /long ba 'tsho tsam lhag ma ni/ /bcu gnyis po ni gso bar bya/ /de ltar mig nad nyi shu ni/ /rtsa bdun dag tu bstan pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu
264a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'o// //de nas rab rib gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rab rib sngon pa nyid 'gyur zhing/ /sngon po ma bcos long par 'gyur/ /de bas mig nad la rab rib/ /mi bzad myur du gso bar bya/ /'tsho byed srad
264a2(mdo 'grel): brgya chu bre ni/ /bcu drug nad bskol bzhi cha lus/ /khu ba 'o ma bred dang/ /mngon bra? de lhan cig btso/ /stag tshor ba dang ram nye ba/ /seng gro ma rgya mtsha pi pi ling/ /shu ti shing mdar rgun 'brum dang/ /thad shing khar 'bras bu
264a3(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btab bskol te/ /mtshan 'thungs rab rib sal mchog yin/ /rgun 'brum btsad dang tsan dan dkar/ /ram nye ba gnyis dzi pa ka/ khar ? shing med dang/ /shing mdang utpal pu N+Da rI/ /zho ni gnyis
264a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis mar rnying ni/ /bre gang 'o ma de mnyam bskol/ /de yis mig sngon rab rib dang/ /mar gyis mgo nad rab rib 'joms/ /nampa? skyer pa ? to la/ /bu tse shel dang bu shel tse/ /'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka/ byi tshor ba dang
264a5(mdo 'grel): kyi lce ba/ /barba? ta ni srang re yin// sgyu ru ra ni bre gang dang/ /chu bre bcu drug nad du bskol/ /bre gzhi lus par gla sgang dang/ /rtsa mkhris shing mngar dug mo nyung/ /ba lu ka dang tsan dan dang/ /pi pi ling wang? byed byed dang/ /mar bre
264a6(mdo 'grel): gang dang bcas bskol ba/ /des ni sna mig sna nad dang/ /khong 'bras rims dang mdzar ma dang/ /'bram ? shu ? mjo nad sal/ /mchog tu ling tog rab rib dang/ /mtshan long dro bas tshig pa 'joms/ /'bras bu
264a7(mdo 'grel): gsum ni srang brgyad dag/ chu be bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus/ /'o ma de dang cha mnyam dang/ /'bras bu gsum gyi lnga gu ni// srad gcig zhum mer bre phyed bskol/ /kha ra'am sbrang rtsi bcas pa'am/ /'bras bu gsum
264b1(mdo 'grel): gyi khu bar bcas/ /'thungs na rab rib thams cad 'joms/ /zhing mdar ram nye ba gnyis dang/ /kaN+Da kA ri pi pi ling/ /a ru ra dang utpal/ /khar rgun 'bum srang rer bcas/ /ra yi 'o ma mar the re/ /'bras bu gsum dang bshad /brIdka
264b2(mdo 'grel): ri dzI khu bar bskol/ /'di ni 'bras bu gsum chen po'i/ /mar de mig nang kun sel mchog/ 'bras bu gsum ma ma mar dam ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar bcas/ /skad rtsi yis ni sprus gyur ba/ /mtshan mo zos par gyur na ni/
264b3(mdo 'grel): zla gcig phan pa'i zas bsten zhing/ /skyu ru ra yi chu 'thungs na/ /mkha' lding lta bu'i mig thob ces/ /drang srong mu khyud ces bshad do/ /ta bya'i shing mdar lcags dang gser/ /khar sbrang rtsi mar rnying dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang rtsi 'dod ?  bsten
264b4(mdo 'grel): ba rab rib 'joms mchog yin/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol ma/ /rab rib can gyis bsten byas pa/ /snum khur phyi'am sran tshod ni/ /'bras bu gsum gyi phye bcas pa 'am/ /'o thug 'bras bu gsum bcas pa/ /bsgrangs te khar
264b5(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi btab/ /zas ma zos pa 'am nang par ni/ /rgun 'brum khar sbrang rtsi dang/ /e ru ra ni so sor bza'/ /rtag tu rab rib can gyis bstan/ /leg bu mig cha drug cu bzhi/ /zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi cha/ /re re gcig tu sgyur ba ni/
264b6(mdo 'grel): skad bu kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ 'dres par gyur gyi bar du bud/ /de nas de yi to drug gi/ tshogs kyi khu ba lan bdun dang/ /so sor de la blug par bya/ /mu tig dud dang ba DUryA/ /chab gsum dang de nas bsra?/ /phye ma'i mig sman da btang na/ /rab rib thams
264b7(mdo 'grel): cad sel byed yin/ /rgun 'brum pad+ma'i rtsa ba yi/ /bu ba'o ma chad dang zhag/ char pa de bzhin khyig bu mig/ bskol zhing bsgrub byas nas ni/ /phye mi de ni dang dang gzhug/ mthang ba gsal byed med/ sman yin/ /mig nang thams cad la
265a1(mdo 'grel): bsngags zhes/ /lus 'phags rgyal bos bshad pa yin/ /spangs ma srad gnyis shu dag gi/ sol bar bsregs lar yi ni/ /'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yi/ /nang du lan ni bdun bcug/ ha bya dang ni na le sham/ lig bu
265a2(mdo 'grel): mig dang bu tse shel/ /spang spos rgyam tsha a ru ra/ /ed phrom ldong ros pi pi ling/ /sug smel rgya mtsho'i wu ba dang/ /stang zil zhi ni gnyis gnyis dang/ /shing mngar srad gcig bcas pa ni/ /skong bu kha sbyar nang bsregs btags//
265a3(mdo 'grel): mig sngon mtshan mo long par bcas/ /dmar ris de bsten pa yis 'joms/ /phye ma mchog tu rab rib nad/ /nyi mas mun pa lta bur sel/ /spang spos dri bzang gsum dang lcags/ gur kum uta pa la sngon po dang/ /khar spang nam a
265a4(mdo 'grel): rur/ /rgya mtsho'i wu ba mching bu dkar/ na le sham dang pi pi ling/ /stang zil shing mdar dud dang bcas/ /tha skar zla ba'i tshe na ni// phye ma mig gnyis la bskus la/ /mig mdzer rab rib dmar ris dang/ /g.ya' dang mig sngon
265a5(mdo 'grel): sogs zhi byed/ /na le sham dang rgyam tsha ni/ /cha re pi pi ling dang ni/ /rgya mtsho'i wu ba cha gnyis dang/ /skyer ba khaN+Da cha dgu ni/ /nag pa la bab tshen btags/ /mig bskus bad kan rab rib 'joms/ /spang ma bsregs te lan mang du//
265a6(mdo 'grel): ba gcin ra rtug khu ba dang/ /skyur rtsabs bud med nu zho dang/ /bug gi khu ba sbrang rtsi mar/ /bcug bar gyur pa gang yin ga/ phye mar byas te mi yi mig/ mkha' lding mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur/ /bring+gar tsa 'bras bu gsum/
265a7(mdo 'grel): dug dang shing mngar khu ba dang/ /mar dang ra yi 'o mar ni/ /zha nye lan ni bdun bdun du/ /bsregs shing bsregs shing btsos ba yi// mig sman thur mas byas pa de// mig sman bskol ba 'am ma bskol ba 'am/ /byug
265b1(mdo 'grel): na rab rib mig mdzer nang/ /chu ser 'jag dang 'byar bag can/ /g.ya' dang tshor ba med pa dang/ /ri mo dmar por snang ba 'joms/ /dngul chu ro nye cha mnyam byas/ /de gnyis stang zil mnyam byas la/ /ga bur cung zad btang ba yi/ /mig sman
265b2(mdo 'grel): rab rib sel mchog yin/ /bya rgod dus su shi ba'i mgo bo ni/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra gang yin de/ /ba lang lci ba bsres thal lig bu mig/ cha mnyam btags par gyur ba'i phye ma yi/ /sbyor 'dis mig gi gsal stobs
265b3(mdo 'grel): bya rgod lta bur byed/ /sbrul nag mgon lig bu mig/ mar bcas dud pa ma shor bsregs/ /spang spos gand+ha ba tra dang/ /lhan cig btags pas mig 'bras ni/ /brdol yang mig ni srung bar byed/ /sprul nag shi ba'i ro dang ni// sdig ba shi
265b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i ro bzhin/ /'o ma'i bum par zhag nyi shu/ /rtsa gcig bcug ste bsrul la srug/ de las mar sar gang byung bas/ /khyim bya gsos te de yi ni/ /rtug pas mig ni bskus gyur na/ /yod bas kyang ni legs par mthong/ /sprul nag po yi
265b5(mdo 'grel): zhag dang dung/ /stang zil ga ta ga'i 'bras bu/ /khu bar byas pa'i spyor ba yis/ /long ba'ang myur du mthong bar byed/ /na le sham ni rdog ma bcu/ /drub mar chang ni srang phyed dang/ /spang ma srang gcig shing mngar ni/ /zho gnyis 'o ma'i nang
265b6(mdo 'grel): du spangs/ /du ba ma shor bsregs mig sman/ /khu ba mnyam med ces bya ste/ /rab rib 'joms ba'i mchog yin no/ /ba ru ra yi tshig khu na le sham/ /skyu ru ra dang spang ma shing mngar ni/ /chu thags byas ba'i ril bu grib mar skam/ /rab
265b7(mdo 'grel): rib myur du 'joms par byed pa yin/ /na la sham dang skyu ru ra/ /rgya mtsho'i wu ba spang ma dang/ /dngul rdo dang ni drub mar chad/ /go rim bzhin du cha res bskyed/ /drub mar chad ni drug pa ste/ /sbyor 'dis rab rib ling tog mdzer/ /ma nagS?
266a1(mdo 'grel): dang mig sngo g.ya' ba sel/ /rin chen dngul dang shel dang gser/ /lig bu mig dang zangs dang lcags/ /tsan dan dmar po yug snam dmar/ /phye ma'i mig sman nang kun sel/ /til mar ba ru ra yi mar/ /bring+ga dza
266a2(mdo 'grel): a sa na'i/ /khu ba lcags kyi snong du bskol/ /snar blug mig ni gsal stabs bskyed/ /nad kyi tshul las de la lan mang du/ /snum blung gtang ga bkru sman sna sman dang/ /mig sman mgo po'i bkru smin mas btang dang/ /nyams rtos
266a3(mdo 'grel): byug dang blug bas ci rigs so/ /'di ni sbyi yi gso ba yin// //da ni re re mnyan par gyis/ /de la rlung gyur rab rib la/ /rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba mar/ /'o ma bzhi 'gyur 'bras bu gsum/ /lde gu bskol bslang bar bya//

266a5(mdo 'grel): re dang/ /ba la gsum dang dzI bam ti/ /nyer shing rtsa ba srang re dang/ /shing mngar srang ni bzhi dang bcas/ /lcags kyi snod du bskol bar bya/ /lcags snod nyid du zla gcig bzhag /sna sman nam tshong yan chad kyi/ /rlung nad mkhris
266a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i nad 'joms shing/ /mchog tu mig la gnas pa sel/ /skra gdong gnya' ba phrag nad sel/ /rgyas bzhin gzi mdangs mdzer bar byed/ /a raN+Da kar rtse ba dag/ /thang shing bra ha ti ba 'bras bu/ /shu dag rgya spos tsa tra dang/
266a7(mdo 'grel): bilba'i rtsa ba til mar dang/ /lo mar bcas bskol mar blug na/ /nam tshong yan chang rlung dang ni/ /bad kan gyi ni nad kun sel/ /stag dang phag dang bya rgod dang/ /sbrul dang khyim bya'i tshil dang ni/ /shing mngar sro lo sbyar te bskal/ /mig
266b1(mdo 'grel): sman bskus pa bsngags pa yin/ /de rjes mig sman lig pu mig/ sha khu 'o ma mar rim bzhin/ /snga ma bzhin du blugs na ni/ /rab rib 'joms byed mchog yin no/ /de ltar byas kyang ma zhi na/ /de 'og rtas pa'i cho ga sbyad/ /shu ti ru rta spang spos
266b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /shing mngar ram nye ba gnyis dang/ /stag tshar ba dang sa ra la/ /pi pi ling dang thad shing ni/ /mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o ma bskol/ /mig rtas pa yi mchog yin no/ /ri dags e Ne ya tshil ni/ /'o ma bskol te gzang bus bsrubs?
266b3(mdo 'grel): de yi dangs ma shing mngar dang/ /tsan dan pu shel co de bzhin/ /sha rid re 'jam go da dang/ /khyim bya sreg pa rma bya'i tshil/ /re re zhing ni cho ga dag/ 'di dag gis ni brtag par bya/ /gsal bar bya dang snum dang ni/ /sman bur btsos pa'i thigs
266b4(mdo 'grel): pa'ang blug/ 'dir ni rlung gyur cham pa bzhin/ /ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsa bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur rab rib la/ /'tsho byed 'bras bu gsum dang ni/ /bskol ba'i mar ni blug ba zhing/ /snum gyis zhen pa gtar ga gdag/ kha ra bud bing sug

267a1(mdo 'grel): ger zho sha a ru ra/ /bca' sga pi pi ling phye gdag/ bkru sman dag ni btang bar bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar ni/ /bi li ka dang ser po gnyis/ /thang shing pi pi ling 'o ma/ /til mar bskol ba'i snu sman btang//
267a2(mdo 'grel): dung dang bla rtsi bri yang ku/ /rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /dri med ril bus mig gsal byed/ /lcags nag phye ma tsha ba gsum/ rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum mig sman/ /ril bu nag pos mig gsal byed/ /ri bong bong bu
267a3(mdo 'grel): seng ge glang/ /rnga mo'i so dang dpral ba'i rus/ /ba lang dkar sbu na le sham/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu btsan dan dung? nu zho ra yi 'o mar btags/ /ril bus rab rib ling tog sel/ /khrag 'gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso/ /bsil

267a7(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi bcug pa'i mig sman 'di/ /'dub pa las gyur rab rib sel/ /nub mo rgyu ba'i sems can gyi/ /rus pa rkang gis gdab dad/ /lig bu mig dang bcas ba ni/ /'bab chu'i nang du zla gcig gam/ /zhag ni nyi shu'i bar
267b1(mdo 'grel): du bzhag/ de nas phyung ste bskams nas ni/ /lug ru yi ni me tog dang/ /shing mngar bcas pa'i phye mar bcas/ /mig bskus 'dus pa las gyur pa'i/ /rab rib sel bar byed mchog yin/ /mig sngo gso ba'ang 'di nyid las/ /gtar ga

267b3(mdo 'grel): gyur ne'u le lta bur long/ /rab rib skabs bshad cho gar sbyar/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi ba lang gi/ lci ba'i khu bskyed khaN+Da/ /yug snam bal bu'i phyi mar sbyar/ /mig sman mtshan mo long la phan/ /na le sham ni zho dang bdar/ /mtshan mo

268a1(mdo 'grel): snum gyur bsil ba'i bkru sman btang/ /bsil sman gyis ni kun tu byug/ ba lang lci khu 'o ma mar/ /bskol ba yis ni mi sman nam/ /bal bu'i lo ma yug snam bskol/ /phye ma btab pa'i mig sman pa na//
