269a1(mdo 'grel): nag po'i sor phyed ma gtogs shing ka mig 'bras bzhi cha bor ba ru/ /'dzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis/ /mig thur dam du bzung nas ni/ /rang grub bu gnas 'phreng du/ /gzugs shing gyen mnye drang por byas//
269a2(mdo 'grel): mig g.yon lag ba g.yas pas dbugs/ /lags par phug na sgra 'byung 'gyur/ /nad med chu ni nyung zhig 'byung/ /de rjes nad pa sbro srings la/ /mig tu nu zho blugs par bya/ /de nas thur ma'i rtse mo yis/ /gnod pa med par

269a6(mdo 'grel): 'thungs cho ga bzhin du bsdams/ /chu dron gyis ni nyer sbyongs bya/ /ci nus smyud byas na gyur na/ /mar khu dro 'jam blugs par byas nas chan sla ba 'am thug pa ska/ /tsha gsum skyu ru ra mar sbyin/ /zhag gsum nas ni dgrol la/ /rlung
269a7(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa yi sman gyis ni/ /khu ba mig tu blug par bya/ /zhag bdun nas ni mig de ni/ /rnam pa kun tu bkrol bar bya/ /ji srid mig gsal brtan 'gyur ba/ /bsdams pa 'bad de gnas par bya/ /gzugs ni phra dang 'tshong ba
269b1(mdo 'grel): dag/ mod la blta bar mi bya'o/ /dbug nyes mi mthun zos pa las/ /skrangs dang na dang dmar la sogs/ /mig na gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nad tshul ji bzhin de gso bya/ /nad dang dmar ba zhi bya'i phyir/ /durba nas dad yug snam dang/ /thal tras

269b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /ser bro ma rgyam cha rkun 'brum dang/ /shing mngar ra yi 'o mar bskol/ /thigs pa mig tu blus nas ni/ /na dang dmang ba 'joms par byed/ /shing mngar ru rta utpa la/ /rgun 'brum rgya skyegs kha rar bcas/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol bo ma ni/

269b5(mdo 'grel): tu ba ra'i rtsa na le sham/ /bam la skyer ba khaN+Da bsku/ /mig bye bu ram ri lu ni/ /char pa'i chu dang bdar ba btad/ /dzA ti nga ba srhi sha dang kak rka ta sring gi me tog mu tig 'bras bu biDUrya/ /ra yi 'o mar btags ba ni/ /zangs ma'i snod la sla
269b6(mdo 'grel): bar bsku/ /zhig bdun nas bkog slar yang ni/ /'o ma dang btags lde gur byas/ /ril bu grib ma la bskams ba/ /mig bskus bye ma mthong ba ni/ gsal zhing stobs ni bskyed par byed/ /byu ru ldod ros lig bu mig/ rgya mtsho'i lbu ba na
269b7(mdo 'grel): la sham/ /sna ? btang ba'i sman sbyar ma/ /bshad pa'i yon tan mtshungs par bstan/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas mig nad thams cad kyi dmigs
270a1(mdo 'grel): brtag pa bshad par bya'o/ /rlung gis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag/ sna rgyas cung zad skungs pa dang/ /mu 'gram dpral mig smin ma kha/ /na zhing zur la 'phyar ba dang/ /rdu ma skam zhing mchi ma grang/ /sla nyung na ba
270a2(mdo 'grel): ldang du ba can/ 'byed dang 'dzum pa dka' ba dang/ /bin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems/ /mig ni bus ba lta bur snang/ /zug rdu 'phra mo khyab snyam byed/ /snum dang dro bas nyer zhir 'gyur/ /mchim 'dzag pa zhes bya'o /de ma bcos na gdung bar 'gyur/ /rna ba sgra 'byung mgo
270a3(mdo 'grel): 'khor dang/ /dpral ba mig dang smin ma sogs/ rtsub shing gis ni rtsub snyam byed/ /de yang bag med yal bar por/ /gdung bas bcom gyur nang de yis/ /sna tshogs tshul ni 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /mig mthong nyams byed rma 'byung 'gyur/ /mu 'gram
270a4(mdo 'grel): kha dang 'jing ba las/ /rlung ni gzhan du 'jug 'gyur zhing/ /mi bzang na la gnag pa dang/ /dmar zhing skrangs la mig mi sdug/ snum zhing kun nas mchim 'dzag/ de ni rlung gis gzhan gyur yin/ /de bzhin mig ni yon po dang/ /chud pa rlung
270a5(mdo 'grel): gi phyin ci log/ mkhris pa'i mchi 'jog mtshan ma ni/ /tsha skrangs du ba 'byung snyam sems/ /mig mchu'i phyi rol gnag pa dang/ /nang na rnag 'drul mchi ma tsha/ /ser zhing mig sman ser por mthong/ /rma la lan tshwa btab snyam sems/ /me
270a6(mdo 'grel): ma dag gtor ba 'dra ba dang/ /mdzar pa'i gong bu lta bur snang/ /mig nang gdung bar gyur ba yin/ /pad kan las gyur mchi 'dzag ni/ /cher ba med skrangs rab tu g.ya'/ /gsher zhing snum la shas cher dkar/ /mig tu sbyin bag 'dzags?
270a7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /gdung ba des ni nag po dma'/ /'bras bu dkar po mthong ba dang/ /cham bas 'debs shing sna rgyas la/ /mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam sems/ /khrag 'gyur dmar ris mgo sdo dmar/ /mig 'bras dkar po dmar ba dang/ ?
270b1(mdo 'grel): khrag 'dzag dmar po mthong ba dang/ /khris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan nyid yin/ /gdung bas mig ni mdza' dmar zhing/ /phyur ba dang ni mtshungs par na/ /me tog tsan du ka ltar dmar/ /shin tu na zhing reg mi bzod/ /lung thang khrag tu nub ba 'dra//
270b2(mdo 'grel): 'gan gcig me ltar snang ba yin/ /gdung ba rang gi ji bzhin du/ /thams cad 'dzag pa las lhag na/ /mur 'bras so/ dang mkhru chos dang mgo bo lhag par na bar byed/ /rlung mkhris shas che re sdud snyam sems/ /grug cing ngan la phul
270b3(mdo 'grel): snyam sems/ shin tu rtsub cing mig mchu mig/ 'dzum dang 'byed par dka' ba dang/ /na zhing skam par gyur pa dang/ grang 'dod smin zhing skam dang bcas/ /mig skam smin pa zhes bya'o/ /nad gzhi gsum ni khrag bcas la/ /sgrang
270b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur de ni rab skrang zhing/ /na dang tsha dang 'dzag dang bcas/ /u dum ba ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/ /mig 'bras dkar por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mchi ma grang zhing dro ba dang/ /sbyin bag ska sla res kyis 'byung/ /skrangs chung cung zad skrangs
270b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya/ de bzhin mtshan nyid gzhan gyis smin/ /mig smon bas nyen skrang ba yi/ /rtsom che mchim rnyog can 'dzag/ /bad kan gyis bsgos mig 'bras ni/ /dkar po dmar zhing 'dul ba dang/ /tsha zhing mthong ba nyams pa dang//
270b6(mdo 'grel): nang ni mal na mi gnas min/ /khrag mkhris shas che'i nad kyi ni/ /zas kyi dangs ma skyur bo'i 'gyur/ /mig gi rtsar ni sod nas ni/ /mig ni dmar por byed par 'gyur/ /skrangs rang smin zhing mchi ma 'dzag/ shin tu long long
270b7(mdo 'grel): por mthong ba/ /sgyur gyis bskyed pa'i nad ces bya/ /de ltar kun rtog nad bcu drug/ de la gdung bas bcom pa ni/ /mig smin bcas pa spang par bya/ /rlung 'gyur zhag lngas mig la gnod par byed/ /bad kan las gyur gdung pa 
271a1(mdo 'grel): zhag bdun gyis/ /de bzhin khrag gyur zhag gsum gyis 'joms byed/ /mkhris gyur 'phral du log spyod kyis gnod byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //
271a2(mdo 'grel): de nas mig nad thams cad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /mchi ma 'dzag sngar 'byung tshul nyid la/ /'khur bkang sna sman rnon po btang/ /rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs nad gzhan la/ /smyung ba dag kyang bya ba yin/ /tshad dang dmar dang gos pa
271a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /skrangs sogs zhi phyir kun la ni/ /sug smel gand+ha pa tra dang/ /na le sham dang btsag yug snam/ /lde gur bcas pa bsku bar bya/ /rlung gyur rgyam tsha skyer khaN+Da/ /shing mdar rgya spos tsan dan nam/ /rgyam tsha dod gra skyer khaN+Da/ /mar gyi
271a4(mdo 'grel): nyid khu bdar ba 'am/ /yang na seng phrom sbyar ba btang/ /khrag mkhris gyur la spang spos dang/ /shug pa shing mngar ram nye ba/ /bad kan las gyur pri yang ku/ /ldong ros sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ /'dus pa las gyur kun gyis bsku/ /na le
271a5(mdo 'grel): sham ni dkar bo cha gcig dang/ /ldong ros cha bzhi seng phrom cha bcu drug/ zhib tu btags te ras gtsang phur mas gtums/ /nang ldang med la mig tu gdab par bya/ /rgya sran nag po ba ra lci ril khu/ /legs btsos sen mo ?
271a6(mdo 'grel): shun pa bshus gyur pa/ /de yi mtshan mo lan cig bskus pa yis/ /mig nad 'khrugs pa myur du zhi bar byed/ /shu ti shing mngar spangs ma a ru ra/ /zhib btags ras kyi thum po lhod par bcings/ /zangs kyi snod du skyur rtsa bas rang
271a7(mdo 'grel): du bcug/ mig tu bzhag na mig nad sna tshogs sel/ /skyed pa srang gcig cha bra phyed du yang/ /khu ba brgyad cha lus par sbrang rtsi gdag/ de bzhin bskus par gyur na ni/ /nad gzhi thams cad 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mig
271b1(mdo 'grel): nad sel/ /shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/ /mig tu blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ /bad kan 'dus pa las gyur mig nad rnams/ /mig nad mang po dag kyang myur du sel/ /er+N+Da yi gzhon nu'i lo ma dang/ /rtsa ba brdungs ter
271b2(mdo 'grel): yi 'o mar bskol/ /blugs sam zan dron mig tu brlan pa yis/ /rlung gyur mchi mdzag nang ni myur du 'joms/ /rlung gyur pa la bilba sogs/ /bskol ba'i sman thigs blug pa 'am/ /e raN+Da'i rtsa 'bri ha ti/ /ma du shie kru dro
271b3(mdo 'grel): 'jam blug/ sha ram ga sha pa la'i ka/ rgya spos a dum ba ra'i shun/ /chu dang 'o ma bcas bskol ba'i/ /thigs blug gzer ni sal mchog yin/ /btsod dang skyer ba rgya skyegs dang/ /rgun 'brum utpal shing mdar
271b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /bskol te bsgrangs par pa ra gdab/ /mig blugs khrag mkhris mig nad sel/ /shing mngar ka she ru'i phye ma/ /ras ma 'jam pa lhod par bcing/ /chang chu'i nang du spangs pa ni/ /khrag mkhris las gyur mchi
271b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzag sel/ /shing mngar skyer pa stag tshor ba/ /thum po nu zho kha rar bcas/ /ra yi 'o mar sbangs pa blugs/ /tshan mdog dmar mchi 'dzag sel/ /sed phrom dkar po'i shing mngar bcas/ /mar brdos legs par btags pa ni//
271b6(mdo 'grel): ras la gtums te nu zhor mnye/ /khrag mkhris snang pa'i mig nad sel/ dod gra nim+ba 'bras bu gsum/ /sed phrom ba sha ka khu ba/ /dro 'jam blugs pas bad kan sel/ /'dus par 'di dag bsres pa phan/ /rlng la mar ni
271b7(mdo 'grel): rnying pa dang/ /mkhris pa ka ra bcas pa dang/ /bad kan la ni cha ba gsum/ /bskol dang thal sman bcas pa blud/ /de 'og khrag kyang dbyung ba dang/ /de nas snum gyur bkru sman btang/ /dro bas tsha ste gzer? bu brka skam sa'i srog
272a1(mdo 'grel): chags sha btags pas/ /mgo dang gdong bsku tsha ba la/ /'o ma mar bcas grang mos bsku/ /rab rib gso ba'i tsha ga yang/ /btags te ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gdung ba la sogs
272a2(mdo 'grel): rnams la phan/ /gdung ba yod ye ma zhi na/ /smin ma'i steng du ma btsa' gdab/ /ba zho snum med kyi rdul snod/ /byugs te sngon por gyur pa dang/ /bskams na zho kha chu ril bur/ /byas pa rlung gyur mig nad 'joms/ /jA ti'i me
272a3(mdo 'grel): rtog kha 'bus dang/ /shing mngar ba bla 'bras bu gsum/ /char chu dang btags ril bur byas/ /khrag mkhris las gyur mig nad sel/ /rgyam tsha 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/ /rgya mtsho lbu ba dung snying po/ /e la ba lu sra rtsi
272a4(mdo 'grel): pog/ ril bus bad kan mig nad sel/ /shing mdar phra puN+Da rA'i ka/ skyer ba srang can ni brgyad brgyad dag/ chu bre bcu drug nang bskol btsags/ /skar bskol ska bar gyur pa ni/ /ra gan dud pa srang bcu dang/ /na la
272a5(mdo 'grel): sham phye zho gnyis gzhug/ de la ril bu 'am phye mar bcas/ bskus na mchi 'dzag thams cad dang/ /dmar na drung pa byed snyam 'jogs/ /'phral du mig ni gsal bar byed/ /sbyor 'di phyug bdag
272a6(mdo 'grel): ces bya ste/ /sman pa nams kyi gsang pa mchog/ mig sman skam la mar blud cing/ /'tsho byed kyi ni sman mar 'di/ /blud cing mig ni rtas bya dang/ /til mar chung du'i sna sman btang/ /'di la 'o ma rgyam
272a7(mdo 'grel): tshar bcas/ /dro 'jam thigs pa blug pa'ang phan/ /bca' sga bud med nu zhor btags/ /mar sbyar mig tu bskus na 'phan/ /yang na rlan can sha yi zhag/ dong gra rgyam cha cung zad btab/ /skra ni mar
272b1(mdo 'grel): bskus me long gis/ mnyes te kham por kha sbyor bcug /bsres te lcags phor mar dang btags/ /gnag na de ni mig sman mchog/ skrang bcas cung zad skrang pa la/ /snum chos byas te gtar ga gdab/ /snum byas rkun 'brum a ru ra/ /dur phed mar bcas
272b2(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang/ /seng phrom dkar po mar la brngos?/ /phye mar byas te ras la gtums/ /chu dron la mnyas thigs pa blug/ gzer 'joms pa yi mchog yin no/ /skyer pa bra buN+Da rI ka/ bskol pa'i thigs pa blugpa phan
272b3(mdo 'grel): mchi 'dzig na zhing drug snyam byed/ /sbyar sman 'di dag btang bar bya/ /lcags kyi snod du zangs ma ba gcin bdar/ /mar bdugs mig bskus gzer ni 'jams par byed/ /zangs ma'i snod du ba zho'i spris ma bdar/ /rgyam
272b4(mdo 'grel): tsha pi pi ling dang bcas ba mchog/ zangs ma'i snod du nu zho dung bdar la/ /dong ga'i lo ma mar bcas dud bas bdugs/ /sbyar sman zhes bya mig tu bskus na ni/ /sdud snyam byed sogs mi bzang nad mur sel/ /u dum
272b5(mdo 'grel): ba ra'i 'bras bu ni/ /lcags snod nang du nu zho ba dang/ /sha ma'i lo ma mar dud bdugs/ /mchi 'dzag gzer mar sdud pa 'joms/ /shikru'i lo ma'i khu ba ni/ /zangs mo gnyis kyi bar du bdar/ /mar dud bdug pas skrangs
272b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /g.ya' dang mchi 'dzag nad rnams 'dzoms/ /til gyi chu dang khar ba ni/ /pham phor bdar te nim+ba ni/ /lo ma mar bskol dud pas bdug/ gzer dmar mchi 'dzag drud snyam sel/ /sbyar sman gyis nimig bskus
272b7(mdo 'grel): te/ /sman shugs zug zer dang bral nas/ /bud med nu zho'i thags pa blug/ lan gsum phan chad de mi bsku/ /bal bu'i lo ma pi pi ling/ /rgya spos lcags phyi stang zil dang/ /dzI ta kha 'bus nas tshur dang//
273a1(mdo 'grel): rgyam tsha ba gcin btags pa yi/ /lde gus zangs kyi snod bskus la/ /zhag bdun bzhag ste pa gcin dang/ /btags te ri lu byas nas ni/ /de 'og grib ma la bskams te/ /bud med nu zho dang bdar bsku//
273a2(mdo 'grel): drung snyam byed dang mchi ma 'dzag/ skrang deng g.ya' ba sel bar byed/ /kaN+Da kA ri'i shun pa dang/ /shing mnga' zas kyi phye ma ni/ /ra yi 'o mas lde gur byas/ /sha mi skyu ru ra'i lo ma/ /mar gis bskus pa'i dud pas bdugs//
273a3(mdo 'grel): bskus na skran dang gzer nad sel/ /skyur gyis skyed la mkhris pa yi/ /mtsham 'dzag pa'i cho gas gso/ /bad kan khrag mkhris kyis bskyed dang/ /'dus pas bskyed dang sgra ngan dang/ /rdzi ma 'gags dang mig smin skam/ /gnag
273a4(mdo 'grel): gi chu ser pad+ma'i rtsa/ /mig mchu'i sha dang skyur bskyed chud/ /mchi 'dzag rdung ba rlung ma gtogs/ /bco brgyad po dag chag par bshad/ /yun ring du ni nab yin/ 'di dag gso pa so so yi/ /le'u'i nad du bshad pa yin/ /de 'og
273a5(mdo 'grel): mig gi tshag spyi'i bshad/ /de nas mig tshag nang pa ni/ /snum 'chos slon ni byas nas kyang/ /gat dag gdab ste khrag dbyung bya/ /bkru sman btang zhing mig mchu ni/ /dag par gyur gyi bar du bzhar/ /sprad ma srad gcin na le sham
273a6(mdo 'grel): dkar po srang ni nyi shu dang/ /skyur rtsabs srad ni sum cu dang/ /btags ste zangs ma'i snod du gzhug/ lo mar lon pa'i mig tshags 'am/ /chu ser 'dzag sogs zhi bar byed/ /gos dang tsha dang mcha ma 'jog/ g.ya' skrangs
273a7(mdo 'grel): de blug pa yi sel/ /bye'u rug ka rany+dza'i sa bon/ /dzA ti'i me tog kha 'bus pa/ /brdungs te bskol nas btsags nas ni/ /khu bar byas pa de dang ni/ stad zil dang sbyar mig sman ni/ /mig tshag g.ya' dang chu sed 'dzag/ g.ya'
273b1(mdo 'grel): zhing 'jul ba sel mchog yin/ /skyer ba /baN+Da sra rtsi pog/ ra gan dud ba ldong ros dang/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu brgyam cha dang/ /na le sham dang btsag yug rnams/ /sbrang rtsi btags pa'i mig sman ni/ /mig tshag 'drul g.ya' sel bar byed/ /rgya
273b2(mdo 'grel): spos a ru ra'i khu bar/ /dngul rdo btags pas mig tshag sel/ /thad shing snum dang bcas pa ni/ /ra gcin nang du spangs pa'ang phan/ /rgya ma tsha 'bras gsum pi pi ling/ /dung gi snying po bu ce shel/ /zangs ma'i phye mar bcas ril bu/ /mig
273b3(mdo 'grel): tshag lid tog sel bar bye/ /yang na nag tshur phyi ma ni/ /bye'u rug pa'i khu bar spangs/ /zangs ma'i snong du zhag bcu bzhag/ de yi mig chag chu ser 'dzag/ rdzi ma 'byi ba sel bar byed/ /ldong res dang ni skyer ba khaN+Da dang/ de mnyam zangs ma'i phye ma
273b4(mdo 'grel): zhig tu btags/ /phye ma mig sman thur ma gcig gis kyang/ /rdzi ma bskyed cing mig tshag 'di yis sel/ /rgya skyegs pa yid skyer pa ner? kunbi/ /khu ba ras kyi dum bu lan bdun spangs/ /sdod bu'i mar me de bus las byung ba'i/ /gnag tsha mig
273b5(mdo 'grel): tshil sel bar byed mchog yin/ mig mchu mang du zhal zhal bya/ /de bzhin gtar ka bya ba dad/ /bkru sman yang yang bya ba ni/ /mig tshag can gyis nad pas bstan rnag gi chu 'jag ma zhi'i mthar/ thur ma phra mos bsreg par bya/ /de ltar mig
273b6(mdo 'grel): nad dgu bcu bzhi/ /nad gzhi mtshan nyid gso bdag/ phan tshun 'dres pa med par ni/ /ma lus par ni bshad pa yin/ /skyes bu nad med ba las kyang/ /nas dang gror? de drag cu pa/ /sa lu khre rgod rnying pa dad/ /mud gsogs pad mkhris 'jams/ /zhun
273b7(mdo 'grel): mar mang du btab pa dang/ /tshad ma de 'dra skams yi/ /sha dang sa 'bru khar dang kar/ /bsten zhing char chu btung ba dang/ /gdugs bcad lham ni bgo ba dad/ /cho ga bzhin du nad sbyangs pa/ /rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya/ /shugs bkag pa dang ma zhud za//
274a1(mdo 'grel): phyed zhu zas dang rtag 'gags za/ /tsha dang byis 'gags byed pa'i/ /zas dang spyod lam sman kun spang/ /rkang ba gnyis kyi dbus na rtsa sbom pa/ /gnyis gnas de yis mig ni nang du khyab/ /de bskus byug dang dril ba la sogs
274a2(mdo 'grel): ba/ /rkang par byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dri ma tsha dang snang pa la sogs pa/ /de gnod gyur na mig la gnod par 'gyur/ /de bas mig la phan 'dod lta ma dang ni/ /de bskus dril dang byug la sogs bsten bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po/
274a3(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// //de nas rna ba'i nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /cham pas btab dang chu la rtse/ /rna ba blud pas rlung 'khrugs shing/ /sgra yi log par sbyor ba dang/ /ldang ba'i rgyu
274a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis 'khrugs nas/ /rna ba'i rtsar ni rlung zhug ste/ /rna ba'i bu gar shugs drag gzer/ /gzhogs phyed na zhing rengs pa dang/ /grang bdag ni mi 'phod cing/ /ring nas mnags shing smin nas kyang/ /chu ser cung zad 'dzag par byed/ /rgyu
274a5(mdo 'grel): med rna ba stong snyam sems/ /zhum dang rgyas pa snyam du byed/ /mkhris 'gyur tsha bcas na zhing gzer/ /grang 'dod skrang zhings rims kyis 'debs/ /myur du smin zhing smin nas kyang/ /chu ser po 'dzag par byed/ /chu ser des ni gang gang du/
274a6(mdo 'grel): reg pa de dang der gnas 'gyur/ /bad kan las gyur mgo 'gram pa/ /mgrin pa lci zhing nad shugs da'o/ /g.ya' zhing grang la dro ba 'dor/ /smin nas gnag dkar ska pa 'dzag/ snang la sogs pas gnod 'gyur ba/ /rna ba gzer
274a7(mdo 'grel): bar byed par 'gyur/ /khrag dang mkhris pa ltar nad dang/ /mtshan nyid cung zad lhag pa yin/ /nad gzhi 'dus pas gzer ba dang/ /skrang bcas rims 'debs mi bzang na/ /res kyis grang dang bro pa 'dod/ /'on pa lta bu nyid du 'gyur//
274b1(mdo 'grel): smin nas rnag ni dkar dang gnag/ dmar dang ska ba 'dzag par 'gyur/ /sgra thos rtsar ni rlung zhugs pa/ /rgyu med par ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /sgra ni yang dang yang du thos/ /de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bshad/ /rlung ni bad kan dang 'dres pa'i/ /rna sgra yal
274b2(mdo 'grel): bar 'or na ni/ /skad gsang mthon por smra ba thos/ /rims gyis 'on ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rlung gi bad kan bskams gyur pas/ /de la rna ba gos gyur na/ /na zhing lci la 'gags gyur pa/ /de ni rna ba 'gags zhes bshad/ /bad kan lasni
274b3(mdo 'grel): rna ba g.ya'/ /skrangs pa de yi ming gis bshad/ /mkhris pas bad kan chig gyur pa/ /nad bcas pa 'am nad mad kyang/ /gnag ska 'dzag cing mar du 'drul/ /rna ba rnag can byed par 'gyur/ /rlung sogs pa yis rna ba'i sha/ khrag la gnod
274b4(mdo 'grel): gyur 'dul bar za/ /srin bus bskyod cing mi bzang na/ /rna nad srin bu can zhes bya/ /rna ba phrugs pa'i rma las byung/ /rma ni snga ma'i mtshan nyid can/ /khong 'bras gyur ba 'am gzhan duAng 'gyur /ther bu 'brum bu skrangs las 'byung//
274b5(mdo 'grel): de las rna ba gnag dang na/ /'on par byed bas gnod par 'gyur/ /mngal du rlung gis rna ba'i sha/ zhum par 'gyur 'khums ba zhes bya'o/ /mngal du sha mdzer sran med/ /pi pi ling 'dra mang po'ang gcig /nad med pi pi ling zhes bya/ /'dus
274b6(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur gsang ba ni/ /mdog 'dra na zhing sra ba dang/ /skang 'gyur de ni ma gsos na/ /smin nas yungs mar lta bur ni/ /'dzag cing 'tsho ba dka' bar 'gyur/ /rma 'tshobs nas kyang nyes par ni/ /rna ba'i sha ni zhum par 'gyur/ /rtsa la gnas
274b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlung gis ni/ /rna shal bskams pa de ming can/ /rna shal pi wam rgyud ltar phra/ /sra ba rgyud can zhes bya'o/ /gzhon sha can ni yun ring du/ /btang snyoms bor nas dbral du bskyed/ /rna shal skrad zhing nad bcas pa/ /dmar zhing 'byar bar gyur ba
275a1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de ni rlung gis 'byar zhes bya/ /gnod 'gyur rgyan rtsi khur sogs kyis ? khrag dang mkhris ba 'khrugs gyur pas/ /dmar zhing tsha na smin pa dang/ /skrangs dang 'brum bu 'brum phran dang/ /dmar zhing tsha la gnag pa yin/ /rlung
275a2(mdo 'grel): dang bad kan gyi rna bshal/ /skrangs zhing nad med sra ba dang/ /brtan zhing mdog 'dra g.ya' ba dang/ /de ni mnye ba zhes byar bshad/ /phug nyes rna ba brgyangs pa las/ /g.ya' bcas tsha grang smin zhing na/ /'dus pa las gyur skrangs pa de//
275a3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal phel byed ces bya'o/ /bad kan khrag gyur srin bu phra/ /g.ya' zhong gnag la rnag bcas pa/ /srin bu phra mos bsdags zhes bya/ /de ma gsos na rna bshal za/ /de las 'dus par gyur pa'i pi pi ling/ /gzer can gas
275a4(mdo 'grel): 'khums gsor mi rung/ /rgyud can gcig bu 'tsho ba tsam/ /lhag ma rnams ni gso bar bya/ /de ltar rna ba'i nad kyi ni/ /dbye ba nyi shu rtsa lngar bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus ba las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
275a5(mdo 'grel): de nas rna ba'i nad gsob bshad par bya'o/ /rlung las gyur ba'i rna nad la/ /sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman bskol mar ni mtshan ma grung/ /rna ba dugs byas de rjes la/ /a shadtha dang a raN+Da/ /bilba arga'i lo ma 'am/ /til mar rgyam
275a6(mdo 'grel): tsha bcas pa dang/ /phur ma btso ba byas pa yi/ /khu ba dro 'jam tsam mam ni/ /la phug gu gul rna ba dag/ rlung 'dzoms sde tshan skyur rnams dang/ /gcin gyi nang du snum chen ni/ /bskol ba de ni rna ba'i nad/ /mi bzad pa'ang myur du sel//
275a7(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba chen po lnga yi shing ka gang yang rung bas gso mas dkri/ /til mar gyis bskus 'bar ba'i rtse/ /snum 'dzag 'phral du nad sel byed/ /de bzhin thad shad du rta dang/ /sgron shing las kyang de bzhin bya/ /rlung nad cham pa la
275b1(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i/ /gso ba 'dir lang phan pa yin/ /mgo bo bkru dang chu grang btung/ /nyin mo'ang yongs su spang par bya/ /mkhris gyur ka ra dkar por bcas/ /mar gyis snam byas bkru sman btang/ /rgun 'brum shing mngar nu zho bskol/ /rna ba bkang pa'ang bsngags
275b2(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /sing mngar tsan dan du rba ? bu shel ci dang ram nye ba/ /ser phrom pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang/ /pad+ma'i sdong bu dzi ba ka/ btsong dang thal tres bskol ba dang/ /shing mngar khu ba bre gang dang/ /'o ma bre do bcas pa dang/ /til mar phul gang
275b3(mdo 'grel): bskol ba dang/ /'di yis snar blugs rnar dgang bslu/ /yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes dgad/ /gzer dad tsha dang na ba sel/ /shing mngar la sogs mar dang bcas/ /rna ba kun tu phyugs na'ang phan/ /bad kan las gyur pi pi ling/ /mar bskol snum gyur skyug
275b4(mdo 'grel): tu gzhug/ bad kan sel ba'i sna sman dang/ /mkhur bkang dugs dang dud bas bdug/ sgog skya sge gsher shi kru dang/ /la phug chu shing mu ram gi/ bskol ba'i khu ba dom pa ni/ /dro 'jam rna bar blugs na'ang phan/ /arga'i myu gu skyar khung btags//
275b5(mdo 'grel): til mar rgyam tshar bcas ba gang/ /snu ha'i shing bu bus par ni/ /bcug la arga'i lo mas g.yog/ phur ma btso ba'i tshul du ?/ de yi khu ba gzer 'joms mchog/ ma du lungka 'am ka pitShi'i/ /khu bas bkang ba byas na'ang phan/ /yang na
275b6(mdo 'grel): tshad bkar de rjes la/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'i phye mas gdag/ ra lug gcin dang 'od ma'i shun/ /til mar bskol pas bkang na phan/ /yang na yungs mar shing kun dang/ /g.yer ma dong gra bskol ba blugs/ /khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso//
275b7(mdo 'grel): gtar ga myu gu gdab par bya/ /smin cing rna ba khrag 'dzag la/ /dud ba mkhur bkang sna sman sbyar/ sbu gu'i cho ga dag dang ni/ /rma reng cho ga gang yin bya/ /gos par ye'us dus gnyis su ? rna ba phyi bzhin dag par bya/ /gu gul dud pas 
276a1(mdo 'grel): gdugs nas kyang/ /sbrang rtsi yis kyang dag par bya/ /ras bal ye'u rab phras byug/ de yi phye ma gdab bar bya/ /gzer dang gnags dang lci ba la/ /cho ga 'dis ni bzlog bar bya/ /pri yang ku dang aM baSh+Ta/ /shing mngar dang ni dad si/
276a2(mdo 'grel): utpa la yi lo ma dang/ /btsod dang seng phrom rgya skyegs dang/ /ka bingtha yi khu ba dang/ /til mar bskol te de blug na/ /rnag 'jig pa ni myur 'chang byed/ /sgra bcas 'on pa dag la ni/ /rlung gis gzer 'joms sman btang bya/ /bad kan las gyur
276a3(mdo 'grel): bad kan ni/ /slon sman sogs kyis dang por bsal/ /e raN+Da dang shi kru dang/ /la phug gzhon nu'i lo ma dang/ /khu btil mar bzhi 'gyur dang/ /'o ma brgyad 'gyur bcas pa dang/ /shing mngar ram nye ba'i lde gu/ /bcas pa bskol ba snar blug
276a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bku dang rna ba bkang ba yis/ /sgra bcas 'on ba gzer ba 'joms/ /shing kun bong nga? dkar po dang/ /shu ti skyer shun sardzi ka/ til mar tsha dang bcas bskol bas/ /bkang na gzeng dang chu ser 'jag?/ sgra bcas 'on pa sel
276a5(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /rna ba sgra dang bcas pa la/ /yungs mar gyis ni bkang na phan/ /la phug skam bo'i dum bu ni/ /thal ba shing kun bca' sga dang/ /shu ti ru rta shu dag dang/ /thad shing shi kru skyer khaN+Da/ /ya ba k+Sha ra rtsabs ru tsha/ /rgyam tsha rdul
276a6(mdo 'grel): tsha sardzi ka/ stag ba'i 'dzer pa kha ru tsha/ /sla sgang rkun tsha bzhi 'gyur dang/ /kha lung khu ba de dang 'dra/ /chu shing khu ba mnyam bskol ba'i/ /til mar bkang bas rna ba'i nang/ /g.ya' dang sgra bcas 'on pa dang/ /rnag 'dzag gzer zhing
276a7(mdo 'grel): srin du can/ /shin tu gso dka' thal sman gyi/ /til mar gyis ni myur du 'joms/ /kha dang so yi nad la'ang phan/ /de nas tshor ba med pa la/ /nye ba las ni gtar ga gdag/ skrangs shing rnags la thos pa ni/ /mi gsal gyur
276b1(mdo 'grel): la skyug? sman btang/ /byis ba rgan dang yun ring du/ lon ba'i 'on ba spang bar bya/ /sgra bcas rnags bar gyur ba la/ /snum dang dugs byas dag bar byas/ /rna ba sbyangs ba'i til mar dag/ kha lung khu ba rgyam tsha dag/ cha dang sbrang

276b3(mdo 'grel): 'jag 'bu can la/ /rna ba chu 'dzag gso bar bya/ /mchog tu rna nad srin can la/ /yungs mar dron bo blug bar bya/ /rna ba'i 'bras la khong 'bras kyi/ /gso ba dang ni skyug sman btang/ /snang ba'i khong 'bras gso ba ni/ /mkhris gyur zag zer gso
276b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /'bum pa thor bu sna ltar bya/ /rna ba gso ba ma smin la/ /rna ba'i khong 'bras ltar gso zhing/ /nad gzhi ji bzhin las kyang bya/ /rna bshal skam la rlung gzer ltar/ /sna sman bsku ba la sogs bya/ /dugs byas snyi bar gyur ba la/ /rna
276b5(mdo 'grel): bshal til mar bskus shing mnya/ /shing mngar bi la ya'i sa bon/ /a sho gand+ha nas byas ba bsku/ /de nas rgyas byed snum gyis ni/ /bsku ba rtag tu bsten par bya/ /nye shing a sha gand+ha dang/ /e raN+Da dang ba ya sa/ /dzi ba ka dang 'o mar
276b6(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /til mar bskal bas bsku ba ni/ /sna bshal rgyas byed mchog yin no/ /'cho byed sde chen lde gu dang/ /rlan can sha ni bskol ba dang/ /rna bshal 'phel zhing rgyas byed yin/ /rna bshal rab zad bcas bas ni/ /lhag ma sbyar la gso
276b7(mdo 'grel): zhing bskyed/ /de bzhin rgyud 'dra 'tshe tsam bya/ /'byar ba la yang chog 'di/ /gnod 'gyur bsil sman bsku ba dang/ /srin bu bad mas khrag dbyung bya/ /'jag bu a mra'i lo ma dang/ /ba la shing mngar sed phrom til/ /bcod dang utpal aM
277a1(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /thal tres til mar bcas pa dang/ /skyur rtsabs bcas pa bskol ba 'di/ /til mar bsku ba bya ba dang/ /me dpal skabs bshad mar gyis bsku/ /mnye ba go ta karka? ta/ /zhag dang bcas ba'i til mar dag/ to ?
277a2(mdo 'grel): lo ma arga dang/ /a? shwa gand+ha bye'u rug pa/ /so ma ra tsa 'bras bu dang/ /rgyam tsha lam ka lir bcas bskol/ /til mar bskol bar bya ba dang/ /sna sman rnon bo btang bar bya/ /dbug nyas pa la asma ta/ /'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma na/

277a6(mdo 'grel): dang zhal zhal byas/ /bcad ba dang ni bsrung bar bya/ /mtshams ni mnyam bar sbyar bya zhing/ /mthon dman byed ba nyid du bya/ /zhun mar dang ni sbrang rtsis byung/ /ras bal gyis ni glan pa dang/ /skud pa dam lhod ran? bar bcing//
277a7(mdo 'grel): rma yi khrag ni bcad pa yi/ /sman gyi phye ma gdab bya zhing/ /spyod pa de la brtan bar bya/ /zhag bdun nas ni ma bcos ba'i/ /til mar bskus la ras bal dgrol/ /legs 'byor spu ni skyes ba dang/ /mtshams sbyor mnyam zhing
277b1(mdo 'grel): brtan pa dang/ /tsad ldan nad ni med pa dang/ /rim gyis rna ba bskyed bar bya/ /nya lcibs kha sral phye'u dang/ /'gri ha ti 'bras mer po gnyis/ /ba la ha ti pi pi ling/ /a shwa gand+ha yungs kar ser/ /ko sha ta ka'i rtsa ba dang/ /ka ra bi ra ru shi ka/ lo

277b6(mdo 'grel): shes byas nas/ /rma gser gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /rma 'byor sna yi nye 'khor gyi/ /sha lhag legs par bcad bar bya/ /de nas shin tu zhib tu bcem/ /dma' ba dag kyang bskyed bar bya/ /bcad ma thag la ci rigs bar/ /bzhag ste chog

278a1(mdo 'grel): mo rlung dang rdul dang ni/ /smra drags gnyid log gnyid yang drags/ /sngas ni mtho drags dma' drags dang/ /chu gzhan 'thungs par gyur pa dang/ /chu mang 'thungs dang nyal po dang/ /skyug dang mchil ma

280a1(mdo 'grel): bi TAngka'i lde gu/ /mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i/ /sna sman sbrid ba rnags pa sel/ /sna bskams pa la ba li'i bar/ /btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza'/ /snum gyi dud ba dugs kyis gas/ /sna rgyas la yang cho ga 'di'o//
280a2(mdo 'grel): sna rnags 'bar la mkhris 'joms sman/ /chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya/ /rnag can la ni bad kan gyi/ /gso ba dang ni 'dra bar bya/ /rgya skyeD dang ni ka rany+dza/ /na le sham dang bi TAngka/ /shing kun bu ram pi pi ling/ /lug thug gcin
280a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar sna sman ni/ /slon byas 'og tu btang bar bya/ /sha kru dan da bri ha ti/ /tsha ba gsum dang lce myang tsha/ /byi rug pa dang biTAngka/ /til mar bskol ba'i sna sman yang/ /btang na mchog tu phan pa yin/ /rnag dang khrag can sar pa ni/ /
280a4(mdo 'grel): khrag gi cham ba lta bur gso/ /shin tu 'phel la rma 'khyims ltar/ /'brum bu rman bu tsha ba la/ /dan+ti dur byid lce myang tsha/ /ldod ros dang ni pi pi ling/ /tsi tra ka yi lde gu ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/ /rang bu snar ni gzhug bar bya/ /
280a5(mdo 'grel): shi kru? la sogs sna sman yang/ /rnag can gso ba'i skabs su bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu ba'o// //de nas kha nang kyi dmigs shes ba
280a6(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya'o/ / nya dang ma he phag gi ni/ /sha dang la phug rjen pa dang/ ma sha'i sran tshed 'o ma zho/ /tsha dang bu ram shing khu dang/ /'brum phra kha sbub nyal bsten dang/ /so shing gis snang goms pa sbos/ /dud pa mkhur bkang skyug
280a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /gtar ga dbugs na nyes sa yin/ /bad kan shes tsha'i nad 'khrugs nas/ /kha yi nang gi nad bskyed 'gyur/ /de la rlung gis chu 'gags 'gyur/ /mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad/ /rlung gis mchu la gnod 'gyur ba/ /
280b1(mdo 'grel): mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin/ /man 'gags brgol? bar 'gyur ba dang/ /gnag cing rtsub ba mchu 'khrugs yin/ /mkhris pa tsha ba mi bzod ser/ /'brum phran lungs kar 'dra bas khyag/ myur smin mang du rnags pa yin na/ /bad kan las gyur
280b2(mdo 'grel): grang ba ni/ /mi bzod sbo zhing skrangs pa dang/ /'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa yin/ /'dus gyur sna tshogs bar snang zhing/ /de ? sbyin bag 'dzag pa dang/ /glo bur shas che skrangs shing zhum/ /na dang mi na rnag mi snyoms/ /khrag las gyur ba
280b3(mdo 'grel): khrag 'dzag cing/ /khrag gi mdog dang 'dra pa dang/ /'di la 'bra? go lta bu yin/ /khrag zer? chu bur 'byung ba yin/ /sha gyur sha yi gong bo 'dra/ /rims kyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul/ /tshil gyur g.ya' zhing 'gul ba dang/ /skrangs
280b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzam til mar lta bur 'dzag?/ snang ba las gyur gas pa dang/ /yang dang yang du 'bye gyur la/ /slar yang 'grub par gyur ba dang/ /mchun g.ya' bar byed pa yin/ /rlung dang bad kan 'dres ba las/ /chu yi chu bur lta bur
280b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /mkhur ba'i 'bras byed skrangs shing brtan/ /mkhru ba tsha zhing rims dang bcas/ /rlung 'gyur so nad dro la srong/ /grang bas reg na lhag par na/ /gzer zhing bcags ba snyam du sems/ /grang bas zhig par de bshad do/ /rlung
280b6(mdo 'grel): dang chu yis so rtse ba/ /gang dang sgyur bas mi bzod par/ /sgyur ba zos ba nyid kyis 'gyur/ /nang bcas 'gul bar byed pa yin/ /sogs sa ni zegs pa dang/ /na zhing zug la g.yo ba yin/ /so 'gul so ni g.yo ba dang/ /za ba'i tshe
280b7(mdo 'grel): lhag par na/ /so ste so ni mi sdug bar/ /so rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /so lhag sa na skyes ba ste/ /de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad/ /skye bar gyur ba'i tshe na ni/ /na zhing skyes na de zhi byed/ /ma bkrus so yi dri ma 'am/ /bad kan rlung
281a1(mdo 'grel): gis bskams pa las/ /di dra brtan 'gyur so dreg yin/ /de ni yal bar bor ba las/ /so ni dum bur zegs gyur ba/ /grugs shing so ni gogs pa yin/ /khrag dang mkhris pa rlung gis so/ /sngon por gyur pa so sngon yin//
281a2(mdo 'grel): nad kyis rlung na shas cher 'gyur/ /rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brten/ /so dbugs bskam te stongs par byas/ /sor ni zas kyi dri mas gang/ /rul pas srin bu phra mo ni/ /skye bar gyur te de 'og tu/ /rgyu med gnag ska ldang dub can/ /sbom
281a3(mdo 'grel): tshe gnag la shas cher na/ /bcad pa 'drar snang rnag khrag 'dzag/ de ni so srin can zhes bya/ /bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil/ /man gas shing rul par 'gyur ba dang/ /gnyen pa zags shing gnas pa de/ /grang bas nyen pa yin par
281a4(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /khrag mkhris rnag pa las byung ba/ /rnyil ni tsha bar byed pa dang/ /khrag gis skrangs pa mthong ba dang/ /g.ya' zhing khrag ni 'dzag pa dang/ /khrag chad nas ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /so ni 'gul zhing na tshabs chung/ /kha dri mnam
281a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur nye 'dar yin/ /so ni gnyis sam gsum thad kar/ /bad kan las gyur rgya shug tsam/ /skrangs pa sra zhing mi bzang na/ /myur du smin pa so 'bur yin/ /rnyil ni nad bcas khrag gis ni/ /phyi dang nang du skrangs shing lci/ /na zhing
281a6(mdo 'grel): tsha la gas pa las/ /rnag khrag sa yi khong 'bras yin/ /so rtsar khrag mkhris las gyur nas/ skabs shing na dang bcas pa dang/ /kha chu 'dzag cing rnyil 'drul ba/ /khong stong gi ni nad ces bya/ /'dus pa las gyur rim dang
281a7(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /rnag dang bcas ba'i khrag 'dzag la/ /so yi sbrel mtshams zhigs pa ni/ /khad stod chen po zhes bshad do// bad kan gyis ni so yi mthar/ /sha mdzer ltar snang 'gram pa dang/ /rna ba na byed spyod lam nyams/ /de
281b1(mdo 'grel): ni sha? lhag ces byar bshad/ /rnyil ni ba dar bar gyur ba las// nad tshabs chen por 'byung gyur zhing// gang zhig so ni 'gul gyur pa/ /de ni nad pa las byung yin/ /rnyil la rten bar byed pa'i nad/ /gso rung yal bar bor ba gang/ /nang du de ni
281b2(mdo 'grel): na? 'dzags pas/ /de ni rgyun lam phra ba bskyed/ /de ni yang yang rnag 'dzag cing/ /bags pa sha dang rus pa 'bigs/ /de yang rang rang mtshan nyid ni/ /ji skad bshad pa sngar shes bya/ /lce ni sha kha'i lo ltar rtsub/ /tshor ba
281b3(mdo 'grel): med gas rlung gnod yin/ /mkhris pas tsha zhing nad bcas 'gyur/ /mdzer ba dmar pos khyab pa yin// bad kan las gyur shal ma li'i/ /tsher mas khyab 'gyur lci zhing mthug/ bad kan mkhris pa 'og tu skrangs/ /
281b4(mdo 'grel): mthong zhing gyod bor byed pa dang/ /smin nas nya yi dri 'dra la// sha 'drul chu ser can zhes bya/ /lce rtsa'i 'og dang 'brel pa ni/ /skrang zhing lce yi rtse mo 'dra/ /mdzer ba 'byung zhing kha chu 'dzag/ lce ni rengs shing rtsub pa dang/ /g.ya' dang nang
281b5(mdo 'grel): bcas tshig mi thon/ /za bar mi nus lca lhag yin/ /de dang 'dra bar lce steng na/ /gnas ba'i nye ba'i lce zhes bya/ /rlung 'khrugs pa ni rkan gyi shar/ /'brum phran sra zhing nad bcas 'gyur/ /mang zhing mthug la 'dzag bar bcas/ /rkan gyi
281b6(mdo 'grel): 'brum phran zhes de bshad/ /bad kan khrag gis rkan phugs su/ /nya yi lgang ba 'dra zhing 'jam/ /'phyong zhing skrangs la sbyin bag can/ /kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed/ /lkog 'gags skom dang lud pa dang/ /slon byed lkog ma'i sha lhag
281b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ rkan gyi phugs su nad med sha/ 'dus pa rkan 'dus zhes bya'o// rkan gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dra// khrag las skyes pa chu bur yin/ /bad kan 'khrugs pas ring nas 'phel/ /nad med rus sbal 'dra zhes bya/ /bad kan
282a1(mdo 'grel): tshil gyis rgya sran 'dra /nang med brtan pa 'bur ba yin/ /mkhris ba rnags pa smin zhes bya/ /rnag 'dzag nang dkyel che ba yin/ /rlung mkhris las gyur tsha nyon mongs/ /rkan bskams de yi ming can yin/ /lce
282a2(mdo 'grel): dang 'brel ba lkog ma'i nang/ /sha yi myu gu myur 'phel zhing/ /mi bzang lam ni dag byed la/ /myur gsod byed pa gag pa yin/ /de ni rlung 'gyur lkog ma kha/ /skam byed 'gram pa sna nad bskyed/ /mkhris pas rims skom rmongs bag can/ /lkog
282a3(mdo 'grel): 'gags dud pas bdugs snyam sems/ /myur smin myur du 'phel ba dang/ /dmar zhing re na mi bde byed/ /bad kan gyis dkar 'byar bag can/ /khrag gyur 'brum bus khyab pa dang/ me mdag 'dra zhing sna nang bskyed/ /mkhris pa las gyur mtshan
282a4(mdo 'grel): nyid mtshungs/ /'dus gyur snag phugs gting ring zhing/ /mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa yin/ /bad kan shas cher skrangs ba la/ /rmen bu rgya shug 'dra zhing mtho/ /gra mtsher mas gang snyam byed/ /lam 'gags byed pa rtsa
282a5(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /zlum zhing mtho la tsha ba dang/ /lkog ma'i ngos nas 'dus pa yin/ /'gram pa'i mtshams nas mgul ba'i nang/ /ras bal sa bon lta bur zlum/ /sbyin bag nad tshabs chung bar skrad/ /sra ba mchu rtse
282a6(mdo 'grel): can zhes bya/ /phyi dang nang du mi bzang skrang/ /lkog ma'i lam gyi gtan pa 'phra /mgo lci snum dang kha chu 'dzag /rims bskyed lkog ma chu 'byings yin/ /skrangs ba shas cher mi na zhing/ /mchu zheng de 'dra gdu bu yin/ /
282a7(mdo 'grel): nad kyis lkog ma sha mdzer ni/ /gcig gam mang bskyed nad tshabs chung/ /dbugs 'byin dka' zhing zas ming dka' / /rtsa ba tsha ba lkog ma'i? mtshon/ /sha yi mdzer ba mang pos khyab/ /rab skom tsha la mgo bo na/ /mdud ltar shin
282b1(mdo 'grel): nang skyed byed/ /mdzer bas khyab pas mdung 'dra yin/ /lkog ma kun ni myur khyab cing/ /myur skye smin 'gyur shas cher na/ /rul ba'i rnag 'dra 'dzag gyur ba/ /skrangs ba lkog ma'i khong 'bras yin/ /lce yi mdza' ma lkog ma sogs/ /skrangs shing smin pa med
282b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad/ /brtan bas khrag gis bskyed byed pas/ /nang med lkog ma'i rman bu yin/ /rlung dang bad kan tshil gyis ni/ /lkog ma'i phyi rol lba ba skyed/ /de ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /rlig pa ltar 'byad na ba med/ /de ni rlung 'gyur dmar ba 'am gnag/ rab zug rtsa
282b3(mdo 'grel): ris nag por bcas/ /'phel bas lkog ma kha bskams shing/ /lce yis ro mi tshor bar byed/ /bad kan las ci reg na grang/ /brtan zhing skya la g.ya' dang bcas/ /'phel na rkan dang lkog mar chags/ /kha ni mngar ba bro bar byed/ /tshil 'gyur bad kan lta bur ni//
282b4(mdo 'grel): de ni 'phel 'bri lus 'dar 'byed? /'phel par byed ba'i tshe na ni/ lkog mar sgra bcas skad gsang nyams/ /bad kan gyis ni rlung rgyun bkag /lkog gnyams skad gsang nyams ba dang/ /dka' bas dbugs 'jigs mun zhugs snyam/ /rlung las skad
282b5(mdo 'grel): nyams gang yin 'gyur/ /rlung ni kun tu 'gro byed pas/ /? smin 'pho bar byed dam yang rtsub pa bskyed byed yin/ mchu dmar pags pa lhod pa dang/ /lce yis grang ba mi bzod lci/ /gas shing tsher mas khyab 'drar snang/ /kha brnags gdad par dka' ba ni/ /kha yi shu ba zhes
282b6(mdo 'grel): byar bshad/ /bad kan gzhang 'brum skan sogs kyi/ /'og tu gnod par byas pa'i rlung/ /gyen du kha ni dri mi zhim/ /de ni steng gi skub ces bya/ /mkhris gyur kha shu kha brnags shing/ /tshan kha ni kha bro la/ /rma la lan tshwas byugs snyam sems/ /khrag las gyur ba
282b7(mdo 'grel): 'di de dang 'dra/ bad kan las gyur kha mngar bro/ /g.ya' rma ni 'byil bag can/ /mkhur tshos nang du bsten nas ni/ /'brum bu gnag cing skyu ba 'byung/ /de ni mnye zhing bcad pa dang/ /bskyod na 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /nad ni khrag bcas gyur kha shu/ kha shu nad ni khrag/
283a1(mdo 'grel): bcas 'gyur/ /'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /de nyid gso shing la sogs la/ /mi dga' kha dri mi zhim 'gyur/ /mchu dang kha dri mi zhim 'gyur/ mchu dang mkhur tshos so rtsa dang/ /lce dang rkan dad mgul ba dang/ /kha dang thams cad
283a2(mdo 'grel): dag gis ni/ /nad ni bdun cu rtsa dgu yin/ /bcu gcig gcig dang bcu dang ni/ /bcu gsum de dang drug dang brgyad/ /bco brgyad bcu gnyis dag dang ni/ /de dag go rims bzhin du sbyar/ /so sto sha dang khrag 'gyur mchu/ /chu bur chu ni med pa dang/ /rkan gyi rus sbal
283a3(mdo 'grel): 'brum phran dang/ /rnyil khong stong stong che chung 'jings/ /skad nyams so sngon steng gi rkub/ /mdud 'dra gang du 'u chu ser can/ /'dus gyur ming pa mchu nad dang/ /khrag dang 'dus gyur gag pa dang/ /sa gog so ni chag pa dang/ /smin pa'i nye ba'i lce dang ni/ /lkog ma'i ? ba skad nyams
283a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bugs yi thon pa lo gcig lon/ /so brtse gsang ba 'tsho btsam/ /lhag ma mtshon dang sman gyis gso/ /yan yag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdas pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig ba'o/ //de nas kha nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /mchu dal ba
283a5(mdo 'grel): yi mdza' blud de/ /btsems pa rma ltar gso bar bya// shing mngar seng phrom kra kru ni/ /thal tres utpal sra pa la ni/ mon sne'u rmi ru pa to la/ /til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya/ /rlung 'joms mngar ba'i sde tshan dang/ /bskol ba'i til mar sna sman btang//
283a6(mdo 'grel): rlung 'gyur mchu dang sra rtsi pog /pra tshil gu gul thad shing ni/ /snam chen bskol ba'i ras bal dag/ spangs pa'i ye'us glan par bya/ /shing mngar phye mar bcas pa dang/ /de nyid kyis ni bsku bar bya/ /e raN+Da yi lo ma ni/ /'o mar bcas pas sbubs dugs bya'o/ /?
283a7(mdo 'grel): ral skabs bshad sna sman dang/ /mgo bo rtas bdag kyang bya/ /mkhris pa snang pa'i mchu nang la/ /srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung ngo/ /ser phrom sbrang rtsi sra rtsi bog/ shing mdar bcas pa'i phye mas gdag sla tres shing mdar rma shing dang bskol ba'i mang gyes bskus na'ang phan//
283b1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar yang gso/ /khrag las gyur ba sar ba la/ /de dag nyid kyis gso bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur mchu nang la/ /ba ta'i thal ba tsha ba gsum/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyang ba bsku/ /gtar ga byas nas ? gdab/ /bad kan 'joms par byed ba yi/ /dud rdub sna sman mkhur
283b2(mdo 'grel): bkang bya/ /tshil 'gyur dugs byas dbral nas ni/ /me yis nges par bsreg par bya/ /pri yang ku dang 'bras bu gsum/ /seng phrom sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ chu yi chu bur brtol nas sbyar/ /sman snod sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya/ /gting ring ba 'am rab 'phel la/ thal ? dag gam ma btsas
283b3(mdo 'grel): gso/ /mkhar ba'i chu ser smin skabs su/ /sgangs ba'i nang ltar gso bar bya/ /so grang ba la dugs byas la/ /so rtsa drug de til mar bsreg/ gas sgang rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi dang/ /se'u 'bru'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/ /skyer pa khaN+Da 'dam bu'i rkang/ /bca' sga sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /'o
283b4(mdo 'grel): mchan bskol mkhur ba bkang/ /e raN+Da'i mar sna sman btab/ /so rtso de bzhin bye ba la/ /rlung 'joms gis ba thams cad bya/ /til dang shing mngar sbrang rtsi ni/ /'o mar bskol ba'i mkhur bkang ba dang/ /so 'gul ba la rtsa ba bcu ni/ /khu ba mar bskol? mkhur ba
283b5(mdo 'grel): bkang/ /spang ma seng brom bi bi ling/ /'bras bu gsum dang rma shing dang/ /rgyam tsha yis ni bdar par bya/ /snum sman gyi ni sne sman dang/ /mkhur bkang sna sman ji bzhin bsten/ /so lhag skyes pa thal sman gyis/ /bskus te goms par ba gyur ba dang/ /srin can ? ltar gyur?
283b6(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /de tshe de dang 'dra bar gso/ /khrag ni chod par ma gyur na/ /bsregs la rma ltang gso bar bya/ /so dreg chags la so rtsal/ /gnod pa med par gsal bar bya/ /thal sman sbrang rtsa'i bcas pas ni/ /de yi 'og tu bsku bar bya/ sa gog ba'ang de nyid ? so rtsar
283b7(mdo 'grel): bshad bas gso bar bya/ /srin can so na mi 'gul la dugs byas nas ni khrag dbyung bya/ /snum gyis bsku zhing mkhud bkang dang/ /sna sman kha ? rlung 'joms sbyin/ /? stong bu ram spra tshil gyis/ /gang ba'i thur mas bsregs par bya/ lo ma bdun pa ?  yi/ /'o ma
284a1(mdo 'grel): bkang na srin gzer 'joms/ /shing kun nag tshur katpal/ /sa rtsi ka dang bi TAM ka ru rta'i phye ma ras ba la gtums/ /sor glan zug zer myur du 'joms/ /yang na 'di nyid bskol ba yi/ /til mar 'khur bas bcad bar bya/ /yang na bri ha tI
284a2(mdo 'grel): rnam gnyis/ /bug dam pa e raN+Da/ /bskol ba'i khu ba mkhur ba dgar/ /de ltar gso ba mang pa yis/ /nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na/ /skam pa phra mo dag gis san/ /so dbyung ba yi cha dpyad kyis/ /dang po rtsa ba nas bslang ste/ /gtan nas de ni dbyung bar bya/ /til mang shing
284a3(mdo 'grel): mdar phyer bcas pa'am/ /sbrang rtsis de 'og mkhur bkang bya/ /de 'og shing mngar bi da ri/ /sring ka dang ka she ru/ /til mar bcu 'gyur 'o ma dang/ /bskol ba'i sna sman btang bar bya/ /rid cing nyams chung rkang po dang/ /rlung nad kyis nyen so mi dbyung/ /ya so dbyung bar mi bya ste/
284a4(mdo 'grel): de ni bla gnyan mang po bskyed/ /de yang 'byin na snum pa dang/ /mngar dang bsil ba'i rim bas gso/ /grang bas nyen la khrag dbyung zhing/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku bar bya/ /gla sgang ardzu na'i shun pa/ /bri yang ku dang skyer khaN+Da/ /bca' sga sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ /de bskol bas
284a5(mdo 'grel): ni ma khur ba bkad/ /mngar sman til mar bskol snang blug rnyil ni nye bar bdar ba la/ /chu tshan mkhur bkang bas dugs ? dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'am shag yi/ /lo mas mang du blud par bya/ /rgya skyegs rma shing pri yam ku rgya rgyam tsha ru rta btsag yug snam/ na ye shes dang bcas
284a6(mdo 'grel): sga dang/ /shing mngar skyer ba'i khaN+Da dang/ /mar gyi snying po sbrang rtsi dang/ /sbyar ba de 'og bsku bar bya/ mar khu 'am til mar mkhur sbo ga/ dro 'jam de yi rjes la bya/ /mngar ba'i sde dang bskol ba'i mar/ /mkhur bkad sna sman byas na phan/ /so 'bur ba la dugs byas la
284a7(mdo 'grel): bcad dad dbuD dang blu par bya// shing mngar bca' sga sa rdzi ka/ rgya mcha'i? phye ma bsku bar bya/ /so yi khong 'bras tsha dro rno/ /rtsub ba'i mkhur bkang bsku bar bya/ /? co shel dang bspru ga/ du rta? nas tshig 'khur phyir ba dar/ /bsil sman gyis ni smin mi gzhug/ smin na dral la
284b1(mdo 'grel): gting ring bsreg/ khong stong bcad de blud nas ni ?  sgang seng phrom 'bras bu gsum/ /shu ti rma shing skyer khaN+Da/ /rgya skyegs shing mngar katpa la/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /de nyid khu bas mkhur bar dgang/ /shing mngar seng phrom du rba dkar/ /thal tres can
284b2(mdo 'grel): dan a ka ru/ /ka ra dkar po btsag yug snam/ /pad+ma dkar po stag tsher ba/ /bskol ba'i sna sman til mar btad/ sha lhag skyes pa bcad nas ni// shu dag te dza ba Ti dang/ /ba ta nas tshig 'khus thal ba/ /sardzi ka dang sbrang rtsi bsku/ /'bras bu gsum dang
284b3(mdo 'grel): pa to la/ /nim+ba bskol bas mkhur ba dgang/ /snang ba las byung nad las ni/ /skyi na gor rtse mos dral la sbyang/ /de nas thal sman sna sman btang/ /mkhur bkang la sogs bsil sman btang/ /lus kyi gong 'og nas sbyangs bya/ /de 'og mgo bo'i bkru sman bya/ /so
284b4(mdo 'grel): yis rtsa ni sos nas kyang/ /phyung ste nad dang ldan pa yi/ /bu ram sbra tshil bkad pas bsreg/ dza te seng ldeng sbra tshil dang/ /gze ma bskol ba'i khubs ba ?/ /'o ma can shing chus ma phur bkang/ /de bskol til mar sna sman btang/ /rlung 'gyur lce ni rtsub pa la/ /rlung gis
284b5(mdo 'grel): mchu nad gos bar bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur lce nad la/ /gzhar te khrag ni dbyung bar bya/ /bsku dang mkhur ba dag pa dang/ /sna sman mngar ba dag kyang bya/ /de bzhin bad kan las gyur la/ /yungs kar tsha ba gsum la sogs/ /sman ni rnon bos gos bar bya/ /lce la chu ser
284b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzag pa gsar/ /mtshon mi reg par de bzhin gso/ /lce lhag skyes pa lce bteg ste/ /lcags kyus lce lhag drangs nas ni/ rtse mo sbyin gor 'dra bas bcad/ rno dang dro bas ba dngos? bya/ /nye ba'i lce la khrag ? te/ nas tshig 'khrus pa'i thal bas bdag/ sha lhag
284b7(mdo 'grel): skyes pa bad kan 'joms/ sna sman ma khur bkang ba dar bar bya/ /ga gon sa bon lta bur ni/ /'phel zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang/ /rtse mos lce yi rtsa ba slebs/ /lcags kyu yis ni bzung nas kyang/ /rtse mo skyin gor 'dra ba yis/ /rtse mo tsa ba ran bar bcad/ /bcas drags
285a1(mdo 'grel): ? gzags 'chi bar byed/ /bcad chung nad ni 'phel bar byed/ /bod da pa tan ? sham/ /shu dag ruN+Da pa ri la/ /rgyam tsho sbrang rtsi bcas pa yis/ /bcas ba dag ni bdar bar bya/ /sa ri pe la ku tan+ta'o/ /pu ce shel dang po dang?
285a2(mdo 'grel): dkar/ /ba ta ni m+ba da sna dar/ /shu dag chu yis mkhur bkang bya/ /'dus 'das so 'bur rus sbal 'dra/ /de bzhin bzhar te gso bar bya/ /rkan brnags ma smin pa la ni/ /nag tshul sbrang rtsi skyer khaN+Da/ /bsku bar bya'o gsil dang mngar/ /sman bskol khu bA mkhur ba
285a3(mdo 'grel): dgad/ /smin nas na ya'i gzhi ltar dras/ /rno dang dro bas bsku bar bya/ /bA sha ka dang ba to la/ /nimpa la sogs rno ba yi/ /sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba 'gad/ /rkan bskams skom dang med po la/ /zas zos rjes la zhun mar ni/ /bca' sma pi pi ling bskol blub?
285a4(mdo 'grel): skyur bas mkhur ba spong dgang gces/ /skam sa'i sha khu snum ba dang/ /zhun mar 'o ma'i sna sman btang/ /lkog ma'i nang la gtar ga gdab/ /sa sman la sogs rnon lo bya/ /skyer ba'i shun pa skyer khaN+Da/ dug no nyung? bskol khu ba blud/ /a ru ra yi gub? ni//
285a5(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsir ldan pa sbyin bar bya/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /nas tshig 'khrus thal skyed ba dang/ /tsi tra ka dang skyer khaN+Da/ /pa ta te pi ti dang/ /nimpa tsha dang gcin bskol/ /mkhar ba sbo dang ril bu dang/ /phye ma gdab pa dag kyang bya/ /lcang ma kyi ri ka rni dang?
285a6(mdo 'grel): gla sgang thang shing bca' sga dang/ /shu dag dam dmu rba yi/ /lde gu dro bskus skrangs nang sel/ /de nas phyi nang dugs byas te/ /so rdub? cha sbyad dag gis sam/ rgya mtsha ldan pa'i sen mo yis/ /rlung 'gyur gag pa bzhar bar bya/ rtsa ba lnga bskol mkhur bshad dang/
285a7(mdo 'grel): til mar mkhur spo sna sman bar/ /mkhris pa las gyur gtar ga gdab/ kha ra sbrang rtsi ? yang ku/ /seng phrom rma shing bcas pa 'dar/ /de bskol khu ba mkhur bar bcad/ /rkun 'brum ba ru sha ga bskol/ /mkhur ba dgad ba'am phan pa yin//
285b1(mdo 'grel): khras las gyur ba 'ang de bzhin du/ /gtar ga gdab ste gso bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur khab yi/ /dud pa tsha ba'i sman bcas gdab/ /a pa ma rga'i 'bras bu dang/ /gi ri karni byi tang+ga/ rgyam tsha can dan til mar bskol/ /sna sman mkhur bkang bya ba bsngags
285b2(mdo 'grel): de gzhin 'dus dang rtsa ba dang/ /mchu rtse skog ma'i mtshon la'ang bya/ /khong 'bras khrag gzags 'bras bu gsum/ /gi wang yug snam skyer khaN+Da/ /seng phrom rgyam tsha rma shing dang/ /pi pi ling bsku mkhur bkang bya/ /rlung las gyur ba'i wa ba la/ /dugs byas
285b3(mdo 'grel): nas ni khrag dbyung zhing/ /til dang zar ma le brgan rtsi/ /pi la ya dang so 'bras kyis/ /rma 'drubs nas bsku dkre bar bya/ /shi kru seng brom gtang ga ri/ /tam bal ha ti pi pi ling/ /ba s? ba dang a ru ra/ /arga rtsab po son cha/ /e ki shang kar bcas par ni//
285b4(mdo 'grel): chan dam dag skyar btags pas bsku/ /lde gu yang dang yang du bsku/ /sle tres nim+ba gug mo nyung/ /ham sa ba ti ba la gnyis/ /thad shing dang ni pi pi ling/ /bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya/ /bad kan la yang 'di dag ni/ /bya zhing lhag par dugs bsku bya/ /a
285b5(mdo 'grel): sa gand+ha bo da? dkar/ /a sa shing ki ba shi la/ /sku ba kha bo 'ol ma si/ /shir? sha dang rgya skyegs shing/ /thal chu'i lde gus bsku bar bya/ /thal ba rnon po gcin bskol btsags/ /khre rgod bza' zhing btung par bya/ /dug mo nyung sogs lan tshwa lnga/ /til mar lhan cig
285b6(mdo 'grel): bskol ba blud/ /bad kan 'joms ba'i dud pa dang/ /slon sman sna sman la sogs bskol/ /tshil gyur ba la gtar ga gdag /bad kan 'jams ba'i chog? bstan/ /'di la a sa la sogs pa'i/ /khu ba gcin ni snga dro blud/ /de ma zhe na thams cad ni/ /smin
285b7(mdo 'grel): byas rma ltar gso bar bya/ /kha shu la ni 'bras bu gsum/ /pa ta rkun 'brum dza ti yi/ /lo mar bskol ba'i sprang rtsir bcas/ /kha ni bsru zhing bcad par bya/ /yang na zhim thig le sogs sngo/ /bza' zhing bsten ba nyid du bya/ /rlung gi kha shud pi pi ling//
286a1(mdo 'grel): rgyam tsha sug smel phye ma gdab/ /yang na rlung 'joms sman bskol ba'i/ /til mar sna sman mkhur bkad phan/ /khrag mkhris gyur la khrag mkhris 'dzoms/ /bad kan las gyur de 'joms bsten/ /'brum phran sra zhing brtan
286a2(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /sha kha'i lo ma sogs kyis bzhad/ /'dus pa las gyur gos ba ni/ /nang gzhi ji ltar shas tsher bya/ /chu pur gsar zhing ma 'phel ba/ /bcad la sa rdzi ka'i thal ba/ /bca' sga sbrang rtsis gdab bar bya/ /de bskol mkhur ba bkang bar ba/ /sle
286a3(mdo 'grel): tres ni ma'i lde gu ni/ /sbrang rtsi til mar bcas pa'ang rung/ /nas zan za zhing til mar rnos/ /sna smad dang ni sku bug bya/ /kha dring la slon sman dang/ /dud la sna sman rnon po btang/ /btsong dang sed phrom da da ki/ shug pa bri yang ku yi chus/ /kha yi nad ni kru ba dang//
286a4(mdo 'grel): phye mas kha ni dgang bar bya/ /grang nyen nye bar bdar bshad pa'i/ /sna sman la sogs bsten par bya/ /'bras bu gsum dang rtsi mkhris rtsi tra ka shing mngar yungs kar gla sgang tsha ba gsum/ /ya bak+Sha ra ser po rnam gnyis dang/ /da trig tsan dan lcad ma star bu dang/ /a
286a5(mdo 'grel): shwadtha dad 'dzam bu'i mya gu dad/ /da nam dza ya ka ra bi ra'i shun/ /sed ldeng snying po bskol te ska bar 'gyur/ /de yi phye mar btab ste ril bu bya/ /de ni kha nang rtag tu bzhag gyur na/ /mchu dang rkan sogs nad ni mi bzang 'joms/ /mchog tu kha bskams pa dang gag pa ded?

286b1(mdo 'grel): gdong la byugs par gyur na ni/ /ngo khab dri ma smi pa la sogs sel/ /zla ba lta bu'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /sa ha ra tsa srang stong chu bre ni/ /bcu drug nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /seng ldeng 'dzam bu shing mngar a nan+ta/ /a mra a ti shing mngar ud+pal snga/ zhib
286b2(mdo 'grel): btags til mar pre gang nang du bskol/ /de ni kha yi nang du bcangs gyur na/ /kha yi nang kun 'joms shing khyad par du/ /so yi phreng ba 'gul pa brtan par byed/ /seng ldang snying po srang ni nyis brgya dang/ /a ri med sa ni srang brgyad dag /chu bre drug cu bzhi bskol

286b4(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang gla sgang a ru ra/ /btsod dang spang spos n+yagro d+ha'i myu du/ /shug pa btsod dang el ba lu/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btab ste bsgrangs? pa ru/ /dzA ti pa tra dza ti pha la dang/ /li shi a ko la dang ka ko la/ /srang reg pur srang bzhi gzhug par bya/ /de la ril bu byas la
286b5(mdo 'grel): rtag tu ni/ /bar gzhag na ni kha nad thams cad sel/ /bskol dang red bu'i sman ni go bzlog pa/ /brtag pa 'di ni til mar bskol bar bya/ /kha na dkun sel bar ni de bshad do/ /so brtan byed pa'i mchog kyang 'di nyid yin/ /ril pu 'di nyid skyed ldeng sbyar til mar
286b6(mdo 'grel): a ri med sa dang bskol ba dag/ /nyin re sten par byed na nad med pa'ang/ /so ni nges par brtan par byed pa yin/ /rgun 'brum sle tres dzA ti myu gu dang/ /skyed pa byi tsher 'bras bu gsum bskol ba/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'di yi mkhur bar bcangs/ kha yi nad du gtogs

287a1(mdo 'grel): dang nas tshig 'khus thal ba/ /tsitra ka rang lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/ /te tso pa ti sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ni/ /nag po khang bcangs so dang mgul nad sel/ /skyed pa'i shun pa ldong ros lce myang tsha/ /ba bla nas tshag 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye/ /sbrad

287a3(mdo 'grel): sel bar byed/ /lo ma bdun pa bla spang pu shel co/ /a ru ra dang tig ta pa to la/ /shing mngar dong ka tsan dan bu tse shel/ /bskol ba 'thungs na kha yi shu ba 'joms/ /pa to la dang bca' sga 'bras bu gsum/ /bi sha la dad tig ta khyi lce ba/ /sle tres bskol ba sprang rtsir

287b1(mdo 'grel): ma'i nad kyi gso ba ni/ shin tu myur ba kho nar bya ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas mgo bo'i nad kyi dmigs shes par bya pa bshad par bya'o/ /du ba nyi tshan kha pa dang ka chung brtse dang
287b2(mdo 'grel): gnyid drags dang/ /gnyid yang rdul dang mdun gyi rlung/ /mchi ma bkag dang dus drags dang/ /chu 'thungs chad 'thungs drags pa dang/ /srin bus shugs ni bkag pa dang/ /brngas dang bsku byug dril phyis la/ mi dga' rgyun du phur du blta/ /ma goms dri dang zas gnod zos//
287b3(mdo 'grel): man du smras pas mgo ba yi/ /nang du nang ni skyed par byed/ /de la rlung ni 'khrugs pa las/ /mur 'gram gnyid su shin tu thug/ /'gram so phug pa snyam du sems/ /smin ma'i mtshams dang dpral ba ni/ /ltung ba snyam sems rab tu na/ /rna bas sgra yis gnod par byed/ mgrin? ni

287b5(mdo 'grel): byas dang/ /bcings pas bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mgo bo'i tshad pa'i nad ces bya/ /glad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba ni/ /gzhogs khyed na ba'i nad ces bya/ /zla gcig zla phyed nas ldang ste/ /rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /shes cher 'phel na mig dang ni/ /rna ba dag kyang ma rungs byed

287b7(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo ldang/ /rmya zhing mig ni skrangs ba rang/ /rna ba g.ya' zhing slon pa yin/ /khrag 'gyur mkhris pa las cher na/ /'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /'dren ma'i zas kyis spyi bo yi/ /khrag dang sha ni 'drul byas pas/ /'dus pa'i nad ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing//
288a1(mdo 'grel): mgo bo'i srin bu skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni mgo bo'i khrag 'thung zhing/ /sems ni 'khrul par byed pa'o/ /mi bzang nad ni skyed par byed/ /lud pa rims dang nyams stobs zad/ /mgo gtsug skrangs dang 'bugs snyam na/ tshe zhing mgo

288b5(mdo 'grel): kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas mgo bo'i nad gso pa bshad par bya'o/ /rlung las gyur ba'i mgo nad la/ /rlung nang gso ba'i cho ga bshad/ /'di ni mtshan mo zhun mar blud/ /de rjes 'o ma dron po blud/ /ma ? rgyas na mang+ga? 'di dud/ /mor dang ldan pa
