288b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /bar na sogs sde tshan brdungs/ /'o ma chu phed bskol pa yi/ /'o ma lus ba de bsgrangs la/ /bsrubs te snying po blangs nas ni/ /de nas mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol/ /mar gyi sna sman blug pa bsngags /'dir ni 'o ma'i sde mtshan
289a1(mdo 'grel): bskol/ /mar dang kha ra bcas pa blud/ /ras bal sa bon shing tsha dang/ /gla sgang dzA ti kha 'bus pa/ /chu bron gtigs pa'i sna sman ni/ /mgo po'i nad kun 'joms byed yin/ /khrag deng mkhris pa las gyur la/ /kha ra gung gu gi
289a2(mdo 'grel): mar bskol btang/ /ru rta rgya spos utpa la/ /tsan dan mar sbyar mgo bskus phan/ /rlung shas che la 'jigs yod pas/ /gtar ga 'di la mi bya'o/ /des ma zhi na bad rlung la/ /me btsa' ji skad bshad par bya/ /gzhogs phyed na la'ang de bzhin
289a3(mdo 'grel): de/ /nad dang 'brel ba gso bar bya/ /shi ri sha yi sa bon dang/ /a ba mrga'i rtsa ba dang/ /kha ru tsha bcas sna sman pa tar/ /yang nas la brtsi bo 'am/ /tsakra marda ga'ang rung/ /skyur ba dang sbyar lde gu bsku/ /nyi ma ltar 'khor de i tshe/ /gtar gas
289a4(mdo 'grel): khrag ni dbyung bar bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur mgo nad la/ /snum chos byas nas gtar ga gdag mgo dad gdong byug sman chu blug/ smon khrus mas btang bsil bar ba/ /'tsho bed dang bskrol bo me dang/ /mar ni sna sman btung ba blud/ /khrag las
289a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'ang 'di bzhin bya/ /mu 'gram can la gtar ga spang/ /bad kan mgo nad mar rnying dang/ /snum 'tshos byas la tsha bas slon/ /dugs dang byug pa sna sman sogs/ /rtsub dro rno ba'i sman gis gso/ /'dir ni mung ba'ang bsngags pa yin/
289a6(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa las ni 'dren mar gso/ /srin gyur sna sman khrag blugs te/ /de yis 'bu ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /khrag gi dri yis ra ro nas/ /kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sna sman dud rdub rmos/ /de ni ne bar 'byung bar 'gyur/
289a7(mdo 'grel): yungs kar nimpa i gu dang/ pi lu'i mar dang sbyar ba yi/ /bi TA ga dang sa rdzi ka/ danda shing kun ba gcin bskol ga sna sman so sor btang bar ba/ /pi DA gani ra gcin dang/ /sbyar ba'i sna sman 'bu 'joms mchog/ ne rul bcas
289b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sna sman dang/ /dud pa dag kyang brdub par bya/ /srin bus khrab ni 'thungs pa'i phyir/ /'di la khrag ni dbyung mi bya/ /mdo 'dar rlung gi mgo nad kyi/ /gso ba me btsa' ma btogs bya/ /nye ba'i mgo nad skyes pa yi/ /rjes dang skyes ma thag la ni/ /rlung nad kyi ni gso
289b2(mdo 'grel): pa bya/ /smin nas khor 'bras gso las bya/ /'brum phran 'brum bu khong 'bras la/ /smin dang ma smin ji bzhin bya/ /srin las srin bu pad+ma yis/ /gtang ga byas te ni ma pa'i chu/ /blugs shing rta spangs khu ba ni/ /ya na tshwa shas cher btab pas
289b3(mdo 'grel): bsku/ /nimpa pa ta la'i lo ma/ /yung bar bcas pa zhib btags bsku/ /ba gcin 'ba' zha rnying bar sbyar/ /khyim bya'i rtag pa dag gis bsku/ /gyo mor ru rta ba rwos pa dang/ /til gyi phye mar bcas pa yis/ /slog pa bskus na g.ya' pa 'a/ /chu
289b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzag g.ya' bsal bar byed/ /ma la dzi dang tsi tra ka/ ka ra bi ra ka rany+dza/ /til mar spu gris bregs pa yi/ /rjes bsku kor 'ang 'byi ba sel/ /des ma zhin mgo bo yi/ /sbyang byas slon smas sogs pa bya/ /mi bzad pa la dar por ni/ /dpral ba'i
289b5(mdo 'grel): rtsa la gtang ka bya /mgo bo'i bkru sman btang/ /shing mngar bi la ya'i sa bon/ /ru rda yungs kar ma sha bcas/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde bu bsku/ /rgya skyegs dong ka'i lo ma dang/ /tsa gra mar dang skyu ru ra/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa bskus na
289b6(mdo 'grel): phan/ khre rgod cha bsrags thal ba ni/ /chu dang sbyar bas bskus na phan/ /kod lar skra 'phyi ji ltar ni/ /nye bar gtang ga gdab ba dang/ /zhal zhal byas te na le sham/ /ldong ris spang ma nag tshur bsku/ /kyang na 'ba' cha'i thang shing
289b7(mdo 'grel): dam/ 'ol ma se yi 'bras bu'i rtsa/ /yang na langka li rtsa 'am/ /ka ra bi ril khu ba'am/ /kAN+Da? kA di khu ba ni/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku bar bya/ /d+ha d+hu ra yi lo ma 'am/ /bse shing 'bras bu'i khu bas bsku/ /til gyi me tog gze ma dang/ /mar dang
290a1(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi bcas pa'am/ /glang po'i so bsregs til mar bsres/ /ko ler 'byi ba'i sman mchog yin/ /skra dkar skye la lug gi rwa/ /snag tshas de bzhin bsku bar bya/ /ji srid skra ni skye kyi bar/
290a2(mdo 'grel): chu blugs ba ni spangs bar bya /spyi cer skra dkar gnyer ma dang/ /skra ser skyes la sbyang byas la/ /sna sman gdong dang mgo bkrus la/ /byug pa rnams kyi gso bar bya/ /'bri ha ti sogs ta li mar bskol/ /'tsho byed bskol pa'i sna sman blug/ ni ma
290a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i mas kyis zla ba gcig/ sna sman btang ste 'o ma blud/ shwi sha a raN+Da dang rmas/ /brim ka ra ja'i khu bar spangs/ /se lu til dang ba ru ra/ /pri yang ka ka ta'i sa bon/ /cha mnyam lcags las bskol nas ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od la bskams
290a4(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /mar 'dzag pa yi sna sman btang/ 'o ma 'thungs pas skra dkar sel/ /sa ha ra dza bye ru ka pa/ /'dri ga ra dza'i khu ba ni/ /bre gang til mar bul gang dang/ /shing mngar srang gcig btab ste bskol/ /a sa na'i ma rdo snod dam//
290a5(mdo 'grel): lug gi rwa yi nang du gzhug/ ka ra bi ra ba ya sya/ /'o ma dang ni zhib btags pa/ /skra dkar byung pa'i rjes bsku zhing/ /spangs na skra dkar sel bar byed/ /bi la ya dang shing mngar dang/ /'tsho byed sde tshan til nag dang/ /sa nag 'o ma'i lde
290a6(mdo 'grel): gu yis/ /gdong bskus gnyer ma sbu ser sel/ /til ngang pad+ma ge sar dang/ /shing mngar sbrang rtsi skyu ru ra/ /lde gus sa ni mgo bskus na/ /skra 'phel nag por 'gyur ba yin/ /spang spos ru rta til nag dang/ /thal res utpal ston po dang
290a7(mdo 'grel): 'o mar gtags te sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /skra ni 'phel bar byed pa'i mchog /lcags phye bri ma ga ra tsa dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang sa nag po/ /bu ram shing khu ro zla gcig gzhug/ skra dkar rtsad nas skyur bar byed/ /ma sha khri rkod skyur
290b1(mdo 'grel): rtsa bas dang/ /nad thug lcags phye tsha mang btab/ /zhag gsum bzhag ste btags pa yis/ /bya bar yang ni nag por byed/ /shing mngar tsan dan stag tsher dang/ /pi pi ling dang utpal/ /skyu ru ra khu til mar bskol/ /sna sman bsku ba byas gyur na/ /skra dkar dang ni
290b2(mdo 'grel): glang ba yi/ /nad kun 'joms par byad pa yin/ /nyer shing dzI bam ti'i khu ba/ /'o ma mar dang til mar dang/ /'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman gyis/ /na mchong yan chad nad kun sel/ /rma bya'i sgro mkhris rgyu ma dang/ /rkang pa rtug? pa mchu bor ba'i/ /sha dang
290b3(mdo 'grel): ba gla rtsa ba bcu/ /bsna shing mngar srang gsum gsum/ /chu bskol khu ba mar bre gang/ /'o ma bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /mngar ba'i lde gu'i sman sde btab/ /de btung mas btang bsku ba dang/ /sna sman dag tu bsten pa yi/ /nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel/ /sman
290b4(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni lde gu dang/ /dzI bam ti dang 'bras bu ba mu ma/ /me ta rgun 'brum dbyi mo dang/ /pa ru sha ka sa mang ka/ ga pra'i rtsa btang bal dang/ /ka rka ta sring ba sral phre'u/ /a ha me ha ta la dang/ /'bra go pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang/ /pad+ma'i stong po kha rdzun/ /shig mngar
290b5(mdo 'grel): nye 'u shing dzI ba ka/ byi da ri dang bu ram shing/ /thal tres rnam gnyis bri ha te/ /murba gze ma zangs rtsi ba/ /sing ga ta dang ka she ru/ /ra sna stir lci ba dang/ /sub smel zur ba man dang/ /ba sbu ba dang cu gang dang/ /ram nye ba dang byi tshe rab ma du
290b6(mdo 'grel): ka dang star ka dang/ /a bi shu ka muny+dza ka/ zho ni gnyis nyis byis tags dang/ /mar bre gang dad 'o ma ni/ /bzhi 'gyur dag dang bskol ba'i mar/ /'di ni rma bya chen mo ste/ /rma bya las ni yon
290b7(mdo 'grel): tan ltag/ lus bzungs dbang po nyams skad 'gags/ /lud pa dbugs ma bde nyen 'joms/ /zla mtshan khu ba'i skyon la'ang phan/ /mol sham la yang bu skyed byed/ /byi ba khyim bya dang po dang/ /ri bong dang yang de bzhin sbyar /nam tshong
291a1(mdo 'grel): yan chad gtogs pa'i nad/ /nye brgya sum cu rtsa gcig yin/ /de dag phan tshun ma 'dres par/ /rgya cher rab tu bshad pa yin/ /drang srong rnams kyi skyes bu'i mgo/ rtsa ba 'og mi yal gar bshad/ /de phyir rtsa ba la gnod pa'i
291a2(mdo 'grel): nang me myur du gso bar bya/ /gang la dbang po kun bsten zhing/ /gang la srog ni gnas byed pas/ /des na yan lag dam pa yin/ /bsrung ba la ni 'bad par bya'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi
291a3(mdo 'grel): le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /stod kyi nad gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas rma gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rma ni lhan cig skyes glo bur/ /reng dang ma reng
291a4(mdo 'grel): dbye ba gnyis/ /lud kyi nad gzhis bskyed lhan cig/ phyi yi rgyu 'byung glo bur ba'o/ /de med pa dag rma red yin/ /rma reng kha rgyas zhum pa dang/ /shin tu sra 'am shin tu snyi/ /shin tu mtho 'am shing tu dma'/ /shin tu grang dam
291a5(mdo 'grel): shin tu tsha/ /dmar zhing skyu 'am gnag pa nyid/ /rnag ni dri mnyam yongs su 'dzag/ sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul ba dang/ /g.yogs shing mched la rab tu na/ /g.yo zhing tsha la skrangs pa dang/ /g.ya' ba la sogs bla gnyan
291a6(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /yun ring du ni 'tsho ba dka' / /rma rnyed mtshan mar shes par bya/ /de ni khrag bcas nang bco lnga/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma/ /gnag cing rmug dmar thal mdog dang/ /thib nus pa lta bur snang/ /zho ga chu 'am 'bras bkru
291a7(mdo 'grel): chu/ da 'dra ba'i chu bla nyung du 'dzag/ sha zad shas cher na zhing zug/ rtsub cing tshog tsheg tsha ba yin/ /mkhris 'gyur myur nAg ser ba dang/ /sngo zhing ser skya bam kham par 'dug/ gcin dang thal chu rgya skyegs chu/ /til mar
291b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra chu mang du 'dzag/ rma la thal sman btab ltar na/ /dmar zhing tsha la gnag pa yin/ /bad kan las gyur mdog skya g.ya'/ /chu ni ska ba mang du 'dzag/ rma kha sbom zhing na ba dang/ /rtsa rgyud kyis khyab nad tshabs chung/ /khrag gyur byu ru'i mdog ltar
291b2(mdo 'grel): dmar/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i rnag /'dzag cing/ /rta bres kyi ni dri ltar bro/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dang yang ldan/ /gnyis sam gsum mam thams cad las/ /gyur pa'i mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/ /lce yi mdog 'dra 'jam zhing mnyen//
291b3(mdo 'grel): rma kha smug cing 'brum phran khyab/ /mnyam pa 'am dbus ma cung zad mtho/ /bla gnyan med rma dag pa yin/ /pags pa sha dang rtsa rgyus dang/ /tshigs dang rus pa nang grol nad/ /brgyad po der ni rma gnas pa/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso ba dka' /
291b4(mdo 'grel): gso sla snying stobs me drod sha/ na tshod nyams stobs ldan pa'i rma/ /zlum zhing dkyus ring rim gsum pa/ /zur bzhi ba ni gang yin dang/ /de bzhin dpyi rgyu ba pho mtshan mchu/ /rgyab dang mkhur tshos kha nang byung/ /gso dka' i
291b5(mdo 'grel): mig dang so dang ni/ /sna dang mig zur lte ba dang/ /srub mtshams lto ba rna ba dang/ /rtsib logs mchan khung nu mar byung/ /dbu ba rnag 'jog rlung 'byung zhing/ /gzugs rngu bcas shing stong nas 'dzag/ mtshan mar brdol zhing
291b6(mdo 'grel): kha nang bltas/ de bzhin rked pa'i rus par gnas/ /mdze can dug gis phog pa dang/ /lus skem gcin nang sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /rma'i steng rma ni byung ba gang/ /rma de gso ba dka' ba yin/ /me dpal rims dang tshad par 'khru/ /lung
291b7(mdo 'grel): pa lu dang skom dad che/ /gnyid med ba dang dbugs mi bde/ mi drod chung bar gyur pa yi/ /rma ni 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo ba'i thod pa chag gyur cing/ /klang rgyas mtshan ma snang de bzhin/ /chu ba rul zhing rtsa? de dang/ /rma phug ring dang srin
292a1(mdo 'grel): bus zos/ /rus pa chag dang zug rdu bcas/ /dug bcas pa dang ma gtogs dang/ /bcing ba nyes dang snum ches dang/ /rtsub pas spu sogs 'dar ba dang/ /skyod dang khong ba ma dag dang/ 'drangs drags nyams smad drags
292a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /chang 'thung nyin bar gnyid log dang/ /nyal po la brten mtshan gnyid yar/ /rma ni log par gsos ba dag/ gsos kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nam mkha' thang ba'i mdog/ 'dra zhing rnam ba med pa dang/ /brten
292a3(mdo 'grel): zhing 'brum bu gnyid bcas pa/ /'tsho bar 'gyur bar de bshad do/ /de nas 'dir skrangs gnas skabs su/ /gang la nye ba de las sbyang/ /sbyar ba skrangs bar gyur pa dang/ /rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /skrangs pa'i skabs su rgyun du
292a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ nye bar spyod pa bsil bas gso/ /de yis nad med chu lta bur/ /mod la zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rma skrangs sra bar gyur pa dang/ /nad bcas mdog ni mi sdug dang/ /dug can las ni khyad par du/ /pad+ma sogs pas khrag dbyung ngo//
292a5(mdo 'grel): nang khrag bral na mod la ni/ /skrangs dang mdog dmar nang zhing 'gyur/ /khrag byung nas ni cung zad lus/ /rig na nus pa rab bsil ba/ /shin tu zhib par red nyid btags/ /bu ram shing bu 'o mas sprus/ /lan brgyar bkrus
292a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i mar dang bcas /gzhan ma bskams par yang dang yang/ /rjes su mthun par bskus na phan/ /byug dang blugs pa de yi byas/ /u dum+ba ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /bla kra lcang ma a shad mdza' i/ /shun pa mar mang bcas bskus na/ /skrangs
292a7(mdo 'grel): ba sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /rung bas che zhing mkhrang ba dang/ sra zhing nad che bas che ba dang/ /khrag 'dzag pa dang rma skrangs pa'i/ /'di lta bu yi rma la ni/ /rlan can sha btags la dugs bya/ /zar ma til ni brdos pa dang/ /'o mas dpal ni
292b1(mdo 'grel): bsad pa dag/ de btags bskus na tsha nad sel/ /rma skrangs brtan zhing nang tshabs chung/ /bad kan rlung 'joms snum bsku zhing/ /de yi rjes la 'ong ma yi/ /sbu gus rim gyis dugs bya'o/ /zhu bar bya phyir lag mthil lam/ /mthe bo yis nis nye
292b2(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /nas dang gro dang mon sran sde'i/ /btsos te btags pa'i lde gus bsku/ gal te de yis ma zhu na/ /de nas de ni dkri bar bya/ /ma smin pa ni zhi 'gyur la/ /smin na rnags pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rgya shugs til dang zar ma dang/ /rgyam tsha phabs
292b3(mdo 'grel): dang ru rtsa'i phye/ /zho skyur zan dron gyis glan zhing/ /dugs byas nas ni dkri bar bya/ /legs smin skrangs ba phyogs gcig 'dus/ /btsang bar nye bar btsir gyur ba/ /dral bar 'os la dral bya zhing/ /shin tu 'jam por gyur pa'ang dral/
292b4(mdo 'grel): gu gul zar ma ba lang so/ /khron bu phug ron rtug pa dang/ /thal sman 'phrod dang thal sman te/ /smin pa'i sman gyis brtol bar bya/ /nang na rnag 'dug 'byung sgo 'phar/ /mtho bar gyur kyang gnang la gnas/ /snum med btsir ba'i sman gyis ni
292b5(mdo 'grel): kun nas rab tu btsir bar bya/ /bsku ba skams nam btsir ba yi/ /las dang btang snyoms nyid du bya/ /de yi rma sgor mi bsku zhing/ /de 'dras nad ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sran ma nas dang gro dang ni/ /ma sha mung+ga bra bo dang/ /sman ni sbyin bag can dag
292b6(mdo 'grel): gis/ /pags pa'i rtsa ba rab tu bsdam/ /gcing rnyi mdze yi rma dang ni/ /shas cher reng ba'i rma dag la/ /dod ka bye rug pa sogs kyis/ /lan ni bdun bdun bkru sogs bya/ /ma dag nimpa pa to la'i/ /lo ma bskol bas bkru bar
292b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /ma dag pa la n+ya gro d+ha/ /la sogs shun lpags bskol bas bkru/ /shing mngar til dang pa to la/ /dur bying danda ser po gnyis/ /nim pa'i lo ma rgyam tshar bcas/ /lde gus bskus na rma sbyong byed/ /rma ni kha phra gnad mtshams gan
193a1(mdo 'grel): danda rgyam tsha lam ka ling/ /dur byid sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/ /reng bur bcas pas rma spyod byed/ /rlung gi gnod cing khrag bcas shing/ /mi bzang na la nas dang gro/ spra tshil sh+ri be sha dra dang/ /thang shing mar bcas bdug pas bdug/
193a2(mdo 'grel): khrag mkhris dug gi shis che ba/ /shun tu bsil ba'i sman gyis bsku/ /bskams shing sha nyung gting ring dma'/ /sha bskyed pa yi sman bya ste/ /shug pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs dang/ /bal a shwa gand+ha til/ /bskus te sha ni bskyod par bya/ /sha
193a3(mdo 'grel): za shi ni cho ga bzhin/ /g.yos su byas te sbyin bar bya/ /sems dga' ba dang sha za yi/ /sha zos nas ni sha 'phel 'gyur/ /sha rnying 'bur bar gyur ba la/ /dzA ti'i me tog nag tshur dang/ /ldong ros ba bla gu gul dang/ /tsi tra ka
193a4(mdo 'grel): yi lde gus bsku/ /sha 'bur shin sra ba dang/ /g.ya' zhing ring nas 'tsho pa dang/ /rma ni na zhing sbyar dka' la/ /thal sman la sogs sbyang bar bya/ /rde'u chung rma ni gcin 'dzag dang/ /gang gzhan khrag ni 'byung ba dang/ /gang zhig
193a5(mdo 'grel): bcad nas sbyar ba dag/ ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /gso bar byed bzhin mi 'grub na/ /de ni me yi las kyi gso/ /skyon med rmal rma 'byor ba'i/ /sman dang sha bskyed gang yin sbyar/ /a shwa gand+ha seng phrom dang/ /shing
193a6(mdo 'grel): mngar btsod dang katpa la/ /da de ki yi me tog gi/ phye ma rma 'tsho ba byed pa'i mchog/ rnag dang sha ni med pa dang/ /sha yi gnas su ma 'drubs pa/ /til dang shing mngar bcas pa yin /lde gus rma ni 'tsho bar bya/ /snum
193a7(mdo 'grel): bro mngar dang kha ba dang/ /skabs thams cad sel bar byed/ /nim pa'i lo ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bskus pas rma spyod mchog yin no/ /snga ma gnyis dang zhun mar sbyar/ /myur du rma 'tsho ba byed pa yin/ /til 'drar nas kyi
293b1(mdo 'grel): lde gu ni/ /de dang 'dra bar la la 'dod/ /khrag mkhris dug dang glo bur ba/ /gting ring tsha dang bcas pa'i rma/ /'o ma rma 'byar sman dang ni/ /bskol ba'i mar gyi rma 'tsho ba bya/ /ban kan rlung 'gyur rma 'byor sman/ /til mar bcas pas rma 'tsho ba
293b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /nag tshur sed phrom a ru ra/ /pi khri dngul rdo sra rtsi pog spangs mngon son pa'i phye ma /til mar bcas pa rma 'tsho ba mchog/ mnyam zhing sha ni brtan pa dang/ /pags par gnas la phye ma phan/ /u dum
293b3(mdo 'grel): par a shwadtha/ /'dzam bu seng phrom katpa la/ /ku ku seng phrom phye mas gdab/ /pags ba myur du skyed par byed/ /rgya skyegs ldong ros btsod dang ni/ /ba la dang ni ser po gnyis// /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu yis
293b4(mdo 'grel): bskul na pags pa dag byed mchog/ skyar pa a mra'i rus pa dang/ /nA ga ge sarpri yang ku/ /tsan dam ser po dngul chu rnams/ /lde gu ba lang lci khu dang/ /sbyar ba bskus bar gyur na ni/ /pags pa mdog 'dra byed mchog yin//
293b5(mdo 'grel): ba so dud pa ma shor bsregs/ /skyes khaN+Da dang til mar dang/ /bskus ni sbu ni skye bar byed/ /de bzhin rkang bzhi'i sems mo spu/ /rus pa pags rwa rmig pa bsregs/ /snag tsha til mar dang sbyar bas/ /bskus na spu ni 'tsho bar byed//
293b6(mdo 'grel): sman ma la ni cha byad kyi/ /las bshad phan dang gnod pa bstan/ /rlung gyur rma la rtswa ba lnga/ gnyis dad rlung 'joms sde tshan pa na/ /mkhris gyur shugs pa n+ya gro d+ha/ /sde tsha ni gnyis dang mkhris 'joms btang/ /bad kan las gyur
293b7(mdo 'grel): dod ka'i sde/ /bad kan 'joms par byed pa btang/ /'dren ma las gyur 'dren mas byas/ /'di dag gis bkru byug pa dang/ /sman mar til mar sman khu dang/ /phye ma reng bu bdun po ni/ /rma la ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /dza'a ti
294a1(mdo 'grel): nim ba pa to la'i lo ma/ /skyer pa yung pa thal tes pu tse shel/ /spra tshil spangs ma shing mngar a ru ra/ /ka rany+dza yi sa bon btsod dang bcas/ /mar bskol 'dis ni rma kha chung ba dang/ /nad la brten zhing rnag ni 'dzag
294a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzad pa dang/ /rma yi phugs ring nad bcas phugs bcas pa'i/ /rma ni dag cing 'tsho ba par byed pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas las le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas 'phral du
294a3(mdo 'grel): byug pa'i rma gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rma ni gnang bas 'phral du ni/ /byung gyur glo bur rma zhes bya/ /de ni mdza' yas yin zin kyang/ /yal ga rnam pa brgyad du bshad/ /bshus dang bcad dang rnam bal bcad/ /rab tu 'chad dang lhung ba
294a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /phug dang bshags dang grugs pa'o/ /de la bshus pa chu ser ram/ /khrag ni nyung zad 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /bags pa tshod pas rtsa 'gyur yin/ /de las tshod 'gyur bcad pa yin/ /de la tshod pa rnam bcad yin/ /rab 'phyang rus bar
294a5(mdo 'grel): lhag ma lus/ /lhungs ba lus las bog pa yin/ /zug rdu phra mo 'bigs pas phug/ khrod ba ma gtogs snum pa yin/ /snga ma las gzhan bshags pa yin/ /khrag dang rkang ni 'dres gyur pa/ /mtshon gyis drag tu bsdum? pa yis/
294a6(mdo 'grel): rus bcad rgya cher snang krugs pa/ /de la 'phral du byung ba'i rma/ /zug gzer shin tu che ba la/ /shing mngar mar dang bskol ba 'am/ /ba bla'i til mar dro 'jam blug/ /nad pa'i tsha ba zhi bya'i phyir/ /bsku pa la sogs snam ba dan/ /bsil
294a7(mdo 'grel): mngar ba yi sman gyis ni/ /de yi mod la blug par/ /'phral gyi rma ni rgya che la/ /sbyangs pa'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang/ /mar gyis mchog tu bskru bya zhig/ /mkhris 'joms bsil ba'i gso ba bya/ /nang gyis rtsom ba che ba la/ /steng dang 'og
294b1(mdo 'grel): nas sbyang bar bya/ /smyung ba bya zhing 'bras chan bzhin/ /rgyun du gtar ga gdab par bya/ /bshus dang grugs pa 'di nyid da/ /cho ga 'di nyid lhag par sbyar/ /de gnyis khrag ni nyung shas 'dzag/ smin pa'am myur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /phal cher rma ni shag cher
294b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /gzhan las khrag ni 'byung gyur la/ /de yis khrag ni zad gyur bas/ /rlung 'khrugs nang ni bskyed pa la/ /rlung 'joms sman dang bskol ba yi/ /snum blugs pa dang sman chu blug/ dugs dang bsku dang dkri ba dang/ /snum gyi 'jam
294b3(mdo 'grel): rtsi rnams kyang bya/ /de ltar zhag bdun par bshad pa'o/ /'phral gyi rma byung cho ga bshad/ /zhag bdun nas ni shugs zas nas/ /sngar bshad la yi cho ga spyad/ /'dir ni phal cher spyi cho ga/ re re gso ba bshad bya ste/ /bshus la na ba
294b4(mdo 'grel): myur bsal phyir/ /rmal phan pa'i phye ma gdag /bcad pa rma sel lde gus bsku/ /rnam par bcad dang rab 'phyang la/ /cho ga bzhin du btsem pa dang/ /bcing ba dang ni btsir ba bya/ /mig bcar ba ni gsor mi rung/ /ma zhar phyir ni 'phyang
294b5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /'ang gi gnas su legs bzhag cing/ /rtsa ma 'chol bar byas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs nas ni/ /lag pas dal gyi mnan par bya/ /de nas shing mngar dzI ba ka/ zangs rtsi ba dang utpa la/ /mar dang 'o ma bcas
294b6(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i/ /sman thigs blugs dang sna sman dang/ /rta ba'i cho ga dag kyang bya/ /mig nad thams cad sel mchog yin/ /mig phugs zhugs la mgul ba bsdam/ /slon dang lud pa sprod pa dbyung/ /yang na dbugs rdub dbugs dbyung
294b7(mdo 'grel): bsngam/ /rma byung mig gi gso ba bya/ /rna ba po ga ba tsems nas ni/ /bu ga til mar dag gi dgang/ /lhag pa'i sum mdo chod gyur te/ /rlung gi 'byung bar 'gyur ba la'ang/ /mnyam du bzhag ste bar mtshams na/ /med par brtsems/
295a1(mdo 'grel): te bcing bar bya/ /'di lar yi mar sar gyis/ /blugs pa dag ni rab tu bsngags/ /gan rkyal bzhag ste kha zas byin/ /legs par spyod lam bsdoms te nyal/ /yan lag thad kar gnas pa yi/ rma byung yan la legs
295a2(mdo 'grel): bzhag ste/ /btsems la bkri zhing bcing bya zhing/ /gos ni mthug pos bcing bar bya/ /pags pa'i 'ur mthil bcings pas ni/ /'phrag pa'i rma la bcing bar bya/ /rlig pa 'phyang la sgang ba ni/ /b+hu gus chu ni gtong nas kyang/ /rlig pa
295a3(mdo 'grel): bcug ste ras ba la dang/ /bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya/ /'ur mthil bcing bar byas pa la/ /rked ba nas ni srad bus gdags/ /de ni rma ni 'dul gyur pas/ /snum dang dugs kyi las mi bya/ /bri yang ku dang a ka ru/ /sug
295a4(mdo 'grel): smel dzA ti parpa ta/ /tsan dam ldongs ros skyer pa dang/ /sle tres dang ni spang ma dang/ /til mar bskol bas rma 'tsho ba byed/ /yan lag ma lus chad pa la/ /til mar bskos bas bsregs nas ni/ /sgye'u bcings pas bcing bar bya//
295a5(mdo 'grel): de nas rmi ltar gso bar bya/ /phug pa zug rdu phyung bas gso/ /grugs dang chag grugs gso bar bya/ /mgo bo'i brug rdu dbyung ba la/ /skra yi ye'u gzhug par bya/ /gzhan du glang rgyas 'dzag pa yis/ /rlung 'khrugs de ni gsod par
295a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rma 'tsho bas nas ni rims kyis ni/ /skra ni dal gyis 'byung bar bya/ /klad rgyas 'dzag la srog chags ni/ /gzhan gyi glang pa bcings bar bya/ /gzhan las zug rdu phyung nas ni/ /rma red red bu snum can gzhug/ phug reng kha ni chung ba
295a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rma khar rnag dang khrag 'dzag la/ 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar blugs/ /de ni slu? gu chung dus btang/ /khod pa brtol te khrag gis gang/ /brgyal zhing snying ga rtsib logs na/ /rims 'debs lus tsha lto sgo snyom//
295b1(mdo 'grel): zas la mngon par mi dga' zhing/ /bshad pa gcin dang phyen 'gags la/ /mig dmar rdul 'byung dbugs mi bde/ /kha nang khrag gi dri bro zhing/ /lus kyang dri mi zhim bar 'gyur/ /ma zhu'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag/ khrag tu yang ni skyug par byed//
295b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu shas cher lto spo zhing/ /gzer nad kyis kyang gnod bar byed/ /zhu ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag/ gzer bcas lus ni lci bar byed/ /lte ba man chad grang ba dang/ /bu ga las kyang khrag 'byung 'gyur/ /gnas ni zhig par
295b3(mdo 'grel): ma gyur kyang/ /khrag ni 'dzag par gyur pa yis/ /bu ga lus ni 'gengs byed de/ /lgang pa'i ngos nas 'gengs dang 'dra/ /khrag nad yod pa de la ni/ /rkang lag grang zhing dbugs grang zhing/ /mig dmar mdog ni skya ba dang/ /lto bo ba ni
295b4(mdo 'grel): spang bar bya/ /ma zhur gnas bskyug sman btang/ /zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa la/ /bkru sman dang ni ni ru ha/ /snu med dro bas sbyang bar bya/ /nas dang rgya shug rgya sran gyi/ /khub snum ni med pa dang/ /nas thug kha zas bza' ba dang/
295b5(mdo 'grel): lce myang tsha dang ldan pa sbyin/ /khrag ni mang du 'dzag pa dang/ /khong ba snang la khrag blug bya/ /rgyu ma 'byar dang chad ba nyen/ /khong ba snang ba gnyis su bshad/ /dang por brgyal sogs chud ba yin/ /nas thug kha zas bza' ba dang/
295b6(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /rgyu ma 'byar ba the tshom bcas/ /rgya ma chad pa 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /gang gi bshad dang gcin dang phyen/ /rang gi lam las byung gyur la/ /bla gnyan med par brdol gyur kyang/ /'tsho bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /ma
295b7(mdo 'grel): brtol rgyu ma byung ba ni/ /gzhug par bya zhing gzhan du mig/ grog mo mgo bo bcad na ni/ /de yang gzhug ces la la smra/ /rdul dang khrag dang rtsa yis gso/ /'o mas legs par bsrus nas ni/ /sen mo bregs te mar gyis bsku/
296a1(mdo 'grel): rims kyis legs par gzhug par bya/ /rkam po 'o mas spangs nas ni/ /mar sar mang po bsku bar bya/ /sor mos mgul ba mnye bar dang/ /chu yis kyang ni gtor bar bya/ /de ltar rgyu ma nang zhugs nas/ /de yi tshen
296a2(mdo 'grel): btsir bar bya/ /rma kha chung dang sbom pa yis/ /rgyu mkhong bar ma chud na/ /de yi tshad tsam lto bar ni/ /bkral te nang du gzhug par bya/ /nang du legs par 'dug gyur na/ /de rjes rgyu ma'i rma btsem bya/ /gnas su legs par ma bzhag na/ /de
296a3(mdo 'grel): ni 'khrugs par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de rjes ras kyis dkris nas ni/ /mar gyis bsku zhing blugs par bya/ /de nas danda til mar dang/ /sbyar ba'i 'o ma dro 'jam blud/ /des ni bshad ba snye ba dang/ /rlung ni bde bar 'byung bar
296a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i spyod pa bsrung/ /lo gcig bar du 'bad par bya/ /lto las tshil ni byung gyur na/ /thal pa 'am ni sa dag gam/ ro bska ba yi rtsa ba dag/ zhib tu btags pas btab nas ni/ /de nas srad
296a5(mdo 'grel): bu dam du bcing/ /sman pa mkhas pas bsad par bya/ /mtshon rnon ma la bsregs pa yis/ /lan cig kho na gcad par bya/ /gzhan du byas nas gcod pa'i tshe/ /na zhing spo ba'am 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sprang rtsi bcas pa rma bcingS
296a6(mdo 'grel): la/ kha zas zhu nas 'o ma mar/ /dan+ti rgya skyegs gze ma dang/ /shing mngar khar bskol pa blung/ /shing mngar bcas pa sngar gyi ni/ /tshogs na dang tsha ba sel/ /tshil gyi rmen bu bshad pa yi/ /til mar bskus
296a7(mdo 'grel): na'ang phan pa yin/ /bal pu'i lo ma shug pa dang/ /spang spos ha re nu ka dang/ /a ka ru dang tsanda dang/ /pad+ma'i sa bon ser po gnyis/ /u shi ra dang shing mngar bcas/ /bskol ba 'phral gyi rmal ni/ /'tsho par byed pa'i
296b1(mdo 'grel): dam par bshad/ /mtshon gyis bsnun pas mi mngon pa/ /g.yang sa mthon po nas lhung ba/ /rlung mkhris 'joms sman 'drangs ba dang/ /mnye dang bsku ba sbyang ba bya/ /lus tshigs byed dang mnyes pa dang/ /snang du bsnun pas nyen pa las/ /snod chen
296b2(mdo 'grel): til mar gyis gang bar/ /gzhug cing sha khu sbyin par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas chag grugs gso pa bshad par bya'o/ /ltung ngang snang sogs kyiS
296b3(mdo 'grel): rus tshigs/ /tshigs dang tshigs med chags 'gyur gnyis/ /tshigs byung gyur na brkyang dang bskum/ /nus pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhan dag shin tu skrangs pa dang/ /gnas skabs kun tu rab tu na/ /bskyod pa chung du mi nus
296b4(mdo 'grel): shing/ /btsir na skrangs dang bcas pa yin/ /de ltar chag grugs mdor bsdus pa'i/ mtshan nyid yin te de dbye ba/ /chag pa'i dbye ba du mar 'gyur/ /de dag kun gyi gso ba ni/ /ji ltar 'tsham ba bzhin du ni /de bzhin don? nye bar bstan/
296b5(mdo 'grel): mang du 'phra mo chag pa dang/ /reg na sgra ni 'grol ba dang/ /gang du rus pa chag pa yi/ /bar du rus pa phram zhugs/ /yang na snang bas chag ba las/ /cung zad lus par gyur ba dang/ /gang yang btegs pa'i tshe na ni/ /rma ltar rkang du
296b6(mdo 'grel): nub pa dang/ /nus gzhan speg par gyur pa dang/ /rlung can nyung zad spang bar bya/ /dbyi yi rus mig chag pa dang/ /gang yang tshigs bye lhung ba dang/ /ro smad shin tu grugs pa dang/ /chag par gyur pa yang? yin dang/ /thong ba'i mtshams ni
296b7(mdo 'grel): ma 'byor ba 'am/ /de bzhin dpral ba phye mar gyur/ /gang yang mur 'gram chag pa dang/ /ltag pa nu ma'i bar chag spang/ /rus pa legs par chag gyur kyang/ bzhag nyes bcing ba nyes pa dang/ /gang zhig bskyod pas gnod 'gyur pa/ /de yang
297a1(mdo 'grel): spangs bar bya pa yin/ /gdod nas rus pa'i tshogs dag ni/ /nyes par skye 'gyur de yang spang/ /rus pa gzhon nu gug pa dang/ /sbubs can chag par gyur pa dang/ /thod pa gas par gyur pa dang/ /gzhan yang mang
297a2(mdo 'grel): du gas pa rnams/ /de nas dma' ba bstod par bya/ /mthon po mnan par bya ba yin/ /nang du nub pa drang bar bya/ /'og tu song ba steng du drang/ /brdag dang mnan dang smad pa dang/ /pags pa bsdus te bcing ba dang/ /de ltar bzhag
297a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /lus su gtogs pa'i tshig thams cad/ /yo 'am mi yo gang yang rung/ /legs par bzhag ste mi 'gyur bya/ /ras ma mar ni mang bas dkri/ /u dum bar ka dam+ba?/ /a rdzu na dang a shadtha/ /sa ra dza
297a4(mdo 'grel): ni pa la sha/ 'o ma las byung shun zheng che/ /'jam pa legs par 'jar ba dang/ /rten dang bcas shing mi 'gyur ba'i/ /shun pa'am dum bu dag dang ni/ /'jag mas legs par dkri bya zhing/ /ras kyi steng du glan par
297a5(mdo 'grel): bya/ /bcing ba lhod par gyur pa yi/ /mtshams sbyor brtan por mi 'gyur ro/ /dang por shin tu na zhing tshe/ /gnag dang skrangs pa 'byung par 'gyur/ /sos ka'i dus su zhag gsum gsum/ /dgun gyi dus su bdun
297a6(mdo 'grel): nas dgrol/ /thun mongs dus su zhag lnga nas/ /yang na chad pa'i dbang las dgrol/ /de nas n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/ /khu ba bsil ba'i chu blug bya/ /de ni nad bcas rtsa ba lnga/ /'o ma bskol ba blug par bya/ /mkhas pas
297a7(mdo 'grel): til mar 'khor lor btsir/ /rlung 'joms sman dang bcas pa yin/ /dro 'jam tsam ni bsku bar bya/ /dus dang yul gyi dbye bas bya/ /khu ba shin tu grang mos ni/ /rgyun du blugs shing lde gus bsku/ /bsar 'o ma
297b1(mdo 'grel): mar dang bcas/ /mngar ba'i sman dang bskol ba dag/ rgya skyegs khu bar bcas pa ni/ /chag grugs can lan da re blud/ /chag grugs rma dang bcas ba yi/ /rnal shing mngar par shas che/ /lde gu bskus ba'i yang na ni/ /lhag ma grug pa lta bur gso/ /rma yi sha ni
297b2(mdo 'grel): 'phyang ba la/ /sprang rtsims kyis bskus nas ni/ /sman pas sman ni kha sbyar nas/ /bcing ba dag kyang legs par bya/ /de ni mnyam zhing legs bshag nas/ /pri yang ku dang kad pa la/ /seng phrom btsod dang dad ki/ phye ma legs par
297b3(mdo 'grel): gdab bya 'am/ /seng phrom da da ki phye ma/ /btab na myur du 'cho bar 'gyur/ /de ltar chag gugs gso ba yin/ /lus zungs brtan la dgun gyi tshe/ /sha chen nad gzhi chung ba'i rma/ /gso sla gzhan ni gso ba dka' / /na tshong
297b4(mdo 'grel): dang po bar ma mdza' / /zla gcig gnyis dang gsum rim gyis/ /cho ga ji skad bshad bsten na/ /rma 'byor brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ /rked pa rje ngar brla chag na/ /spang leb la ni nyal ba phan/ /de bzhin bsdam phyir phur ba lnga/
297b5(mdo 'grel): byas na nye bar bstod byas te/ /rje ngar ngos gnyis la gnyis gnyis/ /rkang mthil drang po gcig bzhag bstod/ /sta zur ram ni sgal tshigs sam/ /gdong dang de bzhin phrag pa ru/ /tshigs byung chag grugs byung gyur
297b6(mdo 'grel): na/ /cho ga 'di bzhin sbyad par bya/ /tshigs ni byung nas yun ring la/ /snum bsku dugs kyis nyer byas te/ /'di bshad thabs dang rang gi blos/ /rang gi gnas su legs par gzhug/ tshig min chag ste grugs
297b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /bcing nyes pa yis gsos pa la/ /brdungs te tshag grugs bsreng par bya/ /de nas chag grugs bzhin du gso/ /chag nas ci nas ma brnags pa/ /de ltar sman pas 'bas 'bang par bya/ /sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul na
298a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /tshigs ni 'drubs par ma 'gyur ro/ /chag grugs can la rlung nas kyi/ /skabs bshad sdum ni sbyar bar bya/ /stobs bskyed sbyor ba bzhi po dang/ /'dzam rtsi'i las kyang bsten par bya/ /sa lu'i chan dang sha khu'i
298a2(mdo 'grel): mar/ /'o ma rgyas byed bsil ba bsten/ /chag grugs can la rus pa'i mtshams/ /la phyir byed tshang tsam sbyin par bya/ /de ma mtshams sbyor byed bas na/ /rmya par byed pa bsngags pa yin/ /lan tshwa tshad dang thal sman dang/ /snum dang
298a3(mdo 'grel): nyal po nyi tshan dang/ /rtsol bsten par mi bya zhing/ /chag grugs zas rtsub bsten mi bya/ /til nag phub ma med par sa yi nang gtums nas/ /chu yi nang du zhag bdun nye bar spangs 'gyur zhing/ /'di ni btags te nyin re legs
298a4(mdo 'grel): gar bskams nas ni/ /de bzhin 'o ma chu dang shing mngar nang du bskol/ /slar yang 'o ma snga ma bzhin du spangs te bskam/ /phub ma med cing rul med zhib tu btags nas ni/ /spang spos ba bla ka dang btsod dang chu srin sen/ /shu
298a5(mdo 'grel): ti kun danda dang ru rta ba bla gsum/ /tsan dan gur gum dang na thal tres a ka ru/ /sgron shing sra ci phog dang thab shing shug pa'i sde/ /de yi phye ma dri zhim 'o ma lhan cig btags/ /dri yi sman ni ma lus 'o mar bskol pa btsir//
298a6(mdo 'grel): rdo dreg ra sna a shu ma ti dang/ /ka she ru dang gand+ha pri yang ku/ /rgya spos gand+ha pa tra seng phrom dang/ /pa yas sya dang murba'i 'o mar bcas/ /spang sbos sogs dang til mar de bskol ba/ /dri yi til mang mchog 'di rus pa dag/
298a7(mdo 'grel): brtan zhing myur du zhi bar byed mchog yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad kyis khyab?/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs bstan bas sel ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu ?
298b1(mdo 'grel): bdun pa'o// //de nas mtshan par brdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /glang po rta la zhon te 'gro/ /gnas dang mal srang tsog bur 'dug/ gzha? 'brum nad kyi rgyur bshang dang/ /gzhan la'ang brten par gyur ba dang/ /mi dge smin bar gyur ba dang/ /'phral
298b2(mdo 'grel): du dam pa la smad pas/ /phal cher 'brum phran dang por 'byung/ /rkub kyi phyi 'am nang du ni/ /rma ni sor ni gnyis sam gcig/ sha khrag gnod par gyur las byung/ /chu sor gcin gyi gnas nye bar/ /'byung bas 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin can/ /de ni mtshan bar
298b3(mdo 'grel): brdol zhes bya/ /kun kyang ma gsos 'drul byed cing/ /mo mtshan chu so gzhag gi bar/ /shas cher 'jig par byed pa dang/ /bshad gci phyen dang khu chu ni/ /bu ga'i nang nas rim gyis 'byung/ /nad gzhi re re ldan ba 'dus/ /glo bur pa dang brgyad du bshad//
298b4(mdo 'grel): ma smin 'brum bu zhes byar bshad/ /smin pa mtshan par brdol yin no/ /rtsa ba mi mngon nang cha bas che/ /shas cher g.yos shing rma 'khyims 'khrug/ mtshan par brdol 'gyur shes par bya/ /de las gzhan du de mi byed/ /de las rlung gyur 'brum
298b5(mdo 'grel): bu ni/ /dmar zhing gnag lan ba dang/ /zug cing 'phar bar byed pa yin/ /mkhris gyur rdza mo'i mgrin ltar ring/ /dmar zhing srab la shas cher che/ /thal mdog dud pa 'thul bcas yin/ /bar mar? las gyur brtan zhing snum/ /rtsa ba che zhing
298b6(mdo 'grel): mdog skya g.ya'/ /rlung mkhris las gyur mdog gnag cing/ /dmar zhing tshal mi bzod na/ /bang rlung las gyur cung zad gnag/ /smin par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /'dus 'gyur rkang ba'i ? bod 'dra/ /nad ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur
298b7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ gzer dang skom dang yig 'chus/ /rims dang slon sogs kyis gnod byed/ /yal bar bor las smin pa dang/ /rma nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de las rlung gyur 'brum bu yi/ //ba ? khyab byed de/ /ko chags bzhin
299a1(mdo 'grel): du kha mang zhing/ /rims 'phel chu ser sla ba dang/ /lbu ba can ni rgyun du 'dzag/ ko tshags kha brgya pa zhes bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur rnga mo'i mgrin/ /bad kan las gyur sbyin bag ni/ /mar 'dzag yongs su 'dzag ces bya/ /rlung
299a2(mdo 'grel): mkhris las gyur bshad sgor ni/ /yongs su mchod pa kun khyab yin/ /dor ni ri bo'i? 'obs kyis ni/ /bskong ba lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur glang/ /gzhan du drang por sod gas byed/ /bad mkhris las gyur sngar
299a3(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i/ /gzhad 'brum la brten de ldan zhing/ /de las gzhad 'brum rtsa bar g.ya'/ /skrangs dang tsha ba la sogs bskyes/ /de ni myur smin brtol gyur na/ /gzhad 'brum rtsa ba rnag ? yin/ /rgyun mi 'chad bar 'dzag byed de//
299a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan 'brum 'di ni 'chan mar brjod?/ /'dus pa las gyur dung 'dra ba'i/ /dud ni 'khyil ba'i dbyibs dang 'dra/ /'di yis gzhad ni zhigs byed cing/ /mi bzang lam ni zhig par byed/ /gang cha shal bskam ba yis/ /rus pa'i
299a5(mdo 'grel): dum bu zos 'gyur pas/ /thad kar song bas lam log zhugs/ /brdol zhing snad par byed pa yin/ /de tshe gsal brnags pa dang/ /sha ni 'drul bar byed pa yin/ /der ni srin bu skye 'gyur zhing/ /gzhan ni kun tu zad bar byed/ /
299a6(mdo 'grel): ring por mi thogs des 'jig byed de ni lam log rma skyes yin/ /de las na tsha g.ya' la sogs/ /rma gso ba las shes par bya/ /de las drug po gso dka' yin/ /'dus 'gyur rma skyes spang par bya/ /sel ba'i gnyer mas phyin
299a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /srubs mtshams la ni brten pa'ang spangs/ /de nas 'brum bu'i tsha nyid ni/ /'di ni dbang de gso bar bya/ /sbrang? dang gtar ga chu blugs sogs/ /ci nas smin par mi 'gyur bar/ /'di ni 'bad de gso par bya/ /smin nas
299b1(mdo 'grel): slar yang snum 'chos dang/ /dugs byas nas ni lus bcing bya/ /gzhang 'brum lta bur bsdams nas ni/ /gting ring legs par brtags bya zhing/ /rtsa ba 'am ni rtse ma 'am/ /phyi bltas na du bltas pa brtag/ de la nang bltas btsal nas ni//
299b2(mdo 'grel): btsags bus legs par bcad bar bya/ /phyir bltas ma lus par bcang la/ /thal sman dag gis gso bar bya/ /de nas thal sman btab pa 'am/ /yang na sman pas mi btsa' bya/ /rnga mo'i mgrin la thal sman bsku/ /ko tshags kha brgya sbubs
299b3(mdo 'grel): gcig pa/ /bcug nas legs par bcad par bya/ /te btubs nas ni lhag ma 'ang bcad/ /gzhan du gzhang ni zhigs nas 'chi/ /'o mas ltar khyab pa 'ang de bzhin du/ /thal sman ba gcin sbu gus gso/ /gzhad 'brum mtshan par brdol
299b4(mdo 'grel): ba 'ang sngar/ /gzhang 'brum la ni sman phye gdab/ /rma skyes pa la re thag ba cang/ /zug rdu chung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ /zug rngu chud ste srin 'joms pa'i/ /bza' rang byug pa sbyang par bya/ /blan dugs sbu gu can la
299b5(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /rlung chos legs sbyar nad la phan/ /ko tshags 'dra dang thams cad la/ /ba lang dogs dang kun tu bzang/ /gzhor phyed pa dang gzhol gyis bya/ /btags te nye bar sbyar bar bya/ /dngos su 'debs par byed pa'i mtshon/ /ba lang
299b6(mdo 'grel): dogs/ zhes bya bar bshad/ /kun tu gtong ba kun tu bzang/ /ngos la gcong pa gzhol phyed pa/ /ngos gnyis su ni gzhol gyis bya/ /'dzag pa'i lam ni ma lus par/ /thams cad me yis bsbeg? par bya/ /slar yang 'di lta'i gnod
299b7(mdo 'grel): mi bskyed/ /sman pas de yi bar bar du/ /de yi lto sbyang la 'bad bya/ byi la'i rus pa 'bras bu gsum/ /khu ba lde gur byas pa bsku/ /dzo ti sma ti ma la sbu/ /bla sman dag bi sha la/ /dur byid pa ti pa tra ka/ /kar bi ra sra rtsi phog/ shu
300a1(mdo 'grel): dag su ra shi ra dang/ /arga'i lo ma til mar bskol/ /mtshan bar rdol la bskus nas ni/ /'di ni phan byed mchog tu bshad/ /shing mngar seng phrom pi pi ling/ /sug smel ha ri nu ka dang/ /ser po gnyis dang pri yi ku/
300a2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsha thal tre ba shug pa dang/ /pad+ma'i snying po da da ki/ /pra tshil ru rta sra rtsi bo ?/ /ba lung 'o mar bcas pa dang/ /til mer lhan cig bskol ba yis/ /bskus na 'brum bu mdze dang rma/ /gcin nang sbrang rtsi 'dra ba 'joms/ /bi tAM ka'i
300a3(mdo 'grel): snying 'bras bu gsum/ /pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling/ /sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar ba yi/ /lde gu zos na srin bu'i nang/ /mtshan mar rdol dang mdze yi nad/ /gcin snyi bo dang sman pa dang/ /rma 'khyims 'tsho 'byed pa yin/ /sle tres sug smen
300a4(mdo 'grel): bi DI ka/ dug mo nyung dang ba ru ra/ /skyu ru ra dang a ru ra/ /gu gul? rim gyis cha re bskyed/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'di zos na/ /'brum bu sbom dang mtshan mar brdol/ /nad ni sal bar byed pa yin/ /pi pi ling dang ci tra ka/ /bya DAM ka dang dug mo nyung
300a5(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam phyed kyi 'bras bu gsum/ /kun dang cha mnyam gu gul dang/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu yis/ /nad ni thams cad 'joms par bya/ /gu yul? swang? lnga pi pi ling/ /'bras bu gsum ni srad re dang/ /shing tsha sug smel
300a6(mdo 'grel): zho gnyis gnyis/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu ni/ /zos na mtshan ba brdol ba dang/ /mdze dang skran nad 'joms par byed/ /de nyid dang ni bca' sga'i phye/ /legs par bsres par gyur pa dang/ /rtsa ba bcu ba'i khu ba bsres/ /mchog
300a7(mdo 'grel): tu rlung gi nad sel byed/ /seng ldeng snying po 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/ /a san bskol khu ba dang bsres dang/ /cha mnyam gu gul sbrang rtsi lde gu byas/ /mdze 'brum gcin snyi mtshan par brdol nad sel/ /'di ni mtshan bar brdol
300b1(mdo 'grel): gso'i bye brag bshad/ /sman gyi mtshan nyid ltag ma gang yin pa/ rma yi dbang byas yongs su bsten pa dang/ /gso thams dogs pa legs par brtags te sbyar/ /rta zhon stobs 'gyed shug ni 'gegs pa dang/ /chang 'thungs nyal po ma zhu
300b2(mdo 'grel): ma go mas dang/ /drag shul las ni sna tshogs rma 'drubs na/ /lo gcig bar ram de las lhag pa spang/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas rmen bu
300b3(mdo 'grel): dang thor bu dang rkang bam dang 'bras kyi phreng ba'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o/ /nad ni bad kan shas che ba/ /khrag dang sha dang tshil la brten/ /zlum zhing mtho bar skrangs pa de/ /mdud pa 'dra bas rmen bur bshad/ /de ni nad gzhi sha khrag
300b4(mdo 'grel): tshil/ /rus rtsa rma las gyur pa dgu/ /de la rlung 'gyur rgya che zhing/ /zug cing bye ba snyam sems na/ /gnas nas gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho/ /rgyu med par ni 'phel zhing 'bri/ /'jam zhing lgang pa lta bur rgyas/ /brtul na khrag ni sla ba
300b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzag/ mkhris gyur tsha zhing mdog ser la/ /dmar zhing myur du smin pa yin/ /ba rtol na khrag ni dron mo 'dzag/ bad kan las gyur nad med sra/ /rag na grang zhing dkar la g.ya'/ /smin ni rnag ni ska ba 'dzag/ nad 'khrugs
300b6(mdo 'grel): khrag las gyur rmen bu/ /srin bu dang ni bcas par gyur/ /sha dang rtsal gnas pa yi/ /rmen bu tshor ba chung ba dang/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin/ /shas che'i gnod 'gyur sha las ni/ /sha bskyed zas la rmen bu 'byung//
300b7(mdo 'grel): snum zhing che la sra ba dang/ /rtsa yis khyab cing bad kan 'dra/ /tshil bskyed pa yis tshol 'phel ba/ /sha pags bar du phyin gyur pa/ /rlung gi rmen bu shin tu snum/ /'jam dang brtan par byed pa yin/ /bad kan dang ni mtshan nyid mtshungs/
301a1(mdo 'grel): lus 'phol 'bri ba mtshungs pa yin/ /de brtol tshil mthug dmar ba dang/ /dkar dang gnag pa 'dzag par 'gyur/ /dus pa chag dang snang pa la/ /mtho dang dma' bar 'gyur ba de/ /rus pa'i rmen bu zhes bya'o/ /rkang
301a2(mdo 'grel): gis song ba 'am drag shul gyis/ /dub par gyur na chu brgal bas/ /rlung gis rtsa yi khrag bcas pas/ /rlung gis btsir te 'khums nas ni/ /yon por byas te bskams pa dang/ /mig 'phar nad nyung rmen bu chags/ /de ni rtsa
301a3(mdo 'grel): yi rmen bur bshad/ /rmin ma 'drubs 'drubs ma thag/ ro ni thams cad zos gyur pa 'am/ /rlong ba spris ma med pa'am/ /yang na lus ni snang gyur pa 'am/ /rlung ni nad khrag ma phyung ba/ /ma spyad rma ni bsrubs pa las/ /tsha
301a4(mdo 'grel): zhing g.ya' dang bcas gyur pa/ /rma yi rmen bur de bshad de/ /gsor rung nad gzhi khrag tshil gyur/ /sra zhing 'gyur dang sbom pa dang/ /gnad dang mgul ba ltor gnas yin/ /mdud pa cher chags thor bu ste/ rmen sung? yi
301a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid can/ /nad gzhi la sogs gyur drug yin/ /phal cher bad kan tshil rgyas yin/ /brtan bas smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag nad kyis/ /'khums pa yi ni gnod 'gyur zhing/ /smin pa de tshe rgyas
301a6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /she yi myur sa khyab gyur cing/ /skyes pa de las nad khrag ni/ /rgyun ma 'chad par mang bu 'dzag/ de ni khrag gi thor bu yin/ /de las sha khrag las gyur spang/ /bzhi po gzhan dag gso bar bya/ /dang phor chu sor
301a7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa 'am/ /ro smang la brten bad kan rgyas/ /sha khrag nad kyis rkang par ni/ /dus su skrangs par byed 'gyur zhing/ /rim gyis stug ba nyid du 'gyur/ /da ni rkang bam zhes bya'o/ /rlung gyur gas shing gcag? pa dang/ /rgyu med na zhing
301b1(mdo 'grel): rtsub cing na/ /mkhris par gyur la ser ba dang/ /tsha dang rims kyis 'debs pa dang/ /bad kan snum lci na tshabs chung/ sha yi mdzer ba chen pos khyab/ /de ni mang du 'dzag pa dang/ /lo gcig 'das pa spang bar bya/ /kha cig lag ba sna dang mchu//
301b2(mdo 'grel): rna ba rkang ba ltar 'byung zer/ /rkang bam skyes par gyur pa de/ /rlan can gnas su mi bzang skye/ /nad ni tshil mgrin mdzing ba mig/ mchan khung chu so gnas pa dag/ mdog 'dra swa zhing snum pa dang/ /ba rta skyu ru ba 'dra dang/ /gting
301b3(mdo 'grel): zug 'bras ni cher 'byung ba/ /ring zhig lon nas smin par byed/ /de las kha cig nad med smin/ /kha cig 'dzag dang g.yab? ba yin/ /kha cig bskams shing kha cig skyes/ /yun ring bu ni gnas bar byed/ /du ? bzhin du 'bri
301b4(mdo 'grel): zhing 'phel/ /'brum chen 'bras chen zhes bya'o/ /de na ring bcas skyug pa dang/ /cha nang yud rtsi logs zug pa spang/ /rma la mi 'phrod bsten pa yis/ /skrangs dang sman pa khyad par med/ /sha sogs nang du rnag? zhugs 'gyur
301b5(mdo 'grel): ring du 'gro bar byed pa yin/ /de ni ring du 'gro pas 'gro/ spubs ltar 'dzag pa spu gu yen/ /drang po spu gu gcig yin te/ /de nyid sna tshogs 'gro bas 'gro/ de ni nang gzhi re re 'jus/ /zug rbu'i? rgyus 'byung lngar 'gyur ro/ /rlung
301b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur nang bcas rma sgo phra/ /mdog mi sdug cing lbu ba 'dzag/ nub mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin/ /mkhris gyur skom dang rims kyis 'debs/ /ser dro rnag ni dri mnam 'dzag/ /nyin par lhag par 'dzag pa
301b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /bad kan ska? zhi sbyin bag 'dzag/ g.ya' zhing sra par gyur ba dang/ /mtshan mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin/ /'dus gyur mtshan ma kun ldan spang/ /nang na gnas pa'i zug rdug ma phyung zhing/ /sbu gu skyes par gyur
302a1(mdo 'grel): pa gang yin de/ /lbu bcan la sla zhing dro ba dang/ /khrag bcas rnag ni cad bcas rtag tu 'byung/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas rmen bu la
302a2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i nang gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rmen bu ma smin pa la ni/ /rang rang skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso/ /kaN+Da ka ri bri ha tI/ /tsi tra ka dang pi pi ling/ /bskol ba'i mar gyis lus sbyang bar/ /'dod pa dag ni snum 'chos bya/ /sbyang
302a3(mdo 'grel): byas sman rna lde gu bsku/ /rmen bu lan mang dugs byas te/ /yang dang yang du mnye bar bya/ /'di ni mchog tu rlung la bya/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'ang/ /gtar ga bsil ba'i sbyor kun bya/ /bar kan las gyur rlung
302a4(mdo 'grel): ltar gso/ /'on kyang smin na de bcad de/ /khrag yod pa ni mes bsreg bya/ /ma lus par bcad lus gyur na/ /slar yang 'phel bar byed par 'gyur/ /sha yi rma las gyur rman bu/ /de bzhin 'tsho ba tsam du bya/ /chi ba las gyur bar 'di
302a5(mdo 'grel): nyid dang/ /til dang 'o ma'i lde gus bsku/ /ras ni nyis rim dag gis dkri/ thong lcags la sogs bsregs pas gos/ /yang na mtshon gyis dral nas ni/ /tshil byung nas ni legs par bsrag /rtsa yi thor bu sar pa la//
302a6(mdo 'grel): sa ha ra ci'i til mar blugs/ /rlung 'dzoms sman gyis dkri dugs bya/ /'jam rtsi dang ni gtar ga gdab/ /thor bu rmen bu lta bur ni/ /rang gi ji bzhin byas rab phan/ /rkang pa ma rlung gyur 'phel pa la/ /snum zhing dugs byas lci
302a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /long mo'i sor gnyis gong du ni/ /gtar ga gdab par bya pa dang/ /e raN+Da mar 'o ma dang/ /ba gcin sbyar ba bla gcig blud/ /zhu nas 'bru snying bca' sga dang/ /'o ma dang sbyar kha zas sbyin/ /de bzhin dur byid 'o ma
302b1(mdo 'grel): blud/ /des ma zhi nams bsreg bya/ /mkhris gyur long mo'i 'og tu ni/ /khrag dbyung mkhris pa sel kun sbyar/ /bad kan las gyur mthe bo las/ /khrag gtar nas kyi kha zas ni/ /sbrang rtsi bcas pa'i sman khu blung/ /'phal ba'i tshe na pi pi ling/ /a
302b2(mdo 'grel): ru ra ni bsten par bya/ /yungs kar 'bri ha ti gnyis kyi/ /rtsa pa'i lde gus byug par bya/ /yang na 'u su'i lde gus byug/ 'bras kyi phreng ba steng 'o gnas/ /sbyang zhing danda dra baM? ti/ /dur byid ko sha ta ki dang/ /de ba ta li'i mar bskol blud/ /bad kan tsha'i ni
302b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzoms pa yi/ /durba sa mkhung bka' sna sman btang/ /gtar gas khrag ngan dbyung ba dang/ /skyer ba khaN+Das gcin yang blung/ /rmen bum smin ba la ni/ /rgyam tsha bca' slan gu li/ /bsku zhing sra brgyam tsha yi/ /thum bus dugs bya mnye bar bya//
302b4(mdo 'grel): sha mil bug sh+ri kru yi/ /sa bon nas dang yungs kar bcas/ /dar bar skyur po btags bskus na/ /rmen bu'i mdud ba zhu bar byed/ /smin bar 'phrigs na khrag dbyung zhing/ /bad kan mkhris pa sel pas gso/ /ma smin pa ni phyung nas kyang/ /thal
302b5(mdo 'grel): sman me btsas gso bar bya/ /dzA ti shma ti laM ka la'o/ /shu ka na sa'i 'bras bu dang/ /ka ka tigta ka rko ti/ /de ba ta li'i sa bon dang/ /pi sha la dang ni rku ndi/ /ko sha ta ka'i ba ta rnams/ /srang ni phye ngang dug zho gnyis/ /ka rany+dza yi mar bre gang//
302b6(mdo 'grel): ni ra gun+ti yi khu ba ni/ /bri bzhi bskol bar gyur pa 'di'i/ /btung dang bsku byug snar btang na/ /'bras kyi phreng ba gsor mi rung/ /yun ring len zhing rnag 'dzag sel/ /li ka li yi sdong bu yi/ /lde gu til mar de bzhi 'gyur/ /nir kun+ti
302b7(mdo 'grel): yi khu bar bskol /sna sman sogs btang 'bras phreng sel/ /tsan dan thang shing na le sham/ /dur bying gla sgang ser po gnyis/ /srang re dug ni srang phyed dang/ /ba gcin sbyar te zhib tu btags/ /b+h+raM mhi'i khu ba arga yi/ /lo ma pa
303a1(mdo 'grel): lang lci khur bcas/ /yungs mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /btung ba la sogs par bsten na/ /mdze dang rma ni 'khyims pa dang/ /'bras kyi phreng ba myur du sel/ /shu dag rgya skyegs a ru ra/ /pu tse shel dang tsan dan dang/ /til
303a2(mdo 'grel): mar bskol ba blud na ni/ /'bras pheng rtsa ba bcas pa sel/ /sha ra bung+ga'i rtsa ba ni/ /'bras kyi chu dang btags gyur ba /sna sman bsku bas 'brum bu dang/ /dug srin 'bras kyi phreng ba 'dzoms/ /u duM ka ri'i rtsa ba dang/ /pi lu'i lo
303a3(mdo 'grel): ma seng phrom dang/ /sa ha ra tsa'i a ru ra/ /shing mngar shu ti tsi tra ka/ thang shing til mar 'o ma mnyam/ /sna sman bsku byug byas pa'ang phan/ /ba lad ra lug rta mig bsregs/ /yungs mar sbyar te bsku ba 'am/ /spru la nag pa rog
303a4(mdo 'grel): rang nyid shi/ ingku tartsi? sbyar ba bsku/ /de ltar ma zhi nad kyi ni/ /legs gzhan byin pa la gnas pa/ /chu so steng ma 'og nas ni/ /tshil phyung nas ni mes bsreg bya/ /gyen du 'gre ba'i nang ba gzhal/ /de yis tshad kyi rting pa ru/ /de la rmen bu
303a5(mdo 'grel): dbyung bya zhes/ /drang sreng mu khyud kyis bshad do/ /rting ba nas bzung sor ni bcu gnyis na/ /dbang po'i chu so yod sbang nad kyi ni/ /g.yon du dral te nya sgong 'dra dbus nas/ /dra ? drang zhes legs thos kyis bshad do/ /mi yi long mo
303a6(mdo 'grel): rna ba'i bar du bzhag/ de yi brgyad pa btang ba'i cha bgos te/ /byin snying ba nad kyi drang thad ma gtogs dral?/ /tshil ni dbyung bar bya zhes gzhan dag 'chang/ /rlung 'gyur sbu gu dug byas la/ /dpral te a ba marga yi/ /sbu gus til dang
303a7(mdo 'grel): rgyam tshar bcas/ /btags pa'i lde bu legs par bsku/ /mkhris pa las gyur til dang btsod/ /nA ga dan+ti ser po gnyis/ /bad kan las gyur rgyam che til/ /dan+ta nampi lan ? bskus/ /zug rdu las byung dral te dbyung/ /til dang mar ?
303b1(mdo 'grel): sbrang? rtsis bskus/ /mtshan dral mi rung chu tshod kyis/ /legs par btsal te nang du dbug/ thal sman la sbangs skus pa'i/ /rma tshol kha ni shas cher dral/ /rma red kha ni dog pa dang/ /phug ring la yang sbyar bar bya/ /reng bu gang dang ting mar gang//
303b2(mdo 'grel): ba ni khyims pa la yang bsngags/ /e raN+Da 'bras lde gus bsku/ /sbu gu'i rma sbyod byed mchog yin/ /rgya shug 'bras bu'i shun pa dang/ /lan tshwa rgya skyegs bcas pa dang/ /sla gor zho sha'i lo ma dang/ /pri yaM ku dang nu zho dang/ /arga snu
303b3(mdo 'grel): ha'i 'o mar sbyar/ /reng bus rma 'khyims myur 'tsho ba byed/ /rgya mtsho'i tsha dang rtsa bas ru tsha/ /lce myang tsha di legs par bsregs/ /sla gor zho sha khyim du ?/ /a mra ta ka seng ldeng gi/ lo ma btsir nas skyer pa gnyis/ /lde gus bsku
303b4(mdo 'grel): ba sogs bsten na/ /bag med mi brtan skyes bu yi/ /'byor ba bzhin du 'grib par byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu pa'o// //de nas nang phra mo'i dmigs shes
303b5(mdo 'grel): par bya ba bshad par bya'o/ /bar rlung las gyur 'brum phran ni/ /snum zhing mdog 'dra mdud pa can/ /nad med mung+ga 'dra ba ni/ /byis pa las skyes ra'i 'gram pa/ /de gnyis las byung shar gnas zug/ nas 'dra nas shel bya ba yin//
303b6(mdo 'grel): 'bras byer zlum po rtso mo me/ /rnag nyung stug mtha 'bras byer yin/ /rmen bu lnga 'am drug 'byung zhing/ /rus spal lta ? thu rus sbal yin/ /rna ba'i stang na kun tu ni/ /'brum phran sra zhing mi bzang na/ /utpal rtsa 'dra pa nas//
303b7(mdo 'grel): skrangs shing cung zad na la brtan/ /'gram pa'i mtshams su de gnyis las/ /'byung pa rdo yi bung bu yin/ /shalma li yi tsher na 'dra/ /'brum phran nas bcas mthug mo ni/ /nang na tshil yong lang cha la/ /'byung ba bzhin ni ma rungs
304a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ /bad kan rlung gyur pad+ma yi/ /tsher ma 'dra bas khyab 'gyur zhing/ /dkar zhing nad ni med pa dag/ pad+ma'i tsher ma can zhes bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran lum/ /u dum+ba ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/ /shas cher
304a2(mdo 'grel): tsha zhing rims 'debs byed/ /gas pa kha bye zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi rnams dang gdong la ni/ /tsha zhing nad dang rims bskyed cing/ /sran chung tsam la de'i mdog can/ /'brum phran mthug po sran chung yin/ /de bas 'brum bu nad tshabS
304a3(mdo 'grel): che/ /sdug bsngal byed pa 'brum bu yin/ /rlung mkhris las gyur 'brum bu'i nad/ /pad+ma'i snying po lta bu yi/ /'brum phran gyis ni phug pa yin/ /de dag nyid bskyed bong bu yi/ /zlum zhing rgya che mtho ba dang/ /mdog dmar

304a5(mdo 'grel): zhes ni grags pa yin/ /tsha ba'i rdul gyis lus brdungs la/ /'brum phran nad bcas sdug mo ni/ /dbyibs dang chad mdog skye che 'dra/ /de ni skye tshe zhes bya'o/ /mkhris pa shas che'i nad kyis ni/ /me dpal lta bur dal gyis mched/
304a6(mdo 'grel): skrangs shing smin la srab cing dmar/ /rims bskyed dra pa'i bong bu'i yin/ /mkhris pa shas che'i 'brum bu ni/ /rims bskyed shal gnod byed pa/ /mchan khung phyogs su me'i gdog can/ /'dre ba de ni me bskyed yin/ /zhag
304a7(mdo 'grel): lnga 'am ni zhag bdun ni/ /zla ba phyed dam srog 'phrog byed/ /nad gzhi gsum skyes 'brum bu zlum/ /nam tshong yan chad skyes sa 'khor/ /mchan khung chu so bi da ri/ /rtsa ba ltar sra bi ta ri/ /tshil dang bad kan las gyur ba'i/ /rmen
304b1(mdo 'grel): bu rtsa rgyus sha la gnas/ /brtol na mar zhag sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /'dzag gyur de la rlung shas che/ /sha skam rmen bur byas nas ni/ /gseg ma lta bur skyed par byed/ /khrag ni dri mnam brnags pa dang/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba yi/ /nad
304b2(mdo 'grel): kyi de la khrag 'dzag pa/ /de ni 'brum bu gseg ma dang/ /lag pa rkang mthil tshigs dang ni/ /nam tshong yan chad grog ma yi/ /mgo ltar rim gyi rmen bu ni/ /phra mo mang pos khyab byed pa/ /na zhing tsha la g.ya' zhing 'drul/ /kun tu skyes te
304b3(mdo 'grel): gog ma'i mgo/ rkang mthil bshag mas bud pa 'am/ /tsher ma sogs kyis snang pa yi/ /'brum bu phur pa ltar mto ba/ /skyes te 'dzer pa 'dra zhes bya/ /shugs bkag pa yis rlung dag ni/ /gzhang dang rkang pa la gnaS pa//
304b4(mdo 'grel): phyi dang nang du rgyu byed pa/ /lam rgyu de la bshang ba ni/ /dka' bas 'byung bar byed pa yin/ /gzhang 'gags pa zhes bya bar 'dod/ /rlung mkhris kyis ni sen mo yi/ /nang gi sha smin nang bskyed pa/ /ma snang nang dang tshim pa dang
304b5(mdo 'grel): nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya'o/ /snang pas brnags shing rtsub pa dang/ /sra ba sen mo ngan zhes bya/ /'dam ni gnod byed la reg nas/ /nang na g.ya' zhing rnag bcas pa/ /sor mo'i 'bras byer zhes bya'o/ /pags pa til 'dra gnag
304b6(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /nad med 'byung 'gyur rme ba ste/ /de nyid 'bur ba 'dzer pa yin/ /mdzer pa las kyang chen por 'gyur/ /dkar nag pags pa'i mdzer pa yin/ /de 'dra'i 'brum bu skyes pa ni/ /dmar po rgya skyegs nor bu yin/ /dkar ba 'am gnag par lhan cig
304b7(mdo 'grel): skyes/ /zlum pa 'am mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /mya ngan khro dang rlung mkhris sogs/ /'khrugs te gdong ni srab 'gyur zhing/ /thig le nag po do shig can/ /gdong la gzhan 'byung khabs zhes bya/ /rlung 'gyur ngo shig rtsub bar?
305a1(mdo 'grel): snang/ /reg na rtsub cing gnag pa yin/ /mkhris gyur mdza' ma cung zad sngo/ /bad kan las mdza' dkar la g.ya'/ /khrag gyur mdza' ma zangs mdog can/ /sbam? zhing tsha ba tsag tsag byed/ /rlung gis bad
305a2(mdo 'grel): kan slongs gyur pa/ /pags par phyin te bskams gyur pa/ /de las pags ba skya 'gyur zing/ /rim gyis tshor ba med 'gyur la/ /g.ya' ba chung zhing 'drul ba med/ /bem po de ni tshor med yin/ /skyug sman nyes dang ma zhu
305a3(mdo 'grel): dang da/ bad mkhris lus la gnas slong bas/ /rab g.ya' zlum po gor gor po/ /dmar po mang du 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /rjes 'brel ldan pa zlum por bshad/ /de ltar nad ni phra mo yi/ /dbye ba sum cu drug tu bstan/ /
305a4(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gcig pa'o// //de nas nad phra mo g.yo ba bshad par bya'o/ /ra yi 'gras ba ma smin pa/ /srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung zhing/ /nas
305a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra dugs ni byas nas su/ /thang shing ru rta ldong ros dang/ /ba bla'i lde gu bskus te bzhu/ /rdo yi bung buAng de ltar gso/ /smin ba ra 'gram rma ltar gso/ /bzhin gnod seng phrom 'u su dang/ /shu dag btags pa'i
305a6(mdo 'grel): lde gu 'am/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma 'am/ /rgya star lo ma tsha sbyar bsku/ /des ma zhi na skyug sman dang/ /sna sman dbrel bar gtar gag dab/ /bad ma'i tsher ma nim+ba yi/ /khu ba 'am ni ba mar bskol bar/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni
305a7(mdo 'grel): bcas pa blud/ /ni pa dong ga sbyar ba byug/ kha bye sogs nas rdo bod bur/ /sa bskor bcas pa mkhris pa yi/ /me dpal lta bur gso bar bya/ /me bskyed pa ni spang bar bya/ /drang ba'i bong bu smyung ba dang/ /gtar ga gdang
305b1(mdo 'grel): dang rtsub chos dang/ /lus kyi sbyang ba skyu ru ra'i/ /sbyor ba'i bsil sman byug bas gso/ /bi da ra la khrag gtar zhing/ /bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso/ /gseg ma lta bu'i 'brum phran la/ /tshil gyi rmen bu lta bur gso/ /grogS
305b2(mdo 'grel): ma'i mgo 'dra bu ga mang/ /cher skyes skrangs shing gnang la gnas/ /rkang pa lag pa byung ba spang/ /cig shos la ni khrag phyung la/ /rgyam tsha dod ga'i sle tres dang/ /ci tse rgya sran rtsa ba dang/ /dan+ti til btags nas phye
305b3(mdo 'grel): bsku/ /smin ba la ni nad can sha/ thams cad legs par sbyar bar bya/ /mtshon gyi bcad la de rjes la/ /thal sman yang na me yis bsreg/ mdzer ba 'dra la btsags bu yis/ /ma lus bcad la snum gyis bsreg/ gzhang 'gagS
305b4(mdo 'grel): pa la nor bu ni/ /'gags pa lta bur gso bar bya/ /nye ba'i sen mo sbyang ba yis/ /tsha ba bsal te mtshon gyis gso/ /sen mo ngan la'ang de bzhin bya/ /rkang pa'i chu ser dag la yang/ /'bras bu skyur po nag tshur bcas/ /til dang 'gi wang
305b5(mdo 'grel): nimpa yi/ /lo ma'i lde gus bsku bar bya/ /rme ba mdzer ba bcas pa ni/ /me shel thal sman dag ges bsreg/ yang na me btsa' gdab par bya/ /de bzhin pags mdzer rgya skyegs nor/ /mtshon gyis bcad de de bzhin gso/ /mtshan ma can sogs
305b6(mdo 'grel): gsum po la/ /nye ba'i phyogs la gat? rag gdab/ /'o ma can shing myu gu shun/ /'o ma btags pas bsku bar bya/ /do shig ardzu na'i shun pa'am/ /brtsod dang sbra rtsir sbyar ba yi/ /lde gu 'am gtar gar dmigs pa ni/ /bsregs pa'i
305b7(mdo 'grel): snag tsha mar sbyar ba sku/ /tsan dan dmar po btsod dang ni/ /ru rta seng phrom pri yaM ku/ /sra chung n+ya gro d+ha myu gu/ /lde gus do shig sel byed cing/ /bzhin mdangs gsal bar byed pa yin/ /zir gnyis dang til nag dang/ /yungs kar 'o
306a1(mdo 'grel): mar bcas pa ni/ /btags pa'i lde gus gdod bskus na/ ngo shig sel zhing zla 'drar byed/ /sran chung phub ma med brdos la/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi mar btags bsku/ /tsher ma rno ba'i shalma li/ /'o mar btags nas bskus
306a2(mdo 'grel): na phan/ /rgya shug tshig gu bu ram bcas/ /sbrang rtsi ri bong khrag sbyar sku/ /ru rta kha lung khu ba yi/ /nang spangs sbrang rtsir bcas ba 'am/ /rkang mar rtsa bar ra'i 'o ma/ /sbrang rtsir bcas ba'i lde guAng phan/ /rkang mar rtsa bab?

306a4(mdo 'grel): tsan dan ser po bre yaM ku/ /rgya shug tshig gu'i lde gu yis/ /gdod ni bskus shing dril gyur na/ /pad+ma'i mdog dang 'dra bar byed/ /sman ni 'di dag btags pa dang/ /shing mngar dang bcas bskol snum ni/ /nang gzhi dzi bzhin ma
306a5(mdo 'grel): ma lus la/ /btung dang bsku ba la sogs bya/ /nas dang seng phrom sbrang rtsi pog/ spra tshil sbrang rtsi pu tse shel/ /mar dang bu ram ba gcin ni/ /gzar bur chags kyi bar du bskol/ /de bskus pa yi sme ba dang/ /do shig mdzer?
306a6(mdo 'grel): ba myur sel byed/ /gdod ni pad+ma 'drar byed cing/ /rkang pa bad 'dab 'drar byed cing/ gur gum shing mngar pu shel tse/ /tsan dan ser dang rgya skyegs dang/ /tsan dan dkar dang n+ya go d+ha'i/ /rkang pa gzhon nu shug pa dang/
306a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin pad+ma ge ser dang/ utpal sngon po bcod dang bcas/ /srang re chu bre bzhi nad du/ /bskol te bzhi cha lus pa ru/ /rgya skyegs btsod dang leb brgan ci/ /shing mngar gur gum zho gnyis gnyis/ phye ma til mar srang
306b1(mdo 'grel): brgyad dang/ de yi nyis 'gyur 'om bskol/ /de ni sna sman tshul bsten na/ /sme ba do shig skra dkar dang/ /gnyer ma gdong gi dri ma sel/ /gdong gi sha rgyas mdog ser byed/ /gtsed dang ser phrom shar ri/ /rgya skyegs ldong ros du ba ri/ /gur gum ru rta
306b2(mdo 'grel): ser po gnyis/ /'gi wa? tsan dan rnam gnyis dang/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma dang/ /dngul chu rma shing tsan dan ser/ /d+ha d+hu ra yi shu nu pad+ma'i/ /sa bon pad+ma ge sar dang/ /pra tsha li sbang ma shug pa sogs/ /zhag dang 'o ma rkang dang mar/ /lo ma can shing 'o ma ni

306b6(mdo 'grel): rga ba'i mthar ni dug can sogs/ /chus rig pa'am ma bkrus dang/ /bskyed pa'i bsam pas sman rnon po/ /lde gu la sogs bskus pa dang/ /khu tshur mo dang sen mo dang/ /bra ma dug can gyis reg na/ /shugs dgag pa dang yun ring du//
306b7(mdo 'grel): reg pa rtsub pas bdar ba 'am/ /nad gzhi 'khrugs pa gsang bar zhugs/ /sos 'dzin lta bu la sogs nad/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sos 'dzin lta bu 'dir lnga ste/ /nad gzhi re re khrag las gyur/ /'dus pa'i nang

307a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de las khrag gyur 'tsho ba tsam/ /'dus pa las gyur 'chi bar byed/ /nang 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gnas/ /sha khrag las ni pho mtshan gyi/ /phyi 'am yang na nang du ni/ /mdzer ba g.ya' bar byed pa 'byung/ /khrag ni spyin
307a4(mdo 'grel): pag 'dzag pa yin/ /mo mtshan de ltar gdugs ltar 'dug/ de ni 'brum nas ma gsos ni/ /pho mo'i khu khrag nyams byed gsod/ /pho mtshan gyi ni phyi 'am nang/ /bad kan khrag gyur 'brum phran ni/ /tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar
307a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra/ /stung po'i yungs kar zhes byar bshad/ /bad kan khrag gyur 'brum bu ni/ /ring zhing mang por gyur pa la/ /dbus nas gas pa gang yin pa/ /de ni nges par 'joms zhes bya/ /nang gzhi ? spu rtse bar byed/ /khrag mkhris?
307a6(mdo 'grel): las gyur 'dzam bu yi/ /rus pa ltar 'dug khong stong can/ /'bras byer gcin snyi 'drar shes bya/ /khrag mkhris las gyur 'brum phran ni/ /ma sha mung+ga 'dra mchog yin/ /pad+ma'i steng du ge sar bzhin/ /'brum bur 'brum
307a7(mdo 'grel): phran gyis khyab pa/ /de ni pad+ma can zhes bya/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rab mnyes pa/ /de ni mnyes pa'i 'brum bur 'gyur/ /mtshan ni mnyes bar gyur pa las/ /rlung 'khrugs gyur pa mnyes pa yin no/ /mi mnyam sa zhing yin pa ni/ /rlung ?
307b1(mdo 'grel): gyur ba rtun shing yin/ /rlung gis mnyes pa la sogs pa'i/ /nang 'khrugs mtshan gyi pags pa ni/ /ldog cing tsha la na bcas shing/ /la la shu ba dag tu 'gyur/ /'dus shing mdud pa chags pa ni/ /de ni nor bu mthur du 'phyar/ /pags pa ldog pa'i nang cas bya
307b2(mdo 'grel): bad kan bcas la g.yang zhing sra/ /rma 'tsho ba rkang shing pags pags/ /gas pa'i nad ces bya bar bshad/ /rlung gis pags la/ gnod 'gyur zhing/ /nor bu 'byar zhing gcin dgags 'gyur/ /
307b3(mdo 'grel): de las rgyun phran nang med 'byung/ /nor bu'i kha ni rags?  gyur pas/ /de ni nor bu'i nang ces bya/ /bad kan las gyur mtshan gyi nang/ /gra mas gang snyam mdud ba'i nang/ /gra mas gnod pa'i khrag gi nang/ /tshor ba nyams pa de ming can/ /rlung dang khrag
307b4(mdo 'grel): mkhris las gyur pa/ /bu ga'i rtse mos 'phra ba yis/ /mtshan gyi nar ni kun tu khyab/ /de ni kha brgya ba zhes bya/ /khrag mkhris las gyur pags pa brnags tsha zhing rims bcas pags pa smin/ /'dus pa las gyur sha gnag cing/ /thams
307b5(mdo 'grel): cad na bas smin pa yin/ /'brum bu gnag cing dmar ba yis/ /'brum nag gis ni gnod 'gyur zhing/ /pha mtshan shin tu na ba gang/ /de ni khrag gi 'brum bu yin/ /sha yi mdzer ba lngar bshad do/ /khong 'bras nang gzhi gsum las skyes//
307b6(mdo 'grel): 'dus pas mtshan nyid brnags 'gyur zhing/ /sha ni nag por gyur ba dang/ /kun? nas zhigs par byed pa gang/ /de ni til nag ces ldod? bshad/ sha las gyur ba'i 'bru bu ba rnams/ /? 'bras til nag cos bya ba/ /bzhi pos?
307b7(mdo 'grel): 'di dag spang bar bya/ /lhag ma rnams ni myur du gso/ /kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang/ /mal ston ma gder gnas pa dang/ /nyal po bsten ni drags pa dang/ /nang ni nang khrag sman gnod dang/ /sa bon nyes pa rnam smin las/ /mngal gyi
308a1(mdo 'grel): nyes ba nyaM shur 'gyur/ /rlung gi mngal la gnod 'gyur pas/ /na zug yangs shing tshor ba med/ /grog mas khyab ba snyam du sems/ /sra zhing rtsub pa sgra dang bcas/ /zla mtshan sla zhing lbu ba can/ /nyung zhing gnag pa 'jig
308a2(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /chu so rtsib logs lhod pa dang/ /na zhad? rim gyis skran bskyed la/ /gzhan yang nyes pa de dang de/ /de ni rlung can yin zhes bshad/ /de nyid shas cher spyad na skrangs/ /bcas pa nyal po drags zhes bya/ /shin tu gzhol la
308a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrig spyad pa/ /rgyab dang chu so byin bar ni/ /na zhing mdul la gnod byed ba/ /de ni spyad sngas pa zhes bya/ /shugs 'khyil ba yi mngal du ma/ /rlung gis gnod bar 'gyur ba la/ /zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung ba/ /'khyil ba lta bur snang
308a4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /nad 'od 'khyil ba can zhes bshad/ /gang tshe rlung gi rtsub pos bu/ /skye zhing skye zhing gsor byed ba/ /bskred nas gsod ba zhes byar bshad/ /'drangs drags mi mnyam gnas bar ni/ /'dod la spyad pas rlung 'khrugs

308a7(mdo 'grel): gam ni zhag bdun nas/ /rlung gi mngal gnas khu ba 'byin/ /nad bcas pa dang nad med pa/ /de ni khu ba smon zhes bya/ /bud med mngal dang sa bon gyis/ /nyes pa rlung gi ? 'gyur zhing/ /'khrig par mi dga' nu ma med/ /mi nang yin te
308b1(mdo 'grel): gsor mi bus/ /mngal gyi nang du rlung gis ni/ /gnod 'gyur mo mtshan khar gnas pas/ /bye ba 'am lhod par gyur ba dang/ /rlung can bzhin du na gyur ba/ shin mtho bar gyur ba ste/ /mo mtshan che nad tshabs zhes bya/ /mkhris pa mngal na gnas pa ni/ /nang gi nang

308b5(mdo 'grel): thag reg mi bzod/ /zla mtshan sngo dang ser po 'byung/ /chu so lto ni lci ba dang/ /'khru zhing yig 'chus par byed/ /chu so brla ni na zhing zug/ rims bskyed yongs rgyas nad ces bya/ /rlung dang bad kan nad kyis khyab/ /mngal nas

308b7(mdo 'grel): byed de/ /mngal du lhag par skyed bar byed/ /de ni pad+ma'i snying po yin/ /nad gzhi gsum ni mo mtshan gyi/ /mngal gnas rang rang gnod pa bskyed/ /'dus ba las gyur nyes pa yin/ /de ltar bud med mngal nad kyis/ /khu ba 'dzin bar? mi byed

309a2(mdo 'grel): sum cu gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nang gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /sos 'dzin 'dra ba gsar byung la/ /pho? mtshan dbus nas gtar ? gang ba/ /bsil ba? lags pas spyad par byang? khyad dang du ni bkru?
309a3(mdo 'grel): sman btang/ /smin na til gyi lde gu ni/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa bsku/ /'dzam bu a mra klu shing dang/ /ni ma dkar po dzra'i myu gu/ rgya shug bi lda sa la ki/ rgya skyegs til ti ni sha'i shun/ /'o ma can gyi shing gi shun?/ 'bras bu
309a4(mdo 'grel): gsum ni chur bskol ba'i/ /khu ba des ni bkru ba dang/ /de bskol til mar gyis rma 'tsho ba/ /spang ma sed? phrom btsag yug snam/ /sug smel ldod ros bsla dang/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha skyer khaN+Da/ /rgyam tsha ha ? nu ka ya
309a5(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /sos 'dzin lta bu'i rma 'tsho ba byed/ /kham phor sbyar mas 'bras bu gsum/ /bsregs pa mar sbyar ma 'tsho ba byed/ /de ni spyi yi gso ba yin/ /re re'i skrangs pa lta bur gso/ /sman pas spyi nas
309a6(mdo 'grel): zhu nags ba yi/ /mi 'gyur de ltar 'bad par bya/ /brnags na rgyus pa sha dang rtsa/ /zhigs pas pho mtshan ma rungs 'gyur/ /'brum ba bcad dang bsegs ba yis/ /gso ba sos 'dzin lta bus gso/ /blud na yungs gar?
309a7(mdo 'grel): phye zhib dang/ /bskol sman phye mar gdab bar bya/ /til mar de nyid kyis bsku zhing/ /rma 'tsho ba pa yi gso ba bya/ /nyes pa gso ba 'di nyid bya/ /de nyid gnyi gar ga rtang ga gdab/ /khong stong la ni gtang ga bya/ /brnaD
309b1(mdo 'grel): lam naM dag bar bya/ /til tu ka dang 'bras bu gsum/ /sed phro ma lnga gu til mar byas/ /'bras byed la ni gtar ga gdab/ /gso ba'i rim pa 'di nyid bya/ /mchog ces bya ba'i 'brum bu ni/ /brtol te lcags kyus blungs te bcad/ /lde gu phye mar
309b2(mdo 'grel): sman khu ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pas gso bor bya/ /mnyes dang pad+ma can la ni/ /mkhris pa'i mo dpal gso bar bya/ /pags smin tshor ba med ba la'ang/ /pho mo'i gso ba 'di nyid bya/ /mnyes pa dugs ni bya ba dang/ /ba bla'i sman mar ?
309b3(mdo 'grel): 'jam blugs/ /mngar ba'i sman sbyar dkri dugs bya/ /rtun shing 'bral gtar ga gdab/ /bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso/ /pags pa ldog la mar gyis bsku/ /e wa la sogs snum 'gyur bas/ /zhag gsum 'am ni zhag lnga du/ /dkri
309b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i dugs ni spyad bar bya/ /dugs bya de yi 'og tu ni/ /snum gyur pags pa drang par bya/ /nor bu rim kyis btsir nas ni/ /chud nas nye ba rang kri bar bya/ /nor bu yang yang snum 'chos bya/ /kha zas snum can sbyin ba'ang phan/ /gas
309b5(mdo 'grel): pa la'ang cho ga yi/ /rim pa ji bzhin byas pa phan/ /'gags bas spu gu kha gnyis pa/ /rgya skyegs kyi ni dkris pa la/ /snum bsku bu gang bcug nas ni/ /rlung 'joms snum ni blugs par bya/ /sbu gu zhag ni gsum gsum nas/ /legs
309b6(mdo 'grel): par bsked de yangs par bya/ /spu gu'i sbyor bas ma grub na/ /mkhas pas 'doms kyi srubs can ni/ /bor te mtshon gyis bral nas kyang/ /de 'og rma ser chog byas/ /rmon bu spu gu'i dugs byas la/ /snum zhing dro bas dkro bar bya//
309b7(mdo 'grel): kha ba rgya ba ni bzhar nas kyang/ /ska ba sbrad rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ /phrag gi 'brum bu khrag gi ni/ /khong 'bras bzhin du gso bar bya/ /kun la rma yi gso ba ni/ /gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mngal gyi nad la mang du ni/ /snum
310a1(mdo 'grel): 'chos dugs dang mas btang sogs/ /rlung 'dzoms pa yi gso ba bsngags/ /rlung las gyur ba mchog tu sbyar/ /bud med kyi ni mngal gyi nad/ /rlung ma gtogs bar 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bas rlung ni bsal byas/ /nad gzhan gyi
310a2(mdo 'grel): ni gso sman bya/ /ba bla'i til mar blud bya zhing/ /'dren ma skye de'i 'o ma blud/ /snum 'chos dugs ni byas te mngal/ /nyis pa gnas pa mnyam du bzhag/ yon po lag pas drang por srad/ /zhum pa slar ni gzhug bya zhing/ /gyes pa yongs su
310a3(mdo 'grel): bzlog bar bya/ /mngal ni gnas nas g.yos gyur ba/ /bud med zug rdur gyur par 'dod/ /bud med la ni slon sman sogs/ /'jom po yongs su sbyar bar bya/ /rnam pa kun tu dag gyur nas/ /'jam rtsi bsku byug sman khu blug/ byug dang
310a4(mdo 'grel): ye'u gzhug la sogs/ /gso ba'i las ni lhag ma sbyar/ /rgun 'brum tang pa la 'bras bu gsum/ /ka sa mar dang ser po gnyis/ /sle tres nye shing sherya ka/ shu ka na sa sbu ba/ /ba ru sha ka zho gnyis gnyis/ /mar ni bre
310a5(mdo 'grel): gang bcas par bskol/ /de blud mngal gyi rlung nad dang/ /bu skyed byed ba'i mchog yin no/ /zi ra go snyod pi pi ling/ /shu dag rgyam tsha ba sha ka/ nas tshig khrus thal ti mu sa/ /tsi tra ka dang kha rar bcas/ /btags te chang
310a6(mdo 'grel): gi dangs mar sbyar/ /mar brdas de ni byin gyur na/ /mngal nad rtsib logs snying nad dang/ /skrangs dang gzhad 'brum sel bar byed/ /ba lung ba sha ka'i rtsa ba/ /zi ra nag po go snyod dang/ /sen rtsi rgyam tsha'i phye ma ni/
310a7(mdo 'grel): chad dang sbyar te blud par bya/ /ra sna gze ma ba sha ka/ bskol ba gzer 'joms mchog yin no/ /sle tres danda 'bras bu gsum/ /bskol ba'i khu ba'ang blug par bya/ /rgya spos saN+Da kA ri dang/ /ru rnga rgyam tsha
310b1(mdo 'grel): thad shing rnams/ /bskol ba'i khu ba til mar bskol/ /spangs ba'i ye'us mngal nas sol/ /mngal nad mkhris pa las gyur ba/ /chu blug bsku byug ye'u yis/ /gso ba bsil zhing mkhris 'joms pa/ /snum 'chos don du mar gyis bya/ /nyer
310b2(mdo 'grel): shing rtsa ba srad bzhi brgya/ /brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba dang/ /'o ma de mnyam mar de ni/ /bzhi yi nang du bskol bar bya/ /'tsho byed sde tshan nyer shing dang/ /ba ru sha ka rkun 'brum dang/ /bi la ya dang ba bla gnyis/ /shing mngar zho ni
310b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis gnyis phye/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang/ /pi pi ling ni srad brgyad brgyad/ /ka ra dkar po srang bcu gzhug/ de las srad ni phyed phyed sbyin/ /mngal khrag khu ba'i nad sel zhing/ /ro tsa bu skyed byed mchog yin/ /glo
310b4(mdo 'grel): rdol zad byed khrag mkhris dang/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang/ /mig ser rlung dang khrag dang ni/ /me dpal dang ni snying nad dang/ /rjed byed kyis nyen da rgan dang/ /myos dang skem byed 'joms par byed/ /de bzhin 'o ma zhun
310b5(mdo 'grel): mar dang/ /'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba ni/ /bu bskyed mkhris pa las gyur ba'i/ /mngal nad sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /ba bla bre ni sum cu gnyis/ /bskol ba til mar mar bre bzhi/ /'o ma bzhi 'gyur pi pi ling/ /ka ka na si ka ra
310b6(mdo 'grel): dkar/ /dzi baM tI dang ram nye ba/ /sti ra nye shing zi ra gnyis/ /mon sran dri'u ba yas sa/ /mA Sha partsi sra ba ni/ /bi lu'i lo ma lhan cig bskol/ /blud na rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i/ /mngal nad sel zhir bu skyed byed/ /khrag gi
310b7(mdo 'grel): mngal nad khrag mdog las/ /rjes su 'brel pa brtags nas kyang/ /nad bzhi pa sags pa'i tshul las ni/ /khrag bcas pa yi sman btang bya/ /shing mngar sbrad rtsi chu shing rtsa/ /ta la'i sa bon sskyer ba'i rtsa/ /pri yaM ku dang
311a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bkrus chu/ /sbyar ba blud na khrag 'dzag pa/ /mdog skya dmar po sel bar byed/ /ba ta 'dzam bu a mri ta/ /tshig khu dang ni brag zhun dang/ /skyer ba khaN+Da aM baM shta/ /btsod dad shalma mma li'i thang chu/ /dug mo
311a2(mdo 'grel): nyung gi shun pags dang/ /gur gum bi wa bong nga dkar/ /seng phrom bla sgang btsag yug snam/ /shing mngar tsan dan dmar po dang/ /katpal dang tsa mi ka/ ka to ga dang dug mo nyung/ /byi tsher ba dang da da ki/ ma du ka dang stang
311a3(mdo 'grel): zil ni/ /skar ma rgyal la bab pa na/ /btus shing btags pa sbrang rtsi dang/ /'bras kyi chu sbyir blud na ni/ /gzhang 'brum tshad par 'khrub dang/ /gang yang khrag tu 'khru ba dang/ /gang yang srin bu'i nang rnams dang/ /byis
311a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad gang yin pa 'joms/ /mngal ni nad dang zla mtshan nad/ /gnag cing dkar dang dmar ba sel/ /phye ma rgyal gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /phan zhes rgyun shes bu yis bsngags/ /bad kan las gyur mngal nad la/ /rtsub dang dro ba'i
311a5(mdo 'grel): sman kun sbyar/ /skyu ru ra'i lo dang ki/ shing mngar utpal lig bu mig/ /'dzam bu a mra tshig gu dang/ /seng phroms nag katpa la/ /se'u 'bru shing tsha tin+tu ka/ /u dum+ba ra bi lba gzhon/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i
311a6(mdo 'grel): phye/ /reg cin 'o ma nyis 'gyur dang/ /til mar bre gang bskol bar bya/ /de bskus pa dang 'jam rtsi dang/ /ras bal ye'us gzhug bar bya/ /skrangs shing phyir ldog mtho zhing sra/ /de bzhin sbyin bag 'dzag pa dang/
311a7(mdo 'grel): phyir 'bur nang du zhum pa dang/ /'brum bu gzer dang bcas la phan/ /nas zan a ru ra'i sbyar chad/ /bu ram chad dang til mar bsten/ /pi pi ling dang lcags phye dang/ /a ru ra sbyor sbrang rtsi phan/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras
311b1(mdo 'grel): bu gsum/ /a mra 'dzam bu'i tshig gu bcas/ /da da ki phye sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /sbyin bag 'dzag pa dag par byed/ /rgya skyegs 'dzam bu da da ki/ so ma ra dza la mang gi/ sra rtsi bog gi phye ma yis/ /dri mi zhim dang sbyin bag 'dzag/ brnags
311b2(mdo 'grel): shing sra ba sel bar byed/ /dong gal sogs sde tshan ni/ /bskol ba'i khu ba blug bar bya/ /sra zhing rtsub par gyur ba la/ /mnyen ba'i cho ga bya ba dang/ /sha brdungs pa yi glan pa dang/ /kri sa ra dang 'o thug gzhug/ dri nga til mar dri zhim
311b3(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ /lde gu dri zhim bsku ba'am/ /dri zangs kun gyi phye ma 'am/ /rul ba'i dri ni sel byed gzhug/ bad kan can la phal cher sman/ /tsha ba ba gcin mas btang phan/ /mkhris pa shing mngar 'o mar bcas/ /rlung 'gyur skyur bcas
311b4(mdo 'grel): til mar phan/ /'dus pa las gyur nad la ni/ /thun mong gis ni gso ba phan/ /de ltar mngal ni dag gyur na/ /sa bon skyon med tha mal bar/ /rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na/ /bud med la ni bu chags 'gyur/ /skyes pa yi ni
311b5(mdo 'grel): dbang po yang/ /las rnams lnga yis dag bya zhing/ /mdog las nad gzhi brtags nas ni/ /nad bcas de 'joms sman gyi gso/ /ru rta rgya skyes shing mngar btsod/ /'bras bu gsum dang ka ra dkar/ /shing mngar me da ser po gnyis//
311b6(mdo 'grel): la la phung dang bu tse shel/ /shing kun ram nye ba ya sya/ /a shwa gand+ha nye'u shing ba/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye/ /mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni/ /bzhi 'gyur bcas pa bskol bar bya/ /blud na mngal dang khu ba yi/ /nyes pa thams
311b7(mdo 'grel): cad sel byed cing/ /tshe ring lus ni rgyas byed la/ /yid gzhungs pa dang bkra shis dang/ bu skyed par ni byed mchog yin/ /'bras bu'i sman mar zhes byar bshad/ /zla mtshan rgyu med thungs gyur na/ /bu ni 'chi bar byed pa yang/ /'tsho zhing
312a1(mdo 'grel): ? ma rnams bsngags/ /'di ni mchog tu byis pa yi/ /lus rgyas gdon 'joms byed pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //yan lag brgyad ba'i
312a2(mdo 'grel): snying po bsdus pa las/ /mtshon gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas dug nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /sngon ni lha dang lha ma yin/ /bdud rtsi 'dod pa bsrubs pa na/ /bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon rol tu/ /skyes bu shin tu 'jiD
312a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i gzugs/ /mche ba bzhi pa gzi brjid 'bar/ /skra ser mig ni me 'bar ba/ /de mthong 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /des ni 'di ni dug ces bya/ /tshangs pa hUM zhes brjod pa dang/ /bslu pa'i bdag nyid can spangs te//
312a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs de rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /gzugs la de ni zhugs bar 'gyur/ /brtan dug nus pa mi bzad par/ /sdong bu la ni gnas pa gang/ /ka la ku ta dbang po'i bu/ /btsan dug ha la ha la sogs/ /rgyu ba'i dug ni mi bzang 'gyur/
312a5(mdo 'grel): sprul dang phag dang mtshe ba dang/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /bcos ma ma yin dug tu bshad/ /bcos ma sna tshogs sman las ni/ /sbyar ba sbyar ba'i dug ces bya/ /de ni sbyor ba'i dbang las ni/ /shin tu ring nas gsong pa 'am//
312a6(mdo 'grel): skrangs dang skya rbab rmu rdzing dang/ /smyo byed gzhang 'brum la sogs bskyed/ /rno dro rtsub cing dang ba dang/ /khyab cing myur gsod yang ba dang/ /'dar zhing 'phral la ro mi gsal/ /'ju bar mi byed pa yi ni/ /rno sogs yon tan dang

314a1(mdo 'grel): bskrangs shing brnags pa dang/ /sha yang nag por gyur nas ni/ /brnags shing shin du 'drul bar byed/ /sbyin bag can du 'dzag par byed/ /gnad du phog par ma gyur pa/ /myur du snying la phan byed bya/ /zug rdu phyung la lcags bsregs

314a3(mdo 'grel): sos btab gso bdag/ ci rigs par ni de la bya/ /rma yi sha ni brnags pa la/ /mkhris ba'i me dpal lta bur gso/ /bde phyir khyod la bu med dang/ /rgyal po la ni dgras bslabs te/ /zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres ba'i/ /nyen 'khor skye bo steng/
314a4(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs lus kyi dri mar bcas/ /mi mthun sman dang thal ba dang/ /nus pa chung bar 'gyur ba'i dug/ sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ma yin/ /des nyen mdog skya ring ba dang/ /me dro nyams shing lung pa dang/ /dbugs mi bde dang rims kyi
