314a7(mdo 'grel): mig sna rna ba med pa dang/ /de yis dbang po nyams par mthong/ /'di dang gzhan la gnod pa yi/ bla gnyan mi bzad mang po gtses/ /'ga' zhig 'phral du ma gsos na/ /sbyar dug gis nyen 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyib chus slon byas kha zaS
314b1(mdo 'grel): nid de la phan pa'i bza' btung sbyin/ /sbyangs nas gser ni bsten bya zhing/ /mdo gnas bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /gser dang bzangs kyi phye ma ni/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra dkar por sbyar/ /lde gus dug ni mi bzod pa/ /dbyig dug thams cad sel bar byed//
314b2(mdo 'grel): mu rba sle tres? pi pi ling/ /rgya spos dbyi mong pa to la/ /gla sgang shu thag tsi tra ka/ bi da ka ni dar ba dang/ /chu dron zho kha chu sbyar ba/ /skyur khu dang sbyar blud na ni/ /dbyig dug gis bcom me drod sbyong/ /zur ba ma nu phug ron gyi/ /sha bskol khu ba
314b3(mdo 'grel): bsgrangs pa yis/ /dbyig dug skom dang lud pa na/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde rims sel/ /dus kyi rang bzhin dus dang zas/ /nad gzhi lus zungs tshogs 'dus pa/ /dug gi nyam da zhes bshad de/ /bkres skom nyams ni chung ba dang
314b4(mdo 'grel): khro dang mya ngan 'jigs dang ngal/ /ma zhu ba dang 'khru ba dang/ /mkhris pa rlung ni 'phel ba dang/ /til gyi me tog 'bras bu snum/ /sa yi rlangs pa 'brug sgra dang/ /gling bu pi wa rol mo yi/ /sgra dang mdun gyi ser bu dang/ /utpal
314b5(mdo 'grel): dri dang myos pa yis/ /dug gi nyam nga 'phel bar byed/ /dbyar ni char gyi dus yin pas/ /bu ram lta bur rlan can 'gyur/ /lus la khyab byed dbyar 'das nas/ /ri yi 'char bas de med byed/ /de bas sprin bral dus su ni/ /nus pa
314b6(mdo 'grel): chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin goms pa dang/ /gnas dus shugs stobs che chung ba/ /brtags te mkhas pas shes byas la/ /de rjes gso ba'i las spyad bya/ /bad kan can gyi slon dang de/ /rtsub dang rno ba'i
314b7(mdo 'grel): sman bsku zhing/ /bska dang ? tshab yi/ /zas kyi dug ni bsal bar bya/ /mkhris can bku sman sman chu blugs/ /shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku zhing/ /bska dang kha dang mdar ba dang/ /mar bcas kha zas sbyin pas gso/ /rlung gi bdag
315a1(mdo 'grel): nyin can mngar dang/ /skyur dang lan tshwa mar bcas ba'i/ /bza' ba mar can bsku byug dang/ /de bzhin sha ni bza' bas gso/ /bkru sman bsku byug kha zas sman/ /mar me bsngags ba ma yin no/ /kun tu gnas skabs
315a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad du/ /dug 'joms mar dang 'dra ba yi/ /sman ni gzhan dag yod min te/ /mchog tu rlung shas che la phan/ /bad kan gnas zhugs gso bar sla/ /mkhris ba'i gnas brten 'bad pas gso/ /rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug//
315a3(mdo 'grel): shin tu gso dga' gsor mi rung/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas sprul gyis zin pa bshad par bya'o/ /mdor nas steng na ni sbrul/ /gsum
315a4(mdo 'grel): ste gdengs gcan lus 'khyil/ /khro bo yin te de yi ni/ /dbye ba mdza' yas myur ba dag/ skye gnas dbye ba rgyas par ni/ /dgos ba med phyir ma bshad do/ /mchog tu rtsub dang tsha ba dang/ /skyur dro mngar bsil dag las ni/ /gdangs ka
315a5(mdo 'grel): can la sogs pa'i dug/ rim gyis rlung sogs 'khrugs par byed/ /gzhon dang rgad po bar ma dang/ /dbyar dang dgun dang sos kar ni/ /'di dag dug ni 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /gzhan dag dus tshigs rnams su 'gyur/ /'khor lo/
315a6(mdo 'grel): gzhol dang g.yung drung gdugs/ /lcags kyu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /gdengs ka can ni myur 'gro ba/ /thams cad gdengs ka can zhes bya/ /lus 'khyil sna tshogs pa yi ni/ /zlum po 'dug pa lus 'khyil yin/ /ring zhing
315a7(mdo 'grel): 'gros ni bul ba yin/ /ri mo sna tshogs ldan pa dang/ /snum zhing kha dog sna tshogs bas/ /mchu zheng bris 'gyur khra bo yin/ /go ta'i bu ni go ta can/ /dug ni gdengs ka can nyams la/ /chad bzhi yi sprul gzhan ni/ /'di
315b1(mdo 'grel): dag nyams ni 'dres pa las/ /'dren ma'i mtshan nyid can te des?/ /'dus pa'i nad ni ldang bar byed/ /zas kyi don dang 'jigs pa dang/ /rkang bas reg pas ? ba 'khrug/ rkang gis rgyu dang 'gras pa dang/ /lha dang drang srong shin rjes bskul/ /sprul gyis
315b2(mdo 'grel): zin bar gang bshad pa/ /phyi ma bzhin du dug shas che/ /'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes byas nas/ /gso ba ji bzhin bya ba yin/ /phal pa sdig can dang tshul bas/ /lam bkag nas ni gnas pa yin/ /gang du kha chug sher ba tsam//
315b3(mdo 'grel): /lus la snang bar byed 'gyur gyi/ /mche ba'i rma ni mi mngon gang/ /de ni mchun gnon byed ces bya/ /mche ba gcig la rjes gnyis mngon/ /khrag med gyur ba blngags shes bya/ /mche ba'i rjes ni khrag bcas gnyis/ /rnam par
315b4(mdo 'grel): gcad pa'o de gsum ni/ /sha chad shin du bug pa dang/ /khrag 'byung po yis zin zhes bya/ /mche ba'i rjes ni bzhi snang ba/ /de bzhin sos 'dzin bcing bar bshad de las dug med dang po gnyis/ /phyi ma gnyis po gsor mi rung/ /sprul gyi dug ni
315b5(mdo 'grel): khrag dag la/ /ma brten lus la gnod mi byed/ /khrag ni cung zad la brten yang/ /til mar thig pa bzhin du mched/ /sngar ma sprul gyis reg pa las/ /'jigs par rlung ni 'khrug par byed/ /lan 'ga' snyangs bar byed pa des/ /sprul gyi lus kyis
315b6(mdo 'grel): bcom zhes bya/ /bgrod dkar mun bas zug gyur pas/ /la la rtogs pas zin pa dang/ /dug gi shug dang slon dang rims/ /brgyal ba 'am mtsha ba skye ba 'am/ /na zhing rmongs bag 'khru bar byed/ /de ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya/ /dug bcas nad kyis i 
315b7(mdo 'grel): zug pa dang/ /skrangs dang g.ya' dang rims bcas pa/ /la la tsha zhing rmen bur bcas/ /de las bzlog ba dug med yin/ /gdengs ka can shugs dang po la/ /nad khrag nag po 'dzag par 'gyur/ /mig dang gdong sogs gnag pa dang//
316a1(mdo 'grel): srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems/ /shugs gnyis par ni rmen bu skye/ /gsum par mgo ni lci bar 'gyur/ /bzhi pa mig 'byed dka' ba dang/ /sos btab brnags shing mchi la ma slon/ /lnga pa tshigs 'byed sam sems dang/ /rgyud gzhan
316a2(mdo 'grel): tshigs ni 'jig pa dang/ lus tsha skyigs bu 'byung ba yin/ /sdug par snying na lus lci zhing/ /brgyal zhing 'khrul zas mi 'ju/ /bdun bar khu ba'i gnas phyin nas/ /phrag gong rgya ba dang rgal tshigs dang/ /rked ba zhig pa snyam sems shing/

316a5(mdo 'grel): lus ni lci bar 'gyur/ /gsum pas sos btab brnags pa dang/ /mig dang kha sna las 'dzag 'gyur/ /bzhi pa mgo lci gnye'u nges 'gyur/ /lnga par lus tshigs na ba dang/ /grad pa'i rims kyis 'debs par byed/ /lhag ma
316a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis po lnga bar mtshungs/ shugs ni lnga par gso ba dag/ bya yi de las phan chad min/ /chu yas ga yengs dang chags pas zad/ /skrag dang de les pham ba dang/ /grangs lhags nyi tshan rlung dang nad/ /bkres skom ngal

316b6(mdo 'grel): rgya'i bar du gnas nas ni/ /lus zungs khrag sogs la gnod cing/ /lus la khyab par byed pa yin/ /dus 'di bang du 'dug pa yi/ /mche bas zin pa bcang sogs las/ /bya zhing ci nas lus la ni/ /
316b7(mdo 'grel): /dug gi yal ga ma 'phros bya/ /zin pa'i mod las myur du ni/ /sbrul ni de nyid za ba 'am/ /sa 'am bod ba gcod byed na/ /rings par gyur na sman pa yis/ /mchil mas byug par bya
317a1(mdo 'grel): ba'am/ rnabs kyis ni so rjes bsku/ /mche bas btab pa'i gong du ni/ /sor bzhi ras ma las byas pa/ /gso ma 'am 'od ma la sogs ba cing/ /sngags shes pa yis grub sngags bzlas/ /chu lon gyis ni chu

317b2(mdo 'grel): 'gags byed pas/ /snying gar pad kan sogs par bye/ /lus lci nad ni slangs pa dang/ /snying 'phar de ni slon du gzhug/ gsher rdzas skyur rtsabs rgya sran dang/ /til dad chad sogs ma gtogs pa/ /dug sel ba yi slon sman btang/ /des ni

317b5(mdo 'grel): sbyar blud/ /gdengs ka can dang ri mo can/ /mi bzang dug gi zin pa la/ /ti du li ya ti bal dang/ /ki ri karni rnam gnyis dang/ /kha lung khar se'u ni/ /btung dang sna sman mig sman bya/ /e sha gand+ha rgun 'brum dang/ /ke ri karni sa bar
317b6(mdo 'grel): nag dang/ ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/ /bye rug pa yi lo ma dang/ /bilba se 'bru ka pi ta/ /cha ni phyed phyed sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /dug sman yin te khyad par du/ /lus dkyil sbrul gyi dug la phan/ /lo ma lnga dang 'bras bu gsum/ /shing mngar nA ga pushpa
317b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ ye la bi du dzi ba ka/ zangs rtsi ba dang bu shel rtse/ /khar shug pa utpal/ /sbrang rtsi dang sbyar kha ba can/ /zhes bya lus 'khyil dug 'joms so/ /bskus na skrangs sa dang shu ba mched/ /'brum bu lus dang lus lce sel/ /taM ba'i n+ya gro
318a1(mdo 'grel): d+ha'i myu gu/ /ji ba ka dang zangs rtsi ba/ /khar dkar po shing ma dang btsos/ /khu ba lus dkyil dug la blud/ /'o ma'i shun la sa bon dang/ /bca' sga pa to la'i sa bon/ /shing sha'i sa bon pu tso shel/ /'bras kyis rtsa ba bong ba dkar

319b1(mdo 'grel): rab na gnag/ gas pa snyam du sems shing thug/ de ni ba lci sogs rul dang/ /dug gis phog so rul ba dang/ /sbrul rus pa las skyes pa ni/ /dug tsha bas chung dang 'bring dang che/ /tshabs chud ser zhing dkar dang gnag/ rtsub dang khra zhing gzi mdog can spu dang

319b3(mdo 'grel): dam gnag/ des ni lce ni skrangs ba dang/ /lus rengs rims kyis nyen pa dang/ /bu ga las ni khrag rnag rlon/ /dbang po'i don ni mi shes shing/ /rdul zhing brgyal la kha skam dang/ /rmongs shing nad kyis nyen pa dang/ /sha ni zhigs par byed

319b5(mdo 'grel): chu grang snyam du sems/ /de nyid rma mo dud kha dang/ /mtshan mo rgyu bas mtshan mo can/ /srin bu rlung mkhris shas tsha zhing/ /rnga mo byi ba bad kan can/ /rnga mo dud pa zhes bya ba/ /phal cher rlung shas che ba yin/ /nad ni gad dang gang
319b6(mdo 'grel): gi ni/ /mtshan ma shas che ba las brtag/ de dad de las gos pa'i sman/ /yon tan mi mthun pa yis gso/ /snying gzer stong rlung gis rengs shing/ /rtsa mi snar zhing rus tshigs na/ /mgo 'khor lus bcing snyam dus pas?
319b7(mdo 'grel): mdog gnang rlung las gyur pa'i dug/ dran nyams dbugs ni tsha par byed/ /snying tsha kha ni khra bro la/ /sha 'gags skrangs par byed pa dang/ /khrag ser ba ni mkhris pa can/ /slon zhing snying na yig 'chus/ /kha chu 'dzag cing
320a1(mdo 'grel): 'cham pas 'debs/ /grang bcas kha ni mngar ba bro/ /bad kan shas che'i du gnad yin/ /'ba' chas rma ni bsku ba dang/ /rlung sel til mar gyis bsku dang/ /sbu gum smin 'bru dugs dang/ /rtas par bya ba'i cho ga'ang phan/
320a2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa can la sman chu blugs/ /shin tu grang ba'i lde gus bsku/ /bad kan la ni bzhar zhing bcad/ /dug dang skyugs sman btang bas gso/ /srin bu rnam pa gsum po la// /gso ba rnams pa gsum pa phan/ /dugs dang bsku
320a3(mdo 'grel): dad sman chu blug/ phal cher dro 'jam btang par bya/ /gzhan du brgyal dad mche ba yis/ /rnag dang 'drul bar byed ma gtogs/ /ma skra yungs kar ser po dang/ /bu ram rnying pa'i du dbas bdug/ dug dang mche ba'i dug kun la
320a4(mdo 'grel): mchog tu phan bar 'gron skyob 'chad/ /dug sel sman ni thams cad dang/ /sbyar ba'i las kyang bya ba yin/ /srin bu sdig pa mi bzang dug/ 'bus zin sbrul gyis zin ltar gso/ /gtan du li ya cha mnyam pa'i/ /dur
320a5(mdo 'grel): byed dang ni zhun mar blud/ /bu yi dug gis gdangs can ltar/ /bskyed par nus pa ma yin no/ 'o ma can shing lde gus bsku/ /spyad byas srin bu'i dug sel byed/ /mu tig lde gus bskus pa 'ang/ /skrangs dang dug dang tsha ba
320a6(mdo 'grel): sel/ /shu dag shing kun bi taM ka/ rgyam tsha ha hi pi pi yod?/ /pa tra por ? tsha ba gsum/ /'gro ba skyong gis ni bshad pa yin/ /yan lag bcu pa'i dug sman ni/ /'gro ba skyod gis ni bshad pa dag/ blud na srin bu'i dug kyang
320a7(mdo 'grel): sel/ sdig pa 'dug gis 'phril zin la/ /'khor los btsar ba'i til mar ma sku/ /sa la par+Ni bskol ba yi/ /dro 'jam yang na gzhan dag blug/ rgyam tsho dang ni bcas pa yi/ /zhun mar yang dang yang du blog/ yang na skyur rtsabs
320b1(mdo 'grel): dro? 'jam mam/ /rgya mtsho 'o ma bcas ba blug/ mar dang brdos pa'i go snyod dang/ /rgyam tshang bcas te dkri bar bya/ /mche bas zin pa dugs byas la/ /zhal zhal btab ste 'bras bu gsum/ /ser po gnyid dang tsha ba gsum/ /shing sha'i me tog
320b2(mdo 'grel): bsku bar bya/ /rgyam tsha kha lung ba gcin skyur/ /byi'u rug pa'i rtse mo btags/ /'ba' cha 'am lci ba dro 'jam tsam/ /bskus na'ang phan bar 'gyur ba yin/ /btung bar zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas/ /yang na 'o mar khar btag/ phug ron rtug pa a
320b3(mdo 'grel): dur/ /rgya spos bca' sga kha lung gi/ khu phang ba sbyar blud pa ni/ /sdig pas zin pa'i sman mchog yin/ /rnga mo'i so ni chu ba la bcas/ /sdig pa'i dug ni 'joms par byed/ /shin kun ba bla ba lung gi/ khu ba dang sbyor lde gu dang/ mag sman ril
320b4(mdo 'grel): bu byas nas ni/ /sdig pa'i dug ni srel mchog yin/ /ba ran+dza da ardzun/ /giri kar nas lun/ /sher sha'i me tog dug mo nyung/ /zho kha chu dad btags bskus na/ /sdig /pa'i dug ni sel bar byed/ /gang zhig rmugs shing rnga ma bla thon/ /bla zhing
320b5(mdo 'grel): mi bzang na 'gyur ba/ /de la yung dang a ru ra/ /bcod dang 'dod pi pi ling/ /bilba gzhon nu na le sham/ /brta ka ? khru bar btags/ /lde gus byugs na phan pa yin/ /sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug kun la/ /zho dang mar ni blung bya zhing/ /gtar ga
320b6(mdo 'grel): gdab cing sna sman dang/ /mig sman gyi dri chog bya/ /dri zhim snub dang/ /rlung 'joms kha zas sbyin par bya/ /dod gra byi ba'i rtug pa dang/ /ba lung khu ba ba bla dang/ /rgyam tsha pu shel sbyar ba i/ /lde gus sbrang ma'i dug myur 'joms ?
320b7(mdo 'grel): pas zin pa'i tha mar ni/ /dug nishas cher langs 'gyur ba'i/ /zin pa'i rmal dug gis bsku/ /u tsi ta ka'i gso ba'ang 'di/ /glang po che i rtug pa de/ /ro ti sha cig le'u chu/ /lde gur byas btags bskus nas ni/ /'di ni sbyar pa'i?/
321a1(mdo 'grel): dug 'joms chog/ shir sha'i sa bon amra? yi/ /'o mas lan gsum bsgos pas ni/ /pi pi ling gi phye mar bsreg/ /dug sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug/ sbrul dang lu ta byi ba yi/ /dug ni sel bar byed pa yin/ /shir sha'i
321a2(mdo 'grel): sa bon ka rany+dza'i sa bon/ /gur gum ru rta ldod ros bcas pa yi/ /dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu sdig pas zin/ /sel bar byed pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs/ /srin bu las ni rab gdug pa/ /ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad/ /gzhan
321a3(mdo 'grel): dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod// //kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes 'brang ba/ /stong phrag yod ces gzhan dag 'chad/ /bla gnyan gzugs ni mang 'gyur na/ /dug can ba ni gcig tu
321a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni/ /shin tu 'dres pas shes par dka' / /gnas kyi nges pa yong min bas/ /de phyir nad las bshad par bya/ /nad gzhi so so'i gsol ba dka' / /'dus pa las gyur gsor mi rung/ /nges

321a6(mdo 'grel): ba lu/ /shin tu g.ya' bar byed pa yin/ rlung 'gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang/ /tshigs na rims kyis 'debs par byed/ /de yi dbye ba nad kyi ni/ /rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya/ /gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing/ /lus pa skyigs bu ma'o/
321a7(mdo 'grel): nad dang/ /'brum phran dka' dang ser dang gnag/ dmar dang skya ba las byung 'gyur/ /'dar dang skyangs la tsha ba dang/ /skom dad long zhing sna 'chus la/ /mchu nag so ni yo ba dang/ /rgyab dang med pa bcom snyam sems/ /'dzam bu'i
321b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu smin 'dra ba'i/ /khrag ni mchus ba ldags rma las 'dzag/ 'dus 'gyur mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing/ ming ni mang por gyur pa yin/ /de dug rnon po bar ma dang/ /dman ba'i dbye bas gsum du 'gyur/ /ma bcos zhag bdun zhag bcu dang
321b2(mdo 'grel): zla ba byed kyi rims kyi gsod/ /ba dang mchu rang thams cad kyang/ /glang shu kor kor por byed cing/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang ser/ /gnag pa 'am 'jam zhing mtho ba dang/ /dbus su gnag pa 'am sngo ba las/ /mdza' ma dra ba lta bus

321b7(mdo 'grel): 'dra 'phal cher ni/ /ba sbu'i bu ga 'dzag par 'gyur/ /nyin zhag bzhi par cher sbrang zhing/ /mgo 'khor lus tsha dbugs mi bde/ /lnga bar dug ldang las gyur pa'i/ /nad ni de dang de dag bskyed/ /drug pa gnad du khyab par byed/ /
322a1(mdo 'grel): bdun ba srog ni 'joms par byed/ /de ltar dug ni rnon po dang/ /bar ma dman pa dbye bar bya/ /de nas nyin zhag nyi shu ni/ /gcig na yong ye zhi bar 'gyur/ /de 'og ba yi zin ba ni/ /mtshon gyis rna ni gdod par bya/ /'dzam bu'i mtshul
322a2(mdo 'grel): sogs pas bsreg/ mkhris pa las gyur bsrag mi bya/ /rtsub cing sbu ni gyes pa dang/ /gnang dang tsig la sogs la gnas/ /zin nas kun tu khyab gyur bar/ /bcad bar mi bya ba sreg mi bya/ /bsreg pa dug sman rgyam tsha dang/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar
322a3(mdo 'grel): bas bsku bar bya /de rjes 'o ma can shing bskal/ /sman khu shin tu bsil mo blugs/ /sngabs rwa sogs sam gtar ga yis/ /thams cad la ni khrag dbyung bya/ /de nas bsil sman bas blugs bya/ /sle sman ta ka a shadtha/ /ba ru ra dang bri yi
322a4(mdo 'grel): ku/ /shug pa sar gnyis sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /ba dang srin bu la sogs pa'o/ /dug 'joms las ni thams cad byed/ /ser po rnam gnyis rma shing brtsod/ /pad+ma ge ser rgyal pos kun /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar tsam ba ka/ snga ma bas kyang yon

322b7(mdo 'grel): gyis ba yi dug kun 'joms/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //de nas byi ba dang a laM ka'i dug gsob bshad par bya'o/ /kha chu can dang mi brtan bu/ /rgod dang sgra can
323a1(mdo 'grel): pags pa dang/ /rnying ba'i so dang khu byug dang/ /ser skya dang ni nag po dang/ /dmar ser khra po dkar po dang/ /thi ba skra dkar byi ba dang/ /bus ba dang ni bra byi ta'i/ /byi ba dbye ba bco brgyad yin/ /gang du 'di yi kha chus
323a2(mdo 'grel): phog/ khu ba phog dang reg pa ni/ /lus kyis lus la reg pa der/ /khrag la gnod cing mdog skyal/ /thor bu rmen bu di mnyam dang/ /shu ba 'khor yid yi pha 'chus/ /mgo 'khor grang rims rab tu na/ /nyams chung 'dar zhing lhu
323a3(mdo 'grel): tshigs na/ /sbu ldang dran nyams khrag 'dzag dang/ /yun ring du ni gnas par byed/ /bad kan can gyis byi ba yi/ /phrug gu mang reg skom blon 'gyur/ /byi ba 'brig sbyong dug gso dka' / /yang dang yang du ldang bar byed/ /yan lag

323b1(mdo 'grel): brnags/ /skrangs shing rmen bu skye zhug 'khums/ /rma ni 'gag cing 'brum bu 'byung/ /lte ba can du zlum por 'gyur/ /kun tu dug bcas mtshan ma 'di/ /dug med de las bzlog pa yin/ /gang gis bzung ba de sbyong tshul/ /sgra sgrogs rgyu med par

325a1(mdo 'grel): ma bgrod par/ /yo byad sman pa sta gon byas/ /khang ba legs par byi dor bya'o/ /de nas chos grangs bzang khrus byas/ /mchod 'os mchod la 'jug par bya/ /der ni sbyangs byas dag gyur nas/ /bde zhing stobs ni skyes

325a4(mdo 'grel): blud na legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/ /de nas lus ni dag 'gyur zhing /thugs sogs rim pa spyad nas kyang/ /zhag gsum ma ma ni zhag lnga 'am/ /zhag bdun bar du zhun mar bcas/ /nas thug dag par gyur gi bar//
325a5(mdo 'grel): sbyin zhing bshad rnying dag par bya/ /de ltar lto ni sbyangs byas nas/ /goms pas shes pa gang zhig la/ /gang zhig 'tsham pa de kun brtag/ /bcud kyis len ni sbyin par bya/ /a ru ra stod de'i sum 'gyur/ /skyu ru ra dang bcas pa
325a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rtsa ba lnga po lnga rnams ni/ /srang ni nyis brgya lnga bcu dag/ chu ni bcu 'gyur dag tu bskol/ /khu ba bcu cha lus pa ru/ /a ru ra rgyal skyu ru ra/ /brdungs pa rus ba byung nas ni/ /khu ba de yi nang du ni/ /shing ta sug
325a7(mdo 'grel): smel pi pi ling/ /ga dur skyes pa a ru pa /tsan dan ma du ka bar+Ni/ /shad ka buShpa ka na ka/ /shu dag gla ba shing mngar dang/ /pi ta ng+ga ni phul de'i tsha ba/ kha re dkar srad stong tshig brgya/ /zhun mar bre ni bcu gnyis dang
325b1(mdo 'grel): til mar bre ni brgyad bcas pa /lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol/ /phog la bsgrangs bar sbrang rtsi ni//srang ni sum brgya nyi gu gzhug/ de nas gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/ /mar gyi snod du gzhug bar bya/ /gang zhig za gcig la mi gnod/ /de ni 'di
325b2(mdo 'grel): yi tshad du bshad/ /zhu ba'i tshe na drug cu ba/ /'o mar bcas pa'i kha zas sbyin/ /bcud kyi len 'di tshangs pas bshad/ /dge zhing dpal yon can yin zhing/ /mkha' la gnas dang byas pa rtse/ /de bzhin dka' thub pas bsten bya/ /lus snyoM
325b3(mdo 'grel): dal dad skra dkar dang/ /gnyer ma'i skyon ni spangs gyur zhing/ /yid gzhungs dran dang stobs ldan zhing/ /tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ba yin/ /skyon med a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /stong dang pi pi ling ni stong dang bcas/ /rgya skyegs shing

329b7(mdo 'grel): chad gzhan dag gam til mar ram/ /rang skyur ram ni zho kha chu/ /da tshe nyid sbyar nang bar ni/ /tshad dang ldan par sbyin bya zhi pa/ /'o ma zhun mar zhag dang nang/ /skam sa'i sha khu so sor ni/ /bskol ba nad gzhi ji bzhin blud/ /yang na sman khu 'ba'

330a5(mdo 'grel): bzhag spyad bar bya/ /sgog skyo shun pa bshus pa'i snying po ni/ /bsreg sha dag gam bza' ba sna tshogs sam/ /shar gtubs pa 'am mar dang tshar bcas bza'/ /kha zas nyung ba ci 'dod spyad par bya/ /khrag dang mkhris ba'i
330a6(mdo 'grel): nang ni ma gtogs pa/ /nad gzhi ma lus ldan par gyur pa 'am/ /rlung nad zhi tshogs dang ni ldan 'gyur ba/ /sgog pa las lhag gzhan sman yod ma yin/ /chu dang bu ram 'o mar sred/ /sha chang skyur la mi dga' zhing/ /ma zhu
330a7(mdo 'grel): ba ni spong mi nus/ /sgog skya nges par gnod pa bskyed/ /mkhris pa ldan pa'i 'jigs pa yis/ /mdza' ma bkru sman 'jam pa btang/ /de ltar bcud len yon tan ni/ /yongs su rdzogs pa thob bar 'gyur/ /sos ka'i
330b1(mdo 'grel): cha ba'i gdungs drags las/ /rgya skyegs khu ba ltar 'dzag gang/ /gser sogs 'byung ba drug gi bcud/ /de ni blag zhun zhes byar bshad/ /de ni kun kyang kha zhing tshe/ /shas cher me drod zhu rjes tsha/ /gcod par byed de de la ni/ /lcags las byung rab
330b2(mdo 'grel): tu bsngags/ /ba gcin dri brog gnag pa dang/ /gu gul 'dra zhing gseg ma med/ /sbyin bag snum zhing skyur ba dang/ /ska zhing 'jam la lci ba yi/ /brag zhun de ni mchog yin no/ /nad dang nad pa rjes mthun par/ /sman dang brag zhun cha
330b3(mdo 'grel): mnyam byas/ /lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya/ /dang po chu ni nyi tshes bkru/ /de 'og bskams la bskal dang zhi/ /brag zhu na sman par mnyam byas pa/ /brgyad cha'i nang du bskol bsna bya/ /khu ba brgyad cha lus bcags la/ /dro 'jam nang
330b4(mdo 'grel): du brag zhun gzhug/ de dang 'dres gyur bskams nas no/ /sman chu'i nang du slar yang gzhug/ de ltar rang rang sman 'phrod ni/ /bskol ba'i khu bar lan bdun spangs/ /de nas tig til sman mar gyis/ /snum 'chos byas nas sbyang byas
330b5(mdo 'grel): te/ 'bras bu gsum gyi khu dang/ /shing mngar ba to la'i khu ba/ /brag zhun dag ni re re yang/ /zhag gsum bar du blud bar bya/ /de nas de la sbyor ba ni/ /dus dang sbyar te blud par bya/ /de ltar brag zhun mi rnams la/ /shin tu phan par byed pa
330b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /yon tan ma lus skyed byed cing/ /'phral du gnod par mi byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag gcig phrag gsum dang/ /phrag bdun zho gnyis srang phyed gcig/ dman dang bar mtshon po yi/ /brag zhun go rim bzhin du sbyar/ /lus ni
330b7(mdo 'grel): shin tu ma sbyangs la/ /brag zhun sbyangs pa btang bar bya/ / zangs dang lcags dang dngul dang gser/ /kun dang yang na re rer sbyar/ /'o ma dang ni lhan cig btang/ /bcud len 'bras bu myur du 'grub/ /rgya sran mon sne'u dam ru dang/ /phu ron sha
331a1(mdo 'grel): ni rtag tu spang/ /gang zhig grag zhun gyis ni mngon sum du/ /ma bsal nad ni sa steng yod ma yin/ /dus su cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na/ /nad med nyams stobs rgya chen skyed par byed/ /khang bar gnas pa'i khom ldan
331a2(mdo 'grel): can/ /phun sum tshogs dang ldan la phan/ /de las gzhan du de rnams la/ /nyi ma rlung gi chog bsten/ /rlung dang nyi tshan bcas sbyor ba/ /bde ba'i longs spyod med na yang/ /gang zhig lus la mi gnod pa/ /mchog tu de ni bshad par bya//
331a3(mdo 'grel): chu grang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang/ /mar ni re re gnyis gnyis dang/ /gsum pa'am yang na thams cad ni/ /zas sngar 'thungs na rgas sra byed/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi bca' sga dang/ /pi pi ling dam rgyam tsha dang/ /a ru ra ni gnyis gnyis dang/ /rtag zas bde
331a4(mdo 'grel): zhing lo brgya 'tsho/ /a ru ra ni mar nang sro/ /bza' zhing mar de 'thungs nas ni/ /rgas sra lus ni yun rir gnas/ /stobs ni 'phel bar byed 'gyur te/ /ji ltar dma' ba byas gzo ba/ /lan cig phan 'dogs ? bzhin no/ /skya ru ra'i khu ba
331a5(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi dang/ /kha ra mar dang lde gur bcas/ /bsten zhing 'phrod ba za ba'i yi/ /rgas ba'i gnod pa 'jig 'gyur te/ /nyes bsrubs bstan bcos rgya chen mtshungs/ /skyu ru ra dang bi TAngka/ /a sa na yi snying po phye/ /lcags phya til mar sprang
331a6(mdo 'grel): rtsi yi/ /mar bcas lde gu bsten na ni/ /na mo tshad mdzes pa ma nyams 'gyur/ /lcags phye bi TAngka yi phye ma dang/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsreg pa lo gcig tsam/ /as na yi za ma tog nas bzhag/ bstan na stobs ldan tshe ring sgra gnag 'gyur/
331a7(mdo 'grel): bi TAngka dang go bye bca' sga rnams/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa gang gis zos/ /rgas ba'i chu bo nad kyi rba rlabs can/ /na chod ldan bI skyi bu de brgal 'gyur/ /seng ldeng a sa na yi khu ba dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba
331b1(mdo 'grel): chog bzhin du bsten ba'i mi rnams ni/ /tshe ring 'gyur ba de la ngo tshar med/ /dzI ba ka yi khu ba sor mor chags/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi mar dang 'bras bu gsum/ /skyes bu dam pas bsten par gyur na ni/ /rgas dang nad ni nges par ldog par 'gyur/ /ba spru ba ni sar ba
331b2(mdo 'grel): srang phyed dang/ /'o mar btags pa zla phyed zla ba gnyis/ /zla drug lo gcig bar du 'thungs na ni/ /rgas shing rnying pa'ang slar ni gzhon bar 'gyur/ /mthu a shu ma ti bra ha ti/ /bal pu shel tsi dang ba da dang/ /a san dang thal tres a ka ru/ bre
331b3(mdo 'grel): yaM ku dang tsan dan re re yi/ /cho ga'ang ba spru ba dang mtshungs pa yin/ /nyer shing lde gu khu bar bskol ba dang/ /zhun mar khar bcas pa za byed pa/ /de ni 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs 'gyur 'tsho/ /nad kyi rkun po 'joms par mi 'gyur ro/ /a
331b4(mdo 'grel): shwa gand+ha jo mar bcas pa ni/ /mar ram til mar chu dren sbyar ba dang/ /zla phyed bsten na nyams chung lus rgyas shing/ /ji ltar lo tog gzhon la char 'bab mtshungs/ /nyin re til nag srang ni re re dag/ zos pa'i rjes la chu grangs 'thung
331b5(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ lus ni sha che rgyas pa nyid 'gyur zhing/ /'chi ba'i bar du so ni brtan par 'gyur/ /gze ma sle tres skyu ru ra'i phye ma/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi cha nyams lde gu zas/ /ro tsa lus brtan nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /lo brgya 'tsho zhing skra ni
331b6(mdo 'grel): nag bor 'gyur/ /tig ta a rur dang skyu ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang bcas pa bsdungs nas brten/ /mi de rma bya bzhin du mdangs ldan zhing/ /yid du 'ongs ba'i bde ba thob bar 'gyur/ /brag zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi bi TAngka/ /a ru ra dang lcags
331b7(mdo 'grel): phye dngul chu dang/ /rta bya bsten na lus zungs rdzogs 'gyur te/ /yang ngo zla phyed rdzogs pa'i zla ba 'dra/ /gang zhig bri kar dza'i khu ba zla ba gcig/ nyin re rgyun tu bsten bar byed pa dang/ /'o ma 'thungs te stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan/ /lo brgya 'tsho
332a1(mdo 'grel): ba dag dang thob bar 'gyur/ /shu dag kyang ni zla ba gcig bstan zhing/ /'o ma 'am mar ram til mar bcas pa bsten/ /gdon gyis mi tshugs pa yi lus 'gyur zhing/ /yid gzhungs tshigs ni shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/ ma
332a2(mdo 'grel): ru ka yi bar ni mar dang brdos/ /zla gcig bar du zas ma zos par bsten/ /gzugs ni rgya cher 'tsho zhing spobs pa che/ /gzhon zhing mdangs ldan yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsang+ga ri dang ni/ /lcags phye srab
332a3(mdo 'grel): ni lnga bcu las byas shing/ /ko sha ta ka'i khu ba'i nang du btags/ /ril bu sum brgya byas nas ril bu de'i/ /grib skams rim gyis ma lus bar bsten cing/ /bkru sman bya zhing thug sla'i rim pa dang/ /thug ska gar bo sha khu
332a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras chan dang/ /mar la bsten zhing zla gcig lus bsdams la/ /zla gcig bzlas nas rang dga' nyid du spyad/ /'bad pas dus kun tu ni ma zhu spang/ /la gcig bar du sbyor ba 'di bsten na/ /gang zhig gso dka' i nad kyis nyen
332a5(mdo 'grel): pa'ang/ /shin tu stobs ldan skyes bu'i bya ba rdzogs/ /lus rgyas 'jam zhing mig dang rna ba bsal/ /gzhon pa nyid kyang lo ni lnga brgya 'tsho/ /seng ldeng shir sha pa ta a sa na/ /rma bya a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /go bye bi TAngka
332a6(mdo 'grel): btags chur 'gyur ni/ /bco brgyad nang bskol wa? kyi dum bu gzhug/ lcags kyi snod du zhag gsum nyi ma yi/ /'od kyis bsros la de rjes me la ni/ /lcags kyi phye ma bzhi bar byas te bskol/ /de btsags khu ba cha gcig 'o na ni
332a7(mdo 'grel): cha gcig de bzhin gso ma'i khu ba gcig/ nyer shing bskol ba'i khu ba cha gsum dang/ /'dir ni mar sar cha ni bzhi dang sbyar/ /'di dag gcig tu lcags nag snod du bskol/ /kha ra rdul med de bzhin sgrang rtsi dang/ /de bzhin mar
332b1(mdo 'grel): dang bsres par gyur ba dang/ /'phrod pa'i zos dang skom dang spyod lam bcas/ /srang re rtag tu bsten par gyur na ni/ /dpal dang ldan zhing nyes pa gsal ba dang/ /nags kyi ma he lta bu'i stobs ldan zhing/ /rta ltar mgyogs la lus ni
332b2(mdo 'grel): brtan pa dang/ skra ni bung ba'i mdog ltar gnag pa dang/ /kha ni dri zhim bud med mar bsten nus/ /tshigs gsal yid gzhungs phun sum tshogS ba dang/ /zla gcig bsten me drod che ba yin/ /des ni mi yi seng ge 'am me 'am ni/ /btso
332b3(mdo 'grel): ma gser gyi mdog 'dra'i lus 'dzin 'gyur/ /mi yi seng ge'i sbyor ba 'di/ /zos na nad kyi mi nyen te/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i bag ba yis/ /lha min tshogs ni 'jigs dang 'dra/ /bring+ga ra tsa'i myu gu'i cho ga 'dis/ /brdos shing mar
332b4(mdo 'grel): bcas zos pa bsdams dang bcas/ /lto sbyangs ba la a sa na'i khu bas/ /'o ma 'thungs shing zas kyi bya ba byed/ /zla gcig bar du bsten par gyur na ni/ /de zhing lo ni nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho/ /lan gcig smras pa'i tshig kyang
332b5(mdo 'grel): zin 'gyur cing/ /dran dang dbang po nyamS pa med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /til mar bsten par byed ba dag/ de yis yon tan de 'thob cing/ /lus ni nag po nyid du 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len ni dus dang rjes
332b6(mdo 'grel): mthun zhing/ /bstan nus 'bras bur bcas pa bshad pa yin/ /gzhan dag phan yon bcas pa yod mod kyi/ /rnyed par dka' bas bdag gis ma bshad do/ /bcud kyi len gyi cho ga las/ /nyams pas gal te nang skyes
332b7(mdo 'grel): na/ bcud kyis len de spangs nas ni/ /de yi sman ni ji bzhin bya/ /bden bar smra zhing khro ba med/ /dbang po sdom zhing bdag nyid rdul/ /zhi zhing dam pa'i sbyong lam dga' / /rtag tu bcud len yin zhes bya/ /yon tan 'di dag ldan
333a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pas/ /gang zhig bcud lan bsten gyur ba/ /de ni dga' zhing tshe ring la/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du bde/ /sbyod pa bsten chos rjes 'jug cing/ /gam na gnas ba'i sems dang mthus/ /?
333a2(mdo 'grel): blo ni ma 'khrul pa/ /bcud kyis lon ni rdzogs pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum rtsa dgu pa'o// //yan lag brgyad ba'i snying pa bsdus pa las/ /rgas pa gso
333a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas ro rtsa ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /skyes bus rtag tu yul brten pas/ /ro tsa ba ni 'dod bya ste/ /rgas dang rtas dang bu rgyud ni/ /de la yon tan de la gnas// bu tsha'i
333a4(mdo 'grel): brgyud ni skyed byed cing/ /'phral du yang dag dga' byed gang/ /gang gis rta ltar rab stobs ldan/ /bud med la ni thogs med 'gro// bud med la rab chags 'gyur ba/ /gang dang gang gis 'phel 'gyur ba/ /de ni ro rtsa
333a5(mdo 'grel): byed ba ste/ /lus kyi stobs kyang bskyed ba'i mchog/ chos dang grags dang tsha ring dang/ /'jig rten gnyis ka bcung len 'gyur/ /gcig tu skyon ni med pa yi/ /tshangs par sbyong la bdag yi rang/ /snying stobs cung ba nyon
333a6(mdo 'grel): mongs pa/ /gnod bar gyur pa'i nad pu can/ /lus ni zad ba bsrung ba'i phyir/ /ro rtsa'i cho ga brjod ba yi/ /nad med khang tsho ldan pa dag/ ro tsa ba ni sten byed ba/ /dus tshigs kun la nyin re zhing/ /nyal ba bya ba dgag pa med
333a7(mdo 'grel): de nas snum gyur sbyangs byas pa/ /ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsir bcas/ /mar dang til mar sbrang rtsi dang/ /sha khu 'o ma kha rar bcas/ /'o ma sha dang sha khu bza'/ /sbyor ba shes pas dang po btang/ /de nas ro tsa byed sbyor ba/ /khu ba
333b1(mdo 'grel): 'u cha 'phel byed bya/ /me tog dri mnam dri ma med/ /'bras bu med bar 'gyur ba'i shing/ /yal ga gcig pa'i shing gcig bzhin/ /bu med mi ni de dang 'dra/ /go ma 'gros 'khyor zhing tshig gi gsal/ /rdul gyis g.yog pa ltar snang ? bzhin ras rna bas
333b2(mdo 'grel): gyis g.yogs pa yang/ /snying ni dga' bar byed ba yin/ /reg pa dang ni mthong sogs la/ /bu mnyam bde ba yod min na/ /gang zhig ches dang grags bar ldan/ /nga rgyal rigs 'phel smos ci dgos/ /lus sbyangs byas te ci nu bar/ /ro tsa'i
333b3(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /'dam bu bur shing 'jag ma sogs/ /pu shel ci dang bi da ri/ /kaN+Da kA ri'i rtsa ba dang/ /pa lang 'tsho byed zangs rtsa ba/ /ram nye ba gnyis med gnyis/ /nyer shing bu rna rnam gnyis dang/ /a shwa gand+ha kha sral phre'u
333b4(mdo 'grel): a ti ba la ba sbra ba/ /bi da ri ti ba ya se/ /ra sna gze ma dzI baM ti/ /shing mngar sa la barni rnams/ /re re'ang srang ni gsum gsum dang/ /mon sran dre'u bre bzhi dang/ /chu bre sum cu gnyis dang bskol/ /khu ba bre? khra bzhi lus ? ba ru/ /mar
333b5(mdo 'grel): bre bzhi dang bi dir/ /skyu ru ra dang bu ram shing/ /bre ni bzhi bzhi gzhug bar bya/ /'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ /bi ra kha sral ram nye gnyis/ /shing mngar phal gu pi pi ling/ /rgun 'brum 'bra go bi da ri/ /ma du ka dang nyer shing du//
333b6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag btags te bcug nas ni/ /de bskol btsags ba'i nang du ni/ /ka ra dkar po mig rkang ni/ /sman ni bre re gzhug pa dang/ /pi pi ling ni srang bzhi dang/ /na la sham ni sang gcig dang/ /shing chos sug smel gsar rnams/ /re re/
333b7(mdo 'grel): srang ni phyed phyed phya/ /sbrang rtsi sbrang ni bcu drug sbyar/ /de la nyin re srad re bza'/ /'o ma dang ni sha khu btung/ /des ni rta ltar bskyod gyur zhing/ /mtshol ba lta bur 'dod pa sbyod/ /bi da ri dang pi pi ling/ /shad? la 'bras rtsa ? li/ /? ?
334a1(mdo 'grel): ma phul re dang/ /de bzhin sbrang rtsi srang brgyad dang/ /kha ra'i phye ma sra lnga bcu/ /mar sar srang ni bcu drug sbyar/ /de la zho ni gnyis gnyis bza'/ /bud med brgya la sbyod par nus/ /kha sral phre'u zho 'am ni/ /ma sha'o mar
334a2(mdo 'grel): bskol te bskrad /ming dang sbrang rtsi bcas kha? dag/ zos la ba sar 'dom? btung/ /mtshan mo thog thag gnyid ma log/ dub pa med par nyal po spyod/ /ra thug rlig pa 'o mar btsos/ /til dang lan mang bsras pa dang/ /kha ra bcas zos gang yin de//
334a3(mdo 'grel): bud med brgya la'ang gsar snyam sems/ /bi da ri yi phye ma ni/ /rang gi khu bar lan mar spangs/ zhun mar sbrang rtsi bcas bldags na/ /bud med bcu la sbyod par nus/ /pi pi yid dang skyu ru'i phye/ /rang gi khu bar legs spangs la// sha kha
334a4(mdo 'grel): dmar sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /zos rjes 'o ma 'thugs pa gang/ /mi de brgyad cu lon na yang/ /mang? tshor gnas shing 'dod sbyod nus/ /shing mdar phye ma zho gnyis dang/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi de mnyam pa/ /zos rjes 'o ma 'thungs gyur na/ /mi de
334a5(mdo 'grel): rtag tu 'dod sbyod nus/ /kar dkar dang srang gi phyed/ /'o mar sbyar te 'thungs pa dang/ /kha ra 'o mar bcas pa yi/ /zas zos bud med la bod gyur/ /pa ya sa dang 'o ma bskol/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas za zhing/ /ba ni yar
334a6(mdo 'grel): ma'i 'o ma 'thungs/ /de ni sa bon zad mi shes/ kha sral phre'u gur phran gyi/ /sa bon phye mkha rar bcas/ /'o ma bzhos ma thag 'thungs na/ /lung bod lta bur sbyod par nus/ /u tsa da yi phye ma dang/ /nyer shing sbyar ba'ang de bzhin no//
334a7(mdo 'grel): zho sbras zla ba ltar dkar ba'i/ /tshags kyis btsags nas zos na ni/ /ba ra drug cu'i zas chan zos/ /rgan po'ang gzhon nu bzhin du sbyod/ /gzem ma sha a ka ru/ /kha sral sa bon nyer shing ba/ /'o ma bcas 'thungs rgas pa yang/
334b1(mdo 'grel): bud med brgyal spyod par nus/ /gang zhig mdar zhing snum pa dang/ /stobs 'phel nyams ni rtas byed dang/ /yid ni dga' bar byed ba gang/ /de dag thams cad ro tsar bshad/ /de bas rdzas ni 'di lta bus/ /brtas byas bud med la 'jug bya/ /rang gi
334b2(mdo 'grel): shugs kyis bskyod pa dang/ /bud med yon tan gyis dga' spyad/ /chos kyi dpag bsam shing myu gu/ /dbang po'i bde ba kun ston byed/ /yul ni yid du 'ong ba lnga/ /'dod pa'i lha yi rda yin no/ /yid 'ong yul ni re res kyang/ /tshim zhing
334b3(mdo 'grel): dga' byed mchog yin no/ /bud med lus la 'dug nas god/ /gnas pa de ni smos ci dgos/ /gang gis ming thos na yang snying dga' zhing/ /mthong na doms par 'gyur ba med ba dang/ /dbang po kun 'dren lcags kyur gyur pa yi/ khur
334b4(mdo 'grel): med khyo yi rjes 'jug 'phyon ma min/ /sgyu rtsal 'jo sgeg na chod lud kyis brgyan/ /phyir ni ngo tsha dben par spyod pa yang/ /tshig snyan smra zhing mchungs bar mngon dga' bcas/ /bud med de ni ro tsa'i don mchog byed/ /'dod pa'i
334b5(mdo 'grel): bstan bcos las bshad skyon med pa'i/ /yul dang dus dang nyams stobs rjes mthun zhing/ /sman dpyad bstan bcos sbyor dang mi 'gal ba/ /'dod ba'i sbyod pa ma lus spyad par bya/ /bsku byug lus dril sman chu blug dang dri/ /me tog
334b6(mdo 'grel): phreng ba la sogs rgyan dang ldan/ /glu dang snyan dang gsal sogs gtam pa mkhas/ /rang bzhin na tshod mtshungs shing dbang 'gyur grogs/ /rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor khrus rdzid bu/ /pad+ma gsar sbrang rtsis myos pa yi/ /sbrad ma bya dang
334b7(mdo 'grel): bcas bar gyur ba dang/ /sngo zhing gzhi mnyam ri yi 'dabs na ni/ /nags tshal khyim dang nye bar gyur ba dang/ /mthong na dga' ba'i shing ni sna tshogs skyes/ /mnyan na bde ba'i khu byug sgra spang sgrob/ /lus bde bud med rgyan dus dbang?
335a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /sems bde ma lus 'khor gyis bskor ba dang/ /so rtsi dang ni chad dangs chud ma ni/ /yid 'ong mtshan mo zla zer bcas par 'dug/ yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang/ /de dang de ni ro tsar byed pa yin//
335a2(mdo 'grel): chud ma kha ni atpal ltar dri zhim/ /pi waM snyam pa'i sgra ni nyan byed dang/ /mal stan yid 'ong me tog gcal bkraM pa/ lcug ma me tog myu gus brgyan pa 'dra/ /yul dang dus la gnod pa gang yang med/ /yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung duAng med/ /ro tsa'i sbyor ba nye bar
335a3(mdo 'grel): ldan gyur ba/ /'dod ba'i 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed// //gla sgang parba ta ni rims brlab na/ /skam dang che ba bod ba bsregs ba ni/ /chu yi nang du gsung ba'i dangs ma phan/ /slon la 'bras yis chu
335a4(mdo 'grel): so'i nad brag zhun/ /gcin snyi skyu ru ra dang ser po gnyis/ /skya rbab nad la lcags kyi phye ma mchog/ rlung dang bad kan la ni a ru ra/ /mcher ba'i nad la pi pi ling mchog yin/ /glo rdol ba la rgya skyegs khu ma bsdags
335a5(mdo 'grel): dug gi nad la shir sha rab tu bsdags/ /tshil dang rlung nad la ni gu gul pan/ /khrag mkhris la ni ba sha ka rab bsdags/ /'khru ba'i nad la dug mo nyung phan zhing/ /gzhad 'brum? go bye dbyig dug la gser phan/ /tsho
335a6(mdo 'grel): chos pa la skyer khaN+Da bsngags shing/ /srin bu'i nad ni bi TIngka yis 'joms/ /gcod tshen la chang ri sha'i 'o ma phan/ /mig gi nad la 'bras bu gsum rab phan/ /dreg nang la ni sle tres rab bsdags shing/ /pho ba'i nad
335a7(mdo 'grel): la dar ba gsar ba mchog/ mdze la seng ldeng snying po bsten pa mchog/ nad kun la ni brag zhun bsngags pa yin/ /smyo byed nad la mar ni rnying pa phan/ /rjod byed dang la gra ma'i rtsa ba phan/ /mya ngan la ni chang ni blud ba phan//
335b1(mdo 'grel): gnyid med pa yi nad ni 'o mas sel/ /cham pa zho ni sbyar ba dag gis se/ /ring pa'i nad la shin sbyin bar bya/ /rlung gi nad la sgog skya rab tu bsdags/ /yan lag rungs pa'i nad na dug gi sel/ /phrag pa phrag gong lag pa na ba la/ /thang chu tsa bor?
335b2(mdo 'grel): yi sna sman btang/ /glad pa'i nad la mar sar hwags? kyis sel/ /dmu rdzing rnga ma'i gcin dang 'o mas bsel/ /mgo bo'i nad kun la ni sna sman bsdags/ /khong 'bras gsar du byung la gtar ka gdab/ /kha yi nang kun la ni mkhur
335b3(mdo 'grel): bkar phan/ /mig nad sna sman mig sman rtas pas sel/ /rgas pa la ni 'o ma zhun mar phan/ /brgyal la chu grang rlung dang gri ba ma phan/ /drod chus ngal dang sge gsher kha ran bza'/ /dub na chang 'thungs lus ni khrus byas phan//
335b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal bzod dang brtan la rtsol ba phan/ /gcin srib la gze ma phan pa yin/ /lus pa lu la kaN+Da kA ri phan/ /rtsib logs gzer la puShpa karmu la phan/ /rgas sra bya la skyu ru ra phan zhing/ /rma la 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul
335b5(mdo 'grel): phan/ //de ltar nad rnams kyi ni sman gyi mchog/ bshad pas nad rnams zhi bar nus pa yin/ /de ni yul dang dus kyi stobs las ni// ci rigs par ni brtags te sbyor bar bya/ /de ltar rgyun shes bu las gzhung gi mdo/ /legs
335b6(mdo 'grel): par bshad pa des ni ma ngoms pas/ /me bzhin 'jug sogs blo mthun dang pas 'dud/ /the tshom 'di ni me bzhin 'jug gis dris/ /skal ldan kha cig bdag nyid mkhas/ /sman dang nad g.yog phun tshogs la/ /sman pa rgan
335b7(mdo 'grel): po'i lung gis ni/ /rjes su 'jug kyang nang bcas shing/ /nad kyis srog ni zad bar snang/ /gzhan dag de las go bzlog snang/ /de phyir phan dang gnod pa yis/ /'bras bu nyes pa ma mchis na/ /'dir ni bstan bcos kyis ci
336a1(mdo 'grel): bstan/ de ltar me bzhin 'jug sogs slob pa'i tshogs/ /rtog pa skyes la rgyun shes bu yis ni/ /de nyid ma lus rnam par bshad 'gyur ba/ /gso byas ma byas mnyam por bya mi rigs/ /yan lag drug cu ldan pa yi//
336a2(mdo 'grel): gso med bde 'gyur yod med kyi/ /nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la/ /lag nas 'dren thabs sman yin no/ /'tsho dang 'chi bar gyur pa la/ /kun la sman yod ma yin zhing/ /thabs la bltos pha ma yin la/ /gzhan du thabs la bltos pa'i nang/ /thabs
336a3(mdo 'grel): kyis bsgrubs na 'grub 'gyur bas/ /rgyu med par ni gtan tshigs min/ /gang yang khyed kyi phun tshogs ni/ /kun dang ldan pas gsos na yang/ /'chi 'gyur zhes smra de ma yi/ /thabs ni min 'gyur yod min/ /gal te de lta'i thabs ldan zhing//
336a4(mdo 'grel): blo ldan gso ba byas gyur kyang/ /sngon las nyes par ma grub pas/ /yan lag bcu drug ldan med min/ /me dang chu sogs dug dang ni/ /rengs sogs mi 'grub su zhig zer/ /rta dang nyams smad 'o ma dang/ /'bras ngan mi byed su
336a5(mdo 'grel): zhig 'dod/ /ma sha kha sral la sogs pa/ /ro tsa mi nus su zhig zer/ /bshad gci bskyed dang mang bar ni/ /nas la the tshom su zhig za/ /sngags dang rgyud ni med pa ru/ /gang gi drug ni 'ju bar 'gyur/ /gag pa sogs la gso
336a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /med par gang zhig bde bar 'gyur/ /'on kyang dus min 'chi la sogs/ /grub mdza' kun tu nges par grags/ /'bad pa chen po dag gis ni/ /ji ltar gzhan gyis bzlogs par nus/ /tsan dan la sogs tsha
336a7(mdo 'grel): sags pa/ /lung las grags pa bzhin du sel/ /rims la smyung dang rta ba dag/ bstan bcos nyin la grags pa yin/ /yan lag bzhi yi yon tan 'byor/ /legs par brtags nas sbyor bya yis/ /gzhan du nad kyi
336b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs 'joms pa/ /gso ba the tshom bcas mi bya/ /'di ni dus min 'chi zhags pa/ /brtan po gcod par byed pa yin/ /nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa la/ /sngags med pa yi srung skud yin/ /'di ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/ /sel byed
336b2(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi mngon sum yin/ /snod ngan gnas na 'phral du ni/ /ha la ha lar gyur pa yin/ /bstan bcos nges par mi shes shing/ /chig tsam la ni rjes gzhol ba/ /gshin rje'i zhags pa thogs pa bzhin/ /sman pa ngan pa ring du spang//
336b3(mdo 'grel): sman pa gzhung la legs mkhas shing/ /lung la mkhas pa'i bzang po dang/ /las la goms shing dge ba dag/ bzang por 'dod pa dam pa yin/ /de ltar rgyud kyi yon tan ldan/ /rgyud kyi skyon ni spangs gyur pa/ /gso ba'i bstan
336b4(mdo 'grel): bcos ma lus pa/ /khyab ste yongs su gnas pa yin/ /srang srong chen po'i gzhung rjes 'jug/ rgya chen dri ma med pa'i gnas/ /rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing/ /bsdus don nye bar mtshon byed yin/ /sman dpyad yan
336b5(mdo 'grel): lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtshom bsgrubs pa las/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang/ /de la don chen rtsol bzhan pa rnams/ /dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig byas/ /'di ni lung chen las grags shing/ /'bras
336b6(mdo 'grel): bu mngon du ston byed pas/ /sngags dang 'dra par legs sbyar gyi/ /log spyod nam yang mi bya'o/ /'di klags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas/ /tshe ring ba dang nad med dag /chos dang nor dang bde dang grags/ /nges par thob par 'gyur ba yin//
336b7(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni bltas nas bsdus don rtogs nus pas/ /rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus/ /rgya che rgyud gzhan dag la goms gyur bas/ /mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med/ /gal te tsa ra ka ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thob
337a1(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /legs bshad nad ni ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin/ /tsa ra ka la ma bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i/ /nyon mongs de ni nad ya rnams kyis gso tha ji ltar bya/ /mngon par zhen pa'i dbang
337a2(mdo 'grel): gis legs par bshad par sbyar pa la'ang/ /shin tu rmongs par mngon par spyod par mi byed gang yin te/ /de ni dang po'i sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med klags gyur zhing/ /skyes bu tshe yis ji srid thub kyi bar du slob par
337a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir/ /til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten/ /de ltar tshangs pa 'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad/ /tshig gi dbye bas bshad pas khyad 'phags med/ ston pa po yis dbang gis
337a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags min/ /de bas phrag dog spangs nas ni/ /bar ma nyid las bsten par bya/ /drang srong gis bshad phyir dga' na/ /legs thob tsa ba ka mar za/ /lus sogs kyis byas cis mi slob/ /des na legs
337a5(mdo 'grel): bshad gzung bar bya/ /'di ni tshe ring rigs byed rgya mtsho yi/ /snying po las ni snying po blangs nas su/ /rnam par sbyar ba dge ba gang thob pa/ /de yis 'gro ba bden nyid mthong bar shog/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus ba las//
337a6(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu tham pa'o// //sman pa'i bdag po dge 'dun gsang ba zhes bya ba'i bu/ /sman pa chen po pha gol zhes bya bas yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po mdzad pa las rgyud phyi ma'i gnas
337a7(mdo 'grel): te drug pa'o// //sman dbyang yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus ba zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran ? dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzad pos zhus te gtan
337b1(mdo 'grel): la phab pa'o// //sman yan lag brgyad pa'i rang 'grel du grags pa zhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ aSh+TaM ga h+ri da ya nA ma ba baiDUrya ka b+hASh+yaM/ bod skad du/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bshad pa/ /bam po
337b2(mdo 'grel): dang po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bairU rya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo /'dod chags la sogs ma lus pa yi nad?
337b3(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu 'brel bas lus la kun tu khyab/ /'dod dang gti mug khro ba sel ba yi/ /sman pa sngon med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas bshad pa/ /tshe ring ldan par 'dod pas na/ /chos dang nor yang
337b4(mdo 'grel): bde bar bsgrub/ /tshe yi rig byed lung bshad pa/ /rab tu gus par bya bar gyis/ /gnas dang po sman dpyad kyi cho ga tshe ring bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dpyad ni/ /changs pa chen pos dran nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i bu skye dgu'i bdag cis bya ba la bshad
337b5(mdo 'grel): do/ skye dgu'i bdag gis sman dpyad lobs nas/ /lha'i sman pa tha skar gyi bu gnyis la bshad do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang sngon gyi drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu dang/ /nabs so skyes dang/ thang la gnas dang/ rkang gnyis
337b6(mdo 'grel): spyod dang/ mu khyud dang/ 'dro ba skyod kyi bu dang/ shol 'gro zhes bya ba la bshad do/ /drang srong chen po 'di rnams kyis kyang/ drang srong me bzhin 'jug pa la sogs pa la bshad do/ /drang srod me bzhin 'jug pa la sogs pas
337b7(mdo 'grel): sman dpyad kyi gzhung lobs nas/ drang srong re res kyang sman dpyad zhib mo rgyas pa so so byas pa'i gzhud rtsing zhib sna tshogs su gyur pa las/ phyis sman ba chen po ? grol zhes bya bas sman dpyad kyi gzhung mang po mdza' dag las ma lus par
338a1(mdo 'grel): btus pa/ rtsing zhib ran cing bslab sla ba'i mdo yan lag brgyad du bsdus pa'i sman dpyad kyi gzhung bris so/ /de la sman dpyad kyi mdo yan/ lag brgyad ces bya ba ni/ nam tshong yan chad lus kyi nad sna tshogs gso ba'i
338a2(mdo 'grel): dpyad dang/ byis pa chung du'i dpyad dang/ gdon nad sna tshogs kyi dpyad dang/ nam tshong yan chad mig dang rna ba dang sna dang klad pa'i nad sna tshogs kyi dpyad dang/ mtshon gyis rmas pa'i rma gso ba'i dpyad dang/ sdig sprul za dug dang rtsi dug gis
338a3(mdo 'grel): phog pa'i dpyad dang/ rgas sra zhing tshe ring bar bya ba'i dpyad dang/ /bud med la phod par bya ba'i dbyad dang/ yan lag mdo rnam pa 'di brgyad yin no/ /de lta bas na sman dpyad kyis gso ba'i cho ga thams cad ni mdo brgyad po 'dir 'dus
338a4(mdo 'grel): so/ de la mi'i nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi ni rnam pa gsum ste rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum ma snyoms te/ gyur na nad yin te/ lus 'joms par byed do/ /'di gsum 'phrod snyoms
338a5(mdo 'grel): la gyur pa med na lus kyi nyams tha mal par gnas nye/ 'tsho bar byed do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum lus la khyab par gnas mod kyi/ de la yang gnas kyi bye brag ni snying ga yan chad ni bad kan gyi gnas so/ /snying ga man
338a6(mdo 'grel): chad lte ba yan chad kyi bar ni mkhris pa'i gnas so/ /lte ba man chad zas zhu ba'i sa dang/ ro smad man chad rkang pa yan chad rlung gi gnas so/ /yang de lan tshod kyi bye brag las bstan na/ byis pa'i cho na ni bad kan no/ /dang
338a7(mdo 'grel): la bab pa'i tshe ni mkhris pa'o/ /rgas phan chad ni rlung gi rang bzhin yin no/ /nyin mtshan yang rnam pa gsum du blta ste/ snga dro? ni bad kan no/ /nyi ma phyed kyi dus na mkhris pa'o/ /snur smad man chad ni rlung ngo/ /mtshan mo'i nam
338b1(mdo 'grel): stong ni bad kan no/ /nam gyi gung la mkhris pa'o/ /nam gyi smad man chad ni rlung gi dus so/ /yang de la zas zos ma thag pa'i rjes la cung zad cig gi bar du ni bad kan gnas so/ /de nas zas de zhu bar byed kyi bar du ni mkhris pa'o/ /zas zhu nas dangs
338b2(mdo 'grel): snyigs byed phan chad ni rlung gi dus so/ /de la kha zas zas pa rnams me'i drod kyi 'ju ba'i bye brag rlung dang mkhris pa dad bad kan las rnam pa bzhir blta ste/ de la rlung skyes nas zas zos pa yang na myur du 'jug/ yang na ring du mi 'du
338b3(mdo 'grel): bar byed de/ /'ju ba mi snyoms so/ /mkhris pa skyes nas zas zos pa'i me'i drod rno ches par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan skyes na zas 'ju bar byed pa'i me'i drod chung bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum shas mnyam na/ zas
338b4(mdo 'grel): 'ju ba'i me'i stobs kyang snyoms pa yin no/ /de la rlung gi shas chen ltos sra'o/ /mkhris pa'i shas chen lto 'jam zhing snyi'o/ /bad kan gyi shas chen lto sra ches pa yang ma yin/ /snyi ba nyid kyang ma yin pa de ni bar mar na pa yin no//
338b5(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gsum shas mnyam ste snyoms ba ne nad gzhi snyoms te nad med pa'o/ /ye lus kyi nad gzhi dang po ni/ /ma'i mngal du zla mtshan dang khu ba chags pa de tshun chad nas lus skye ba la sogs par gyur pa ni
338b6(mdo 'grel): nad kyi 'go de nas byung ba yin te/ /de nas dpe srin bu gdug pa'i dug dang 'dra'o/ /yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang gsum gyi bye brag las lus kyi rang bzhin ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan re re la yang che ba dang
338b7(mdo 'grel): 'bring po dang chung du so sor blta'o/ /rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum 'phrod snyoms na/ lus zungs 'phrod snyoms pa yin te/ nad med pa'i mchog go/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum las gang yang rung ba gnyis shig ?
339a1(mdo 'grel): lhag par che na/ /nad gzhi rnam gnyis las nad du 'gyur te/ /smad par bya ba'i rang bzhin yin no de la rlung gi rang bzhin ni rtsub pa yang bgrang ba srab phra ba g.yo ba yin no/ /de la mkhris pa'i rang bzhin ni 'jam bag
339a2(mdo 'grel): can/ tsa tshag tsag byed pa/ /dro ba yang ba dri dbar? mnam pa/ khod 'khru ba gsher te sla ba yin no/ de la bad kan gyi rang bzhin ni lci ba bsil ba 'jam pa/ 'ju zhing 'drul ba brtan pa/ nal? nal po 'byar bag gi rang bzhin yin ne/
339a3(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum las gnyis kyis shas chen ldan pa'i nad ces bya'o/ /gsum char las nad du gyur pa ni 'dus pa'i nad ces bya'o/ /de la lus zungs bdun zhes bya ba ni/ bcud dang sa ma dang/ khrag dang
339a4(mdo 'grel): sha dang/ tshil dang/ rus pa dang/ rkang dang/ khu chu dang bdun no/ /'di bdun dang snyigs ma bshang gci/ /rdul la sogs pa la rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyis gnod par byed pa yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dad
339a5(mdo 'grel): bad kan gsum snyoms na/ lus thams cad rtas par byed do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams ma snyoms na lus la gnod par byed pa yin no/ /de la sman no cog gi dang/ zas zos so cog gi ro ni mdo rnam pa
339a6(mdo 'grel): drug ste/ mngar ba dang/ sgyur ba dang/ tshwa bro ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ ska ba dang/ rnam pa drug go/ ro rnam pa 'di drug kyang rtsi sman tha dad pa la rten to/ /ro 'di drug gi stobs kyang go res bzhin du mthu che ba yin no/ /de la dang po'i
339a7(mdo 'grel): mngar ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ tshwa pro ba 'di gsum gyis ni rlung sel to/ kha ba dang tsha ba dang bskabs ni bad kan sel to/ /bska ba dang kha ba dang mngar bas ni mkhris pa sel to/ /de la tsha ba dang skyur ba dang/ lan tshwa ni mkhris pa dang/
339b1(mdo 'grel): khrag rgyas pa'i tsha ba'i nad skye'o/ //sman gyi bye brag ni rnam pa gsum du blta ste/ la las ni nad zhi bar byed/ /la las ni nad ldang bar byed/ /tha mal ni nyams tha mal par gnas par byed do/ /yang sman gyi mthu rnam pa gnyis te/
339b2(mdo 'grel): tshe ba dang bsil ba'i yon tan yin no/ /sman zhu ba'i rjes ni rnam pa gsum ste/ mngar ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ tsha ba'i rang bzhin yin no/ /sman gyi yon tan ni rnam pa bcu ste/ lci ba dang/ snyom pa dang/ bsil ba dang/ snum pa dang/ 'jam pa dang/
339b3(mdo 'grel): bska ba dang/ mnyen pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ rab tu phra ba dang/ skam bag can no/ /'di las bzlog na nyi shar sbyar ro/ /nad gso ba'i dpyad ni dbyar rgun gyi dus kyi bye brag dang/ sman gyi bye brag dang/ sman gyi sb yor zhi gtang ba'i las la mkhas pa
339b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'di gsum ldan zhing legs par sbyor ba yi/ nad med par byed pa'i rgyu gcig pu ste/ mchog yin no/ /rnam pa 'di gsum ltar ma 'byor te tshungs sam log par sbyar tam/ lhag par sbyar te ches ma? nad kyi nyen pa yin te nad
339b5(mdo 'grel): du shes par bya'o/ /nad ces bya ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan ma snyoms pa las nad du 'gyur ro/ /nad med pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nang gzhi 'phrod cing snyoms na/ nad med pa'i rang bzhin yin no/ /nad ces bya ba ni ?
339b6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gnyis te/ gcig ni bkres pa dang skom pa dang dga' ba'i nad rtag pa rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yin no/ /'phral du snang pa dang/ ma 'phrod pa ma snyoms pa las nad du gyur pa ni/ glo bur gyi nad yin te/ 'di dang rnam gnyis so//
339b7(mdo 'grel): nad 'di gnyis kyang lus dang sems kyi bye brag gis/ nad kyi gnas kun rnam pa gnyis rig par bya'o/ /de la 'dod chags dang/ gti mug gnyis kyi yid kyi yin te 'di gnyis nad gzhir bstan to/ /de la nad kyi thabs brtag pa ni/
340a1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum ste/ blta ba dang/ lag la myang zhing reg par bya ba dang/ nad thabs dri ba dang gsum gyis brtag go/ de la nad pa'i nad brtag pa yang rnam pa lnga ste/ sngar nad gzhir gyur ba'i zas mi 'phrod pa'i ci zos rjes bcad pa dang/
340a2(mdo 'grel): nad gang yin pa'i tshul las shes par bya ba dang/ nad kyi dngos po gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang/ nad du 'gyur ba'i kha zas la sogs pa zos par gyur pas nad cher gyur pa dang/ nad mngon par rtogs te nad kyi ming ci yin
340a3(mdo 'grel): pa bye brag phyed pa dang/ 'di lta bus nad kyi tshul rtogs par bya'o/ /yang nad kyi tshul rtag pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/ yul sa'i bye brag dang/ lus kyi bye brag las rnam pa gnyis su blta ste/ de las yul sa'i bye brag gi chu dang/ shing
340a4(mdo 'grel): rtsi nyung shing/ ri nyung skams che/ rus pa can rlung che ba'i yul de lta bu ni/ rlung nad lhag par che zhing khrag nad du 'gyur ro/ /yul ser che ste/ chu mngar? shis? che shing mod pa'i yul 'di lta bu las ni bad kan ltag par tsha zhing rlung
340a5(mdo 'grel): du yang 'gyur ro/ /skams dang gsher sa de gnyis cha mnyam ste/ thun mong tshom du gyur na rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad kyang ches mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na yul sa las blta ba rnam pa gsum
340a6(mdo 'grel): du bshad pa yin no/ /sman pas nad kyi dmigs gso dka' sla las sman sbyar ba yang rnam pa gnyis te/ nad kyis btab nas skad cig thang cig nas lo zla ba la sogs pa'i ? ji srid lon pa na/ /'phral du nad kyi thebs
340a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tsha bas che chug gis dmigs las brtag te sman pas sman sbyar bar bya'o/ /sma pas sman gtang ba yang mdo rnam pa gnyis te/ stong du drang zhing blon pa la sogs pa nas/ bkru zhing sbyang bar bya ba dang nad zhi bar bya ba'i sman
340b1(mdo 'grel): gtang ba dang gnyis so/ /lus las byung ba'i nad rnams rims pas gso ba ni mchog tu sman bzang ste/ sman lang pa nas gtang ba dang/ bkru sman gtang ba dang/ slo sman gtang ba dang/ til mar dang sman mar dang/ sbrang rtsi la sogs pa btang zhing
340b2(mdo 'grel): gso'o/ /sems kyi nad gso pa ni/ shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa dang/ brtan zhing dga' pa dang ldan pa dang/ gzhan gyis brnyas pa la sogs pa byas pas sems mi dga' zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur na/ bdag nyid kyi tshong ji tsam pa dang/ ci 'dra ba
340b3(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa rigs pa'i tshul gyis bsams te/ sems kyi nad gso ba 'di ni sems nad gso ba'i mchog yin no/ /sman gtang zhing nad gso ba'i dpyad thabs la mdo rnam pa bzhi ste/ sman pa dang sman dang nad g.yog dang/ nad pa dang
340b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa 'di bzhi'o/ /nad gso ba'i mdo rnam pa 'di bzhi po'i re re la yang rnam pa bzhi bzhi ste bcu drug dang ldan na/ nad gso ba la sogs pa sman dpyad thams cad byar rung ngo/ /de la yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na sman pa yin te/ de dag
340b5(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ sman pa chen po mkhas shing lugs che/ kun gyi stengs su gyur pa yin/ sman dpyad kyi gtsug lag bshad pa dpyad kyi lung legs par 'khos pa yin sman sbyar zhing gtang ba'i las su bya ba rnams mthong ba dag/ snyoms
340b6(mdo 'grel): las dang le lo mi byed cing brtson pa yin/ phyi'i brku bshal dang sman sbyar ba la sogs pa la gtsang sgra che zhing nang gi 'dod chen med la snying rje yod pa'i gtsang sbra dang ldan pa ? ni sman pa'i yon tan no/ /de yang sman yang
340b7(mdo 'grel): yon tan bzhi dang ldan par dgos te/ sman sna tshogs so so'i brko skam pa la sogs pa so so'i cho ga bzhin byas par gyur pa dang/ sman sna re re yang mthu stobs la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ sman skye ba'i tshe na/ char pa 
341a1(mdo 'grel): chen po 'am than pa ches pa 'am/ nyi lhags dang grib mas ha cang gnod par ma gyur cing/ /sa bzang po nas skyes pa so so'i smin par ldan pa dag nad dmigs tha dad pa dang/ 'phrod pa'i sman dmigs su phan pa pa dang ldan
341a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'di bzhi ni sman gyi yon tan yin no/ /nad g.yog gi yon tan yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ nad pa la byams pa dang/ phyi nang gi gcing sbra che ba bsnyel mdongs yod cing gshor la brtson pa dang/ nad pa'i nad kyi tshul las kha zas la
341a3(mdo 'grel): sogs pa rung gi cho ga sman pas bstan pa bzhin mi brjed mi 'khrul zhing lobs pa'o/ /nad pa yang yon tan bzhi dang ldan na nad gsor rung ste/ gso ba'i yo byad 'byor te phyug pa dang/ sman pa'i dpyad nyan cing bka' blo bde ba
341a4(mdo 'grel): dang nang ba rang gi nad gang dang gang du na bshes pa dang/ sman dang dpyad byas na phog rmya che zhing stabs dang ldan pa bzhi'o/ /de ltar sman? dpyad kyis yan lag bcu drug po 'di dag dang ldan na/ nang gso ba la sogs pa dang/ rgan sran
341a5(mdo 'grel): che zhing tsha ring bar bya ba la sogs pa kun kyang byar rung ngo/ /sman pas nad pa zhig gso na/ nad gsor rung ba'i nad pa ni/ /na tshod dar la bab pa dang/ /sman dpyad kyi cho ga thams cad la phog rmya nus shing bzod pa dang/ rnam pa 'di gnyis
341a6(mdo 'grel): su ldan pa'i mi sman gyi cho ga dang/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa bsrung zhing dbang po zhi zhing thub par bsrung nus pa 'di lta bu'i nad pa ni gso sla ba yin no/ /yang nad pa'i nad gso pa la/ na tshod dar la bab cing phog rmya nus kyang nad gnang du bab par
341a7(mdo 'grel): gyur tam/ nad gzhi che ba la sogs par gyur na ni/ gso dka' ba yin no/ /nad pa'i na tshad dar la bab cing phog rmya la sogs pa dang ldan la /nad kyang gnad la bab par ma song nad gzhi yang chung/ na ba'i
341b1(mdo 'grel): dmigs nyid kyang gsal bar mi snang ste/ nang gang yin pa'i tshul lam/ rtags cam zhig sngar snang dang ma/ nad kyi dmigs gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid gsal bar rtogs pa dang/ /rims la sogs pa nad gang yang rung ba'i
341b2(mdo 'grel): bla gnyan gyi nad phran tshegs gzhan dag gis kyang ma btab na/ de ni gnod pa ma yin te gso sla ba'o/ /yang nad pa zhig na ste mi bde na/ /mi'i rang bzhin dang/ /dbyar dgun gyi rus dang/ yul skams dang/ ser che ba la sogs pa
341b3(mdo 'grel): gnod par byed pa'i khams la sogs pa las mi bde ba'i nad kun kyang cig tu mi mthun te tha dad par gyur pa 'di lta bu dang/ sman dbyar bya ba'i yan lag bcu drug dang yang ldan par gyur pa 'di 'dra ba'i nad ni gso sla
341b4(mdo 'grel): ba yin no/ /yang nad kyis btab pa zhig las dpyad du bya na/ mi de btsas pa'i tshe'i bla skar gang yin pa dang/ gza' gang yin pa dang sbyar ste/ thog ma nad kyis btab pa'i nyi ma dang sbyar na btsas pa'i tshe'i skar ma la
341b5(mdo 'grel): gnod pa na gyur pa dang/ nad 'dom sna gnyis kyis dag ste/ nad sna cig na ba dang/ kha nas khrag 'byung ba dang/ thur du yang 'byung ste sgo gnyis ka nas khrag 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang/ yang na kha dang sna la sogs pa kun nas?
341b6(mdo 'grel): khrag 'ong ba 'di lta bu ni gso dka' ba yin na/ 'di ltar ma 'dom ste/ kha 'am smad 'ga' zhig nas khrag 'ong bar zad pa dang/ nad rnying dkyil cha ba ma yin pa nad gsar ba 'di lta bu ni gos sla ba zhes bya'o/ /de la
341b7(mdo 'grel): nad gso dka' ba zhes bya ba ni/ gtar ka sna tshogs gdab pa dang/ chu'i srog chags pad+mas nad khrag 'ji ba du gzhug pa dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba las sbyar ba'i sman gyi bsku ba dang/ nad sna gnyis 'doms pa'i nang
342a1(mdo 'grel): kyis btab par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i nang ni gso dka' ba yin te/ /sman dang kha zas phan pa tsam zhig gis zin pa dang/ tshe srog la thog par zad do/ de lta bu ni gso dka' zhes bya'o/ /de la yang gso sla ba'i dmigs bstan
342a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang gso dka' ba'i dmigs bstan pa 'di rnam gnyis dang mi mthun pa nad gzhi yang che la nad sna yang 'doms pa dang/ sman dang kha zas kyi bcos shing bsgyur du yang yi rung/ tshe srog gis zin pa yang mi 'dra la gso pa'i dpyad du bya
342a3(mdo 'grel): ba kun dang rab tu mi mthun par gnas pa dang/ sems kyang la bral 'khrul du gyur te/ mi 'phrod cing gnod par 'gyur ba kun 'dod pa dang/ gnyen nam 'dza' sdug pa dang 'phrad 'dod ces zer ba lta bu dang/ rmongs shing mi dran la/ myos
342a4(mdo 'grel): te ma smras pa dang/ 'dod pa rnams rjed pa dang khro par gyur te sman pa dang/ nad g.yog dang/ dpyad du bya ba rnams la gshe zhing tshig pa dang/ 'di lta bu'i nad gzhi cher gyur pa ni gso ba'i thabs dka' ba zhes bya ba ste/ sman
342a5(mdo 'grel): pas nang pa la bltas nas 'chi ltas snang zhing/ mig 'gyur la nyams thag par snang zhing sman pa la yang khro/ rgyal po la yang khro/ sman pa dang rgyal po dang mi mdza'i ma mthun pa la yang khro zhing 'tshig/ yo byad mi 'byor la/
342a6(mdo 'grel): sman pas gso ba'i dbyad byas na yang brel te mi khom zhe 'am/ sman pas dpyad kyang nyan du mi btub pa dang/ nad pa gtum ba mya ngan la gnas cing spyad bya bas 'jigs te phog rmya chung ba/ drin mi gzo ba/ nga rgyal byed cing
342a7(mdo 'grel): sman pa la brnyas pa/ tshe zad pa gyur pa 'di ltar mthong na/ thabs med de sman pas thong zhig/ tshe ring bar bya ba'i sman dpyad kyis le'u dang po'i rgyud bshad zin to// //de nas tshe ring bar 'dod pa'i rgyu las sman dpyad
342b1(mdo 'grel): kyi rnam grangs kyi mdo bsdu ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /tshe ring bor 'dod na yang dpyad dang cho gar bya ba'i rnam grangs brgya nyi shu yod do/ /de dag gang zhe na/ ming gis bgrang ba las/ mdo mdod dmigs kyis bshad pa'i gnas sum cu dang/ byis pa rum du chags pa la
342b2(mdo 'grel): dpyad du bya ba rnam pa drug dang/ nad gzhi rnam pa bcu drug dang/ nad gso ba'i dpyad nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang/ bkru sman dang/ skyug sman dang/ sman mas gtang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga grub pa rnam pa drug dang/ byis pa chung du'i dpyad dang/ gdon nad kyi cho ga
342b3(mdo 'grel): dang smyo ba dang/ brjod byed kyi nad dang/ mig nad dang/ sna nad dang/ kha nad nad/ rna nad dang/ klad nad la sogs pa'i dpyad dang/ rma dang mtshon gyis phog pa sna tshogs dang/ rkang lag dang/ 'bur ba la sogs pa gso ba'i dpyad rnam pa bzhi
342b4(mdo 'grel): bcu yod do/ /de la tshe ting bar 'dod na nyin re zhing rtag tu ji ltar bya ba dang/ lo gcig cing dus tshigs tha dad pa drug yod pa la kha zas la sogs pa'i cho ga dang/ dbyad ji ltar bya ba dang/ rtag pa bde zhi nad med par bya ba
342b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ skom ci dang ci btung ba dang/ kha zas so so'i bye brag shes par bya ba dang/ kha zas dang skom la sogs pa'i nang du/ dug btab pa thams cad la tshor zhing ngos zin par bya ba'i thabs bstan te/ zas bsdam par bya ba bshad pa dang/
342b6(mdo 'grel): zas ran par bza' ba' i chod bzung ba brtan pa dang/ sman sna so so'i mthu dang yon tan dang zhu ba'i rjes bstan pa dang/ /sman gyi khu ba mngar ba dang/ skyur ba dang kha ba la sogs pa'i bye brag ro la gnas pa bstan pa dang/ bad kan
342b7(mdo 'grel): dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad shes par bya ba dang/ nad de dag gi so so'i bye brag dbye ba dang/ nad so so gso ba'i thabs gnyis pa bstan pa dang/ rid ba dang ske zhing nyam chung ba brta ba'i thabs dang/ snum la par byang? kyi cho ga bya ba
343a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa'i nad sbyang bar bya ba dang/ dugs dang lums bya ba dang/ mas bkru zhing gsal ba la sogs pas lus brtan par bya ba dang/ sna nas gtang ba dang/ sman
343a2(mdo 'grel): gyi dud pa gtang zhing rdub pa dang/ bad kan rgyas sam so 'gul lam/ na ba lta bu la til mar ram sman gyi khu ba khar blugs shing dor ba dang/ mig sman blugs shing dor ba dang/ mig sman blugs te mig nad bkru ba dang/ mig nad bkrus nas
343a3(mdo 'grel): mig gso ba'i sman btang ba dang/ mda' la sogs pa mtshon gyis rmas te mde'u khong du lus pa dang/ tsher ma zug pa 'am gre bar bsnangs ba'am/ gram chag ba dbyung ba'i thabs dang/ btsags bu dang/ bcag khab la sogs
343a4(mdo 'grel): pa sna tshogs kyi bye brag dang/ rtsa'i bye brag dang/ mtshon khong du lus pa dbyung ba'i cho ga dang/ gtar dpyad so sos nad dmigs gang gang la gdab pa dang/ thal sman rnon po'i sman gyi bsku ba dang/ me ba cwa gdab pa'i las bya
343a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i de dag ni lus kyi nad gso ba'i cho ga mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu bya ba yin no/ /de la byis pa dum du chags pa ni mngal du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ de la kha zas dang spyod lam ji ltar bshad pa dang/ rum du chags
343a6(mdo 'grel): pa de'i nad kyi bye brag dang/ de'i rkang lag dang/ yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa dang/ gnad kyi bye brag bstan pa dang/ lus mdog dang/ tshul la sogs pa 'gyur te 'chi ltas byung ba dang/ sman pa 'bod pa 'am/ 'gug pa'i
343a7(mdo 'grel): bang chen las ltas su lta ba dang/ 'di drug ni byis pa rum du chags pa'i bye brag bstan pa'o/ /nad gzhi ni nad thams cad kyi gzhi zhes bya ba dang/ rims nad mang po'i nad gzhi dang/ khrag nad kyi nad gzhi dang/ lud pa'i
343b1(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gzhi dang/ glo gcong la sogs pa dang/ chang drags pa las nad du gyur pa dang/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad dang/ tshad pa'i nad dang/ chus 'gags pa'i nad dang/ /gcin snyi pa'i nad dang/ khong 'bras dang/ dmu rdzid
343b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ skya rba ba dang/ mdze nad dang/ rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa dang/ dreg nad dang/ nad 'di rnam pa bcu drug gi nad gzhi ci dad ci las gyur pa bstan pa ni nad gzhi bcu drug bshad pa'o/ /de la nad gso ba'i dpyad rnam ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis
343b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rims nad sna tshogs gso ba dang/ khrag nad rgyas te stod smad du 'byung ba gso ba dang/ lud pa'i nang gso ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba dang/ glo gcong gi nad gso ba dang chad nad gso ba dang/ rtag tu slon ba'i nang gso ba dang/
343b4(mdo 'grel): chad nad gsog dang/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad gsod dang/ zhu ba'i tshad pa dang/ ma zhu ba be'u sna bas su 'byung ba dang/ rnam gnyis kyi tshad pa gso ba dang/ po ba'i nang gso ba dang/ gcin 'gags pa'i nad gso ba dang/ gcin za gu'i nad gso ba dang/
343b5(mdo 'grel): khong 'bras gso ba dang/ skran nad gso ba dang/ dmu rdzings gso pa dang/ skya rbab kyi nad gso ba dang/ 'or nad gso ba dang/ me dpal gso ba dang/ mdze'i nang gso ba dang/ sha bkra'i dpyad dang/ rlung nad kyi dpyad dang/ dreg nad gso
343b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpyad rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni nad gso ba'i le'u zhes bya'o/ /cho ga grub pa rnam drug ces bya ba ni/ skyug sman gtang pa'i chog dang/ bkru ba'i cho ga dang/ skyug sman dang bkru ba de grub par bya ba'i cho ga dang/ sman mas
343b7(mdo 'grel): gtang pa'i cho ga dang/ sman mas gtang pa'i cho gas nad phyin te sos par bya ba dang/ sman mas gtang pa'i thabs nor tam/ gtang ma lags pa las ma rung ste nad du gyur pa gso ba'i thabs dang sman gyi cho ga bstan pa ste rnam pa 'di drug ni sman
344a1(mdo 'grel): dpyad kyi cho ga grub par bya ba yin no/ /sman dpyad kyi cho ga bzhi bcu pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de dag gang zhe na byis pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni byis pa btsas ma thag pa'i tshe nas dpyad dang che gar bya ba'i rim pa rnam
344a2(mdo 'grel): gsum dang/ byis pa'i nad mi 'byung bar bya ba dang/ nu zho'i dpyad dang/ byis pa gdon gyi btab na gso ba'i cho ga dang/ sman gtang pa'i thabs dang/ mi chen po'i gdon gyis gtab na gdon gyi dmigs shes pa dang/ gdon nad bsal
344a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i cho ga dang/ smyo ba'i nad bsal ba dang/ brjed byed kyi nad bsal ba dang/ rdzi ma dang mig dang mchu'i nad ngo shes pa dang/ nad dmigs bsal ba dang/ mig gi mdza' ma'i gra mtshams dang/ mig gi 'bras bu'i nad dmigs brtag pa
344a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ nad so sor gsal ba'i cho ga dang/ mig rab rib du gyur te mi mthong ba'i nad dmigs brtag pa dang/ nad gso ba'i cho ga dang/ mig gi mthong ba nyams pa'i nad gso ba'i cho ga dang/ mig nad sna tshogs kyi nad dmigs
344a5(mdo 'grel): brtag pa dang/ mig nad gso ba'i cho ga dang/ rna nad kyi dmigs brtag pa dang/ rna nad gso ba dang/ rna nad kyi nad dmigs brtag pa dang/ sna nad gso ba'i cho ga dang/ kha nad kyi dmigs brtag pa dang/ kha nad gso ba'i
344a6(mdo 'grel): cho ga dang/ mgo nad kyi dmigs gang yin brtag pa dang/ mgo nad gso ba'i cho ga dang/ rma rnyid gso ba'i cho ga dang/ rma gsar pa gso ba'i cho ga dang/ rkang lag chag grub su gyur ba gso ba dang/ mtshan par brdol ba'i
344a7(mdo 'grel): nad dmigs brtag cing gso ba'i cho ga dang/ 'bras dang thor bu la sogs pa nad dmigs brtag pa dang/ gso ba'i cho ga dang/ 'brum bu phra mo'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba dang/ gso ba'i cho ga dang/ gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad
344b1(mdo 'grel): dmigs bdag? pa dang/ gso ba'i cho ga dang/ dug sna tshogs kyi dmigs brtag ci gso ba'i cho ga dang/ sprul gdug pas zin pa'i nad gso ba dang/ srin bu gdug bas zin pa dang/ byi ba la sogs pa gdug pas zin pa so so'i gso ba'i cho ga dang/ nad
344b2(mdo 'grel): med cing rgas srab bcud kyi len sbyar ba'i cho ga dang/ bu med pa la sa bon gso zhing ro ci ba'i cho ga dang/ sbyad rnam pa bzhi bcu ste/ de ltar dpyad kyi rnam grangs brgya nyi shu ni mdo rnam pa drug tu bsdus te bshad pa yin no/ /de la dang por
344b3(mdo 'grel): mdo'i gnas sum cu bstan pa las go rim bzhin du rtag tu nyin par gyi dpyad du bya ba bshad par bya ste/ nyams tha mal par gnas pas tshe bsrung par bya ba dang/ lus kyi rim gro bya ba'i phyir nad par dmar rengs shar tsa na langs te skad cig
344b4(mdo 'grel): 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol tu bshad gci la sogs pa byas nas/ nad par so shing gi rgyu shing arga dang/ shing n+ya gro d+ha dang/ seng ldeng dang/ shing ka rany+dza dang/ shing ka ku b+ha la sogs pa so shing ro kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ ska bar bro
344b5(mdo 'grel): ba las thor to bzhogs te 'jam por byas la/ so rnyil la gnod par ma gyur par ? bar bya'o/ gal te zas ma zhu ba 'am/ slon bro 'am/ dbugs mi bde ba'am/ lung pa lu ba 'am/ rims na'am/ kha yon por gyur pa'am/ kha skams te skom
344b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ kha'i nang du thor bu byung ba 'am/ /snying na ? mig na 'am/ glang pa na ba'am/ rna ba na bar gyur na ni so shing ma bca' zhig/ kha gdong bkrus nas mig la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ mig la phan pa'i sman bstang zil zhes bya ba mig la rtag tu byug go/
344b7(mdo 'grel): mig ni me'i rang bzhin yin pas na/ de'i khyad par du lhag par bad kan las 'jigs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bas na zhag bdun zhing mig sman skyer khaN+Da zhes bya ba mig tu lan cig blugs shing mchi ma dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas rma?
345a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang klad pa mi bde ba rnams la til mar las sbyar ba'i sman mar thig ba gnyis tsam sna nas btang ngo/ /mgul ba dang gre ba dang/ lce'u chung dang/ lce dang lkog ma dang/ so dang rnyil la sogs pa'i nad bsal ba
345a2(mdo 'grel): 'am phan par bya ba'i phyir sman gyi khu bas mkhur bkang ste skad cig tsam bzhag la dor ro/ /sman sregs pa'i dud pa'i yang sbu gu nas/ /sna dang kha nas rdub par bya'o/ /so rtsi tam+bu la yang mur bar bya'o/ /gal te glo 'grams te kha nas
345a3(mdo 'grel): khrag 'ong dam/ /mkhris pa skyes sam/ kha nas khrag mang du 'ong ba 'am/ rlung gi lus rtsub bor gyur ba 'am/ mig na'i dug nad dam/ brgyal ba 'am/ chang nad kyis gzir tam/ lus skam par 'gyur ba 'di lta bu la so rtsi tam+bu
345a4(mdo 'grel): la mur du mi rung ngo/ /lus rtag tu mar gyis bskus na rgas pa dang ngal zhing dub ba dang/ chad pa dang/ rlung nad sel bar byed de/ lhag par mgo bo dang/ rkang pa mar gyis bskus na/ mi nad kyis skyon med/ mig gsal ba dang/ lus rtas
345a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ tshe la phan pa dang/ gnyid legs par 'ong ba dang/ pags pa'i mdog 'jam zhing rtas bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bad kan skyes te mi bde ba 'am/ skyug sman nam/ bkru sman gtang te bkrus sam/ zas ma zhu bar gyur na
345a6(mdo 'grel): mar gyis ma byug zhig/ lus brtsal zhing sbyangs na/ khong yang ba dang/ las phod pa dang/ zas zhus par byed pa'i me'i drod 'bar ba dang/ tshil zad par byed pa dang/ lus kyi stod smad skabs phye la lus drims par
345a7(mdo 'grel): byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad yod dam/ byis pa 'am rgas ba zhig na lus bskyod cing btsal bar bya ba de yang dgun lhags pa'i dus dang/ dpyid kyi dus su sbyar te/ de yang zas snum bag
345b1(mdo 'grel): bza' zhing stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pas/ stobs kyi shugs dang/ tshad phyed tsam byung ste/ btsal zhing bskyod par bya'o/ /dus gong ma gnyis ma yin pa dus gzhan gyi tshe ni cir na tsam mi drag bar btsal zhing shugs dbyung ba dang sbyang bar bya'o//
345b2(mdo 'grel): de ltar btsal zhing bskyod pa'i shugs phyung ba'i rjes la/ lus thog thag ci ran cig bde bar nyes shig bskyod cing btsal ba'i shugs dbyung ba dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /bskyod cing btsal ba'i shugs ha cang grags ches na skom
345b3(mdo 'grel): dad che ba dang/ glo gcod du gyur ba dang/ snying na te mi dran pa mun thibs shes byed pa dang khrag rgyas pa dang/ mkhris ba rgyas pa dang/ lung pa lu ba dang/ rims dang slon par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi gnod pa drag shul las
345b4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa de lta bu 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang mtshan mo mi nyal bar byed pa dang/ lam ring gis du ba ste chad pa dang/ bud med la grags te dub pa dang/ gad mo rgod drags pa dang/ smra mang zhing grags
345b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ stobs kyi tshan gyis mi nus bzhin/ ha cang shugs drag pos btsal zhing bsten na seng ges glang po che grangs pa bzhin lus ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lus mar gyis byugs ba'i rjes la lde gus byugs
345b6(mdo 'grel): shing byis te dril na/ bad kan sel ba dang/ tshil rab tu zhu bar byed pa dang/ lus dang yan lag brtan par byed pa dang/ pags pa'i mdog dri ma med cing shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lus lde gus dril nas lus khrus bya'o//
345b7(mdo 'grel): khrus byas pa'i yon tan ni pho ba drod che zhing kha zas 'ju ba dang/ bud med la phong de ro tsa ba dang/ tshe la phan pa dang/ mdangs dang ldan zhing stobs skye ba dang/ lus kyi pags pa g.ya ba med pa dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ dal zhing dub pa rtas 
346a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rdul med pa dang/ snyom pa sangs pa dang/ skom pa med pa dang/ lus che ba las lus bsil ba dang/ mi shes pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyis khrus chu ni tshan por byas la/ mgul ba man chad lus la blugs shing
346a2(mdo 'grel): pa krus na lus kyi stobs skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo bkru ba ni chu tsha ches na mi bzang ngo/ /chu tshan de nyid kyis mgo bkrus na/ lus kyi stobs 'phrog pa dang/ skra 'byi ba dang/ mig la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gal te kha 'gram pa la chags pa'i
346a3(mdo 'grel): nad yod dam/ mig na 'am/ kha nad kyis btab pa 'am/ rna ba na 'am/ tshad pa na 'am/ lto sbos sam/ cham pas btab pa 'am/ kha zas ma zhu 'am/ zas zos ma thag lta bu la bkrus na mi rung ste/ khrus ma byed cing/ kha zas bza' ba ni
346a4(mdo 'grel): zas zhu ba'i rjes la zos na phan te/ kha zas bza' ba de la yang tshod ran par bzung ste bza' bar bya'o/ /bshad ba 'od ba gyur na mi brnags par bshad do/ /bshad pa mi 'ong bzhin de yang stobs kyis mi btsir ro/ /bshad pa 'ong bar
346a5(mdo 'grel): gyur na bshad ba ma byas par las gzhan mi byed cing/ de bzhin du nad gang yang rung ste mi bden/ nad ma bsal bar las gzhan mi bsgrub bo/ /sems can thams cad ni ci byed sgrub pa thams cad kyang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir bsgrub bo/ /bde
346a6(mdo 'grel): ba de yang chos ma bsgrubs na mi 'thob 'o/ /de bas na chos la rab tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bas na mi dge ba'i grogs po ring du spangs la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la mos pas bsten par bya'o/ /de bas na sems can la gnod
346a7(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dang/ rku ba dang/ 'dod pas gzhan la g.yem pa dang/ phra ma dang/ ngag rtsub po dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ tshig gyal? ba smra ba dang/ gnod sems dang/ brnab sems dang/ log par lta ba'i sdig pa'i lus ngag dang yid kyi
346b1(mdo 'grel): las mi dge ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /sems can 'tsho bas 'phongs pa dang/ nad dang mya ngan gyis gzir te nyams thag par gyur pa la ci nus pas phan gdags pa dang/ chung du grog sbur yan chad la yang bdag gi rang gi lus dang srig bzhan du blta bar bya'o//
346b2(mdo 'grel): rtag par blta ba dang/ dge slong rnams dang/ bram ze dang/ sman pa dang/ na so rgan pa dang/ rgyal po dang/ gsar du 'ong ba rnams la 'gron bya ba dang/ slong ba rnams la 'gron bya ba dang/ slong ba rnams la rgyab kyis mi phyogs pa dang/ mi brnyas mi sbyong pa dang/
346b3(mdo 'grel): dgras tshar du gnod pa chad byed kyang phan gdags pa ltar bya ba dang/ dar ba dang dgud par gyur na yang yid cig ste/ sems lhag par dga' ba 'am/ mya ngan la gnon par mi byed/ dar cing 'byor bar gyur pa'i rgyu las brtsal bar bya ba'i rigs kyi
346b4(mdo 'grel): pha rol 'byor par gyur pa la phrag dog bya bar mi rigs so/ /smra ba yang dus su smra/ phan par smra/ ran par smra/ brdzun gyi mi bsla zhing nges pa dang/ /bzhin 'dzum zhing snga nas gsong po smra ba dang/ spyod lam bzang po dang ldan ba dang/ /snying rje che zhing 'jam pa dang
346b5(mdo 'grel): bdag 'ba' zhig bde bar byed pa yin/ /thams cad la yid rton par byed pa yang ma yin/ kun la dog par byed pa yang ma yin/ bdag gi dgra zhes bya ba su yang med pa dang/ bdag ni su'i dgra yang ma yin bar bya ba dang/ bdag la gzhan gyis brnyas so
346b6(mdo 'grel): zhes tshig tu mi 'byin/ dpon po 'am bla ma bdag la mi byams so zhes mi smra/ mi'i yid dang sbyar te/ brtags la ci nas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya ste/ gzhan dga' bar byed pa ni mdzangs pa zhes bya'o/ /dbang po rnams gzir cig
346b7(mdo 'grel): gnod pa yang mi bya/ ha cang yang longs bcos shing nyams rangs su yang mi bya/ mdor na chos dang nor dang longs spyod dang 'di gsum med pa'i mod stong par gyur pa'i las mi brtsam mo/ /las 'di gsum dang mi ldan yang
347a1(mdo 'grel): las 'di gsum dang mi 'gal ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /mdor na chos thams cad la bsgrub cing bya ba ni ran par sgrub cing 'jug go/ skra ring po dang sen mo dang kha sbu 'brel pa dang/ dri ma 'byung ba'i sgo dgu
347a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ rkang pa dri ma med par bya ba dang/ khrus bya ba la dga' ba dang/ spos mchog tu dri zhim po thogs shing cha lugs mdzes la rgod cing 'phyar ba ma yin pa dang/ gos dang rgyan la sogs pa ha cang yang ches par mi bya/ rtag tu rin
347a3(mdo 'grel): po che dang/ grub pa'i sngags dang/ sman chen po dag kyang lus la bcad do/ /phan tshun 'gro na yang lham gyon gdugs thogs la mig ran pa tsam du blta zhing 'gro'o/ /mtshan mo ni gar yang mi 'gro'o/ /mtshan mo mi 'gror mi
347a4(mdo 'grel): rung brtad ba'i las shig byung na yang/ grogs dang bshams la chas shing lag cha thogs la song zhig/ yan man 'gro ba'i lam ga na mchod rten gyi grib ma 'am/ bla ma mchod gnas shig 'dug gam/ rgyal mtshan gyi
347a5(mdo 'grel): grib ma 'am/ mi ro dang thal ba dang lud phung dang/ gyo mo dang/ bong pa dang/ gtor ma dang yas btags bor dang/ khrus byas pa'i sa dang/ chu bor ba 'di rnams la mi brtsi mi bsgom par bskor de 'gro bar
347a6(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /chu bo che la brgal par mi bya/ /ma chen po'i nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ gru ngan la bag tsha ba dang/ shing bag tsha ba la mi 'gro mi 'dzeg/ gzhon pa rta mi srun pa la zhon te mi 'gro/ sbrid pa dang/ gang mo dang/ blal dang/ bya
347a7(mdo 'grel): snyongs la sogs pa'i tshe yang kha ha cang mi gdang ngo/ sna'i bu gar 'dzub mos ha cang yang mi drung ba dang/ bya ba'i dmigs med par sal bab du ri mo mi bri lus dang yan lag ha cang mi gcu/ gtsog gtsog par
347b1(mdo 'grel): yang ma 'dug shig/ lus kyi las sam/ ngag gis smra ba'am/ sems kyi bsam pa'i las ci byed kyang rung ste/ dal bar ma gyur par tshad bzung ste snga nas thong zhig/ yun ring du mal cig nam 'grod cig/ rgyus ma rig pa'i shing drung du nub mo ma
347b2(mdo 'grel): 'dug cig/ de bzhin lam gyi sum mdo dang/ mchod rten gyi drung dang/ lam gyi gzhi mdo'i rgyun sa dang/ lha khang gi drung dang ri dags la sogs pa bsang pa'i dmar dang/ slo phyung ba'i sa dang/ 'brog dang 'di dag tu 'gro bar mi
347b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /khang stong dang dur khrod du ni nyin par yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /nyi ma la mig chugs su yang mi blta/ mgo bo la khur thogs te khyer bar mi bya/ shin tu zhib cing phra ba 'am/ 'od 'tshor ba 'am/ gtsog pa 'am/ mi sdug pa
