419b2(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /de la nyam mtshag brtas par bya ba ni sha mtshag rgyas pa tshon par bya'o/ /nyam mtshag smad de skem por bya ba ni zas dbri zhing bsdam pa smyung ba lta bur byas pas/ lus sha dbri ste khong yang bar bya ba yin no de/
419b3(mdo 'grel): yang yong ni phal cher lus kyi rang bzhin ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' i rang bzhin yin te 'di rnams par bskyed pa dang dbri ba'o/ /chen po lnga po 'di rnams la dpyad du bya ba/ khong snum ba dang/ lus kyi khong rtsub par bya
419b4(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /lus de la yang dugs dang lums bya ba'i cho ga nad gyi gnad kyi tshe gzhil bar bya ba'i dpyad kyang bya'o/ /chen po lnga'i las la dpyad du bya ba yang rnam pa gnyis te/ lus kyi nad bkru zhing sbyang ba dang/ zhi bar bya'o/ /bkru zhing sbyang bani nang gi
419b5(mdo 'grel): nad phyir sel ba ste/ de yang rnam pa lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ sman mas btang te nad bsal pa dang/ skyug sman btang ba dang/ khong pa'i lus nad bkru ba dang /mgo bo'i nad rnams sman sna nas gtang zhing bsal ba dang/ gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba
419b6(mdo 'grel): dang lnga'o/ /nad zhi bar byed pa ni nad sel cing 'khru bar byed pa yang ma yin te/ 'phrod cing snyoms te bde ba las gnod par yang mi byed/ rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa rnams ma snyoms te nang du gyur pa'i rnams dub cing zhi nas nang 'phrod snyom
419b7(mdo 'grel): par byed pa de la nad zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ de yang rnam pa bdun du blta'o/ /de gang zhe na/ drod che ba'i 'ju sman gyis nad bsal du rung ba 'ju bar bya ba dang/ pho ba'i me drod bskyed pa dang/ bru ba cha bar bya ba dang/ skom par bya ba dang/ lus bsig cing
420a1(mdo 'grel): bcag pa dang/ nyi ma tsha ba la bde ba dang/ tsha ba'i nad la bser bu bsil ba dang sbyar ba 'di dag ni 'phral du nad dub cing zhi bar bya ba yin/ rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad gnyis la ni brta ba'i cho ga dang/ dub cing zhi bar bya ba'i
420a2(mdo 'grel): dpyad bya'o/ /zas dang sman gyi lus brta bar bya ba ni chang nad kyi btab te nyam chung ba dang/ bud med kyis dub ba dang/ mya ngan gyis sha zad pa dang/ lus khur gyis ske ba dang/ lam rings gyi rgyun gyis chad pa dang /glo brdol ba dang/ lus skems
420a3(mdo 'grel): shing ring? ba dang/ khong na snum med de lus rtsub pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang /rlung gi shas che ba dang/ lto na bu yod de nyams chung ba dang/ bu btsas pa dang/ byis ba chung du dang/ mi rgan po sbabs chung du 'di lta bu dang/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus
420a4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu lus brta ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la lus brta ba ni sha dang 'o ma dang/ mar dang/ mngar bag dang/ snum bag dang/ li khar dkar po dang/ sman mas btang pa 'di dag gis khong brta zhing nyams mtshag bskyed la/ yang
420a5(mdo 'grel): lus la phan pa mtshan mo mal na gnyid bde ba'i log par bya/ lus la mar gyis byugs shing mnyes te/ chu dron pos khrus bya ba dang/ nyam bag tu bde bar 'dug pa dang/ nyams dga' bar bya ba 'di lta bus lus blta'o//
420a6(mdo 'grel): yang lus kyi sha mtshag nyam smad cing 'bri bar bya ba ni/ gcin snyi ba'i nad dang/ phob na be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na pa dang/ zas snum bag ha cang zos sam/ lus kyi khong snum ches sam/ rims kyis btab bam /brla ra nges
420a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i nad yod dam/ mdzes btab bam/ shu chen mched pa 'am/ khong 'bras dang/ mcher ba na ba dang /klang pa na ba dang/ lkog ma na ba dang/ mig na ba dang/ lus sha bskyed de sbom por 'gyur ba dang/ 'di lta bu dang/ dgun bstod kyi tshe
420b1(mdo 'grel): lta bu rtag tu zas bsdam shing kha zas dbrib dang/ smyung par bya'o/ /de la sman gyis rtag tu bkru zhing sbyang bani lus ha cang sha che zhing sbom pa dang/ nyam stobs che ba'i mi dang/ tsha ba'i mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad dang/ bad kan rgyas pa'i te che ba dang/ pho ba'i
420b2(mdo 'grel): nang na be'u sna bas yod pas zas mi 'ju ste mchin pa ni ba dang/ rims na ba dang/ rtog tu smon zhing skyug bro ba dang ? tshad ba rab tu 'khru ba'i nad dang/ snying na ba dang/ bshang gci 'gags pa ste 'ong du mi rung ba dang/ lus dang khong lce ba dang/ sgrag pa
420b3(mdo 'grel): rtag tu 'ong ba dang/ yig? 'chus shing dang kha mi bde ba la sogs pa dang /bkru sman dang skyug sman drag tu cher btang ngo/ /sman gyis ran par bkru zhing sbyang ba 'bring tsam du btang ba'i dmigs ni/ sha che chung ran tsam gyi mi la sngar nad bzhu ba'i sman
420b4(mdo 'grel): btang /drod skyod la/ de'i rjes la nad kyi dmigs gong ma ltar mi bde zhing na ba gang yang rung ste/ de lta bu'i mi dang/ yang la la sha chung zhing skem la nad dmigs gong ma ltar na ba de rnams la/ bkru zhing sbyad ba'i sman drag ngal ran pa 'bring tsam du
420b5(mdo 'grel): btang ba dang/ nyams chung zhing skem pa la thun chung zhing 'jam por btang la/ de'i tshe na kha zas bsnga ma zhing skom thur par bya'o/ /yong ni nad ba'i nyams stobs 'bring tsam cig la mi bde na/ de la dpyad bkru sman gyis bkru zhing sbyad mi dgos
420b6(mdo 'grel): te/ de lta bu ni lus bsig? cing bcag pa dang/ nad dmigs dang sbyar te/ rlung dang bser bu las gsang ba gar legs par bya'o/ /nyams mtsheg 'bring la yang brku sman la sogs pa mi btang na/ nad pa nya ma chung ba la bkru sman
420b7(mdo 'grel): 'jam po yang btang du mi rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos so/ /cad pa lus kyi nyam mtshag smad cing bri ba lta bu la ni nyam mtshag gso zhing blta bar bya ba'i mi la ni/ zas bsdams pa dang/ sbyang ba la sogs pa cung zad tsam bya rung ngo/ /sbyin
421a1(mdo 'grel): gos shing nyams mchog brta ba'i dpyad bya ba dang skyug sman dang bkru sman dang smyung bar byas te/ nyams mtshag smad par bya ba yang yul gyi snams dang/ dus dang/ mi'i na tshod dang/ nyams ma tshag dang
421a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar te/ ha cang nyams 'bri ba dang/ ha cang nyams brta ba yang mi bya'o/ /de la lus kyi nyam mchi ga brta pa'i dpyad bya ste/ nyams mthu brtas par 'gyur bar mngon zhing nyam tshag brtas /sha skyes stobs dang ldan pa gyur na/
421a3(mdo 'grel): mig dang rna ba la sogs pa dbang po rnams gsal/ bshang lci'i dri ma mi sri bar 'byung /lus khong yang bshor/ ba zas yi gar 'ong na de lta bu nad med par gso zhing cho gar byar rung ngo/ /yang kha zas bsdam zh+ng dbri ba dang/ smyung
421a4(mdo 'grel): par bya bas phan par mngon pa'i rtags ni kha zas phra zhing bsdams sam/ sbyung bar byas pa las zas zhu ste bkres shing skom par 'gyur ba dang/ khong gsud pa'i sgegs pa man ma bo mi zhim pa med pa tha ma la bar 'gyur ba la/ sems
421a5(mdo 'grel): kyang gsal dang ga dang /gre ba yang sang sang por gyur la /na ba dang mi bde ba yang rtse'i zhal la/ khong yang zhing ci bya'o cog la sems spro ba yod/ myo myong po snyom pa'i bag med pa de lta bu ni/ kha zas smyung? ba byas pas phan bar mngon pa yin no/ /
421a6(mdo 'grel): nyam mtshag brta ste sha bskyed pa'i cho ga chod ma zin te ha cang drags pas sha ha cang cher skyes sam kha zas bri zhing smad ba dang/ smyung bar byas ba drags pa ha cang ? por gyur pa 'di gnyis lta bu la sman dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba ni/ sha cher skyes pa dang/ kha zas smyung par byas
421a7(mdo 'grel): ba las nad cing gyur pa'i tshul mngon te/ lus sha ha cang che zhing tsho ba'i ni nad 'brum bu dang/ ? snyi ba'i nad dang/ rims nad dang/ dmu rdzing lta bu gsus pa cher skyes pa'i nang dang /bshang gci 'byung ba'i mtshams su mtshan mar brdol ba'i nang dang/ lung ba lu ba dang
421b1(mdo 'grel): rim rmongs bus 'debs pa dang /gcin sri ba dang pho bar be'u snabs chags te zas mi 'ju ba dang/ mdze la sogs pa'i nad mi bzad pa rnams 'byung ngo/ /de la sha che zhing chen po ni tshil zad par bya ba dang/ rlung dang bad kan bsal bar bya ba lta bu'i dpyad thams cad bzang
421b2(mdo 'grel): do/ /de la mi tshon bo skem po grims par bya ba'i kha zas ni/ rgya sran ku la ta dang/ ju? rna dang/ sha ma rkra khre rgod dang/ mas dang/ sran chud man sran rde'u dang/ 'di rnams g.yos su byas pa bzang zhing/ skom du ni sbrang rtsi chu dang sbyang ba dang/ zo ga chu dang/
421b3(mdo 'grel): dgag dang/ 'di rnams btung ngo/ /yang sman a ri ta'i khu ba skom du bsnan pa btung ngo/ /sems la bskyed pa dang/ skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang/ lus gsig cing bcag pa dang mtshan mo 'dod 'dod ma nyal bar bya'o/ /sman ni a
421b4(mdo 'grel): ru ra dang /ba ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsum zhib tu btags la/ sbrang rtsi lde gus sbrus te bza'o/ /yang sman gu ru rtse sla tres dang /a ru ra dang/ gla sgang chen po 'di gsum btags te sgra rtsi las sbrus pa bza'o/ /yang sman ra tsany+dza? na zhes
421b5(mdo 'grel): bya bskyed khaN+Da dang/ rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ba sa la par ni dang/ pi na parna dang/ bra ha ti dang/ kanda kA ri dang/ gze ma dang 'di lnga btang ngo/ /yang gu gul btang ba'i dpyad dang/ sman brag zhun btang ba'i dbyang bya'o/ /sman agni sman ti khu ba yang
421b6(mdo 'grel): ra?/ de btang na yang sha 'bri'o/ /yang sman ba ting+ga dang/ sgra dang/ ya bak+Sha? ra nas tshig 'khrus pa'i tsha dang/ lcags kyi tsha tsha phye ma nag po dang/ nas dang skyu ru ra dang/ 'di rnams phye mar byas la/ sbang rtsi dang sbyar te btang na/ sha ce zhing tsha ba'i
421b7(mdo 'grel): nad sel zhing sha grims par 'ong ngo/ /yang tsha pa rnam pa gsum po ? sga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ ka ti ti dang/ ba ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang gsum dang/ shi bru dang/ byi TaM ka dang/ bod pa dang/ thi ra dang/ shing
422a1(mdo 'grel): kun dang/ lan tshwa nag po dang/ go snyod dang/ la la phud dang/ 'u su dang/ kru trug tres dang/ skyer pa dang/ chu rtsi mo dang/ bri ha tI rnam gnyis dang/ sba ma'i 'bras bu dang/ pa tha dad/ pi pi ling
422a2(mdo 'grel): gi rtsa ba dang/ chu las skyes pa ke'u ka dang/ 'di rnams zhib tu brtags pa'i phye ma cha snyam pa dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang/ til mar gsum mnyam par byas te/ sman 'di rnams las nas phye cha bcu drug gis bskyed de sbyar ba 'di
422a3(mdo 'grel): mthungs na/ lus sha rab tu che zhing sbom po dang/ lus sha chen po las byung ba'i nad thams cad dang/ nad gzhan yang 'byang la sha yang grims shing phra bar 'ong/ gzhan yang snying na ba dang/ mig ser dang/ sha kra dang/
422a4(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ lkog ma na ba dang/ 'di rnams sel te phan /yid rno/ /yid gzhungs sems dran pa la phan/ khong pa'i drod skye/ zas 'ju ba la phan no/ /ha cang kha zas bsdams shing spyad pa
422a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba drags pa na/ lus sha rang tu skam/ mgo 'khor/ lud pa skams por 'ong/ /skom dang che/ kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ lus kyi khong na chil dang snum bag zad pa dang/ khong pa'i nad kyi dod nyams te zad//
422a6(mdo 'grel): /gnyid mor/ mig rtul/ rna ba mi gsang/ kha chu zad /gzi dang mdangs nyams te/ zas yi gar 'ong ba mi skres/ skad 'gag /chu sor zug snying na /klad pa na /byin pa dang brlan/ slu do dang rtsib logs na/ rlung
422a7(mdo 'grel): nad las gyur pa'i rims nad kyis 'debs/ smra ba'i tshigs ma/ lus kyi bstod du rlung nad 'dzug/ skyug bro/ /rus pa'i tshigs kun btsag pa snyam byed cing na/ bshad gci dri ma sri pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu ni kha zas bsdams pa dang/ smyung la
422b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ sman gyis bkru zhing sbyangs te/ skem por gyur pa lang nad de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /yod ni lus sha brta zhing tshon po bya ba'am/ skem por bya ba yang rung ste/ skem por ni nad dkon la// sman dpyad sla ste rung ngo/ /tshon po nab ni sman
422b2(mdo 'grel): dpyad byar med de mi rung? du/ ha cang tsho ches pa ni tshil ches pas khong pa'i me'i drod kyang 'bri/ rlung nad kyang sel te/ zas mngar bag bza' zhing bsod bas tshim par byed pa dang/ bde ba nyams phag tu byed pas ni sha skem
422b3(mdo 'grel): pa las tshon por 'gyur ro/ /de bsan na rgan pa dang/ kha zas mi 'phrod mi mthun pa bza' bas/ lus skem zhing ring par gyur pa 'di lta bu la lus sha skyes shing rtas par 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom thams cad dang/ sman
422b4(mdo 'grel): btang zhing sems las med pa la rtag tu snying dga' bar 'dug pa dang/ rtag tu skom 'thungs shing nyin par nyal ba ni phag bzhin du tshon por 'gyur ro/ /lus brtan zhing tshon por bya ba ni/ sha las lhag pa ni
422b5(mdo 'grel): gang yang med do/ /de bas mi tshon po sha pal gyis snying mi chim pa dang/ sha mchag brta zhing tshon por blta ba dang/ gcan gzan dang/ khra lta bus lus gsos shing bskyed pa'i sha lhag par bzang ngo/ /skem por
422b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sha yang ba phan no/ /nas dang gro ni tshon bo dang/ skem po gnyid ka'i zas su bzang ngo/ /yod ni nad kyi rnam grangs mangs pas bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa dang/ 'khru pa gcad pa la sogs pa
422b7(mdo 'grel): dpyad mang po du ma yod kyis kyang mdor na nad pa gso zhing brtas par bya ba dang/ kha zas bsdam zhing sha dbri bar bya ba dang/ sman gyis bkru zhing gsal ba dang/ zhi bar byas pa gang yang rung
423a1(mdo 'grel): dpyad kyi mdo rnam gnyis su 'dus te/ dper na nad kyi rnam grangs brgya nyi shu yod kyis kyang/ nad thams cad kyi gzhi ni rlung dang bad kan dang
423a2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa gsum du 'dus pa dang 'dra'o/ /nad pa blta zhing gso ba'i thabs dang/ nad yang bar bya ba'i phyir zas dbri ba'am smyud par bya ba dang/ gso ba'i thabs rnam pa
423a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis bshad pa'i le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// mang+ga laM//
